text: 如果双曲线的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}(-3,0)$, $F_{2}(3,0)$ ,一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{2} x$，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (3, 0);Focus(G)={F1,F2};Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(2)*x)
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/k^2 = 1);k: Number;k>0;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (3,0)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的任意一点$P$，记点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d$，对于给定点$A(4,5)$，则$|P A|+d$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (4, 5);PointOnCurve(P,G);Distance(P, yAxis) = d;d:Number
process: 抛物线的准线为x=-1”,把P到y轴的距离再行主左延伸一个单位,就是P到准线的距离,根据抛物线的定义,P到准线的距离等于到焦点F(1,0)的距离,所以|PA|+d=|PA|+|PF|-1,由于A在抛物线的外侧,所以,当A、P、F共线时(即P是线段AF与抛物线的交点),所求的值最小,最小值为|AF|-1=\"\sqrt{(9+25)-1=\sqrt{34}-1^{n}}

text: 过点$M(3 ,-1)$且被点$M$平分的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的弦所在直线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: LineSegment;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (3, -1);IsChordOf(H,G);MidPoint(H)=M;PointOnCurve(M,H)

text: 动点$P$与定点$A(-1,0)$ , $B(1,0)$的连线的斜率之积为$-1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, A))*Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = -1;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0)
process: 设P(x,y),则k_{PA}=\frac{y-0}{x+1},k_{PB}=\frac{y-0}{x-1}\because动点P与定点A(-1,0)、B(1,0)的连线的斜率之积为-\thereforek_{PA}\cdotk_{PB}=-1,\therefore\frac{y^{2}}{r^{2}-1}=-1,即x^{2}+y^{2}=1,且x\neq\pm1,综上点P的轨迹方程是x^{2}+y2=1(x\neq\pm1).

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1)
process: 由题可得a=b=1,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{2},故离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}.

text: 点$P(x, y)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}} + \frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$上的任意一点，$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2} \leq 90^{\circ}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(F1, P, F2) <= ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 若双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，且一条渐近线的方程为$y= \sqrt{7} x$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = sqrt(7)*x)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m, n>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$ , 一个焦点恰好是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;n: Number;m>0;n>0;Eccentricity(H) = 1/2;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(H)) = Focus(G)

text: 已知抛物线的顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，其上的点$P(-3 , m)$到焦点的距离为$5$，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;m:Number;Coordinate(P) = (-3, m);Vertex(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G))=5
process: 因为抛物线顶点在原点、焦点在x轴上,且过p(-3,m),可设抛物线方程为y^{2}=-2px(p>0),由抛物线的定义可知,3+\frac{p}{2}=5.\thereforep=4.\therefore抛物线方程为y^{2}=-8x.

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点，$F$为其焦点，点$A(1,5)$，则$|M F|+|M A|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (1, 5);PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = F
process: 抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点(0,1),准线方程y=-1,如图所示,利用抛物线定义知|MP|=|MF|当A,M,P三点共线时,|MF|+|MA|的值最小,即AM\botx轴此时|MF|+|MA|=|AP|=5+1=6

text: 直线$y=x-1$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$| A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = x - 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3} b$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$O A \perp O B$，则椭圆离心率的值等于?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = b*sqrt(6)/3);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B)) = True

text: 抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$和圆$x^{2}+(y-a)^{2}=1$有两个不同的公共点，则$a$的值的集合是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (-a + y)^2 = 1);a: Number;NumIntersection(G, H) = 2
process: 由抛物线与圆有两个交点的情况如下1、当它们相切时,联立抛物线与圆的方程可得y^{2}+(\frac{1}{2}-2a)y+a^{2}-1=0.此时有\triangle=(\frac{1}{2}-2a)^{2}-4(a^{2}-1)=0,解得a=\frac{17}{8}上图中若圆的位置向上移动,则两曲线不存在交点2、由1中的图,若圆的位置向下移动,出现如下有4个交点和3个交点的情况3、在出现3个交点的情况下圆的位置继续下移,则交点从2个到1个,如下图示\therefore此过程a的范围是-1<a<1,此后圆的位置继续向下移动,两曲线无交点综上,a的值的集合(-1,1)\cup(\frac{17}{8})

text: 已知点$P(x, y)$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上，则$3 x+2 y$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G);x1:Number;y1:Number
process: 点P(x,y)在椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1上,令x=\sqrt{5}\cos\theta,y=3\sin\theta\therefore3x+2y=3\sqrt{5}\cos\theta+2\times3\sin\theta=9(\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}\cos\theta+\frac{2}{3}\sin\theta)令\sin\varphi=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3},则\cos\varphi=\frac{2}{3}则原式=9\sin(\varphi+\theta),当\varphi+\theta=\frac{\pi}{2}时其最大值为9故最大值为9青】本题考杳了运后的函数换元后求最值问题,在解答此类问题时注意椭圆方程的换元形式,属于中而

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在椭圆上，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;O: Origin;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, RightDirectrix(G));VectorOf(P, Q) = 2*VectorOf(F1, O);lambda: Number;lambda>0;VectorOf(F1, Q) = lambda*(VectorOf(F1, O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, O)) + VectorOf(F1, P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, P)))
process: 设椭圆的右焦点为F_{2},由\overrightarrow{PQ}=2\overrightarrow{F_{1}O},得知\overrightarrow{PQ}=\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}},可知四边形F_{1}F_{2}QP为平行四边形由于\overrightarrow{F_{1}Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1}O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1}O}|},则平行四边形F_{1}F_{2}QP为菱形.设点P(x,y)、Q(\frac{a2}{c},y),则\overrightarrow{PQ}=(\frac{a2}{c}-x,0),\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}=(2c,0)\because\overrightarrow{PQ}=\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}\therefore\frac{a^{2}}{c}-x=2c\thereforex=\frac{a^{2}}{c}-2c=\frac{a^{2}-2c^{2}}{x},则点P的横坐标为\frac{a^{2}-2c^{2}}{c}由于平行四边形F_{1}F_{2}QP为菱形,则|\overrightarrow{PF}|=|\overrightarrow{PQ}|由椭圆的第二定义可得|\overrightarrow{PF}|=\frac{c}{a}\cdot(\frac{a2-2c^{2}}{c}+\frac{a2}{c})=\frac{2(a^{2}-c^{2})}{a}=2c整理得c^{2}+ac-a^{2}=0,等式两边同时除以a^{2}得e^{2}+e-1=0,\because0<e<1,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2},因此,椭圆的离心率为\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点$F$到其一条渐近线的距离为$1$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线过双曲线的左焦点，则抛物线上的动点$M$到点 $(5,0)$距离的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;Distance(F, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 1;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;PointOnCurve(LeftFocus(G), Directrix(H)) = True;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, H) = True;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (5, 0)
process: 由题意可得:d=\frac{|cd|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=1\thereforeb=1,c=2则抛物线为y^{2}=8x,设动点M(x,y距离为\sqrt{(x-5)^{2}+y^{2}}=\sqrt{x^{2}-10x+25+8x}=\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+24}\therefore最小值是2\sqrt{6}

text: $F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$E$，若$|E F|=4$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;E: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), xAxis) = E;Abs(LineSegmentOf(E, F)) = 4
process: 本题首先可以根据题意写出直线方程y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2}),然后联立直线方程与抛物线方程,借助韦达定理求出线段AB的中点坐标,即可写出线段AB的垂直平分线方程,再然后根据垂直平分线方程求出点E坐标,最后根据|EF|=4即可求出p的值.羊解】因为F是抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点,所以F(\frac{p}{2},0)因为直线过点F且倾斜角为60^{\circ},所以直线方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2}),联立\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2})\\v2=2px\end{cases},整理得3x^{2}-5px+\frac{3p}{4}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{5p}{3}线段AB中点的横坐标为\frac{5p}{6},纵坐标为\frac{\sqrt{3}p}{2}线段AB的垂直平分线的方程为y-\frac{\sqrt{3}p}{3}=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}因为线段AB的垂直平分线交x轴于点E,所以E(\frac{11p}{6},0因为|EF|=4,所以\frac{11p}{6}-\frac{p}{2}=4,解得p=3,

text: 已知$M(t, 0)$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$对称轴上一点，且过该点的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则直线$O A$, $O B$斜率乘积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;t:Number;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M,SymmetryAxis(G));Coordinate(M) = (t, 0);PointOnCurve(M, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 设过M(t,0)的直线方程为:x=my+t,联立方程\begin{cases}x=my+t\\y2=2px\end{cases}可得,y^{2}-2pmx-2pt=0设A,B两点的坐标为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2})则y_{y_{2}}=-2pt则y_{1}y_{2}=-2pt.而^{k}_{OA}\cdotk_{OB}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}}\cdot\frac{y_{2}}{x_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}\cdoty_{2}}{y_{1}^{2}}=\frac{4p^{2}}{y_{1}y_{2}}=\frac{4p^{2}}{-2pt}=-\frac{2p}{t}

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;J: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 + y^2/32 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 1);Expression(J) = (y^2 + (x + 2)^2 = 1/4);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, H);PointOnCurve(N, J)
process: \because两圆圆心(2,0),(-2,0)恰好是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{32}=1的焦点F_{1},F_{2},\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=12,两圆半径分别为:1,\frac{1}{2},\therefore(|PM|+|PN|)\min=|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|\cdot1-\frac{1}{2}=12\cdot1-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{21}{2}(|PM|+|PN|)\max=|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+1+\frac{1}{2}=12+1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{27}{2}则|PM|+|PN的取值范围为:[\frac{21}{2},\frac{27}{2}].的能的是中档题

text: 已知斜率为$k$的直线$l$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，且与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线$C$的准线上一点$M(-1,-1)$满足$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;k: Number;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (-1, -1);Slope(l)=k;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),l);Intersection(l, C) = {A,B};PointOnCurve(M,Directrix(C));DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0

text: 经过两点$A(0,2)$ , $B(\frac{1}{2}, \sqrt{3})$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);Coordinate(B) = (1/2, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(A,G) = True;PointOnCurve(B,G) = True
process: 将A(0,2),B(\frac{1}{2},\sqrt{3})代入椭圆标准方程,解方程组求得a和b,进而得到椭圆方程由于未知椭圆焦点在哪个轴上,所以可设椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{n^{2}}=1,将A(0,2),B(\frac{1}{2},\sqrt{3})代入方程可得\begin{cases}0+\frac{4}{n^{2}}=1\\\frac{1}{m}+\frac{3}{m^{2}}=1\end{cases},解得m=1,n=2,所以椭圆方程为x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的直线$x-m y+m=0$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\Delta O A B$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则$m^{6}+m^{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;m: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (m - m*y + x = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(O,A,B))=2*sqrt(2)
process: 试题分析:先根据抛物线的方程求得焦点的坐标,代入直线方程求得m和p的关系式,进而把直线与抛物线方程联立消去y,求得方程的解,进而根据直线方程可分别求得y_{1}和y_{2},\triangleOAB的面积可分为\triangleOAP与\triangleOBP的面积之和,而\triangleOAP与\triangleOBP若以OP为公共底,则其高即为AB两点的y轴坐标的绝对值,进而可表示三角形的面积进而求得p,则m的值可得,代入m^{6}+m^{4}中,即可求得答案.

text: 从抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$引抛物线准线的垂线，垂足为$M$，且$|P M|=5$，设抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\cos \angle MPF$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P,G);L:Line;PointOnCurve(P,L);IsPerpendicular(L,Directrix(G));FootPoint(L,Directrix(G))=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 5;Focus(G) = F

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1$与直线$x+y-1=0$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$($O$为原点)，则$\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (x + y - 1 = 0);Expression(H) = (-y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};DotProduct(VectorOf(O, P), VectorOf(O, Q)) = 0

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的两个焦点，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: F2: Point;F1: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, H) = True;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y$经过点$(2 , 1)$，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Coordinate(H) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 由点在抛物线上,代入求出抛物线的方程,进而求出焦点坐标.因为抛物线x^{2}=2py经过点(2,1)所以2^{2}=2p\times1,所以2p=4,即抛物线的方程为:x^{2}=4y所以焦点坐标为:(0,1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{m}-x^{2}=1(m>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y=\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的焦点重合，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;m>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/8);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 分析:根据双曲线和抛物线的性质,求出焦点坐标,然后求出m=a^{2}=3,即可求出双曲线的离心率.解析:\because双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{m}-x^{2}=1(m>0)的一个焦点与抛物线y=\frac{1}{8}x2的焦点重合抛物线y=\frac{1}{8}x2的焦点坐标为(0,2),\thereforec=2,\therefore1+m=4即m=a^{2}=3,\thereforea=\sqrt{3},\therefore_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$，过双曲线$C$的左焦点$F$作一斜率为$\sqrt{2}$的直线交双曲线$C$的左支于$A$、$B$两点，若以$A B$为直径的圆过坐标原点$O$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;l: Line;Slope(l) = sqrt(2);PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, LeftPart(C)) = {A, B};E: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), E);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, E)

text: 若点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离比它到点$(2 , 0)$的距离小$1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x = -1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);Distance(P, G) = Distance(P, H) - 1
process: \because点P到直线x=-1的距离比它到点(2,0)的距离小1\therefore点P到直线x=-2的距离等于它到点(2,0)的距离\therefore点P的轨迹为抛物线,方程为y^{2}=8x

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过$F$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A B}=5 \overrightarrow {F B}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = sqrt(3);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, B) = 5*(VectorOf(F, B))
process: 分析:由\overrightarrow{AB}=5\overrightarrow{FB}可得\overrightarrow{AF}=4\overrightarrow{FB},|\overrightarrow{AF}|=4m,|\overrightarrow{BF}|=m,所以在AABD中,利用|AD|=\frac{1}{2}|AB|可得结果.详由\overrightarrow{AB}=5\overrightarrow{FB}可得\overrightarrow{AF}=4\overrightarrow{FB},设|\overrightarrow{AF}|=4m,|\overrightarrow{BF}|=m.过A,B分别做准线的垂线,垂足为A_{1},B_{1},由双曲线定义得|AA_{1}|=\frac{4m}{e},|BB_{1}|=\frac{m}{e}过B做BD垂直于AA_{1}垂足D,因为AB斜率为\sqrt{3},所以在4ABD中,\angleBAD=60^{\circ}可得|AD|=\frac{1}{2}|AB|,即\frac{4m}{e}-\frac{m}{e}=\frac{3m}{e}=\frac{5m}{2}解得e=\frac{6}{5},C的离心率为\frac{6}{5},

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点均在焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，若$|\overrightarrow{A F}|+|\overrightarrow{B F}|=4$，线段$A B$的中点到直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$的距离为$1$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(H) = (x = p/2);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Abs(VectorOf(A, F)) + Abs(VectorOf(B, F)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)=1
process: 分别过A、B作直线x=\frac{p}{2}的垂线,设AB的中点M在准线上的射影为N,根据抛物线的定义,可得|AF|+|BF|=|AC|+|BD|=4,梯形ACDB中,中位线|MN|=\frac{1}{2}(|AC|+|BD|),由线段AB的中点到x=\frac{p}{2}的距离为1,可得|x_{0}-\frac{p}{2}|=1,进而即可求解.分别过A、B作直线x=\frac{p}{2}的垂线,垂足为C、D,设AB的中点M在准线上的射影为N,连接MN,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),M(x_{0},y_{0})根据抛物线的定义,可得|AF|+|BF|=|AC|+|BD|=4,所以梯形ACDB中,中位线|MN|=\frac{1}{2}(|AC|+|BD|)=2,可得x_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=2,即x_{0}=2-\frac{p}{2},因为线段AB的中点到x=\frac{p}{2}的距离为1,可得|x_{0}-\frac{p}{2}|=1.所以|2-p|=1,解得p=1或p=3.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两条渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1)

text: 若双曲线方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，则其离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{3+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2-k}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/(3+k)+y^2/(2-k)=1);k:Number
process: 试题分析:由题:\begin{cases}3+k>0\\2-k>0\\3+k+2-k\end{cases},解得:{x|-3<x<2,且x\neq-\frac{1}{2}}

text: 若斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$A B$的中点坐标为$(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{3})$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: k: Number;l: Line;Slope(l) = k;C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (1/2, 1/3)

text: $A$、$B$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$上两点，线段$A B$的中点在直线$x=-\frac{1}{2}$上，则直线$A B$与$y$轴的交点的纵坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = -1/2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)
process: 由题意可知,直线AB的斜率必然存在,设直线AB的方程为y=kx+m.则直线AB与y轴的交点的纵坐标为m,设点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),将直线AB的方程与椭圆方程联立并化简得(2k^{2}+1)x^{2}+4kmx+2m^{2}-2=0,A=16k^{2}m^{2}-4(2k^{2}+1)(2m^{2}-2)>0,化简得m^{2}<2k^{2}+1,即k^{2}>\frac{m^{2}-1}{2}.由韦达定理可得x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{4km}{2k^{2}+1}=-1,所以4km=2k^{2}+1将等式两边平方得16k^{2}m^{2}=(2k^{2}+1)^{2}所以m^{2}=\frac{(2k^{2}+1)^{2}}{16k^{2}}=\frac{k^{2}}{4}+\frac{1}{16k^{2}}+\frac{1}{4}\geqslant2\sqrt{\frac{k^{2}}{4}\cdot\frac{1}{16k^{2}}}+\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{2}当且仅当_{k}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}时,等号成立,由于m^{2}\geqslant\frac{1}{2},解得m\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}或m\leqslant-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}.因此,直线AB与y轴的交点的纵坐标的取值范围是(-\infty,-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}]\cup[\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},+\infty)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)
process: 由\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{5},得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=4,\therefore\frac{b}{a}=2,\therefore双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm2x

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$，若$P$为其右支上一点，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知双曲线$C$的焦点在坐标轴上，渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$，若点$(4,2)$在$C$上，则双曲线$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 2);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(2)/2)*X);PointOnCurve(G, C);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), axis)
process: 若双曲线C的焦点在x轴上,设双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)因为渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x'点(4,2)在C上,所以\begin{cases}\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\\\frac{16}{a^{2}}-\frac{4}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}a_{2}=8\\b^{2}=4\end{cases},因此c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=2\sqrt{3}则双曲线C的焦距为2c=4\sqrt{3};若双曲线C的焦点在y轴上,设双曲线C的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)因为渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x'点(4,2)在C上,所以\begin{cases}\frac{a}{b}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\\\frac{4}{a^{2}}-\frac{16}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},无解,故双曲线C的焦点不在y轴上;综上2c=4\sqrt{3}

text: 已知中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的双曲线的一条渐近线为$y=\frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Center(C)=O;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=(y=4/3*x);SymmetryAxis(C)=axis

text: 已知点$P(\frac{3}{2},-1)$在抛物线$E$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线上，过点$P$作抛物线的切线，若切点$A$在第一象限，$F$是抛物线$E$的焦点，点$M$在直线$A F$上，点$N$在圆$C$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$上，则$|M N|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;C: Circle;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;p>0;Expression(E) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Expression(C) = ((x + 2)^2 + (y + 2)^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (3/2, -1);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(E));TangentOfPoint(P , E) = G;TangentPoint(G, E) = A;Quadrant(A) = 1;Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(M, LineOf(A, F));PointOnCurve(N, C)
l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(l)=(x-2*y+6=0);IsTangent(l,C)
process: 联立方程组\begin{cases}y2=2px,\\x-2y+6=0,\end{cases}整理得y^{2}-4py+12p=0.因为C与l相切,所以A=16p^{2}-48p=0,解得p=3或p=0(舍去).

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$e$，过$F_{1}$作直线$y=-\frac{b}{a} x$的垂线交双曲线右支于点$P$，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，则$e^{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;e:Number;L:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = -x*b/a);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Eccentricity(G)=e;PointOnCurve(F1,L);IsPerpendicular(L,H);Intersection(L,RightPart(G))=P;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若右准线上存在$P$点使得线段$P F_{1}$的垂直平分线恰好过$F_{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightDirectrix(G)) = True;P: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = True

text: 设直线$y=k x$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$P$为$C$上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，若$C$的离心率为$2$，则$k_{1} \cdot k_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;k1: Number;k2:Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = k*x);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(P, C);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B);Slope(LineOf(P,A)) = k1;Slope(LineOf(P,B))=k2;Eccentricity(C) = 2;k:Number

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则离心率$e$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;e: Number;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=6 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线$l$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，与$C$的准线交于点$D$，若$|A B|=8$，则点$D$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;D: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 6*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l,Directrix(C))=D;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8
process: 由题可得焦点F(\frac{3}{2},0)若直线斜率不存在,则直线l方程为x=\frac{3}{2},代入抛物线可得y=\pm3,则|AB|=6,不符合题意;设直线斜率为k,则方程为y=k(x-\frac{3}{2}),代入抛物线方程可得4k^{2}x^{2}-(12k^{2}+24)x+9k^{2}=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{3k^{2}+6}{k^{2}},由抛物线定义可得|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+3=\frac{3k^{2}}{k^{2}}+6+3=8,解得k=\pm\sqrt{3}则直线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{3}{2}),当x=-\frac{3}{2}时,y=\pm3\sqrt{3},故点D的坐标为(-\frac{3}{2},\pm3\sqrt{3})

text: 直线$l$: $2 x-3 y+12=0$与$x$轴、$y$轴分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则以$A$为焦点，经过$B$点的椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(l)=(2*x - 3*y + 12 = 0);Intersection(l,xAxis) = A;Intersection(l, yAxis) = B;OneOf(Focus(G))=A;PointOnCurve(B, G)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的离心率大于$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$ , $A$是椭圆的上顶点，$B$是椭圆上的点，则$|A B|^{2}$的最大值=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;a>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G)>sqrt(2)/2;UpperVertex(G)=A;PointOnCurve(B, G)
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)的上顶点为A(0,1),由椭圆的参数方程设B(a\cos\theta,\sin\theta),所以|AB|^{2}=(a\cos\theta)^{2}+(1-\sin\theta)^{2}=a^{2}(1-\sin^{2}\theta)+1-2\sin\theta+\sin^{2}\theta=-(a^{2}-1)\sin^{2}\theta+2\sin\theta+a^{2}+1=-(a^{2}-1)(\sin^{2}\theta+\frac{2}{a^{2}-1}\sin\theta)+a^{2}+=-(a^{2}-1)(\sin\theta+\frac{1}{a^{2}-1})^{2}+\frac{1}{a^{2}-1}+a^{2}+1所以当\sin\theta+\frac{1}{a^{2}-1}=0时,|AB|^{2}取最大值为\frac{1}{a^{2}-1}+a^{2}+1

text: 动点$P$在曲线$y=x^{2}+1$上运动，$A(1,0)$，则$P A$中点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;P: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2 + 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 设M(x,y)是所求轨迹上任意一点,其中P(x_{1},y_{1})因为M是PA的中点,可得\begin{cases}x=\frac{1+x_{1}}{2}\\y=\frac{0+y_{1}}{2}\end{cases},所以\begin{cases}x_{1}=2x-1\\y_{1}=2y\end{cases}代入曲线y=x^{2}+1,可得2y=(2x-1)^{2}+1,整理得y=2x^{2}-2x+1即PA中点的轨迹方程为y=2x^{2}-2x+1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|F A|=4$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 4
process: 设过F(1,0)的直线方程为x=my+1,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立直线与抛物线方程\begin{cases}x=my+1\\y2=4y\end{cases},可得y^{2}\cdot4my-4=0,由韦达定理,可得y_{1}y_{2}=-4,则x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4}\frac{y_{2}^{2}}{4}=1\because由抛物线的定理,可得|FA|=x_{1}+1\thereforex_{1}=3,x_{2}=\frac{1}{3},\therefore|FB|=x_{2}+1=\frac{4}{3},|AB|=4+\frac{4}{3}=\frac{16}{3}

text: 焦点为$F$的抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=3 y$的准线与$y$轴交于点$A$，点$M$在抛物线$C$上，则$\frac{M F}{|M A|}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;M: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 3*y);Focus(C)=F;Intersection(Directrix(C),yAxis)=A;PointOnCurve(M, C)
process: 作MN垂直于准线于点N,\frac{|MF|}{|MA|}=\frac{|MN|}{|MA|}=\sin\angleMAN不妨在第一象限取点M,当MA与抛物线相切时,\angleMAN最小,设切点为M(x_{0},y_{0})又因为A(0,-\frac{3}{4}),设切线MA方程为:y=kx-\frac{3}{4}与x^{2}=3y联立可得:x^{2}-3kx+\frac{9}{4}=0,由4=9k^{2}-4\times\frac{9}{4}=0可得k=1所以切线斜率k_{AM}=1,所以\angleMAN=45^{\circ}所以45^{\circ}\leqslant\angleMAN\leqslant90^{\circ},所以\frac{|MF|}{|MA|}=\frac{|MN|}{|MA|}=\sin\angleMAN\in[\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},1]\frac{MF}{MA}的取值范围是\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},

fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;Expression(C1)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);a:Number;b:Number;a>0;b>0;F1:Point;LeftFocus(C1)=F1;H:Circle;M:Point;l:Line;Expression(H)=(x^2+y^2=a^2);TangentOfPoint(F1,H)=l;TangentPoint(l,H)=M;C2:Parabola;Expression(C2)=(y^2=2*p*x);p:Number;p>0;N:Point;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F1,M)),C2)=N;OneOf(Focus(C1))=Focus(C2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))
process: 由于直线F_{1}M和圆相切,故圆心到直线的距离等于半径,而|OF_{1}|=c,故|F_{1}M|=|MN|=b.所以直线F_{1}M的斜率为\frac{b}{a},故直线F_{1}M的方程为y=\frac{a}{b}(x+c).由于O是|F_{1}F_{2}|的中点,故|OM|是三角形NF_{1}F_{2}的中位线,故|NF_{2}|=2a且\angleN=\frac{\pi}{2},由等面积法得\frac{1}{2}\times2c\timesy_{N}=\frac{1}{2}\times2a\times2b,解得y_{N}=\frac{2ab}{c},代入直线F_{1}M的方程,求得x_{N}=\frac{b^{2}-a2}{c},故N(\frac{b^{2}-a^{2}}{c},\frac{2ab}{c}).由于抛物线和双曲线焦点相同,故\frac{p}{2}=c,p=2c,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4cx,将N点坐标代入抛物线方程并化简得b^{4}-a^{2}b2-a^{4}=0,即\frac{b^{4}}{a^{4}}-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}-1=0,解得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}+1}{2},故双曲线的离心率为e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{3+\sqrt{5}}{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}+1}{2}

process: 因为抛物线与圆均关于x轴对称,不妨设A在x轴上方,,则y=\sqrt{2px},y=\frac{\sqrt{2p}}{2\sqrt{x}},y_{0}^{2}=2px_{0},点A处的切线斜率k=y|x=x_{0}=\frac{\sqrt{2p}}{2\sqrt{x_{0}}}=\frac{p}{y_{0}},切线方程l:y-y_{0}=\frac{p}{y_{0}}(x-x_{0}),,即l:y_{0}y-px-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{2}=0,又切线l与圆M:(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=4相切于另一点B,有:\frac{2p-\frac{y^{2}}{2}}{\sqrt{p^{2}+y^{2}}}=2'两边平方化简得y_{0}^{4}-(16+8p)y_{0}^{2}=0,解得y_{0}^{2}=0或y_{0}^{2}=8p+16,又y_{0}^{2}=0时,A,B重合,不合题意故y_{0}^{2}=8p+16,x_{0}=\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{2D}=\frac{8p+16}{2D}=4+\frac{8}{p},\therefore|AF|=\frac{p}{2}+x_{0}=\frac{p}{2}+4+\frac{8}{p}\geqslant2\sqrt{\frac{p}{2}\cdot\frac{8}{p}}+4=8,当且仅当\frac{p}{2}=\frac{8}{p},p=4时,取得最小值.

process: 设内切圆的圆心M,设\triangleAF_{2}B三边与内切圆的切点,连接切点与圆心M的线段,由内切圆的性质可得|AF_{2}|-|AQ|=|BF_{2}|-|BQ|,再由双曲线定义可知:|AF_{2}|-|AF_{1}|=|BF_{2}|-|BF_{1}|=2a,可得Q,F_{1}重合,再由\angleAF_{2}B=60^{\circ}可得内切圆的半径的值.设内切圆的圆心为M(x,y),设圆M与三角形的边分别切于T,Q,S,如图所示连接MS,MT,MQ,由内切圆的性质可得:|F_{2}T|=|F_{2}S|,|AT|=|AQ|,|BS|=|BQ|.所以|AF_{2}|-|AQ|=|AF_{2}|-|AT|=|F_{2}T|,|BF_{2}|-|BQ|=|BF_{2}|-|BS|=|F_{2}S|所以|AF_{2}|-|AQ|=|BF_{2}|-|BQ|,由双曲线的定义可知:|AF_{2}|-|AF_{1}|=|BF_{2}|-|BF_{1}|=2a,所以可得Q,F_{1}重合所以|TF_{2}|=2a=4,所以圆的半径为_{r}=|MT|=|TF_{2}|\tan\frac{\angleAF_{2}B}{2}=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}

process: 由抛物线定义可求得|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+x_{2}+\frac{1}{2},根据|AF|+|BF|\geqslant|AB|可求得x_{1}+x_{2}的最小值,由所求距离为\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}可确定所求距离的最小值.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由抛物线方程知焦点F(\frac{1}{4},0),准线方程为:x=-\frac{1}{4}由抛物线定义知:|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{1}{4},|BF|=x_{2}+\frac{1}{4}\because|AF|+|BF|\geqslant|AB|=3(当且仅当A,F,B三点共线时取等号)即x_{1}+x_{2}+\frac{1}{2}\geqslant3,解得:x_{1}+x_{2}\geqslant\frac{5}{2}\becauseAB中点M到y轴距离为d=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}\geqslant\frac{5}{4},故所求最小值为\frac{5}{4}

process: 将椭圆y^{2}+mx^{2}=1(m>0)化为标准方程是y^{2}+\frac{x^{2}}{m}=1,若\frac{1}{m}>1,即0<m<1,则椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{1-1}}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{m}}}=\frac{1}{2},解得:m=\frac{3}{4};若\frac{1}{m}<1,即m>1,则椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{m}}}{\frac{1}{2}},解得:m=\frac{4}{3}.

process: 求出点A(\frac{4a}{3},y),再由点A在以F_{1}F_{2}为直径的圆上得F_{1}A\botF_{2}A,接若利用向量数量积为0,从而得到关于a,c的方程,进而得到离心率.设A(\frac{4a}{3},y),代入\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1化简得y^{2}=\frac{7}{9}b^{2},由已知得F_{1}A\botF_{2}A,则\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}=0因为\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}=(\frac{4a}{3}+c,y),\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}=(\frac{4a}{3}-c,y),所以(\frac{4}{3}a+c)(\frac{4}{3}a-c)+y^{2}=(\frac{4}{3}a+c)(\frac{4}{3}a-c)+\frac{7}{9}b^{2}=0又a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},整理得:a^{2}=\frac{2}{9}c^{2}\Rightarrow\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{9}{2}\Rightarrowe=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2},

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点, 且双曲线的离心率为$2$, 则该双曲线的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的切线交双曲线右支于点$M$，若$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);M: Point;AngleOf(F1, M, F2) = pi/4;L:Line;TangentOfPoint(F1,H)=L;Intersection(L,RightPart(G))=M
process: 设切点为N,连接ON,过F_{2}作F_{2}A\botMN,垂足为A,如下图:由圆的切线性质可知:ON\botF_{1}M,ON=a,由三角形中位线定理可知:AF_{2}=2a,AF_{2}\botF_{1}M在RtAAF_{1}F_{2}中,AF_{1}=\sqrt{F_{1}F_{2}^{2}-AF_{2}^{2}}=2b,在RtAAF_{2}M中,\angleF_{1}MF_{2}=\frac{\pi}{4},所以MA=2aF_{2}M=2\sqrt{2}a,由双曲线定义可知:F_{1}M-F_{2}M=2a,即2b+2a-2\sqrt{2}a=2a,所以b=\sqrt{2}a,而c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}},所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{3}a,因此e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3}即双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{3}

text: 已知点$A(0 , 2)$抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，线段$FA$交抛物线于点$B$，过$B$做$l$的垂线，垂足为$M$, 若$A M \perp M F$, 则$p$=?

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，以$O F$($O$为坐标原点) 为直径的圆与双曲线的一个交点为$A$，若$O A$的倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;O: Origin;F: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(O, F), H);OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = A;Inclination(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = pi/6
process: 设F_{1}是双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的左焦点,则|AF|=\frac{c}{2},|AF_{1}|=2a+\frac{c}{2}.在三角形AF_{1}F中,\angleOFA=\frac{\pi}{3},由余弦定理得(2a+\frac{c}{2})^{2}=(2c)^{2}+(\frac{c}{2})^{2}-2\cdot2c\cdot\frac{c}{2}\cdot\cos\frac{\pi}{3},则_{2a+\frac{c}{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{13}c}{2},即e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{13}+1}{b}.

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的右焦点且与$x$轴垂直的直线，交该双曲线的两条渐近线于$A$、$B$两点，则$A B$的长度为?

process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x'右焦点为(2,0),则点A(2,\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}),B(2,-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}3).所以|AB|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}-(-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3})^{3}=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知点$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上除顶点外的任意一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为左、右焦点，$c$为半焦距，$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆与$F_{1} F_{2}$切于点$M$，则$|F_{1} M| \cdot|F_{2} M|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P=Vertex(G));LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;HalfFocalLength(G) = c;c:Number;TangentPoint(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)),LineSegmentOf(F1,F2))=M
process: 设圆与PF_{1}的切点为点S,与PF_{2}的切点为点T,根据从圆外一点向圆所引的两条切线长相等可知:|F_{1}M|=|F_{1}S|,|F_{2}M|=|F_{2}T|,|PS|=|PT|\textcircled{1}当P在双曲线图象的右支时,而根据双曲线的定义可知|F_{1}M|-|F_{2}M|=|F_{1}P|-|F_{2}P|=2a\textcircled{1};而|F_{1}M|+|MF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c\textcircled{2},联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}解得:|F_{1}M|=a+c,|F_{2}M|=c-a,所以|F_{1}M|\cdot|F_{2}M|=(a+c)(c-a)=c^{2}-a^{2}=b^{2};\textcircled{2}当P在双曲线图象的左支时,而根据双曲线的定义可知|F_{2}M|-|F_{1}M|=|F_{2}P|-|F_{1}P|=2a\textcircled{3};而|F_{1}M|+|MF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c\textcircled{4},联立\textcircled{3}\textcircled{4}解得:|F_{2}M|=a+c,|F_{1}M|=c-a,|F_{1}M|\cdot|F_{2}M|=(a+c)(c-a)=c^{2}-a^{2}=b^{2}综上,可得|F_{1}M|\cdot|F_{2}M|=b^{2}.

text: 已知$P(4,4)$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上的一点，$F$为抛物线$C$的焦点，定点$M(-1,4)$，则$\Delta M P F$的外接圆的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (4, 4);PointOnCurve(P, C);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-1, 4)
process: 点P(4,4)是抛物线C:y^{2}=2px上的一点,可得16=8p.解得p=2,即抛物线的方程为y^{2}=4x,由F(1,0),M(-1,4),P(4,4),可得MP=5,PF=5,MF=2\sqrt{5}\cos\angleMPF=\frac{5^{2}+5^{2}-(2\sqrt{5})^{2}}{2\times5\times5}=\frac{3}{5}则\sin\angleMPF=\sqrt{1-\frac{9}{25}}=\frac{4}{5},设\triangleMPF的外接圆的半径为R则2R=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{4}=\frac{5\sqrt{5}}{2}解得R=\frac{5}{5}\sqrt{5}可得\triangleMPF的外接圆的面积为\pi\times\frac{125}{6}=\frac{125\pi}{6}

text: 若点$Q(4,1)$是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的弦$A B$的中点，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);Coordinate(Q) = (4, 1);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=Q
process: 由中点Q(4,1)知直线斜率存在,利用点差法求得斜率,然后确定直线AB的方程即可由题意可知,当AB垂直于x轴时,不符合题意,故直线AB的斜率存在设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则y_{1}=8x_{1}\textcircled{1},y_{2}=8x_{2}\textcircled{2}且x_{1}+x_{2}=8,y_{1}+y_{2}=2,\textcircled{1}-\textcircled{2}得(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})=8(x_{1}-x_{2}),即2(y_{1}-y_{2})=8(x_{1}-x_{2}),即\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=4,故直线AB的斜率k=4,故直线AB的方程为y=4(x-4)+1即4x-y-15=0.

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$P$为$C$上一点，$P F$与$x$轴垂直，$Q$为$x$轴上一点，且$P Q \perp O P$. 若$|F Q|=6$，则$C$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F),xAxis);PointOnCurve(Q, xAxis);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), LineSegmentOf(O, P));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, Q)) = 6
process: 由题得|OF|=\frac{p}{2},|PF|=p,\angleOPF=\anglePQF,所以\tan\angleOPF=\tan\anglePQF所以\frac{|OF|}{|PF|}=\frac{|PF|}{|FQ|},即\frac{\frac{p}{2}}{p}=\frac{p}{6},解得p=3.所以C的准线方程为x=-\frac{3}{2}

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y^2 + (-a + x)^2 = 3);Eccentricity(C) = 2;IsTangent(Asymptote(C),G)
process: 由已知离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=2'即b^{2}=3a^{2};又渐近线bx+ay=0与圆(x-a)^{2}+y^{2}=3相切得\frac{ab}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=\sqrt{3}联立得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=12,所以双曲线方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 过原点的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=-1$交于两点，则$l$的斜率的取值范围是?

process: 设过原点的直线/的方程为y=kx.由\begin{cases}\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=-1\\y=kx\end{cases}可得(3-4k^{2})x^{2}+12=0,因为直线l与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=-1交于两点,所以A=0-4\times(3-4k^{2})\times12>0,即4k^{2}>3,解得:k>\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}或k<-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.

text: 已知点$M(-1 , 1)$和抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$，过$C$的焦点且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点. 若$\angle A M B=90^{\circ}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-1, 1);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);G: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),G) = True;Slope(G) = k;k: Number;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;AngleOf(A, M, B) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 详设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则\begin{cases}y_{1}^{2}=4x_{1}\\y_{2}^{2}=4x_{2}\end{cases}所以y_{1}^{2}-y_{2}^{2}=4x_{1}-4x_{2}所以k=\frac{y_{1}^{2}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{4}{y_{1}+y_{2}}取AB中点M(x_{0},y_{0})分别过点A,B作准线x=-1的垂线,垂足分别为A,B'因为\angleAMB=90^{\circ},\therefore|MM|=\frac{1}{2}|AB|=\frac{1}{2}(|AF|+|BF|)=\frac{1}{2}(|AA|+|BB'|),因为M'为AB中点,所以MM'平行于x轴因为M(-1,1)所以y_{0}=1,则y_{1}+y_{2}=2即k=2

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)(m>0)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}=1$的左顶点为$A$, 若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$A M$平行，则实数$a$=?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;M: Point;m: Number;m>0;Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a = 1);a: Real;A: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M))
process: \frac{1}{3}试题分析:根据抛物线的定义知点M(1,m)(m>0)到抛物线焦点的距离即为其点到抛物线准线x=-\frac{p}{2}的距离,即:1+\frac{p}{2}=5解得:p=8,所以抛物线方程为:y^{2}=16x,此时M(1,4),双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}=1的左顶点为:A(-\sqrt{a},0),其渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{a}}{a}x',双曲线的一条渐近线与直线AM平行,必有\frac{4}{1+\sqrt{a}}=\frac{\sqrt{a}}{a}解得:a=\frac{1}{9},所以答案为:\frac{1}{3}.

text: 已知点$M(-5,0)$, $N(5,0)$,$\triangle M N P$的周长是$36$，则$\triangle M N P$的顶点$P$的轨迹方程为?

process: 由于点P满足|PM|+|PN|=36-10=26>10,知点P的轨迹是以M、N为焦点,且2a=26的椭圆(由于P与M、N不共线,故y\neq0)\thereforea=13,又c=5,\thereforeb^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=13^{2}-5^{2}=144故\triangleMNP的顶点P的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{169}+\frac{y^{2}}{144}=1(y\neq0),

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的渐近线方程为$\sqrt{3} x \pm y=0$，则$b$=?

process: 利用双曲线方程写出渐近线方程求解b即[详解]双曲线\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)的渐近线方程:bx+2y=0因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)的渐近线方程为\sqrt{3}x\pmy=0所以\frac{b}{2}=\sqrt{3},可得b=2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知点$F_{1}(-\sqrt{2}, 0)$, $F_{2}(\sqrt{2}, 0)$动点$P$满足$|P F_{2}|-|P F_{1}|=2$，当点$P$的纵坐标为$\frac{1}{2}$时，点$P$到坐标原点的距离为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-sqrt(2), 0);F2: Point;Coordinate(F2) = (sqrt(2), 0);P: Point;-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2;YCoordinate(P) = 1/2;O: Origin
process: 试题分析:\because|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}|=2,且2<|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{2},\therefore点P的轨迹是以F_{1}(-\sqrt{2},0)F_{2}(\sqrt{2},0)为焦点的双曲线的左支.此时c=\sqrt{2},a=1,则b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=1.\therefore点P的轨迹方程是x^{2}-y^{2}=1(x\leqslant-1).设P(x_{0},\frac{1}{2})代入上式可得x_{0}=\frac{5}{4}.则|PO|=\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+(\frac{1}{2})^{2}}=\sqrt{\frac{5}{4}+\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}.

text: 已知点$A(-\sqrt{2}, 0)$, $B(\sqrt{2}, 0)$，动点$P$满足$\angle A P B=\theta$且$|P A| \cdot|P B| \cdot \cos 2 \frac{\theta}{2}=1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-sqrt(2), 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (sqrt(2), 0);P: Point;AngleOf(A, P, B) = theta;theta: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B))*Cos(theta/2)^2 = 1
process: 根据题意,可知|AB|=2\sqrt{2}由|PA|\cdot|PB|\cdot\cos^{2}\frac{\theta}{2}=1,\theta\in(0,\pi),则|PA|\cdot|PB|\cdot\frac{1+\cos\theta}{2}=1,\therefore|PA||PB|+|PA||PB|\cos\theta=2,在\DeltaABP中\cos\theta=\frac{|PA|^{2}+|PB|^{2}-|AB|^{2}}{2|PA||PB|}=\frac{|PA|^{2}+|PB|^{2}-8}{2|PA||PB|}\therefore2|PA||PB|\cos\theta=|PA|^{2}+|PB|^{2}-8,\begin{matrix}{\\PA|&PB\end{matrix}+\frac{|PA|^{2}+|PB|^{2}}{2}-4=2即2|PA||PB|+|PA|^{2}+|PB|^{2}=12\therefore(|PA|+|PB|)^{2}=12^{'}所以|PA|+|PB|=2\sqrt{3}为定值且大于|AB|,可得P的轨迹为椭圆.且长轴长2a=2\sqrt{3},焦距2c=2\sqrt{2},焦点在x轴上,中心在原点的椭圆.即a=\sqrt{3},c=\sqrt{2},所以b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=1,所以P的轨迹方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$M$是双曲线$C$左支上的点，$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的周长是$9$，动点$P$在双曲线$C$的右支上，则$\Delta M F_{1} P$面积的取值范围是?

process: 由题结合双曲线的定义可得|MF_{1}|=\frac{3}{2},|MF_{2}|=\frac{7}{2},则可求出_{M}(-\frac{5}{4},\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4}),再由直线MF_{1}与渐近线y=\sqrt{3}x平行可得S_{\triangleMF_{1}P}>\frac{1}{2}|MF_{1}|\cdot\sqrt{3}=\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4}.\becauseM是双曲线C左支上的点,\therefore|MF_{2}|-|MF_{1}|=2.\because\DeltaMF_{1}F_{2}的周长是9,\therefore|MF_{2}|+|MF_{1}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|=9.\because|F_{1}F_{2}|=4,\therefore|MF_{1}|=\frac{3}{2},|MF_{2}|=\frac{7}{2}.解得x_{0}=-\frac{5}{4},y_{0}=\pm\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4}根据双曲线的对称性,不妨取y_{0}=\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4},则M(-\frac{5}{4},\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4})\thereforek_{MF}=\sqrt{3},\therefore直线MF_{1}的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x+2)\because直线MF_{1}与渐近线v=\sqrt{3}x平行,\therefore双曲线C的右支上任意一点到直线MF的距离都大于两平行线间的距离,即都大于\sqrt{3},\therefores_{\DeltaMF_{1}P}>\frac{1}{2}|MF_{1}|\cdot\sqrt{3}=\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{4}与睛)关键

text: 椭圆的两焦点为$F_{1}(-4,0)$ , $F_{2}(4,0)$，点$P$在椭圆上，若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积最大为$12$，则椭圆方程为?

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-ky^{2}=1$的一个焦点是$(3 , 0)$，则实数$k$=?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点，$A$是椭圆的右顶点，动点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$满足$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O A}=9$，则当$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$最大时，$y_{0}^{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;RightVertex(G) = A;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, P), VectorOf(O, A)) = 9;WhenMax(AngleOf(F1, P, F2))
process: 由\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{OA}=9可求得x_{0},根据\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{k_{PF}}{1+k_{PF_{2}}\cdotk_{PF_{1}}},将\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}利用y_{0}表示出来结合基本不等式可求得\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}的最大值,由正切函数单调性可知此时\angleF_{1}PF_{2}最大,根据基本不等式取等条件可得结果.羊解】由椭圆方程知:A(3,0),F_{1}(-1,0),F_{2}(1,0则\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{OA}=(x_{0},y_{0})\cdot(3,0)=3x_{0}=9,解得:x_{0}=3不妨设y_{0}>0,由k_{PF_{1}}=\frac{y_{0}}{4},k_{PF_{2}}=\frac{y_{0}}{2}得\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\tan(\anglePF_{2}A-\anglePF_{1}A)=\frac{k_{PF_{2}}-k_{PF_{1}}}{1+k_{PF_{2}}\cdotk_{PF}}\frac{2}{2\sqrt{\frac{8}{y}}\cdoty_{0}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}(当且仅当\frac{8}{y_{0}}=y_{0}时取等号)\because\angleF_{1}PF_{2}\in[0,\frac{\pi}{2}),故由正切函数的单调性知当\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}最大时,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}最大此时\frac{8}{y_{0}}=y_{0}'即y_{0}^{2}=8.

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$($|F_{1} F_{2}|=2 c$)，以坐标原点$O$为圆心，以$c$为半径作圆$A$，圆$A$与双曲线$C$的一个交点为$P$，若三角形$F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为$a^{2}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;c:Number;A: Circle;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2))=2*c;O:Origin;Center(A)=O;Radius(A)=c;OneOf(Intersection(A, C)) = P;Area(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)) = a^2
process: 不妨设P为右支上一点,设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,由双曲线的定义可得m\cdotn=2a,由题意可得\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形,且\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},可得m^{2}+n^{2}=4c^{2},且\frac{1}{2}mn=a^{2},由(m\cdotn)^{2}=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn=4c^{2}-4a^{2}=4a^{2},即为c=\sqrt{2}a

text:
设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点. 若点$P$在双曲线上，且$ \overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，
则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0

text: 若双曲线经过点$(-\sqrt{3} , 6)$，且它的两条渐近线方程是$y=\pm 3 x$，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-sqrt(3), 6);PointOnCurve(F, E);Expression(Asymptote(E)) = (y = pm*3*x)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8+m}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率是$\frac{1}{2}$，则两准线间的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 8) + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2;l1:Line;l2:Line;Directrix(G)={L1,L2}

text: 已知点$P(t, 3)$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 x$上一点，$F$是$C$的焦点，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);P: Point;t: Number;Coordinate(P) = (t, 3);PointOnCurve(P, C);F: Point;Focus(C) = F
process: 点P(t,3)是抛物线C:y^{2}=2x上一点,可得2t=9,解得t=\frac{9}{2},由抛物线的定义可得:\frac{9}{2}-(-\frac{1}{2})=5所以|PF|=5

text: 在平面直角坐标系中，$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,0)$，若$||P A|-| P B||=8$，则$P$点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B)=(5,0);Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B)))=8
process: \because||PA|-|PB||=8,所以P点的轨迹是以A,B两点为焦点,以8为实轴长的双曲线.即2a=82c=10,所以a=4,b=3,所以双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点到渐近线的距离是其到左顶点距离的一半，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Distance(RightFocus(G),Asymptote(G))=(1/2)*Distance(RightFocus(G),LeftVertex(G))
process: 根据题意可知:b=\frac{a+c}{2},又因为a=3,且9+b^{2}=c^{2},故可得c=5,b=4.

text: 方程$(x^{2}+y^{2}-2) \sqrt{x-3}=0$表示的曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G)=((x^2+y^2-2)*sqrt(x-3)=0)

text: 若关于$x$, $y$的方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{3-k}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k:Number;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);Expression(G)=(x^2/(2+k)+y^2/(3-k)=1)

text: 若点$P$、$Q$均在椭圆$T$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}-1}=1(a>1)$上运动，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$T$的左、右焦点，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}-2 \overrightarrow{P Q}|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: T: Ellipse;Expression(T) = (y^2/(a^2 - 1) + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>1;P: Point;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(P, T) = True;PointOnCurve(Q, T) = True;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(T) = F1;RightFocus(T) = F2
process: 由向量加减法运算得|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}-2\overrightarrow{PQ}|=|2\overrightarrow{PO}-2\overrightarrow{PQ}|=2|\overrightarrow{QO}|,而|\overrightarrow{QO}|最大值就是实半轴长a显然O是F_{1}F_{2}的中点,则\overrightarrow{PF}+\overrightarrow{PF}=2\overrightarrow{PO}\therefore|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}-2\overrightarrow{PQ}|=|2\overrightarrow{PO}-2\overrightarrow{PQ}|=|2(\overrightarrow{PO}-\overrightarrow{PQ})|=|2\overrightarrow{QO}|,最大值为2a

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4/3;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 14/3

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=8$的右焦点$F_{2}$有一条弦$P Q$ ,$|P Q|=7$, $F_{1}$是左焦点，那么$\Delta F_{1} P Q$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 8);RightFocus(G) = F2;F2: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = True;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = 7;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1

text: 已知椭圆的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$, $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆的左右焦点，$P$为椭圆上在第一象限的一点，$I$为$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，直线$P I$与$x$轴交于点$Q$，椭圆的离心率为$\frac{1}{3}$，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=\lambda \overrightarrow{I Q}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;I: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;lambda:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);Quadrant(P)=1;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;Intersection(LineOf(P,I), xAxis) = Q;Eccentricity(G) = 1/3;VectorOf(P, Q) = lambda*VectorOf(I, Q);a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0
process: 如图所示,连接IF_{1}、IF_{2},I是\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内心,所以IF_{1}、IF_{2}分别是\anglePF_{1}F_{2}和\anglePF_{2}F的角平分线,由于经过点P与\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆圆心I的直线交x轴于点Q.则PQ为\angleF_{1}PF_{2}的角平分线,则Q到直线PF_{1},PF_{2}的距离相等.所以\frac{S_{\trianglePF_{1}Q}}{S_{\trianglePF_{2}Q}=\frac{|PF_{1}|}{|PF_{2}|}=\frac{|C}{|C}同理可得\frac{1}{1}由比例关系性质可知\frac{|PI|}{|1Q|}又椭圆的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{|\overrightarrow{IQ}|}{|\overrightarrow{PI}|}=\frac{1}{3}.所以\overrightarrow{PI}=?\overrightarrow{IQ},所以\overrightarrow{PQ}=4\overrightarrow{IQ},故\lambda=4

text: 直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$，且与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=5 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};VectorOf(A, F) = 5*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 依题意,抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F(1,0)设直线l的方程为y=k(x-1)由\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y2=4x\end{cases}得k^{2}x^{2}-2(k^{2}+2)+k^{2}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}},x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=1=5\overrightarrow{FB}-x_{1}=5x_{2}-5即5x_{2}+x_{1}-6=0\becausex_{1}=\frac{1}{x_{2}},\therefore5x_{2}+\frac{1}{x_{2}}-6=0,解得x_{2}=l或x_{2}=\frac{1}{5}\thereforex_{1}=1或x_{1}=5又x_{1}+x_{2}=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}}>2,将x_{1}=5代入解得_{k}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右焦点为圆心，且与其渐近线相切的圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);H: Circle;RightFocus(G) = Center(H);IsTangent(Asymptote(G), H)
C: Ellipse;a: Real;a>1;Expression(C) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/3
process: 由椭圆方程C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1),以及离心率为\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}故可得\sqrt{1-(\frac{1}{a})^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}解得a=\pm2,又a>1,故可得a=2.

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为其两个焦点，点$P$为双曲线上一点，若$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$| PF_{1}|+| PF_{2} |$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 如果方程$x^2+k y^2=2$表示焦点在$x$轴上，且焦距为$\sqrt{3}$的椭圆，则椭圆的短轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2+k*y^2=2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);FocalLength(G)=sqrt(3);k:Number
process: 方程x^{2}+ky^{2}=2可化为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1,则(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2})^{2}+\frac{2}{k}=2=\frac{2}{k}=\frac{5}{4},\therefore短轴长为2x\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}=\sqrt{5}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F$作某一渐近线的垂线，分别与两渐近线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}=\frac{1}{2}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F, L) ;IsPerpendicular(L, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) ;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};Intersection(L, l1) = A;Intersection(L, l2) = B;A: Point;B: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 1/2
process: 当a>b>0时,由\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}=\frac{1}{2},由角分线性质定理及条件可得\frac{|OA|}{|OB|}=\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}=\frac{1}{2}则Rt\triangleOAB中,\angleAOB=\frac{\pi}{3}渐近线OB的斜率k=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}即离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: $F(c , 0)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，$F$与椭圆上点的距离的最大值为$m$，最小值为$n$，则椭圆上与点$F$距离为$\frac{m+n}{2}$的点是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;c: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Max(Distance(F, P)) = m ;m: Number;n: Number;Min(Distance(F, P)) = n;P0: Point;PointOnCurve(P0, G);Distance(F, P0) = (m + n)/2

text: 已知圆的方程为$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$，若抛物线过点$A(-1,0)$ , $B(1,0)$，且以圆的切线为准线，则抛物线的焦点轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);IsTangent(H, Directrix(G))
process: 根据题意可知:焦点到A和B的距离之和等于A和B分别到准线的距离和;而距离之和为A和B的中点O到准线的距离的二倍,即2r=4,所以焦点的轨迹方程C是以A和B为焦点的椭圆,由此能求出该抛物线的焦点F的轨迹方程.设抛物线焦点为F,过A,B,O作准线的垂线AA_{1},BB_{1},OO_{1}则有|AA_{1}|+|BB_{1}|=2|OO_{1}|=4;由抛物线定义得|AA_{1}|+|BB_{1}|=|FA|+|FB|\therefore|FA|+|FB|=4,故点F的轨迹是以A,B为焦点,长轴长为4的椭圆(去掉长轴两端点)\therefore抛物线的焦点轨迹方程\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(y\neq0).

text: 若直线$y=k x+1(k \in R)$与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$有一个公共点，求实数$k$的取值集合?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);k: Real;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;e: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = sqrt(10)/5

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=x$上一定点$B(1 , 1)$和两个动点$P$、$Q$，当$P$在抛物线上运动时，$B P \perp P Q$，则$Q$点的纵坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;PointOnCurve(Q, G) = True;P: Point;Q: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(B, P), LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = True
process: 试题分析:设P(t^{2},t),Q(s^{2},s)\cdotBP\botPQ,\therefore\overrightarrow{BP}\cdot\overrightarrow{PQ}=0,即(t^{2}-1,t-1)\cdot(s2-t^{2},s-t)=(t^{2}-1)\cdot(s^{2}-t^{2})+(t-1)\cdot(s-t)=0即t^{2}+(s+1)t+s+1=0\becauset\inR,\therefore必须有A=(s+1)^{2}-4(s+1)>0\cdot即s^{2}-2s-3\geqslant0,解得s<1或s>3.0点的纵坐标的取值范围是:(-\infty,-1)\cup[3,+\infty)老占.抛物线的简单性质

text: 已知抛物线方程为$x^{2}=-8 y$，则抛物线焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -8*y)
process: 因为抛物线方程为x^{2}=-8y,焦点在y轴,开口向下,焦点坐标为(0,-2)

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$的方程为$x-y+4=0$，在抛物线上有一动点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d_{1}$ , $P$到直线$l$的距离为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;P: Point;d1:Number;d2:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (x - y + 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = d1;Distance(P, l) = d2
process: 设抛物线的焦点为F(1,0),则d_{1}=|PF|-1,过P作直线x-y+4=0的垂线PM,垂足为M,过F作直线直线x-y+4=0的垂线FN,N为垂足,线段FN与抛物线的交点为Q,如图d_{1}+d_{2}=|PF|-1+|PM|=|FP|+|PM|-1.由图形可知,当M,P,F三点共线,即M与N重合,P与Q重合时,|PF|+|PM|取得最小值|FN|=\frac{|1-0+4|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2},所以d_{1}+d_{2}的最小值是\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2}-1

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2
process: 由椭圆的定义,可得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,则|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|\geqslant2\sqrt{|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|}可得|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\leqslanta^{2}(当且仅当|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=a时,等号成立)又由\frac{1}{|PF_{1}|}\frac{1}{PF_{2}}^{2}\_\overline{2}\geqslant2\sqrt{\frac{1}{a^{4}}}=\frac{2}{a^{2}}(当且仅当|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=a时,等号成立所以\frac{1}{|PF}|PF_{2}|^{2}的最小值为\frac{2}{a^{2}}

text: 设$M$、$N$是抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$上任意两点，点$E$的坐标为$(-\lambda, 0)(\lambda \geq0)$，若$\overrightarrow{E M} \cdot \overrightarrow{E N}$的最小值为$0$，则实数$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;E: Point;M: Point;N: Point;lambda: Real;lambda>=0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(E) = (-lambda, 0);PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, C);Min(DotProduct(VectorOf(E, M), VectorOf(E, N))) = 0
process: \overrightarrow{EM}和\overrightarrow{EN}的夹角最大为\frac{\pi}{2},从点E向抛物线引两条切线,切点分别为M,N,此时\overrightarrow{EM}和\overrightarrow{EN}的夹角最大,从而可得到直线EM的方程,与抛物线方程联立,则A=0,可求出\lambda的值由题意,\overrightarrow{EM}和\overrightarrow{EN}的夹角最大为\frac{\pi}{2},从点E向抛物线引两条切线,切点分别为M,N,此时\overrightarrow{EM}和\overrightarrow{EN}的夹角最大,且直线EM的斜率k=\tan\frac{\pi}{4}=1,方程为y=x+\lambda,联立\begin{cases}y2=4x\\v=x+2\end{cases},消去x可得y^{2}-4y+4\lambda=0,则_{A}=(-4)^{2}-4\times4\lambda=0,解得\lambda=1.

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=12 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$M$在$C$上，点$N$在$l$上，且$F N=\lambda F M(\lambda>0)$，若$|M F|=4$，则$\lambda$的值为?

process: 因为点M在C上,|MF|=4,所以x_{M}+3=4,即x_{M}=1,不妨设M在第一象限,则M(1,2\sqrt{3})所以_{k_{FM}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{1-3}=-\sqrt{3},故直线FM的方程为y=-\sqrt{3}(x-3),因为FN=\lambdaFM(\lambda>0),又准线l:x=-3,代入y=-\sqrt{3}(x-3)可得y_{N}=6\sqrt{3},所以\lambda=\frac{|FN|}{|FM|}=\frac{y_{N}}{y_{M}}=3

process: 由题意得p=3,可得抛物线的方程和直线AB的方程,联立直线AB方程和抛物线方程,运用韦达定理和中点坐标公式可得AB的中点Q的坐标和弦长|AB|,可得圆Q的半径,在\triangleQMN中,由锐角三角函数的定义可得所求值抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为F(\frac{p}{2},0),准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2}由题意得p=3,则抛物线方程为y^{2}=6x,F(\frac{3}{2},0),则直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{3}{2})由\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{3}{2}),\\\end{cases},得3x^{2}-15x+\frac{27}{4}=0-1设A,B的横坐标分别为x_{1},x_{2},则x_{1}+x_{2}=5所以AB的中点Q的坐标为(\frac{5}{2},\sqrt{3}),|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=5+3=8.则圆Q的半径为4在\triangleQMN中,\sin\angleQMN=\frac{\frac{5}{2}}{4}=\frac{5}{8}

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，与准线交于$C$点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$\overrightarrow{B C}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A F|-|B F|$的值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Intersection(l,Directrix(G))=C;Focus(G) = F;VectorOf(B, C) = 3*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 根据\overrightarrow{BC}=3\overrightarrow{FB}作图如下:过B作准线的垂线BB_{1},垂足为B_{1},过A作准线的垂线AE,垂足为E由抛物线的几何性质:BB.1=BF所以直线AB的倾斜角为\alpha,\cos\alpha=\cos\angleCBB_{1}=\frac{1}{3}\frac{|BB_{1}|}{|DF|}=\frac{|BC|}{|CF|},即\frac{|BB_{1}|}{2}=\frac{3}{4}所以|BF|=|BB_{1}|=\frac{3}{2},|FC|=6又因为\frac{|BB_{1}|}{BC}=\frac{|EA|}{|AC|},即\frac{1}{3}=\frac{|EA|}{|AC|},\frac{1}{3}=\frac{|FA|}{|AF|+|FC|}\frac{1}{3}=\frac{|FA|}{|AF|+6}.解得:|FA|=3所以|AF|-|BF|=\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-y+2=0$与$x$轴交于点$A$，点$P$在直线$l$上. 圆$C$:$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2$上有且仅有一个点$B$满足$A B \perp B P$，则点$P$的横坐标的取值集合为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 2);Expression(l) = (x - y + 2 = 0);Intersection(l, xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(P, l);PointOnCurve(B, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(B, P))
process: 由AB\botBP,得点B在以AP为直径的圆D上,由圆D与圆C相切,可得D在以A,C为焦点的椭圆上从而可得其轨迹方程,D在直线l上,联立可求得D坐标,最后可得P点坐标.由AB\botBP,得点B在以AP为直径的圆D上,所以圆D与圆C相切.由题意得A(-2,0),C(2,0).若圆D与圆C外切,则DC-DA=\sqrt{2};若圆D与圆C内切,则DA-DC=\sqrt{2}所以圆心D在以A,C为焦点的双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1上,即14x^{2}-2y^{2}=7.又点D在直线l上由\begin{cases}y=x+2\\14x2-2v2=7\end{cases}得12x^{2}-8x-15=0,解得x_{D}=\frac{3}{2}或x_{D}=-\frac{5}{6}.所以x_{P}=2x_{D}-x_{A}=2x_{D}+2=5或x_{P}=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 对于曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-1}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上椭圆，则$k$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;C: Curve;k: Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/(4 - k) + y^2/(k - 1) = 1);E = C;PointOnCurve(Focus(E), xAxis)
process: 根据题意可得关于k的不等式组为\begin{cases}4-k>0,\\k-1>0,\\4-k>k-1,\end{cases}解不等式组即可得答案\because曲线C:\frac{x2}{4-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-1}=1表示焦点在x轴上椭圆{k-1>0,解得:k\in(1,\frac{5}{2})4-k>k-1,

text: 过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，若$\angle A O B=120^{\circ}$($O$是坐标原点)，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

process: \because\angleAOB=120^{\circ}\Rightarrow\angleAOF=60^{\circ}\Rightarrow\angleAFO=30^{\circ}\Rightarrowc=2a,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=2.

text: 已知$P$、$Q$为抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$上两点，点$P$、$Q$的横坐标分别为$4$ ,$-2$，过$P$、$Q$分别作抛物线的切线，两切线交于点$A$，则点$A$的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(P,G) = True;PointOnCurve(Q,G) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y);XCoordinate(P) = 4;XCoordinate(Q) = -2;L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOfPoint(P,G) = L1;TangentOfPoint(Q,G) = L2;Intersection(L1,L2) = A;A:Point
process: 因为P、Q在抛物线上,所以P(4,8),Q(-2,2),由题意知两条切线方程的斜率都存在设过P点的切线方程为y=k_{1}(x-4)+8则\begin{cases}y=k_{1}(x-4)+8\\y=\frac{1}{2}x^{2}\end{cases}则\frac{1}{2}x^{2}-k_{1}x+4k_{1}-8=0因为相切,所以A=k_{1}^{2}-4\times\frac{1}{2}\times(4k_{1}-8)=0解得k_{1}=4,所以过P点的切线方程为y=4x-8同理设过Q点的切线方程为y=k_{2}(x+2)+2则\begin{cases}y=k_{2}(x+2)+2\\y=\frac{1}{2}x^{2}\end{cases},则\frac{1}{2}x^{2}-k_{2}x-2k_{2}-2=0因为相切,所以A=k_{2}^{2}+4k_{2}+4=0解得k_{2}=-2,所以过Q点的切线方程为y=-2x-2联立方程\begin{cases}y=4x-8\\v=-2x-2\end{cases},解得x=1所以两条切线方程的交点横坐标为1

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上存在一点$M$，它到左焦点的距离是它到右准线距离的$2$倍，则椭圆离心率的最小值为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一条渐近线过点$(4,3)$，且双曲线的一个焦点在拋物线$y^{2}=20 x$的准线上，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;C:Parabola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (4, 3);PointOnCurve(H,OneOf(Asymptote(G)));Expression(C)=(y^2=20*x);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),Directrix(C))
process: 抛物线y^{2}=20x的准线方程为x=-5,\because双曲线的一个焦点在抛物线y^{2}=20x的准线,\thereforec=5,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x\because双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的一条渐近线过点(4,3)\therefore(4,3)在直线y=\frac{b}{a}x上,即4.\frac{b}{a}=3,即4b=3a,b=\frac{3}{4}a平方得b^{2}=\frac{9}{16}a^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=25-a^{2},则\frac{25}{16}a^{2}=25.则a^{2}=16,b^{2}=25-16=9,即双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,

text: 设$A$、$B$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$长轴的两个端点，若$C$上存在点$M$满足$\angle A M B=120^{\circ}$，则$m$的取值范围是?

process: 假设椭圆的焦点在x轴上,则0<m<3时,假设M位于短轴的端点时,\angleAMB取最大值,要使椭圆C上存在点M满足\angleAMB=120^{\circ},\angleAMB\geqslant120^{\circ},\angleAMO\geqslant60^{\circ},\tan\angleAMO=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{m}}\geqslant\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}解得:0<m\leqslant1;当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,m>3,假设M位于短轴的端点时,\angleAMB取最大值,要使椭圆C上存在点M满足\angleAMB=120^{\circ},\angleAMB\geqslant120^{\circ},\angleAMO\geqslant60^{\circ},\tan\angleAMO=\frac{\sqrt{m}}{\sqrt{3}}\geqslant\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},解得:m\geqslant9,\thereforem的取值范围是(0,1]\cup[9,+\infty)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $P$为抛物线上一点，$P A \perp l $, $A$为垂足，如果$A F$的倾斜角为$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;l: Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G)=l;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,A),l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,A),l)=A;Inclination(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = (2*pi)/3
process: 试题分析:\because抛物线方程为y^{2}=8x,\therefore焦点F(2,0),准线l方程为x=-2,\because直线AF的倾斜角为\frac{2\pi}{3},直线AF的方程为y=-\sqrt{3}(x-2),由\begin{cases}x=-2\\y=-\sqrt{3}(x-2)\end{cases}可得A点坐标为(-2,4\sqrt{3})\becausePA\botl,A为垂足,\thereforeP点纵坐标为4\sqrt{3},代入抛物线方程,得P点坐标为(6,4\sqrt{3})|PF|=|PA|=6-(-2)=8,

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

process: 由于a=4,根据椭圆定义|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=2a,所以\triangleABF_{2}的周长为4a=16

text: 已知$P$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上一点，$O$为坐标原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为曲线$C$的左右焦点,若$|O P|=|O F_{2}|$，且满足$\tan \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=3$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);O: Origin;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F2));Tan(AngleOf(P, F2, F1)) = 3
process: \because|OP|=|OF_{2}|.\thereforeO为\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}外接圆的圆心.\therefore\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}又\tan\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=3,\therefore|PF_{1}|=3|PF_{2}|,由双曲线定义可知|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a解得|PF_{1}|=3a,|PF_{2}|=a,由|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}即(3a)^{2}+a^{2}=4c^{2}即有c^{2}=\frac{5}{2}a^{2}所以_{e}=\sqrt{10}

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的长轴的两个端点，$P$是椭圆$C$上的动点，且$\angle A P B$的最大值是$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则实数$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;m: Real;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/(m + 1) + y^2/m = 1);Endpoint(MajorAxis(C))={A,B};PointOnCurve(P, C);Max(AngleOf(A, P, B)) = 2*pi/3
process: 当点P位于短轴的端点时\angleAPB取得最大值,由此可得a,b的关系,利用椭圆的标准方程,即可求得m的值.如图所示,当点P位于短轴的端点时\angleAPB取得最大值,因为\angleAPB的最大值是\frac{2\pi}{3},所以\tan\frac{\angleAPB}{2}=\tan\frac{\pi}{3}=\sqrt{3},即\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3}所以\frac{\sqrt{m+1}}{\sqrt{m}}=\sqrt{3},解得m=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，已知$(\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}+ \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{A F_{1}}=0$ , $\overrightarrow{A F_{1}}=\frac{4}{3} \overrightarrow {{F}_{1}B}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;A: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Expression(C)=(x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};DotProduct((VectorOf(A,F2)+VectorOf(F1,F2)),VectorOf(A,F1))=0;VectorOf(A,F1)=4/3*VectorOf(F1,B);a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0
process: \because(\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}+\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}})\cdot\overrightarrow{AF_{1}}=(\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}+\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}})\cdot(\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}-\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}})=\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}^{2}-F_{1}F_{2}^{2}=0且|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|=2c|\overrightarrow{a}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|=2c\therefore|\overrightarrow{AF}|=2a-\because\overrightarrow{AF_{1}}=\frac{4}{3}\overrightarrow{F_{1}B}=2a-2c\therefore|\overrightarrow{BF}_{1}|=\frac{3}{2}(a-c),|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|=\frac{a}{2}+\frac{3c}{2}设AF_{1}的中点为H,则F_{2}H\botAB|\overrightarrow{AH}|=a-c,|\overrightarrow{BH}|=\frac{5}{2}(a-c).|\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}|^{2}-|\overrightarrow{AH}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}|^{2}-|\overrightarrow{BH}|^{2}代入数据并整理得:7c^{2}-12ac+5a^{2}=0,等式两边同时除以a2得:7e^{2}-12e+5=0解得e=\frac{5}{7}或e=1(舍去)所以椭圆C的离心率为e=\frac{5}{7}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点，$P$是双曲线上的一点，满足$|\overrightarrow{O P}|=|\overrightarrow{O F_{1}}|$, $O$是坐标原点，若$\Delta F_{1} F_{2} P$的面积为$4$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);O: Origin;Abs(VectorOf(O, P)) = Abs(VectorOf(O, F1));Area(TriangleOf(F1, F2, P)) = 4
process: 设P(x_{P},y_{P}),若|\overrightarrow{OP}|=|\overrightarrow{OF_{1}}|,则点P的轨迹方程为:x^{2}+y^{2}=c联立圆的方程x^{2}+y^{2}=c与双曲线的方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1可得:y_{p}=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{c}则\triangleF_{1}F_{2}P的面积为:S=\frac{1}{2}\times2c\times|y_{p}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2c\times\frac{b^{2}}{c}=b^{2}=4,结合b>0可得b=2.

text: 已知双曲线中心在原点，且以椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=64$的焦点为顶点，焦距长为$16$，则双曲线标准方程为?

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点$F$, 且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点,则$\frac{|A F| \cdot|B F|}{|A B|}$=?

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点，$P$是$C$的左支上一点，点$A$的坐标为$(0,4)$，则$\triangle A P F$周长的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 4);RightFocus(C)= F;PointOnCurve(P,LeftPart(C))
process: 设左焦点为F_{1}(-3,0),由双曲线的定义转化\triangleAPF的周长为|AP|+|PF_{1}|+2+|AF|,即可得解由双曲线方程x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1可知,a=1,c=3,故F(3,0),左焦点F_{1}(-3,0)当点P在双曲线左支上运动时,由双曲线定义知|PF|-|PF_{1}|=2,所以|PF|=|PF_{1}|+2,从而\triangleAPF的周长为|AP|+|PF|+|AF|=|AP|+|PF_{1}|+2+|AF|,因为|AF|=\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}=5为定值,所以当(|AP|+|PF_{1}|)最小时,\triangleAPF的周长最小,此时点P在线段AF_{1}与双曲线的交点处,如图所示,此时(|AP|+|PF_{1}|)=|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}=5所以AAPF周长的最小值为12.故答家为:12

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3 m}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 m+1}=1$的焦点在$x$轴上，则实数$m$的取值范围是?

process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{3m}+\frac{y^{2}}{2m+1}=1的焦点在x轴上,所以3m>2m+1>0,解得m>1,所以实数m的取值范围是(1,+\infty)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n}-y^{2}=1(n>1)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在双曲线上，且满足$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|=2 \sqrt{n+2}$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;n: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;n>1;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/n = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2*sqrt(n + 2)
process: 利用焦点三角形的性质结合题设条件可得|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{n+2}+\sqrt{n},|PF_{2}|=\sqrt{n+2}-\sqrt{从而可得焦点三角形为直角三角形,进而可求其面积.[详解]设点P在双曲线的右支上,则|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2\sqrt{n},|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2\sqrt{n+2}解得|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{n+2}+\sqrt{n},|PF_{2}|=\sqrt{n+2}-\sqrt{n}又|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{n+1}故|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}PF_{1}\botPF_{2}\therefore\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形.又|PF_{2}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=2\thereforeS_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$具有共同渐近线，且过点$(2,2)$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;H:Hyperbola;Expression(H)=(x^2-y^2/4=1);G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (2, 2);Asymptote(C)=Asymptote(H);PointOnCurve(G,C)

text: 已知两点$A(-1,0)$ ,$B(1,0)$，若直线$x-y+a=0$上存在点$P(x , y )$,满足$\angle A P B=90^{\circ}$，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;a: Real;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (a + x - y = 0);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(A, P, B) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);x1:Number;y1:Number
process: 因为直线x-y+a=0上存在点P(x,y)满足\angleAPB=90^{\circ},所以AP\botBP,即\overrightarrow{AP}\bot\overrightarrow{BP},\overrightarrow{AP}=(x+1,y),\overrightarrow{BP}=(x-1,y),所以\overrightarrow{AP}\cdot\overrightarrow{BP}=(x+1)(x-1)+y^{2}=0,整理可得:x^{2}+y^{2}=1,由题意可得:直线x-y+a=0与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=1有交点,所以圆心(0,0)到直线x-y+a=0的距离d=\frac{|a|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+12}}\leqslant1,解得:-\sqrt{2}\leqslanta\leqslant\sqrt{2}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$ , $A B$是过焦点$F$的一条弦，$A A_{1} \perp$准线$l$于$A_{1}$点，$B B_{1} \perp$准线$l$于$B_{1}$点，$N$是$A_{1} B_{1}$中点，若$A A_{1}=4$ , $B B_{1}=2$，则线段$N F$的长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2=2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G) = True;Focus(G) = F;F: Point;PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = True;l: Line;Directrix(G) = l;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,A1),l) = True;A1: Point;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,A1),l) = A1;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(B,B1),l) = True;B1: Point;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(B,B1),l) = B1;N: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A1,B1)) = N;LineSegmentOf(A,A1) = 4;LineSegmentOf(B,B1) = 2
process: 设点A和点B的坐标,由抛物线的定义分别表示出点A的横坐标x_{1}=4-\frac{p}{2},点B的横坐标x_{2}=2-\frac{p}{2},设直线AB的方程代入抛物线方程,利用韦达定理求得x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},解得p=\frac{8}{3},从而可以求得焦点F的坐标和点N的坐标,利用两点间距离公式求解NF的长即可.由抛物线的对称性,设点A(x_{1},y_{1}(y_{1}>0),A_{1}(-\frac{p}{2},y_{1})点B(x_{2},y_{2})(y_{2}<0),B_{1}(-\frac{p}{2},y_{2})由抛物线的定义,AA_{1}=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=4,x_{1}=4-\frac{p}{2}BB_{1}=x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=2,x_{2}=2-\frac{p}{2},直线AB的斜率存在,设直线AB:y=k(x-\frac{p}{2})代入抛物线方程并整理得,k^{2}x^{2}-(k^{2}p+2p)x+\frac{p^{2}k^{2}}{4}=0所以(4-\frac{p}{2})\cdot(2-\frac{p}{2})=\frac{p^{2}}{4},解得,p=\frac{8}{3},由韦达定理,x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},所以(4-\frac{p}{2}).(2-\frac{p}{2})=\frac{p^{2}}{4},解得,p=\frac{8}{3},所以焦点坐标F(\frac{4}{8},0),x_{1}=4-\frac{p}{2}=4-\frac{4}{3}=\frac{8}{3},x_{2}=2-\frac{p}{2}=2-\frac{4}{3}=\frac{2}{3},所以y_{1}=\sqrt{2\times\frac{8}{3}\times\frac{8}{3}}=\frac{\sqrt{82}}{3},y_{2}=-\sqrt{2\times\frac{8}{3}\times所以点N-\frac{4}{3},\sqrt{3}由两点间距离公式,|NF|=|(-\frac{4}{3}-\frac{4}{3})^{2}+\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}|=2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知两点$M(-3,0)$ , $N(3,0)$，点$P$为坐标平面内一点，且$|\overrightarrow{M N}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{M P}|+\overrightarrow{M N} \cdot \overrightarrow{M P}=0$，则动点$P(x , y)$到点$M(-3,0)$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(N) = (3, 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1:Number;y1:Number;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, N), VectorOf(M, P)) + DotProduct(Abs(VectorOf(M, N)),Abs(VectorOf(M, P))) = 0
process: 因为M(-3,0),N(3,0),所以\overrightarrow{MN}=(6,0),|\overrightarrow{MN}|=6,\overrightarrow{MP}=(x+3,y),\overrightarrow{NP}=(x-3,y),由|\overrightarrow{MN}|\cdot|\overrightarrow{MP}|+\overrightarrow{MN}\cdot\overrightarrow{NP}=0可得6\sqrt{(x+3)^{2}+y^{2}}+6(x-3)=0,整理可得y^{2}=-12x,所以M是抛物线y^{2}=-12x的焦点,所以点P到点M的距离的最小值就是原点到M(-3,0)的距离为3.

text: 已知点$A(2,4)$在拋物线$y^{2}=2 p x$上，且抛物线的准线过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点，若双曲线的离心率为$2$，则该双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2=2*p*x);Coordinate(A) = (2, 4);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Directrix(H));Eccentricity(G) = 2;p:Number;PointOnCurve(A,H)
process: 试题分析:\because点A(2,4)在抛物线y^{2}=2px上,\therefore16=4p,即p=4.\therefore抛物线的准线方程为x=-2又抛物线的准线过双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(a>0,b>0)的一个焦点,则c=2,而e=\frac{c}{a}=2,\thereforea=1,则b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=4-1=3'\therefore双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1.

text: 已知中心在原点的双曲线$E$的离心率为$2$，右顶点为$A$，过$E$的左焦点$F$作$x$轴的垂线$l$，且$l$与$E$交于$M$，$N$两点，若$\Delta A M N$的面积为$9$，则$E$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;A: Point;M: Point;N: Point;l:Line;O:Origin;Center(E)=O;Eccentricity(E)=2;RightVertex(E)=A;LeftFocus(E)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);Intersection(l, E) = {M,N};Area(TriangleOf(A, M, N)) = 9;F:Point
process: 设双曲线标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)令x=-c,则\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,得y=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a},所以|MN|=\frac{2b^{2}}{a},易知|AF|=a+c,所以S_{\triangleAMN}=\frac{1}{2}|MN||AF|=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{2b^{2}}{a}\times(a+c=又a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2}\cdots\textcircled{2},\frac{c}{a}=2\cdots\textcircled{3},联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}\textcircled{3}求解得所以双曲线方程为:x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

process: 如图所示|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,且PF_{2}\botF_{1}F_{2}\therefore\trianglePF_{2}F,为等腰直角三角形又\because|PA|=|AF_{1}|,\thereforeAF_{1}=AF_{2}=PA=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}=\sqrt{2}c又|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,\therefore2a=2\sqrt{2}c,即a=\sqrt{2}c,代入b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2},得b=c,由PF_{2}\botF_{1}F_{2}知x_{B}=c,代入椭圆方程解得|y_{b}|=\frac{b^{2}}{a}=\frac{c^{2}}{B}=\frac{c}{\beta},即|BF_{2}|=\frac{c}{\sqrt{2}}\frac{|BF_{2}|}{|PF_{1}}=\frac{\frac{c}{\sqrt{2}}}{2c}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 抛物线$y=-\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的准线与对称轴交于点$A$，过点$A$作直线交抛物线于$M$、$N$两点，点$B$在抛物线对称轴上，且$(\overrightarrow{B M}+\frac{\overrightarrow{M N}}{2}) \cdot \overrightarrow{M N}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{O B}|$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = -x^2/8);A: Point;Intersection(Directrix(G), SymmetryAxis(G)) = A;H: Line;PointOnCurve(A, H) = True;Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(B, SymmetryAxis(G)) = True;B: Point;DotProduct((VectorOf(B, M) + VectorOf(M, N)/2), VectorOf(M, N)) = 0;O: Origin
process: 抛物线标准方程是x^{2}=-8y,所以焦点为(0,-2),准线方程为y=2,A(0,2)设直线MN方程为y=kx+2,M(x_{1},y_{1}),N(x_{2},y_{2})由\begin{cases}y=kx+2\\y=-\frac{1}{8}x^{2}\end{cases}得\frac{1}{8}x^{2}+kx+2=0,所以A=k^{2}-4\times\frac{1}{8}\times2=k^{2}-1>0,k^{2}>1所以x_{1}+x_{2}=-8k设MN的中点为P(x_{0},y_{0}),则x_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}==-4k,y_{0}=kx_{0}+2=-4k^{2}+2,\overrightarrow{BM}+\frac{\overrightarrow{MN}}{2}=\overrightarrow{BM}+\overrightarrow{MP}=\overrightarrow{BP},由(\overrightarrow{BM}+\frac{\overrightarrow{MN}}{2})\cdot\overrightarrow{MN}=0得\overrightarrow{BP}\cdot\overrightarrow{MN}=0,即BP\botMN设B(0,t),则\frac{-4k^{2}+2-t}{-4k}\timesk=-1't=-4k^{2}-2因为k^{2}>1,所以t=-4k^{2}-2<-6,即B点纵坐标取值范围是(-\infty,-6)

text: 已知$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点，若$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{6}$,$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}|$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知经过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线与该抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|F A|=2|F B|$，若直线$A B$被圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=2 p$所截得的弦长为$4$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F,L);Intersection(L, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B));H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 2*p);Length(InterceptChord(LineOf(A, B), H)) = 4
process: 抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0),设直线AB方程为x=my+\frac{p}{2},代入y^{2}=2px有y^{2}-2pmx-p^{2}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})从而y_{1}+y_{2}=2pm\textcircled{1},y_{1}y_{2}=-p^{2},\textcircled{2}由|FA|=2|FB|可得y_{1}=-2y_{2}\textcircled{3},联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}\textcircled{3}可得_{m}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}于是直线AB方程为x=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}y+\frac{p}{2},即4x-\sqrt{2}y-2p=0,从而圆心(0,0)到直线AB的距离为d=\frac{2p}{\sqrt{18}},又圆的半径为r=\sqrt{2p},弦长为4,从而有2p-\frac{4p^{2}}{18}=4,解得p=3或6.

text: 顶点在坐标原点，焦点为$F(0,1)$的抛物线上有一动点$A$，圆$(x+1)^{2}+(y-4)^{2}=1$上有一动点$M$，则$|A M|+|A F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;F: Point;A: Point;M: Point;O:Origin;Vertex(G)=O;Coordinate(F) = (0, 1);Focus(G)=F;Expression(H) = ((x + 1)^2 + (y - 4)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(M,H)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过$F$且与$C$的一条渐近线垂直的直线$l$与$C$的右支交于点$P$，若$A$为$P F$的中点，且$|O A|=\frac{3 b}{2}-a$($O$为坐标原点)，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);IsPerpendicular(l,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));Intersection(l,RightPart(C))=P;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = A;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = -a + (3*b)/2
process: 设双曲线的右焦点为F_{1},设直线l与渐近线y=-\frac{b}{a}x交于B,可求出|BF|=b,|OB|=a,|PF_{1}|=3b-2a,由椭圆定义可得|PF|=3b,|AB|=\frac{b}{2},在直角三角形ABO中,(\frac{3}{2}b-a)^{2}=a^{2}+(\frac{b}{2})^{2},即可求出\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{2},得出离心率如图所示,设双曲线的右焦点为F_{1},不妨设直线l与渐近线y=-\frac{b}{a}x交于B,在直角三角形BOF中,由点到直线的距离可在\begin{matrix}BF&|-\frac{b}{a}\cdot(-c)-0|\\\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}&=\frac{bc}{a}=b,\because|OF|=c,\therefore|OB|=\sqrt{|OF^{2}-|BF|^{2}}=a'\becauseOA为\trianglePFF_{1}的中位线,|OA|=\frac{3b}{2}-a,\therefore|PF_{1}|=3b-2a,\because|PF|-|PF_{1}|=2a,\therefore|PF|=3b,\therefore|AF|=\frac{3b}{2},|AB|=|AF|-|BF|=\frac{b}{2}则在直角三角形ABO中.a)^{2}=a^{2}+(\frac{b}{2})^{2},化简得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为椭圆的左. 右焦点，已知$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，且$|P F_{1}|=3|P F_{2}|$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 利用余弦定理和椭圆的定义列方程,化简后求得椭圆的离心率.由|PF_{1}|=3|PF_{2}|,结合椭圆的定义和余弦定理有:\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|=3|PF_{2}|\\|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a\\(2c)^{2}=|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}-2|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\cdot\cos60\end{cases}化简得\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{7}{16},e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$，右焦点$F$到一条渐近线的距离为$2$，则双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;m: Number;m>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;Distance(F,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=2
process: 双曲线C:x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1^{(m>0)},的右焦点为F(c,0)点F到渐近线y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x的距离为:\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b,即b=2所以m=b^{2}=4.所以双曲线的焦距为:2\sqrt{1+4}=2\sqrt{5}

text: 若双曲线$y^{2}-\frac{x^{2}}{m}=-1$的实轴长为$4$，则其焦距等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 - x^2/m = -1);Length(RealAxis(G))=4
process: 双曲线方程可化为\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1,必有m>0,又实轴长为4,所以2\sqrt{m}=4,因此m=4,所以c^{2}=4+1=5,故焦距为2c=2\sqrt{5}.

text: 双曲线$H$的渐近线为$x+2 y=0$与$x-2 y=0$. 若$H$经过点$P(2 , 0)$，则双曲线$H$的方程为?

process: 依题意可设所求双曲线方程为(x+2y)(x-2y)=\lambda(\lambda\neq0),因为H经过点P(2,0),所以(2+0)(2-0)=\lambda,即\lambda=4,所以双曲线H的方程为x^{2}-4y^{2}=4,即\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$ ,过点$(2,0)$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则直线$O A$, $O B$($O$为坐标原点)的斜率之积为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;O: Origin;H: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(H, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B}
process: 设点A(x_{A},y_{A}),B(x_{B},y_{B})设l的方程为x=ty+2,则\begin{cases}x=ty+2\\y2=4x\end{cases}得y^{2}-4ty-8=0,则y_{A}\cdoty_{B}=-8,所以x_{A}\cdotx_{B}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}\cdoty_{2}^{2}}{16}=4^{,}从而k_{OA}\cdotk_{OB}=\frac{y_{A}\cdoty_{B}}{x_{A}}=\frac{-8}{4}=-2

text: 双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$在双曲线右支上，且$|P F_{1}|=3|P F_{2}|$ ,$ y=\pm x$为$C$的渐近线方程，若$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$4 \sqrt{2}$，则双曲线$C$的焦距长为?

text: 已知双曲线与$y=-x$直线有公共点，与直线$y=-2 x$没有公共点，则双曲线离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;L:Line;Expression(H) = (y = -2*x);Expression(L) = (y = -x);IsIntersect(G,L);NumIntersection(G, H) = 0
process: 若双曲线的焦点在x轴上,可设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)由于双曲线与y=-x直线有公共点,与直线y=-2x没有公共点,则1<\frac{b}{a}\leqslant2所以,e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}\in(\sqrt{2},\sqrt{5}]若双曲线的焦点在y轴上,可设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)若双曲线与y=-x直线有公共点,与直线y=-2x没有公共点,不合乎题意综上所述,双曲线离心率的取值范围是(\sqrt{2},\sqrt{5}]

text: 过直线$x-y-4=0$上一点$P$(点$P$不在$x$轴上）作抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的两条切线，两条切线分别交$x$轴于点$G$、$H$，则$\Delta G H P$外接圆面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: L: Line;Expression(L) = (x - y - 4 = 0);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,L) = True;Negation(PointOnCurve(P,xAxis));Z: Parabola;Expression(Z) = (x^2 = 4*y);L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOfPoint(P,Z) = {L1,L2};Intersection(L1,xAxis) = G;G: Point;Intersection(L2,xAxis) = H;H: Point
process: 抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点为F(0,1)如图,设切点A(4a,4a^{2})(a\neq0),B(4n,4n^{2})(n\neq0)直线PA、PB与x轴分别交于G、H,连接PF、GF、HF由x^{2}=4y,可得y=\frac{1}{4}x^{2},则y=\frac{1}{2}x则k_{PA}=\frac{1}{2}\times4a=2a,k_{PB}=\frac{1}{2}\times4n=2n直线PA方程为y-4a^{2}=2a(x-4a),即y=2a(x-2a),则G(2a,0)直线PB方程为y-4n^{2}=2n(x-4n),即y=2n(x-2n),则H(2n,0)由k_{PA}\cdotk_{FG}=2a\cdot\frac{1-0}{0-2a}=-1,可知GF\botPA由k_{PB}\cdotk_{FH}=2n\cdot\frac{1-0}{0-2n}=-1,可知HF\botPB则P、G、F、H四点在以线段PF为直径的圆上,此圆即为\triangleGHP的外接圆.点F到直线x-y-4=0的距离为d=\frac{|0-1-4|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2}则|PF|\geqslantd=\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2},则\triangleGHP的外接圆半径r=\frac{1}{2}|PF|\geqslant\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{4}故\triangleGHP的外接圆面积_{S}=\pi^{2}\geqslant\pi\times(\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{4})^{2}=\frac{25\pi}{8}即\triangleGHP的外接圆面积的最小值为\frac{25\pi}{8}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1)
