fact_expressions: m: Line;G: Ellipse;O: Origin;P: Point;P1: Point;P2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Intersection(m, G) = {P1, P2};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P1, P2)) = P;k1: Number;Slope(m) = k1;Negation(k1 = 0);k2: Number;Slope(LineOf(O, P)) = k2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(0<b<2)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，若$|\overrightarrow{B F_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}|$的最大值为$5$，则$b$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;0 < b;b < 2;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l) = True;l: Line;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};B: Point;A: Point;Max(Abs(VectorOf(A, F2)) + Abs(VectorOf(B, F2))) = 5
process: 由椭圆的定义,得|AB|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=4a=8,所以当线段AB的长度取得最小值时,|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}|有最大值.易知当AB垂直于x轴时,|AB|最小,计算即可得解羊解】由椭圆的定义,可知|AB|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=4a=8,所以当线段AB的长度取得最小值时,|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}|有最大值当AB垂直于x轴时,|AB|最小,且|AB|\_=2\times\frac{b^{2}}{2}=b^{2}所以|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}|的最大值为8-b^{2}=5,所以b^{2}=3,即b=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知抛物线的顶点在原点，对称轴为$x$轴，抛物线上的点$M(-3, m)$到焦点的距离为$5$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;O: Origin;m: Number;Coordinate(M) = (-3, m);Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G) = xAxis;PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5
process: 由于M的横坐标为负数,故抛物线开口向左,设抛物线方程为y^{2}=-2px,由于M到准线的距离为5,其横坐标为-3,根据抛物线的定义可知\frac{p}{2}=2,p=4,抛物线方程为y^{2}=-8x,代入M点的坐标得y^{2}=24,解得y=\pm2\sqrt{6},故m=\pm2\sqrt{6}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点到直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x$的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x*(sqrt(3)/3))
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的右焦点为(1,0),所以点(1,0)到直线y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x的距离为d=\frac{|\sqrt{3}\times1-3\times0|}{\sqrt{3+9}}=\frac{1}{2}

text: 已知方程$(m-1) x^{2}+(3-m) y^{2}=(m-1)(3-m)$表示椭圆，则$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2*(m - 1) + y^2*(3 - m) = (3 - m)*(m - 1));m:Number
process:
当m=1或m=3时,方程(m-1)x^{2}+(3-m)y^{2}=(m-1)(3-m)不表示椭圆当m
eq1且m
eq3时,方程(m-1)x^{2}+(3-m)y^{2}=(m-1)(3-m)可变形为: rac{x^{2}}{3-m}+ rac{y^{2}}{m-1}=1若表示椭圆,则 egin{cases}3-m>0\m-1>0\3-m
eqm-1\end{cases},解得1<m<2或2<m<3综上,m的取值范围为1<m<2或2<m<3.睛】本题考查椭圆的方程注意长轴与短轴不相等.

text: 已知抛物线的焦点到准线的距离为$1$，则抛物线的标准方程为(写出一个即可)?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Distance(Focus(G),Directrix(G))=1
process: 设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=2px.根据题意可得p=1,所以抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=2x

text: 连接定点$A(2,0)$和曲线$y=x^{2}+2$上动点$B$的线段$A B$的中点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);G: Curve;Expression(G) = (y = x^2 + 2);B: Point;PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P
process: 设P(x,y),B(x_{0},y_{0}),因为P是AB的中点,所以\begin{cases}\frac{x_{0}+2}{2}=x\\\frac{y_{0}}{2}=y\end{cases},则\begin{cases}x_{0}=2x-2\\y_{0}=2y\end{cases}代入曲线可得2y=(2x-2)^{2}+2,整理可得y=2x^{2}-44x+3所以P的轨迹方程是y=2x^{2}-4x+3.

text: 若短轴长为$2 \sqrt{5}$，焦距为$4$的椭圆的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$ ,过$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知中心在原点的椭圆$C$的右焦点为$F(1,0)$，离心率等于$\frac{1}{2}$，则$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F: Point;O:Origin;Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);RightFocus(C) = F;Center(C)=O;Eccentricity(C)=1/2
process: 根据椭圆的离心率公式以及c=1利用b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}求出b^{2},即可得到椭圆的方程依题意,所求椭圆的焦点位于x轴上,且c=1,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\Rightarrowa=2,b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=3,因此其方程是\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$与该抛物线的焦点$F$的距离$|M F|=4$，则点$M$的横坐标$x1$=?

process: M与焦点F的距离|MF|=4,即M代准线的距离为4,\because2p=4,-\frac{p}{2}=-1,准线为x=-1,\thereforeM的横坐标为|MF|-1=3.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点,$P$为椭圆$C$上一点,且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \perp \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$, 若$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$9$, 则$b$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+9}=1(m>0)$的虚轴长是实轴长的$2$倍，则$\Gamma$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/m - y^2/(m + 9) = 1);m: Number;m>0;Length(ImageinaryAxis(Gamma)) = 2*Length(RealAxis(Gamma))
process: 由虚轴长是实轴长的2倍可得b=2a,进而求得m与[详解]由题,双曲线中b=2a,故b^{2}=4a2,即m+9=4m\Rightarrowm=3.故c^{2}=m+m9=15故焦距2c=2\sqrt{15}

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -x)

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的右焦点为顶点，左顶点为焦点的抛物线方程是?

text: 中心在原点的双曲线的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Center(G)=O;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)
process: 若双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,由于其一条渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x,则\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3}所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=4,e=2若双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{\frac{x}{12}}=1,由于其一条渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x,则\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3}所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{4}{3},e=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$4$, 那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/64 + y^2/36 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 4

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过右焦点$F_{2}$的直线$A B$与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\Delta A B F_{1}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;B: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/6 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, LineOf(A, B));Intersection(LineOf(A, B), G) = {A, B}

text: 已知直线$l$: $a x+b y=0$与椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$C$的坐标为$(1,1)$，则$\overrightarrow{C A} \cdot \overrightarrow{C B}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;C: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(C) = (1, 1);a: Number;b: Number;Expression(l) = (a*x + b*y = 0);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 由题可设A(x_{0},y_{0}),B(-x_{0},-y_{0}),则\overrightarrow{CA}\cdot\overrightarrow{CB}=(x_{0}-1,y_{0}-1)\cdot(-x_{0}-1,-y_{0}-1)=2-(x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2})|OA|=\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}}\in[1,3],\thereforex_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}\in[1,9],\therefore\overrightarrow{CA}\cdot\overrightarrow{CB}\in[-7,1]

text: 直线$y=k x+1$与抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$至多有一个公共点，则$k$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;k: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(H, G) <= 1
process: 把y=kx+1代入y^{2}=2x得k^{2}x^{2}+(2k-2)x+1=0(1)若k=0,则-2x+1=0,方程只有一解,符合题意(2)若k\neq0,\triangle=(2k-2)^{2}-4k^{2}=4-8k直线y=kx+1与抛物线y^{2}=2x至多有一个公共点\Delta=4-8k\leqslant0,解得k\geqslant\frac{1}{2}所以k\geqslant\frac{1}{2}或k=0故对答案为:0\cup[\frac{1}{2},+\infty)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{a-2}=1$的焦点坐标为$(0, \pm \sqrt{6})$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/(a - 2) + x^2/a = 1);Coordinate(Focus(C)) = (0,pm*sqrt(6))
process: 双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{a-2}=1的焦点坐标为(0,\pm\sqrt{6})

text: 若圆锥曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5-\lambda}-\frac{y^{2}}{\lambda-1}=1$的离心率为$\sqrt{\lambda}$, 则$\lambda$=?
fact_expressions: H: ConicSection;lambda: Number;Expression(H) = (x^2/(5 - lambda) - y^2/(lambda - 1) = 1);Eccentricity(H) = sqrt(lambda)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=2 x-4$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点. 则$\cos \angle A F B$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x - 4);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的上、下顶点分别为$B_{1}$、$B_{2}$. 点$M$为$C$上不在坐标轴上的任意一点，且直线$M B_{1}$, $M B_{2}$的斜率之积为$-\frac{b}{2 a}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;B1: Point;B2: Point;UpperVertex(C) = B1;LowerVertex(C) = B2;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);Negation(PointOnCurve(M, axis));Slope(LineOf(M, B1))*Slope(LineOf(M, B2)) = -b/(2*a)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线与曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y \geq 0)$只有一个交点，则实数$a$满足的条件是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Curve;a: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(H) = And(x^2/a+y^2/4=1,y>=0);NumIntersection(Directrix(G), H) = 1
process: 根据题意求出抛物线的准线方程为x=-2,分别讨论a>0和a<0时曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y\geqslant0)所表示的图形,即可求解.抛物线y^{2}=8x的准线为x=-2,当a>0时,\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y\geqslant0)表示椭圆在x轴上方部分以及左右顶点所以-\sqrt{a}\leqslantx\leqslant\sqrt{a},若x=-2与曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y\geqslant0)只有一个交点则-\sqrt{a}\leqslant-2,解得a\geqslant4,当a<0时,\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y\geqslant0)表示双曲线的在x轴上方部分即上支此时x\in(-\infty,+\infty)此时满足x=-2与曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(y\geqslant0)只有一个交点,所以a<0.综上所述:实数a满足的条件是a<0或a\geqslant4,

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过焦点的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则当$|A F|+4|B F|$取得最小值时，直线$A B$的倾斜角的正弦值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F,H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)))
process: \textcircled{1}过焦点的直线的斜率不存在时,则|AF|=|BF|=2,即\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=1\textcircled{2}过焦点的直线的斜率存在时,设直线的方程为y=k(x-1)(k\neq0).联立\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},消去y得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=1.\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=\frac{1}{x_{1}+1}+\frac{1}{x_{2}+1}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+2}{x_{1}x_{2}+x_{1}+x_{2}+}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{1+\frac{k^{2}}{2k^{2}+4}+1}=1综上,\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=1.设|AF|=a,|BF|=b,则\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=1.\therefore|AF|+4|BF|=a+4b=(\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b})(a+4b)=5+\frac{4b}{a}+\frac{a}{b}\geqslant5+2\sqrt{\frac{4b}{a}\cdot\frac{a}{b}}=9,当且仅当a=2b=3时取等号.\therefore当|AF|+4|BF|取得最小值时,x_{1}+1=2(x_{2}+1)=3,即x_{1}=2,x_{2}=\frac{1}{2},此时直线AB的斜率为k=\pm2\sqrt{2},即直线AB的倾斜角的正弦值为\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 若在直线$y=x$上存在点$P$、$P$到点$A(-m, 0)$与到点$B(m, 0)(m>0)$的距离之差为$2$，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P:Point;m: Real;m>0;Expression(G) = (y = x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Coordinate(A) = (-m, 0);Coordinate(B) = (m, 0);Distance(P,A)-Distance(P,B)=2
process: 根据双曲线的定义,将问题转化为直线y=x和双曲线右支有交点的问题来解决.根据双曲线的定义可知,其2a=2,a=1.要使双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的右支与直线y=x有交点,则其渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x的斜率\frac{b}{a}>1,故b>1,所以m=c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{1+b^{2}}>\sqrt{1+1}=\sqrt{2},所以m的取值范围是(\sqrt{2},+\infty)

text: 已知点$A$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上一点，$F$为椭圆的一个焦点，且$A F \perp x$轴，$|A F|$=焦距，则椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);F: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$, 点$A$、$B$在抛物线上, 且满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F B}$, 若$|\overrightarrow{A F}|=\frac{3}{2}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(A, F) = lambda*VectorOf(F, B);Abs(VectorOf(A, F)) = 3/2;lambda:Number
process: 由题意得F(0,1)因为AB为抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点弦,所以\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=\frac{2}{p}=1.而|\overrightarrow{AF}|=\frac{3}{2},解得|\overrightarrow{BF}|=3.又因为\overrightarrow{AF}=\lambda\overrightarrow{FB},所以\lambda=\frac{|\overrightarrow{AF}|}{|\overrightarrow{DO}|}=\frac{3}{3}=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$为$(1,0)$，过点$F$的直线交该抛物线的准线于点$A$，与该抛物线的一个交点为$B$，且$\overrightarrow{F A}=-3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, Directrix(G)) = A;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = B;VectorOf(F, A) = -3*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标F(1,0),准线方程x=-1作BD垂直于准线于D,准线与x轴交于点E,则EF//DB,\therefore\triangleAEF\sim\triangleADB.\because\overrightarrow{FA}=-3\overrightarrow{FB},\therefore|BD|=\frac{4}{3}|EF|=\frac{8}{3}由抛物线的定义得|BF|=|BD|=\frac{8}{3}\therefore|AB|=4|BF|=\frac{32}{3}

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点，定点$A(-3,-3)$，点$P$为椭圆$C$上的一个动点，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-3, -3);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C)
process: 设椭圆的右焦点为F_{1}(1,0),再利用数形结合分析求解.设椭圆的右焦点为F_{1}(1,0),|PA|+|PF|=|PA|+2a-|PF|=4+|PA|-|PF|\leqslant4+|AF|=4+\sqrt{(-3-1)^{2}+3^{2}}=9

text: 已知点$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=-8 x$的焦点，$O$为原点，点$P$是抛物线准线上一动点，$A$在抛物线上，且$|A F|=4$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(G));PointOnCurve(A, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，焦点为$F$，若$A$、$B$在抛物线上且在第一象限，$|A F|=2$,$|B F|=4$,$|A B|=3$，求直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 4;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 3
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则由于AB的斜率存在,设AB的斜率为k.A,B都在x轴上方,由题意知k>0,由抛物线定义AF=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2},BF=x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}则\begin{cases}x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=2\\x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=4\end{cases}\Rightarrow|x_{1}2.由弦长公式AB=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}|所以_{AB}=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}|x_{1}-x_{2}|=3\Rightarrow\sqrt{1+k^{2}}=\frac{3}{2}\Rightarrowk=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$，过其右焦点且垂直于实轴的直线与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$O M \perp O N$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G),H);IsPerpendicular(RealAxis(G),H);Intersection(H,G) = {M,N};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, M), LineSegmentOf(O, N))
process: 由题意,设右焦点为F.因为OM\botON,所以AOMN为等腰直角三角形,所以|MF|=|OF|,可得\frac{b^{2}}{a}=c又由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},整理得c^{2}-ac-a^{2}=0,解得\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1\pm\sqrt{5}}{2}又因为e>1,所以_{e}=\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}.

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;Z: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 5)^2 = 4);Expression(Z) = (y^2 + (x + 5)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, H);PointOnCurve(N, Z)
process: 试题分析:设两圆(x-5)^{2}+y^{2}=4和(x+5)^{2}+y^{2}=1圆心分别为A,B,则A,B正好为双曲线两焦点,|PM|-|PN|\leqslant|PA|+2-(PB|-1)=|PA|-|PB|+3=2a+3=6+3=9,即最大值为9

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{\sqrt {2}}{2} x$，则它的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x*(sqrt(2)/2));Eccentricity(G)=e;e:Number

text: 设$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$上一动点，$O$为坐标原点，$M$为线段$OP$的中点，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;P: Point;G: Hyperbola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = M

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{11}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\Delta F_{1} A B$的周长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;F1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/11 + y^2/7 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{11}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1得长半轴长为a=\sqrt{11}由椭圆的定义可知,三角形\triangleF_{1}AB的周长为|AB|+|AF_{1}|+|BF_{1}|=|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=2a+2a=4\sqrt{11}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点$F(c, 0)$，点$P$在椭圆$C$上，线段$P F$与圆$(x-\frac{c}{3})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{b^{2}}{9}$相切于点$Q$，且$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{Q F}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;c: Number;Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (-c/3 + x)^2 = b^2/9);Q: Point;TangentPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F), G) = Q;VectorOf(P, Q) = 2*VectorOf(Q, F)
process: 根据数形结合分析,可得PF\botPF',并根据勾股定理,可得b^{2}+(2a-b)^{2}=4c^{2}=4(a^{2}-b^{2})计算离心率.如图,首先画出函数图象,|EF|=|OF|-|OE|=c-\frac{1}{3}c=\frac{2}{3}c,\therefore\frac{|EF|}{|EF|}=\frac{\frac{2}{3}c}{c+\frac{1}{3}c}=\frac{1}{2}又\because\overrightarrow{PQ}=2\overrightarrow{QF},\thereforePF'//QE,且\frac{|QE|}{|PF|}=\frac{1}{3},且PF\botPF'\because|QE|=\frac{b}{3},\therefore|PF|=b,根据椭圆的定义可知|PF|=2a-b由勾股定理可知|PF|^{2}+|PF|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2},即b^{2}+(2a-b)^{2}=4c^{2}=4(a^{2}-b^{2})整理为b^{2}+4a^{2}+b^{2}-4ab=4a^{2}-4b^{2},即\frac{b}{a}=\frac{2}{3},\therefore\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}

text: 过抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$的焦点$F$作斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线$l$，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线在$A$、$B$处的两条切线交于点$M$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Slope(l)=sqrt(3);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Intersection(TangentOnPoint(A,C),TangentOnPoint(B,C))=M;B:Point

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的一个焦点为$F_{1}$，点$P$在椭圆上，如果线段$P F_{1}$的中点$M$在$y$轴上，则点$M$到坐标原点$O$的距离$|M O|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;M: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 + y^2/3 = 1);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;PointOnCurve(M, yAxis);Distance(M, O) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, O))
process: 设点M的坐标为(0,m),由题得F_{1}(-3,0),根据中点坐标公式知道点P的坐标为(3,2m),代入椭圆的方程得解.设点M的坐标为(0,m),由题得F_{1}(-3,0).根据中点坐标公式知道点P的坐标为(3,2m),代入椭圆的方程得m=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}.所以|MO|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}

text: 若直线$l$经过抛物线$x^{2}=-4 y$的焦点且与圆$(x-1)^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=1$相切，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -4*y);Expression(H) = ((x - 1)^2 + (y - 2)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),l);IsTangent(l,H)
process: 因为抛物线方程为x^{2}=-4y所以焦点坐标为:F(0,-1).当直线的斜率不存在时,设直线方程为:x=0,圆心到直线的距离为d=1=r,符合题意,当直线的斜率存在时,设直线方程为:y=kx-1,即kx-y-1=0圆心到直线的距离为d=\frac{|k-3|}{\sqrt{1+k^{2}}}=r=1,解得k=\frac{4}{3}.所以直线方程为4x-3y-3=0,

text: 双曲线$y^{2}-4 x^{2}=64$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$7$，则$P$到它的另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-4*x^2 + y^2 = 64);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;Distance(P, F1) = 7;Negation(F1 = F2);OneOf(Focus(G))=F2
process: 将双曲线y^{2}-4x^{2}=64化成标准形式:\frac{y^{2}}{64}-\frac{x}{16}=1,\thereforea^{2}=64,b^{2}=16'P到它的一个焦点的距离等于7,设PF_{1}=7\because|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|=2a=16,\thereforePF_{2}=PF_{1}\pm16=23或-9(舍去)

text: 离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$ , 一个焦点是$F(0 ,-3)$的椭圆标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, -3);Eccentricity(G)=e;e: Number;e = 1/2;OneOf(Focus(G))=F
process: 试题分析:先设出椭圆方程,根据条件列出关于a,b,c的方程,求出a,b,c即可得到结论由题设椭圆的焦点在y轴上,设方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,由题得:\begin{cases}c=3\\\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\\a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}a=6\\b=3\sqrt{3}\end{cases}所以椭圆标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{27}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{2} x$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别是$C$的左、右焦点，$P$为$C$右支上一点. 若$|P F_{1}|=m-1$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;m: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;m>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(2)*x));LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = m - 1
process: 因为双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{2}x.所以\sqrt{\frac{m}{4}}=\sqrt{2},解得m=8.因为|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=4,|PF_{1}|=m-1所以|PF_{2}|=3,又|F_{F}|=4\sqrt{3},由余弦定理里得\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{5}{21}则\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的面积_{S}=\frac{1}{2}\times3\times7\times\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{21}{2}\times\frac{4\sqrt{26}}{21}=2\sqrt{26}

text: $P$、$Q$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$上顶点以外的两点，$O$为坐标原点.$\angle P O Q=\frac{\pi}{4}$，直线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$分别是过$P$、$Q$两点抛物线的切线.($I$)则$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$的交点$M$点的轨迹方程是?($II$)若$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$分别交$x$轴于$A$、$B$两点，则过$\triangle A B M $的垂心与点$(0,-\frac{1}{4})$的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);P: Point;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;PointOnCurve(Q, G) = True;Negation(Vertex(G) = P);Negation(Vertex(G) = Q);O: Origin;AngleOf(P, O, Q) = pi/4;l1: Line;l2: Line;PointOnCurve(P, l1) = True;PointOnCurve(Q, l2) = True;IsTangent(l1, G) = True;IsTangent(l2, G) = True;M: Point;Intersection(l1, l2) = M;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l1, xAxis) = A;Intersection(l2, xAxis) = B;l3: Line;PointOnCurve(Orthocenter(TriangleOf(A, B, M)), l3) = True;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (0, -1/4);PointOnCurve(I, l3) = True

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y=\frac{x^{2}}{2}$交于$A$、$B$两点，且抛物线在$A$、$B$两点处的切线互相垂直，其中$A$点坐标为$(2 , 2)$, 则直线$l$的斜率等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;IsPerpendicular(TangentOnPoint(A,G),TangentOnPoint(B,G)) = True;Coordinate(A) = (2, 2)
process: 对抛物线y=\frac{x^{2}}{2},y=x;又A(2,2),可得:k_{A}=2抛物线在A,B两点处的切线互相垂直\thereforek_{B}=-\frac{1}{2}\thereforeB(-\frac{1}{2},\frac{1}{8})\thereforek_{AB}=\frac{2-\frac{1}{8}}{2+\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{3}{4}本题正确结果:\frac{3}{3}

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作直线$l$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=\lambda$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则实数$\lambda$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = lambda);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(P,l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=P;lambda: Real
process: 根据中点坐标公式及点差法,可求得直线l的方程,结合直线与双曲线有两个不同的交点,可得\triangle>0,即可求得\lambda的取值范围.因为双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=2.则\lambda\neq0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})因为点P恰为线段AB的中点则x_{1}+x_{2}=2,y_{1}+y_{2}=2则\begin{cases}x_{1}^{2}-\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{2}=\lambda\\x_{2}2-\frac{y_{2}}{2}=\lambda\end{cases},两式相减并化简可得\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=2\times\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=2即直线l的斜率为2所以直线l的方程为y=2x-1x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=\lambda.化简可得2x^{2}-4x+2\lambda+1=0因为直线l与双曲线有两个不同的交点所以A=16-4\times2\times(2\lambda+1)>0解得\lambda<\frac{1}{2}且\lambda\neq0所以\lambda的取值范围为(-\infty,0)\cup(0,\frac{1}{2})

text: 已知抛物线$\Gamma_{1}$和$\Gamma_{2}$的焦点均为点$F(2,1)$，准线方程为$x=0$和$5 x+12 y=0$. 设两抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: Gamma_1: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Gamma_2: Parabola;Focus(Gamma_1)=F;Focus(Gamma_2)=F;Coordinate(F)=(2,1);Expression(Directrix(Gamma_2)) = (5*x + 12*y = 0);Expression(Directrix(Gamma_1)) = (x = 0);Intersection(Gamma_1,Gamma_2)={A,B}
process: 根据抛物线定义写出两抛物线方程(平方),相减后可得A,B两点坐标满足的方程,化简此方程(根据A,B两点在两准线的位置确定正负)可得直线AB方程详解】按抛物线定义有_{T_{1}}:(x-2)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=x^{2};I_{2}:(x-2)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=\frac{(5x+12y)^{2}}{13^{2}}两方程相减即得x^{2}=\frac{(5x+12y)^{2}}{13^{2}},而A,B位于x=0的右侧和5x+12y=0的上侧,故x=\frac{5x+12y}{13},即y=\frac{2}{3}x.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}(-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$ , $F_{2}(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$, 点$P$是第一象限内双曲线上的点，且$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，$\tan \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=-2$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-sqrt(3)/2, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (sqrt(3)/2, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 1/2;Tan(AngleOf(P, F2, F1)) = -2

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$和圆$O$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$, 若$C$上存在点$P$, 使得过点$P$引圆$O$的两条切线,切点分别为$A$、$B$,满足$\angle A P B=60^{\circ}$, 则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;O: Circle;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = b^2);TangentOfPoint(P, O) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,O)=A;TangentPoint(l2,O)=B;AngleOf(A, P, B) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);PointOnCurve(P,C)
process: 试题分析:连接OP,\therefore\angleOPB=30^{\circ},\because|OB|=b,\therefore|OP|=2b\therefore2b\leqslanta,\therefore4a^{2}-4c^{2}\leqslanta^{2}\thereforee\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左，右焦点，点$M$在$E$上，且$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则$\Delta F_{1} M F_{2}$的面积为?

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x = -2)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，直线$y=\frac{4}{3} x$与双曲线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A F \perp B F$，则双曲线的渐进线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = (4/3)*x);RightFocus(G) = F;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 由题意可知:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)焦点在x轴上,右焦点F(c,0),则\begin{cases}y=\frac{4}{3}x\\\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},整理得:(9b^{2}-16a^{2})x^{2}=9a^{2}b^{2},即x^{2}=\frac{9a^{2}b^{2}}{9b^{2}-16a^{2}}\thereforeA与B关于原点对称,设A(x,\frac{4}{3}x),B(-x,-\frac{4}{3}x),\overrightarrow{FA}=(x-c,\frac{4}{3}x),\overrightarrow{FB}=(-x-c,-\frac{4}{3}x),\becauseAF\botBF,\therefore\overrightarrow{FA}\cdot\overrightarrow{FB}=0,即(x-c)(-x-c)+\frac{4}{3}x\times(-\frac{4}{3}x)=0,整理得:c^{2}=\frac{25}{9}x^{2},\thereforea^{2+b^{2}}=\frac{25}{9}\times\frac{9a^{2}b^{2}}{9b^{2}-16a^{2}},即9b^{4}-32a^{2}b^{2}-16a^{4}=0\therefore(b^{2}-4a^{2})(9b^{2}+4a^{2})=0.\becausea>0,b>0,\therefore9b^{2}+4a^{2}\neq0,\thereforeb^{2}-4a^{2}=0,故b=2a,双曲线的渐近线方程v=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm2x

text: 设抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $A \in C$，已知以$F$为圆心，$F A$为半径的圆$F$交$l$于$B$、$D$两点；若$\angle B F D=90^{\circ}$, $\triangle A B D$的面积为$4 \sqrt{2}$；则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;A: Point;In(A,C);F1: Circle;Center(F1) = F;Radius(F1) = LineSegmentOf(F,A);B: Point;D: Point;Intersection(F1, l) = {B, D};AngleOf(B, F, D) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Area(TriangleOf(A, B, D)) = 4*sqrt(2)
process: 由题意,\triangleBFD是等腰直角三角形,斜边|BD|=2p,结合S_{\triangleABD}=4\sqrt{2},即得解解由对称性知:\triangleBFD是等腰直角三角形,斜边|BD|=2p点A到准线l的距离d=|FA|=|FB|=\sqrt{2}pS_{\DeltaABD}=4\sqrt{2}\Leftrightarrow\frac{1}{2}\times|BD|\timesd=4\sqrt{2}\Leftrightarrowp=2

text: 已知点$F_{1}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点，点$A(1,1)$，动点$P$在椭圆上，则$|P A+ P F_{1}|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的一个顶点作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$的两条切线,切点分别为$A$、$B$, 若$\angle A O B=90^{\circ}$($O$是坐标原点), 则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = b^2);l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentOfPoint(OneOf(Endpoint(MajorAxis(C))),G) = {l1,l2};TangentPoint(l1,G)=A;TangentPoint(l2,G)=B;AngleOf(A, O, B) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 经过抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点和顶点且与准线相切的圆的半径为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);H: Circle;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H) = True;PointOnCurve(Vertex(G),H) = True;IsTangent(Directrix(G),H) = True
process: 试题分析:焦点为(2,0),所以圆心在直线x=1上,设圆心坐标为(1,a),所以到准线的距离即半径为1+2=3.

text: 已知椭圆的中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴，短轴的一个端点$B$与椭圆的两个焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$组成的三角形的周长为$4+2 \sqrt{3}$ ,且$\angle F_{1} B F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$ ,则椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Center(G) = O;O: Origin;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;OneOf(Endpoint(MinorAxis(G))) = B;B: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Perimeter(TriangleOf(B, F1, F2)) = 4 + 2*sqrt(3);AngleOf(F1, B, F2) = 2*pi/3
process: 设椭圆的焦点在x轴上,长轴长为2a,焦距为2c,如图所示则在\triangleF_{2}OB中,由\angleF_{2}BO=\frac{\pi}{3}得:c=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}a'所以\triangleF_{2}BF_{1}的周长为2a+2c=2a+\sqrt{3}a=4+2\sqrt{3}\thereforea=2,c=\sqrt{3}.\thereforeb^{2}=1;故所求椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x2}{4}+y^{2}=1.当椭圆的焦点落在y轴上,同理可得方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{4}+x^{2}=1

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$，当$m \in[-2 ,-1]$时，该曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;In(m, [-2, -1])

text: 过点$M(1,1)$作斜率为$-\frac{1}{2}$的直线与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$，若$M$是线段$A B$的中点，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);G: Line;Slope(G) = -1/2;PointOnCurve(M, G);C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 试题分析:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\frac{x_{1}2}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{1}2}{b^{2}}=1\textcircled{1},\frac{x_{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{2}2}{b^{2}}=1\textcircled{2},\becauseM是线段AB的中点,\therefore\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=1,\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=1^{,}\because直线AB的方程是y=-\frac{1}{2}(x-1)+1.\thereforey_{1}-y_{2}=-\frac{1}{2}(x_{1}-x_{2}),\because过点M(1,1)作斜率为-\frac{1}{2}的直线与椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)相交于A,B两点,M是线段AB的中点,\therefore\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}两式相减可得\frac{x_{1}-x_{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}2}{b^{2}}=0,即\frac{2}{a^{2}}+(-\frac{1}{2})\cdot\frac{2}{b^{2}}=0\thereforea=\sqrt{2}b\thereforec=b\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;F2: Point;m>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(m^2 + 5) + x^2/m^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = (2*pi)/3;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2))
process: 由双曲线的方程可得:双曲线的实半轴长a=m,设半焦距c,则c^{2}=2m^{2}+5,由双曲线的定义可得|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|=2|AF_{2}|=2a,\therefore|AF_{2}|=a=m,|AF_{1}|=3m.在\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中,由余弦定理得|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}A|^{2}+|F_{2}A|^{2}-2|F_{1}A||F_{2}A|\cos\angleF_{1}AF_{2}即8m^{2}+20=9m^{2}+m^{2}-2\times3m\timesm\times(-\frac{1}{2}).解得:m=2,

text: 已知双曲线的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 4 y=0$，焦点坐标为$(-5,0)$，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (-5, 0);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(pm*4*y+3*x=0)
G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左右焦点，点$P$在双曲线的左支上，且$\frac{|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|^{2}}{|P F_{1}|}$的最小值为$8 a$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(G)) = True;Min(Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = 8*a
process: 试题分析:\because双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},P为双曲线左支上的任意一点,\therefore|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}|=2a,|PF_{2}|=2a+|PF_{1}|,\therefore\frac{|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{(|PF_{1}|+2a)^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}=|PF_{1}|+\frac{4a^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}+4a\geqslant8a(当且仅当|PF_{1}|=2a时取等号),所以|PF_{2}|=2a+|PF_{1}|=4a,\because|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}|=2a<2c,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=6a\geqslant2c,所以e\in(1,3].

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左焦点为$F$、$M$是该双曲线一条渐近线上的点，且$O M \perp M F$ , $O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle O M F$的面积为$4$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, M), LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(O, M, F)) = 4
process: 如图,根据双曲线的对称性,不妨设点M在第二象限,则对应的渐近线方程为=-\frac{b}{a}x\Rightarrowbx+ay=0,因为OM\botMF,所以MF=\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{bc}{c}=b.=4,而\triangleOMF的面积为4,则\frac{1}{2}\times4\timesb=4\Rightarrowb=2,则离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{20}}{4}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过原点$O$作斜率为$\frac{4}{3}$的直线交$C$的右支于点$A$，若$|O A|=|O F|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, G) = True;Slope(G) = 4/3;G: Line;Intersection(G, RightPart(C)) = A;A: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F))
process: 假设已知直线的倾斜角为\theta,由题可知:\tan\theta=\frac{4}{3},所以,\sin\theta=\frac{4}{5},\cos\theta=\frac{3}{5},然后根据|OA|=|OF|,求得A点坐标,最后代入双曲线的方法化简并结合e=\frac{c}{a}(e>1)可得结果.设已知直线的倾斜角为\theta,由题可知:\tan\theta=\frac{4}{3}所以,\sin\theta=\frac{4}{5},\cos\theta=\frac{3}{5},因为|OA|=|OF|=c所以,A(\frac{3}{5}c,\frac{4}{5}c),又因为A在双曲线C上,所以,代入C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,得\frac{9c^{2}}{25a^{2}}-\frac{16c^{2}}{25b^{2}}=1,所以9e^{2}-\frac{16e^{2}}{e^{2}-1}=259,即e^{4}-9e^{2}-16e^{2}=25e^{2}-25化简得:9e^{4}-50e^{2}+25=0,即(9e^{2}-5)(e^{2}-5)=0,解得:a=+\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}或e=\pm\sqrt{5}.又因为e>1,所以e=\sqrt{5}.

text: 已知过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$焦点的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，过点$A$作抛物线准线的垂线，垂足为$M$, $|A B|=|B M|$, 则$A$点的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);G: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};L: Line;PointOnCurve(A, L);IsPerpendicular(L, Directrix(C));M: Point;FootPoint(L, Directrix(C)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, M))

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$A$是椭圆上顶点，$D$是$A F_{2}$的中点，若$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}} \perp \overrightarrow{D F_{1}}$ ,则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F2: Point;D: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;UpperVertex(C)=A;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = D;IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(A,F2),VectorOf(D,F1))

text: 若椭圆上的点到焦点的距离的最小值为$5$，最大值为$15$，则椭圆短轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Min(Distance(P, Focus(G))) = 5;Max(Distance(P, Focus(G))) = 15
process: 不妨设椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),由题意可得\begin{cases}a+c=15\\a-c=5\end{cases}-c=5解得\begin{cases}a=10\\c=5\end{cases},则椭圆的短轴长度为:2b=2\sqrt{10^{2}-5^{2}}=10\sqrt{3}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$G$位于第一象限的双曲线上，若点$H$满足$\overrightarrow{O H}=\overrightarrow{O G}+\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{G F_{1}}}{|\overrightarrow{G F_{1}}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{G F_{2}}}{| \overrightarrow{G F_{2}}} |)(\lambda \neq 0)$，且直线$G H$与$x$轴的交点为$P(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}, 0)$，则$G$点的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Point;PointOnCurve(G, C) ;Quadrant(G) = 1;H: Point;VectorOf(O, H) = VectorOf(O, G) + lambda*(VectorOf(G, F1)/Abs(VectorOf(G, F1)) + VectorOf(G, F2)/Abs(VectorOf(G, F2)));lambda: Number;Negation(lambda = 0);O: Origin;Intersection(LineOf(G,H), xAxis) = P;P : Point;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3)/3, 0)
process: 由\overrightarrow{OH}=\overrightarrow{OG}+\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}}{|\overrightarrow{GF}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}}{|GF_{2}|})得GH是\angleF_{1}GF_{2}的角平分线,根据角平分线性质结合双曲线定义可求得G到焦点的距离,再利用G在双曲线上可得G点坐标.\because\overrightarrow{OH}=\overrightarrow{OG}+\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}}{|\overrightarrow{GF}_{1}}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}_{2}}{|\overrightarrow{GF}_{2}|}),\therefore\overrightarrow{GH}=\overrightarrow{OH}-\overrightarrow{OG}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}}{|\overrightarrow{GF}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{GF}_{2}}{|\overrightarrow{GF_{2}}|},\thereforeGH是\angleF_{1}GF_{2}的角平分线,由双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1得a=1,b=\sqrt{2},\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{3},即F_{1}(-\sqrt{3},0),F_{2}(\sqrt{3},0)又P(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},0)'\therefore_{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}'|PF_{2}|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\frac{|GF_{1}|}{|GF_{2}|}=\frac{|PF_{1}|}{|PF_{2}|}=\frac{\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}}{\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}}=2,又由双曲线定义得|GF_{1}|-|GF_{2}|=2a=2,\therefore|GF_{2}|=2,|GF_{1}|=4,设G(x_{0},y_{0})(y_{0}>0),则\begin{cases}x_{0}^{2}-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{2}=1\\(x_{0}-\sqrt{3})^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=4\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}x_{0}=\sqrt{3}\\y_{0}=2\end{cases}.\thereforeG(\sqrt{3},2)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$3 x-2 y=0$，则以双曲线的顶点和焦点分别为焦点和顶点的椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Ellipse;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(3*x-2*y=0);Vertex(G)=Focus(H);Focus(G)=Vertex(H)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个顶点$A(a, 0)$ , $B(0, b)$，过$A$、$B$分别作$A B$的垂线交该椭圆于不同的$C$、$D$两点，若$2|B D|=3|A C|$，则椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;C: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (a, 0);Coordinate(B) = (0, b);In(A,Vertex(G));In(B,Vertex(G));L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(A,L1);PointOnCurve(B,L2);IsPerpendicular(L1,LineSegmentOf(A,B));IsPerpendicular(L2,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Intersection(L1, G) = C;Intersection(L2, G) = D;Negation(C=D);2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, D)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, C))
process: 过A作AB的垂线的方程为y=\frac{a}{b}(x-a),与\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1联立方程4过B作AB的垂线的方程为y=\frac{a}{b}x+b,与\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=因为2|BD|=3|AC|,所以2|x_{D}-0|=3|x_{C}-a\frac{4a3b^{2}}{a^{4}+b^{4}}=\frac{3a\times2b^{4}}{a^{4}+b^{4}}\therefore2a^{2}=3b^{2}=3a^{2}-3c^{2},a^{2}=3c^{2}\thereforee^{2}=\frac{1}{3},e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 若方程$x^{2}-3 m y^{2}=1$表示的曲线是焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Curve;Expression(H) = (x^2 - 3*m*y^2 = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis) ;H = G
process: 将方程化为\frac{x^{2}}{1}+\frac{y^{2}}{-\frac{1}{3m}}=1,依题意有\begin{cases}-\frac{1}{3m}>0,\\1>-\frac{1}{3m},\end{cases}解得m<-\frac{1}{3},即实数m的取值范围是{m|m<-\frac{1}{3}}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1)
process: 由题意知,a=2,所以实轴长为2a=4.

text: 若双曲线与椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=64$有相同的焦点，它的一条渐近线方程是$x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 64);Focus(G) = Focus(H);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (x+sqrt(3)*y=0)
process: \becausex^{2}+4y2=64\Leftrightarrow\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1\therefore该椭圆的焦点在x轴,且焦点坐标为:(\pm4\sqrt{3},0)\because双曲线的一条渐近线方程为x+\sqrt{3}y=0,\therefore设双曲线的方程为x^{2}-3y^{2}=\lambda,即\frac{x^{2}}{\lambda}-\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{\lambda}{3}}=1\because双曲线与x^{2}+4y^{2}=64有相同的焦点,\therefore\lambda+\frac{1}{3}\lambda=48,\thereforea=36,\therefore双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{36}-\frac{y^{2}}{12},=1

text: 若椭圆$W$:$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: W: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(W) = (x^2/2 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(W) = sqrt(6)/3
process: \textcircled{1}当椭圆的焦点在x轴上时,则有a=\sqrt{2},c=\sqrt{2-m}由题意得\frac{\sqrt{2-m}}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}解得m=\frac{2}{3}.\textcircled{2}当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,则有a=\sqrt{m},c=\sqrt{m-2},由题意得\frac{\sqrt{m-2}}{\sqrt{m}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}解得m=6.综上可得m=\frac{2}{3}或m=6.

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 36)

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y=\frac{x^{2}}{2}$相交于$A$、$B$两点，当$|A B|=4$时，则弦$A B$中点$M$到$x$轴距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(G)=(y=x^2/2);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=4;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M
process: 由题意,抛物线y=\frac{x^{2}}{2}的焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{2}),根据抛物线的定义如图,所求d=MM_{1}=\frac{AA_{1}+BB_{1}}{2}=\frac{AF+BF-1}{2}\geqslant\frac{AB-1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 中心在原点，一个焦点坐标为$(0 , 5)$，短轴长为$4$的椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0, 5);Length(MinorAxis(G)) = 4

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}-2 m-3}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(5 - m) + y^2/(m^2 - 2*m - 3) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)

text: 抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y$的焦点为$F$，点$P(x_{0}, \frac{p}{8})$是抛物线$C$上的一点满足$|P F|=\frac{5}{8}$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*p*y);p: Number;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x0, p/8);x0: Number;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F)) = 5/8
process: 当p>0时,PF=\frac{p}{8}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{5}{8},解得p=1,则抛物线C的方程为:x^{2}=2y.当p<0时,|PF|=-\frac{p}{2}-\frac{p}{8}=\frac{5}{8},解得p=-1,则抛物线C的方程为:x^{2}=-2y;

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，过双曲线的右焦点垂直于$x$轴的直线被双曲线截得的弦长为$m$，则$\frac{m}{a}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;m: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), H);IsPerpendicular(xAxis, H);Length(InterceptChord(H, G)) = m
process: 双曲线的焦距为2c,则\frac{c}{a}=2,即c=2a,则b=\sqrt{a}把x=c=2a代入双曲线可得y=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a},故m=\frac{2b^{2}}{a},所以,\frac{m}{a}=\frac{2b^{2}}{a^{2}}=6^{-}

text: 已知抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=3 x$, 过点$(3,0)$的直线$l$交抛物线$M$于$A$、$B$两点，则$\angle A O B$=?
fact_expressions: M: Parabola;Expression(M) = (y^2 = 3*x);l: Line;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(H, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, M) = {A, B};O: Origin
process: 依题意知直线l斜率不为0,则可设直线l的方程为x=ty+3,代入y^{2}=3x得y^{2}-3ty-9=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则y_{1}+y_{2}=3t,y_{1}y_{2}=-9.因为\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=x_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=(ty_{1}+3)(ty_{2}+3)+y_{1}y_{2}=(1+t^{2})y,y_{2}+3t(y_{1}+y_{2})+9=(1+t^{2})(-9)+3t\cdot3t+9=0,所以\overrightarrow{OA}\bot\overrightarrow{OB},即\angleAOB=90^{\circ}.故填90^{\circ}.

text: 若点$O$和点$F$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的中心和左焦点，点$P$为双曲线右支上的任意一点，则$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{F P}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Center(G)=O;LeftFocus(G)=F
process: 试题分析:由题:可设P(x,y),又F(-2,0),得:\overrightarrow{OP}=(x,y),\overrightarrow{FP}=(x+2,y)\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=x(x+2)+y^{2},又P在\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1上,得:\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=\frac{4x^{2}}{3}+2x-1=\frac{4}{3}(x+\frac{3}{4})^{2}-\frac{7}{4}x\geqslant\sqrt{3},当x=\sqrt{3}时,又最小值3+2\sqrt{3}则取值范围得:|3+2\sqrt{3},+\infty)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$没有公共点，则该双曲线的焦距的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Circle;m>0;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y + 2)^2 = 1);NumIntersection(Asymptote(G),H)=0

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点均在焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$上，若$|A F|+|B F|=4$，线段$A B$的中点到直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$的距离为$1$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x = p/2);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Focus(G)=F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)=1
process: 分别过A,B作准线l:x=-\frac{p}{2}的垂线,垂足分别为C,D,设AB的中点M在准线上的射影为点N,连接MN,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),M(x_{0},y_{0}),根据抛物线的定义,得|AF|+|BF|=|AC|+|BD|=4,所以梯形ACDB中,中位线MN=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BD)=2可得x_{0}=2-\frac{p}{2}因为线段AB的中点到直线x=\frac{p}{2}的距离为1,所以|x_{0}-\frac{p}{2}|=1,所以|2-p|=1,解得p=1或p=3

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，上顶点为$A$，点$P$为第一象限内椭圆上的一点，$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|=4|F_{1} F_{2}|$，$S_{\Delta P F_{1} A}=2 S_{\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}}$，则直线$P F_{1}$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, A))=2*Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线$l$: $x=-\frac{5}{4}$，点$M$在抛物线$C$上，点$A$在准线$l$上，若$M A \perp l$，直线$A F$的倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$，则$|M F|$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线交双曲线于$P$、$Q$两点，且$P Q \perp P F_{1} $,$|P Q|=\frac{5}{12}|P F_{1}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), LineSegmentOf(P, F1));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = (5/12)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))

text: 过抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=x$的焦点$F$任作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$ , $l_{2}$，分别与抛物线$E$交于$A$、$B$两点和$C$、$D$两点，则$|A B|+4|C D|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;F:Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = x);Focus(E)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l1);PointOnCurve(F,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,l2);Intersection(l1,E)={A,B};Intersection(l2,E)={C,D}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$中以$P(8,1)$为中点的弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (8, 1);IsChordOf(H, G);MidPoint(H) = P
process: 设以点P(8,1)为中点的弦所在的直线与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1交于A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由点P(8,1)是线段AB的中点,知\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}\\y_{1}+y_{2}\end{cases}x_{2}=16,把A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})代入双曲线x^{2}-4y^{2}=16,由点差法得到k=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=2,由此能求出以点P(8,1)为中点的弦所在的直线方程详解】设以点P(8,1)为中点的弦所在的直线与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1交于A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})\because点P(8,1)是线段AB的中点,\therefore\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=1\\y_{1}+y_{2}=2\end{cases}把A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})代入椭圆x^{2}-4y^{2}=16,得\begin{cases}x_{1}2-4y_{1}=16\textcircled{1}\\x_{2}-4y_{2}=16\textcircled{2}\end{cases}\textcircled{1}-\textcircled{2}得(x_{1}+x_{2})(x_{1}-x_{2})-4(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})=0\therefore16(x_{1}-x_{2})-8(y_{1}-y_{2})=0k=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=2'\therefore以点P(8,1)为中点的弦所在的直线方程为y-1=2(x-8)整理,得2x-y-15=0.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}={8} x$的焦点重合，且焦点到其渐近线的距离为$1$，则此双曲线的实轴长?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(G))=Focus(H);Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G))=1
process: 试题分析:由题意画出图形,再由抛物线方程求出焦点坐标,得到双曲线的焦点坐标,由焦点到双曲线一条渐近线的距离为1列式,再结合隐含条件求解.如图,由抛物线方程y^{2}=8x,得抛物线的焦点坐标F(2,0)即双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的右焦点坐标为F(2,0)双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x.不妨取y=\frac{b}{x},化为一般式:bx-ay=0.则\frac{|2b|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=1,即4b^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}又a^{2}=4\cdotb^{2},联立解得:a^{2}=3,\thereforea=\sqrt{3}.则双曲线的实轴长为2\sqrt{3}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，则$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)/2
process: 由题意,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},可得a^{2}=4b^{2},又C的渐近线方程y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x\thereforey=\pm\frac{1}{2}x.

text: 已知点$P(6 , y)$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$上，$F$为抛物线焦点，若$|PF|=8$，则点$F$到抛物线准线的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;P: Point;y0: Number;Coordinate(P) = (6, y0);PointOnCurve(P, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 8

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-k y^{2}=1$的一个焦点是$(\sqrt{5}, 0)$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (-k*y^2 + x^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(5), 0);OneOf(Focus(G))= H
process: 试题分析:将双曲线方程化为标准方程得^{x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{1}}=1,则1+\frac{1}{k}=5,解得k=\frac{1}{4}.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=x-3$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|+|B F|=|A B|$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(G) = (y = x - 3);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B))
process: 因为|AF|+|BF|=|AB|,所以A,B,F三点共线,又由抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为F(\frac{p}{2},0)将焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0)代入直线y=x-3上,即\frac{p}{2}-3=0,解得p=6

text: 若椭圆$b^{2} x^{2}+a^{2} y^{2}=a^{2} b^{2}(a>b>0)$和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=(\frac{b}{2}+c)^{2}$有四个交点，其中$c$为椭圆的半焦距，则椭圆的离心率$e$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;H: Circle;c: Number;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (a^2*y^2 + b^2*x^2 = a^2*b^2);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = (b/2 + c)^2);NumIntersection(G, H) = 4;HalfFocalLength(G)=c;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 由题意可知,椭圆的上、下顶点在圆内,左、右顶点在圆外则\begin{cases}a>\frac{b}{2}+c\\b<\frac{b}{2}+c\end{cases},整理得\begin{cases}(a-c)^{2}>\frac{1}{4}(a^{2}-c^{2})\\\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}<2c\end{cases},解得\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}<e<\frac{3}{5}

process: 本试题主要考查了椭圆的性质的运用,结合三点共线求解最值.由题意F_{2}(3,0),|MF_{2}|=5,由椭圆的定义可得,|PM|+|PF_{1}|=2a+|PM||PF_{2}|=10+|PM|-|PF_{2}|\leqslant10+|MF_{2}|=15,当且仅当P,F_{2},M三点共线时取等号,

text: 直线$l$: $y=k x+2$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$有公共点，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;k: Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l) = (y = k*x + 2);IsIntersect(l, C)
process: 将直线方程与椭圆方程联立,消去y,得到方程,方程有两\geqslant0,解不等式,即可求解。联立\begin{cases}\frac{x2}{2}+y^{2}=1,\\y=kx+2,\end{cases}整理得(2k^{2}+1)x^{2}+8kx+6=0因为直线l与椭圆C有公共点,所以A=(8k)^{2}-24(2k^{2}+1)\geqslant0,\sqrt{6}\sqrt{6}]\cup[\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}1本题考查直线与椭圆的位置关系,转化为方程解的个数,属于基础题

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;D:Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(G) = (2, 6);Expression(D)=(x^2/4-y^2/6=1);Asymptote(C)=Asymptote(D);PointOnCurve(G, C)
process: 根据给定条件求出a,b的关系,再由双曲线C过的点即可计算作答[详解]双曲线C:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的渐近线为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x,而双曲线D:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1的渐近线为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}x依题意,\frac{a}{b}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},又双曲线C经过点(2,6),则\frac{36}{a^{2}}-\frac{4}{b^{2}}=1,解得:a=\sqrt{30},b=2\sqrt{5}所以双曲线C的实轴长为2\sqrt{30}.

text: 过点$P(2,0)$作圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=1$的切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$. 若$A$、$B$恰好在双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线上，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: O: Circle;Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, 0);L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOfPoint(P, O) = {L1, L2};TangentPoint(L1, O) = A;TangentPoint(L2, O) = B;A: Point;B: Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Z1: Line;Z2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {Z1, Z2};PointOnCurve(A, Z1);PointOnCurve(B, Z2)
process: 如图所示,双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x过点P(2,0)作圆O:x^{2}+y^{2}=1的切线,其中A,B为切点由圆的切线的性质,可得OA\botAP.因为OA=1,OP=2,可得\angleAOP=60^{\circ},即渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x的倾斜角的正切值为\sqrt{3}所以\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},即b^{2}=3a^{2}.又由b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2},所以c^{2}=4a^{2},所以e=\frac{c}{a}=2,即双曲线C的离心率为2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(a>0)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有相同的焦点，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;a: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/3 = 1);a>0;Expression(H) = (y^2/4 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(H) = Focus(G)
process: 由题意得a^{2}-4=9+3,从而可求出a的值由题得a^{2}-4=9+3,解得a=4或a=-4(舍去)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1(a>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,左顶点为$A $,以$F_{2}$为圆心，$|F_{2} A|$为半径的圆交双曲线右支于$M$、$N$两点，且线段$A M$的垂直平分线过点$N$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Circle;A: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;N: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/7 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;LeftVertex(G) = A;Center(H) = F2;Radius(H) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F2, A));Intersection(H, RightPart(G)) = {M, N};PointOnCurve(N, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, M)))
process: 由已知可得|AN|=|MN|,结合双曲线的对称性,有4AMN为等边三角形,且外接圆的半径为a+c,求出点M坐标,由双曲线定义可得|MF_{1}|=3a+c,再用两点间距离公式求出|MF_{1}|,进而得出a,c关系,由b=\sqrt{7},即可求解线段AM的垂直平分线过点N,|AN|=|MN|,以F_{2}为圆心,|F_{2}A|为半径的圆交双曲线右支于M、N两点则圆的半径为a+c,且|AM|=|AN|,所以AAMN为等边三角形,F_{2}为AAMN外心所以M的坐标为(\frac{a+3c}{2},\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}(a+c)}{2})|MF_{2}|=a+c,\therefore|MF_{1}|=3a+c,F_{1}(-c,0),\therefore\begin{matrix}2\\MF_{1}\end{matrix}=(3a+c)^{2}=(\frac{a+3c}{2}+c)^{2}+[\frac{\sqrt{3}(a+c)}{2}],整理得4a^{2}-ac-3c^{2}=0,(4a-3c)(a+c)=0,c=\frac{4}{3}a,b^{2}=\frac{16}{9}a^{2}-a^{2}=7,\thereforea=3.

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)
process: 】由椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1,可得椭圆的右焦点坐标为(2,0),由抛物线方程为y^{2}=2px可得其焦点为(\frac{p}{2},0),由题意有\frac{p}{2}=2,再求解即可.由椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1,则c=\sqrt{5-1}=2,则椭圆的右焦点坐标为(2,0)又抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点坐标为:(\frac{p}{2},0)又抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1的右焦点重合则\frac{p}{2}=2,解得p=4

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a > b;b > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(H) = sqrt(3)/2

text: 短轴长为$\sqrt{5}$，离心率$e=\frac{2}{3}$的椭圆的两焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点,则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Length(MinorAxis(G))=sqrt(5);Eccentricity(G)=e;e:Number;e=2/3;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 设椭圆的长轴长为2a,短轴长为2b,焦距为2c,因为短轴长为\sqrt{5},离心率e=\frac{2}{3},所以\begin{cases}\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{3}\\2b=\sqrt{5}\\a^{2}=b^{2}+c2\end{cases}所以a^{2}=\frac{9}{4},所以a=\frac{3}{2}.又因为\triangleABF_{2}的周长为|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|由椭圆定义可知\triangleABF_{2}的周长为4a=6,

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点$F$的直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，其中$A$点坐标为$(4,4)$，则线段$A B$的中点到准线的距离等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (4, 4);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 由y^{2}=4x知2p=4,p=2.所以焦点F(1,0),又A(4,4),则直线AB的斜率为k=\frac{4}{3}所以直线AB的方程为y=\frac{4}{3}(x-1)联立直线和抛物线方程\begin{cases}y=\frac{4}{3}(x-1)\\\end{cases}可得4x^{2}-17x+4=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{17}{4},所以线段AB中点到准线的距离是\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{25}{8}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上横坐标为$1$的点到焦点的距离为$\frac{5}{2}$，则$p$=?

process: 根据抛物线的定义即可求解.由抛物线定义可得,1-(-\frac{p}{2})=\frac{5}{2}解得p=3,故答家为:3

text: 与椭圆$9 x^{2}+4 y^{2}=36$有相同焦点，且短轴长为$4 \sqrt{5}$的椭圆方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 36);H:Ellipse;Focus(G)=Focus(H);Length(MinorAxis(H))=4*sqrt(5)
process: 椭圆9x^{2}+4y^{2}=36,\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1\thereforec=\sqrt{5},\because椭圆的焦点与椭圆9x^{2}+4y^{2}=36有相同焦点\therefore椭圆的半焦距c=\sqrt{5},即a^{2}-b^{2}=5\because短轴长为4\sqrt{5}\thereforeb=2\sqrt{5},a=5\therefore椭圆的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{20}=1

process: 先由已知条件知道双曲线的两个焦点为两个圆的圆心,再利用平面几何知识把|PM|-|PN|转化为双曲线上的点到两焦点之间的距离即可求|PM|-|PN|的最大值.如图,双曲线的两个焦点为:F_{1}(-4,0),F_{2}(4,0)为两个圆的圆心,半径分别为r_{1}=2,r_{2}=1|PM|_{\max}=|PF_{1}|+2,|PN|_{\min}=|PF_{2}|-1故|PM|-|PN|的最大值为:(|PF_{1}|+2-|PF_{2}|+1)=|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|+3=5

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F_{1}(-3 \sqrt{2}, 0)$，且离心率为$3$，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?

text: 中心在原点，焦点在坐标轴上，长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，且过点 $P(4,0)$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;Center(G) = O;G: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), axis);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G));P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 分析:讨论椭圆的焦点在x轴上或在y轴上,利用椭圆长轴长是短轴长的2倍,过点P(4,0),分别求出a,b的值,即可得到椭圆的标准方程.详若椭圆的焦点在x轴上,则a=4,因为长轴长是短轴长的2倍.所以,a=4=2b\Rightarrowb=2,椭圆方程为\frac{x}{16}^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1;若椭圆的焦点在y轴上,则b=4,因为长轴长是短轴长的2倍.所以,a=2b=8,椭圆方程为\frac{y^{2}}{64}+\frac{x}{16}^{2}=1,

text: 已知圆$C$:$(x+3)^{2}+y^{2}=4$，动圆$M$过点$A(3,0)$，且圆与圆$M$外切，则动圆$M$的圆心$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x + 3)^2 = 4);A: Point;M: Circle;Coordinate(A) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(A, M);IsOutTangent(C, M);M1: Point;Center(M) = M1
process: 设圆M的圆心为M(x,y),由题意可得圆C的圆心为C(-3,0),半径r=2,因为动圆M过点A(3,0),且圆与圆M外切,则|MC|-|MA|=r=2<6,即点M的轨迹为双曲线的右支由双曲线的性质可知该双曲线的实轴长2a=2,焦距2c=6,则a^{2}=1,b^{2}=8故该双曲线的方程是x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1,即动圆M的圆心M的轨迹方程是x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1(x\geqslant1)

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=4 x$，焦点为$F$，过点$P(-1,0)$作斜率为$k (k>0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，连接$A F$，$B F$（$A F>B F$)，若$|A F|=2|B F|$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, l);Slope(l) = k;k:Number;k>0;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};LineSegmentOf(A, F)>LineSegmentOf(B, F);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F(1,0),直线AB的方程为y-0=k(x+1),k>0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})代入抛物线y^{2}=4x化简可得k^{2}x^{2}+(2k^{2}-4)x+k^{2}=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{4}{k^{2}}-2,\textcircled{1}x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=1,\textcircled{2}由抛物线的焦半径公式可知:|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+1,|BF|=x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{2}+1由|AF|=2|BF|,则x_{2}-2x_{1}=1,\textcircled{3}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}解得:x_{1}=\frac{4}{3k^{2}}-1,x_{2}=\frac{8}{3k^{2}}x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=(\frac{4}{3k^{2}}-1)\times(\frac{8}{3k^{2}}).1,整理得:k^{2}=\frac{8}{9},解得:k=\pm\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}由k>0,则k=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}\sqrt{2}

text: 已知点$Q(2 \sqrt{2} , 0)$及抛物线$y=\frac{x^{2}}{4}$上一动点$P(x_{0} , y_{0})$，则$y_{0}+| P Q|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (2*sqrt(2), 0);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);x0: Number;y0: Number;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{k+4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率为$2$，则$k$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 4) + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}$，则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(6)/2
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)的离心率为\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},则{\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}\begin{matrix}_{c^{2}-a^{2}}=1&所以a=\sqrt{2},b=1,则渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，抛物线$C$上的点$A$、$B$满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=4 \overrightarrow{F B}$，若$A$、$B$在准线上的射影分别为$M$、$N$，且$\Delta M F N$的面积为$5$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;Focus(C) = F;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;PointOnCurve(B, C) = True;VectorOf(A, F) = 4*VectorOf(F, B);Projection(A, Directrix(C)) = M;Projection(B, Directrix(C)) = N;M: Point;N: Point;Area(TriangleOf(M, F, N)) = 5

text: 已知双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{3}{4} x$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/4)*x)
process: 此题考查双曲线的离心率因为双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{4}x,所以a=4,b=3或a=3,b=4,故c=5.所以离心率e=\frac{5}{3}或\frac{5}{4}.答案:\frac{5}{3}或\frac{5}{4}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，过其焦点的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=6$ , $A B$的中点的横坐标为$2$，则此抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6;XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 2
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),因为AB过抛物线的焦点\thereforeAB=AF+BF=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}+x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2\times2+p=6解得p=2,所以抛物线的方程为y^{2}=4x.

text: 椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}(-c, 0)$ , $F_{2}(c, 0)$，点$P$是椭圆$C$上点，$P F_{1} \perp x$轴，且$\angle P F_{2} F_{1}=45^{\circ}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);c: Number;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), xAxis) ;AngleOf(P, F2, F1) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知某椭圆过点$(\sqrt{2}, 1)$ ,$(\sqrt{3}, \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;I: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(2), 1);Coordinate(I) = (sqrt(3), sqrt(2)/2);PointOnCurve(H, G);PointOnCurve(I, G)
process: 设椭圆方程为mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1(m>0,n>0且m\neqn)\therefore\begin{cases}2m+n=1\\3m+\frac{1}{2}n=1\end{cases},解得:\begin{cases}m=\frac{1}{4}\\n=\frac{1}{2}\end{cases},\therefore椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线右支上一点，且$P F_{2}$的中点$M$在以$O$为圆心，$O F_{1}$为半径的圆上，则$|P F_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/20 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G)) = True;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = M;M: Point;O: Origin;Center(H) = O;Radius(H) = LineSegmentOf(O, F1);H: Circle;PointOnCurve(M, H) = True
process: 由题意画出图形,利用已知结合三角形中位线定理及双曲线的定义求解.如图,由双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1,得a^{2}=16,b^{2}=20,则c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=6.则|OM|=|OF_{1}|=6,|PF_{1}|=2|OM|=12,\therefore|PF_{2}|=|PF_{1}|-8=4,

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$到准线的距离为$2$，过焦点$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|=3|F B|$，则线段$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;Distance(F,Directrix(G)) = 2;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))
process: 焦点F到准线的距离为p=2,过点A作AD垂直于准线l于点D,过点B作BE垂直于l于点E,延长AB交l于点C,则ABCEAACD,所以\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{BE}{AD}=\frac{BF}{AF}=\frac{1}{3},记BC=x,则AC=3x,因为|AF|=3|FB|,所以BF=\frac{1}{4}AB=\frac{1}{2}x,AF=3BF=\frac{3}{2}x,因为CF=BC+BF=\frac{3}{2}x,F为AC的中点,所以AD=2FG=4,所以AF=\frac{3}{2}x=4,即x=\frac{8}{3},|BE|=\frac{4}{3}即线段AB的中点到y轴的距离为\frac{|AD|-1+|BE|-1}{2}=\frac{5}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率为$2$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2
process: 试题分析:由题意得,a^{2}=1,b^{2}=m,c=\sqrt{1+m},根据双曲线离心率\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{1+m}}{1}=2'得m=3

text: 已知点$A(0,4)$，抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y  (0<p<4)$的准线为$l$，点$P$在$C$上，作$P H \perp l$于点$H$ ,$|P H|=|P A|$ , $\angle A P H=120^{\circ}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;P: Point;H: Point;0 < p;p < 4;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Coordinate(A) = (0, 4);Directrix(C) = l ;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, H),l);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A));AngleOf(A, P, H) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);l:Line;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, H),l)=H
process: 设抛物线的焦点为F(0,\frac{p}{2}),|AF|=4-\frac{p}{2},由抛物线的定义可知,|PH|=|PF|,因为|PH|=|PA|,所以|PA|=|PF|不妨设点P在第一象限,过点P作PQ\boty轴于点Q,则Q为AF的中点,|AQ|=|FQ|=\frac{1}{2}|AF|=\frac{1}{2}(4-\frac{p}{2}),因为\angleAPH=120^{\circ},所以\angleAPQ=120^{\circ}-90^{\circ}=30^{\circ}所以|_{PQ|}=\sqrt{3}|AQ|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}(4-\frac{p}{2})^{,}|OQ|=|FQ|+|OF|=\frac{1}{2}(4-\frac{p}{2})+\frac{p}{2}=2+\frac{p}{4}所以点P的坐标为(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}(4-\frac{p}{2}),2+\frac{p}{4},因为点P在抛物线C上,所以[\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}(4-\frac{p}{2})]^{2}=2p\times(2+\frac{p}{4})化简得5p^{2}+112p-192=0,解得p=\frac{8}{5}或-24(舍去),所以p=\frac{8}{5}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (3*x^2 - y^2 = 3)

text: 斜率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$的直线$l$经过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$，与双曲线的左、右两支分别交于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$F_{1} B$的垂直平分线经过右焦点$F_{2}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2:Point;B: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Slope(l)=sqrt(5)/2;LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1,l);Intersection(l,LeftPart(G))=A;Intersection(l,RightPart(G))=B;PointOnCurve(F2,PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(F1,B)))
process: 根据垂直平分线的性质得到|BF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,再由双曲线的定义可得:|BF_{1}|=2c+2a,设直线l的倾斜角为\theta,则_{\tan\theta}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}可得\cos\theta的值,在\triangleF_{1}BF_{2}中,由余弦定理可得a,c之间的关系,进而可得离心率.羊解)设双曲线的焦距为2c.因为线段F_{1}B的垂直平分线经过右焦点F_{2},所以|BF2.=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c.由双曲线的定义可得:|BF_{1}|=|BF_{2}|+2a=2c+2a设直线l的倾斜角为\theta,则_{ta}\tan\theta=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},所以\theta为锐角,所以由\begin{cases}\sin\theta=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}\\\cos\theta^{2}\theta+\cos2\theta=1\end{cases}可得:\begin{cases}\sin\theta=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}\\\cos\theta=\frac{2}{3}\end{cases}在\triangleF_{1}BF_{2}中,由余弦定理可得:\cos\theta=\cos\angleBF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{BF_{1}2+F_{1}F_{2}2-BF_{2}2}{2BF_{1}\cdotF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{4(a+c)^{2}+4c^{2}-4c^{2}}{2\cdot2(a+c)\cdot2c}=\frac{a+c}{2c}=\frac{2}{3}解得:c=3a,所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=3,

text: 已知一个双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{m-3}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+2}=1$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m - 3) - y^2/(m + 2) = 1);m: Number
process: 由双曲线方程所满足的条件可得(m-3)与(m+2)同号可得m的范围由双曲线的方程可得(m-3)(m+2)>0,解得m>3或m<-2.

text: 直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为椭圆的右焦点，若$A F \perp B F$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = (sqrt(3)/3)*x);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 由题意转化条件为点A(\frac{\sqrt{3}c}{2},\frac{c}{2}),代入椭圆方程可得\frac{3c^{2}}{4a^{2}}+\frac{c^{2}}{4b^{2}}=1,化简后即可得解设点F(c,0),椭圆如图所示:\because直线_{AB}:y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x'\therefore_{\tan}\angleAOF=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}即\angleAOF=30^{\circ}又AF\botBF,O为AB中点,\thereforeOA=OF=c,\therefore点A(c\cos\angleAOF,c\sin\angleAOF)即A(\frac{\sqrt{3}c}{2},\frac{c}{2})\because点A(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},\frac{c}{2})在椭圆上,\therefore\frac{3c^{2}}{4a^{2}}+\frac{c^{2}}{4b^{2}}=1,结合b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}化简可得3c^{4}-8a^{2}c^{2}+4a^{4}=0由e=\frac{c}{a}可得3e^{4}-8e^{2}+4=0,解得e^{2}=\frac{2}{2}或e^{2}=2(舍去)\thereforee=\sqrt{\frac{2}{3}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}

text: 已知过点$P(2,0)$的直线交抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$于$A$、$B$两点，直线$O A$ , $O B$($O$为坐标原点) 分别交直线$x=-2$于点$M$、$N$，则以$M N$为直径的圆截$x$轴所得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, 0);H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H) = True;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;H1: Line;Expression(H1) = (x=-2);Intersection(LineOf(O,A),H1) = M;Intersection(LineOf(O,B),H1) = N;M: Point;N: Point;G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(M,N),G) = True

text: 过点$M(1,1)$作动直线交抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(M, H);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 若线段$AB$长为$4$，其端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$轴、$y$轴上移动，则$AB$的中点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;M:Point;Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))={A,B};PointOnCurve(A, xAxis);PointOnCurve(B, yAxis);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M
process: 设AB的中点P的坐标为(x,y),A(m,0),B(0,n),\therefore\begin{cases}x=\frac{m}{2}\\y=\frac{n}{2}\end{cases},\therefore\begin{cases}m=2x\\n=2y\end{cases},\because线段AB的长为4,\therefore\sqrt{m^{2}+n^{2}}=4,\thereforem^{2}+n^{2}=16,\therefore4x^{2}+4y^{2}=16,\thereforex^{2}+y^{2}=4,AB的中点M的轨迹方程是x^{2}+y^{2}=4,

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上的动点，若动点$Q$满足$\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}=\lambda \overrightarrow{P Q}(\lambda \in R, \lambda>0)$且$|\overrightarrow{P Q}|=|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则点$Q$到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$一条渐近线距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/9 + y^2/8 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(H) = F1;RightFocus(H) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, H);Q: Point;lambda: Real;VectorOf(F1, P) = lambda*VectorOf(P, Q);Abs(VectorOf(P, Q)) = Abs(VectorOf(P, F2));G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1);lambda>0
process: 椭圆的a=3,b=2\sqrt{2},则c=1,F(-1,0),若动点Q满足\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}=\lambda\overrightarrow{PQ}(\lambda\inR,\lambda>0)且|\overrightarrow{PQ}|=|\overrightarrow{PF}_{2}|则F_{1},P,Q三点共线,且同向,由|QF|=|PQ|+|PF|=|PF_{2}|+|PF_{1}|=2a=6,所以Q的轨迹为以F_{1}为圆心,6为半径的圆双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的一条渐近线方程设为\sqrt{3}x-2y=0由圆心到渐近线的距离为\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{3+4}}=\frac{\sqrt{21}}{7}所以点Q到双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1-条渐近线距离的最大值为\frac{\sqrt{21}}{7}+6

text: 已知过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$右焦点且倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线右支有两个交点，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), H) = True;Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);NumIntersection(H, RightPart(G)) = 2

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的点，$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$分别是椭圆的左、右焦点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$, 则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 经过点$M(2,1)$作直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，且$M$为$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(M, l) ;l: Line;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 + y^2/4 = 1);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一条渐近线经过点$(3,-4)$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (3, -4);PointOnCurve(H, OneOf(Asymptote(G)))
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,由渐近线过点(3,-4),可得-4=-\frac{3b}{a},即b=\frac{4}{3}a,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2}+\frac{16}{9}a^{2}}=\frac{5}{3}a,可得e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{3},

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$经过点$M(1,2)$，直线$l$与抛物线交于相异两点$A$、$B$，若$\Delta M A B$的内切圆圆心为$(1, t)$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 2);PointOnCurve(M, G);l: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Negation(A=B);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};t: Number;Coordinate(Center(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(M, A, B)))) = (1, t)
process: 将点M(1,2)代入y2=2px,可得p=2,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x.由题意知,直线l斜率存在且不为0,设直线l的方程为x=my+n(m\neq0).代入y^{2}=4x,得y^{2}-4my-4n=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2})则y_{1}+y_{2}=4m,y_{1}y_{2}=-4n又由AMAB的内切圆心为(1,t),可得k_{MA}+k_{MB}=\frac{y_{1}-2}{x_{1}-1}整理得y_{1}+y_{2}+4=4m+4=0解得m=-1,从而/的方程为y=-x+n所以直线/的斜率为-1.青】本题考查直线与抛物线的位置关系,设而不求的方法表示交点间的关系,属于中档题

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，在$C$上有一点$P$ ,$|P F|=8$，则$P F$的中点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 8;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M
process: 设P(x_{0},y_{0}),p=2,所以|PF|=x_{0}+1=8,解得x_{0}=7,所以PF的中点M横坐标为\frac{1+7}{2}=4,即PF的中点M到y轴的距离为4.

text: 已知双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，直线$l$: $x=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}$与双曲线$\Gamma$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$是坐标原点，若$(\overrightarrow{A O}+\overrightarrow{A B}) \cdot \overrightarrow{B O}=0$，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Hyperbola;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;Expression(Gamma) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a:Number;b:Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(l)=(x = sqrt(a^2 + b^2));Intersection(l, Gamma) = {A, B};DotProduct((VectorOf(A, B) + VectorOf(A, O)),VectorOf(B, O)) = 0
process: 试题分析:因为a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},所以直线l:x=c(c>0),则A(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),B(c,-\frac{b^{2}}{a})=(-c,-\frac{b^{2}}{a}),\overrightarrow{AB}=(0,-\frac{2b^{2}}{a}),\overrightarrow{BO}=(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),由平面向量数量积得:c^{2}-\frac{3b^{4}}{a^{2}}=0,解得:e=\frac{\sqrt{3}+\sqrt{39}}{6}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，若直线$2 x-y=0$为$C$的一条渐近线，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;Expression(G) = (2*x - y = 0);OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = G
process: 由题意知双曲线的渐近线为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x又双曲线的一条渐近线为2x-y=0,得y=2x\frac{a}{b}=2,所以e=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

fact_expressions: P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;x1:Number;y1: Number;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F1) = (0,-3);Coordinate(F2) = (0, 3);Distance(P,F1)+Distance(P,F2)=10

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ ,过$F$倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$A M \perp l$, $B N \perp l$ , $M$, $N$为垂足，点$Q$为$M N$的中点，$|Q F|=2$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;F: Point;l: Line;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Q: Point;p > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, M), l);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(B, N), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, M), l) = M;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(B, N), l) = N;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = 2
process: 如图,由抛物线的几何性质可得,以AB为直径的圆与准线l相切,且切点为Q\triangleMFN是以\angleMFN为直角的直角三角形则MN|=2|QF|=4,即BD|=4,\therefore|AB|=\frac{|BD|}{\sin60^{\circ}}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{8\sqrt{3}}{3}设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=2px\\y-0=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2})\end{cases},得12x^{2}-20px+3p=0.则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{20}{12}p=\frac{5}{3}p则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{20}{12}p=\frac{2}{3}p,\therefore|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=\frac{5}{2}p+p=\frac{8}{3}p\therefore\frac{8}{3}p=\frac{8\sqrt{3}}{3},则p=\sqrt{3}.

text: 设椭圆与双曲线有公共焦点，它们的离心率之和为$2$，若椭圆方程为$25 x^{2}+9 y^{2}=225$，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Focus(H) = Focus(G);Eccentricity(G)+Eccentricity(H)=2;Expression(H) = (25*x^2 + 9*y^2 = 225)

text: 已知点$M(2,1)$是抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y$上的点，则以点$M$为切点的抛物线的切线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Coordinate(M) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);l:Line;IsTangent(l,G);TangentPoint(l,G)=M

text: 共焦点的椭圆与双曲线的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$，若椭圆的短轴长是双曲线虚轴长的$3$倍，则$\frac{1}{e_{1}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;G: Hyperbola;Focus(H) = Focus(G);e1: Number;Eccentricity(H) = e1;e2: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e2;Length(MinorAxis(H)) = Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))*3
process: 分析:设椭圆的短半轴长和双曲线虚半轴长分别为b_{1}、b_{2},椭圆的长半轴长和双曲线实半轴长分别为a_{1},a_{2},根据条件得a_{1}^{2}+9a_{2}^{2}=10c^{2},令a_{1}=\sqrt{10}c\sin\theta,a_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}c\cos\theta'利用三角函数求最值即可.详设椭圆的短半轴长和双曲线虚半轴长分别为b_{1}、b_{2},椭圆的长半轴长和双曲线实半轴长分别为a_{1},a_{2},则b_{1}=3b_{2}\Rightarrowa_{1}^{2}+9a_{2}^{2}=10c^{2},令a_{1}=\sqrt{10}c\sin\theta,a_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}c\cos\theta'\frac{1}{e_{1}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}(3\sin\theta+\cos\theta)=\frac{10}{3}\sin(\theta+\varphi)\leqslant\frac{10}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点.若在$C$上存在一点$P$，使$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，且$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)
process: 】由已知可得三角形是等腰直角三角形,则根据椭圆定义可得三角形三边长度,利用勾股定理即可求解由已知可得三角形PF_{1}F_{2}是等腰直角三角形,且\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|由椭圆的定义可得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,\therefore|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=a,又|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,\therefore在\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,由勾股定理可得:2|PF_{1}^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}^{2},即2a^{2}=4c^{2},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},

text: 已知$M(0 ,-5)$ , $N(0 , 5)$，动点$P$满足$|PM|-|PN|=6$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (0,-5);Coordinate(N) = (0, 5);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N)) = 6

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的离心率$e \in(1,2)$，则$k$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/k = 1);k: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e, (1, 2))

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，过焦点$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$、$B$分别作$x$轴、$y$轴的垂线，垂足分别为$C$、$D$，则$|A C|+|B D|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H:Line;A: Point;C: Point;B: Point;D: Point;F:Point;l1:Line;l2:Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H,G)={A,B};PointOnCurve(A,l1);PointOnCurve(B,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,xAxis);IsPerpendicular(l2,yAxis);FootPoint(l1,xAxis)=C;FootPoint(l2,yAxis)=D

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的焦距是$10$，曲线上的点$P$到一个焦点的距离是$2$，则点$P$到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/16 + x^2/a = 1);FocalLength(G) = 10;PointOnCurve(P, G);OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 2
process: 由题意,曲线的半焦距为5,若曲线是焦点在x轴上的椭圆,则a>16,所以a-16=25\Rightarrowa=41,而椭圆上的点P到一个焦点距离是2,则点P到另一个焦点的距离为2\sqrt{41}-2;若曲线是焦点在y轴上的椭圆,则0<a<16,所以16-a=25\Rightarrowa=-9,舍去;若曲线是双曲线,则a<0,容易判断双曲线的焦点在y轴,所以16+(-a)=25\Rightarrowa=-9,不妨设点P在双曲线的上半支,上下焦点分别为F_{2}(0,5),F_{1}(0,-5),因为实半轴长为4,容易判断点P到下焦点的距离的最小值为4+5=9>2,不合题意,所以点P到上焦点的距离为2,则它到下焦点的距离PF_{1}=|PF_{2}|+8=10.

text: 椭圆$C$的左焦点为$F_{1}(-6 , 0)$，且经过点$P(5 , 2)$，则椭圆$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-6, 0);Coordinate(P) = (5, 2);LeftFocus(C) = F1;PointOnCurve(P,C)
process: 根据题意可得椭圆的焦点在x轴上且焦点为F_{1}(-6,0),F_{2}(6,0)由椭圆的定义为|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,从而可得答案.椭圆C的左焦点为F_{1}(-6,0),则椭圆的焦点在x轴上且右焦点为F_{2}(6,0)由椭圆的定义可得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=\sqrt{(5+6)^{2}+2^{2}}+\sqrt{(5-6)^{2}+2^{2}}=6\sqrt{5}=2a所以a=3\sqrt{5},c=6,则b^{2}=45-36=9所以椭圆C的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{45}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{10-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1$的长轴在$y$轴上，若焦距为$4$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(10 - m) + y^2/(m - 2) = 1);OverlappingLine(MajorAxis(G),yAxis);FocalLength(G)=4
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{10-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1的长轴在y轴上,焦距为4,所以m-2-(10-m)=(\frac{4}{2})^{2}\thereforem=8

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且双曲线$C$上的点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$ ,$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|=3$ ,$|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=4  $，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 3;Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) = 4
process: 由双曲线的定义可得2a=|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|-|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=1,所以a=\frac{1}{2},因为\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,所以\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\bot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}所以(2c)^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}=25,解得c=\frac{5}{2},所以双曲线C的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=5.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的坐标为?点$F$到双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(H) = F
C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)) = 6
process: 由题意,求得双曲线的方程C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1,得其中一条渐近线方程\sqrt{5}x-2y=0,再利用点到直线的距离公式,即可求解.解】由题意知,双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的左右焦点为F_{1},F_{2}因为|F_{1}F_{2}|=6,即2c=6,解得c=3,所以4+b^{2}=3^{2},解得b^{2}=5,即b=\sqrt{5}所以双曲线的方程C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1,则其中一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}x'即\sqrt{5}x-2y=0所以焦点F_{1}(-3,0)到直线\sqrt{3}x-2y=0的距离为d=\frac{|\sqrt{5}\times(-3)-2\times0|}{\sqrt{(\sqrt{5})^{2}+(-2)^{2}}}=\sqrt{5}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线与抛物线的两个交点为$A$、$B$，若$A B$中点横坐标为$2$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 6*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 2
process: 由题意知,p=3,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由线段AB中点横坐标为2,知x_{1}+x_{2}=4由抛物线的定义知|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=4+3=

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm x$，且过点$(1, \sqrt{2})$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*x);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(H,G) = True
process: 设以y=\pmx为渐近线的方程为x^{2}-y^{2}=\lambda,又因为该双曲线过点(1,\sqrt{2}),所以\lambda=1-2=-1,即双曲线的标准方程为y^{2}-x^{2}=1.

process: 由题意可知,2p=2,解得p=1,因为抛物线x^{2}=2y开口向上,所以抛物线x^{2}=2y的焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{2})

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=2$的右焦点重合，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;p: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 2);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{n-6}-\frac{x^{2}}{n}=1$的离心率是$\sqrt{3}$，则$n$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;n: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2/(n - 6) - x^2/n = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)
process: 当焦点在y轴上时,\begin{cases}n-6>0\\n>0\\\frac{n-6+n}{n-6}=3\end{cases},解得n=12.当焦点在x轴上时,双曲线标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{n}-\frac{y^{2}}{6-n}=1^{,}\begin{cases}6-n>0\\-n>0\\\frac{-n+6-n}{a}=3\end{cases}解得n=-6,综合得n=12,或n=-6,

text: 已知$P$、$Q$为抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$上两点，点$P$、$Q$的横坐标为$4$ ,$-2$ ,过$P$、$Q$分别作抛物线的切线，两切线交于点$A$，则点$A$的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Q: Point;A: Point;L1:Line;L2:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y);PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(Q,G);XCoordinate(P)=4;XCoordinate(Q)=-2;TangentOfPoint(P,G)=L1;TangentOfPoint(Q,G)=L2;Intersection(L1,L2)=A
C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);Focus(C)={F1,F2};x0:Number;y0:Number;0<x0^2/2+y0^2;x0^2/2+y0^2<1
process: 试题分析:从已知条件看,本题先确定点P与椭圆的位置关系,P(x_{0},y_{0})与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的位置关系是:\frac{x_{0}2}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\LeftrightarrowP在椭圆内,\frac{x_{0}2}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}>1\LeftrightarrowP在椭圆上,\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}>1\LeftrightarrowP在椭圆外.因此本题中,P在椭圆内,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|<2a=2\sqrt{2},又|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|\geqslant|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c=2,所以所求取值范围是[2,2\sqrt{2})
