text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若点$A$在第一象限，且$|A F|=3|F B|$，则直线$A B$的倾斜角为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A)=1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))
process: 因为|AF|=3|FB|,所以直线AB存在斜率,设为k(k\neq0),抛物线C:y^{2}=4x焦点F的坐标为(1,0),所以直线AB的方程为:y=k(x-1),与抛物线联立为\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\y=k(x-1)\end{cases}\Rightarrowky2-4y-4k=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),x_{1}>0,y_{1}>0,x_{2}>0,y_{2}<0,所以有y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{k},y_{1}y_{2}=-4.因为点A在第一象限,且|AF|=3|FB|,所以\overrightarrow{AF}=3\overrightarrow{FB}\Rightarrow(1-x_{1},-y_{1})=3(x_{2}-1,y_{2})\Rightarrowy_{1}=-3y_{2},因此有-3y_{2}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{k},-3y_{2}\cdoty_{2}_{2}=-4\Rightarrow-2y_{2}=\frac{4}{k}>0,-3y_{2}2=-4\Rightarrowk>0,k^{2}=3\Rightarrowk=\sqrt{3}设直线AB的倾斜角为\alpha,所以\tan\alpha=\sqrt{3},解得:\alpha=\frac{\pi}{3}

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，焦距为$2 c$，若直线$y=\sqrt{3}(x+c)$与椭圆$C$的一个交点$M$满足$\angle M F_{1} F_{2}=2 \angle M F_{2} F_{1}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

text: 焦点为$F$的抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$的准线与坐标轴交于点$A$，点$P$在抛物线$C$上，则$\frac{|P A|}{|P F|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*y);Intersection(Directrix(C), axis) = A;PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C)=F
process: 根据题意,过P做PM与准线垂直,垂足为M,设\anglePAM=\theta则\frac{|PA|}{|PF|}=\frac{|PA|}{|MP|}=\frac{1}{\sin\theta}若\frac{|PA|}{|PF|}取得最大值,必有\sin\theta取得最小值,则\theta取得最小值,此时AP与抛物线相切,设直线AP的方程为y=kx-1联立\begin{cases}x^{2}=4y\\y=kx-\end{cases}消去y得:x2-4kx+4=0由A=16k^{2}-16=0,解得:k=1或k=-1取k=\tan\theta=1来计算,0\leqslant\theta<\pi知,\theta=\frac{\pi}{4}所以\frac{|PA|}{|PF|}的最大值为\frac{\frac{1}{2}}{\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}}=\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为左支上任意一点，直线$l$是双曲线的一条渐近线，点$P$在直线$l$上的射影为$Q$，且当$|P F_{2}|+|P Q|$取最小值$5$时，$S_{\Delta F_{1} Q F_{2}}$的最大值为?

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右顶点是$A(a, 0)$，其上存在一点$P$，使$\angle A P O=90^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (a, 0);RightVertex(G) = A;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;O: Origin;AngleOf(A, P, O) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 设P(x,y),由\angleAPO=90^{\circ},可知点P在以OA为直径的圆上,则圆心为(\frac{a}{2},0),半径为\frac{|OA|}{2}=\frac{a}{2},则圆的方程是(x-\frac{a}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=(\frac{a}{2})^{2}.所以y^{2}=ax-x^{2}\textcircled{1}又因为点P在椭圆上,故\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{k^{2}}=1\textcircled{2}把\textcircled{1}代入\textcircled{2}得\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{ax-x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,所以(a^{2}-b^{2})x^{2}-a^{3}x+a^{2}b^{2}=0故(x-a)\cdot[(a^{2}-b^{2})x-ab^{2}]=0.又x\neqa,x\neq0,所以x=\frac{ab^{2}}{a^{2}}\frac{aD}{-b^{2}}又0<x<a,所以0<\frac{ab^{2}-b^{2}}{a^{2}-b^{2}}<a,所以2b^{2}<a^{2},则a^{2}<2c^{2},所以_{e}>\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3},因为0<e<1,故所求的椭圆离心率的取值范围是(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},1)

text: 已知双曲线的右焦点为$(5 , 0)$，一条渐近线方程为$2 x-y=0$，则此双曲线的标准方程是?

process: 根据题意,双曲线的一条渐近线方程为2x-y=0,则可设双曲线的方程x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=\lambda,\lambda\neq0;又由双曲线的右焦点为(5,0),即焦点在x轴上且c=5,则\lambda>0;则双曲线的方程可变形为\frac{x^{2}}{1}-\frac{y^{2}}{4)}=1=1,又由c=5,则5\lambda=25,解可得\lambda=5;则此双曲线的标准方程是\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1

text: 若椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2 m+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 m}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$C$的短轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/(2*m + 1) + y^2/(2*m) = 1);Eccentricity(C) = 1/2
process: 判断出椭圆的焦点在x轴上,得出a,b,c的值,根据离心率的概念可得e=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2m+1}}=\frac{1}{2},解出m的值可得短轴长.由椭圆C:\frac{x2}{2m+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2m}=1得焦点在x轴上,a^{2}=2m+1,b^{2}=2m'c^{2}=1,且e=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2m+1}}=\frac{1}{2},解解得m=\frac{3}{2},所以b^{2}=2m=3,b=\sqrt{3},所以C的短轴长为2\sqrt{3}

text: 设过原点的直线与双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$交于$P$、$Q$两个不同点，$F$为$C$的一个焦点，若$\tan \angle P F Q=\frac{4}{3}$,$|Q F|=5|P F|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);G: Line;O:Origin;PointOnCurve(O,G);P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;a>0;b>0;Intersection(G, C) = {P, Q};OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;Tan(AngleOf(P, F, Q)) = 4/3;Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = 5*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Negation(P=Q)
process: 如图所示:连接PF_{1},QF_{1},根据对称性知PF_{1}QF为平行四边形,计算得到|PF_{1}|=\frac{5a}{2},|PF|=\frac{a}{2},利用余弦定理计算得到答案如图所示:连接PF_{1},QF_{1},根据对称性知PF_{1}QF为平行四边形\tan\anglePFQ=\frac{4}{3},则\cos\anglePFQ=\frac{3}{5},\cos\angleF_{1}PF=-\frac{3}{5},|QF|=|PF_{1}|=5|PF|,|PF_{1}|-|PF|=2a,故|PF_{1}|=\frac{5a}{2},|PF|=\frac{a}{2}根据余弦定理:4c^{2}=(\frac{5a}{2})^{2}+(\frac{a}{2})^{2}-2\cdot\frac{5a}{2}\cdot\frac{a}{2}\cdot(-\frac{3}{5}),化简得到c^{2}=2a2,故e=\sqrt{2}宗合应用能力和计算能力

text: 已知圆$O$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$经过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点$F_{2}$，且经过点$F_{2}$作圆$O$的切线被椭圆$C$截得的弦长为$\sqrt{2}$. 则椭圆$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;O: Circle;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F2;L:Line;TangentOnPoint(F2, O)=L;Length(InterceptChord(L,C))=sqrt(2)
process: 因为圆O:x^{2}+y^{2}=1经过椭圆C的右焦点F_{2},所以c=1,则a^{2}=b^{2}+1,且过点F_{2}作圆O的切线被椭圆C截得的弦长为\sqrt{2},所以(1,\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})在椭圆上,即\frac{1}{1+b^{2}}+\frac{1}{2b^{2}}=1,所以b^{2}=1,a^{2}=2,故椭圆C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$e$，若点$(e, 1)$与点$(-\sqrt{3}, \sqrt{2})$都在双曲线$C$上，则该双曲线的焦点到其一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Point;H: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(G) = (e, 1);Coordinate(H) = (-sqrt(3), sqrt(2));Eccentricity(C) = e;PointOnCurve(G, C);PointOnCurve(H, C)
process: \because点(e,1)与点(-\sqrt{3},\sqrt{2})都在双曲线C上,\therefore\begin{cases}\frac{e^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1\\\frac{3}{a^{2}}-\frac{2}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},消去e^{2}可得a^{2}=b^{2},\thereforea^{2}=b^{2}=1,\therefore双曲线的焦点为(\pm\sqrt{2},0),渐近线为y=\pmx取焦点(\sqrt{2},0)渐近线为y=x则焦点到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{1+1}}=1.

process: 将抛物线化成标准方程得y^{2}=\frac{1}{8}x,根据抛物线的基本概念即可算出该抛物线的焦点坐标.\because抛物线的方程为x=8y^{2},\therefore化成标准方程,得y^{2}=\frac{1}{8}x,由此可得抛物线的2p=\frac{1}{8},得\frac{p}{2}=\frac{1}{32}\therefore抛物线的焦点坐标为(\frac{1}{32},0)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若以坐标原点$O$为圆心，$b$为半径的圆与双曲线$C$交于点$P$(点$P$在第一象限)，且$O P \perp P F_{2}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};O: Origin;G: Circle;Center(G) = O;Radius(G) = b;P: Point;Intersection(G, C) = P;Quadrant(P) = 1;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 由已知得双曲线C的焦点在y轴上,如图所示以坐标原点O为圆心,b为半径的圆与双曲线C交于第一象限的点P,可知|OP|=b,又|OF_{2}|=c所以|PF_{2}|=a,由双曲线的定义可得|PF_{1}|=3a,在Rt\triangleOF_{2}P中,\cos\angleOF_{2}P=\frac{a}{c},在\triangleF_{1}F_{2}P中,由余弦定理可得\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}P=\frac{a^{2}+(2c)^{2}-(3a)^{2}}{2a\cdot2c}=\cos\angleOF_{2}P=\frac{a}{c},化简得c=\sqrt{3}a,所以b=\sqrt{2}a,所以双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，右焦点为$F$，以$F$为圆心的圆与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线相切于第一象限内的一点$B$. 若直线$A B$的斜率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;G: Circle;Center(G) = F;B: Point;Quadrant(B) = 1;TangentPoint(G, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = B;Slope(LineOf(A, B)) = 1/2
process: F(c,0),A(-a,0),由题意设B(x,\frac{b}{a}x),则\frac{b}{x-c}\times\frac{b}{a}=-1'解得x=\frac{a^{2}}{c},即B(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{ab}{c})所以k_{AB}=\frac{\frac{ab}{c}}{\frac{a^{2}}{2}+a}=\frac{1}{2},2b=a+c,3c^{2}-2ac-5a^{2}=0,3e^{2}-2e-5=0,解得e=\frac{5}{2}或e=-1(舍去)

text: 已知$P(2,6)$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点，抛物线$C$的焦点为$F$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 6);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = F
process: P(2,6)代入抛物线方程导p=9.从而可得由P(2,6)为抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)上一点得6^{2}=4p,可得p=9.则|PF|=2+\frac{9}{2}=\frac{13}{2}

text: 设双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$x=1$与双曲线的其中一条渐近线交于点$P$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/9 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Intersection(H,OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=P
process: 求出双曲线的渐近线以及焦点,从而可得直线x=1与双曲线的渐近线交于点,利用三角形的面积公式即可求解.由双曲线方程知其渐近线方程为:y=\pm3x,焦点F_{1}(-\sqrt{10},0),F_{2}(\sqrt{10},0)则直线x=1与双曲线的渐近线交于点(1,3),(1,-3),不妨设P(1,3)则S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{10}\times3=3\sqrt{10}.

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$，且$l$与该拋物线交于不同的两点$A(x_{1}, y_{1})$ , $B(x_{2}, y_{2})$. 若$x_{1}+x_{2}=3$，则弦$A B$的长是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1) ;Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);x1 + x2 = 3;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Negation(A = B);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)
process: 由题意得p=1,由抛物线的定义知:AB=AF+BF=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}+x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=3+1=4,

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4)
process: 试题分析:抛物线方程即x^{2}=4y,从而可得p=2,\frac{p}{2}=1,由此求得抛物线焦点坐标.抛物线y-\frac{1}{4}x^{2}即x^{2}=4y,\thereforep=2,\frac{p}{2}=1,故焦点坐标是(0,1)

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 - y^2/144 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (13, 0);Distance(P, A) = 20;B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (-13, 0)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{3} x$，它的一个焦点与抛物 线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点相同，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 16*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $x^{2}+2 y^{2}=4$，过点$P(1,1)$的直线与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2 + 2*y^2 = 4);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);L: Line;PointOnCurve(P, L) = True;Intersection(L, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P
H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-6*x + x^2 + y^2 - 7 = 0);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number;a>0;IsTangent(H, Directrix(G))

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点$F$恰好是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点，且两条曲线交点的连线过点$F$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;C: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;F: Point;p>0;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(E) = F;RightFocus(C) = F;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(C, E) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(F, LineOf(A, B))
process: 设两条曲线交点为A、B根据椭圆和抛物线对称性知AB\botx轴,不妨点A在第一象限,由A在抛物线上得A(\frac{p}{2},p),A在椭圆上得A(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a})e^{2}-2e-1=0解得e=1+\sqrt{2},e=1-\sqrt{2}(舍去)

text: 若$\triangle A B C$的两个顶点坐标$A(-4,0)$ , $B(4,0)$ , $\triangle A B C$的周长为$18$，则顶点$C$轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-4, 0);Coordinate(B) = (4, 0);Perimeter(TriangleOf(A, B, C)) = 18
process: \becauseAABC的两个顶点坐标A(-4,0),B(4,0),周长为18\thereforeAB=8,BC+AC=10\because10>8,\therefore点C到两个定点的距离之和等于定值.\therefore点C的轨迹是以A、B为焦点的椭圆\because2a=10,2c=8,\thereforeb=3\because椭圆的标准方程是\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(y\neq0)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的两条渐近线恰好是曲线$y=a x^{2}+\frac{1}{3}$的两条切线，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Curve;a: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = a*x^2 + 1/3);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};IsTangent(L1,H);IsTangent(L2,H)
process: 因为y=2ax,又双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的两条渐近线为y=\pm\frac{2}{3}x,且x=0时时y=ax^{2}+\frac{1}{3}=\frac{1}{3}>0,所以a>0,2a=\frac{2}{3}\Rightarrowa=\frac{1}{3}.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，过其焦点且斜率为$-1$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$A B$的中点的横坐标为$3$，则该抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Slope(H) = -1;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 3
process: 由直线过其焦点且斜率为-1,可得方程为y=-x+\frac{p}{2},代入抛物线的方程,化为关于x的一元二次方程,利用根与系数的关系和中点坐标公式可得p,即可得到抛物线的准线方程.设直线方程y-0=-1\cdot(x-\frac{p}{2}),得y=-x+\frac{p}{2}代入抛物线方程得(\frac{p}{2}-x)^{2}=2px,化简的x^{2}-3px+\frac{p^{2}}{4}=0x_{1}+x_{2}=3p=2\times3,\thereforep=2,准线方程x=-\frac{p}{2}=-1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上的点$A(x_{0},-2)$到其焦点的距离是点$A$到$y$轴距离的$3$倍，则$p$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = (x0, -2);x0:Number;PointOnCurve(A,G);Distance(A,Focus(G))=3*Distance(A,yAxis)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)开口向右,准线为x=-\frac{p}{2}将A的坐标代入抛物线方程得4=2px_{0},x_{0}=\frac{2}{p}由于抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)上的点A(x_{0},-2)到其焦点的距离是点A到y轴距离的3倍.根据抛物线的定义有x_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=3x_{0}'所以\frac{2}{p}+\frac{p}{2}=3\times\frac{2}{p},\frac{p}{2}=\frac{4}{p},p^{2}=8,p=2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-1}=1$表示双曲线，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G)=(x^2/(2 - k) + y^2/(k - 1) = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$ , $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$分别为椭圆的两焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且$|P F_{2}|=3$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 3
process: \because|PF|+|PF_{2}|=2a=8\therefore|PF_{1}|=8-3=5,|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c=4\thereforePF_{2}\botF_{1}F_{2}\thereforeS=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}||PF_{1}|=\frac{1}{2}\times3\times4=6

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$P$、$Q$两点，与其准线交于点$M$，且$\overrightarrow{F M}=3 \overrightarrow{F P}$，则$|\overrightarrow{F P}|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;F: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};Intersection(l, Directrix(C)) = M;VectorOf(F, M) = 3*VectorOf(F, P)

text: 已知抛物线的顶点在坐标原点，对称轴为$x$轴，抛物线上的点$M(-3 , m)$到焦点的距离等于$5$，则抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;O: Origin;m:Number;Coordinate(M) = (-3, m);Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G)=xAxis;PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5
process: 设抛物线方程为y^{2}=-2px(p>0),则焦点F(-\frac{p}{2},0)由题意,得\begin{cases}m^{2}\\\sqrt{m^{2}+(3}\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}p=4,\\m=2\sqrt{6}\end{cases}或\begin{cases}\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},\\m=-2\sqrt{6}\end{cases}故所求的抛物线方程为y^{2}=-8x.故准线方程为x=2b女安为.

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$共焦点，且过点$(1, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2})$的椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;I: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(I) = (1, sqrt(3)/2);PointOnCurve(I, H);Focus(G)=Focus(H)
process: 由题设知:\because\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1所以其焦点为(\pm\sqrt{3},0),焦点在x轴上,因为椭圆与双曲线同焦点.故设椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\thereforea^{2}-b^{2}=3又椭圆过点\therefore\frac{1}{a^{2}}+\frac{(\sqrt{3}}{b^{2}})^{2}=1解得a=2,b=1,\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1\therefore\frac{4}{4}+y^{2}=1.与双曲线\frac{x2}{2}-y^{2}=1共焦点,且过点(1,\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2})的椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1

text: 已知点$P(5,0)$，若双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右支上存在两动点$M$、$N$，使得$\overrightarrow{P M} \perp \overrightarrow{P N}$，则$\overrightarrow{M P} \cdot \overrightarrow{M N}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5, 0);C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M,RightPart(C)) ;PointOnCurve(N,RightPart(C)) ;IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(P, M), VectorOf(P, N))
process: 设M(x_{1},y_{1})(x_{1}\geqslant1),则x_{1}^{2}-\frac{y_{1}}{3}=1'即y_{1}^{2}=3(x_{1}^{2}-1).因为\overrightarrow{PM}\bot\overrightarrow{PN},所以\overrightarrow{PM}\cdot\overrightarrow{PN}=0,则\overrightarrow{MP}\cdot\overrightarrow{MN}=\overrightarrow{MP}\cdot(\overrightarrow{MP}+\overrightarrow{PN})=\overrightarrow{MP}+\overrightarrow{MP}\cdot\overrightarrow{PN}=\overrightarrow{MP}=(x_{1}-5)^{2}+y_{1}^{2}=x_{1}^{2}-10x_{1}+25+3(x_{1}^{2}-1)=4(x_{1}-\frac{5}{4})^{2}+\frac{63}{4}因为x_{1}\geqslant1,所以4(x_{1}-\frac{5}{4})^{2}+\frac{63}{4}\geqslant\frac{63}{4},当且仅当x_{1}=\frac{5}{4}时等号成立即\overrightarrow{MP}\cdot\overrightarrow{MN}的最小值是\frac{63}{4}

text: 设双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是双曲线$C$右支上一点，若$|P F_{2}|=5$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C)) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 5

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左顶点为$M$，右焦点为$F$，过点$F$作垂直于$x$轴的直线$l$与双曲线交于$A$，$B$两点，且满足$M A \perp M B$，则该双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = M;RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);IsPerpendicular(xAxis, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A,B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M, A), LineSegmentOf(M, B))
process: 由MA\botMB及对称性知4MAB是等腰直角三角形,因此有|MF|=|FA|,由此列式可求得离心率[详解]由题意可得AF=MF,且AF=\frac{b^{2}}{a},MF=a+c,则\frac{b^{2}}{a}=a+c,即b^{2}=a^{2}+ac=c^{2}-a^{2},所以e^{2}-e.2=0(e>1),解得e=2.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$离心率$e=2$ ,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点相同，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G:Hyperbola;a:Number;b:Number;a>0;b>0;C:Parabola;e:Number;Expression(G)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(C)=(y^2=8*x);Eccentricity(G)=e;e=2;OneOf(Focus(G))=Focus(C)
process: 由抛物线的方程求得其焦点,由已知求得双曲线的a,b,c,由此得出双曲线的方程,可得选项设双曲线的半焦距为c(c>0),由抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点坐标为(2,0),得c=2.又因为双曲线的离心率e=2,所以a=1,又由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},可得b=\sqrt{3},所以双曲线的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1.

fact_expressions: C1: Parabola;C2: Circle;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);Expression(C1) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(C2) = (x^2+y^2-4*x+3=0);PointOnCurve(A, C1);PointOnCurve(B, C2)

text: 已知点$M(-3 , 0)$, $N(3 , 0)$, $B(1 , 0)$, $\odot O$与$MN$相切于点$B$,过$M$, $N$与$\odot O$相切的两直线相交于点$P$，则$P$点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 0);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (3, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);O: Circle;TangentPoint(O, LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = B;L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOfPoint(M, O) = L1;TangentOfPoint(N, O) = L2;P: Point;Intersection(L1, L2) = P

text: 过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点$A$的斜率为$k$的直线交椭圆于另一个点$B$，且点$B$在$x$轴上的射影恰好为右焦点$F$，若$\frac{1}{3}<k<\frac{1}{2}$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;k: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A;PointOnCurve(A, G);Slope(G) = k;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Projection(B, xAxis) = F;RightFocus(C) = F;1/3 < k;k < 1/2

text: 两个焦点的坐标分别是$(-4,0)$ ,$(4,0)$，椭圆上一点$P$到两焦点的距离的和等于$10$的椭圆标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;Focus(G)={F1,F2};Coordinate(F1)=(-4,0);Coordinate(F2)=(4,0);Distance(P, F1)+Distance(P, F2)=10
process: \because两个焦点的坐标分别是(-4,0),(4,0),\therefore椭圆的焦点在横轴上,并且c=4.\therefore由椭圆的定义可得:2a=10,即a=5,\therefore由a,b,c的关系a2=b^{2}+c解得b=3,\therefore椭圆方程是\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -4*x)
process: 试题分析:根据抛物线方程求得p,则根据抛物线性质可求得抛物线的焦点坐标.抛物线方程中p=2,\therefore抛物线焦点坐标为(-1,0)故填写(-1,0)

text: 已知点$P(2 , 1)$，若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的一条弦$A B$恰好是以$P$为中点，则弦$A B$所在直线方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 已知直线$y=(a+1) x-1$与曲线$y^{2}=ax$恰有一个公共点，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x*(a + 1) - 1);H: Curve;Expression(H) = (y^2 = a*x);a: Real;NumIntersection(G, H)=1

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1(b>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm x$，则$b$等于?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$，焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点相同，那么双曲线渐近线方程为?

text: 抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$上的点$A(1,2)$到焦点$F$的距离为?

process: \because抛物线y=2x^{2},\therefore标准方程为:x^{2}=\frac{1}{2}y.准线方程为:y=-\frac{1}{8},点A(1,2)到焦点F的距离为A到准线的距离:2+\frac{1}{8}=\frac{17}{8}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的半焦距为$c$，过右焦点且斜率为$1$的直线与双曲线的右支交于两点，若抛物线$y^{2}=4 c x$的准线被双曲线截得的弦长是$\frac{2 \sqrt{2}}{3} b e^{2}$($e$为双曲线的离心率)，则$e$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;HalfFocalLength(G) = c;c: Number;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), L);Slope(L) = 1;L: Line;NumIntersection(L, RightPart(G)) = 2;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*c*x);Length(InterceptChord(Directrix(H), G)) = (2*sqrt(2)/3)*b*e^2;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 试题分析:由题意,得抛物线的准线为x=-c,它正好经过双曲线的左焦点,所以准线被双曲线截得的弦长为\frac{2b^{2}}{a},所以\frac{2b^{2}}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}be^{2},即\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3}e^{2},所以e=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{\sqrt{2}e^{2})^{2}}{3}},整理,得2e^{4}-9e^{2}+1=0,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}或e=\sqrt{3}.又过焦点且斜率为1的直线与双曲线的右支交点,所以e=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}.

text: 如果双曲线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{27}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$有相同焦点，且经过点$(\sqrt{15} , 4)$，那么双曲线其方程是?

text: 设$F$为双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点，过$F$且斜率为$\frac{a}{b}$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$，$B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Slope(l)=a/b;L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(C)={L1,L2};Intersection(L1,l)=A;Intersection(L2,l)=B;VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)
process: \because渐近线OB的斜率为-\frac{b}{a}.\thereforel\botOB,又\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{FB}在Rt\triangleOBA中,由角平分线定理可得\frac{|OA|}{|OB|}=\frac{|FA|}{|FB|}=2,所以\angleAOB=60^{\circ},\anglexOA=30^{\circ},所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知斜率为$2$的直线经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点$F_{2}$，与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，则弦$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: L: Line;Slope(L) = 2;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;F2: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, L) = True;Intersection(L, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B), G) = True
process: 由题可得右焦点F_{2}为(1,0)则直线AB的方程为y=2(x-1)联立直线与椭圆方程可得3x^{2}-5x=0,则x_{1}=\frac{5}{3},x_{2}=0,代入|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}|x_{1}-x_{2}|求解即可由题意知椭圆的右焦点F_{2}的坐标为(1,0)直线AB的方程为y=2(x-1),联立\begin{cases}y=2(x-1)\\\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1\end{cases}消去y,得3x^{2}-5x=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})得x_{1}=\frac{5}{3},x_{2}=0,则|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}|_{x_{1}}-x_{2}|=\sqrt{1+2^{2}}\times\frac{5}{3}=\frac{5\sqrt{5}}{3}

text: 经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 抛物线的焦点坐标为(1,0),当直线斜率不存在时,令x=1得:y=\pm2,所以|AB|=4,当直线斜率存在时,设直线方程为y=k(x-1),联立\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y2=4x\end{cases}得:k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0k\neq0,设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}}=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}},|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2+\frac{4}{12}+2=4+\frac{4}{12}>4,所以,|AB|的最小值为4故答客为:4

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$M(-1,4)$作$y$轴的垂线交抛物线$C$于点$A$，且满足$|A F|=|A M|$，设直线$A F$交抛物线$C$于另一点$B$，则点$B$的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;Z: Line;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(M) = (-1, 4);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(M, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, yAxis);Intersection(Z, C) = A;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, M));Intersection(LineOf(A, F), C) = {A, B}
process: 由|AF|=|AM|可得点M在准线上,则可得-\frac{p}{2}=-1,可得抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4x,所以A(4,4),从而可求出直线AB方程为y=\frac{4}{3}x-\frac{4}{3},然后直线方程与抛物线方程联立可求出点B的纵坐标作解】由题意可知,因为|AF|=|AM|,所以点M在准线上,又因为准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},所以-\frac{p}{2}=-1,即p=2,所以抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4x,因为点M坐标为(-1,4),所以A(4,4),故直线AB方程为y=\frac{4}{3}x-\frac{4}{3}联立\begin{cases}y=\frac{4}{3}x-\frac{4}{3},\\y2=4x\end{cases}得y^{2}-3y-4=0,解得y=4(舍)或y=-1,故点B纵坐标为-1.

text: 点$P$为椭圆$C$上一动点，过点$P$作以椭圆短轴为直径的圆的两条切线，切点分别为$M$、$N$，若$\angle M P N=60^{\circ}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Circle;M: Point;P: Point;N: Point;L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsDiameter(MinorAxis(C),G);TangentOfPoint(P,G)={L1,L2};TangentPoint(L1,G)=M;TangentPoint(L2,G)=N;AngleOf(M, P, N) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 根据题意,找到a、b、c的关系,求出离心率的范围设椭圆的中心为O,因为\angleMPN=60^{\circ},所以\anglePOM=60^{\circ},所以\frac{|OP|}{|OM|}=2,所以|OP|=2b,椭圆上的点到原点距离最远的是长轴端点,所以a\geqslant2b,即\frac{b}{a}\leqslant\frac{1}{2}\therefore\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}\leqslant\frac{1}{4},\therefore\frac{a2-c^{2}}{a^{2}}\leqslant\frac{1}{4},所以离心率e=\frac{a^{2}}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}\geqslant\sqrt{1-(\frac{1}{2})^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},所以e\in[\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, LeftPart(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 12
process: 利用双曲线的定义可求出|AF_{2}|.\becauseA在双曲线C的左支上,由双曲线的定义可得|AF_{2}|-|AF_{1}|=2\sqrt{16}=8,因此,|AF_{2}|=|AF_{1}|+8=20

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{k+8}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$, 则$k$的值是?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F(-1,0)$，直线$l$: $y=-x+m$与抛物线交于不同的两点$A$、$B$，若$0 \leq m<1$，则$\Delta F A B$的面积的最大值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;m:Number;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(l)=(y=-x+m);m>=0;m<1;Coordinate(F) = (-1, 0);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(l,G) = {A, B};Negation(A = B)
process: \because抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)焦点为F(-1,0)\therefore抛物线的方程为y^{2}=-4x联立抛物线方程和直线方程得x^{2}+(4-2m)x+m^{2}=0因为又两交点,\triangle=(4-2m)^{2}-4m^{2}>0即m<1所以0\leqslantm<1恒成立.设点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=2m-4,x_{1}x_{2}=m^{2}|AB|=\sqrt{2}|x_{1}-x_{2}|=4\sqrt{2}\sqrt{1-m}\becauseF(-1,0)到直线y=-x+m的距离d=\frac{|1+m|}{\sqrt{2}}\thereforeS_{\DeltaABF}=\frac{1}{2}d|AB|=2\sqrt{(1-m)(1+m)^{2}}=\sqrt{2}\sqrt{(2-2m)(1+m)(1+m)}\leqslant\sqrt{2}\sqrt{(\frac{2-2m+1+m+1+m)^{3}}{3}}=\frac{8\sqrt{6}}{9}当且仅当2-2m=1+m,即m=\frac{1}{3}时取等号,即\triangleABF的面积的最大值为\frac{8\sqrt{6}}{9}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点到一条渐近线的距离为$2 a$，则其离心率的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Distance(RightFocus(G), OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 2*a
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的右焦点为(c,0)其中一条渐近线方程为bx-ay=0,焦点到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{2+b^{2}}}=b=2a,即\frac{b}{a}=2则e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+4}=\sqrt{5}.放答客为:\sqrt{5}

text: 已知以$F$为焦点的抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两点$A$、$B$满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为?

process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})为两点A,B满足\overrightarrow{AF}=3\overrightarrow{FB}.y_{1},\overrightarrow{FB}=(x_{2}-1,y_{2}),即\begin{cases}y_{1}=4x_{1}\\y_{2}=4x_{2}\\y_{1}=-3x_{2}\end{cases}解得:\begin{cases}-y_{1}=3y_{2}\\x_{2}=\frac{1}{3}\end{cases}故\begin{cases}x_{1}=3\\y_{1}=12\end{cases}B的中点到y轴得距离为\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{5}{3}.与睛)本题考查了向量的坐标运算,抛物线的定义等知识,解题时设出变量,列出方程组,得出变量的值,根据图形解决问题

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$M$到左焦点$F_{1}$的距离是$2$,$N$是$M F_{1}$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，则$|O N|$=?

text: 曲线$\frac{x|x|}{2}-\frac{y|y|}{4}=1$上的点到直线$y=\sqrt{2} x$的距离的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G) = ((-y*Abs(y))/4 + (x*Abs(x))/2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(2)*x)
process: 曲线\frac{x|x|}{2}-\frac{y|y|}{4}=1表示的方程等价于以下方程,\begin{matrix}\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x\geqslant0,y\geqslant0)\\\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x\geqslant0,y<0)&画出图象有:\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{=1(x<0,y<0)}\end{matrix}:故y=\sqrt{2}x是双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x\geqslant0,y\geqslant0)与\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}=1(x<0,y<0)渐近线方程所以曲线\frac{x|x|}{2}-\frac{y|y|}{4}=1上的点到直线y=\sqrt{2}x的距离的最大值为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x\geqslant0,y<0)上的点到直线y=\sqrt{2}x的距离.设直线y=\sqrt{2}x+m(m<0)与曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x\geqslant0,y<0)相切,联立方程组,化简得4x^{2}+2\sqrt{2}mx+m^{2}-4=0,令A=8m^{2}-16(m^{2}-4)=0,解得m=-2\sqrt{2}所以切线为:y=\sqrt{2}x-2\sqrt{2}故两平行线y=\sqrt{2}x-2\sqrt{2}与y=\sqrt{2}x之间的距离为d=\frac{|0+2\sqrt{2}|}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{6}}{3}所以曲线\frac{x|x|}{2}-\frac{y|y|}{4}=1上的点到直线y=\sqrt{2}x的距离的最大值是\frac{2\sqrt{6}}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的斜率为$\sqrt{3}$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Slope(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=sqrt(3)
process: 由已知渐近线的斜率k=\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},则离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+3}=2

text: 已知动点$M$分别与两定点$A(1,0)$ , $B(-1,0)$的连线的斜率之积为定值$m(m \neq 0)$，若点$M$的轨迹是焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆（除去点$A$ , $B$)，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: M:Point;A:Point;B:Point;G:Ellipse;m:Number;Negation(m=0);Coordinate(A)=(1,0);Coordinate(B)=(-1,0);Slope(LineOf(M,A))*Slope(LineOf(M,B))=m;Locus(M)=G;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);Negation(PointOnCurve(A,G));Negation(PointOnCurve(B,G))
process: 化简得到k_{AM}\cdotk_{BM}=\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2-1}}=m,即x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1'根据题意0<-m<1,解得答案表示焦点在x轴上的椭圆(除去点A、B),故0<-m<1,故m\in(-1,0).

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，动点$M$在圆$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=4$上，过$M$作$x$轴的垂线，垂足为$N$，点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{N P}=\overrightarrow{PM}$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;N: Point;P: Point;M: Point;O: Origin;l: Line;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(M, l);IsPerpendicular(l, xAxis);FootPoint(l, xAxis) = N;VectorOf(N, P) = VectorOf(P, M)
process: 设M(x_{0},y_{0}),由题意可得N(x_{0},0),设P(x,y),运用向量的坐标运算,结合M满足椭圆方程,化简整理可得P的轨迹方程;[详解]设M(x_{0},y_{0}),由题意可得N(x_{0},0)设P(x,y),由点P满足\overrightarrow{NP}=\overrightarrow{PM},可知P为MN的中点,可得x=x_{0},y=\frac{1}{2}y_{0}.即有x_{0}=x,y_{0}=2y,代入圆C:x^{2}+y^{2}=4,可得x^{2}+4y^{2}=4.即\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1,

text: 已知$c$是双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(a>0, b>0)$的半焦距，离心率为$e$，则$\frac{1}{e}+\frac{b}{c}$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);HalfFocalLength(C) = c;Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 由题意知,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}},\therefore\frac{1}{e}+\frac{b}{c}=\frac{a+b}{c}=\frac{a+b}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b}}-\frac{1}{2}成立.\therefore\frac{1}{e}+\frac{b}{c}的最大值是\sqrt{2}

text: 已知点$P$在抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上运动，$F$为抛物线的焦点，点$A$的坐标为$(2,3)$，则$P A+P F$取得最小值时点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 3);WhenMin(LineSegmentOf(P, A) + LineSegmentOf(P, F))
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/64 - y^2/36 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;F1: Point;F2: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = 17
process: 由双曲线方程\frac{x^{2}}{64}-\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1可得a=8,b=6,c=10,由双曲线的图形可得点M到右焦点F_{2}的距离d\geqslantc-a=2.因为|MF_{1}|-|MF_{2}|=2a=16,|MF_{1}|=17,所以|MF_{2}|=1(舍去)或|MF_{2}|=33.

text: 已知椭圆$C$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$，左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$C$上一动点，则$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e:Number;Eccentricity(C) = e ;e= 1/3;LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,C)

text: 点$P$是椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，且$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆半径为$1$. 当点$P$在第一象限时，它的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 + y^2/7 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)))=1;Quadrant(P)=1
process: 椭圆的焦点三角形问题,充分利用椭圆的定义,从两个角度表示出S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}},建立关于y_{p}的关系式求解.因为|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=8,|F_{1}F_{2}|=6,所以S_{\trianglePFF}F_{2}=\frac{1}{2}(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|)\times1=7;又因为S_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|\cdoty_{p}=3y_{p}=7,所以y_{p}=\frac{7}{3}

text: 已知点$F$为抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 y$的焦点，过点$F$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1} $, $l_{2}$，直线$l_{1}$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l_{2}$与$C$交于$D$，$E$两点，则$|A B|+4|D E|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;E: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*y);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l1);PointOnCurve(F,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,l2);Intersection(l1, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l2, C) = {D,E}
process: 设直线l_{1}的方程为y=kx+\frac{1}{2},联立方程组,分别求得|AB|=2k^{2}+2和|DE|=\frac{2}{k^{2}}+2,结合基本不等式,即可求得|AB|+4|DE|的最小值,得到答案.由题,抛物线C:x^{2}=2y的焦点F(0,\frac{1}{2}),准线方程为y=-\frac{1}{2}设直线l_{1}的方程为y=kx+\frac{1}{2},k\neq0,联立方程组\begin{cases}x^{2}=2y\\y=kx+\frac{1}{2}\end{cases},则x^{2}-2kx-1=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),可得x_{1}+x_{2}=2k,y_{1}+y_{2}=kx_{1}+\frac{1}{2}+kx_{2}+\frac{1}{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+1=2k^{2}+由抛物线的定义可得|AB|=y_{1}+y_{2}+1=2k^{2}+2,由l_{1}\botl_{2},可将上式中的k换为-\frac{1}{k},可得|DE|=\frac{2}{k^{2}}+2,则|AB|+4|DE|=10+2(k^{2}+\frac{4}{k^{2}})\geqslant10+2\times2\sqrt{k^{2}.\frac{4}{k^{2}}}=18当且仅当k=\pm\sqrt{2},上式取得等号则|AB|+4|DE|的最小值为18

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Expression(H) = ((x + 1)^2 + (y - 3)^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(M, H)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的两个焦点，已知点$P$在此双曲线上，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，若此双曲线的离心率等于$\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}$，则点$P$到$y$轴的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3;Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(6)/2
process: 依题意,由\begin{matrix}b=\sqrt{2}\\c&\sqrt{6}\\a&\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\\c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\end{matrix}解得a=2,c=\sqrt{6},根据双曲线焦点三角形面积公式有S=b^{2}\cot\frac{\angleF_{1}PF_{2}}{2}=\frac{2}{\tan\frac{\pi}{6}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\sqrt{6}\cdot,解得|y|=\sqrt{2},代入双曲线方程解得|x|=2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴相交于点$C$. 若以$F$为圆心、$p$为半径的圆与抛物线相交于点$A$，$B$，则$\sin \angle A C F$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;C: Point;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = C;H: Circle;Center(H) = F;Radius(H) = p;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，动弦$A B$过左焦点$F_{1}$. 若$|\overrightarrow {F_{2} A}-\overrightarrow{F_{2} B}| \geq|\overrightarrow {F_{2} A}+\overrightarrow{F_{2} B}|$恒成立，则椭圆$E$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),E);PointOnCurve(F1,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Abs(VectorOf(F2,A)-VectorOf(F2,B)) >= Abs(VectorOf(F2,A)+VectorOf(F2,B))
process: 由条件可得\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}\leqslant0,转化为\frac{2b^{2}}{a}\geqslant4c'从而得到椭圆E的离心率的取值范围.由|\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}-\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}|\geqslant|\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}+\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}|可得\overrightarrow{F_{2}A}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}\leqslant0\frac{2b^{2}}{a}\geqslant4c'即2ac\leqslanta^{2}-c^{2}\thereforee^{2}+2e-1\leqslant0\therefore0<e\leqslant\sqrt{2}-1

text: 已知点$P(1,2)$在抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，过点$M(1,0)$且斜率大于零的直线$l$交抛物线$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A M}=3 \overrightarrow{M B}$，则直线$l$的倾斜角为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 2);E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;PointOnCurve(P, E);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(M, l);Slope(l) > 0;l: Line;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;VectorOf(A, M) = 3*VectorOf(M, B)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$, $A$ , $B$分别为椭圆的左顶点和上顶点，$F$为右焦点，且$A B \perp B F$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(G)=A;UpperVertex(G)=B;RightFocus(G) = F;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(B, F));a > b;b > 0
process: 由已知可设A(-a,0),B(0,b),F(c,0),因为AB\botBF,所以k_{AB}\cdotk_{BF}=-1,所以\frac{b}{a}\cdot(-\frac{b}{c})=-1,即b^{2}=ac,所以a^{2}-c^{2}=ac,两边同时除以a^{2},得1-\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{c}{a},即e^{2}+e-1=0,解得_{e}=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2}所以椭圆的离心率为\underline{\sqrt{5}-1}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，$O$为坐标原点，$M$为抛物线上一点且$|M F|=3$，则$\Delta O M F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(M, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 3
process: 设M(m,n),由抛物线方程y^{2}=4x得:2p=4,所以p=2由抛物线的定义得:|MF|=m+\frac{p}{2}=3,解得:m=2,又n^{2}=4m解得:n=\pm2\sqrt{2},所以\triangleOMF的面积为:S=\frac{1}{2}\times|OF|\times|n|=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times2\sqrt{2}=\sqrt{2}】本题主要考查了抛物线的定义及方程思想、三角形面积计算,属于基础题

text: 经过点$M(4 , 3)$，渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$的双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (4, 3);PointOnCurve(M, G);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，上顶点为$B$.已知椭圆的短轴长为$4$，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$，则椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;UpperVertex(G) = B;Length(MinorAxis(G)) = 4;Eccentricity(G)=sqrt(5)/5
process: 由已知可得出关于a、b、c的方程组,解出a、b、c的值,由此可得出椭圆的方程由题意可得\begin{cases}2b=4\\c=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}\\b=\sqrt{a2-c^{2}}\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}a=\sqrt{5}\\b=2\\c=1\end{cases}因此,该椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: $A$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$上一点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，$O$为坐标原点，当$|AF|=4$时，$\angle OFA=120^{\circ}$，则抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(A, G);Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F))=4;AngleOf(O, F, A) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 由题意\angleBFA=\angleOFA-90^{\circ}=30^{\circ}过A作准线的垂线AC,过F作AC的垂线,垂足分别为C,B.如图A点到准线的距离为:d=|AB|+|BC|=p+2=4,解得p=2,则抛物线的标准方程:y^{2}=4x.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)(m>0)$到其焦点$F$的距离为$5$，点$F$到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一条渐近线的距离为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;H: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;F: Point;m:Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);Focus(H) = F;Distance(M, F) = 5;Distance(F,OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: (分析)由已知结合抛物线的定义求得p,得到F的坐标,再由点到直线的距离公式列式求得b,进一步求得c,即可求出答案.由抛物线的定义,得点M(1,m)到焦点的距离等于到准线x=-\frac{p}{2}的距离.即1+\frac{p}{2}=5,解得p=8,所以抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=16x,焦点F(4,0),取双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的一条渐近线为y=\frac{b}{\sqrt{2}}x,即bx-\sqrt{2}y=0,则有\frac{|4b|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+2}}=2\sqrt{2},解得b=\sqrt{2}.所以\frac{\upsilon}{c=\sqrt{a2+b^{2}}}=2,则e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}数答家为:,,,

text: 双曲线$8 kx^{2}-ky^{2}=8$的一个焦点为$(0 , 3)$，则$k$的值为?双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (8*(k*x^2) - k*y^2 = 8);Coordinate(H) = (0, 3);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 已知点$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上任意一个点，若点$P$到双曲线两条渐近线的距离乘积等于$\frac{b^{2}}{3}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1, L2};Distance(P, L1)*Distance(P, L2) = b^2/3

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点为$A$ ,以$A$为圆心，$b$为半径作圆$A1$，圆$A1$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线于交$M$、$N$两点，若$\angle M A N=60^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;A1: Circle;M: Point;A: Point;N: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;Center(A1)=A;Length(Radius(A1))=b;Intersection(A1, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = {M, N};AngleOf(M, A, N) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 如图所示,由题意可得|OA|=a,|AN|=|AM|=b,\because\angleMAN=60^{\circ}\therefore|AP|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}b,\therefore|OP|=\sqrt{|OA|^{2}-|PA|^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2}-\frac{3}{4}b^{2}}.设双曲线C的一条渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x的倾斜角为\theta,则\tan\theta=\frac{|AP|}{|OP|}=\frac{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}b}{\sqrt{a-\frac{3}{4}b^{2}}}\therefore\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{2}\frac{b}{3}}=\frac{b}{a},解得a^{2}=3b^{2}e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}答案:\frac{\sqrt{1+a^{2}}}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;x0: Number;y0:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/32 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (x0, y0);PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));Distance(A,RightFocus(G)) = 2*x0

text: 若直线$y=k x+1$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$有且只有一个公共点,则$k$的值是?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);k: Number;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1
process: 若直线y=kx+1与抛物线y^{2}=4x有且只有一个公共点,分类讨论,分直线与x轴平行,或者直线与抛物线相切求出k的值,从而得到答案.\textcircled{1}当直线y=kx+1与x平行时,方程为y=1,k=0,与抛物线y^{2}=4x只有一个公共点,坐标为(\frac{1}{4},1).\textcircled{2}当k\neq0时,方程y=kx+1与抛物线方程联立,消去y得k^{2}x^{2}+(2k-4)x+1=0,A=(2k-4)^{2}-4k^{2}=0,解得k=1,切线方程为y=x+1,综上,k=0或1,

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$，过点$P(4,1)$引一条弦，使它恰好被$P$点平分，则该弦所在的直线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 6*x);Coordinate(P) = (4, 1);PointOnCurve(P,H);MidPoint(H)=P;IsChordOf(H,G)
process: 试题分析:设过点P(4,1)的弦的两个端点分别为A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则:\begin{cases}y_{2}=6x_{1}\\y_{2}=6x_{2},x_{1}=\frac{2}{x_{2}}-x_{1}=y_{2}+y,\end{cases}得:y_{2}^{2}-y_{1}=6(x_{2}-x_{1}),又因为点P(4,1)恰好是线段AB的中点.\therefore\frac{y_{2}+y_{1}}{2}=1\Rightarrowy_{2}+y_{1}=2故该弦所在直线的斜率为k=\frac{y_{2}-y_{1}}{x_{2}-x_{1}}=\frac{6}{y_{2}+y_{1}}=\frac{6}{2}=3,所以该弦所在直线的方程为:y-1=3(x-4),即3x-y-11=0.故答案应填:3x-y-11=0

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，过右焦点$F$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与椭圆$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = sqrt(3);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = VectorOf(F, B)/2
process: 数形结合,使用椭圆的第二定义进行计算,得到|BE|,|AB|,然后利用\cos\angleABE=\frac{|BE|}{|AB|}计算即可.羊解】如图,生线交右准线于点C作AE垂直BC于点E由\overrightarrow{AF}=\frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{FB},设|\overrightarrow{AF}|=m,|\overrightarrow{FB}|=2m,则|AB|=3m由|AD|=\frac{|\overrightarrow{AF}|}{e}=\frac{m}{e},|AD|=\frac{|\overrightarrow{FB}|}{e}=\frac{2m}{e}所以|BE|=|BC|-|AD|=\frac{m}{e}又直线AB的斜率为\sqrt{3},所以\angleABE=\angleAFx=60^{\circ}所以\cos\angleABE=\frac{|BE|}{|AB|}=\frac{1}{3e}=\frac{1}{2}\Rightarrowe=\frac{2}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，$O$为坐标原点，以$O F_{2}$为直径的圆与该双曲线$C$的一条渐近线交于$O$、$P$两点，若$\angle O P F_{1}=45^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;O: Origin;F2: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(O,F2),G);Intersection(G, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = {O, P};AngleOf(O, P, F1) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)
process: 如图,渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x,则焦点F_{2}(c,0)到渐近线距离d=\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}}=b,即PF_{2}=b,则OP=\sqrt{F_{2}O^{2}-F_{2}P^{2}}=a,过点P作PA\botx轴于点A,则PA=\frac{OP\cdotPF_{2}}{OF_{2}}=\frac{ab}{c},由勾股定理得:OA=\frac{a^{2}}{c},则P(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{ab}{c}),则直线PF方程为:\frac{y-0}{x+c}=\frac{\frac{ab}{c}-0}{\frac{a^{2}}{c}+c},即y=\frac{ab}{a^{2}+c^{2}}(x+c),过点O作OB\botPF_{1}于点B,则OB=\frac{abc}{\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a^{2}+c})}^{2}},又\angleOPF_{1}=45^{\circ},所以OP=\sqrt{2}OB,即\frac{\frac{\sqrt{2}abc}{a^{2}+c^{2}}}{\sqrt{1+(\frac{ab}{2}^{2}}}=a,解得:\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5},即C的离心率为\sqrt{5}

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点且斜率为$1$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=8$ , $O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);Slope(G) = 1;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8
process: 由题可知直线AB的方程为:y=x-\frac{p}{2},代入y^{2}=2px化简,利用韦达定理以及抛物线的定义|AB|=8求得p的值,可得抛物线的方程.联立直线与抛物线方程,利用面积公式即可求解.详解】由题可知焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0),则该直线AB的方程为:y=x-\frac{p}{2},代入y^{2}=2px,化简可得x^{2}-3px+\frac{p^{2}}{4}=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则有x_{1}+x_{2}=3p.\because|AB|=8,\therefore有x_{1}+x_{2}+p=8,解得p=2,\therefore抛物线的方程为:y^{2}=4x可得直线AB的方程为:y=x-1联立\begin{cases}y=x-1\\y2=4x\end{cases}可得y^{2}-4y-4=0所以y_{1}+y_{2}=4,y_{1}y_{2}=-4.\therefore\DeltaAOB的面积S=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times\sqrt{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}}=2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知直线$y=\frac{b}{3}$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$交于$B$、$C$两点,且$B C$为直径的圆恰好经过椭圆的右焦点$F$,则该椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;I: Line;B: Point;C: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(I) = (y = b/3);Intersection(I, G) = {B, C};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(B,C),H);RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F,H);F:Point
process: 根据题意画出草图,根据直线y=\frac{b}{3}与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)交于B,C两点,且BC为直径的圆恰好经过椭圆的右焦点F,可得\overrightarrow{FB}\bot\overrightarrow{CF},即可求得答案.详解]根据题意画出草图\because直线y=\frac{b}{3}与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)交于B,C两点,且BC为直径的圆恰好经过椭圆的右焦点F_{AB}\bot\frac{-}{C}\because\overrightarrow{FB}\bot\overrightarrow{CF}_{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{y=\frac{b}{3}}与\frac{\frac{x}{a^{2}}}=1(a>b>0)联立方程:则\begin{cases}y=\frac{b}{3}\\\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases}解得:x=\pm\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a\thereforeB(-\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a,\frac{b}{3}),C(\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a,\frac{b}{3})两点可得\overrightarrow{FB}=(-\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a-c,\frac{b}{3}),\overrightarrow{FC}=(\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a-c,\frac{b}{3})由\overrightarrow{FB}\bot\overrightarrow{CF},可得\overrightarrow{FB}\cdot\overrightarrow{CF}=0即(-\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a-c,\frac{b}{3}).(\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a-c,\frac{b}{3})=02-\frac{8}{9}a^{2}+\frac{b^{2}}{9}=0,即\frac{8}{9}c^{2}-\frac{7}{9}a^{2}=0\thereforec^{2}-\frac{7}{9}^{a^{2}+\frac{5}{9}}=0,叫\frac{c}{a^{2}}=\frac{7}{8},故e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{14}}{4}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点，点$P$在双曲线右支上且满足$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，双曲线的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 4 y=0$，则$\cos \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (3*x + pm*(4*y) = 0)
process: 设双曲线的半焦距为c,因为双曲线的渐近线方程为3x\pm4y=0,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{4}则c=\sqrt{a^{2+b^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2}+\frac{9}{16}a^{2}}=\frac{5}{4}a,因为,在\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,|PF_{1}|=2c+2a,由余弦定理可得\cos\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{(2c)^{2}+(2c+2a)^{2}-(2c)^{2}}{2\times2c(2c+2a)}=\frac{a+c}{2c}=\frac{a+\frac{5}{4}a}{\frac{5}{2}a}=\frac{9}{10}

process: 因方程\frac{x2}{m^{2}+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1表示双曲线,则m<0,方程可写成:\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}+1}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1令双曲线的半焦距为c,则c^{2}=m^{2}+1+(-m),双曲线的离心率e有:e^{2}=\frac{m^{2}+1+(-m)}{m^{2+1}}=1+\frac{-m}{m^{2}+1}=1+\frac{1}{-m+\frac{1}{m}}\leqslant1\frac{1}{2\sqrt{-m\cdot\frac{1}{m}}}=\frac{3}{2},当且仅当\frac{1}{e\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}}即m=-1时取“=”,所以所求离心率的取值范围是(1,\frac{\sqrt{6}}{4}

process: 试题分析:由题意可得双曲线的焦点在x轴上,将双曲线的方程化为标准方程,求得a,b,c,解k的方程可得所求值.由题意可得双曲线的焦点在x轴上,可得双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{k}\cdoty^{2}=1,(k>0)即有a^{2}=\frac{1}{k},b^{2}=1,c^{2}=1+\frac{1}{k}由一个焦点的坐标是(2,0)解得k=\frac{1}{3}.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , 过点$F_{2}$作直线交椭圆于$M$、$N$两点，线段$M N$长度的最小值为$3$. 若$|\overrightarrow{N F_{2}}|=\lambda|\overrightarrow{F_{2} M}|(\lambda \in[1,2])$，则弦长$M N$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;H: Line;M: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;lambda: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};Min(Length(LineSegmentOf(M, N))) = 3;Abs(VectorOf(N, F2)) = lambda*Abs(VectorOf(F2, M));In(lambda, [1, 2]);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M, N), G)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，点$O$是原点，若$|A F|=3$，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 3
process: 根据已知条件不妨设A在第一象限,根据抛物线定义以及方程,求出A点坐标,进而得出直线AF方程,与抛物线方程联立,求出B点坐标,即可求出AOB的面积.抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点为F(1,0),\because|AF|=3,\therefore点A到准线l:x=-1的距离为3点A的横坐标为2,根据对称性不妨设点A在第一象限,设A(2,y_{1})(y_{1}>0),B(x_{2},y_{2})x=2代入抛物线方程得y_{1}=2\sqrt{2}直线AF方程为y=2\sqrt{2}(x-1),联立\begin{cases}y=2\sqrt{2}(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},消去x得,y^{2}-\sqrt{2}y-4=0,解得y=2\sqrt{2},y_{2}=-\sqrt{2}\therefore\DeltaAOB的面积为_{S}=\frac{1}{2}\times|OF|\times|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times3\sqrt{2}=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)  (m>0)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}$=$1$的左顶点为$A$. 若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$AM$平行，则实数$a$等于?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);M: Point;a: Real;m:Number;m>0;p: Number;p>0;Distance(M,Focus(H))=5;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a=1);A:Point;LeftVertex(G)=A;Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),LineOf(A,M))

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上一点$P$到左焦点的距离为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则$P$到左准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = sqrt(3)/2
process: 由\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1可得a=\sqrt{3},c=1,设椭圆的左焦点,右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2}椭圆上点P到右准线的距离为d.则\frac{|PF_{1}}{d}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}},所以_{d}=\sqrt{3}|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{3}{2}.

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=-2 p y(p>0)$上各点到直线$3 x+4 y-12=0$的最短距离为$1$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;P: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -2*p*y);Expression(H) = (3*x + 4*y - 12 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Min(Distance(P, H)) = 1
process: 由题意直线3x+4y-12=0与抛物线x^{2}=-2py(p>0)相离,可得0<p<\frac{32}{3}.设点P(x,y)是抛物线x^{2}=-2py(p>0)上的点,则y=-\frac{1}{2p}x^{2}.根据点到直线的距离公式求出点P到直线3x+4y-12=0的距离d,由题意d_{\min}=1,即可求出p.由题意直线3x+4y-12=0与抛物线x^{2}=-2py(p>0)相离.由\begin{cases}3x+4y-12=0\\x2=-2pv\end{cases}得x^{2}-\frac{3p}{2}x+6p=0,则_{A}=(-\frac{3p}{2})^{2}-4\times6p<0,\therefore0<p<\frac{32}{3}设点P(x,y)是抛物线x^{2}=-2py(p>0)上的点,\thereforey=-\frac{1}{2n}x^{2}点P到直线3x+4y-12=0的距离\therefored=\frac{\frac{2}{p}(x-\frac{3p}{4})^{2}-(\frac{9p}{8}-1}{\sqrt{5}}

text: 已知双曲线$c$的渐近线方程为$x \pm \sqrt{3}y=0$，且双曲线$c$的右焦点在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-8 x-2 y+16=0$上，则双曲线$c$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: c: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(c)) = (x + pm*sqrt(3)*y = 0);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (-2*y - 8*x + x^2 + y^2 + 16 = 0);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(c), G)

text: 椭圆的中心在坐标原点，离心率等于$\frac{1}{2}$，抛物线$y^{2}=-4 x$的准线$l$过它的一个焦点，则椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = -4*x);l: Line;Directrix(H) = l;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), l)

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$右焦点$F$的直线$l$交椭圆短轴于点$Q$，交椭圆于$M$、$N$两点，若$\overrightarrow{F M}=\lambda \overrightarrow{M Q}$, $\overrightarrow{F N}=\mu \overrightarrow{N Q}$，则$\lambda \mu$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);Q: Point;Intersection(l, MinorAxis(G)) = Q;M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {M, N};lambda: Number;mu: Number;VectorOf(F, M) = lambda*VectorOf(M, Q);VectorOf(F, N) = mu*VectorOf(N, Q)
process: 由题知F(\sqrt{3},0),直线l的斜率存在,设方程为y=k(x-\sqrt{3}),则Q(0,-\sqrt{3}k)由于点Q在短轴上,故-1<-\sqrt{3}k<1,即-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}<k<\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},联立方程\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1\\y=k(x-\sqrt{3})\end{cases}得(4k^{2}+1)x^{2}-8\sqrt{3}k^{2}x+12k^{2}-4=0设M(x_{1},y_{1}),N(x_{2},y_{2}),所以x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{8\sqrt{3}k^{2}}{|4k^{2}+1}|,x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{12k^{2}-4}{4k^{2}+1},\overrightarrow{FM}=(x_{1}-\sqrt{3},y_{1}),\overrightarrow{MQ}=(-x_{1},-\sqrt{3}k-y_{1}),\overrightarrow{FN}=(x_{2}-\sqrt{3},y_{2}),\overrightarrow{NQ}=(-x_{2},-\sqrt{3}k-y_{2})因为\overrightarrow{FM}=\lambda\overrightarrow{MQ},\overrightarrow{FN}=\mu\overrightarrow{NQ},所以_{\lambda}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{x_{1}}-1'\mu=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{x_{2}}-1所以_{n}=(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}-1)(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}-1)=-(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{x_{2}}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{x_{1}})+1=\frac{3-\sqrt{3}(x_{1}+x_{2})}{x_{1}2}+1=\frac{3-\sqrt{3}(x_{1}+x_{2})}{x_{1}x_{2}}+1=\frac{3-12k^{2}}{12k^{2}-4}+1=-\frac{1}{12k^{2}-4}所以-\frac{3}{12k^{2}-4}\geqslant\frac{1}{4},故12k^{2}-4\in[-4,0)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{2} x$，则它的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(2)*x))

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$在$C$的右支上，$O$为坐标原点，若存在点$P$，使$|P F|=|O F|$，且$\cos \angle O F P=\frac{1}{4}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Cos(AngleOf(O, F, P)) = 1/4
process: 在焦点三角形中由余弦定理求得a,c关系,再求离心率设双曲线的左焦点为E,在\triangleEFP中,|EF|=2c,|PF|=c,|PE|=2a+c,\cos\angleEFP=\frac{1}{4}由余弦定理\cos\angleEFP=\frac{4c^{2}+c^{2}-(c+2a)^{2}}{2\cdot2c\cdotc}=\frac{1}{4},得e=\frac{c}{a}=2.

fact_expressions: P: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;H1: Circle;Expression(H1) = (y^2 + (x + 1)^2 = 1);H2: Circle;Expression(H2) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);Q: Point;R: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, H1) = True;PointOnCurve(R, H2) = True

text: 以原点为顶点，$x$轴为对称轴，并且经过$P(-2,-4)$的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G) = xAxis;G: Parabola;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-2, -4);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 设抛物线的标准方程,再代入P(-2,-4)求解即可由题,设抛物线方程为y^{2}=2px,代入P(-2,-4)有(-4)^{2}=2p(-2)\Rightarrowp=-4故抛物线y^{2}=-8x.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{6}}{3}$，顶点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的焦点相同,那么该双曲线的焦点坐标为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Ellipse;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/8 + y^2/5 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2*sqrt(6)/3;Vertex(G) = Focus(H)

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，若椭圆上存在点$P$，使$\angle A_{1} P A_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;LeftVertex(C) = A1;RightVertex(C) = A2;A1: Point;A2: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;P: Point;AngleOf(A1, P, A2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 如图,当P在上顶点时,\angleA_{1}PA_{2}最大,此时,\angleA_{1}PA_{2}\geqslant120^{\circ}即可,\angleA_{2}PO\geqslant60^{\circ},\tan\angleA_{2}PO=\frac{a}{b}\geqslant\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},即a\geqslant\sqrt{3}b.a^{2}\geqslant3b^{2},a^{2}\geqslant3(a^{2}-c^{2}),2a^{2}\leqslant3c^{2},\frac{c}{a}\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}e\in[\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},1

text: 平面内动点$P$到两定点$F_{1}(-2,0)$,$F_{2}(2,0)$的距离之差为$m$，若动点$P$的轨迹是双曲线，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G:Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;m:Number;P:Point;Coordinate(F1)=(-2,0);Coordinate(F2)=(2, 0);Distance(P,F1)-Distance(P,F2)=m;Locus(P)=G
process: 双曲线中满足a<c,由题意得|P_{1}F_{1}-P_{1}F_{2}|=2a<4,即|m|<4且m\neq0则m的取值范围是(-4,0)\cup(0,4)

fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(H) = e1;Eccentricity(G) = e2

text: 一个圆圆心为椭圆右焦点，且该圆过椭圆中心，交椭圆于$P$，直线$PF_{1}$($F_{1}$为该椭圆左焦点) 是此圆切线，则椭圆离心率为?
fact_expressions: G:Ellipse;H:Circle;P:Point;F1:Point;Center(H)=RightFocus(G);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H);Intersection(H,G)=P;LeftFocus(G)=F1;IsTangent(LineOf(P,F1),H)

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-y+1=0$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点,若椭圆上存在一点$P$使得$\Delta P A B$面积最大则点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);Expression(l)=(x-y+1=0);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};PointOnCurve(P,G);WhenMax(Area(TriangleOf(P,A,B)))

text: 已知$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{75}=1$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的焦点，$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/75 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 利用余弦定理以及椭圆的定义可得PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=\frac{100}{3},再由三角形面积公式可得结果[详解]在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,F_{1}F_{2}2=PF_{1}2+PF_{2}2-2PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}\cos60^{\circ}即200=PF_{1}2+PF_{2}2-PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2},\textcircled{1}由椭圆的定义,得2a=PF_{1}+PF_{2}300=PF_{1}2+PF_{2}2+2PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2},得PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=\frac{100}{3}\thereforeS\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{25\sqrt{3}}{2}答案:\frac{25\sqrt{3}}{3}.

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点且与$x$轴垂直的直线，交该双曲线的两条渐近线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);A: Point;B: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};Intersection(H, l1) = A;Intersection(H, l2) = B
process: 由双曲线方程求出右焦点为F(2,0),然后把x=2代入双曲线的渐近线方程中求出y的值,可得AB两点的纵坐标,从而可求出|AB|的值[详解]双曲线的右焦点为F(2,0),过F与x轴垂直的直线为x=2,渐近线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=0,将x=2代入x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=0,得y^{2}=12,y=\pm2\sqrt{3},故|AB|=4\sqrt{3}故答客为:4.2营】此题考查双曲线的性质,尾干其科题

text: 经过抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点作直线交抛物线于$A(x_{1} , y_{1})$ ${B}(x_{2}, y_{2})$两点，若$y_{1}+y_{2}=5$，则线段$A B$的长等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;y1: Number;x2: Number;y2: Number;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);y1 + y2 = 5
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (k*y^2 + 5*x^2 = 5);k: Number;F1: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;Coordinate(F1) = (0, 2)
process: 试题分析:椭圆的标准方程为:x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{5}{k}}=1的一个焦点为(0,2),所以\frac{5}{k}-1=4\Rightarrowk=1

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$A$为$C$上的动点，点$P$在线段$F_{1} A$的延长线上，且$(\overrightarrow{A P}+\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=0$，则$P$到$y$轴距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F1, A))) = True;DotProduct(VectorOf(A, F2) + VectorOf(A, P), VectorOf(F2, P)) = 0
process: 取F_{2}P的中点Q,连接AQ,\overrightarrow{AP}+\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}=2\overrightarrow{AQ},则\overrightarrow{AQ}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=0,可知|AP|=|AF_{2}|,由椭圆定义可知|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=|AF_{1}|+|AP|=|F_{1}P|=4,则点P的轨迹是以F_{1}为圆心,以4为半径的圆,由图可知当点P和点M重合时,到y轴距离最大值为5.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，过其右焦点$F$作渐近线的垂线，垂足为$B$，交$y$轴于点$P$，交另一条渐近线于点$A $,并且点$P$位于点$A$、$B$之间. 已知$O$为原点，且$|O A|=\frac{5}{3} a$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B:Point;P: Point;F:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);l:Line;l1:Line;l2:Line;RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, l);IsPerpendicular(l,l1);FootPoint(l,l1)=B;Intersection(l,yAxis)=P;Intersection(l,l2)=A;Between(P,A,B)=True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = (5/3)*a;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l2;Negation(l1=l2)

text: 在椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$中, 斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线交椭圆于左顶点$A$和另一点$B$，点$B$在$x$轴上的射影恰好为右焦点$F$，若椭圆离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$, 则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A:Point;B: Point;F: Point;e:Number;k:Number;a > b;b > 0;k>0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;Slope(G)=k;LeftVertex(C)=A;Intersection(G,C)={A,B};Projection(B, xAxis) = F;Eccentricity(C) = e ;e= 1/3
process: 试题分析:因为椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{1}{3},所以\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{3},所以c=\frac{1}{3}a,b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}a'因为点B在x轴上的射影恰好为右焦点F,所以点_{B(c},\frac{b^{2}}{a}),又A(-a,0),所以k=\frac{b^{2}}{c+a}=\frac{\frac{8}{9}a}{\frac{1}{2}a+a}=\frac{2}{3}

text: 已知$A$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点，$O$为坐标原点，若直线$l$: $x=2 c$上存在点$P$使得$\angle A P O=45^{\circ}$，则椭圆离心率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;c:Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(G)=A;Expression(l)=(x=2*c);PointOnCurve(P,l);AngleOf(A,P,O)=ApplyUnit(45,degree)
process: 设P(2c,t),则利用直线AP,OP倾斜角及两角差的正切可得\frac{at}{t^{2}+2c(2c+a)}=1在R上有解,该分式方程可转化为一元二次方程,利用判别式可得a,c的不等式,从而可求离心率的最大值设P(2c,t),右焦点为F.因为直线l:x=2c上存在点P使得\angleAPO=45^{\circ}故\frac{at}{t^{2}+2c(2c+a)}=1在R上有解即t^{2}-at+2c(2c+a)=0在R上有解所以a^{2}-8c(2c+a)\geqslant0即16e^{2}+8e-1\leqslant0,故_{0}<e\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}-1}{4}故离心率的最大值为\underline{\sqrt{2}-1}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点为$A$，以$A$为圆心，$b$为半径做圆，圆$A$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线相交于$M$、$N$两点，若$\overrightarrow{O M}=\frac{3}{2} \overrightarrow{O N}$($O$为坐标原点)，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;RightVertex(C) = A;A1: Circle;Center(A1) = A;Radius(A1) = b;M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(A1, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = {M, N};O: Origin;VectorOf(O, M) = (3/2)*VectorOf(O, N)
process: 双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的右顶点为A(a,0)以A为圆心,b为半径做圆A,圆A与双曲线C的一条渐近线交于M、N两点则点A到渐近线bx-ay=0的距离为AB=\frac{ab}{c}\because\overrightarrow{OM}=\frac{3}{2}\overrightarrow{ON},\thereforeOB=5BN=\frac{5b^{2}}{c},\becauseOA=a\thereforea^{2}=\frac{25b^{4}}{c^{2}}+\frac{a2b^{2}}{c^{2}},.a^{2}c^{2}=25b^{4}+a^{2}b^{2},\thereforea^{2}(c^{2}-b^{2})=25b^{4},\thereforea^{2}=5b^{2}=5c^{2}-5a^{2},即6a^{2}=5c^{2},即\sqrt{6}a=\sqrt{5}c,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{\sqrt{30}}{5}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过右焦点$F_{2}$作双曲线其中一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$P$，连接$P F_{1}$，若$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;L: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, L);IsPerpendicular(L, OneOf(Asymptote(G)));FootPoint(L, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作垂直于$x$轴的直线，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则以$F$为圆心，$A B$为直径的圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G:Parabola;H: Circle;l: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;Focus(G)=F;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(F,l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};Center(H)=F;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H)
process: 因为抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F为(1,0),通径长为|AB|=2p=4,所以以F为圆心,AB为直径的圆的方程是(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=4.

text: 过抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点$F$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，点$A$在第一象限，若$|A F|=3|B F|$，则直线$l$的倾斜角为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A)=1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 过A,B作AA,BB垂直准线x=-\frac{p}{2},垂足为A,B,过B作AA垂线,垂足为C,利用抛物线的定义,即可得答案;过A,B作AA,BB垂直准线x=-\frac{p}{2},垂足为A,B,过B作AA垂线,垂足为C由抛物线定义知|BF|=|BB|,|AF|=|AA|,|BF|=\frac{1}{4}|AB|.所以|AC|=|AA|-|BB|=|AF|-|BF|=2|BF|=\frac{1}{2}|AB|.又因为BC\botAA,所以\angleBAC=60^{\circ},即直线l的倾斜角为60^{\circ}

fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P1: Point;P2: Point;PointOnCurve(P1, C) ;PointOnCurve(P2, C) ;YCoordinate(P1) = y1;YCoordinate(P2) = y2;y1^2 + y2^2 = 8;y1:Number;y2:Number

text: 已知$A$、$B$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两个点，$O$是坐标原点，若$|O A|=|O B|$，且$\Delta A O B$的垂心恰是抛物线的焦点，则$\Delta A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, B));Orthocenter(TriangleOf(A,O,B))=Focus(G)

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=\frac{1}{3} y$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = y/3)
process: 根据抛物线的方程,得到p的值,然后得到其准线方程.因为抛物线方程为:x^{2}=\frac{1}{3}y,所以2p=\frac{1}{3},即p=\frac{1}{6}所以准线方程为y=-\frac{p}{2}=-\frac{1}{12}

text: 设$F$是抛物线$C_{1}$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，点$A$是抛物线$C_{1}$与双曲线$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y 2}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的一个公共点，且$A F \perp x$轴，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C1: Parabola;Expression(C1) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C1) = F;C2: Hyperbola;Expression(C2) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;OneOf(Intersection(C1, OneOf(Asymptote(C2)))) = A;A: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), xAxis) = True

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 试题分析:设|PF_{1}|=m_{1}|PF_{2}|=n(m>n),\thereforem-n=2a=8\because(2c)^{2}=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos60^{\circ},\thereforemn=36,则\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}mn\sin60^{\circ}=9\sqrt{3}.

text: 抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2)
process: 试题分析:抛物线的标准方程是x^{2}=\frac{1}{4}y,所以准线方程是y=-\frac{1}{16}

text: 以抛物线$y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点为圆心，半径为$\sqrt{7}$的圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -4*x);H: Circle;Focus(G) = Center(H);Radius(H) = sqrt(7)
process: 因为抛物线y^{2}=-4x的焦点为(-1,0),所以所求圆的标准方程为(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=7

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$: $x+y+\sqrt{2}=0$，抛物线上一动点$P$到直线$l$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (x + y + sqrt(2) = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 设与直线l平行且与抛物线相切的直线方程为x+y+m=0,由\begin{cases}x+y+m=0\\y2=4x\end{cases},得y^{2}+4y+4m=0,则\triangle=16-16m=0,得m=1,所以切线方程为x+y+1=0,所以抛物线上一动点P到直线l的距离的最小值为d=\frac{|\sqrt{2}-1|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/2 = 1)
process: 试题分析:由双曲线方程可知a^{2}=4,b^{2}=2,\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=6,\thereforea=2,c=\sqrt{6},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}

text: 已知点$P(1,1)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$某条弦的中点，则此弦所在的直线的一般方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;P:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3=1);MidPoint(H)=P;Coordinate(P) = (1,1);IsChordOf(H,G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过点$F$作双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$H$，点$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{F P}=3 \overrightarrow{F H}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;P: Point;H: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;l:Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);IsPerpendicular(l, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(l, OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=H;PointOnCurve(P, C);VectorOf(F, P) = 3*VectorOf(F, H)
process: 根据向量条件,求出P的坐标,代入双曲线方程,即可得出结论由题意,设P(x,y),直线FH的方程为y=\frac{a}{b}(x+c)与渐近线y=-\frac{b}{a}x联立,可得H的坐标为(-\frac{c^{2}}{a},\frac{ab}{c}).\because\overrightarrow{FP}=3\overrightarrow{FH},即\begin{cases}x+c=\\y=\frac{3ab}{c}\end{cases}-\frac{a^{2}}{c}+c\therefore\begin{cases}x=-\frac{3a^{2}}{c}+2c\\y=\frac{3ab}{c}\end{cases}代入双曲线方程可得,\frac{(-\frac{3a^{2}}{c}+2c)^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{9a^{2}}{c^{2}}=1'化简可得\frac{4c^{2}}{a^{2}}=13,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$2$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知点$F$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，且过点$F$的直线$y=2 x-4$与此双曲线只有一个交点，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x - 4);RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F, H);NumIntersection(H,G)=1
process: 2x-4=0,得x=2即F(2,0)由过点F的直线y=2x-4与此双曲线只有一个交点可知渐近线斜率\frac{b}{a}=2,c=2,a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2}所以a^{2}=\frac{4}{5},b^{2}=\frac{16}{5},双曲线的方程为\frac{5x^{2}}{4}.\frac{5y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 已知$m>0$ , $A(0, \sqrt{m+1})$ , $B(0,-\sqrt{m+1})$. 若直线$y=3 x$上存在一点$P$，使得$|P B|-|P A|=2$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 3*x);Coordinate(A) = (0, sqrt(m + 1));Coordinate(B) = (0, -sqrt(m + 1));m > 0;PointOnCurve(P, G);-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 2;m: Number
process: 因为|PB|-|PA|=2,所以P的轨迹是以A,B为焦点,实轴长为2的双曲线的上支该双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{\sqrt{m}}x因为直线y=3x上存在一点P,使得|PB|-|PA|=2,所以3>\frac{1}{\sqrt{m}},解得m>\frac{1}{9}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点的距离到焦点的距离为$5$，则这点的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);D: Point;PointOnCurve(D, G) = True;Distance(D, Focus(G)) = 5
process: 由抛物线定义得x+1=5,\thereforex=4\thereforey^{2}=4\times4\Rightarrowy=\pm4,即这点的坐标为(4,\pm4)

text: 过抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，$E$在点$A$、$B$处的切线分别与$y$轴交于$C$、$D$两点，则$4 \sqrt{2}|C D|-|A B|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;E: Parabola;C: Point;D: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(E), l);Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};Intersection(TangentOnPoint(A,E), yAxis) = C;Intersection(TangentOnPoint(B,E),yAxis)=D
process: 由y^{2}=4x,y=2\sqrt{x},求导,y=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x}},设A(x_{1},y_{1})B(x_{2},y_{2}),则过A点的切线的斜率k=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x_{1}}},则切线方程y-y_{1}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{x_{1}}}(x-x_{1})令x=0,解得:y=\sqrt{x_{1}},则C(0,\sqrt{x_{1}})同理可得D(0,-\sqrt{x_{2}}),则|CD|=\sqrt{x_{1}}+\sqrt{x_{2}}设直线AB的方程:y=k(x-1),联立\begin{cases}y=k(x\\v2=4x\end{cases}整理得:k^{2}x^{2}-2(k^{2}+2)x+k^{2}=0,则x_{1}x_{2}=1\therefore|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=(\sqrt{x_{1}}+\sqrt{x_{2}})^{2}则4\sqrt{2}|CD|-|AB|=4\sqrt{2}(\sqrt{x_{1}}+\sqrt{x_{2}})-(\sqrt{x_{1}}+\sqrt{x_{2}})^{2}设\sqrt{x}+\sqrt{x_{2}}=t,t\geqslant2,设f(t)=4\sqrt{2}t-t^{2}=-(t-2\sqrt{2})^{2}+8,t\geqslant2.\therefore当t=2\sqrt{2}时,f(t)取最大值,最大值为8,\therefore4\sqrt{2}|CD|-|AB|的最大值为8,数答客为:8.

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;E: Circle;M: Point;N: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Expression(C) = (x^2/4+y^2/3=1);Expression(E)=((x-4)^2+(y-3)^2=1);PointOnCurve(M,C);PointOnCurve(N,E)
process: 如图,M为椭圆C上任意一点,N为圆E:(x-4)^{2}+(y-3)^{2}=1上任意一点则|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=4,|MN|\geqslant|ME|-1(当且仅当M、N、E共线时取等号)\begin{matrix}\therefore&\\|MN|-|MF_{1}|=|MN|-(4-|MF_{2}|)=|MN|+|MF_{2}|-4\geqslant|ME|+|MF_{2}|-5\geqslant|EF_{2}|-5当且仅当M、N、E、F_{2}共线时等号成立.\becauseF_{2}(1,0),E(4,3),则EF_{1}=\sqrt{(4-1)^{2}+(3-0)^{2}}=3\sqrt{2}\thereforeMN|-|MF|的最小值为3\sqrt{2}-5.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的点到直线$x-y+4=0$的最小距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P0: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x - y + 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P0, G)
process: 设抛物线y^{2}=4x上的点P的坐标为(\frac{t^{2}}{4},t)则点P到直线x-y+4=0的距离为d==\frac{|\frac{1}{4}(t-2)^{2}+3|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\frac{1}{4}(t-2)^{2}+3}{\sqrt{2}}\geqslant\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点$O$的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于点$A$、$B$，且$2|F O|=|A B|$，若$\angle B A F=\frac{\pi}{6}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;O: Origin;l: Line;PointOnCurve(O, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, O)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B));AngleOf(B, A, F) = pi/6
process: 设右焦点为F,连接AF,BF因为2|OF|=|AB|=2c,即|FF|=|AB|,可得四边形AFBF为矩形Rt\triangleABF中,\begin{matrix}\\AF\end{matrix}=2c\cdot\cos\angleBAF=2c\cdot\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\sqrt{3}c,|BF|=2c\cdot\sin\angleBAF=2c\cdot\frac{1}{2}=c由椭圆的定义可得|AF|+|AF|=2a,所以2a=(\sqrt{3}+1)c,所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}+1}=\sqrt{3}-1

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，且与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=4$，若$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为$1$，则$p$的值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(Focus(C), l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), yAxis) = 1
process: 由题意,抛物线C:y^{2}=2px的焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0),设直线l方程为x=my+\frac{p}{2},A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立方程组\begin{cases}x=my+\\y2=2px\end{cases}x=my+\frac{p}{2},整理得y^{2}-2pmy-p^{2}=0,所以y_{1}+y_{2}=2pm,则x_{1}+x_{2}=m(y_{1}+y_{2})+p=2pm^{2}+p,因为|AB|=4,可得|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2pm^{2}+2p=4,即p(m^{2}+1)=2又由AB的中点到y轴的距离为1,可得\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{2pm^{2}+p}{2}=1,即p(2m^{2}+1)=2,联立方程组,可得m=0,此时p=2.

text: 已知抛物线的顶点为原点，对称轴为坐标轴，并且经过点$M(-5 ,-10)$，则抛物线的标准方程为?

process: 解析过程略

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率为$2$，则它的一个焦点到一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2
process: 由双曲线离心率为2,得\sqrt{1+m}=2,即m=3,故双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1焦点坐标为(2,0),渐近线方程为:y=\pm\sqrt{3}x.故焦点到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{|2\sqrt{3}+0|}{1+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}=\sqrt{3},

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 m x(m>0)$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的一条渐近线的距离为$3$，则此抛物线的方程?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*m*x);m: Number;m>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Distance(Focus(H),OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 3
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4mx(m>0)的焦点为F(m,0)双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的渐近线方程为3x\pm4y=0,则F(m,0)到渐近线的距离为\frac{|3m|}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}}=\frac{3m}{5}=3\Rightarrowm=5,所以抛物线的方程为y^{2}=20x

process: 抛物线x^{2}=16y的焦点在y轴上,且\frac{p}{2}=4,故其准线方程为:y=-4,

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的实轴长为$8$，右焦点为$F$、$M$是双曲线$C$的一条渐近线上的点，且$O M \perp M F$，$O$为坐标原点，若$S_{\triangle O M F}=6$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Length(RealAxis(C)) = 8;RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(M,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, M), LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(O,M,F)) = 6
process: 由实轴长为8,则a=4,OM\botMF,则MF=b,在直角\triangleOFM中,OF=c,则OM=a,则S_{\triangleOFM}=\frac{1}{2}ab=6,可求得b,从而可得双曲线的离心率.双曲线的实轴长为8,则a=4,OM\botMF,即MF为焦点到渐近线的距离所以MF=b,又OF=c,所以在直角\triangleOFM中,OM=a则S_{\triangleOFM}=\frac{1}{2}ab=6,得b=3,c=:所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{4}

text: 设双曲线的焦点在坐标轴上，两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),axis) = True;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/3));e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 分析:根据双曲线的渐近线方程,设出双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-y^{2}=m(m\neq0),对m进行分类讨论,可以得出双曲线的离心率分别为\sqrt{10}或\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}.详双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{3}x,可设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-y^{2}=m(m\neq0当m>0时,双曲线的焦点在x轴上,此时e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{10}{9},e=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}当m<0时,双曲线的焦点在y轴上,此时e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=10,e=\sqrt{10}综上,双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{10}或\frac{\sqrt{10}}{3}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$，左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$|\overrightarrow{B F_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;B: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 试题分析:由椭圆方程知,c=\sqrt{9-4}=\sqrt{5},又根据椭圆的定义知|BF_{2}|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{1}|+|AF_{1}|=6,即|BF_{2}|+|AF_{2}|+|AB|=12,所以当|AB|最小时,即AB垂直x轴时,|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}|最大,此时易知|AB|=\frac{8}{3},所以|\overrightarrow{BF_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}|最大值12-\frac{8}{3}=\frac{28}{3},以答案应填:\frac{28}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点$O$的直线与$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，连接$B F$，若$|O A|=|O F|=5$ ,$|B F|=8$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;B: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(O, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F)) = 5;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 8
process: 记双曲线的右焦点为F_{1},连结AF_{1},BF_{1},因为A,B两点关于原点O对称,且都在双曲线C上.可得|OA|=|OB|=5,|AF|=|BF_{1}|;又|OF|=|OF_{1}|=5.所以|F_{1}F_{2}|=|AB|,即四边形AF_{1}BF_{2}为矩形;因此AF\botBF所以|AF|=\sqrt{10^{2}-8^{2}}=6,所以|AF_{1}|-|AF|=2a=2,即a=1又c=|OF|=5,所以离心率为\frac{c}{a}=5.

text: 若直线$y=k x+1$与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$有且只有一个公共点，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 已知点$A(0,-2)$，椭圆$E$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$ , $F$是椭圆的焦点，直线$A F$的斜率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$ , $E$的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0,-2);Eccentricity(E) = sqrt(3)/2;Focus(E) = F;Slope(LineOf(A,F))=2*sqrt(3)/3
process: 依题意F(c,0),则\begin{cases}\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\\\frac{-2-0}{0-c}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\\a^{2}b^{2}+c^{3}\end{cases}解得a=2,b=1,c=\sqrt{3}所以椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{12-m}=1(0<m<12)$的一条渐近线的斜率$k>\sqrt{2}$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(12 - m) + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;0 < m;m < 12;k: Number;Slope(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = k;k > sqrt(2)
process: 因为\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{12-m}=1(0<m<12)的一条渐近线的斜率k>\sqrt{2}所以\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{12-m}{m}>2,所以m<4,又0<m<12,所以m的取值范围是(0,4)

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，右顶点为$A$，点$P$为$C$上一动点，若$|P F|$的最大值为$3$，最小值为$1$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;RightVertex(C) = A;PointOnCurve(P, C);Max(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))) = 3;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))) = 1
process: 求出椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,设P(x,y),求出\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}=\frac{1}{4}(x-2)^{2},再利用二次函数的图象和性质求解.并解]由题得\begin{cases}a+c=3\\a-c=1\end{cases},\thereforea=2,c=1,\thereforeb=\sqrt{3},\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,\thereforey^{2}=3-\frac{3}{4}x^{2}设P(x,y),因为F(-1,0),A(2,0),所以\overrightarrow{PA}=(2-x,-y),\overrightarrow{PF}=(-1-x,-y)所以\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}=(2-x)(-1-x)+y^{2}=x^{2}+y^{2}-x-2=x^{2}+3-\frac{3}{4}x^{2}-x-2=\frac{1}{4}x^{2}-x+1=(\frac{1}{2}x-1)^{2}=\frac{1}{4}(x-2)^{2},因为-2\leqslantx\leqslant2,\thereforex=-2时\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}的最大值为4.

text: 已知点$(-2 , 3)$与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的距离是$5$，则$p$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$在双曲线上，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则点$P$到$x$轴的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 不妨设P在双曲线的右支上,|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,则\begin{cases}m-n=4\\m^{2}+n^{2}=64\end{cases}mn=24,点P到x轴的距离等于h,利用等面积可得\frac{1}{2}\times8\timesh=\frac{1}{2}mn\thereforeh=3

text: 若过双曲线焦点且与双曲线实轴线垂直的弦的长等于焦点到渐近线距离的$2$倍，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L: LineSegment;IsChordOf(L, G);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), L);IsPerpendicular(L, RealAxis(G));Length(L) = 2*Distance(Focus(G), Asymptote(G))
process: 设双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)不妨设F(c,0),一条渐近线为ay-bx=0可得焦点到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{|0-bc|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b过双曲线焦点且与实轴垂直的弦的长等于\frac{2b^{2}}{a}\because过双曲线焦点且与双曲线实轴线垂直的弦的长等于焦点到渐近线距离的2倍\therefore\frac{2b^{2}}{解得a=b}\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{2}a,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}a}{a}=\sqrt{2}原的有1本题给出双曲线满足的条件,求双曲线的离心率.若重考查了双曲线的标准方程与简单几何性质等知识,属于基础题

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Focus(G) = Focus(H)
process: 由椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,故焦点为(4,0),(-4,0)设双曲线的半焦距为c,则c=4,因双曲线的离心率为2,则e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{4}{a}=2故a=2,所以b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=2\sqrt{3}所以双曲线的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点且斜率为$1$的直线$l$与此抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);Slope(l) = 1;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point
process: \because直线过抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点(1,0),且斜率为1\therefore直线的方程为y=x-1设A(x_{1},y),B(x_{2},y_{2}),抛物线的焦点为F\therefore根据抛物线的定义可得:|AB|=|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1联立方程组\begin{cases}y2=4x\\y=x-1'\end{cases}化简得x^{2}-6x+1=0\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=6\therefore|AB|=x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1=8

text: 已知$B$、$C$是两个定点，$|B C|=6$，且$\triangle A B C$的周长等于$16$，则顶点$A$的轨迹方程为?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$||F B|-| F A||$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = pi/4;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 易得抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F(1,0),准线为x=-1设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由\begin{cases}y=x-1\\y2=4x\end{cases},可得x^{2}-6x+1=0,解得x_{1}=3+2\sqrt{2},x_{2}=3-2\sqrt{2}由抛物线的定义可得|FB|-|FA|=|x_{1}+1-(x_{2}+1)|=4\sqrt{2}
