text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$，过焦点$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|>|B F|$，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;l: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Inclination(l)=ApplyUnit(60,degree);Intersection(l,C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) > Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点坐标为(\frac{p}{2},0)\because直线l倾斜角为60^{\circ}\therefore直线l的方程为:y-0=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2})设直线与抛物线的交点为A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})\therefore|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2},|BF|=x_{2}+\frac{p}{2},联立方程组,消去y并整理,得12x^{2}-20px+3p^{2}=0解得x_{1}=\frac{3p}{2},x_{2}=\frac{p}{6}\therefore|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=2p,|BF|=x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{2p}{3}\therefore|AF|:|BF|=3:1,\frac{|AF|}{BF}的值为3.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$M$在双曲线上且$M F_{1} \perp M F_{2}$，则点$M$到$x$轴的距离为?

text: 若椭圆上的点到其一个焦点的距离的最小值为$2$，最大值为$8$，则该椭圆的短轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P:Point;PointOnCurve(P,G);Min(Distance(P,OneOf(Focus(G))))=2;Max(Distance(P,OneOf(Focus(G))))=8
process: 不妨设椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),由题意可得\begin{cases}a+c=8\\a-c=2\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}a=5\\c=3\end{cases},则椭圆的短轴长度为:2b=2\sqrt{5^{2}-3^{2}}=8.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (k*x^2 + 3*(k*y^2) = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (-4,0);k: Number
process: 点(-4,0)是椭圆kx^{2}+3ky^{2}=1的一个焦点椭圆kx^{2}+3ky^{2}=1的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{k}+\frac{y^{2}}{3k}=1可得:\frac{1}{k}-\frac{1}{3k}=16,解得k=\frac{1}{24}

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=16$，且$|A F|<|B F|$则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 16;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) < Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 由题意可设过抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点F的直线方程为y=k(x-2)联立\begin{cases}y=k(x-2)\\y2=8x\end{cases},得k^{2}x^{2}-(4k^{2}+8)x+4k^{2}=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{4k^{2}+8}{k^{2}}\because|AB|=16\thereforex_{1}+2+x_{2}+2=16,即\frac{4k^{2}+8}{k^{2}}=12\thereforek^{2}=1,则x^{2}-12x+4=0.\therefore_{x=\frac{12\pm8\sqrt{2}}{2}}=6\pm4\sqrt{2}\thereforex_{1}=6-4\sqrt{2},x_{2}=6+4\sqrt{2}\therefore|AF|=6-4\sqrt{2}+2=8-4\sqrt{2}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两条渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1)

text: 若$A B$为过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$中心的弦，$F_{1}$为椭圆的焦点，则$\triangle F_{1} A B$面积的最大值为?

process: 设A的坐标(x,y),根据对称性得B(-x,-y),表示出4F_{1}AB面积,由图知,当A点在椭圆的顶点时,其AF_{1}AB面积最大,结合椭圆的标准方程,即可求出AF_{1}AB面积的最大值设A的坐标(x,y),则根据对称性得B(-x,-y)则AF_{1}AB面积S=\frac{1}{2}OF\times|y_{A}-y_{B}|=\frac{1}{2}OF\times|2y|=c|y|\therefore当|y|最大时,AF_{1}AB面积最大,由图知,当A点在椭圆的顶点时,其AF_{1}AB面积最大,则AF_{1}AB面积的最大值为cb=\sqrt{25-16}\times4=12,

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=a y  (a>0)$上一点$P(2 a , 4 a)$到焦点$F$的距离为$17$，则直线$P F$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = a*y);Coordinate(P) = (2*a, 4*a);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(P, F) = 17
process: 抛物线C:x^{2}=ay(a>0)上一点P(2a,4a)到焦点F的距离为17可得17=4a+\frac{a}{4}=\frac{17a}{4},解得a=4,抛物线方程为:x^{2}=4y,则F(0,1),P(8,16),k_{PF}=\frac{16-1}{8}=\frac{15}{8}则直线PF的方程为:y=\frac{15}{9}x+1,

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$，准线是$l$，点$P$是曲线$C$上的动点，点$P$到准线$l$的距离为$d$，点$A(1,6)$，则$|P A|+d$的最小值为?

process: 抛物线焦点F(4,0),准线x=-4,由抛物线定义|PF|=d,|PA|+d=|PA|+|PF|\geqslant|AF|=3\sqrt{5},当且仅当A,P,F三点共线时,取“=”号,此时,P位于抛物线上,\therefore|PA|+d的最小值为3\sqrt{5}[

text: 若椭圆两焦点为$F_{1}(-4 , 0)$ ,$F_{2}(4 , 0)$,点$P$在椭圆上，且$\Delta PF_{1} F_{2}$的面积的最大值为$12$，则此椭圆的方程是?

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = sqrt(3)/3
process: 由\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0知,PF_{1}\botPF_{2}由\tan\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}知,\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=30^{\circ}在Rt\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,|PF_{1}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|\cos30^{\circ},|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|\sin30^{\circ}\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}||F_{1}F_{2}|(\cos30^{\circ}+\sin30^{\circ})=(\sqrt{3}+1)c=2a,即e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}+1}=\sqrt{3}-1

text: 已知$A$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左顶点，$F$为双曲线$C$的右焦点，以实轴长为直径的圆交其中一条渐近线于点$P$(点$P$在第二象限)，$P A$平行于另一条渐近线，且$S_{\Delta O P A}=\sqrt{3}$，则$P F$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;G: Circle;Diameter(G) = Length(RealAxis(C));l1: Line;l2: Line;Intersection(G,l1) = P;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 2;IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(P,A) , l2) = True;O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(O,P,A)) = sqrt(3);OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l2;Negation(l1=l2)
process: 如图,连接PF,交另一条渐近线于点Q,因为PA//OQ,所以\anglePAO=\angleQOF=\anglePOA,所以\trianglePAO是等边三角形,所以\anglePOA=60^{\circ}则\frac{b}{a}=\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},即b=\sqrt{3}a;又因为S_{\triangleOPA}=\sqrt{3},所以\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^{2}=\sqrt{3}解得a=2,b=2\sqrt{3},c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=4在\trianglePAF中,PA=2,AF=6,\anglePAF=在\trianglePAF中,PA=2,AF=6,\anglePAF=60^{\circ},由余弦定理,得PF=\sqrt{4+36-2\times2\times6\cos60^{\circ}}=2\sqrt{}案为:2\sqrt{7}

text: 若椭圆的焦点坐标为$(\pm 3,0)$，且经过点$(4,0)$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (pm*3,0);I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(I,G) = True
process: 由题可知椭圆焦点在x轴上,故设椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),则有\begin{cases}a2-b^{2}=9\\\frac{16}{a2}=1\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}a^{2}=16\\b^{2}=7\end{cases},故方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1

text: $F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$的直线与抛物线的一个交点为$A$，交抛物线的准线于$B$，若$\overrightarrow{B A}=2 \overrightarrow{A F}$，且$|\overrightarrow{B A}|=4$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H) = True;H: Line;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = A;A: Point;Intersection(H, Directrix(G)) = B;B: Point;VectorOf(B, A) = 2*VectorOf(A, F);Abs(VectorOf(B, A)) = 4
process: 因为F是抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点,所以F(\frac{p}{2},0),准线为x=-\frac{p}{2},设过F的直线为y=k(x-\frac{p}{2}),与抛物线交于点A(x_{1},y_{1}),C(x_{2},y_{2}),过A、B两点作AM,CN垂直准线于M,N点,所以|CN|=|CF|,|AM|=|AF|,因为\overrightarrow{BA}=2\overrightarrow{AF},所以|\overrightarrow{BA}|=2|\overrightarrow{AF}|,所以|BA|=2|AM|,所以\angleABM=30^{\circ},又因为|\overrightarrow{BA}|=4,所以|AM|=|AF|=2,且2|CN|=|CB|=|BA|-|AF|-|FC|=|BA|-|AM|-|CN|,所以2|CN|=6+|CN|,所以|CN|=6=|CF|,联立直线与抛物线\begin{cases}y=k(x-\frac{p}{2})\\y2=2px\end{cases},消去y得k^{2}(x^{2}-px+\frac{p^{2}}{4})=2px,所以k^{2}x^{2}-(k^{2}p+2p)x+\frac{k^{2}p^{2}}{4}=0^{,}所以x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{k^{2}p+2p}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},又因为x_{1}>0,x_{2}>0,且x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=|AM|=2,x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=|CN|=6,所以x_{1}x_{2}=(2-\frac{p}{2})(6-\frac{p}{2})=12-4p+\frac{p^{2}}{4}=\frac{p^{2}}{4}所以p=3

text: 已知双曲线$\frac {x^{2}} {a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，那么双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)
process: 由于双曲线的一条渐近线为y=\sqrt{3}x,故\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},所以双曲线离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=2

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，过点$P(1 , 1)$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为弦$A B$中点，则直线$l$斜率是?

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线过双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{9}-\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$的一个顶点，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));p: Number;p>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)), Directrix(H)) = True

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，过抛物线上一点$M$作$l$的垂线，垂足为$N$. 设$A(\frac{7}{2} p, 0)$ , $A N$与$M F$相交于点$B$，若$|A F|=2|M F| $, $\Delta A B M$的面积为$\frac{9 \sqrt{2}}{2}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;N: Point;M: Point;F: Point;B: Point;l: Line;l1: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = ((7/2)*p, 0);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(M, l1);IsPerpendicular(l, l1);FootPoint(l, l1) = N;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A, N), LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = B;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(A, B, M)) = (9*sqrt(2))/2;PointOnCurve(M, G)
process: 由题设可知,|MF|=\frac{1}{2}(\frac{7p}{2}-\frac{p}{2})=\frac{3}{2}p'所以x_{M}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{3}{2}p,解得x_{M}=p,故|y_{M}|=\sqrt{2}p,故\frac{1}{2}\times3p\times\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}p=\frac{9\sqrt{2}}{2},即p=3,填3.

text: 抛物线$y=x^{2}$的准线方程为?

process: 由抛物线的标准方程为x^{2}=y,得抛物线是焦点在y轴正半轴的抛物线,2p=1\therefore其准线方程是y=-\frac{p}{2},y=-\frac{1}{4}.

text: 经过点$(1 , 2)$的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 2);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 设抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=mx或x^{2}=my,将(1,2)代入得m=4或\frac{1}{2},从而所求标准方程是y^{2}=4x与x^{2}=\frac{1}{2}y.

text: 已知$\triangle A B C$的顶点$A(-5,0)$, $B(5,0)$，其内切圆圆心在直线$x=3$上，则顶点$C$的轨迹方程?

process: 如图,AABC与圆的切点分别为E、F、G,则有|AE|=|AG|=8,|BF|=|BG|=2,|CE|=|CF|.所以|CA|-|CB|=8-2=6.根据双曲线定义,所求轨迹是以A、B为焦点,实轴长为6的双曲线的右支\thereforec=5,a=3睛】本题考查轨迹方程,利用的是定义法,定义法:若动点轨迹的条件符合某一基本轨迹的定义(如椭圆、双曲线、抛物线、圆等),可用定义直接探求,属于其础题

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{10}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$，抛物线的顶点在原点，对称轴为$x$轴，焦点为双曲线的左焦点，则抛物线的标准方程是?

process: 双曲线的左焦点为(-4,0),所以抛物线的标准方程是y^{2}=-4\times4x,y^{2}=-16x

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$左焦点$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线的左支于$M$、$N$两点,$F_{2}$为其右焦点,则$|M F_{2}|+|N F_{2}|-|M N|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, LeftPart(G)) = {M, N}

process: 由双曲线的定义得:|MF_{2}|-|MF_{1}|=2a\textcircled{1}|NF_{2}|-|NF_{1}|=2a\textcircled{2},\textcircled{1}+\textcircled{2}得|MF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|-|MN|=4a,而a=2.所以|MF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|-|MN|=8.

text: 设$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$, 则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: \because点P在双曲线右支上,且满足\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=4\textcircled{1}\\PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}=20\textcircled{2}\end{cases}\textcircled{2}\cdot\textcircled{1}^{2}得|PF_{1}|+PF_{2}|=2.\therefore\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|+PF_{2}|=1.故结果为1.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右顶点为$A$ ,经过原点的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P Q|=a$ , $A P \perp P Q$ ,则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;O:Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;PointOnCurve(O, l);Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = a;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, P), LineSegmentOf(P, Q))
process: 设点P在第一象限,由对称性可知|OP|=\frac{a}{2},利用锐角三角函数的定义可得出\angleAOP=60^{\circ},从而可求出点P的坐标,并将点P的坐标代入椭圆C的方程,可得出a与b的等量关系,即可求出椭圆C的离心率.不妨设点P在第一象限,O为坐标原点,由对称性可得|OP|=\frac{1}{2}|PQ|=\frac{a}{2}s\anglePOA=\frac{|OP|}{|OA|}=\frac{1}{2},故\anglePOA=60^{\circ}设点P(x_{0},y_{0}),则x_{0}=\frac{a}{2}\cos60^{\circ}=\frac{a}{4},y_{0}=\frac{a}{2}\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a'即点_{P}(\frac{a}{4},\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a),将点P的坐标代入椭圆C的方程得\frac{a}{a}=1^{\frac{1}{1}}可得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{5},设椭圆的焦距为2c(c>0),则椭圆C的离,心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{a2-b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 若直线$m x+n y=4$和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$没有交点，则过点$(m, n)$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的交点个数为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;l: Line;m: Number;n: Number;J: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(l) = (m*x + n*y = 4);Coordinate(J) = (m, n);NumIntersection(l, H)=0;PointOnCurve(J, L);L:Line
process: 直线mx+ny=4和圆x^{2}+y^{2}=4没有交点,故\frac{4}{\sqrt{m^{2}+n^{2}}}>2\therefore0<m^{2}+n^{2}<4点P(m,n)在以原点为圆心,半径为2的圆内.故圆m^{2}+n^{2}=4内切于椭圆,故点P(m,n)在椭圆内,则过点(m,n)的直线与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的交点个数为2个

text: 已知$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点，记$P$到此抛物线的准线的距离为$d_{1}$ , $P$到直线$x+2 y-12=0$的距离为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 12 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);d1: Number;d2: Number;Distance(P, Directrix(G)) = d1;Distance(P, H) = d2
process: \because点P到准线的距离等于点P到焦点F的距离\therefore过焦点F作直线x+2y-12=0的垂线,此时d_{1}+d_{2}的值最小\becauseF(1,0)=\frac{|1-12|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}}}=\frac{11\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=3 y$上一点$A$的纵坐标为$\frac{5}{4}$，则点$A$到此抛物线焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 3*y);PointOnCurve(A,G);YCoordinate(A)=5/4
process: 试题分析:由题意得,抛物线的准线方程为y=-\frac{3}{4},所以点A到准线的距离为\frac{5}{4}-(-\frac{3}{4})=2,根据抛物线的定义可知点A与抛物线的交点的距离就是点A与抛物线准线的距离,所以点A到此抛物线焦点的距离为2.

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=a^{2}(a>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$是第一象限内双曲线上的点.若直线$P A$ , $P B$的倾斜角分别为$\alpha$ , $\beta$，且$\beta=m \alpha(m>1)$，那么$\alpha$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a>0;m:Number;m>1;alpha:Number;beta:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = a^2);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Inclination(LineOf(P,A))=alpha;Inclination(LineOf(P,B))=beta;beta=m*alpha

text: 抛物线的准线方程是$y=\frac{1}{2}$，则其标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 1/2)
process: 抛物线的准线方程是y=\frac{1}{2},即\frac{p}{2}=\frac{1}{2}\thereforep=1,且焦点在y轴负半轴上,所以标准方程为x^{2}=-2y.

text: 已知双曲线$C$过点$(4,2 \sqrt{3})$，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm x$，则$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 2*sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(G, C);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*x)
process: 根据双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pmx,设双曲线方程为x^{2}-y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0),再将点(4,2\sqrt{3})代入求解因为双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pmx,所以设双曲线方程为x^{2}-y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0)又因为双曲线C过点(4,2\sqrt{3}),所以\lambda=4^{2}-(2\sqrt{3})^{2}=4所以双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$ x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，其准线与$y$轴交于点$D$，过点$F$作直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B \perp A D$，且$|B F|=|A F|+4$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), yAxis) = D;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(A, D));Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + 4
process: 求出抛物线的焦点坐标,设设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),设直线AB方程为:y=kx+\frac{p}{2}与抛物线方程联立,可得x_{1}x_{2}=-p^{2},y_{1}y_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},利用AB\botAD可知\overrightarrow{AD}\bot\overrightarrow{AF},转化为数量积为0,可以解出y_{1}=\frac{\sqrt{5}-2}{2}p'y_{2}==\frac{\sqrt{5}+2}{2}p'再利用抛物线的定义将|BF|=|AF|+4用p表示即可解出p的值.羊解)抛物线C:x^{2}=2py(p>0)的焦点为F(0,\frac{p}{2}),D(0,-\frac{p}{2})设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),假设直线AB斜率存在,设直线AB方程为:y=kx+\frac{p}{2}由\begin{cases}y=kx+\frac{p}{2}\\x^{2}=2py\end{cases}可得:x^{2}-2pkx-p^{2}=0,所以x_{1}x_{2}=-p^{2},y_{2}==\frac{p^{2}}{4},\overrightarrow{AD}=(-x_{1},-\frac{p}{2}-y_{1}),\overrightarrow{AF}=(-x_{1},\frac{p}{2}-因为AB\botAD,则AD\botAF,所以\overrightarrow{AD}\cdot\overrightarrow{AF}=y_{1})_{1}^{2}-(\frac{p}{2}+y_{1})(\frac{p}{2}-y_{1})=0,即x_{1}2+y_{1}2=\frac{p^{2}}{4},所以y_{1}2+2py_{1}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},可得y_{1}=\frac{\sqrt{5}-2}{2}p'y_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{5}+2}{2}F所以|BF|-|AF|=(y_{2}+\frac{p}{2})-(y_{1}+\frac{p}{2})=2p=4,所以p=2.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$为双曲线的右支上的一点，$|A F_{1}|=\frac{11}{2} a-c$($c$为半焦距)，且直线$A F_{2}$与直线$y=-\frac{b}{a} x$平行，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F2: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;c:Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y =-(b/a)*x);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F1))=(11/2)*a-c;HalfFocalLength(G)=c;IsParallel(LineOf(A,F2),H)
process: 根据题意可得因为|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|=2a,且|AF_{1}|=\frac{11}{2}a-c所以|AF_{2}|=\frac{7}{2}a-c,因为直线AF_{2}与直线y=-\frac{b}{a}x平行所以\tan\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{b}{a}.所以\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{a}{c}=\frac{4c^{2}+(\frac{7}{2}a-c)^{2}-(\frac{11}{2}a-c)^{2}}{2\times2c\times(\frac{7}{2}a-c)}所以8a^{2}-2ac-c^{2}=0,即(2a-c)(4a+c)=0,解得e=\frac{c}{a}=2.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点是$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，分别过$A$、$B$两点作直线$x=-2$的垂线，垂足分别为$E$，$H$. 若$|A E|=2|B H|$，则直线$l$的斜率 $k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;E: Point;B: Point;H: Point;F: Point;k: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(G) = (x = -2);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(A,L1);PointOnCurve(B,L2);IsPerpendicular(L1,G);IsPerpendicular(L2,G);FootPoint(L1,G)=E;FootPoint(L2,G)=H;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, E)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, H));Slope(l) = k
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).由|AE|=2|BF|,利用抛物线的定义得到x_{1}+2=2(x_{2}+2).再通过作A_{1}垂直x轴,BB_{1}垂直x轴,由\triangleAA_{1}F_{n}\triangleBB_{1}F.得到2(2-x_{2})=x_{1}-2,进而求得点A或B的坐标,然后结合焦点坐标求解.羊解】如图所示:设直线l的方程为y=k(x-2),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).因为|AE|=2|BF|,所以x_{1}+2=2(x_{2}+2).作AA_{1}垂直x轴,垂足为A_{1},作BB_{1}垂直x轴,垂足为B_{1}则\triangleAA_{1}F-\triangleBB_{1}F.从而\frac{|B_{1}F|}{|A_{1}F|}=\frac{|BF|}{|AF|}=\frac{1}{2},即2(2-x_{2})=x_{1}-2解得x_{1}=4.因为A(x_{1},y_{1})在抛物线C上,所以y_{1}=\pm4\sqrt{2},则k=\frac{\pm4\sqrt{2}}{4-2}=\pm2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，过焦点$F$作双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$M$，直线$M F$交另一条渐近线与$N$，则$\frac{M F}{N F}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e;e = 2*sqrt(3)/3;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F, Z);L1: Line;L2: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L2;Negation(L1 = L2);IsPerpendicular(L1, Z);M: Point;FootPoint(L1, Z) = M;N: Point;Intersection(LineOf(M, F), L2) = N
process: 由题意双曲线的离心率为:e=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}可得\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},可得\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{4}{3},所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x'如图\angleMOF=30^{\circ},F(c,0)则MF=\frac{\sqrt{3}c}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(\sqrt{3}})^{2}}=b,OM=a,所以MN=\sqrt{3}a,所以,\frac{|MF|}{|NF|}=\frac{b}{\sqrt{3}a-b}=\frac{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}a}{\sqrt{3}a-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}a}=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 已知$c$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的半焦距，则$\frac{b+c}{a}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);HalfFocalLength(G) = c
process: 试题分析:依题意有a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2},所以(\frac{b+c}{a})^{2}=\frac{b^{2}+2bc+c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a^{2}+2bc}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{2bc}{a^{2}},因为0<2bc\leqslantb^{2}+c^{2}=a^{2}(当且仅当b=c时等号成立),所以1<1+\frac{2bc}{a^{2}}\leqslant1+\frac{a^{2}}{a^{2}}=2,所以1<\frac{b+c}{a}\leqslant\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过焦点且与渐近线平行的直线与双曲线相交于点$M$，则$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),G);IsParallel(G,Asymptote(C));Intersection(G,C)=M
process: 分析:先求出渐近线方程,然后求出过一个焦点且与渐近线平行的直线方程,代入双曲线方程求得交点M的坐标,从而可得三角形面积.详双曲线的焦点为F_{1}(-5,0),F_{2}(5,0),渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x.过F_{2}与一条渐近线平行的直线方程为y=\frac{4}{3}(x-5),由\begin{cases}y=\frac{4}{3}(x-5)\\\frac{x2}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1\end{cases}得\begin{cases}x=\frac{17}{5}\\y=-\frac{32}{15}\end{cases},即M(\frac{17}{5},-\frac{32}{15}),\thereforeS_{AF_{1}MF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times10\times\frac{32}{15}=\frac{32}{3}.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的一个焦点为$(1,0)$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;G: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(G) = (1, 0);OneOf(Focus(C)) = G
process: 椭圆C:\frac{\pi^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的一个焦点为(1,0),可得a^{2}-3=1,解得a=2,所以椭圆的离心率为:e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}

text: 以坐标轴为对称轴，原点为顶点，且过圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x+6 y+9=0$圆心的抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (6*y - 2*x + x^2 + y^2 + 9 = 0);PointOnCurve(Center(H), G)
process: 试题分析:圆心坐标为(1,-3),在第四象限,抛物线过圆心可设为y^{2}=2px(p>0)或x^{2}=2py(p>0)分别代入(1,-3)可得抛物线方程为y^{2}=9x或x^{2}=-\frac{1}{3}y

text: 已知过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点$F$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|+2|B F| \geq k$恒成立，则$k$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};k: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F))+2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B,F)) >= k
process: 如图设直线AB的方程为x=my-1,设点A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})将直线AB的方程与椭圆C的方程联立\begin{cases}x=my-1\\\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1\end{cases},消去x得(m^{2}+2)y^{2}-2my-1=0,A=4m^{2}+4(m^{2}+2)=8(m^{2}+1)>0,由韦达定理得y_{1}+=\frac{|y_{1}+|y}{\sqrt{1+m^{2}}\cdot|y}\frac{2m}{n^{2+2}},y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{1}{m^{2}+}\frac{2}{3}=\frac{\sqrt{8(1+m^{2})}}{\sqrt{1+m^{2}}}=2\sqrt{2},\therefore2\sqrt{2}(|AF|+2|BF|)=(\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{m+2}{|BF|})(|AF|+2|BF|)=3+\frac{2|BF|}{|AF|}+\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}当且仅当|AF|=\sqrt{2}|BF|时,等号成立,所以,|AF|+2|BF|\geqslant\frac{3+2\sqrt{2}}{2\sqrt{2}}=1+\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}\thereforek\leqslant1+\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4},因此,k的最大值为1+\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 一动点到$y$轴的距离比到点$(2 , 0)$的距离小$2$，则此动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: K: Point;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (2, 0);Distance(K, yAxis) = Distance(K, G) - 2

G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p > 0;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l) = True;l: Line;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);x2: Number;y2: Number

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k+2}-\frac{y^{2}}{5-k}=1$表示双曲线，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 2) - y^2/(5 - k) = 1);k: Number

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，焦距为$2 c$，双曲线上存在一点$P$，使直线$P F_{1}$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于$P F_{1}$的中点$M$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};c: Number;FocalLength(G) = 2*c;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;M: Point;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);TangentPoint(LineOf(P,F1),H) = M;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = M
process: 设点P为双曲线右支上的一点,直线PF_{1}与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}相切于PF_{1}的中点M,利用中位线的性质可双曲线的定义可得|PF_{2}|=2a,|PF_{1}|=4a,再由勾股定理和离心率公式求解即可设点P为双曲线右支上的一点,因为直线PF_{1}与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}相切于PF的中点M,所以OM\botPF_{1},|OM|=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|=a,即|PF_{2}|=2a,由双曲线定义可得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,则|PF_{1}|=4a.又PF_{1}\botPF_{2},则|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2},即为16a^{2}+4a^{2}=4c^{2},则c^{2}=5a^{2},所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5},

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{3-m}=1$表示椭圆，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m:Number;Expression(G)=(x^2/(m-1)+y^2/(3-m)=1)
process:
由m-1>0,3-m>0且m-1
eq3-m可得.方程 rac{x^{2}}{m-1}+ rac{y^{2}}{3-m}=1表示椭圆\Rightarrow egin{cases}m-1>0\3-m>0\m-1
eq3-m\end{cases},解得1<m<3且m
eq2.所以m的取值范围是(1,2)\cup(2,3)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2/3 + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的离心率为\frac{1}{2},当焦点在x轴时,可知a^{2}=m,b^{2}=3,c^{2}=m-3可得\frac{m-3}{m}=\frac{1}{4},解得m=4当焦点在y轴时,可知a^{2}=3,b^{2}=m^{2}=3-m可得\frac{3-m}{3}=\frac{1}{4},解得m=\frac{9}{4}

text: 已知双曲线$a x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Real;Expression(G) = (a*x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=x)
process: 双曲线ax^{2}-y^{2}=1的一条渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{a}x,y=x故a=1.

text: 设$m$为常数，若点$F(0,5)$是双曲线$-\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的一个焦点，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/9 - y^2/m = 1);m: Number;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, 5);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F
process: 根据双曲线的焦点坐标可得出关于m的等式,解出即可.由于点F(0,5)是双曲线-\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1的一个焦点,则-m+9=5^{2}=25,解得m=-1

text: 设点$M$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上的动点，点$N$是圆$E$:$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$上的动点，且直线$M N$与圆$E$相切，则$|M N|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;E: Circle;N: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 + y^2/8 = 1);Expression(E) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, E);IsTangent(LineOf(M,N),E)
process: 数形结合将|MN|转化为\sqrt{|ME|}-1,问题转化为求椭圆上一点到圆心E的距离,采用函数方法可求解.[详解]由题可知E(1,0),|NE|=1,设M(x_{0},y_{0}),\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{9}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8}=1=y_{0}^{2}=8(1-\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{2}),-3\leqslantx_{0}<33

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$(1,0)$，则该抛物线上一点到焦点的距离的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (1, 0);H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 由抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点坐标为(1,0),可得\frac{p}{2}=1,解得p=2,设抛物线上的任意一点为M(x_{1},y_{1})(x_{1}\geqslant0),焦点为F(1,0)由抛物线的定义可得|MF|=x_{1}+1,因为x_{1}\geqslant0,所以|MF|\geqslant1,所以抛物线上一点到焦点的距离的取值范围是1,+\infty)

text: 已知直线$y=k x(k \neq 0)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，以$A B$为直径的圆恰好经过双曲线的右焦点$F$，若三角形$A B F$的面积为$4 a^{2}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;I: Line;k: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;a>0;b>0;Negation(k=0);Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(I) = (y = k*x);Intersection(I, G) = {A, B};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H);PointOnCurve(F,H);RightFocus(G)=F;Area(TriangleOf(A,B,F))=4*a^2
process: 因为以AB为直径的圆恰好经过双曲线的右焦点F,所以AB为直径的圆的方程为x^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2},圆也过左焦点F_{1}因为AB与F_{1}F_{2}相等且平分.所以四边形AF_{1}BF为矩形,所以|AF|=|BF_{1}|设|AF|=m,|BF|=n,则|AF|-|BF|=|BF_{1}|-|BF|=m-n=2a所以m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn=4a^{2},因为AF\botBF所以m^{2}+n^{2}=|AB|^{2}=4c^{2},因为三角形ABF的面积为4a^{2}所以\frac{1}{2}mn=4a^{2},得mn=8a^{2}所以4c^{2}-16a^{2}=4a^{2},得c^{2}=5a^{2}所以a^{2}+b^{2}=5a^{2},所以b^{2}=4a^{2},得b=2a,所以双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm2x'

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的一个焦点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$A$、$B$与椭圆的另一焦点$F_{2}$构成的$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);F1: Point;Focus(E) = {F1, F2};l: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};F2: Point
process: 根据题意,由椭圆的定义,显然A,B两点到两个焦点的距离之和都等于椭圆的长轴长,则三角形ABF_{2}的周长可求.解】由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1得:a=\sqrt{3},b=1,c=\sqrt{2}又AB过焦点F_{1},所以由椭圆的定义得:|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a=2\sqrt{3},|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=2\sqrt{3}所以三角形ABF_{2}的周长=|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=4\sqrt{3}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$y=k x(k>0)$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$|O M|=|O F_{2}|$,$O$为坐标原点，又$S_{\Delta M F_{2} N}=\frac{(|M F_{2}|+|N F_{2}|)^{2}}{16}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;k: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F1:Point;F2: Point;N: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);k>0;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, M)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F2));Area(TriangleOf(M,F2,N))=(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F2)))^2/16
process: 由直线y=kx(k>0)与双曲线的对称性可知,点M与点N关于原点对称.在三角形\triangleMF_{2}N中,|OM|=|OF_{2}|,所以MF_{2}\botNF_{2},M,N是以F_{1}F_{2}为直径的圆与双曲线的交点,不妨设M(x_{1},y_{1})在第一象限,S_{\triangleNF_{2}}M=S_{\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}},因为圆是以F_{1}F_{2}为直径,所以圆的半径为c.因为点M(x_{1},y_{1})在圆上,也在双曲线上,所以有\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\x^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2}\end{cases}联立化简可得b^{2}(c^{2}-y_{1}^{2})-a^{2}y_{1}=a^{2}b^{2},整理得b^{2}c^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}=b^{2}y_{1}2+a^{2}y_{1},b^{4}=c^{2}y^{2},y_{1}=\frac{b^{2}}{}所以S_{\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2c\cdoty_{1}=b^{2},由_{S_{\triangleMF_{2}N}}=\frac{(|MF}{|MF}所以MF_{1}+MF_{2}=4b,又因为MF_{1}-MF_{2}=2a,联立\begin{cases}MF_{1}+\\MF_{-}\end{cases}\frac{2|+|NF_{2}|)^{2}}{联立}\begin{cases}MF_{1}+MF_{2}=4b\\MF-MF_{2}=2a\end{cases}可得MF_{1}=2b+a.MF_{2}=2b-a,因为F_{1}F_{2}为圆的直径,所以MF_{1}^{2}+MF_{2}^{2}=F_{1}F_{2}^{2}即(2b+a)^{2}+(2b-a)^{2}=4c^{2},8b^{2}+2a^{2}=4c^{2},4b^{2}+a^{2}=2c^{2}.4c^{2}-4a^{2}+a^{2}=2c^{2},2c^{2}=3a^{2},\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{3}{2},所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，点$Q(\frac{9}{2} p, 0)$. 若$|Q F|=2|P F|$，且$\Delta P Q F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (9*p/2, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Area(TriangleOf(P, Q, F)) = 8*sqrt(3)
process: 由条件知F(\frac{p}{2},0),所以|QF|=4p,所以|PF|=\frac{1}{2}|QF|=2p.由抛物线的准线为x=-\frac{p}{2},及抛物线的定义可知,P点的横坐标为2p-\frac{p}{2}=\frac{3}{2}p不妨设点P在x轴上方,则P的纵坐标为\sqrt{3}p;所以S_{\trianglePQF}=\frac{1}{2}\times4p\times\sqrt{3}p=8\sqrt{3},解得p=2.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $P$是$l$上一点，$Q$是直线$P F$与$C$的一个交点，若$\overrightarrow{F P}=4 \overrightarrow{F Q}$，则$|F Q|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 16*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, l);Q: Point;OneOf(Intersection(LineOf(P, F), C)) = Q;VectorOf(F, P) = 4*VectorOf(F, Q)
process: 设Q到1的距离为d,则|FQ|=d\because\overrightarrow{FP}=4\overrightarrow{FQ},\therefore|PQ|=3d,\therefore直线PF的斜率为\_\frac{\sqrt{(3d)^{2}-d^{2}}}{d}\becauseF(4,0).\therefore直线PF的方程为y=-2\sqrt{2}(x-4).与y^{2}=16x联立可得x=2,\therefore|FO|=d=2+4=6.

text: 动点$P$到点$F(2,0)$的距离与它到直线$x+2=0$的距离相等，则$P$的轨迹方程为?

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到两焦点的距离之积为$m$，则$m$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};F1: Point;F2: Point;Distance(P,F1) * Distance(P,F2) = m;m:Number
process: 根据椭圆的定义得到|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=10,结合基本不等式得到|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\leqslant(\frac{|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|}{2})^{2}即可求解解】设椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},则m=|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|根据椭圆的定义,可得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=10又由|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\leqslant(\frac{|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|}{2})^{2}=(\frac{10}{2})^{2}=25当且仅当|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|时,即|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=5时,等号成立所以m的最大值为25.

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , $A$是$C$上任意一点，则$\Delta A F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为?

process: 根据题意,椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,其中a=6,b=3则c=\sqrt{36-9}=3\sqrt{3}A是C上任意一点则AAF_{1}F_{2}的周长l=|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|=2a+2c=12+6\sqrt{3}本题正确结果:12+6\sqrt{3}】本题考查椭圆的几何性质问题,关键在于明确焦点三角形的周长为固定值:2a+2c

text: 若椭圆的两个焦点坐标为$F_{1}(-1,0)$ , $F_{2}(5,0)$，长轴的长为$10$，则椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (5, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 10
process: 依题意可得:椭圆的中心为(2,0),a=5,c=3,从而可求椭圆的方程因为椭圆的两个焦点坐标为F_{1}(-1,0),F_{2}(5,0),长轴的长为10,所以椭圆的中心为(2,0),a=5,c=3,所以b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=25-9=16'所以,椭圆的方程为:\frac{(x-2)^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 若椭圆$x^{2}+m y^{2}=1$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，则椭圆长轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (m*y^2 + x^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(2)/2
process: 椭圆x^{2}+my^{2}=1即x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{1}=1,当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,\thereforea^{2}=\frac{1}{m},b^{2}=1'由c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2},得c^{2}=\frac{1-m}{m}\because\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1-m=\frac{1}{2},解得m=\frac{1}{2}\thereforea=\sqrt{2},即长轴长为2\sqrt{2}当椭圆的焦点在x轴上时,b^{2}=\frac{1}{m},a^{2}=1\thereforea=1,即长轴长为2,综上所述,椭圆长轴长为2\sqrt{2}或2.

fact_expressions: x: Number;y: Number;sqrt(y^2 + (x - sqrt(3))^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + sqrt(3))^2) = 4
process: 根据\sqrt{(x-\sqrt{3})^{2}+y^{2}}+\sqrt{(x+\sqrt{3})^{2}+y^{2}}=4可知,点(x,y)到(\sqrt{3},0),(-\sqrt{3},0)的距离之和是点4,注意到4>2\sqrt{3},于是(x,y)的轨迹落在以(\pm\sqrt{3},0)为焦点,长轴为4,中心在坐标原点的椭圆上,椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1,利用三角代换,设x=2\cos\alpha,y=\sin\alpha(0\leqslant\alpha<2\pi),于是|3x-4y+10|=|6\cos\alpha-4\sin\alpha+10|,利用辅助角公式|3x-4y+10|=|2\sqrt{13}\cos(\alpha+\varphi)+10|(其中\tan\varphi=\frac{2}{3}),又|\cos(\alpha+\varphi)|\leqslant1,|3x-4y+10|=|2\sqrt{13}\cos(\alpha+\varphi)+10|\in[10-2\sqrt{13},10+2\sqrt{13}],最大值为10+2\sqrt{13}

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线经过双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=1$的一个焦点，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = 2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Directrix(H)) = True
process: 根据题意,双曲线的方程为:y^{2}-x^{2}=1则其焦点在y轴上,且c=\sqrt{2}则抛物线x^{2}=2py(p>0)焦点坐标为(0,\pm\frac{p}{2}),所以\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{2},可得p=2\sqrt{2}

text: 若点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{100}+\frac{y^{2}}{64}=1$上的一点，$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$是焦点，且$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/100 + y^2/64 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G)={F1,F2};AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=a x$上的点$P(\frac{3}{2}, y_{0})$到该抛物线焦点$F$的距离为$2$，设$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);a: Number;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3/2, y0);y0: Number;Focus(G) = F;F: Point;Distance(P, F) = 2;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True
process: 利用点P的坐标可得a>0,从而得到准线方程与焦点坐标,再根据焦半径公式求得a的值,再将点P的坐标代入抛物线方程得y_{0},利用三角形的面积公式可求得答案\because点P(\frac{3}{2},y_{0})在抛物线上,\thereforea>0,\therefore抛物线的准线为x=-\frac{a}{4},焦点为F(\frac{a}{4},0)\therefore|PF|=\frac{3}{2}+\frac{a}{4}=2\Rightarrowa=2,不妨设y_{0}>0,\thereforey_{0}=\sqrt{3},\therefores=\frac{1}{2}\cdot|OF|\cdoty_{0}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot\frac{1}{2}\cdot\sqrt{3}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，直线$m$为抛物线在第一象限内一点$P$处的切线，过$P$作平行于$x$轴的直线$n$，过焦点$F$平行于$m$的直线交$n$于点$M$ ,若$|P M |=4$，则点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: m: Line;G: Parabola;n: Line;P: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Quadrant(P) = 1;TangentOnPoint(P, G) = m;PointOnCurve(P,n);IsParallel(xAxis, n);C:Line;PointOnCurve(F,C);IsParallel(C,m);Intersection(C,n)=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,M))=4

G: ConicSection;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;Slope(H)=2;Intersection(H,G)={A,B};Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=2*sqrt(5);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G)

text: 已知椭圆方程$C$为$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$ ,$ F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆的两个焦点，点$P$在$C$上且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$. 则三角形$F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16+y^2/8=1);Focus(C)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3
process: 由\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1可得,a^{2}=16,b^{2}=8,\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=8,设|PF_{1}|=t_{1},|PF_{2}|=t_{2},由椭圆的定义可得t_{1}+t_{2}=8,\textcircled{1},由余弦定理得t_{1}^{2}+t_{2}-2t_{1}t_{2}\cdot\cos60^{\circ}=32,\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}平方-\textcircled{2}可得t_{1}t_{2}=\frac{32}{3},\thereforeS_{APF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{32}{3}\times\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{8\sqrt{3}}{3},

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的一个交点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的左右焦点，则$\cos \angle F_{1} P F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(H) = F1;RightFocus(H) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 8*y)
process: 由抛物线方程x^{2}=8y知,抛物线焦点在y轴上,由2p=8,得\frac{p}{2}=2,所以焦点坐标为(0,2).

text: 已知$F_{1}(-c, 0)$,$ F_{2}(c, 0)(c>0)$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$M$，与$C$的右支交于点$N$，$O$为坐标原点，若$|O N|=c$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;c:Number;G: Circle;H: Line;F1: Point;O: Origin;N: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);TangentPoint(H, G) = M;Intersection(H,RightPart(C))=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, N)) = c;F2:Point;c>0
process: 因为|ON|=c,所以|ON|=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|,所以NF_{1}\botNF_{2}.又直线NF_{1}与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}相切于点M,所以OM\botNF_{1},所以OM/\!/NF_{2}又O为F_{1}F_{2}的中点,所以OM为\triangleNF_{1}F_{2}的中位线,所以|NF_{2}|=2|OM|=2a根据双曲线的定义可知|NF_{1}|-|NF_{2}|=2a,所以|NF|=4a.在Rt\triangleNF_{1}F_{2}中,|NF_{1}^{2}+|NF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|,即(4a)^{2}+(2a)^{2}=(2c)^{2},得c^{2}=5a^{2}所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$，过$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，则$|F A|+4|F B|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,H);Intersection(H,G)={A,B}
process: 联立方程组消元,由根与系数的关系得出A,B横坐标x_{1}x_{2}=4,利用抛物线的性质得出|FA|+4|FB|=\frac{4}{x_{2}}+4x_{2}+10,根据基本不等式得出最值羊解】抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点F(2,0)设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则|FA|+4|FB|=x_{1}+2+4(x_{2}+2)=x_{1}+4x_{2}+10,当直线AB斜率不存在时,|FA|+4|FB|=2+4\times2+10=20,当直AB斜率存在时,设直线AB的方程为y=k(x-2)代入y^{2}=8x得k^{2}x^{2}-(4k^{2}+8)x+4k^{2}=0,\thereforex_{1}x_{2}=4,\therefore|FA|+4|FB|=\frac{4}{x_{2}}+4x_{2}+10\geqslant2\sqrt{\frac{4}{x_{1}}\times4x_{1}}+10=18,当且仅当x_{1}=1时取等号.|FA|+4|FB|的最小值是18.

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若点$P$椭圆上，且$\cos \angle F_{1} PF_{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，则$|PF_{1}|\cdot| P F_{2} |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Cos(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 1/2

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆$C$上移动时，$I$为$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，则$|I O|$的取值范围 ($O$为坐标原点) 为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有公共渐近线，且焦距为$8$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 - y^2/3 = 1);Z: Hyperbola;Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(Z);FocalLength(Z) = 8

G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, l1);IsPerpendicular(l2, LineSegmentOf(P, F1));IsParallel(l2, LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 试题分析:由题设条件显然得出PF_{1}\botPF_{2},故|PO|=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|=c,而P点在渐近线l_{1}:y=\frac{b}{a}x上,可求得P点坐标为(a,b),下面由l_{2}//PF_{2}可得\frac{b}{a-c}=-\frac{b}{a}\Rightarrowc=2a\Rightarrowe=2.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点为$F$，过$F$做斜率为$2$的直线$l$, 直线$l$与双曲线的右支有且只有一个公共点，则双曲线的离心率范围?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;Slope(l)=2;PointOnCurve(F,l);NumIntersection(l, RightPart(G)) = 1
process: 因为过F做斜率为2的直线l,直线l与双曲线的右支有且只有一个公共点,所以\frac{b}{a}\geqslant2,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}\geqslant\sqrt{5},又因为e>1,所以e\in[\sqrt{5},+\infty)

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$上任意一点，则当$P$点到直线$x+y+2=0$的距离最小时，$P$点与该抛物线的准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Expression(H) = (x + y + 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Distance(P, H))
process: 先根据题设条件求出点P的坐标,再根据抛物线的性质求出点P到其准线的距离即可当直线y=-x+b与抛物线相切于P点时,到直线x+y+2=0的距离最小,把y=-x+b代入y=x^{2}得x^{2}+x-b=0,由于相切\thereforeA=1-4b=0得b=-\frac{1}{4}.因此P(-\frac{1}{2},\frac{1}{4}),此点到准线y=-\frac{1}{4}的距离为\frac{1}{2}

text:
双曲线的中心在坐标原点，离心率等于$2$ , 一个焦点的坐标为$(2 , 0)$，则此双曲线的渐近线
方程是?

已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$和椭圆$\frac{a x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1  (a \leq 1)$的交
点，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 以椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$中心为顶点，右顶点为焦点的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2/5 = 1);Vertex(G) = Center(H);Focus(G) = RightVertex(H)
process: 椭圆中心是原点,右顶点是(1,0),它是抛物线的焦点,则\frac{p}{2}=1,p=2\therefore抛物线标准方程是y2=4x

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>b;b>0;F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;L: Line;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;PointOnCurve(F1,L) = True;Intersection(L,G) = {A,B};Coordinate(A) = (x1,y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2,y2);Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(A,B,F2))) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2)) = 2;Abs(y1-y2) = 3;A: Point;B: Point

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的弦$A B$中点为$M(1,1)$，则直线$A B$的方程?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M
process: 设出A,B的坐标,利用点差法求解出直线AB的斜率,然后根据直线的点斜式方程求解出直线AB的方程,最后转化为一般式方程.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),所以\begin{cases}x_{1}^{2}+4y_{1}^{2}=16\\x_{2}^{2}+4y_{2}^{2}=16\end{cases},所以-\frac{1}{4}\cdot\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}又因为\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=1\times2=2\\y_{1}+y_{2}=1\times2=2\end{cases},所以-\frac{1}{4}\cdot\frac{2}{2}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}}=k_{AB},所以k_{AB}=-\frac{1}{4},所以l_{AB}:y-1=-\frac{1}{4}(x-1),即x+4y-5=0,

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线$l$与抛物线交于不同的两点$A$、$B$、$M$为抛物线$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点，若$\tan \angle A M B=2 \sqrt{6}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Negation(A=B);M: Point;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;Tan(AngleOf(A, M, B)) = 2*sqrt(6)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上一点$P$到该椭圆的一个焦点的距离为$6$，则点$P$到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 6
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1的焦点F_{1},F_{2}在m的是中,长半轴长a=5,即长轴长2a=10,不妨令|PF_{1}|=6由椭圆定义知,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=10,则有|PF_{2}|=4,所以点P到另一个焦点的距离为4.故答家为:4

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到$y$轴的距离是$4$，则点$P$到该抛物线焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = 4
process: 因为抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x,所以准线方程为x=-1,所以点P到准线的距离为4+1=5,故点P到该抛物线焦点的距离5.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点为$(3 , 0)$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/5 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (3, 0);RightFocus(G) = H

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$与曲线$x y=k(k>0)$交于点$M$，若$M$到抛物线焦点$F$的距离为$4$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Curve;k: Number;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);k>0;Expression(H) = (x*y = k);Intersection(G, H) = M;Focus(G) = F;Distance(M, F) = 4
process: 试题分析:\begin{cases}y^{2}=8x\\xy=k\end{cases}解得M点的横坐标为\sqrt[3]{\frac{k^{2}}{8}}.若M到抛物线焦点F的距离为4则M到准线x=-2的距离也为4,即\sqrt[3]{\frac{k^{2}}{8}}+2=4,易得:k=8

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/36 = 1)
process: 令\frac{4}{4}-\frac{36}{36}=0,可得渐近线方程为y=\pm3x,

text: 已知双曲线的对称轴为坐标轴，一条渐近线为$2 x-y=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (2*x - y = 0);SymmetryAxis(G) = axis

text: 已知焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), yAxis);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*(2*x))
process: 因为以原点为中心,焦点在y轴上的双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x,所以\frac{a}{b}=2,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}b}{2b}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.

text: 椭圆$M$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$M$上任一点，且$| P F_{1}|\cdot| P F_{2} |$的最大值的取值范围是$[2 c^{2} , 3 c^{2}]$，其中$c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}$，则椭圆$M$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: M: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c:Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M)=F1;RightFocus(M)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,M);Range(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2)))=[2*c^2,3*c^2];c=sqrt(a^2-b^2);Eccentricity(M)=e

text: 已知双曲线$C$与曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$有公共的渐近线，且经过点$A(-3,4 \sqrt{2})$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Curve;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-3, 4*sqrt(2));Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(G);PointOnCurve(A,C)

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 ,b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，且它的一条准线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线重合，则此双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3);OneOf(Directrix(G))=Directrix(H)

text: 若双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若在其渐近线上存在一点$P$，使得 $||P F_{1}|-| P F_{2}||=2 b$，则双曲线$E$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(E));Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 2*b

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}+6 x+m=0$相切，则实数$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (m + 6*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);m: Real;IsTangent(Directrix(G), H)
process: x^{2}+y^{2}+6x+m=0的圆心为(-3,0),半径为\sqrt{9-m},抛物线y^{2}=8x的准线是直线x=-2,所以-2+3=\sqrt{9-m},得m=8.

text: 已知点$M$ $(\sqrt{3}, 0)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$与直线$y=k(x+\sqrt{3})$交于点$A$、$B$，则$\triangle A B M$的周长为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的一点$P$到椭圆一个焦点的距离为$3$，则$P$到另一焦点距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F2;Negation(F1 = F2);Distance(P, F1) = 3
process: 试题分析:由椭圆定义知:|PF|+|PF_{2}|=2a,所以P到另一焦点距离为7.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$上点$P(4,4)$到焦点$F$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(P) = (4, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F
process: 由题设有8p=16,可得p=2,\therefore抛物线方程为:y2=4x,故焦点坐标为(1,0)\therefore|PF|=\sqrt{(4-1)^{2}+4^{2}}=5.

text: 若直线$y=x+k$与曲线$x=\sqrt{1-y^{2}}$恰有一个公共点，则$k$的取值范围是?

text: 若以$F$为焦点的抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两点$A$ , $B$满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则弦$AB$的中点到准线的距离为?

text: 已知双曲线的两个焦点为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的长轴的端点，其准线过椭圆的焦点，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 以$3 x \pm 4 y=0$为渐近线，且过点$M(-2,3)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (3*x + pm*4*y = 0);G: Hyperbola;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 3);PointOnCurve(M, G) = True
process: 因为渐近线为3x\pm4y=0,所以设双曲线方程为9x^{2}-16y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0).又过点M(-2,3),代入可得9\times4-16\times9=\lambda,即\lambda=-108,所以9x^{2}-16y^{2}=-108,整理可得\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{12}=1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = 1)

r1: Hyperbola;r2:Hyperbola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;a:Number;b:Number;a>0 ;b>0;Expression(r1) = (x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(r2) = (y^2/b^2-x^2/a^2=1);PointOnCurve(A,r1);PointOnCurve(B,r2);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);x1^2 - x2^2 = a^2;Slope(LineOf(O, A))*Slope(LineOf(O,B)) = 1/3

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则其渐近线方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左焦点为$F$、$C$为$O A$的中点 ($O$为坐标原点)，点$P$为第一象限中的一点，且$|C P|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|O C|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;C: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = C;O: Origin;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, P)) = (sqrt(3)/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, C))
process: 由题意知F(-2,0),A(0,2)因为C为OA的中点,所以C(0,1),因为|CP|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|OC|'所以|CP|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},即点P在以C为圆心,\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}为半径的圆上,又点P在第一象限,所以点P的轨迹方程x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=\frac{3}{4}(x>0,y>0)

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，若点$P$为双曲线左支上的一点，且直线$P A_{1}$, $P A_{2}$的斜率分别为$-1$，$-\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A1: Point;A2: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A1;RightVertex(G) = A2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(G));Slope(LineOf(P, A1)) = -1;Slope(LineOf(P, A2)) = -1/3
process: PA_{1}的方程为y=-(x+a),PA_{2}的方程为y=-\frac{1}{3}(x-a),则P(-2a,a),将点P的坐标,代入双曲线,则\frac{4a2}{a^{2}}-\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}则双曲线渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的实轴长为$2$，虚轴长为$4$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Length(RealAxis(G))=2;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 4
process: 由题意,2a=2,2b=4,得a=1,b=2.\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{5}.\therefore双曲线的焦距为2\sqrt{5}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为点$F$，点$B$是虚轴的一个端点，点$P$为双曲线$C$左支上一个动点，若$\triangle B P F$周长的最小值等于实轴长的$4$倍，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;OneOf(Endpoint(ImageinaryAxis(C))) = B;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));Min(Perimeter(TriangleOf(B, P, F))) = 4*Length(RealAxis(C))
process: 把P到右焦点的距离转化为P到左焦点的距离,根据最小值可建立a,b,c的等式,从而求得\frac{b}{a},得渐近线方程.设F_{1}是双曲线的左焦点,如图,则|PF|=|PF_{1}|+2a,|BF|+|BP|+|PF|=|BF|+|BP|+|PF_{1}|+2a,显然|BP|+|PF_{1}|\geqslant|BF_{1}|=\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}},当且仅当B,P,F_{1}三点共线时取等号,\therefore\DeltaBPF的最小值是2\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}}+2a,\therefore2\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}}+2a=4\times2a^{,}9a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}=b^{2}+b^{2}+a^{2}b^{2}=4a^{2},\frac{b}{a}=2^{n}\therefore渐近线方程为y=\pm2x

text: 若斜率为$2$的直线经过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Slope(H)=2;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);Intersection(H,G)={A,B}
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则对于抛物线x^{2}=4y,焦点弦长|AB|=p+(y_{1}+y_{2}).因为抛物线的焦点坐标为(0,1),k_{AB}=2,所以直线AB的方程为y=2x+1,即x=\frac{y-1}{2}将x=\frac{y-1}{2}代入抛物线方程,得y^{2}-18y+1=0,从而y_{1}+y_{2}=18,所以|AB|=2+18=20

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，线段$MF$的中点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$2$，则$| PF |$=?
fact_expressions: M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,F)) = P;Distance(P, yAxis) = 2

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P(x, y)$为该抛物线上的动点，又已知定点$A(2,2)$，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(A) = (2, 2);Focus(G) = F;x1:Number;y1:Number;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点为F(1,0),准线为l:x=-1,如下图所示:\"的垂线,垂足为点B.由抛物线的定义可得|PB|=|PF|,所以,|PA|+|PF|=|PA|+|PB|,当且仅当A、P、B三点共线时,即当AB\botl时,|PA|+|PB|取得最小值为2+1=3

fact_expressions: O1: Circle;Expression(O1) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);O2: Circle;Expression(O2) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 4);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;TangentOfPoint(P, O1) = LineOf(P, A);TangentOfPoint(P, O2) = LineOf(P, B);TangentPoint(LineOf(P, A), O1) = A;TangentPoint(LineOf(P, B), O2) = B;A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B))

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上一点$P(m, n)$到其焦点的距离为$8 m$，则$m$=?

process: 由题意得,抛物线的准线方程为x=-2,又点P(m,n)到焦点的距离为8m,所以|PF|=m+2=8m,解得m=\frac{2}{7}

fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x - 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率$e \in (1 , 2)$，则其中一条渐近线的斜率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e, (1, 2))

text: 以双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$为圆心，$\sqrt{2} a$为半径作圆，与双曲线右支交于$P$、$Q$二点，若$\angle P A Q=\frac{\pi}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;A: Point;Q: Point;H:Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;Center(H)=A;Radius(H)=sqrt(2)*a;Intersection(H,RightPart(C))={P,Q};AngleOf(P, A, Q) = pi/2
process: 由题意易知:|PA|=\sqrt{2}a,\anglePAO=45^{\circ},故P(2a,a),带入双曲线方程,得:4-\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=1即a^{2}=3b^{2},4a^{2}=3c^{2},即e=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=6 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$C$的准线交$x$轴于点$M$. 若$|A F|=2|M F|$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 6*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F))
process: 由抛物线方程,求出焦点坐标,准线方程,|AF|=2|MF|=6,根据焦半径公式和抛物线方程求出A,进而求出直线AB方程,与抛物线方程联立,求出B点坐标,求出|BF|,即可求解抛物线C:的焦点为F,的准线交x轴于点M;抛物线C:y^{2}=6x的焦点为|MF|=6,设点A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),根据对称性不妨设A在第一象限,即y_{1}>0根据抛物线的定义|MF|=x_{1}+\frac{3}{2}=6,\thereforex_{1}=\frac{9}{2}y=\sqrt{\frac{9}{2}\times6}=3\sqrt{3}.A(\frac{9}{2},3\sqrt{3}),直线AB方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{3}{2}).与抛物线方程联立\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{3}{2})\\v2=6x\end{cases},消去x整理得,\sqrt{3}y^{2}-6y-9\sqrt{3}=0,解得y_{1}=3\sqrt{3},y_{2}=-\sqrt{3},x_{2}=\frac{1}{2},\therefore|BF|=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{3}{2}=2.\therefore|AB|=|AF|+|BF|=8.b然安为\cdot8青】本题考查抛物线与直线的关系,考杳应用抛物线定义求焦点弦,属于中档题

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 + 3*y^2 = 1)
process: 试题分析:2x^{2}+3y^{2}=1\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{1}+\frac{y^{2}}{1}=1\thereforea^{2}=\frac{1}{2},b^{2}=\frac{1}{3}\thereforec^{2}=\frac{1}{6}\thereforec=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{6},焦点坐标为(\pm\frac{\sqrt{6}}{6},0)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x)
process: 试题分析:一次项系数除以4得焦点横坐标或纵坐标,所以焦点(2,0)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$有相同的焦点，则$a$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{a>0}=1的焦点在x轴上依题意得\begin{cases}a\\0<a^{2}<4,\\4-a^{2}=a+2\end{cases}解得a=1(4-a^{2}=a+2

text: 已知点$A$ ,$B$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的两点，$O$为原点，若$\overrightarrow {OA} \cdot \overrightarrow {OB}=0$，则点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0

text: 若双曲线$E$的两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，且$E$的两焦点坐标为$(0, \pm \sqrt{5})$，则双曲线$E$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(E)) = (y = pm*2*x);Coordinate(Focus(E)) = (0, pm*sqrt(5))

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=2$的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 2)
process: 将双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=2化为标准方程得\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1'为等轴双曲线,\therefore双曲线的右焦点坐标为(2,0),一条渐近线方程为y=\pmx,即x\pmy=0,\therefore根据对称性,焦点到渐近线的距离为\frac{|2-0|}{\sqrt{1+1}}=\sqrt{2},

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$ , $P$为$x$轴上一动点，经过点$P$的直线$y=2 x+m(m\neq 0)$与双曲线$C$有且只有一个交点，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, xAxis) = True;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = m + 2*x);m: Number;Negation(m = 0);NumIntersection(G, C) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，经过点$P(1 , 0)$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且$2 \overrightarrow{B P}=\overrightarrow{P A}$，则$|A F|+2|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;P: Point;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (1, 0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};2*VectorOf(B, P) = VectorOf(P, A)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1)
process: 根据双曲线标准方程的特征即可求解.[详解]由题可知a^{2}=4\Rightarrowa=2\Rightarrow2a=4.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$，两焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线交双曲线于$A$、$B$两点，且$\triangle A B F_{1}$内切圆的半径为$a$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;l:Line;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F2,l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(A,B,F1)))=a

text: 一动圆过定点$A(2,0)$，且与定圆$B$: $x^{2}+4 x+y^{2}-32=0$内切，则动圆圆心$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(A, C);B: Circle;Expression(B) = (y^2 + x^2 + 4*x - 32 = 0);IsInTangent(C, B);M: Point;Center(C) = M
process: 圆B的方程化为标准形式为(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=36,圆心B(-2,0),其半径为R=6设动圆圆心M的坐标为(x,y),半径为r.由题意|BM|=R-r,又r=|MA|,所以|BM|=R-|BA|,即|BM|+|CM|=6,所以由椭圆的定义知,M的轨迹是以B(-2,0),A(2,0)为焦点,线段AB的中点O(0,0)为中心的椭圆.设椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),则a=3,c=2,b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{5},所以所求圆心M的轨迹方程是\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1

text: 已知$F$是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左焦点，$P$是椭圆$E$上的动点，$A(1, \sqrt{3})$为一个定点，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: F: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F;E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E) = True;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, sqrt(3))
process: 首先根据椭圆的定义得到|PF|=8-|PF_{2}|,将|PA|+|PF|转化为|PA|-|PF_{2}|+8,再根据图像求出|PA|-|PF_{2}|的最大值即可.设椭圆的右焦点为F_{2},如图所示:因为|PF|+|PF_{2}|=2a=8,所以|PF|=8-|PF_{2}|所以|PA|+|PF|=|PA|-|PF_{2}|+8.当P点运动到P的位置时,此时A,F_{2},P_{1}三点共线.|PA|-|PF_{2}|取得最大值为|AF_{2}|=\sqrt{(1-2)^{2}+\sqrt{3}}=2所以|PA|+|PF|=|PA|-|PF_{2}|+8\leqslant2+8=10.|PA|+|PF|的最大值为10.

text: 已知椭圆的标准方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，则该椭圆的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1)

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$恒过定点$A(1 , 2)$，则椭圆的中心到准线的距离的最小值?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);A: Point;Coordinate(A)=(1, 2);PointOnCurve(A, C)

text: 已知椭圆$E$的中心在原点、对称轴为两坐标轴,且一个焦点为$F(0,1)$, 离心率为$e=\frac{1}{2}$,则该椭圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;F: Point;O:Origin;Center(E)=O;SymmetryAxis(E)=axis;Coordinate(F) = (0, 1);OneOf(Focus(E))=F;e:Number;e=1/2;Eccentricity(E)=e
process: \because椭圆E的一个一个焦点为F(0,1)\therefore可得c=1设椭圆E方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\becausee=\frac{1}{2}\therefore\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2},可得a=2根据b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{2^{2}-1^{2}}=\sqrt{3}\therefore椭圆E方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{4}+\frac{x^{2}}{3}=1

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/m = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-4, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = {F1,F2}
process: 因为焦点坐标为(-4,0)和(4,0),所以焦点在x轴上,m<25,c=4,所以25-m=4^{2},解得m=9.睛】本题考查了椭圆的相关性质,主要考查了椭圆的a、b、c三者之间的关系以及椭圆的焦点与椭圆的标准方程之间的关系,考查了计算能力,是简单题.

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$,$\Delta A B F_{1}$的顶点$A$, $B$在椭圆上，且边$AB$经过右焦点$F_{2}$，则$\triangle A B F_{1}$的周长是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(F2, LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 过抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点$F$作一条倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 设点A坐标为(x_{1},y_{1}),点B坐标为(x_{2},y_{2}),抛物线y=\frac{1}{4}x2的焦点为(0,1),由题意知直线的方程为x=\sqrt{3}y-\sqrt{3},联立抛物线方程与直线方程得:3(y-1)^{2}=4y,即3y^{2}-10y+3=0\textcircled{1}交点A,B的纵坐标为方程\textcircled{1}的两个解,由韦达定理得:y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{10}{3},由抛物线性质可知,点A到抛物线焦点的距离为y_{1}+1,点B到抛物线焦点的距离为y_{2}+1,所以|+1+y_{1}+1=y+y_{1}+2=\frac{16}{3},故本题正确答案为\frac{16}{3}

text: 若一个椭圆的长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，焦距为$8$，则这个椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 3 * Length(MinorAxis(G));FocalLength(G) = 8
process: 若椭圆的焦点在x轴,可设椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),且2c=8,即c=4又2a=6b,\thereforea=3b,结合a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2},得9b^{2}=b^{2}+16,\thereforeb^{2}=2^{n}则a^{2}=9b^{2}=18.\therefore椭圆标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{18}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1若椭圆的焦点在y轴,同理可得\frac{y^{2}}{18}+\frac{x^{2}}{2}=1

text: 焦点坐标为$(-5,0)$和$(5,0)$，且点$B(0,12)$在椭圆上，那么这个椭圆的标准方程?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(A) = (5, 0);Coordinate(B) = (0, 12);Focus(G)={H,A};PointOnCurve(B, G)

text: 已知$A(0,7)$ , $B(0,-7)$ , $C(12,2)$，以$C$为一个焦点作过$A$、$B$的椭圆，则椭圆的另一个焦点$F$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 7);Coordinate(B) = (0, -7);Coordinate(C) = (12, 2);Focus(G)={C,F};PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);F:Point
process: 根据椭圆定义得到|AF|-|BF|=2,故焦点F的轨迹方程为双曲线的下支,计算得到答案根据椭圆定义知:|AF|+|AC|=|BF|+|BC|,即|AF|+13=|BF|+15,故|AF|-|BF|=2故焦点F的轨迹方程为双曲线的下支,a=1,c=7,故b=4\sqrt{3}故轨迹方程为:y2-\frac{x2}{48}=1(y<0)

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点. 若$|A F|=6 $,$|B F|=3$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 6;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 3
process: 设过抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的准线l与x轴交于点G,与直线AB交于C,过A作l的垂线,垂足为E,作BD\botl于D,根据相似三角形性质可得\frac{BD}{AE}=\frac{BF}{AF}=\frac{1}{2}\RightarrowB是AC中点,可得BC=9,\frac{FG}{AE}=\frac{CF}{AC}\Rightarrow\frac{FG}{6}=\frac{12}{18}\RightarrowFG=4,\thereforeP=4,

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (2*(m*x^2) + y^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: 将椭圆y^{2}+2mx^{2}=1(m>0)化为标准方程是y^{2}+\frac{x^{2}}{2m}=1若\frac{1}{2m}>1,即0<m<\frac{1}{2},则椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{1-1}}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{2m}}}=\frac{1}{2},解得:m=\frac{3}{8};若\frac{1}{2m}<1,即m>\frac{1}{2},则椭圆的离心率为\_e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{2m}}}{}1,解得:m=\frac{2}{3},

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+x^{2}=1(a>1)$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$, $P$为椭圆上的一个动点，则$P$与定点$B(-1,0)$连线距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;B: Point;P: Point;e:Number;a>1;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(B) = (-1, 0);Eccentricity(G)=e;e = (2*sqrt(5))/5;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 椭圆\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+x^{2}=1(a>1)的离心率e=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5},可得\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-1}}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5},解得a=\sqrt{5}椭圆方程为\frac{y^{2}}{5}+x^{2}=1,设点P(x,y),则-1\leqslantx\leqslant1,y^{2}=5-5x^{2},

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$ ,过点$P(0,6)$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$是线段$P B$的中点，则点$A$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;P: Point;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (0, 6);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,B)) = A
process: \textcircled{1}当直线l斜率不存在时,l方程为:y=0\RightarrowA(0,2\sqrt{3}),B(0,-2\sqrt{3}),很显然不满足题意,舍去\textcircled{2}当直线l斜率存在时,设l:y=kx+6,代入椭圆方程得:(3+4k^{2})x^{2}+48kx+96=0令A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{48k}{3+4k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{96}{3+4k^{2}}\RightarrowA(2,3)或A(-2,3)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$(-1,0)$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$4|F A|+|F B|$的最小值为$19$，则抛物线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;H:Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(H) = (-1, 0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(H, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Min(4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))) = 19
process: 设AB:y=k(x+1),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立方程:\begin{cases}y=k(x+1)\\y^{2}=2px\end{cases}\Rightarrowx_{2}x_{1}=14|FA|+|FB|=(4x_{1}+x_{2})+\frac{5}{2}p\geqslant4+\frac{5}{2}p=19\Rightarrowp=6,y^{2}=12x.

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$分别与双曲线的左、右支交于点$A$、$B$，若以$A B$为直径的圆过点$F_{2}$且$|A F_{2}|=|B F_{2}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, LeftPart(C)) =A;Intersection(l,RightPart(C))=B;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(F2,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F2))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(B,F2))
process: 先根据题意,判断出\triangleABF_{2}为等腰直角三角形,找到|BF_{2}|=2\sqrt{2}a,在\triangleF_{1}BF_{2}中,利用余弦定理建立关于a、c的齐次式,求出离心率e.因为以AB为直径的圆过点F_{2},所以AF_{2}\botBF_{2},又|AF_{2}|=|BF_{2}|,所以\triangleABF_{2}为等腰直角三角形,所以\angleABF_{2}=45^{\circ}设|AF_{2}|=|BF_{2}|=t,则|AB|=\sqrt{2}t由双曲线的定义可得|AF_{2}|-|AF_{1}|=2a,|BF_{1}|-|BF_{2}|=2a,两式相加得:|BF_{1}|-|AF_{1}|=4a,即|AB|=4a.所以\sqrt{2}t=4a,解得:t=2\sqrt{2}a.在\triangleF_{1}BF_{2}中,|BF_{1}|=2a+|BF_{2}|=(2+2\sqrt{2})a_{1}|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,|BF_{2}|=2\sqrt{2}a,\angleF_{1}BF_{2}=45^{\circ}由余弦定理得:|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=|BF_{1}|^{2}+|BF_{2}|^{2}-2|BF_{1}|\times|BF_{2}|\cos45^{\circ}即4c^{2}=((2+2\sqrt{2})a)^{2}+(2\sqrt{2}a)^{2}-2((2+2\sqrt{2})a)\times(2\sqrt{2}a)\times\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},整理化简得e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3}.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左, 右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$在椭圆$C$上 (与$A$、$B$不重合)，直线$A P$与$y$轴交于点$M$，过点$A$作$A N \| B P$，直线$A N$与$y$轴交于点$N$，若点$S(t, 0)$满足$\overrightarrow{S M} \cdot \overrightarrow{S N}=5$，则$t$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);M: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, P), yAxis) = M;N: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, N));IsParallel(LineOf(A, N), LineOf(B, P));Intersection(LineOf(A, N), yAxis) = N;S: Point;t: Number;Coordinate(S) = (t, 0);DotProduct(VectorOf(S, M), VectorOf(S, N)) = 5
process: 设P(x_{0},y_{0}),则\frac{x_{0}2}{2}+y_{0}^{2}=1;由题意A(-\sqrt{2},0),B(\sqrt{2},0),直线AP的方程为\frac{y-0}{y_{0}-0}=\frac{x+\sqrt{2}}{x_{0}+\sqrt{2}},令x=0可得y=\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}+\sqrt{2}},即M(0,\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}+\sqrt{2}}设N(0,n),因为AN//BP,所以\frac{n}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}-\sqrt{2}}\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}-\sqrt{2}},即N(0,\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}-\sqrt{2}}\overrightarrow{SM}=(-t,\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}+\sqrt{2}}),\overrightarrow{SN}=(-t,\frac{\sqrt{2}y_{0}}{x_{0}-\sqrt{2}})因为\overrightarrow{SM}\cdot\overrightarrow{SN}=5,所以t^{2}+\frac{2y_{0}^{2}}{x_{0}2-2}=5由\frac{x_{0}2}{2}+y_{0}2=1得2y_{0}^{2}=2-x_{0}^{2},代入可得t^{2}=6,即t=\pm\sqrt{6}

text: 已知$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，并且椭圆上点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);AngleOf(F1,P,F2)=ApplyUnit(90,degree)

text: 设椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$, $F$是右焦点，$l$是过点$F$的一条直线（不与$y$轴平行），交椭圆于$A$, $B$两点，$l^{\prime}$是$A B$的中垂线，交椭圆的长轴于一点$D$，则$\frac{D F}{A B}$的值是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;l1:Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Negation(IsParallel(l,yAxis));Intersection(l,C)={A,B};PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = l1;Intersection(MajorAxis(C),l1)=D

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$M$、$N$在双曲线$E$的一条渐近线上，$|F M|=|F N|=\sqrt{3} a$且$\overrightarrow{F M} \cdot \overrightarrow{F N}=a^{2}$，则双曲线$E$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;RightFocus(E) = F;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;J: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(E)) = J;PointOnCurve(M, J) = True;PointOnCurve(N, J) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, M)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N)) = sqrt(3)*a;DotProduct(VectorOf(F, M), VectorOf(F, N)) = a^2
process: 根据题意作出示意图,利用已知条件求解出焦点F到渐近线的距离|PF|,再根据点到直线的距离公式求解出|PF|的长度,两者相等即可得到对应的离心率因为\overrightarrow{FM}\cdot\overrightarrow{FN}=a^{2},|FM|=|FN|=\sqrt{3}a,所以\cos\angleMFN=\frac{a2}{(\sqrt{3}a)^{2}}=\frac{1}{3}又因为\angleMFP=\angleNFP,所以2\cos^{2}\angleMFP-1=\frac{1}{3},所以\cos\angleMFP=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}所以\frac{|PF|}{|MF|}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},所以|PF|=\sqrt{2}a,取渐近线bx-ay=0,根据点到直线的距离公式可知:|PF|=\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=b所以\sqrt{2}a=b,所以2a^{2}=b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2},所以c^{2}=3a^{2},所以e^{2}=3,e=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$上一点，$Q$为双曲线$C$渐近线上一点，$P$、$Q$均位于第一象限，且$2 \overrightarrow{Q P}=\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$，$\overrightarrow{Q F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{Q F_{2}}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Q: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);PointOnCurve(Q,Asymptote(C));Quadrant(P)=1;Quadrant(Q)=1;2*VectorOf(Q, P) = VectorOf(P, F2);DotProduct(VectorOf(Q, F1), VectorOf(Q, F2)) = 0
process: 由双曲线的方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},P为双曲线C上的一点,Q为双曲线C的渐近线上的一点,且P,Q都位于第一象限,且2\overrightarrow{QP}=\overrightarrow{PF}_{2},\overrightarrow{QF}\cdot\overrightarrow{QF}_{2}=0,可知P为QF_{2}的三等分点,设P(x_{1},y_{1}),将坐标用a,b,c表示,并代入双曲线方程,即可得到离心率的值.由双曲线的方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},P为双曲线C上的一点,Q为双曲线C的渐近线上的一点,且P,Q都位于第一象限,且2\overrightarrow{QP}=\overrightarrow{PF}_{2},\overrightarrow{QF}\cdot\overrightarrow{QF}_{2}=0,可知P为QF_{2}的三等分点,且\overrightarrow{QF}_{1}\bot\overrightarrow{QF}_{2}点Q在直线bx-ay=0上,并且|OQ|=c,则Q(a,b),F_{2}(c,0)设P(x_{1},y_{1}),则2(x_{1}-a,y_{1}-b)=(c-x_{1},-y_{1})解得x_{1}=\frac{2a+c}{3},\frac{2b}{3},即P(\frac{2a+c}{3},\frac{2b}{3})代入双曲线的方程可得\frac{(2a+c)^{2}}{9a^{2}}-\frac{4}{9}=1'解得e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{13}-2,

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$是椭圆上的任意一点，则$\frac{|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|}{P F_{1}}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: \frac{|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|}{PF_{1}}=\frac{|PF_{1}-(8-PF_{1}|}{PF_{1}}=|\frac{PF_{1}-(8-PF_{1}}{PF_{1}}|=|2-\frac{8}{PF_{1}}|因为2\leqslantPF_{1}\leqslant6且函数y=2-\frac{8}{x}在x\in[2,6]上单调递增,所以-2\leqslant2-\frac{8}{PF}\leqslant\frac{2}{3},故|2-\frac{8}{PF}|\in[0,2]

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，其一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，点$P(\sqrt{3} , y_{0})$在该双曲线上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;y0:Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), y0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=x);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$, $\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=2$，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 2

text: $P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上的点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是其焦点，双曲线的离心率是$\frac{5}{4}$，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$，若$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为$9$，则$a+b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Eccentricity(G) = 5/4;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Area(TriangleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 9

text: 若点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$上，它的横坐标与双曲线的右焦点的横坐标相同，则点$P$与双曲线的左焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/12 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);XCoordinate(P) = XCoordinate(RightFocus(G))
process: 记双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},因为点P在双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1上,它的横坐标与双曲线的右焦点的横坐标相同所以点P的横坐标为:x_{P}=\sqrt{16+12}=2\sqrt{7},因此\frac{28}{16}-\frac{y_{P}^{2}}{12}=1,解得y_{P}=\pm3,因此|PF_{2}|=3,由双曲线定义可得:||PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}||=2a=8,所以|PF_{1}|=11或|PF_{1}|=-5(舍)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上任一点，当$\frac{|PF_{1}|^{2}}{|PF_{2}|} |$最小值为$8 a$时，该双曲线离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 8*a;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 试题分析:由定义知:|PF_{2}|\cdot|PF_{1}|=2a,\therefore|PF_{2}|=2a+|PF_{1}|,\therefore\frac{|PF_{2}|^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{(2a+|PF_{1}|)}{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{4a^{2}}{|PF_{1}|^{+}4a+|PF_{1}|}\geqslant8a.当且仅当\frac{4a^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}=|PF_{1}|,即|PF_{1}|=2a时取得等号.然后利用焦半径公式可以导出该双曲线离心率c的取值范围.由定义知:|PF_{2}|\cdot|PF_{1}|=2a,\therefore|PF_{2}|=2a+|PF_{1}|,\frac{|PF_{2}|^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{(2a+|PF_{1}|)^{2}}{|PF_{1}|}|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|+4a+|PF_{1}|>8a当且仅当\frac{4a^{2}}{|PF|}=|PF_{1}|,即|PF_{1}|=2a时取得等号设P(x_{0},y_{0}),(x_{0}\leqslant-a)依焦半径公式得:|PF_{1}|=-e\timesx_{0}-a=2a,\thereforex_{0}=-3a\thereforee=-\frac{3a}{x_{0}}\leqslant3又\becausee>1,故e\in(1,3]答案:(1,3].

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点$M$、$N$为抛物线上的一点，且满足$|M N|=2 | N F|$,则$\angle NMF$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;Intersection(Directrix(G),xAxis)=M;PointOnCurve(N,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,N))=2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F))

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作渐近线的一条垂线，若该垂线恰好与以$F_{1}$为圆心，$|O F_{1}|$为半径的圆相切，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;O: Origin;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F2,L);IsPerpendicular(Asymptote(C),L);Center(G)=F1;Radius(G)=Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,F1));IsTangent(L,G)
process: 设过F_{2}作渐近线的一条垂线为l:y=k(x-c),根据该垂线恰好与以F_{1}为圆心,|OF_{1}|为半径的圆相切,根据点到直线距离公式可得\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}},由e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}},即可求得答案.\because双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的左、右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2}可得:F_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0)过F_{2}作渐近线的一条垂线,不妨设与y=\frac{b}{a}x垂直设过F_{2}作渐近线的一条垂线为l:y=k(x-c)根据题意画出图象,根据图象可得k存在由两条两条直线垂直可得:\frac{b}{a}\cdotk=故k=-\frac{a}{b}又\becauseF_{1}为圆心,|OF_{1}|为半径的圆\therefore(x+c)^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2}根据点到直线距离公式可得:\frac{|-\frac{a}{\sqrt{1+(\frac{a}{a})^{2}}}|}=c整理可得:\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{1}{3},即\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=3双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+3}=2

text: 如果过两点$A(a, 0)$和$B(0 , a)$的直线与抛物线$y=x^{2}-2 x-3$没有交点，那么实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: a: Real;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (a, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (0, a);H: Line;PointOnCurve(A, H);PointOnCurve(B, H);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2 - 2*x - 3);NumIntersection(H, G) = 0

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>\sqrt{3})$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则直线$y=6 x$与$C$的其中一个交点到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;G: Line;a>sqrt(2);Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = 6*x);Eccentricity(C) = 1/2
process: \becausee=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{3}{a^{2}}}=\frac{1}{2},\thereforea=2,由\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\\y=6x\end{cases},得|x|=\frac{2}{7}.\therefore直线v=6x与C的其中一个交点到y轴的距离为\frac{2}{5}

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的点$A$到焦点的距离为$10$，则$A$到$x$轴的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);PointOnCurve(A, G);Distance(A, Focus(G)) = 10
process: 根据抛物线方程可求得焦点坐标为(0,1),准线方程为y=-1\because抛物线x^{2}=4y上的点A到焦点的距离为10\therefore点A到x轴的距离是10-1=9

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点,点$P$在椭圆上，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{| \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(Q, RightDirectrix(G));VectorOf(P, Q) = 2*VectorOf(F1, O);lambda:Number;VectorOf(F1, Q) = lambda*(VectorOf(F1, O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, O)) + VectorOf(F1, P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, P)));lambda>0

text: 已知$P$为抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的动点，点$P$在$x$轴上的射影为$M$，点$A$的坐标是$(2,0)$，则$|P A|+|P M|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P,G);Projection(P, xAxis) = M
process: 试题分析:由抛物线的定义得PA+|PM|=|PF|-1+|PA|\geqslant|AF|-1=\sqrt{5}-1.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}$，椭圆上一点$P$到两焦点距离之和为$12$，则椭圆的短轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)/3;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 12
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)的离心率:e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}椭圆上一点P到两焦点距离之和为12,即:2a=12.可得:a=6,c=2\sqrt{5},\thereforeb=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{36-20}=4则椭圆的短轴长:2b=8.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{25}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$上的点$P$到一个焦点的距离为$11$，则它到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 - y^2/24 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 11
process: 设双曲线的左、右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},不妨设PF_{1}=11,根据双曲线的定义知PF_{1}-PF_{2}|=2a=10,\thereforePF_{2}=1或PF_{2}=21,而F_{1}F_{2}=14,\therefore当PF_{2}=1时,1+11<14(舍去),\thereforePF_{2}=21.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线过点$P(1, \frac{4}{3})$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 4/3);PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(G))

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，点$A$在$E$上，且$|A F|=2|O F|$，若$|O A|=\sqrt{10}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(A, E);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = sqrt(10)
process: 设A(x_{0},y_{0}),由题知F(\frac{p}{2},0),|OF|=\frac{p}{2},因为|AF|=2|OF|,所以|AF|=2|OF|=p因为点A在E上,所以|AF|=x_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=p,解得x_{0}=\frac{p}{2}所以A(\frac{p}{2},\pmp)所以|\_|OA|=\sqrt{10}=\sqrt{\frac{p^{2}}{4}+p^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}p'解得p=2\sqrt{2}

text: 在平面坐标系中,动点$P$和点$M(-2,0)$ , $N(2,0)$满足$|\overrightarrow{M N}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{M P}|+\overrightarrow{M N} \cdot \overrightarrow{N P}=0$, 则动点$P(x, y)$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 0);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, N), VectorOf(N, P)) + DotProduct(Abs(VectorOf(M, N)), Abs(VectorOf(M, P))) = 0;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number
process: |\overrightarrow{MN}|\cdot|\overrightarrow{MP}|+\overrightarrow{MN}\cdot\overrightarrow{NP}=0,则4\sqrt{(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}}+(4,0)\cdot(x-2,y)=0即\sqrt{(x+2)^{2}+y2}=2-x,化简得到y^{2}=-8x

text: 平面内到一定点$F$和到一定直线$l$($F$在$l$上)的距离相等的点的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;F:Point;G:Point;PointOnCurve(F,l);Distance(F,G)=Distance(G,l)
process: 因为F在l上,所以平面内到一定点F和到一定直线l(F在l上)的距离相等的点的轨迹是过点F且垂直于/的直线.

text: 设点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>0)$的左、右焦点，过点$F_{1}$且与$x$轴垂直的直线$l$与双曲线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点.若$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为$2 \sqrt{6}$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);IsPerpendicular(xAxis,l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(A, B, F2)) = 2*sqrt(6)
process: 先求出A、B两点坐标,即可得弦长|AB|,S_{\triangleABF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times|AB|\times|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{6},结合c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},b^{2}=2,即可求出a得值,渐近线方程即为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x设F_{1}(-c,0),b=\sqrt{2},将x=-c代入\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1可得:y^{2}=\frac{4}{a^{2}},即y=\pm\frac{2}{a}所以A(-c,\frac{2}{a})、B(-c,-\frac{2}{a}),|AB|=\frac{4}{a}则S_{\DeltaABF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times|AB|\times|F_{1}F_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{4}{a}\times2c=2\sqrt{6}则\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},又因为c^{2}=a^{2}+2,解得:a=2,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},故该双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 已知双曲线的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{5} x$的焦点相同，且双曲线的渐进线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{2} x$，则此双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*(sqrt(5)*x));OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/2))
process: 由题知:抛物线y^{2}=4\sqrt{5}x的焦点为:(\sqrt{5},0)设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)得:\begin{cases}c=\sqrt{5}\\\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\\c^{2}=a2+b^{2}\end{cases}解得a=2,b=1所以双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1.

text: 设$M$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的一个点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的焦点，如果点$M$到点$F_{1}$的距离是$4$，那么点$M$到点$F_{2}$的距离是?

text: 已知直线$l$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线，半径为$3$的圆过抛物线顶点$O$和焦点$F$与$l$相切，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;O: Origin;F:Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Directrix(G)=l;Radius(H)=3;Vertex(G)=O;Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(O,H);PointOnCurve(F,H);IsTangent(H,l)
process: 依题意设圆的方程为:(x-a)^{2}+(y\cdotb)^{2}=3^{2}(r>0),抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0)半径为3的圆过抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的顶点O和焦点F则\begin{cases}a^{2}+b^{2}=3^{2}\\(\frac{p}{2}-a)^{2}+b^{2}=3^{2}\end{cases}解得p=\frac{4}{3}\times3=4,因此抛物线的方程为:y^{2}=8x
