text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$A$在$E$上，以$A$为圆心的圆与$y$轴相切，且交$A F$于点$B$，若$|A B|=2|B F|$，则圆$A$截线段$A F$的垂直平分线所得弦长为$\sqrt{7}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;G: Circle;p>0;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(A, E);Center(G) = A;IsTangent(G, yAxis);Intersection(G, LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = B;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F));Length(InterceptChord(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, F)), G)) = sqrt(7)
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),以A为圆心的圆与y轴相切,则半径r=|x_{1}|,由抛物线的定义可知,|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2},又|AB|=2|BF|\therefore|AF|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+\frac{1}{2}x_{1},解得x_{1}=p,则|AF|=\frac{3p}{2},圆A截线段AF的垂直平分线所得弦长为\sqrt{7}即p^{2}-\frac{9p^{2}}{16}=\frac{7}{4},解得p=2

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F(1,0)$，过点$F$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$M$，若$\triangle M A B$的面积为$\frac{8 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=8$，则线段$AB$中点的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8
process: 试题分析:由抛物线y^{2}=4x,可得焦点F(1,0),若AB\botx轴,则|AB|=2p=4,不符合条件,舍去.设直线l的方程为:my=(x-1),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).联立\begin{cases}my=x-1\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},化为y^{2}-4my-4=0,\thereforey_{1}+y_{2}=4m,y_{1}\cdoty_{2}=-4.\therefore化为m^{2}=1,解得m=\pm1,当m=1时,联立\begin{cases}y=x-1\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},化为x^{2}-6x+1=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=6因此\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=3.同理可得:m=-1时,\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=3.\therefore线段AB中点的横坐标为3.

text: 已知椭圆中心在原点，一个焦点为$(\sqrt{3} , 0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则该椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(3), 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 已知椭圆中心在原点,一个焦点为(\sqrt{3},0),且长轴长是短轴长的2倍.故得到c=\sqrt{3},a=2b,\becausea^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}\thereforeb^{2}=1,b=1a=2.故得到椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到准线的距离为$d_{1}$，到直线$l$: $4 x-3 y+16=0$为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Distance(P, Directrix(G)) = d1;d1: Number;l: Line;Expression(l) = (4*x - 3*y + 16 = 0);Distance(P, l) = d2;d2: Number
process: 如图,点P是抛物线上任一点,根据抛物线的定义可知d_{1}=|PF|,所以d_{1}+d_{2}=|PF|+d_{2},由图可知,|PF|+d_{2}的最小值是点F到直线4x-3y+16=0的距离F(1,0)到直线l:4x-3y+16=0的距离d=\frac{|4+16|}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}=4,所以d_{1}+d_{2}的最小值为4.效答客为:4

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1 $, $F_{1} $, $F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线上的第一象限内的点，点$I$为$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，$\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}$的面积的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, C);Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I
process: 先由双曲线的定义得到点I在F_{1}F_{2}上垂足为右顶点,设出渐近线的倾斜角为\theta,则\tan\theta=\frac{4}{3}.\angleIF_{2}H=\alpha,则2\alpha\in(0,\pi-\theta),求出\tan\alpha\in(0,2),从而求出y_{1}=|HF_{2}|\tan\alpha\in(0,4),求出,\triangleIF_{1}F_{2}的面积的取值范围.[详解]由题意得:c^{2}=9+16=25,故|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c=10,设点I(x_{1},y_{1}),且I在F_{1}F_{2}上垂足为H,根据双曲线定义及切线长定理可得:|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=|HF_{1}|-|HF_{2}|,又因为|HF_{1}|+|HF_{2}|=2c,解得:|HF_{1}|=a+c,所以点H坐标为(a,0),即渐近线y=\frac{4}{3}x的倾斜角为\theta,则\tan\theta=\frac{4}{3},记\angleIF_{2}H=\alpha,则2\alpha\in(0,\pi-\theta),所以\alpha<\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{\theta}{2},即^{ta1}a<\tan(\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{\theta}{2})=\frac{1}{\tan\frac{\theta}{2}},又\frac{2\tan\frac{\theta}{2}}{1-\tan^{2}}=\tan\theta=\frac{4}{3},解得:\tan\frac{\theta}{2}=\frac{1}{2}(负值舍)所以\tan\alpha\in(0,2),则y=|HF_{2}|\tan\alpha\in(0,4)所以S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|\cdoty_{1}=5y_{1}\in(0,20)

text: 已知直线$l$: $x=m y+1$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点$F$，交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l)=(x=m*y+1);m: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;F: Point;Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l,C)={A,B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 求出直线过定点(1,0),从而可得p=2,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由题意可得y_{1}=-2y_{2},将直线代入抛物线,利用韦达定理可得y_{2}=\pm\sqrt{2},从而求出斜率.由直线x=my+1过(1,0),所以p=2,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{FB},可得y_{1}=-2y_{2},直线x=my+1与抛物线y^{2}=4x联立得,y^{2}=4my所以y_{1}y_{2}=-4,可得y_{2}=\pm\sqrt{2}所以k=\frac{\pm\sqrt{2}}{1-1}=\pm2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$A B$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，交准线于点$C$，若$|B C|=2|B F|$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, LineOf(A, B));Intersection(LineOf(A, B), G) = {A, B};Intersection(LineOf(A, B), Directrix(G)) = C;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 分别过A,B作准线的垂线,利用抛物线的定义将A,B到焦点的距离转化到准线的距离,利用已知和相似三角形的相似比,建立关系式,求解|AF|,|BF|可算得弦长\_设y^{2}=4x=2px,可知p=2如图,作AM,BN垂直于准线分别于M,N,则|BN|=|BF|又|BC|=2|BN|,\frac{|CB|}{|CF}=\frac{2}{3},'\therefore\frac{|BN|}{P}=\frac{2}{3}|BN|=\frac{4}{3},|BC|=\frac{8}{3},\therefore|CF|=4\frac{2}{|AM|}=\frac{|CF|}{|CA|},\therefore\frac{2}{|AM|}=\frac{|CF|}{|CA|}=\frac{4}{4+|AM|},解得|AM|=4\therefore|AF|=4|AB|=|AF|+|BF|=4+\frac{4}{3}=\frac{16}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$4 x-3 y=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{3}{5} x$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = (3/5)*x)
process: 结合双曲线的标准方程可得双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x据此有:\frac{b}{a}=\frac{5}{3},\therefore\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{c^{2}-a^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{25}{9},则:e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{25}{9}+1=\frac{34}{9},\thereforee=\frac{\sqrt{34}}{3}

text: 已知抛物线$y=ax^{2}$的准线方程为$y=1$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在椭圆上 (且不为椭圆的右顶点)，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$,$\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C:Ellipse;a:Number;b:Number;lambda:Number;F1:Point;P:Point ;Q:Point;O:Origin;a>b ;b>0;Expression(C)=(x^2/a^2+y^2/b^2=1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;PointOnCurve(P,C);PointOnCurve(Q,RightDirectrix(C));VectorOf(P,Q)=2*VectorOf(F1,O);VectorOf(F1,Q) = lambda * (VectorOf(F1,P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1,P))+VectorOf(F1,O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1,O)));lambda>0;Negation(RightVertex(C)=P)
process: 因为\overrightarrow{PQ}=2\overrightarrow{F_{1}O},故PQ平行于x轴,且P点的横坐标为\frac{a^{2}}{c}-2c'又\overrightarrow{F_{1}Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1}O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1}O}|})(\lambda>0)知Q点在\anglePF_{1}O角平分线上,故有\anglePF_{1}O=2\angleQF_{1}O由于PQ//F_{1}F_{2},|PQ|=|FF_{2}|,故四边形PF_{1}F_{2}Q是一个平行四边形结合对角线是角平分线可知,四边形PF_{1}F_{2}Q是菱形,则|PF_{1}|=2c由此得|PF_{2}|=2a-2c由椭圆的第二定义知e=\frac{|PF_{2}|}{|PQ|}=\frac{2a-2c}{2c},解得e=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2}

text: 渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$且过点$P(\sqrt{3}, 2 \sqrt{3})$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)*x);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), 2*sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(P, G) = True
process: 若双曲线的焦点在x轴上,设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{32}=1,则\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3}且\frac{3}{a^{2}}-\frac{12}{b^{2}}=1,无解;若双曲线的焦点在y轴上,设双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{12}=1,则\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3}且\frac{12}{a^{2}}-\frac{3}{b^{2}}=1,得a^{2}=3,b^{2}=1,则双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$M(x_{0}, 2 \sqrt{2})(x_{0}>\frac{p}{2})$是抛物线$C$上一点，以$M$为圆心的圆与线段$M F$相交于点$A$，且被直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$截得的弦长为$\sqrt{3}|M A|$，若$|M A|=2$，则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Circle;H: Line;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;p>0;x0: Number;x0 > p/2;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x = p/2);Coordinate(M) = (x0, 2*sqrt(2));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(M, C);Center(G) = M;Intersection(G, LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = A;Length(InterceptChord(H, G)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A));Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A)) = 2
process: 由题意,M(x_{0},2\sqrt{2})在抛物线上,则8=2px_{0},则px_{0}=4,\textcircled{1}则|MA|=2|AF|=\frac{2}{3}|MF|=\frac{2}{3}(x_{0}+\frac{p}{2})\because被直线x=\frac{p}{2}截得的弦长为\sqrt{3}|MA|,则|DE|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|MA|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x_{0}+\frac{p}{2})由|MA|=|ME|=r,在Rt\triangleMDE中,|DE|^{2}+|DM|^{2}=|ME|^{2},即\frac{1}{3}(x_{0}+\frac{p}{2})^{2}+(x_{0}-\frac{p}{2})^{2}=\frac{4}{9}(x_{0}+\frac{p}{2})^{2},代入整理得4x_{0}^{2}+p^{2}=20,\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2},解得x_{0}=2,p=2,\therefore|AF|=\frac{1}{3}(x_{0}+\frac{p}{2})=1,

text: 已知离心率为$2$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m, n \in R)$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点重合，则$\frac{m}{n}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;n: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);Eccentricity(G)=2;Focus(G)=Focus(H)
process: 由题意,椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,可得c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=1,即F(\pm1,0)因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1的焦点与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的焦点重合,即c=1,又由双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1的离心率为2,即e=-\frac{c}{m}=2,解得m=\frac{1}{4}又由-n=c^{2}-m=1-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{3}{4},解得n=-\frac{3}{4}所以\frac{m}{n}=-\frac{1}{3}.

text: 已知抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$、$P$为抛物线$M$上一点. 若$|P F|=5$，则$P$点的坐标为?
fact_expressions: M: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(M) = (y^2 = 16*x);Focus(M)=F;PointOnCurve(P, M);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5
process: 抛物线M:y^{2}=16x的焦点为F(4,0),准线为l:x=-4,若|PF|=5,则P到准线的距离为5,设P(x,y),即x+4=5,解得x=1.代入抛物线方程得y=\pm4,所以P点的坐标为(1,4)或(1,-4)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的离心率为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点是$(5,0)$, 一条渐近线是$3 y-4 x=0$，那么双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (5, 0);OneOf(Focus(G))=H;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(3*y-4*x=0)
process: 因为双曲线的焦点是(5,0),所以c=5,因为渐近线是3y-4x=0,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3},又c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}.所以a=3,b=4,所以双曲线的方程是\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1.

text: 已知直线$l_{1}$: $2 x-y+6=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $x=-1$, $F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，点$P$在抛物线$C$上运动，当点$P$到直线$l_{1}$和直线$l_{2}$的距离之和最小时，直线$PF$被抛物线所截得的线段长是?
fact_expressions: l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (2*x -y + 6 = 0);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (x = -1);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);WhenMin(Distance(P, l1) + Distance(P, l2))
process: 直线l_{2}为抛物线y^{2}=4x的准线,由抛物线的定义知,P到l_{2}的距离等于P到抛物线的焦点F(1,0)的距离.点P到直线l_{1}和直线l_{2}的距离之和最小即转化为点P到点F(1,0)和直线l_{1}的距离之和最小,当点P到点F(1,0)和直线l_{1}的距离之和最小时,直线PF\botl_{1},从而直线PF方程为y=-\frac{1}{2}(x-1),代入C方程得x^{2}-18x+1=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=18,从而所求线段长为x_{1}+x_{2}+p=18+2=20.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=20 x$焦点$F$恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点，且双曲线过点$(\frac{15}{4}, 3)$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;I: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 20*x);Coordinate(I) = (15/4, 3);Focus(H) = F;RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(I, G)
process: 试题分析:由于抛物线y^{2}=20x的焦点为F(5,0).所以双曲线中c=5.又双曲线过点(\frac{15}{4},3).即可得\frac{15^{2}}{16a^{2}}-\frac{3^{2}}{b^{2}}=1.即可解得a=3,b=4,所以双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x

text: 已知点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上, 且点$P$到$y$轴的距离$6$, 则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = 6
process: 先求出焦点坐标,再结合抛物线第一定义即可求解如图,由y^{2};=16x可得焦点坐标为(4,0),则抛物线准线为x=-4,|PB|=6,则|PF|=|PB|+\frac{P}{2}=6+4=10

text: 动点$P(x, y)(x \geq 0)$到点$F(1,0)$的距离与点$P$到$y$轴的距离差为$1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;F: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;x1>=0;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Distance(P,F)-Distance(P,yAxis)=1
process: 试题分析:动点P(x,y)(x\geqslant0)到点F(1,0)的距离与点P到y轴的距离差为1,因此有\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}}=x+1,化简整理得到y^{2}=4x;

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线方程是?焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点到左准线的距离为$\frac{5}{2}$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;Distance(RightFocus(G), LeftDirectrix(G)) = 5/2
process: 由双曲线的焦点及准线求解即可.由x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)可得右焦点F(c,0),左准线为x=-\frac{a^{2}}{c}=-\frac{1}{c}所以c+\frac{1}{c}=\frac{5}{2}解得c=2或c=\frac{1}{2}(舍),所以b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点为$F$，上顶点为$A$，点$P$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=8$上，点$Q$在椭圆上，则$2|P A|+|P Q|-|Q F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;P: Point;A: Point;Q: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 8);RightFocus(G) = F;UpperVertex(G) = A;PointOnCurve(P, H);PointOnCurve(Q, G)
query_expressions: Min(2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)))
process: 求得椭圆的a,b,c,可得焦点坐标和顶点坐标,可P(2\sqrt{2}\cos\theta,2\sqrt{2}\sin\theta),由两点的距离公式可得2|PA|=|PB|,即点P与B(0,4\sqrt{2})的距离,再由椭圆的定义,可得2|PA|+|PQ|-|QF|=|PB|+|PQ|+|QF_{2}|-2\sqrt{6},再由四点共线取得最值,可得所求椭圆\frac{x2}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1的a=\sqrt{6},b=\sqrt{2},c=2,右焦点为F(2,0),右焦点为F_{2}(-2,0),上顶点为A(0,\sqrt{2})2\sqrt{2}\cos\theta,2\sqrt{2}\sin2\sqrt{2}\sin\theta),=2\sqrt{10-8\sin\theta}=\sqrt{40-32\sin\theta}-4\sqrt{2}^{2}点P与B(0,4\sqrt{2})的距离,由椭圆的定义可得-|QF|=|QF_{2}|-2a=|QF_{2}|-2\sqrt{6},\frac{2|PA|+|PQ|-|QF|}{=\sqrt{(0+2)^{2}+(4\sqrt{2})^{2}}-2\sqrt{6}}+|PQ|+|QF_{2}|-2\sqrt{6}\geqslant|BF_{2}|-2\sqrt{6}当且仅当B,P,Q,F_{2}三点共线上式取得等号故2|PA|+|PQ|-|QF|的最小值是6-2\sqrt{6}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$, 点$P$是椭圆$C$上的一个动点,满足$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \geq-1$($O$为坐标原点,$F_{2}$为椭圆的右焦点),则点$P$的横坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;DotProduct(VectorOf(O,P),VectorOf(P,F2)) >= -1;O: Origin;F2: Point;RightFocus(C) = F2
process: 设点P(x,y),根据\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}\geqslant-1,得到x,y的关系,代入椭圆方程,得到关于x的不等式,解得x的范围,结合椭圆上点的横坐标范围,得到答案椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1,F_{2}为椭圆的右焦点,所以F_{2}(1,0)设点P(x,y),所以\overrightarrow{OP}=(x,y),\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(1-x,-y)由\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}\geqslant-1,得x-x^{2}-y^{2}\geqslant-1又因P(x,y)在椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1上,所以y^{2}=1-\frac{x^{2}}{2},所以x-x^{2}-1+\frac{x^{2}}{2}\geqslant-1,解得0\leqslantx\leqslant2,因为因P(x,y)在椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y2=1上,所以-\sqrt{2}\leqslantx\leqslant\sqrt{2}所以点P的横坐标的取值范围是[0,\sqrt{2}]

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，其一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，则$b$=?若点$P( \sqrt{3} , y_{0})$在双曲线上，则$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}$=?

text: 若点$(3 , 1)$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的一条弦的中点，且这条弦所在直线的斜率为$2$，则$p$=?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则$m$=?

process: 由已知,a=1,所以_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+m}=\sqrt{5},解得m=4

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$焦点$F$恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点，且双曲线过点$(\frac{3 a^{2}}{p}, \frac{2 b^{2}}{p})$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3 m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{5 n^{2}}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2 m^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 n^{2}}=1$有公共焦点，那么双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点、右焦点分别为$A$, $F$，它的左准线与$x$轴的 交点为$B$，若$A$是线段$BF$的中点，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 3) + y^2/4 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e=1/3;e:Number
process: 分焦点的位置进行分类求解即可得出答案当焦点在x轴上时,a=\sqrt{m+3},b=2,c=\sqrt{m-1},e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{m-1}}{\frac{m+3}{m}}=\frac{1}{3},解得m=\frac{3}{2},解得m=\frac{5}{9},\thereforem=\frac{3}{2}或m=\frac{5}{9},

text: $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线$C$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，点$P$在双曲线$C$的右支上，满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} {F}_{2}}=0$，$|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则双曲线的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: F1:Point;F2:Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;e:Number;Eccentricity(C)=e;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C));DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F2),VectorOf(F1,F2)) =0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) = (2*sqrt(3))/3;e=2*sqrt(3)/3
process: 由数量积公式得出PF_{2}\botF_{1}F_{2},再结合离心率公式、通径、c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},联立求出双曲线的虚轴长.\because\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}=0,\thereforePF_{2}\botF_{1}F_{2}\begin{matrix}e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\\|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=\frac{b^{2}}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\end{matrix}={a=2\sqrt{3}则虚轴长为4

text: 已知点$M$、$N$是抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$上不同的两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，且满足$\angle M F N=135^{\circ}$，弦$M N$的中点$P$到直线$l$: $y=-\frac{1}{16}$的距离记为$d$, $|M N|^{2}=\lambda \cdot d^{2}$，则$\lambda$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2);M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Negation(M=N);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;AngleOf(M, F, N) = ApplyUnit(135, degree);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M, N), G);P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = P;l: Line;Expression(l) = (y=-1/16);d: Number;Distance(P, l) = d;lambda: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))^2 = (d^2)*lambda
process: 如图所示:l:y=-\frac{1}{16}为抛物线的准线,作MA\botl于A,PQ\botl于Q,NB\botl于B则MA+NB=2PQ=2d\geqslant2\sqrt{MA\cdotNB},故MA\cdotNB\leqslantd^{2},当MA=NB=d时等号成立根据余弦定理:MN^{2}=MF^{2}+NF^{2}-2MF\cdotNF\cos135^{\circ}=(MA+MB)^{2}-(2-\sqrt{2})MA\cdotMB故MN^{2}\geqslant4d^{2}-(2-\sqrt{2})d^{2}=(2+\sqrt{2})d^{2},故\lambda\geqslant2+\sqrt{2}

text: 已知直线$l$: $y=1$与$y$轴交于点$M$、$Q$为直线$l$上异于点$M$的动点，记点$Q$的横坐标为$n$，若曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle M Q N=45^{\circ}$，则$n$的取值范围是?(用区间表示)
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;M: Point;Q: Point;N: Point;n:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=1);Intersection(l,yAxis)=M;PointOnCurve(Q,l);Negation(Q=M);XCoordinate(MidPoint(Q)) = n;PointOnCurve(N, C);AngleOf(M, Q, N) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)
process: 由题,Q(n,1),n\neq0,设k_{QN}=k,则l_{QN}:y=k(x-n)+1,当Q在第一象限时,则k=1,当l_{QN}与椭圆相切时,n取得最大值,联立\begin{cases}x^{2}+2y^{2}-2=0\\y=(x-n)+1\end{cases},则3x^{2}+4(1-n)x+2(n^{2}-2n)=0,令A=0,则n=1\pm\sqrt{3},n=1-\sqrt{3}不符合题意,舍去;当Q在第二象限时,则k=-1,当l_{QN}与椭圆相切时,n取得最小值.联立\begin{cases}x^{2}+2y^{2}-2=0\\y=-(x-n)+1\end{cases},则3x^{2}-4(1+n)x+2(n^{2}+2n)=0,令d=0,则n=-1\pm\sqrt{3},n=-1+\sqrt{3}不符合题意,舍去,综上,n\in[-1-\sqrt{3},0)\cup(0,1+\sqrt{3}],

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，若在双曲线的右支上存在一点$M$，使得$(\overrightarrow{O M}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \overrightarrow{F_{2} M}=0$(其中$O$为坐标原点)，且$|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|$，则双曲线离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, RightPart(G));DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, M)),VectorOf(F2, M)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(M, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(VectorOf(M, F2))
process: 试题分析:设C是MF_{2}的中点,因为(\overrightarrow{OM}+\overrightarrow{OF_{2}})\overrightarrow{F_{2}M}=0,所以2\overrightarrow{OC}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}M}=0,即OC\botMF_{2},即OM=OF_{2},因为OC//F_{1}M,所以F_{1}M\botMF_{2},因为|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|,所以|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}|-|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|-|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=2a,则|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=\frac{2a}{\sqrt{3}-1}=(\sqrt{3}+1)a,|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=\sqrt{3}(\sqrt{3}+1)a,因为|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|^{2}=4c^{2},所以4(\sqrt{3}+1)^{2}a^{2}=4c^{2},即(\sqrt{3}+1)^{2}a^{2}=c^{2},即(\sqrt{3}+1)a=c,则离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3}+1

text: 已知直线$a x+b y+c-1=0 ,(b c>0)$经过圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2 y-15=0$的圆心，则$\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;b*c>0;Expression(H) = (a*x + b*y + c - 1 = 0);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (-2*y + x^2 + y^2 - 15 = 0);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H) = True
process: 圆x^{2}+y^{2}-2y-15=0化成标准方程,得x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=16,\therefore圆x^{2}+y^{2}\cdot2y\cdot15=0的圆心为C(0,1),半径r=4\because直线ax+by+c-1=0经过圆心C,\thereforea\times0+b\times1+c\cdot1=0,即b+c=1,因此,\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c}=(b+c)(\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c})=10+\frac{9b}{c}+\frac{c}{b}\geqslant10+2\sqrt{\frac{9b}{c}.c}=16,由此可得当3b=c,\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c}最小值为16.

text: 曲线$y=\sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{4}}$与直线$y=2 x+m$有且只有一个公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Curve;G: Line;m: Real;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(1 - x^2/4));Expression(G) = (y = m + 2*x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1
process: 曲线y=\sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{4}}即为曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1(y\geqslant0),它表示如图所示的半椭圆若直线与椭圆相切,则A=16(17-m^{2})=0,得m=\pm\sqrt{17}若直线过(2,0),则m=-4;若直线过(-2,0),则m=4结合图象可知m=\sqrt{17}或-4\leqslantm<4答案为:m=\sqrt{17}或-4\leqslantm<4.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$ ,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的焦点坐标为?渐近线方程为?

设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的公共焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上一点，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左右焦点，点$I$是$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心 (三角形内切圆的圆心)，若恒有$S_{\Delta I P F_{1}}-S_{\Delta I P F_{2}} \leq \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} S_{\Delta I F1 F_{2}}$成立，则双曲线的离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;Center(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = I;Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F1)) - Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F2)) <= (sqrt(2)/2)*Area(TriangleOf(I, F1, F2))
process: 设\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆的半径为r.由双曲线的定义可得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,则S_{\DeltaIPF_{1}}=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|r,S_{\DeltaIPF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|r,S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2c\cdotr因为_{S_{\triangleIPF_{1}}}-S_{\DeltaIPF_{2}}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}},所以\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|r-\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|r\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\cdotc\cdotr可得\sqrt{2}c\geqslant|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,故e=\frac{c}{a}\geqslant\sqrt{2},

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一个焦点坐标为$(0,2)$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1);m: Real;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0, 2)
process: 由题意可得m>5,椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的a=\sqrt{m},b=\sqrt{5},c=\sqrt{m-5},即有\sqrt{m-5}=2,解得m=9.

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{3}{2} x$，则满足条件的一个双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/2)*x)
process: 由双曲线标准方程与渐近线方程的关系可得[详解]渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{2}x的双曲线方程为(\frac{3}{2}x+y)(\frac{3}{2}x-y)=\lambda(\lambda\neq0),则\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1就是其中之一.

text: 已知倾斜角为$\alpha$的直线$l$的斜率等于双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的离心率，则$\sin (\pi-2 \alpha)$=?
fact_expressions: alpha: Number;Inclination(l) = alpha;l: Line;Slope(l) = Eccentricity(G);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1)
process: \because双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的离心率\frac{c}{a}=2,\therefore\tan\alpha=2,因为\alpha为直线的倾斜角,所以\alpha\in(0,\pi)\therefore\sin\alpha=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}\cos\alpha=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}\therefore\sin(\pi-2\alpha)=\sin2\alpha=2\sin\alpha\cos\alpha=\frac{4}{5}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点$P$到左焦点的距离为$\frac{5}{2}$, 则它到右准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = 5/2
process: 试题分析:设点P到右准线的距离为d,由椭圆的第一定义知,点P到右焦点的距离等于4-\frac{5}{2}=\frac{3}{2},离心率e=\frac{1}{2},再根据椭圆的第二定义得\frac{3}{\frac{2}{d}}=e=\frac{1}{2},解得d=3\therefore点P到右准线的距离为3.

text: 如果$M$是椭圆$C_{1}$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的动点，$N$是椭圆$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上的动点，那么$\Delta O M N$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C1: Ellipse;C2: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(C1) = (x^2/16+y^2/9=1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/64+y^2/36=1);PointOnCurve(M,C1);PointOnCurve(N,C2)
process: 设点M(4\cos\alpha,3\sin\alpha)、N(8\cos\beta,6\sin\beta),可计算得出S_{\triangleOMN}=12|\sin(\alpha-\beta)|,利用正弦函数的有界性可求得结果.设M(4\cos\alpha,3\sin\alpha),N(8\cos\beta,6\sin\beta)\widehat{V}|^{2}\cos^{2}\angleMO=\frac{1}{2}|24(\sin\alpha\cos\beta-\cos\alpha\sin\beta)|=12|\sin(\alpha-\beta)|\leqslant12

text: 过双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，且斜率为$2$的直线与$E$的右支有两个不同的公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(E), G);Slope(G) = 2;NumIntersection(G, RightPart(E)) = 2
process: 由双曲线及其渐近线可知,当且仅当0<\frac{b}{a}<2时,直线与双曲线的右支有两个不同的公共0<\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}<4,1<\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}<5,故1<e<\sqrt{5}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt3x $,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点相同. 则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;Expression(E) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(E))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);F: Parabola;Expression(F) = (y^2 = 16*x);OneOf(Focus(E)) = Focus(F)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$ , $l_{2}$，直线$l_{1}$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l_{2}$与$C$交于$D$、$E$两点，则$\frac{1}{|A B|}+\frac{1}{|D E|}$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;E: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l1);PointOnCurve(F,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,l2);Intersection(l1,C)={A, B};Intersection(l2,C)={D, E}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，有一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点重合，则$m n$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);m > n;n > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(H) = 1/2;OneOf(Focus(H))=Focus(G)
process: 由已知椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)的离心率为\frac{1}{2},得\frac{m-n}{m}=\frac{1}{4},所以4n=3m因为抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点为(1,0),而椭圆的右焦点为(c,0)所以c=1,得m-n=1,解得m=4,n=3,所以mn=12.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点为$F$，原点为$O$，过抛物线焦点垂直于$x$轴的直线与抛物线交于点$P$，若$P O=3 \sqrt{5}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);P: Point;Intersection(H, G) = P;LineSegmentOf(P, O) = 3*sqrt(5)
process: 分析:首先根据题意,求得抛物线的焦点坐标,之后将横坐标代入抛物线方程,求得点P的纵坐标,从而得到点P的坐标,利用两点间距离公式得到p所满足的等量关系,从而求得结果详根据题意得F(\frac{p}{2},0),将x=\frac{p}{2}代入抛物线方程,求得y=\pmp.从而有P(\frac{p}{2},\pmp),因为PO=3\sqrt{5}得到\frac{p^{2}}{4}+p^{2}=45'解得p=6.

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/4 + y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=2 x$，右准线方程是$x=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = 2*x);Expression(RightDirectrix(G)) = (x = sqrt(5)/5)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$, 则双曲线$C$的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)
process: 根据离心率公式得到答案\because离心率为\sqrt{5},可得\frac{\sqrt{m+4}}{\sqrt{m}}=\sqrt{5},可得m=1,则实轴长为2.

text: 过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点$F$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$，$B$，若$\angle A F B=120^{\circ}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);TangentOfPoint(F, G) = {l1, l2};l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentPoint(l1,G) = A;TangentPoint(l2,G) = B;A: Point;B: Point;AngleOf(A, F, B) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 由题意不妨令F(c,0),因为A,B为过F作圆x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}的两条切线的切点,\angleAFB=120^{\circ}所以\angleAFO=60^{\circ},又|OF|=c,|OA|=a,所以\sin\angleAFO=\frac{|OA|}{|OF|}=\frac{a}{c}=\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},故离心率为\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，若双曲线左支上存在一点$P$使得$\frac{|P F_{2}|^{2}}{|P F_{1}|}=8 a$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,LeftPart(G)) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = 8*a

text: 两个焦点为$(\pm 2,0)$且过点$P(\frac{5}{2},-\frac{3}{2})$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (pm*2, 0);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5/2, -3/2);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>0)$的焦距为$2$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 2
process: 由题意c=1,所以m-1=1,m=2.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的渐近线为$y=\pm \frac{3}{4} x$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/4)*x)
process: 根据题意可知:\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{4},于是\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{4},

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的短轴长为$2$，上顶点为$A$，左顶点为$B$，左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且$\Delta F_{1} A B$的面积为$\frac{2-\sqrt{3}}{2}$，点$P$为椭圆上的任意一点，则$\frac{1}{|P F_{1}|}+\frac{1}{|P F_{2}|}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Length(MinorAxis(G)) = 2;A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = B;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Area(TriangleOf(F1, A, B)) = (2 - sqrt(3))/2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)

P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;PointOnCurve(P, G);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 2;O: Origin;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$与$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的焦点，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/m = 1);Expression(C)=(x^2/3-y^2/2=1);Focus(G)=Focus(C)
process: 结合双曲线的几何性质,得到m+1=3+2,即可求解,得到答案由题意,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1与\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1有相同的焦点,可得m+1=3+2,解得m=4

text: 已知抛物线$C$的方程为$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$，其焦点为$F$,$A B$为过焦点$F$的抛物线$C$的弦，过$A$、$B$分别作抛物线的切线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$，设$l_{1}$，$l_{2}$相交于点$P$. 则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p:Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Focus(C) = F;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C);PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B));l1:Line;l2:Line;TangentOfPoint(A,C)=l1;TangentOfPoint(B,C)=l2;Intersection(l1,l2)=P
process: 设A(x_{1},\frac{x_{1}2}{2p}),B(x_{2},\frac{x_{2}}{2p}),因为F(0,\frac{p}{2}),所以设AB的方程为y=kx+\frac{p}{2}代入抛物线方程x^{2}=2py得x^{2}-2pkx-p^{2}=0,从而x_{1}+x_{2}=2pk,x_{1}x_{2}=-p^{2}由x^{2}=2py,得y=\frac{x^{2}}{2p},则y=\frac{x}{p},则k_{PA}=\frac{x_{1}}{p},k_{PB}=\frac{x_{2}}{p},因此k_{PA}\cdotk_{PB}=\frac{x_{1}}{n^{2}}=-1,即PA\botPB.所以\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=0睛)本题考查直线与抛物线的位置关系的综合应用,考查转化思想以及计算能力,是中档题

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点（$A$点在第一象限) , $\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=-4 $, $M$坐标为$(4,0)$，当$\triangle A B M$的面积最小时，线段$O A$的长度为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = -4;Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Quadrant(A) = 1;WhenMin(Area(TriangleOf(A,B,M)))
process: 由题意设l的方程为x=my+n,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立抛物线方程可得y^{2}-4my-4n=0,所以y_{1}+y_{2}=4m,y_{1}y_{2}=-4n则_{x_{1}x_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4}.\frac{y_{2}^{2}}{4}=\frac{(y_{1}\cdoty_{1})^{2}}{16}=n^{2},\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=x_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=n^{2}-4n=-4所以n^{2}-4n+4=0,解得n=2,所以直线l过定点N(2,0),则S_{\DeltaABM}=\frac{1}{2}|MN|\cdot|y_{1}-y_{2}|=|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\sqrt{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}}=\sqrt{16m^{2}+32}当m=0时,\triangleABM的面积最小,此时的方程为x=2,A点的坐标为(2,2\sqrt{2}),|OA|=\sqrt{2^{2}+(2\sqrt{2})^{2}}=2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，点$P$是双曲线$C$上一点，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点$Q$恰好在直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x*(b/a));LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Q;PointOnCurve(Q, G);a > 0;b > 0
process: 依题意可知点P在双曲线的右支上,由|PF_{1}|=2|PF_{2}|,|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,可得|PF_{1}|=4a|PF_{2}|=2a,因为Q为PF_{1}中点,所以|OQ|=a,|QF_{1}|=2a.在\triangleOQF_{1}中,\tan\angleQOF_{1}=\frac{b}{a},所以\cos\angleQOF_{1}=\frac{a}{c}=\frac{a^{2}+c^{2}-4a^{2}}{2ac},解得c=\sqrt{5}a.所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5}

text:
若点$P$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上一点，满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，
则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Focus(G)={F1,F2};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 过点$A(6,1)$作直线与双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=16$相交于两点$B$、$C$, 且$A$为线段$B C$的中点则直线的方程（表示为一般式）为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;B: Point;C: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 16);Coordinate(A) = (6, 1);PointOnCurve(A, H);Intersection(H, G) = {B, C};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B,C))=A

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，焦点记为$F$，过点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|-\frac{2}{|B F|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 分直线/斜率存在不E时,联立直线与抛物线方程,由韦达定理可得A,B两点横坐标间的关系,由抛物线定义可得|AF|-\frac{2}{|BF|}的表达式,转化为一个变量,求最值即可,当斜率不存在时,由通径的长可求解.详解)因为抛物线y^{2}=4x,所以F(1,0).当直线l的斜率存在时,设直线l的方程为y=k(x-1)(k\neq0)代入y^{2}=4x可得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=1.由抛物线的定义可得|AF|=x_{1}+1,|BF|=x_{2}+1,所以|AF|-\frac{2}{|BF|}=x_{1}+1\frac{1}{4}令x_{2}-1=t(t\geqslant1),则x_{2}=t+1\frac{(1+\sqrt{2})}{+2\sqrt{2}}=\frac{2}{1+\sqrt{2}}=2\sqrt{2}-2(当且仅当t=\sqrt{2}时等号成立)当直线l的斜率不存在时,|AF|=|BF|=2,所以AF-\frac{2}{|BF|}=1.综上,|AF|-\frac{2}{|BF|}的最小值为2\sqrt{2}-2

fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;t:Number;Coordinate(F1) = (0, -3);Coordinate(F2) = (0, 3);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))=t+9/t;t>0

text: 若过点$(\sqrt{2}, 2)$的双曲线的渐近线为$y=\pm 2 x$，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(H,G) = True;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*2*x)
process: 因为双曲线的渐近线为y=\pm2x,故设其方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0),因为点(\sqrt{2},2)在双曲线上,所以,\lambda=(\sqrt{2})^{2}-\frac{2}{4}=1,即所求方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 平面上两定点$A$ , $B$之间距离为$4$，动点$P$满足$PA-PB=2$，则点$P$到$AB$中点的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Distance(A, B) = 4;LineSegmentOf(P, A) - LineSegmentOf(P, B) = 2

text: 已知点$M$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的一个动点，则点$M$到点$A(2,0)$的距离与点$M$到该抛物线准线的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(M, G)
process: \because抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点F的坐标为F(0,1),作图如下:\because抛物线x^{2}=4y的准线方程为y=-1,设点M到该抛物线准线y=-1的距离为d由抛物线的定义可知,d=|MF|,\thereforeMA+d=|MA|+|MF|\geqslant|AF|(当且仅当F、M、A三点共线时,且M在F、A中间时取等号)\therefore点M到点A(2,0)的距离与点M到该抛物线准线的距离之和的最小值为|AF|\becauseF(0,1)、A(2,0),|AF|=\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}}=\sqrt{5}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到焦点$F_{1}$的距离是$6$，那么$P$到焦点$F_{2}$的距离?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Distance(P, F1) = 6

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$，过点$M(2,0)$的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，与$E$的准线交于点$C$，且点$A$在第一象限，若$\frac{|C B|}{|A B|}=\frac{2}{3}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);l: Line;B: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(M,l) = True;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(Directrix(E) , l) = C;Quadrant(A) = 1 ;Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, B))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2/3
process: 过点A,B分别作E的准线的垂线,垂足分别为H,K由题意知直线l的斜率存在且不为0,故可设直线l的方程为y=k(x-2)(k\neq0),将其代入y^{2}=4x,得k^{2}x^{2}-4(k^{2}+1)x+4k^{2}=0,则_{A}=16+32k^{2}>0,x_{A}x_{B}=4\textcircled{1},因为\frac{|CB|}{|AB|}=\frac{2}{3},且点A在第一象限所以\frac{|CB|}{|CA|}=\frac{2}{5},所以\frac{|BK|}{|AH|}=\frac{2}{5}.又|BK|=x_{B}+1,|AH|=x_{A}+1,所以\frac{x_{B}+1}{x_{A}+1}=\frac{2}{5},即x_{B}=\frac{2}{5}x_{A}-\frac{3}{5}\textcircled{2}联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2},得x_{A}=4,x_{B}=1,又A,B是抛物线y^{2}=4x上的点,所以y_{A}=4,y_{B}=-2,所以直线l的斜率k=\frac{y_{A}-y_{B}}{x_{A}-x_{B}}=\frac{4+2}{4-1}=2

text: 若点$P$是以$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上一点，满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，且$|P F_{1}|=2 | P F_{2}| $，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 设双曲线的渐近线方程为$2 x \pm 3 y=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (2*x + pm*3*y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (b>a>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , $P$$(2, \sqrt{2})$为双曲线$C$上一点，且$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}=3$，若线段$P F_{1}$与双曲线$C$交于另一点$A$，则$\Delta P A F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a, b: Number;b > a;a > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 3;A: Point;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), C) = {P, A}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$中，以点$M(-1, \frac{1}{2})$为中点的弦所在的直线斜率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$过点$(-2,0)$，过左焦点$F_{1}$的直线与双曲线的左支交于$A$、$B$两点，右焦点为$F_{2}$，若$\angle A F_{2} B=45^{\circ}$，且$|A F_{2}|=8$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;G: Line;H: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (-2, 0);PointOnCurve(H, C);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, LeftPart(C)) = {A, B};AngleOf(A, F2, B) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = 8
process: 由双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0过点(-2,0),可得a=2,由过左焦点F_{1}的直线与双曲线的左支交于A,B两点,右焦点为F_{2},|AF_{2}|=8,可得|AF_{1}|=4,设|BF_{1}|=x,则|BF_{2}|=x+4,可得|AB|=|BF_{2}|=x+4,又因为\angleAF_{2}B=45^{\circ}故\triangleABF_{2}是以B为直角的等腰直角三角形,则|AB|=|BF_{2}|=4\sqrt{2},可得S_{\triangleABF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times4\sqrt{2}\times4\sqrt{2}=16故答案:16睛)本题主要考查双曲线的定义及简单性质,得出\triangleABF,是以B为直角的等腰直角三角形是解题的关铺

text: 已知点$F$、$A$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点和右顶点，过$F$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于点$P$，且$\triangle A F P$的内切圆半径为$\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{2}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;RightVertex(G) = A;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = P;Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(A, F, P))) = sqrt(a^2 - b^2)/2

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$, 且与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有公共焦点. 则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = (sqrt(5)/2)*x);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G)
process: 双曲线C.\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,由一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}x,可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}\textcircled{1}椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的焦点为(-3,0),(3,0)可得a^{2}+b^{2}=9\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}可得a=2,b=\sqrt{5},即双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1

text: 在$Rt \triangle ABC$中，$ AB=AC=1$，如果椭圆经过$A$ , $B$两点，它的一个焦点为$C$，另一个焦点在$A B$上，则这个椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;LineSegmentOf(A,B)=LineSegmentOf(A,C);LineSegmentOf(A,C)=1;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B,G);OneOf(Focus(G))=C;F:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Negation(C=F);PointOnCurve(F, LineSegmentOf(A, B))
C: Ellipse;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>3;Expression(C) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

G: Ellipse;n: Number;m: Number;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;m>0;n>0;Expression(G) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-1, -3);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1:Number;y1:Number;-1<x1;x1<2;y1<0;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G)
process: 由题意得\begin{cases}\frac{1}{m}+\frac{9}{n}=1\\\frac{4}{1}=1\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}m=4\\n=12\end{cases},点A(-1,-3),点P在\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1(-1<x<2,y<0)上,点A(-1,-3)与(2,0)连线的斜率为k=\frac{0-(-3)}{2-(-1)}=1,过点A与\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1相切的直线方程为:y=-x-4数形结合可得k_{PA}\in(-1,1)

text: 设$P(x, y)$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$在第一象限上的点，则$\frac{x}{4-x}+\frac{3 y}{6-y}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);x1:Number;y1:Number

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一条准线方程为$y=m$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);Expression(OneOf(Directrix(G))) = (y = m)
process: 由题意知,在椭圆中a=\sqrt{m},c=\sqrt{m-4},所以准线方程为y=\frac{a^{2}}{c}=\frac{m}{\sqrt{m-4}}由题意得\frac{m}{m-4}=m,解得m=5.答案:5

text: 动圆经过点$(2,0)$，且与直线$l$: $x=-2$相切，则动圆圆心$C$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C1: Circle;H: Point;C: Point;Expression(l) = (x = -2);Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(H, C1);IsTangent(C1, l) ;Center(C1) = C
process: \because动圆C经过定点F(2,0),且与直线x=-2相切,\therefore圆心C到定点F(2,0)的距离与其到直线x=-2的距离相等\therefore动圆的圆心C的轨迹是以定点F(2,0)为焦点,以x=-2为准线的抛物线,可得\frac{p}{2}=2,2p=8,可得方程为y^{2}=8x,

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，那么双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)
process: 由题意得,双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{3},解得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2}因为双曲线焦点在纵轴上,所以双曲线的渐近线方程为_{y}=\pm\frac{a}{b}x\Rightarrowy=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x'即\sqrt{2x}\pm2y=0

text: 已知直线$l$: $k x-y+1=0$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$P$，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}<0$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$取最小值时的直线的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (k*x - y + 1 = 0);k: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};O: Origin;P: Point;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = P;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) < 0;WhenMin(DotProduct(VectorOf(P, A), VectorOf(P, B)))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线分别交于$A$ , $B$两点,$O$为坐标原点，若$S_{\triangle A O B}=2 \sqrt{3}$，则双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Z1: Line;Z2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {Z1, Z2};H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;Intersection(Z1, Directrix(H)) = A;B: Point;Intersection(Z2, Directrix(H)) = B;O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = 2*sqrt(3);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的两条渐近线为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,抛物线y^{2}=4x的准线为x=-1,所以A(-1,\frac{b}{a}),B(-1,-\frac{b}{a})因此S_{\triangleAOB}=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times2\frac{b}{a}=2\sqrt{3}\thereforeb=2\sqrt{3}a\thereforec=\sqrt{13}a,e=\sqrt{13}.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 a x$的准线方程为$x=-2$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(a*x));Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x = -2)
process: 因为准线方程为x=-\frac{a}{2}=-2,所以a=4

fact_expressions: C: Circle;P: Point;Q: Point;x0:Number;y0:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);Coordinate(Q) = (x0*y0, x0 + y0);PointOnCurve(P, C)
process: 设Q(x,y),则x=x_{0}y_{0},y=x_{0}+y_{0},\because动点P(x_{0},y_{0})在圆C:x^{2}+y^{2}=1上运动\thereforex_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=1,2x+1\cdotx_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=1\geqslant2|x_{0}y_{0}|=|2x|.\therefore-\frac{1}{2}\leqslantx\leqslant\frac{1}{2},\therefore所求轨迹方程为:y^{2}=2x+1(-\frac{1}{2}\leqslantx\leqslant\frac{1}{2})

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F$，设$A(x_{1}, y_{1})$, $B(x_{2}, y_{2})$是抛物线上的两个动点，若$x_{1}+x_{2}+p=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}|A B|$，则$\angle A F B$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);p + x1 + x2 = ((2*sqrt(3))/3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B))
process: 由A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2})是抛物线y^{2}=2px上的两个动点,得|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p又x_{1}+x_{2}+p=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}|AB|,所以|AF|+|BF|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}AB在\triangleAFB中,由余弦定理得:\cos\angleAFB=\frac{|AF|^{2}+|BF|^{2}-|AB|^{2}}{2|AF||BF|}=\frac{(|AF|+|BF|)^{2}-2|AF||BF|-|AB|^{2}}{2|AF||BF|}=\frac{4}{2|AF||BF|}-1=\frac{1}{2|AF||BF|}-1又|AF|+|BF|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}|AB|\geqslant2\sqrt{|AF||BF|}-,即|AF||BF|\leqslant\frac{1}{3}|AB|^{2},所以\cos\angleAFB\geqslant\frac{1}{2}|AB|^{2}-1=-\frac{1}{2},因此\angleAFB的最大值为\frac{2\pi}{3}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点$F$引它的渐近线的垂线，垂足为$M$，延长$FM$交$y$轴于点$E$，若$F M=M E$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;M: Point;E: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);OneOf(Focus(G))=F;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F,L);IsPerpendicular(L,Asymptote(G));FootPoint(L,Asymptote(G))=M;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F, M)), yAxis) = E;LineSegmentOf(F, M) = LineSegmentOf(M, E)

text: 双曲线的中心在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，焦距为$16$，一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}} x$，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);FocalLength(G) = 16;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) =(y=(3/sqrt(7))*x)
process: 试题分析:根据题意双曲线设所求双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),由\begin{cases}2c=16\\\frac{a}{b}=\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}}\\c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}a=6\\b=2\sqrt{7},\\c=8\end{cases},所以所求的双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{36}-\frac{x^{2}}{28}=1

text: $P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为左右焦点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 试题分析:由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1方程可知,a=5,b=3,c=4,\becauseP点在椭圆上,F_{1},F_{2}为椭圆的左右焦点,\therefore|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=10,|F_{1}F_{2}|=8,设|AF_{1}|=m,|AF_{2}|=n,则\begin{cases}m+n=10\\m^{2}+n^{2}-mm=64\end{cases},解得mn=12,所以\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积为\frac{1}{2}mn\sin60^{\circ}=3\sqrt{3}.所以答案应填:3\sqrt{3}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，右焦点为$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作$x$轴的垂线与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;F2: Point;RightFocus(G) = F2;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, L)=  True;IsPerpendicular(L, xAxis) = True;Intersection(L, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,则a^{2}=5,b^{2}=4,所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=1,所以椭圆的左、右焦点F_{1}(-1,0),F_{2}(1,0),即|F_{1}F_{2}|=2,过F_{1}作x轴的垂线与椭圆相交于A,B两点,易知x=-1与椭圆交于A,B两点,将x=-1代入椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,解得y=\pm\frac{4\sqrt{5}}{5},所以|AB|=\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5},即s_{\triangleABF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|AB||F_{1}F_{2}|=\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过$F$点作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;RightFocus(G) = F;L:Line;IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);PointOnCurve(F,L);Intersection(L, G) = {A, B};DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0
process: 由题意可解出A,B两点的坐标,再由\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=0可得出\triangleOAB是等腰直角三角形,即可列出方程a^{2}-c^{2}=ac,即可求得离心率.\because椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)的右焦点为F,过F作x轴的垂线交椭圆C于A,B两点,将x=c代入\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1解得:y=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a}若\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=0,则\triangleOAB是等腰直角三角形(O为坐标原点)可得:\frac{b^{2}}{a}=c'即a^{2}-c^{2}=ac,即e^{2}+e-1=0且e\in(0,1),解得:e=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{}

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$, $P$为双曲线$C$上的一点，若点$P$到双曲线$C$的两条渐近线的距离之积为$1$，则双曲线的半焦距$c$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {L1,L2};Distance(P,L1) * Distance(P,L2) = 1;c: Number;HalfFocalLength(C) = c
process: 由题意,双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,可得其渐近线方程为bx\pmay=0,设P(x,y),可得点P到两条渐近线的距离分别为d_{1}=\frac{|bx-ay|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}},d_{2}=\frac{|bx+ay|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}因为点P到双曲线C的两条渐近线的距离之积为1,可得d_{1}d_{2}=\frac{|bx-ay|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}\cdot\frac{|bx+ay|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{|b^{2}x^{2}-a^{2}y2|}{a^{2}+b^{2}}=又由\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,可得b^{2}x^{2}-a^{2}y^{2}=a^{2}b^{2},所以\frac{a2b^{2}}{a^{2}+b^{2}}=1,即a_{2}+b^{2}=a^{2}b^{2}\leqslant\frac{(a^{2}+b^{2})^{2}}{4},即c^{2}\leqslant\frac{c^{4}}{4},所以c\geqslant2,当且仅当a=b时等号成立所以双曲线的半焦距c的取值范围[2,+\infty)

text: 直线$l$: $y=2 x-4$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点$F$，与$C$交于$A$、$B$俩点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(l)=(y=2*x-4);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};F:Point
process: 因为直线l:y=2x-4过抛物线C:y^{2}=2px的焦点F,故F(2,0)即p=4,故抛物线C:y^{2}=8x,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由\begin{cases}y=2x-4\\y2=8x\end{cases}可得x^{2}-6x+4=0,故|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=10,

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点且离心率为$2$的双曲线标准方程是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);G: Hyperbola;Focus(H) = Focus(G);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: $P$为双曲线$C_{1}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$上一点，$F$为双曲线的右焦点，且$P F=4$，则点$P$到双曲线左准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C1) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C1);RightFocus(C1) = F;LineSegmentOf(P, F) = 4
process: a^{2}=4,b^{2}=5,\thereforec^{2}=9设椭圆的左焦点为F_{1},||PF_{1}|-|PF||=4\Rightarrow||PF_{1}|-4|=4,解得|PF_{1}|=8,设点P到双曲线左准线的距离为d,那么\frac{|PF_{1}|}{d}=\frac{c}{a}\Rightarrow\frac{8}{d}=\frac{3}{2},\therefored=1故填:\frac{i6}{16}可以的两个定义,意在考查转化和计算能力,属于简单题型

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$在曲线$C$上，若$\triangle P A B$中，$\angle P B A=\angle P A B+\frac{\pi}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?

process: 如图,过B作BM\botx轴,\because\anglePBA=\anglePAB+\frac{\pi}{2},则\anglePAB=\anglePBM,\therefore\anglePAB+\anglePBx=\frac{\pi}{2}.即k_{PA}\cdotk_{PB}=1.设P(x,y),又A(-a,0),B(a,0)\frac{y}{x+a}\cdot\frac{y}{x-a}=1,\thereforex^{2}-y^{2}=a^{2},\thereforea=b,则双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pmx,

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 y$，则$C$的准线方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且椭圆$C$与双曲线$C^{\prime}$: $\frac{2 x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$共焦点，若椭圆$C$与双曲线$C^{\prime}$的一个交点$M$满足$|M F_{1}| \cdot|M F_{2}|=2$，则$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(C1)=(2*x^2/a^2-y^2=1);Focus(C)=Focus(C1);OneOf(Intersection(C,C1))=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))=2
process: 由椭圆和双曲线的定义可得\begin{cases}|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=2a\\|MF_{1}|-|MF_{2}|=\sqrt{2}a\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}|MF_{1}|=\frac{2+\sqrt{2}}{2}a\\|MF_{2}|=\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{2}a\end{cases},再代入|MF_{1}|\cdot|MF_{2}|=2,解得a的值,从而得|MF_{1}|、|MF_{2}|和|F_{1}F_{2}|的长,由勾股定理可知,4MF_{1}F_{2}是直角三角形,结合面积公式,即可求解.[详解]由题意,将双曲线C:C:\frac{2x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1化成标准形式为\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1不妨设点M在双曲线的右支上,则由椭圆和双曲线的定义,可得\begin{cases}|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=2a\\|MF_{1}|-|MF_{2}|=2\cdot\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}a=\sqrt{2}a\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}|MF_{1}|=\frac{2+\sqrt{2}}{2}a\\|MF_{2}|=\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{2}a\end{cases}因为|MF_{1}|\cdot|MF_{2}|=2,代入可得\frac{2+\sqrt{2}}{2}a\cdot\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{2}a=2^{,}解得a=2或a=-2(舍负)所以|MF_{1}|=2+\sqrt{2}|MF_{2}|=2-\sqrt{2},3曲线的焦距|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{\frac{a2}{2}+1}=2\sqrt{3},显然有|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|,所以AMF_{1}F_{2}是直角三角形.所以AMF_{1}F_{2}的面积为:S_{\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot|MF_{1}|\cdot|MF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times(2+\sqrt{2})\times(2-\sqrt{2})=1

text: 直线$y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为原点，则三角形$A O B$面积为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(3)*(x - 1));G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};O: Origin

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一动点，则点$P$到直线$l$:$2 x-y+3=0$和$y$轴的距离之和的最小值是?

process: 由题意知,抛物线的焦点为F(1,0).设点P到直线/的距离为d,由抛物线的定义可知,点P到y轴的距离为|PF|-1所以点P到直线/的距离与到y轴的距离之和为d+|PF|-1.所以d+|PF|的最小值为点F到直线l的距离,故d+|PF|的最小值为\frac{|2+3|}{\sqrt{2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\sqrt{5},所以d+|PF|-1的最小值为\sqrt{5}-1

text: 已知点$P$和$Q$的横坐标相同，$P$的纵坐标是$Q$的纵坐标的$2$倍，$P$和$Q$的轨迹分别为双曲线$C_{1}$和$C_{2}$. 若$C_{1}$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，则$C_{2}$的渐近线方程为?

text: 以抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$为圆心的圆交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，交$C$的准线于$D$、$E$两点，已知$|A B|=8$，则$|D E|$=?

text: 已知双曲线的焦点在$y$轴上，焦距为$4$，且一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线的标准方程是?

process: 利用待定系数法可求得结果.[详解]依题意设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1.则\begin{cases}2c=4\\\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3}\\c=a2+b^{2}\end{cases},解得a^{2}=3,b^{2}=1,所以双曲线的标准方程是\frac{y^{2}}{}-x2=1

text: 过点$(0,-3)$的直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$只有一个公共点，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, -3);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);NumIntersection(l, G) = 1
process: 讨论直线的斜率不存在、;在不为零、的三种情兄可得答:由题意,直线l的斜率不存在时,直线l的方程为x=0,满足题意直线l的斜率存在时,设直线l的方程为y=kx-3,代入y^{2}=4x.可得k^{2}x^{2}-(6k+4)x+9=0,\thereforek=0时,直线l的方程为y=-3满足题意;k\neq0时,由A=(6k+4)^{2}-36k^{2}=0,解得k=-\frac{1}{3},此时直线l的方程为x+3y+9=0.综上,直线l的方程为x=0或y=-3或x+3y+9=0.

text: 已知$A$ , $B$ , $P$为双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$上不同三点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}=2 \overrightarrow{P O}$($O$为坐标原点)，直线$PA$ , $PB$的斜率记为$m$, $n$，则$m^{2}+\frac{n^{2}}{9}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A = B);Negation(A = P);Negation(P = B);VectorOf(P, A) + VectorOf(P, B) = 2*VectorOf(P, O);Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = m;Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = n
process: \because满足\overrightarrow{PA}+\overrightarrow{PB}=2\overrightarrow{PO}(O为坐标原点),\thereforeA,B关于原点对称,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(\cdotx_{1},\cdoty_{1}),P(x_{0},y_{0}),则\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{4}=x_{0}^{2}-1'\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4}=x_{1}^{2}-1'直线PA,PB的斜率记为m,n,满足mn=\frac{y_{0}^{2}-y_{1}^{2}}{x_{2}-x,2}=4,则m^{2}+\frac{n^{2}}{9}\geqslant2\cdotm\cdot\frac{n}{3}=\frac{2mn}{3}=\frac{8}{3}即m^{2}+\frac{n^{2}}{0}的最小值为\frac{8}{2}

process: 双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{2}x,可设双曲线的方程为y^{2}-2x^{2}=t(t\neq0),代入(1,2)可得t=4-2=2,则双曲线的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{2}-x^{2}=1,可得a=\sqrt{2},b=1,c=\sqrt{3},焦距2c=2\sqrt{3},

text: 已知$A$、$B$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的公共顶点.$P$是双曲线上的动点，$M$是椭圆上的动点（$P$、$M$都异于$A$ , $B$)，且满足$AP+BP= \lambda(AM+B M)$，其中$\lambda \in R$，设直线$A P$ , $B P$ , $A M$ , $B M$的斜率分别记为$k_{1}$,$k_{2}$ , $k_{3}$, $k_{4}$, $k_{1}+k_{2}=5$，则$k_{3}+k_{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a1:Number;b1:Number;a1 > b1;b1 > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b1^2 + x^2/a1^2 = 1);Vertex(G)={A,B};In(A,Vertex(H));In(B,Vertex(H));PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(M,H);Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);Negation(M=A);Negation(M=B);LineSegmentOf(A, P) + LineSegmentOf(B, P) = lambda*(LineSegmentOf(A, M) + LineSegmentOf(B, M));lambda:Real;Slope(LineOf(A,P))=k1;Slope(LineOf(B,P))=k2;Slope(LineOf(A,M))=k3;Slope(LineOf(B,M))=k4;k1:Number;k2:Number;k3:Number;k4:Number;k1+k2=5

text: 椭圆$r$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$焦距为$2 c$，若直线$y=\sqrt{3}(x+c)$与椭圆$r$的一个交点$M$满足$\angle M F_{1} F_{2}=2 \angle M F_{2} F_{1}$, 则该椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: r: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;G:Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(r) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = sqrt(3)*(c + x));LeftFocus(r)=F1;RightFocus(r)=F2;FocalLength(r)=2*c;OneOf(Intersection(G,r))=M;AngleOf(M,F1,F2)=2*AngleOf(M,F2,F1)
process: 注意到直线过点(-c,0)即为左焦点F_{1},又斜率为\sqrt{3},所以倾斜角为60^{\circ},即\angleMF_{1}F_{2}=60^{0}.又\angleMF_{1}F_{2}=2\angleMF_{2}F_{1}故\angleMF_{2}F_{1}=30^{0},那么\angleF_{2}MF_{1}=90^{0}MF_{1}=F_{1}F_{2}\cdot\cos60^{0}=2c\cdot\frac{1}{2}=c,MF_{2}=F_{1}F_{2}\cdot\sin60^{0}=2c\cdot\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\sqrt{3}ce=\frac{2c}{2a}=\frac{2c}{MF_{1}+MF_{2}}=\frac{2c}{\sqrt{3}c+c}=\sqrt{3}-1【考点定位】考查离心率的算法,要求学生要有敏锐的观察力,比如直线的特征.属于难题

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上，点$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$\Delta O P F$的面积为$32$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Area(TriangleOf(O, P, F)) = 32
process: 由抛物线方程可知焦点坐标,利用三角形面积公式可求得P点纵坐标,进而得到P点横坐标;利用抛物线焦半径公式求得结果.由题意得:F(4,0)\therefore|OF|=4设P(x,y),则S_{AOPF}=\frac{1}{2}|OF|\cdot|y|=2|y|=32,解得:|y|=16\thereforex=\frac{y^{2}}{16}=16\therefore|PF|=16+4=20

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$K$，点$A$在$C$上且$|A K|=\sqrt{2}|A F|$，则$\Delta A F K$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;K: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = K;PointOnCurve(A, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, K)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))
process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=8x的焦点为F(2,0),准线与x轴的交点为K(-2,0)设A点坐标为(\frac{y^{2}}{8},y),则有(\frac{y^{2}}{8}+2)^{2}+y^{2}=2\times((\frac{y^{2}}{8}-2)^{2}+y^{2},解得y^{2}=16\therefore\DeltaAFK的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times4\times4=8

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点到焦点$F$和点$(4,0)$的距离之和的最小值为$5$，则此抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;K: Point;PointOnCurve(K, C);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 0);Min(Distance(K, F) + Distance(K, G)) = 5
process: 根据抛物线的定义,P到焦点与点(4,0)的距离之和等于点P到准线的距离与到点(4,0)的距离之和,其最小值为点(4,0)到准线的距离,即\frac{p}{2}+4=5,所以p=2,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x=1本题主要考查抛物线的方程和几何性质,考查数学运算能力,数形结合思想

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$ , $\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2);AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)
process: 在\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,由正弦定理得\sin\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=1,即\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=\frac{\pi}{2},设PF_{2}=1,则PF_{1}=2,F_{2}F_{1}=\sqrt{3},所以离心率e=\frac{2c}{2a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.

process: 以x=1为准线的抛物线的标准方程是y^{2}=-2px,\frac{p}{2}=1\thereforey^{2}=-4x

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点,则$|A B|$的值等于?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M$到准线及对称轴的距离分别为$10$和$6$，则其标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y**2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Distance(M, Directrix(G)) = 10;Distance(M, SymmetryAxis(G)) = 6
process: 点M到对称轴的距离为6,\therefore不妨设点M的坐标为(x,6).又\because点M到准线的距离为10,6^{2}=2px,x+\frac{p}{x}=10.解得\begin{cases}x=9,\\p=2\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=1,\\p=18.\end{cases}故当点M的横坐标为9时,抛物线方程为y2=4x;当点M的横坐标为1时,抛物线方程为y^{2}=36x.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$经过焦点的弦$A B$的两端点坐标分别为$A(x_{1} , y_{1})$ , $B(x_{2} , y_{2})$，则$\frac{y_{1} y_{2}}{x_{1} x_{2}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = {A, B};Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G) = True;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = True;x1: Number;y1: Number;x2: Number;y2: Number
process: 由抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0),得其焦点坐标为(\frac{p}{2},0)设过焦点的弦AB所在直线方程为x=my+\frac{p}{2}由\begin{cases}x=my+\frac{p}{2}\\y^{2}=2px\end{cases}消去x整理得y^{2}-2pmy-p^{2}=0.所以y_{1}y_{2}=-p^{2}.因为点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})在抛物线上所以x_{1}y^{\frac{y_{2}}{2p}},x_{2}y_{2}^{\frac{y^{2}}{2p}},所以x_{1}^{x_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}}{20}.\frac{y_{2}}{20}=\frac{4p^{2}}{11^{2}2}=-4

text: 已知斜率为$1$的直线过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的焦点，且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的长是?

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，过右焦点$F$且斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线与$C$相交于$A$，$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$, 则$k$=?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/m = 1);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;e = 1/2;m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)
process: 试题分析:直接利用已知条件求出椭圆的几何量a,b,c,利用离心率公式计算求解即可.焦点在x轴上的椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,可知a=\sqrt{\pi},b=3,c=\sqrt{m-9},\because离心率是e=\frac{1}{2},\therefore\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{m-9}}{\sqrt{m}}=\frac{1}{2}解得m=12.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$，右焦点为$F$，点$P$是直线$x=2$在第一象限上的动点，直线$P F$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线在第一象限上的交点为$Q$，若$\overrightarrow{F P}=2 \overrightarrow{P Q}$，则$|F Q|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;F: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);Expression(G) = (x = 2);RightFocus(C) = F;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Quadrant(Q) = 1;Intersection(LineOf(P, F), OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = Q;VectorOf(F, P) = 2*VectorOf(P, Q)
process: 在双曲线C:\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1中,a^{2}=4,b^{2}=12,则c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=16,即c=4所以右焦点为F(4,0),设P(2,y_{0}),y_{0}>0,Q(x_{1},y_{1})双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1的渐近线方程为:y=\pm\sqrt{3}x由\overrightarrow{FP}=2\overrightarrow{PQ},则点Q在直线y=\sqrt{3}x上.\overrightarrow{FP}=(-2,y_{0}),\overrightarrow{PQ}=(x_{1}-2,y_{1}-y_{0})所以-2=2(x_{1}-2),解得x_{1}=1,则y_{1}=\sqrt{3}\times1=\sqrt{3}

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;x1: Number;y1: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + (2*y^2)/3 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设椭圆$M$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$右顶点和上顶点分别为$A$、$B$，直线$A B$与直线$y=-x$相交于点$P$，若点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=-a x$上，则椭圆$M$的离心率等于?

text: 已知点$A(0,1)$, $C(0,5)$, 动点$M$的轨迹为$x^{2}=4 y$, 动点$N$满足$|N C|=2$, 则$|M N|+\frac{1}{2}|N A|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;C: Point;N: Point;M: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 1);Coordinate(C) = (0, 5);E: Curve;Expression(E) = (x^2 = 4*y);Locus(M) = E;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, C)) = 2
process: 根据题意画出图象:动点N满足|NC|=2设N(x,y),可得N的轨迹为圆x^{2}+y^{2}-10y+21=0,设Q(m,n),且|QN|=\frac{1}{2}|NA|,可得\sqrt{(x-m)^{2}+(y-n)^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}}化简可得3x^{2}+3y^{2}-8mx+(2-8m)y+4m^{2}+4n^{2}-1=0,\becauseN的方程又为3x^{2}+3y^{2}-30y+63=0可得m=0,n=4,即Q(0,4),可得|MN|+\frac{1}{2}|NA|的最小值为|MN|+|QM|的最小值.当Q,N,M三点共线,且为抛物线的法线时,取得最小值.设M(s,t),由y=\frac{1}{4}x2的导数为y=\frac{1}{2}x可得\frac{1}{2}s\cdot\frac{t-4}{s}=-1,解得:t=2,s=\pm2\sqrt{2},即M(\pm2\sqrt{2},2),即有|QM|=\sqrt{4+8}=2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，$P(-\frac{5}{3}, 0)$，若$P B \perp A B$，则$|A F|$=?

process: 抛物线的准线方程为y=-2,将y=2代入抛物线的方程,求得x=\pm4,故两个交点的坐标为由于圆和y=-2相切,根据圆的对称性可知,圆心在y轴上.设圆心的坐标是(0,b),故\frac{2}{2}+(b-2)^{2}=|b-(-2)|,解得b=2,故圆心为(0,2),半径为4,所以圆的方程为x^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=16.

text: 双曲线$3 x^{2}-y^{2}=3$的渐近线方程是?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$F$的直线交该抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若点$A$在第一象限，且$|F A|=3|F B|$，则线段$A B$的中点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A)=1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))
process: 根据题意和抛物线几何关系,画出几何关系如下图所示:如图所示,过A,B分别作准线的垂线,垂足分别为C,D,过B作AC的垂线,垂足为E设BF=m,则AF=3m,AB=4m.由抛物线的定义知AC=3m,BD=m故在Rt\triangleABE中,有AE=2m=\frac{1}{2}AB,所以\angleEAB=60^{\circ},即直线AB的倾斜角为60^{\circ}所以可设直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1),代入y^{2}=4x,有3x^{2}-10x+3=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),AB中点为M(x_{0},y_{0})则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{10}{3},所以x_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{5}{3}所以_{y_{0}}=\sqrt{3}(x_{0}-1)=\sqrt{3}(\frac{5}{3}-1)=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}故AB中点坐标为(\frac{5}{3},\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}).

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，两渐近线分别为$l_{1}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$ , $l_{2}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$. 过$F$作$l_{1}$的垂线，垂足为$M$，该垂线交$l_{2}$于点$N$，$O$为坐标原点. 若$|O F|=|F N|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;F: Point;N: Point;M:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;l1:Line;l2:Line;Expression(l1)=(y=(b/a)*x);Expression(l2)=(y=-(b/a)*x);L:Line;PointOnCurve(F,L);IsPerpendicular(l1,L);FootPoint(l1,L)=M;Intersection(L,l2)=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N));Asymptote(C)={l1,l2}
process: 因为l_{1}:y=\frac{b}{a}x',所以可i设直线FM的方程为y=-\frac{a}{b}(x-c)联立\begin{cases}y=-\frac{a}{b}(x-c)\\y=-\frac{b}{ax}\end{cases}得到N点的坐标(\frac{a_{2}}{a_{2}}-b^{2},-\frac{abc}{a^{2}-b^{2}}),又F(c,0)|FN|=\sqrt{(c-\frac{a2c}{a^{2}+(0+\frac{abc}{a-b^{2}})}=|OF|=c整理得:4a^{2}=3c^{2},所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{4}{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}.

text: 双曲线的中心在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，焦距为$16$ ,一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}} x$，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis) = True;FocalLength(G) = 16;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x*3/sqrt(7))
process: 试题解析:焦距为16,则c=8-条渐近线方程为y=\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}}x,即\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}}=\frac{a}{b}解得a=6,b=2\sqrt{7}双曲线方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{36}-\frac{x^{2}}{28}=1

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$的焦距为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?

process: 由题意得:2\sqrt{1+m}=2\sqrt{2},解得:m=1,则双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pmx

text: 已知点$M(1,-1)$和抛物线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$，过$C$的焦点且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A M} \cdot \overrightarrow{B M}=0$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/4);Coordinate(M) = (1, -1);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);Slope(G) = k;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};DotProduct(VectorOf(A, M), VectorOf(B, M)) = 0;k:Number
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),直线AB方程y=kx+1,然后由直线方程与抛物线方程联立,消去y,利用根与系数关系,表示出x_{1}+x_{2},x_{1}x_{2},从而可表示出y_{1}+y_{2},y_{1}y_{2},进而可表示\overrightarrow{AM}\cdot\overrightarrow{BM},列方程可求出斜率的值羊解]抛物线标准形式x^{2}=4y,焦点坐标(0,1),设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),直线AB方程y=kx+1,代入抛物线方程得x^{2}-4kx-4=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=4k,x_{1}x_{2}=-4y_{1}+y_{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+2=4k^{2}+2,y_{1}y_{2}=\frac{1}{16}x_{1}^{2}x_{2}^{2}=1.所以\overrightarrow{AM}\cdot\overrightarrow{BM}=(1-x_{1},-1-y_{1}\cdot(1-x_{2},-1-y_{2})\frac{2}{1-1}=2+x_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}-(x_{1}+x_{2})+(y_{1}+y_{2}),代入得4k^{2}-4k+1=0\Rightarrowk=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$M(x_{1}, y_{1})$到其焦点的距离为$3$，则点$M$到原点的距离?

process: 根据抛物线方程可求得焦点坐标为(0,1),准线方程为y=-1,根据抛物线定义,解得y_{1}=2,代入抛物线方程求得x=\pm2\sqrt{2}所以点M的坐标为:(\pm2\sqrt{2},2),所以点M到原点的距离为|OM|=\sqrt{2^{2}+(\pm2\sqrt{2})^{2}}=2\sqrt{3},

fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Coordinate(D) = (m, 0);x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;m:Number;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(B, C);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), xAxis) = D;x1 + x2 = 2
process: 由A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})是抛物线C:y^{2}=4x上两点则\begin{cases}y_{1}=4x_{1}\\y_{2}=4x_{2}\end{cases},两式作差可得(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})=4(x_{1}-x_{2})由线段AB的垂直平分线与x轴相交,则直线AB的斜率存在且不为0所以\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{4}{y_{1}+y}|_{1}+y_{2}线段AB的中点坐标为(\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2},\frac{y}{-}所以线段AB的垂直平分线的斜\underline{.}所以\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}.\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{1-m}=\frac{y}{y_{1}}\frac{4}{y_{1}+y_{2}}解得m=3.

text: 已知定点$A(4,0)$和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$上的动点$B$，动点$P(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{O A}+\overrightarrow{O B}=2 \overrightarrow{O P}$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;A: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Coordinate(A) = (4, 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(O, A) + VectorOf(O, B) = 2*VectorOf(O, P)
process: \because定点A(4,0)和圆x^{2}+y^{2}=4上的动点B设动点P(x,y)及圆上点B(m,n),则\because\overrightarrow{OA}+\overrightarrow{OB}=2\overrightarrow{OP},\therefore(m+4,n)=(2x,2y),\thereforem=2x-4,n=2y,\thereforem^{2}+n^{2}=4即(x-2)^{2}+y2=1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的一个焦点到其渐近线距离为$3$，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/k = 1);Distance(OneOf(Focus(G)),Asymptote(G))=3
process: 双曲线的方程为\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{-k}=1.取双曲线的一条渐近线为y=\frac{\sqrt{-k}}{2}x'即-kx-2y=0;双曲线的一个焦点为(\sqrt{4-k},0)\cdot由题意得\frac{|-k\sqrt[x]{4-k}|}{\sqrt{-k+4}}=3,解得k=-9或k=4(舍去).答案:-9

text: 已知直线$x=m$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\triangle A O B$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$\sqrt{2}$，且双曲线$C$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;m: Number;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x = m);l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {l1, l2} ;Intersection(G, l1) = A;Intersection(G, l2) = B;Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = sqrt(2);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)
process: 由双曲线的渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,联立方程组,求得A,B的坐标,求得|AB|=|\frac{2b}{a}m|再由双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{3},得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2},求得|AB|=2\sqrt{2}|m|,再利用面积公式,即可求解[详解]由双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),可得渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x联立\begin{cases}x=m\end{cases},\\y=\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases},得\begin{cases}x=m\\y=\frac{bm}{a}\end{cases};联立\begin{cases}x=m\\y=-\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases},得\begin{cases}x=m\\y=-\frac{bm}{a}\end{cases},故|AB|=|\frac{2b}{a}m|又由双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{3},所以\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=^{\circ}\frac{2-a^{2}}{2}=e^{2}--1=2,得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2}所以|AB|=|2\sqrt{2}m|,故S_{AAOB}=\frac{1}{2}\times|2\sqrt{2}m|x|m=\sqrt{2},解得m=\pm1

C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;FocalLength(C) = 8
process: 根据题意,2c=8,即c=4;若椭圆的焦点在x轴上,即a>9时,a=9+16=25;若椭圆的焦点在y轴上,即0<a<9时,9=a+16,则a=-7,舍去;故a=25.

text: 过点$(3 ,-1)$且与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$有公共渐近线的双曲线标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C: Hyperbola;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (3, -1);PointOnCurve(H, C);Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C)
process: 设与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1有公共渐近线的双曲线标准方程是\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0)因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1过(3,-1),所以\frac{9}{3}-(-1)^{2}=\lambda,即\lambda=2,所以所求双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{6}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 短轴长为$2 \sqrt{5}$，离心率$e=\frac{2}{3}$的椭圆的两焦点为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;e:Number;Length(MinorAxis(G))=2*sqrt(5);Eccentricity(G)=e;e=2/3;Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 由题意,得2b=2\sqrt{5},e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{3},则a=3,b=\sqrt{5},c=2.由椭圆的定义知\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的周长=AB+AF_{2}+BF_{2}=AF_{1}+BF_{1}+AF_{2}+BF_{2}=(AF_{1}+AF_{2})+(BF_{1}+BF_{2})=4a=12.

text: 已知点$P(0,2)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上两点$A(x_{1}, y_{1})$ , $B(x_{2}, y_{2})$满足$\overrightarrow{A P}=\lambda \overrightarrow{P B}(\lambda \in R)$，则$|2 x_{1}+3 y_{1}-12|+|2 x_{2}+3 y_{2}-12|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (0, 2);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/8 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;x2:Number;y2:Number;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);lambda: Real;VectorOf(A, P) = lambda*VectorOf(P, B)
process: 由|2x_{1}+3y_{1}-12|+|2x_{2}+3y_{2}-12|联想到点到直线的距离,结合中位线和换元法求解.由\overrightarrow{AP}=\lambda\overrightarrow{PB}知A,B,P三点共线,当直线AB的斜率不存在时,A(0,2\sqrt{2}),B(0,-2\sqrt{2}),此时|2x_{1}+3y_{1}-12|+|2x_{2}+3y_{2}-12|=24.当直线AB的斜率存在时,设AB:y=kx+2,联立\begin{cases}y=kx+2\\\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1\end{cases}得(1+2k^{2})x^{2}+8kx-83=0,x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{^{\circ}8k}{1+2k^{2}},y_{1}+y_{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+4=-\frac{1}{1}设AB的中点M(x_{0},y_{0}),则x_{0}=-\frac{\angle}{1+}\frac{1}{2}+2k消去参数k可得\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{2}+(y_{0}-1)^{2}=1,其中y_{0}>0;令\begin{cases}x_{0}=\sqrt{2}\cos(\\y_{0}=1+\sin\theta\end{cases}\frac{x_{0}}{y_{0}}\sqrt{2}+\sin\theta+3\sin\theta-9|=\frac{|\sqrt{17}\cos(\theta+\varphi)-9|}{\sqrt{13}}其中\theta\neq2k\pi-\frac{\pi}{2},k\inZ,则点M(x_{0},y_{0})到直线2x+3y-12=0的距离为所以d\leqslant\frac{9+\sqrt{17}}{\sqrt{13}};因为由梯形的中位线性质可得A,B到直线2x+3y-12=0的距离之和为点M(x_{0},y_{0})到直线2x+3y-12=0的距离的2倍.所以|2x_{1}+3y_{1}-12|+|2x_{2}+3y_{2}-12|=2\sqrt{13}d\leqslant18+2\sqrt{17}.综上可得|2x_{1}+3y_{1}-12|+|2x_{2}+3y_{2}-12|的最大值为18+2\sqrt{17}同能)本题主要考查椭圆中的最值问题,综合性较强,难度较大,侧重考查了换元的意识及数学运算的核心素养

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(B) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(C, G)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$M$是抛物线上异于顶点的一点，$\overrightarrow{O M}=2 \overrightarrow{O N}$(点$O$为坐标原点)，过点$N$作直线$O M$的垂线与$x$轴交于点$P$，则$2|O P|-|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);Negation(Vertex(G) = M);O: Origin;VectorOf(O, M) = 2*VectorOf(O, N);N: Point;P: Point;H: Line;PointOnCurve(N,H);IsPerpendicular(LineOf(O,M),H);Intersection(H,xAxis) = P
process: 依题意,设M(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{4},y_{0}),由\overrightarrow{OM}=2\overrightarrow{ON},得N为OM的中点且N(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8},\frac{y_{0}}{2}则k_{OM}=\frac{4}{y_{0}},易得直线OM的垂线NP的方程为y-\frac{y_{0}}{2}=-\frac{y_{0}}{4}(x-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8})令y=0,得x=\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8}+2^{,}故P(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8}+2,0),由抛物线的定义易知MF=\frac{y^{2}}{4}+1,故2|OP|-|MF|=2(\frac{y_{0}}{8}+2)-(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{4}+1)=3.

text: 过椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点作$x$轴的垂线，交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l$过$C$的左焦点和上顶点，若以$A B$为直径的圆与$l$存在公共点，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;l1:Line;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(C),l1);IsPerpendicular(l1,xAxis);Intersection(l1,C)={A,B};PointOnCurve(LeftFocus(C),l);PointOnCurve(UpperVertex(C),l);IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);IsIntersect(l,G)
process: 求出直线l的方程,利用点到直线的距离与半通径的关系,列出不等式,求解即可.直线l的方程为:\frac{x}{-c}+\frac{y}{b}=1,椭圆的右焦点(c,0)过椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)的右焦点作x轴的垂线,交C于A,B两点直线l过C的左焦点和上顶点.若以AB为直径的圆与l存在公共点.可得:\frac{|-1-1|}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{c^{2}}+\frac{1}{b^{2}}}\leqslant\frac{b^{2}}{a}可得:b\geqslant2c,即a^{2}-c^{2}\geqslant4c^{2},即:e^{2}\leqslant\frac{1}{5},.e\in(0,1)解得:0<e\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过右支上一点$P$作双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$H$. 若$|P H|+|P F_{1}|$的最小值为$4 a$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;H: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C));L:Line;PointOnCurve(P,L);IsPerpendicular(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=H;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H))) = 4*a
process: 利用双曲线的定义|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|+2a,从而可得|PH|+|PF_{1}|=|PH|+|PF_{2}|+2a,利用点到直线的距离公式可得|PH|+|PF_{2}|=b,由题意可得b+2a=4a,进而求出离心率由双曲线定义知,|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,则|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|+2a\therefore|PH|+|PF_{1}|=|PH|+|PF_{2}|+2a,所以,过F_{2}作双曲线一条渐近线的垂线垂足为H,交右支于点P此时|PH|+|PF_{2}|+2a最小,且最小值为4a,易求焦点到渐近线的距离为b,即|PH|+|PF_{2}|=b.所以b+2a=4a,即b=2a,c^{2}=5a^{2},可求离心率e=\sqrt{5}

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上一点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$的切线$\frac{x_{0} x}{4}+y_{0} y=1$分别交$x, y$轴于$A$、$B$两点，则当$|A B|$最小时，$|O P|$=?

process: 由题意设切点为(2\cos\theta,\sin\theta),则椭圆在切点外的切线方程为\frac{\cos\theta\cdotx}{2}+\sin\theta\cdoty=1,令x=0则y=\frac{1}{\sin\theta},令y=0则x=\frac{2}{\cos\theta}\therefore|AB|^{2}=x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{\sin^{2}\theta}++\frac{4}{\cos2\theta}=(\frac{1}{\sin^{2}\theta}+\frac{4}{\cos^{2}\theta})(\sin^{2}\theta+\cos^{2}\theta)=1+4+\frac{\cos2\theta}{\sin^{2}\theta}+\frac{4\sin^{2}\theta}{\cos^{2}\theta}\geqslant5+2\sqrt{4}=9当且仅当2\sin^{2}\theta=\cos^{2}\theta,即_{\tan\theta}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},此时\cos2\theta=\frac{\sin}{\sin}\frac{\cos2\theta}{in^{2}\theta+\cos2\theta}=\frac{1}{\tan^{2}\theta+1}=\frac{2}{3}\therefore|AB|^{2}\min=9,\therefore|AB|_{\min}=3此时OP=\sqrt{3\cos2\theta+1}=\sqrt{3}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$, $P(2, y)$在抛物线上，则$|PF|$=?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{1}$作直线$l$与$C$的左右支分别交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\angle Q P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，且$|P Q|=|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: F2: Point;F1: Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);l: Line;Intersection(l, LeftPart(C)) = P;Intersection(l, RightPart(C)) = Q;Q: Point;P: Point;AngleOf(Q, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 由双曲线的定义知,|QF|-|QF_{2}|=|PF_{1}|=2a,|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}|=2a\therefore|PF_{2}|=4a,\because\angleQPF_{2}=60^{\circ},\therefore\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=120^{\circ}在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,由余弦定理|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}-2|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\cos120^{\circ}得4c^{2}=4a^{2}+3|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=28a^{2},即\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=7\therefore\frac{b^{2}}{a2}=6,即双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{6}x

text: 已知圆$F$: $(x+3)^{2}+y^{2}=1$，直线$l$: $x=2$，则与直线$l$相切且与圆$F$外切的圆的圆心$M^{\prime}$的轨迹方程为?

process: 因为M到定点F距离等于到定直线x=2距离加1,所以轨迹为抛物线,焦点为F(-3,0),准线为x=3,方程为y^{2}=-12x

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的渐近线方程是?
