process: 由双曲线的方程求得a=2,b=3,再根曲线的几何性质,即可求解渐近线的方程,得到答详解】由双曲线的方程\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,可得a=2,b=3又由焦点在x轴上,故渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm\frac{3}{2}x

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$，点$P$为$x=-2$的任意一点，过点$P$作抛物线$C$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，则点$M(0,1)$到直线$A B$的距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;P: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(G) = (x=-2);Coordinate(M) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);TangentOfPoint(P, C) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,C)=A;TangentPoint(l2,C)=B
process: 设P(-2,m),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})易知点A处的斜率不为0,设斜率为k,所以点A处的切线方程为y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1})由\begin{cases}y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1})\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},消去x得y^{2}-\frac{4}{k}y+\frac{4y}{k}-4x_{1}=0由\triangle=0得k=\frac{2}{y}所以A处的切线方程为2x-y_{1}y+2x_{1}=0因为切线过点P(-2,m),所以-4-y_{1}m+2x_{1}=0,同理可得点B处的切线方程为-4-y_{2}m+2x_{2}=0,所以直线AB的方程为-4-ym+2x=0,则直线AB过定点(2,0)所以点M(0,1)到直线AB的距离的最大值为:点M(0,1)到定点(2,0)的距离\sqrt{5}.

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 + y^2/9 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));r: Number;Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = r
process: 椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1中,a^{2}=9,b^{2}=5,则c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=4,\thereforea=3,c=2\therefore|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c=4,\because|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,|PF_{1}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|\therefore|PF_{2}|=2,\becauseS_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times\sqrt{4^{2}-1^{2}}=\sqrt{15},\thereforeS_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|)\cdotr=\sqrt{15}解得r=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{5}故填\frac{\sqrt{15}}{5}1本题考查了椭圆的几何性质,涉及了椭圆的定义的应用,涉及了三角形的内切圆的性质和等面积转化法的应用,注意椭圆的标准方程中,a2,b2对应的值.

text: 抛物线的顶点为原点，焦点在$x$轴上. 直线$2 x-y=0$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，$P(1 , 2)$为线段$AB$的中点，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);H: Line;Expression(H) = (2*x - y = 0);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 2);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P
process: 试题分析:因为直线2x-y=0过原点,因此A,B中有一点为原点,不妨设A(0,0),又P(1,2)是AB的中点,则B(2,4),设抛物线方程为y^{2}=mx,则4^{2}=m\times2,m=8,即抛物线方程为y^{2}=8x

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左顶点为$A$、$O$为坐标原点，以$O F$为直径作圆交双曲线的一条渐近线于点$P$ ,且$|P A|=|P F|$，则双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;A: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;O: Origin;G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(O,F),G);Intersection(G,OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = P;P: Point;e: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 由题意可知F(c,0),则以OF为直径的圆的方程为(x-\frac{c}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{4},取其中一条渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x联立直线与圆的方程,求出P的坐标,再由|PA|=|PF|即可得到a、c的关系式,求出双曲线的离心率.羊解】由题可知A(-a,0),F(c,0),双曲线的渐近线的方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,可取y=\frac{b}{a}x以OF为直径的圆的方程为(x-\frac{c}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{4}联立\begin{cases}y=\frac{b}{a}x\\(x-\frac{c}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{4}\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}x=\frac{a2}{c}\\y=\frac{ab}{c}\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=0\\y=0\end{cases}(舍去)可得P(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{ab}{c}).可得P(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{ab}{c}).可得\frac{c-a}{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{c},即c^{2}-ac=2a^{2},e^{2}-e-2=\therefore(e-2)(e+1)=0,解得e=2或e=-1(舍去)故双曲线的离心率e=2.

text: 已知点$F$、$B$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦点和虚轴端点，若线段$F B$的中点在双曲线$C$上，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);OneOf(Focus(C))=F;OneOf(Endpoint(ImageinaryAxis(C)))=B;PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F,B)), C)
process: 由题意可得点B(0,b)、点F(c,0),故线段FB的中点为(\frac{c}{2},\frac{b}{2}).再根据线段FB的中点M在双曲线C上,可得\frac{(\frac{c}{2})^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(\frac{b}{2})^{2}}{b^{2}}解得(\frac{c}{a})^{2}=5,\therefore\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5},\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}-a^{2}}{a^{2}}}=2双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm2x.

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=a y$的焦点恰好为双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的下焦点，则$a$=?

process: 抛物线x^{2}=ay的焦点为(0,\frac{a}{4})双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1的下焦点为(0,-2),\therefore\frac{a}{4}=-2,\thereforea=-8

text: 已知椭圆$C$和双曲线$Q$有相同焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且它们的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$，设点$M$是$C$与$Q$的一个公共点，若$\angle F_{2} M F_{1}=60^{\circ}$，则$\frac{e_{1} e_{2}}{e_{1}+e_{2}}$的最小值为?

G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 - y^2 = 6)
process: 双曲线2x^{2}\cdoty^{2}=6即为\frac{x2}{3}-\frac{y2}{6}=1,可得a=\sqrt{3},b=\sqrt{6},c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=3即焦距为2c=6.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x$，若顶点到渐近线的距离为$1$，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)/3*x);Distance(Vertex(G), Asymptote(G)) = 1
process: 由已知\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},即a=\sqrt{3}b,取双曲线顶点(a,0)及渐近线y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x,则顶点到该渐近线\sqrt{3}x-3y=0的距离为\frac{\sqrt{3}a}{\sqrt{(\sqrt{3})^{2}+3^{2}}}=\frac{a}{2},由题可知a=2,所以b=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}},则所求双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{3y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是$\Gamma$上的点.若$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|=3$，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/5 + y^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, Gamma);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 3
process: 根据椭圆的定义写出|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|与|F_{1}F_{2}|,然后代入求解\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2},即可求出\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}由题意可知,a=\sqrt{5},c=2,由椭圆的定义知,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2\sqrt{5},|F_{1}F_{2}|=4,则\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{20-6-16}{2\times3}=-\frac{1}{3},所以\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\cos\angleF_{1}PF=-1

text: 点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左、右两焦点，点$N$为椭圆$C$的上顶点，若动点$M$满足:$|\overrightarrow{M N}|^{2}=2 \overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}$，则$|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}+2 \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;M: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;UpperVertex(C)=N;Abs(VectorOf(M, N))^2 = 2*DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F1), VectorOf(M, F2))
process: 设M(x_{0},y_{0}),由\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1,得N(0,1),F_{1}(-1,0),F_{2}(1,0),则由|MN|^{2}=2\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{MF_{2}},可得x_{0}^{2}+(y_{0}-1)^{2}=2x_{0}^{2}-2+2y_{0}^{2},化为x_{0}^{2}+(y_{0}+1)^{2}=4,可设\begin{cases}x_{0}=2\cos\alpha\\y_{0}=2\sin\alpha\end{cases}\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}=(-2\cos\alpha-1,-2\sin\alpha+1),2\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}=(-4\cos\alpha+2,-4\sin\alpha+2),\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}+2\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}=(-6\cos\alpha+1,-6\sin\alpha+3),|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}+2\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=\sqrt{(1-6\cos\alpha)^{2}+(3-6\sin\alpha)^{2}}|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}+2\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|的最大值为6+\sqrt{10},故答案36+\sqrt{10}方法点本题主要考查椭圆的简单性质,平面向量的数量积公式,以及三角函数求最值问题,属于难题.求最值问题常见方法有\textcircled{1}配方法:若函数为一元二次函数,常采用配方法求函数求最值;\textcircled{2}图象法;\textcircled{3}不等式法;\textcircled{4}单调性法;\textcircled{5}换元法:常用代数或三角代换法,用换元法求值域时需认真分析换元参数的范围变化利用三角换元后往往利用辅助角公式结合三角函数的单调性求解

fact_expressions: C: Curve;a: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a = 1);FocalLength(C) = 8
process: 由题意知半焦距c=4,当a>0时,则曲线C为椭圆,又9<4^{2},所以a=9+4^{2}=25;当a<0时,曲线C为双曲线,所以-a+9=4^{2},所以a=-.故a的值为25或--

text: 若曲线$x=\sqrt{a-y^{2}}$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$有两个不同的交点，则$a$的取值范围是?

process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1中,a_{1}=9、b_{1}2=7,所以a_{1}=3,b_{1}=\sqrt{7},则椭圆的上顶点为(0,\sqrt{7}),右顶点为(3,0),曲线x=\sqrt{a-y^{2}}(x\geqslant0),即x^{2}+y^{2}=a(x\geqslant0),表示以原点为圆心,\sqrt{a}为半径的y轴及y轴右侧的半圆,依题意可得\sqrt{7}\leqslant\sqrt{a}<3,所以7\leqslanta<9,即a\in[7,9);

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$和准线$l$，过点$F$的直线交$l$于点$A$，与抛物线的一个交点为$B$，且$\overrightarrow{F A}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, l) = A;OneOf(Intersection(G,C))=B;VectorOf(F, A) = 3*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 由抛物线C:y^{2}=4x的方程,易知焦点F(1,0)和准线l:x=-1.过点B作BM\botl,垂足为M,设准线l与x轴交于N点,如下图:不妨设|FB|=t,故|FA|=3|FB|=3t,从而|AB|=2t又由抛物线定义可知,BM=FB=t,又因为\frac{|BM|}{|NF|}=\frac{|AB|}{|FA|},|NF|=2,所以\frac{t}{2}=\frac{2t}{2},解得,t=\frac{4}{2}所以|AB|=2t=\frac{8}{3}.数答字为:\underline{8}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3} x$与椭圆$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A F \perp B F$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;Expression(l)=(y = sqrt(3)*x);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 画出图像,设左焦点为F_{1},连接AF_{1},BF_{1},根据椭圆对称轴以及AF\botBF,判断出四边形AF_{1}BF为矩形,利用直线y=\sqrt{3}x的倾斜角,结合椭圆的定义列方程,化简后求得离心率.如图所示,设左焦点为F_{1},连接AF_{1},BF_{1},由椭圆的对称性及AF\botBF,可知AF_{1}BF为矩形,\therefore|OA|=|OF|=|OF|=c由直线y=\sqrt{3}x得\angleAOF=60^{\circ},\therefore|AF|=c,且\angleAF_{1}F=30^{\circ},|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c椭圆的定义可得,|AF|+|AF_{1}|=c+\sqrt{3}c=2a,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}+1}=\sqrt{3}-1

text: $\triangle ABC$中，$A(-2 , 0)$ , $B(2 , 0)$，则满足$\triangle ABC$的周长为$8$的点$C$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);Perimeter(TriangleOf(A,B,C))=8

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F(4,0)$，过点$F$的直线交椭圆$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B$的中点坐标为$M(1,-1)$，则椭圆$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;M: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (4, 0);Coordinate(M) = (1, -1);RightFocus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, E) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 若$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，$P$是该椭圆上的一个动点，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 由椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1可知a=2,因为P是该椭圆上的一个动点,所以|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=4,因此由基本不等式可得;|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|\leqslant(\frac{|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|}{2})^{2}=4(当且仅当|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=2时,取等号)

text: 已知抛物线$C$的顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，且抛物线上有一点$P(4 , m)$到焦点的距离为$6$. 则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;m:Number;Coordinate(P) = (4, m);Vertex(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), xAxis);PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P, Focus(C)) = 6
process: 由题意可设抛物线方程为y^{2}=2px.其准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},根据定义可得4+\frac{p}{2}=6,解得p=4所以抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=8x.

fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;10*sqrt((x1 - 1)^2 + (y1 - 2)^2) = Abs(3*x1 + 4*y1)

text: 已知抛物线的焦点为$F(0,1)$，过点$P(0,2)$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=4 \sqrt{6}$，则$|A F|+|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Focus(G) = F;Coordinate(F) = (0, 1);F: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (0, 2);l: Line;PointOnCurve(P,l) = True;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4*sqrt(6)
process: 求得抛物线的方程,设出直线l的方程,联立直线l的方程和抛物线方程,化简写出根与系数关系.根据|AB|=4\sqrt{6}求得直线l的斜率,结合抛物线的定义求得|AF|+|BF|.[详解]因为抛物线的焦点为F(0,1),所以抛物线的方程为x^{2}=4y设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),易知直线l的斜率存在,设其方程为y=kx+2由\begin{cases}y=kx+2\\x^{2}=4y\end{cases}可得x^{2}-4kx-8=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=4k,x_{1}x_{2}=-8,所以|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}}==\sqrt{1+k^{2}}.\sqrt{16k^{2}+32}=4\sqrt{6},解得k=\pm1所以|AF|+|BF|=y+y+2=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+6=4k^{2}+6=10.

text: 直线$y=k x+1$与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$总有公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;H: Line;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);IsIntersect(H,G)
process: 直线y=kx+1恒过定点P(0,1)焦点在x轴上的椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1,可得0<m<9,\textcircled{1}由直线y=kx+1与焦点在x轴上的椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1总有公共点,可得P在椭圆上或椭圆内即有\frac{0}{9}+\frac{1}{m}\leqslant1,解得m\geqslant1,\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}可得1\leqslantm<9.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{100}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上一点$P$到其焦点$F_{1}$的距离为$6$，则$P$到另一焦点$F_{2}$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/100 + y^2/36 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;Distance(P, F1) = 6;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F2;Negation(F1= F2)

G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;c:Number;Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);Focus(G)={F1,F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) =(sqrt(2)/2)*b^2
process: 试题分析:设|PF_{1}|=m_{}|PF_{2}|=n,在APF_{1}F_{2}中,由椭圆的定义可知,m+n=2a,应用余弦定理可得,\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{m^{2}+n^{2}-4c^{2}}{2mn},即mn=\frac{2b^{2}}{1+\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}},又因为APF_{1}F_{2}的面积为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}b^{2},所以S=\frac{1}{2}mn\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{2b^{2}}{1+\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}}\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{b^{2}}{1+\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}}\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}b^{2},所以可得1+\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\sqrt{2}\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2},再由\cos^{2}\angleF_{1}PF_{2}+\sin^{2}\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=1可得\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{1}{3},故应填\frac{1}{3}.

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点，$B_{1} B_{2}$是双曲线的虚轴，$M$是$O B_{1}$的中点，过$F$、$M$的直线交双曲线$C$于点$A$，且$F M=2 MA$，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;B1: Point;B2: Point;ImageinaryAxis(C) = LineSegmentOf(B1, B2);M: Point;O: Origin;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, B1)) = M;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);PointOnCurve(M, G);A: Point;Intersection(G, C) = A;LineSegmentOf(F, M) = 2*LineSegmentOf(M, A)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的斜率为$\sqrt{2}$，且右焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{3} x$的焦点重合，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Slope(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = sqrt(2);H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*(sqrt(3)*x));RightFocus(G) = Focus(H)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4\sqrt{3}x的焦点为(\sqrt{3},0),所以c=\sqrt{3}依题意,双曲线一条渐近线的斜率\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2},结合c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}可解得a=1,b=\sqrt{2}所以双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1.

text: 曲线$x^{2}+y^{2}+2 x=0$与曲线$y+|x|=0$的交点个数是?
fact_expressions: Z: Curve;Expression(Z) = (2*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);G: Curve;Expression(G) = (y + Abs(x) = 0)
process: 由\begin{cases}x^{2}+y^{2}+2x=0\\y+|x|=0\end{cases}可得,x^{2}+x=0,所以\begin{cases}x=0\\y=0\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=-1\\y=-1\end{cases},所以交点个数是2

text: 已知椭圆的长轴长是$8$，离心率是$\frac{3}{4}$，则此椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 8;Eccentricity(G) = 3/4
process: 试题分析:由已知结合椭圆定义可得椭圆标准方程.由题意知,2a=8,\thereforea=4,又e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3}{4},\thereforec=3,则b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=7.当椭圆的焦点在x轴上时,椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{7}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=-12 x$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -12*x)
process: 分析:通过抛物线标准方程直接得到P的值,得到焦点坐标(-\frac{p}{2},0).详抛物线标准方程y^{2}=-2px(p>0)的焦点为(-\frac{p}{2},0)所以y2=-12x的焦点坐标为(-3,0).

text: 已知直线$y=-x+1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$O A \perp O B$  ($O$为坐标原点），若椭圆的离心率$e \in[\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}]$，则$a$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = 1 - x);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B)) = True;O: Origin;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e, [1/2, sqrt(3)/2])
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).由\begin{cases}y=-x+1\\\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},消去y,可得(a^{2}+b^{2})x^{2}-2a^{2}x+a^{2}(1-b^{2})=0.\therefore则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2a^{2}}{a^{2}+b^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{a^{2}(1-b^{2})}{a^{2}+b^{2}},由A=(-2a^{2})^{2}-4a^{2}(a^{2}+b^{2})(1-b^{2})>0,整理得a^{2}+b^{2}>1\thereforey_{1}y_{2}=(-x_{1}+1)(-x_{2}+1)=x_{1}x_{2}-(x_{1}+x_{2})+1.OA\botOB(其中O为坐标原点),可得\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=0.\thereforex_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=0,即x_{1}x_{2}+(-x_{1}+1)(-x_{2}+1)=0,化简得2x_{1}x_{2}-(x_{1}+x_{2})+1=0.\therefore2\cdot\frac{a^{2}(1-b^{2})}{a^{2}+b^{2}}-\frac{2a^{2}}{a^{2}+b^{2}}+1=0整理得a^{2}+b^{2}-2a^{2}b^{2}=0\becauseb^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=a^{2}-a^{2}e^{2},\therefore代入上式,化简得2a^{2}=1+\frac{1}{1-e^{2}},\thereforea^{2}=\frac{1}{2}(1+\frac{1}{1-e^{2}})\becausee\in[\frac{1}{2},\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}],平方得\frac{1}{4}\leqslante^{2}\leqslant\frac{3}{4}.\therefore\frac{1}{4}\leqslant1-e^{2}\leqslant\frac{3}{4},可得\frac{4}{3}\leqslant\frac{1}{1-e^{2}}\leqslant4,因此\frac{7}{3}\leqslant2a^{2}=1+\frac{1}{1-e^{2}}\leqslant5,\frac{7}{6}\leqslanta^{2}\leqslant\frac{5}{2},可得a^{2}的最大值为\frac{5}{2},满足条件a^{2}+2>1,\therefore当椭圆的离心率e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}时,a的最大值为\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$经过点$(2,0)$，则该双曲线渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/16 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 将点(2,0)的坐标代入双曲线的方程得\frac{4}{a2}=1,\becausea>0,可得a=2.所以,双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{2}{16}}=1,因此,该双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm2x

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$x=a$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线的焦点$F$为$\triangle O A B$($O$为坐标原点) 的垂心，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;a: Real;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;Expression(H) = (x = a);Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Focus(G)=F;Orthocenter(TriangleOf(O,A,B))=F
process: 由题意知,F(1,0),设A(a,b),B(a,-b),则b^{2}=4a,a\neq0故\overrightarrow{FA}=(a-1,b),\overrightarrow{OB}=(a,-b),则\overrightarrow{FA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=(a-1)a-b^{2}=a(a-5)=0,\thereforea=5,

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$，点$A(-4 , 0)$，点$P$是抛物线$C$上的动点，则$\frac{|P F|}{|P A|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 16*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-4, 0);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C)
process: 如图所示,设点P在准线上的射影为Q,等价于直线AP与抛物线C相切时\anglePAQ最小,\sin\anglePAQ也最小,再根据A=0求解即可.点A(4,0)在抛物线C的准线x=4上,设点P在准线上的射影为Q,则\frac{|PF|}{PA}=\frac{|PQ|}{|PA|}=\sin\anglePAQ,当直线AP与抛物线C相切时\anglePAQ最小,\sin\anglePAQ也最小.设PA的方程为y=k(x+4),与y^{2}=16x联立得k^{2}x^{2}+(8k^{2}-16)x+16k^{2}=0.由_{\triangle}=(8k^{2}-16)^{2}-64k^{4}=0得k=\pm1,当k=\pm1时,\sin\anglePAQ=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 若抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上一点$M$到焦点$F$的距离为$4$，则点$M$的纵坐标的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = F;Distance(M, F) = 4
process: 根据抛物线方程求出焦点、准线方程,利用抛物线定义求解.[详解]由y=\frac{1}{4}x^{2}可得x^{2}=4y所以该抛物线的焦点为F(0,1),准线方程为y=-1设M(x_{M},y_{M}),由抛物线的定义可得|MF|=y_{M}+1=4,所以y_{M}=3

text: 点$M$到点$F(2,0)$的距离比它到直线$l$: $x+3=0$的距离小$1$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);l: Line;Expression(l) = (x + 3 = 0);Distance(M, F) = Distance(M, l) - 1
process: \because点M到点F(2,0)的距离比它到直线l:x+3=0的距离小1,\therefore点M到直线x=-2的距离和它到点(2,0)的距离相等.因此点M的轨迹符合抛物线的定义根据抛物线的定义可得点M的轨迹是以点(2,0)为焦点,以直线x=-2为准线的抛物线.\thereforep=4,抛物线的标准方程为y2=8x

text: 设$A$、$B$为曲线$C$: $y=\frac{x^{2}}{4}$上两点，$A$与$B$的横坐标之和为$4$，则直线$A B$的斜率?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Curve;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/4);PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(B, C);XCoordinate(A) + XCoordinate(B) = 4
process: 先设A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2}),将A、B两点坐标代入抛物线方程,两式作差整理,即可得出直线AB的斜率.设A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})因为A、B为曲线C:y=\frac{x^{2}}{4}上两点,所以\begin{cases}y_{1}=\frac{x_{1}2}{4}\\y_{2}=\frac{x_{2}}{4}\end{cases},则y_{1}-y_{2}=\frac{x_{1}}{4}-\frac{x_{2}2}{4}=\frac{(x_{1}-}{}又A与B的横坐标之和为4,即x_{1}+x_{2}=4,因此直线AB的斜率为k_{AB}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{4}=1.

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 - y^2/7 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 7

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$在第一、四象限分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C)=(y^2 = 2*(p*x));p:Number;p>0;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A)=1;Quadrant(B)=4
process: 试题分析:如图,作AM\botl,BN\botl,M,N是垂足,则|AF|=|AM|,|BF|=|BN|,由已知在直角梯形AMNB中\angleMAB=60^{\circ},所以\frac{|AM|-|BN|}{|AB|}=\cos60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2},所以\frac{|AF|-|BF|}{|AF|+|BF|}=\frac{1}{2},所以\frac{|AF|}{BF}=3.老点:抛物线的定义.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线与$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$、$B$两点. 若$\overrightarrow{F_{1} A}=\overrightarrow{A B}$ ,$\overrightarrow {F_{1} B} \cdot \overrightarrow {F_{2} B}=0$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;F1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(C)={L1,L2};Intersection(G, L1) = A;Intersection(G,L2) =B;VectorOf(F1, A) = VectorOf(A, B);DotProduct(VectorOf(F1,B),VectorOf(F2,B))=0
process: 如图,由\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}=\overrightarrow{AB},得F_{1}A=AB.又OF_{1}=OF_{2},得OA是三角形F_{1}F_{2}B的中位线,即BF_{2}//OA,BF_{2}=2OA由\overrightarrow{F_{1}B}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}=0,得F_{1}B\botF_{2}B,OA\botF_{1}A,则OB=OF_{1}有\angleAOB=\angleAOF_{1}又OA与OB都是渐近线,得\angleBOF_{2}=\angleAOF_{1},又\angleBOF_{2}+\angleAOB+\angleAOF_{1}=\pi,得\angleBOF_{2}=\angleAOF_{1}=\angleBOA=60^{\circ},又渐近线OB的斜率为\frac{b}{a}=\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},所以该双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}=2青】本题考查平面向量结合双曲线的渐进线和离心率,渗透了逻辑推理、直观想象和数学运算素养.采取几何法,利用数形结合思想解题.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$向双曲线的一条渐近线引垂线，垂足为$M$，交另一条渐近线于$N$，若$2 \overrightarrow{M F}= \overrightarrow{F N}$，则双曲线的离心率?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F: Point;N: Point;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;L:Line;L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(F, L);IsPerpendicular(L,L1);FootPoint(L,L1)=M;Intersection(L,L2)=N;2*VectorOf(M, F) = VectorOf(F, N);OneOf(Asymptote(C))=L1;OneOf(Asymptote(C))=L2;Negation(L1=L2)
process: 如图所示渐近线OM的方程为bx+ay=0,右焦点为F(c,0),因此|FM|=\frac{bc}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b,过点F向ON作垂线,垂足为P,则|FP|=|FM|=b又因为2\overrightarrow{MF}=\overrightarrow{FN},所以|FN|=2b,在直角三角形FPN中,\sin\angleFNP=\frac{|PF|}{|FN|}=\frac{b}{2b}=\frac{1}{2},所以\angleFNP=\frac{\pi}{6},故在三角形OMN中,\angleMON=\frac{\pi}{3},所以\angleFON=\frac{\pi}{6},所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},即a=\sqrt{3}b,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=2b所以双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2b}{\sqrt{3}b}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $A$ , $B$是椭圆$C$上的两个不同的点，设$P(1, \frac{1}{2})$，若$\overrightarrow{A P}=\overrightarrow{P B}$，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A,C) = True;PointOnCurve(B,C) = True;Negation(A=B);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 1/2);VectorOf(A, P) = VectorOf(P, B)
process: 由\overrightarrow{AP}=\overrightarrow{PB},可得P为AB的中点,且P(1,\frac{1}{2})在椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1内设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\frac{x_{1}2}{4}+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{3}=1,\therefore\underline{(x_{1}-x_{2})(x_{1}+x}则\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=-\frac{3(x_{1}}{4(y_{1}}\frac{y_{1}-y_{2})(y_{1}+y_{2})}{4\times1}=-\frac{3}{2},即AB所在直线的斜率为-\frac{3}{2}.\therefore直线AB的方程为y-\frac{1}{2}=-\frac{3}{2}(x-]),即3x+2y-4=0.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点、右焦点为$A$、$F$，过点$A$的直线$l$与$C$的一条渐近线交于点$Q$，直线$Q F$与$C$的一个交点为$B$，$\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{A B}=\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}$，且$\overrightarrow{B Q}=4 \overrightarrow{F Q}$，则双曲线的离心率$e$为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;Q: Point;A: Point;B: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(A,l);Intersection(l,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=Q;OneOf(Intersection(LineOf(Q,F), C)) = B;DotProduct(VectorOf(A, Q), VectorOf(A, B)) = DotProduct(VectorOf(A, Q), VectorOf(F, B));VectorOf(B, Q) = 4*VectorOf(F, Q);Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)中,A(a,0),渐近线y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,设右焦点为F(c,0)由\overrightarrow{AQ}\cdot\overrightarrow{AB}=\overrightarrow{AQ}\cdot\overrightarrow{FB}\Leftrightarrow\overrightarrow{AQ}\cdot(\overrightarrow{AB}+\overrightarrow{BF})=0\Leftrightarrow\overrightarrow{AQ}\cdot\overrightarrow{AF}=0,即\overrightarrow{AQ}\bot\overrightarrow{AF},直线l:x=a由双曲线对称性知,不妨令Q(a,b),设B(x_{0},y_{0}),则\overrightarrow{BQ}=(a-x_{0},b-y_{0}),\overrightarrow{FQ}=(a-c,b)因\overrightarrow{BQ}=4\overrightarrow{FQ},则(a-x_{0},b-y_{0})=4(a-c,b),解得x_{0}=4c-3a,y_{0}=-3b即点B(4c-3a,-3b),又点B在双曲线C上,则有\frac{(4c-3a)^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(-3b)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\Leftrightarrow(4e-3)^{2}=10解得_{e}=\frac{3\pm\sqrt{10}}{4},因e>1,则e=\frac{3+\sqrt{10}}{4}

text: 已知中心是坐标原点的椭圆$C$过点$(1, \frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5})$，且$C$的一个焦点为$(2,0)$，则$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Point;O:Origin;Center(C)=O;Coordinate(G) = (1, 2*sqrt(5)/5);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(C)))=(2,0);PointOnCurve(G,C)
process: 分析:首先由椭圆的一个交点坐标,得到另一个焦点为(-2,0),结合图像所过的一个点,结合椭圆的定义,利用两点间距离求得2a的值,即可求得a=\sqrt{5},利用焦点坐标得c=2,利用椭圆中a,b,c的关系求得b=\sqrt{5-4}=1,从而求导椭圆的方程详根据题意有椭圆的另一个焦点是(-2,0),则有\frac{\sqrt{5}+3\sqrt{5}}{5}=2\sqrt{5}所以a=\sqrt{5},因为c=2,所以b=\sqrt{5-4}=1从而得到椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

process: 根据椭圆的定义,|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,|BF|+|BF_{2}|=2a.\therefore\DeltaABF_{2}的周长为|AF|+|AF_{2}|+|BF|+|BF_{2}|=4a\becausea=\sqrt{2},\therefore\triangleABF_{2}的周长为4\sqrt{2}

text: $F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点，$A$、$B$是抛物线上的两点，$|A F|+|B F|=8$，则线段$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1$的焦距为$2 \sqrt{3}$, 则其离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(3 - m) + y^2/(m - 2) = 1);m: Number;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(3)
process: 分析:已知双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1的焦距为2\sqrt{3},故c=\sqrt{3},然后根据焦点位置的不同由a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2}建立等式关系即可得出m,再求离心率即可.详由题可知:当m<2时,焦点在x轴上,3-m+[-(m-2)]=3\Rightarrowm=1,此时e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}或者当m>3时,焦点在y轴,-(3-m)+(m-2)=3\Rightarrowm=4,此时e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},故综合得离心率为\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$l$: $y=k x(k \neq 0)$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A F B$周长的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;k:Number;Negation(k=0);Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;Expression(l)=(y = k*x) ;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B}
process: 设椭圆C的右焦点为F,连接AF、BF因为AB、FF的中点为坐标原点,故四边形AFBF为平行四边形所以,|BF|=|AF|,由椭圆的定义可得|AF|+|AF|=2a=4.因为直线y=kx(k\neq0)与椭圆C关于原点对称,则点A、B也关于原点对称,设点A(x_{0},y_{0}),则0<x_{0}^{2}<4,所以,|AB|=2\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+y^{2}}=2\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+1-\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4}}=2\sqrt{\frac{3x^{2}}{4}+1}\in(2,4)所以,AAFB的周长为|AF|+|AF|+|AB|=4+|AB|\in(6,8)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$与直线$2 x+y-4=0$相交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线的焦点为$F$，那么$|\overrightarrow{F A}|+|\overrightarrow{F B}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (2*x + y - 4 = 0);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B};Focus(G) = F
process: 根据抛物线定义将|\overrightarrow{FA}|+|\overrightarrow{FB}|用A,B两点横坐标表示,再联立直线与抛物线方程,结合韦达定理求解[详解]设A(x_{1},y),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则|\overrightarrow{FA}|+|\overrightarrow{FB}|=x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1=x_{1}+x_{2}+2由y^{2}=4x,2x+y-4=0得x^{2}-5x+4=0\thereforex+x_{2}=5,所以|\overrightarrow{FA}|+|\overrightarrow{FB}|=7与】本题老杳抛物线定义心及韦达定理应用,老杳基本分析求解能力,届其科题

text: 点$M(3,2)$到抛物线$C$: $y=a x^{2}(a>0)$准线的距离为$4$,$F$为抛物线的焦点，点$N(1,1)$，当点$P$在直线$l$: $x-y=2$上运动时，$\frac{|P N|-1}{|P F|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;a: Number;M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (y = a*x^2);Expression(l)=(x-y=2);Coordinate(M) = (3, 2);Coordinate(N) = (1, 1);Distance(M,Directrix(C))=4;Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,l)
process: 分析:先求出抛物线的方程,设AP=t,则AN=\sqrt{2},AF=2\sqrt{2},PN=\sqrt{t^{2}+2},PF=\sqrt{t^{2}+8},再表示\frac{|PN|-1}{|PF|},利用换元法,即可得出结论详\because点M(3,2)到抛物线C:y=ax^{2}(a>0)准线的距离为4,\therefore2+\frac{1}{4a}=4,\thereforea=\frac{1}{8},\therefore抛物线C:x^{2}=8y直线l:x\cdoty=2与x轴交于A(2,0),则FA\bot1.设AP=t,则AN=\sqrt{2},AF=2\sqrt{2},PN=\sqrt{t^{2}+2},PF=\sqrt{t^{2}+8}设\sqrt{t^{2}+2}\cdot1=m(m\geqslant\sqrt{2}\cdot1)则\frac{|PN|-1}{|PF|}=\frac{\sqrt{t^{2}+2}-1}{\sqrt{t^{2}+8}}=\thereforem=\sqrt{2}\cdot1,即t=0时,\frac{|PN|-1}{|PF|}的最小值

text: 设$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0, b>0)$的左右顶点，若双曲线上存在点$M$使得两直线斜率$k_{M A_{1}} k_{M A_{2}}<2$，则双曲线$C$的离心率的取值范围为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$e$，其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{6}}{e} x$，则$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*x*sqrt(6))
process: 由题意\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{e},\frac{b}{a}\therefore\frac{\sqrt{6}}{a^{2}},结合c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}转化为e的方程可解得结论.

text: 与曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{24}+\frac{y^{2}}{49}=1$共焦点并且与曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{36}-\frac{y^{2}}{64}=1$共渐近线的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;C1: Curve;C2: Curve;Expression(C1) = (x**2/24 + y**2/49 = 1);Expression(C2) = (x**2/36 - y**2/64 = 1);Focus(E) = Focus(C1);Asymptote(E) = Asymptote(C2)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-16 y^{2}=16$左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，直线$l$过双曲线的左焦点$F_{1}$交双曲线的左支与$A$、$B$，且$|A B|=12$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 16*y^2 = 16);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, LeftPart(G)) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 12

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点重合，且焦点到渐近线的距离为$1$，则此双曲线的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(G))=Focus(H);Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G))=1
process: 由双曲线方程知其渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x^{,}即\pmbx-ay=0\becausey^{2}=8x焦点为(2,0)\therefore双曲线一个焦点坐标为(2,0),则c=2\therefore(2,0)到渐近线的距离d=\frac{|\pm2b|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{2b}{c}=1\thereforeb=\frac{c}{2}=1\thereforea=\sqrt{c^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{3}\therefore双曲线的实轴长为2a=2\sqrt{3}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，则$a$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2 m-1}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线，则实数$m$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 3) - y^2/(2*m - 1) = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)
process: 因为方程\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2m-1}=1表示焦点在y轴上的双曲线,所以\begin{cases}m+3<0\\2m-1<0\end{cases},解得m<-3,

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上一点$M$的横坐标是$6$，则$M$到焦点$F$的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);PointOnCurve(M, G);XCoordinate(M) = 6;F: Point;Focus(G) = F

G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/15 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));H: Circle;Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x + 4)^2 = 4);K: Circle;Expression(K) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 1);Z1: Line;Z2: Line;TangentOfPoint(P, H) = Z1;TangentOfPoint(P, K) = Z2;M: Point;TangentPoint(Z1, H) = M;N: Point;TangentPoint(Z2, K) = N
process: 求得两圆的圆心和半径,设双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{15}=1的左右焦点为F_{1}(-4,0),F_{2}(4,0),连接PF_{1},PF_{2},F_{1}M,F_{2}N,运用勾股定理和双曲线的定义,结合三点共线时,距离之和取得最小值,计算即可得到所求值.羊解】圆C_{1}:(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}=4的圆心为(-4,0),半径为r_{1}=2;圆C_{2}:(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=1的圆心为(4,0),半径为r_{2}=1,设双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{15}=1的左右焦点为F_{1}(\cdot4,0),F_{2}(4,0),连接PF_{1},PF_{2},F_{1}M,F_{2}N,可得|PM|^{2}\cdot|PN|^{2}=(|PF_{1}|^{2}\cdotr_{1}^{2})\cdot(|PF_{2}|^{2}\cdotr_{2}^{2})=(|PF_{1}|^{2}\cdot4)\cdot(|PF_{2}|^{2}-1)=|PF_{1}|^{2}\cdot|PF_{2}|^{2}\cdot3=(|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|)(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|)\cdot3=2a(|PF|+|PF_{2}|\cdot3=2(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|)\cdot3\geqslant2\cdot2c\cdot3=2\cdot8\cdot3=13.当且仅当P为右顶点时,取得等号,即最小值13.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$O A \perp B F_{1}$ ,$|A F_{2}|=|B F_{2}|$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(B, F1),LineSegmentOf(O, A));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2))
process: 作出图象,取AB中点E,连接EF_{2},设F_{1}A=x,根据双曲线定义可得x=2a,再由勾股定理可得到c^{2}=7a^{2},进而得到e的值.取AB中点E,连接EF_{2}.则由已知可得BF_{1}\botEF_{2},F_{1}A=AE=EB设F_{1}A=x,则由双曲线定义可得AF_{2}=2a+xBF_{1}-BF_{2}=3x-2a-x=2a,即x=2a,在Rt\triangleF_{1}EF_{2}中,由勾股定理可得(4a)^{2}+(2\sqrt{3}a)^{2}=(2c)^{2}则e==\sqrt{7}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$ ,过焦点$F$且斜率为$1$的直线与$C$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$P$、$Q$两点在准线上的投影分别为$M$，$N$两点，则$\Delta M F N$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = 1;Intersection(G, C) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;Projection(P, Directrix(C)) = M;Projection(Q, Directrix(C)) = N;M: Point;N: Point
process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=4x则焦点坐标为F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1过焦点F且斜率为1的直线方程为y=x-1,化简可得x=y+抛物线C与直线相交于P,Q两点,设P(x_{1},y_{1}),Q(x_{2},y_{2})且P,Q两点在准线上的投影分别为M,N则\begin{cases}x=y+1\\y2=4x\end{cases},化简可得y^{2}-4y-4=0所以y_{1}+y_{2}=4,y_{1}.v_{1}=-4则|MN|=|y_{1}-y_{2}|()\overrightarrow{A_{2}}^{2}-4y_{1}\cdoty_{2}所以S_{\triangleMFN}=\frac{1}{3}\times4\sqrt{\times2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m \in R , m \neq 0)$的离心率为$2$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Negation(m=0);Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2
process: 根据双曲线标准方程,知:a^{2}=9,b^{2}=m>0\because双曲线的离心率为2\therefore\frac{c}{a}=2,而c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\thereforem=27

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$上一点$M(x_{1}, y_{1})$到其焦点的距离为$\frac{9}{2}$，则点$M$到坐标原点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;x1: Number;y1: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 6*x);Coordinate(M) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 9/2;O: Origin
process: 由题意知,焦点坐标为(\frac{3}{2},0),准线方程为x=-\frac{3}{2}由M(x_{1},y_{1}到焦点距离等于到准线距离,得x_{1}+\frac{3}{2}=\frac{9}{2},则x_{1}=3\thereforey^{2}=18,可得|OM|=\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}}=3\sqrt{3}

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一个焦点$F$作它的一条渐近线的垂线$F M$, 垂足为$M$并且交$y$轴于$E$，若$M$为$EF$中点，则$m$=?

text: 已知点$A$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点，$O$为坐标原点，过椭圆的右焦点$F$作垂直于$x$轴的直线$l$，若直线$l$上存在点$P$满足$\angle A P O=30^{\circ}$，则椭圆离心率的最大值?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);IsPerpendicular(xAxis, l);PointOnCurve(P, l);AngleOf(A, P, O) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)
process: 由对称性不妨设P在x轴上方,设P(c,m),m>0,\anglePOF=\alpha,\anglePAF=\beta\therefore\tan\angleAPO=\tan(\alpha-\beta)=\frac{\frac{m}{\frac{m}{2}-\frac{m}{a+c}}}{c(a+c)+m^{2}=\frac{c(a+c)}{c}\cdot\frac{a+c}{m}}}+m^{\frac{a}{2\sqrt{c(a+c)}}当且仅当m=\sqrt{c(a+c)}取等号\therefore(\tan\angleAPO)_{\max}\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\therefore4e^{2}+4e-3\leqslant0,即(2e-1)(2e+3)\leqslant0,所以0<e\leqslant\frac{1}{2}故椭圆离心率的最大值为\frac{1}{2}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点，$P$是椭圆上的一点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆面积为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0
process: 由\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,可得PF_{1}与PF_{2}得夹角为\frac{\pi}{2},由椭圆焦点三角形面积公式可得S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}得大小,设\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆得半径为r,可得S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|)\timesr,可得r的值,可得答案.羊解】由椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,可得a=5,b=3,c=4,|F_{1}F_{2}|=8,设PF_{1}与PF_{2}得夹角为\theta,由\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,可得\theta=\frac{\pi}{2},\frac{\theta}{2}=\frac{\pi}{4},由椭圆焦点三角形面积公式可得:S_{\trianglePF_{1}F},=b^{2}\times\tan\frac{\theta}{2}=9,设\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆得半径为r.可得S_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|)\timesr=\frac{1}{2}\times(10+8)\timesr=9,可得r=1.故\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆面积为\pi

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的一个动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y-12=0$和$l_{2}$: $y+1=0$的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);Expression(l1)=(4*x - 3*y - 12 = 0);Expression(l2)=(y+1=0);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 求出抛物线的焦点坐标,准线方程,利用抛物线的定义转化为焦点到直线的距离求解即可.[详解]抛物线y=\frac{1}{4}x2,即x^{2}=4y的焦点坐标为(0,1),准线方程l_{2}:y+1=0.由抛物线的定义,可知抛物线上的点到准线的距离与到焦点的距离相等.所以抛物线上的点P到直线l_{1}:4x-3y-12=0和l_{2}y+1=0的距离之和的最小值,转化为焦点(0,1)到直线l_{1}:4x-3y-12=0的最小值,d=\frac{|0-3-12|}{\sqrt{16+9}}=3

process: 若抛物线的交点在x轴,设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=mx,m\neq0,\because抛物线过点(1,\therefore1=m,即m=1,\therefore此时抛物线方程为y^{2}=x.若抛物线的交点在y轴,设抛物线的方程为x^{2}=ny,n\neq0,\because抛物线过点(1,1\therefore1=n,即n=1,此时抛物线方程为x^{2}=y.综上:y^{2}=x或x^{2}=y.

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，经过原点$O$的直线$l$与椭圆$E$交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P F|=3|Q F|$，且$\angle P F Q=90^{\circ}$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?

process: 取椭圆的右焦点F,连接QF',PF',由椭圆的对称性,可得四边形PFQF为平行四边形,则|PF|=|QF|,\angleFPF=\pi-\anglePF=180^{\circ}-90^{\circ}=90^{\circ},|PF|=3|QF|,而|PF|+|PF|=2a,所以|PF|=\frac{a}{2},所以|PF|=\frac{3a}{2}在Rt\trianglePFF中,(\frac{a}{2})^{2}+(\frac{3a}{2})^{2}=(2c)^{2},解得:e=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{4}

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点，$P$为$C$上的一点，若$|P F|=1$，则点$P$的坐标为?

process: 由题设,a=2,c=1,则a-c=1,a+c=3,所以椭圆上点与F距离范围为[1,3],又|PF|=1,所以P是椭圆的右顶点,即P的坐标为(2,0).

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，则$|P F|$的取值范围为?

process: 由题意,F(-1,0),设P(x,y由题意,F(-1,0),设P(x,y),则\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\Rightarrowy^{2}=3-\frac{3}{4}x^{2},所以+4,因为-2\leqslantx\leqslant2,所以|PF|的范围是[1,3].

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，$P$是以$F$为焦点的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上任意一点，$M$是线段$P F$上的点，且$|P M|=2|M F|$，则直线$O M$斜率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;P: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, LineSegmentOf(P,F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F))
process: 由题意可知,以F为焦点的抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0),则F(\frac{p}{2},0)而P是抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)上任意一点,M是线段PF上的点,且|PM|=2|MF|,设点P(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{2p},y_{0})(y_{0}>0),可得M(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{6p}+\frac{p}{3},\frac{y_{0}}{3})则k_{OM}=\frac{\frac{y_{0}}{3}}{\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{\frac{0}{60}+\frac{p}{3}}}=\frac{2}{\frac{y_{0}}{p}+\frac{2p}{y_{0}}}\leqslant\frac{2}{2\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},当且仅当y_{0}^{2}=2p^{2}时等号成立,\therefore直线OM斜率的最大值为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>1)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n}-y^{2}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?

process: 试题分析:因为两曲线的焦点相同,所以c^{2}=m-1=n+1,即m--n=2.设P是两曲线在第一象限内的交点,则由椭圆与双曲线的定义,有\begin{cases}PF\bot|PF|=2\sqrt{m}\\PF|-|PF_{2}=2\sqrt{n}\end{cases},解得\begin{matrix}PF\\PF_{2}&\sqrt{m}+\sqrt{n}\end{cases},所以|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=2.在AF_{1}PF_{2}中,由余弦定理,得\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{|PF|^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}-|F_{1}F_{2}^{2}}{2|PF\cdot|PF_{2}|}=\frac{(\sqrt{m}+\sqrt{n})^{2}+(\sqrt{m}-\sqrt{n})^{2}-4(m-1)}{\frac{2(n-m)+4}{2\times2}}=0,所以\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{\pi}{2},所以S_{AF_{1}PF_{2}}=

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(m>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为椭圆和双曲线的一个交点，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;m: Number;n: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;m>0;n>0;Expression(H) = (y^2/9 + x^2/m^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/n^2 = 1);Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = {F1, F2};OneOf(Intersection(H,G))=P
process: \because已知椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(m>0)和双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(n>0)有相同的焦点F_{1}、F_{2}\thereforem^{2}\cdot9=n^{2}+4,即m^{2}\cdotn^{2}=13,假设P在第一象限,根据椭圆和双曲线的定义可得:|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2m,|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=2n,两式平方差得4|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=4m^{2}-4n^{2}=4\times13,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=13

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦距为$6$，短轴为长轴的$\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}$，直线$l$与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，弦$A B$的中点为$M(2,1)$，则直线$l$的方程为?

process: 由已知可得椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的半焦距c=3,又短轴为长轴的\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}故_{2b}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}\times2a'故a=4,b=\sqrt{7},故椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1设弦的两端点为A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})相减得\underline{(x_{1}-x_{2}(x_{1}+x_{2})}+\frac{(y_{1}-y_{2})(y_{1}+y_{2})}{7}=0所以弦所在的直线的斜率为-\frac{7}{8},其方程为y-1=-\frac{7}{8}(x-2),整理得7x+8y-22=0.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左, 右焦点，若双曲线右支上存在一点$P$，使$(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=0$ , $O$为坐标原点，且$|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G));DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, P)),VectorOf(F2, P)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))
process: 取PF_{2}的中点A,则(\overrightarrow{OP}+\overrightarrow{OF_{2}})\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=0,\cdot2\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=0,\therefore\overrightarrow{OA}\bot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}\becauseOA是\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的中位线,\thereforePF_{1}\botPF_{2},OA=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}由双曲线的定义得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,\because|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}|PF_{2}|,\because|PF_{2}|=\frac{2a}{\sqrt{3}-1},|PF_{1}|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}a}{\sqrt{3}-1}\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,由勾股定理得|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=4c^{2},(\frac{2a}{\sqrt{3}-1})^{2}+(\frac{2\sqrt{3}a}{\sqrt{3}-1})^{2}=4c^{2},\thereforee=\sqrt{3}+1

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$C$上有且只有一个点$P$满足$|O F|=|F P|$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;O: Origin;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,F))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(F,P))
process: 设点P的坐标为(x,y),可得y^{2}=利用两点间的距离公式得出|FP|=a-\frac{c}{a}x=c,结合题意可得出x=a,由此可得出a=2c,可求得|a的值,进而可得出椭圆C的方程.设点P的坐标为(x,y),则点F(c,0),由题意得y^{2}=3-\frac{3x^{2}}{a^{2}},由于|FP|=\sqrt{(x-c)^{2}+y^{2}}=\sqrt{x^{2}-2cx+c^{2}+3-\frac{3y^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}x^{2}-2cx+a^{2}}=|\frac{c}{a}x-a|\because-a\leqslantx\leqslanta,则\frac{c}{a}x-a<0,所以,|FP|=a-\frac{c}{a}x=c由于在椭圆C上有且只有一个点P满足|OF|=|FP|,则x=\pma若x=-a,则|FP|=a+c>c,不合乎题意若x=a,则|FP|=a-c=c,可得a=2c,即a=2\sqrt{a^{2}-3},解得a=2,因此,椭圆C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$到直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3} x+b$的距离为$\sqrt{3}$，且直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|+|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (y = sqrt(3)*x + b);Focus(C) = F;Distance(F, l) = sqrt(3);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};b:Number
process: 由题知,抛物线C的焦点F(1,0),则焦点F到直线l:y=\sqrt{3}x+b的距离_{d}=\frac{|\sqrt{3}+b|}{2}=\sqrt{3},解得\begin{cases}b=-3\sqrt{3}或b=\sqrt{3}.又直线l与抛物线C交于A,B两点,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立\\y^{2}=\sqrt{3}x+b,\end{cases}消去x并整理得\sqrt{3}y^{2}-4y+4b=0,则a=16-16\sqrt{3}b>0,解得b<\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},所以b=-3\sqrt{3},所以直线l:y=\sqrt{3}x-3\sqrt{3}.代入抛物线C:y^{2}=4x,消去y并整理得3x^{2}-22x+27=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{22}{3},所以|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=\frac{28}{3}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=8 y$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在抛物线$C$上，且$P F \perp O F$，则$|\overrightarrow{O F}-\overrightarrow{P F}|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 8*y);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;O: Origin;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F), LineSegmentOf(O, F))
process: 由题意|OF|=2,|PF|=4,则|\overrightarrow{OF}-\overrightarrow{PF}|=|\overrightarrow{OP}|=\sqrt{|OF|^{2}+|FP|^{2}}=2\sqrt{5}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点. 若$P$是$C$的左支上一点，$A(0,6 \sqrt{6})$是$y$轴上一点，则$\triangle A P F$周长的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 6*sqrt(6));PointOnCurve(A, yAxis)
process: 试题分析:因a=1,b^{2}=8\Rightarrowc=3,设双曲线的左焦点为F',AAPF的周长为L=AF+AP+PF,注意到AF=\sqrt{9+216}=15,AP+PF=AP+PF'+2,故当A,P,F'三点共线时AP+PF=AP+PF'+2,最短,设P(x,y),则y=2\sqrt{6}(x+3)代入双曲线方程解得x=-2,y=2\sqrt{6},所以PF=\sqrt{25+24}=7,PA=\sqrt{4+96}=10,故三角形的周长的最小值为L=15+7+10=32,应填32.

text: $P$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$右支上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是左、右焦点，$I$是三角形$P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，若$S_{\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}}=2 S_{\Delta I P F_{2}}+(1+\frac{1}{\lambda}) S_{\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}}$，则实数$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;I: Point;Incenter(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)) = I;lambda: Real;Area(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)) = 2*Area(TriangleOf(I,P,F2)) + (1+1/lambda)*Area(TriangleOf(I,F1,F2))
process: 依题意,设双曲线的焦距为2c,实轴长为2a,则c=\sqrt{3},a=1\because1是三角形PF_{1}F_{2}的内心,设三角形PF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆的半径为r,则:S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}(|F_{1}F_{2}|+|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|)r.S_{\DeltaIPF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|r,S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|r,\becauseS_{APF_{1}F_{2}}=2S_{\DeltaIPF_{2}}+(1+\frac{1}{\lambda})S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}}又S_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=S_{\DeltaIPF_{2}}+S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}}+S_{\DeltaIPF_{1}}\thereforeS_{\DeltaHPF_{2}}+\frac{1}{2}S_{\DeltaIF_{1}F_{2}}=S_{\DeltaIPF_{1}}即\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|r|+\frac{1}{\lambda}\times\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|r=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|r\therefore|PF_{2}|+\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|=|PF_{1}|,又P是双曲线右支上一点\because\frac{1}{\lambda}=\frac{|PF|-|PF_{2}|}{|F_{1}F_{2}|}=\frac{2a}{2c}=\frac{a}{c}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\therefore\lambda=\sqrt{3}.

text: 若双曲线的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{2} x$，则其离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y=sqrt(2)*x)
process: 试题分析:由题意得,当双曲线的焦点在x轴上时,此时\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2}\Rightarrowb=\sqrt{2}a,此时双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2+b^{2}}}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}a}{a}=\sqrt{3},当双曲线的焦点在y轴上时,此时\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{2}\Rightarrowa=\sqrt{2}b,此时双曲线的离心率为\_e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{(2}}{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}

text: 已知直线$l$经过椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{2}+x^{2}=1$的焦点并且与椭圆相交于$P$、$Q$两点，线段$P Q$的垂直平分线与$x$轴相交于点$M$，则$\triangle M P Q$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l) = True;Intersection(l,G) = {P,Q};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;Q: Point;M: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P,Q)),xAxis) = M
C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4
process: 试题分析:双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1中a=4,b=2,则渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{2}x由题意P在双曲线的左支上,则PF_{2}|\cdot|PF_{1}|=2a=8,\therefore|PF_{2}|=12

text: 直线$x=m$与椭圆$C$: $3 x^{2}+4 y^{2}=12$交于$A$、$B$，椭圆的左焦点为$F$，当$\triangle F A B$的周长最大时，$\triangle F A B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;m: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (3*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 12);Expression(G) = (x = m);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};LeftFocus(C) = F;WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F, A, B)))
process: 设椭圆的右焦点为F_{1},显然有F_{1}A+F_{1}B\geqslantAB(当直线x=m经过点F_{1}时取等号)因此有F_{1}A+F_{1}B+FA+FB\geqslantAB+FA+FB,即AB+FA+FB\leqslant2a+2a=4a即\triangleFAB的周长最大值为4a,此时直线x=m经过点F_{1},由3x^{2}+4y^{2}=12\Rightarrow\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\Rightarrowa=2,b=\sqrt{3},\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{4-3}=1因此此时直线x=m的方程为x=1,当x=1时,3\times1^{2}+4y^{2}=12\Rightarrowy=\pm\frac{3}{2}即AB=2\times\frac{3}{2}=3,FF_{1}=2,因此\triangleFAB的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times2\times3=3.

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，准线与$y$轴的交点为$M$、$N$为抛物线上的一点，且满足$|N F|=\lambda|M N|$，则$\lambda$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G),yAxis) = M;M: Point;PointOnCurve(N,G) = True;N: Point;lambda: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = lambda*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))

text: 已知点$A$、$B$、$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的右顶点、下顶点、左焦点和右焦点，点$M$、$N$是椭圆上任意两点，若$\Delta M A B$的面积最大值为$\sqrt{2}+1$，则$\frac{|N F_{1}| \cdot|N F_{2}|}{|N F_{1}|+9|N F_{2}|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(G) = A;LowerVertex(G) = B;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Max(Area(TriangleOf(M, A, B))) = 1 + sqrt(2)
process: 设M(a\cos\theta,\sin\theta),因为A(a,0),B(0,-1),所以直线AB的方程为x-ay-a=0点M到直线AB的距离为d=\frac{|a\cos\theta-a\sin\theta-a|}{\sqrt{1+a^{2}}}=\frac{a}{\sqrt{1+a^{2}}}|\sqrt{2}\cos(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4})-1|\leqslant\frac{(\sqrt{2}+1)a}{\sqrt{1+a^{2}}}因为AMAB的面积最大值为\sqrt{2}+1,所以\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{1+a^{2}}\frac{(\sqrt{2}+1)a}{\sqrt{1+a^{2}}}=\sqrt{2}+1,即a=2.由椭圆的定义可得|NF_{1}|+|NF_{2}|=2a=4,设t=|NF_{2}|,则|NF_{1}|=4-t且0<t<4.\frac{|NF_{1}|\cdot|NF_{2}|}{|NF_{1}|+9|NF_{2}|}=\frac{(4-t)t}{4-t+9t}=\frac{(4-t)t}{4+8t},令y=\frac{(4-t)t}{4+8t},则y=\frac{8(2-t-t^{2})}{(4+8t)^{2}},易求0<t<1时,y>0;1<t<4时,y<0;所以y的最大值为\frac{1}{4}

text: 点$A$是抛物线$C_{1}$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$与双曲线$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的交点，若点$A$到抛物线$C_{1}$的准线的距离为$p$，则双曲线$C_{2}$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C2: Hyperbola;C1: Parabola;A: Point;p: Number;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;p > 0;Expression(C1) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(C2) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Intersection(C1, OneOf(Asymptote(C2))) = A;Distance(A, Directrix(C1)) = p
process: 取双曲线的一条渐近线:y=\begin{cases}取双曲线的一条渐近线:y=bx,联立\\y^{2}=2px\\y=\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}x=\frac{2pa^{2}}{b^{2}}\\y=\frac{2pa}{a}\end{cases},故A(\frac{2pa^{2}}{b^{2}},\frac{2pa}{b})\because点A到抛物线的准线的距离为p\therefore\frac{p}{2}+\frac{2pa^{2}}{b^{2}}=p,化为\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}\therefore双曲线C_{2}的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{5}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (3*x - 2*y = 0)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)的渐近线方程为\frac{x}{a}\pm\frac{y}{3}=0,即3x\pmay=0(a>0),又它的一条渐近线方程为3x-2y=0.所以a=2.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$与点$M(-1,2)$，过$C$的焦点，且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-1, 2);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);Slope(G) = k;k: Number;G: Line;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0

text: 若常数$a>0$, 椭圆$x^{2}+a^{2} y^{2}=2 a^{2}$的长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: a: Real;a>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (a^2*y^2 + x^2 = 2*a^2);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 3*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 由椭圆x^{2}+a^{2}y^{2}=2a^{2},可得椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1,当a>1时,\frac{x2}{2a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1表示焦点在x轴上的椭圆,\therefore2\sqrt{2a^{2}}=3\times2\sqrt{2},即a=3,当0<a<1时,\frac{x^{2}}{2a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1表示焦点在y轴上的椭圆\therefore2\sqrt{2}=3\times2\sqrt{2a^{2}},即a=\frac{1}{3}综上,实数a的值为3或\frac{1}{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，$C$的离心率$e=2$，过$F_{2}$的直线与双曲线$C$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点(其中$A$点在第一象限)，设点$M$、$N$分别为$\Delta A F_{1} F_{2}$, $\Delta B F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，则$|M N|$的范围是?(用只含有$a$的式子表示)
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e;e = 2;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F2, G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, RightPart(C)) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;M: Point;N: Point;Incenter(TriangleOf(A, F1, F2)) = M;Incenter(TriangleOf(B, F1, F2)) = N;a>0;b>0

text: 已知点$(1,1)$在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，则$C$的焦点到其准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(G) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(G, C)
process: 点(1,1)代入抛物线方程1=2p\times1,解得p=\frac{1}{2},抛物线方程为:y^{2}=x,焦点坐标为(\frac{1}{4},0),准线方程为:x=-\frac{1}{4}.焦点到准线的距离:\frac{1}{4}-(-\frac{1}{4})=\frac{1}{2}均答家为:\underline{1}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、 右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线$C$的左支于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \perp \overrightarrow{P Q}$且$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为$12 a$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, LeftPart(C)) = {P, Q};IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(P,F2),VectorOf(P,Q));Perimeter(TriangleOf(P,Q,F2))=12*a

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在此双曲线上，$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，如果点$P$到$x$轴的距离等于$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$，那么该双曲线的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Distance(P, xAxis) = sqrt(5)/5

text: 已知双曲线的中心在坐标原点，一个焦点为$F(10 , 0)$，两条渐近线的方程为$y=\pm \frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F: Point;O:Origin;Center(G)=O;Coordinate(F) = (10, 0);OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(4/3)*x)

text: 已知点$Q(-2 \sqrt{2} , 0)$及抛物线$x^{2}=-4 y$上一动点$P(x, y)$，则$|y|+|P Q|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (-2*sqrt(2), 0);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -4*y);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点到双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线距离等于$\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Distance(Focus(G), Asymptote(C)) = 1/3
process: 先求出抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点坐标为(0,1),和双曲线的一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x,根据点到直线的距离公式和离心率公式即可求出.详解)抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点坐标为(0,1),双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的一条渐近线方程为\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=3,

text: 已知点$P(m, 2)$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$右支上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为其左右焦点，线段$P F_{1}$交$C$的左支于点$Q$，则$|P Q|+|Q F_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: P: Point;m: Number;Coordinate(P) = (m, 2);C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Q: Point;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LeftPart(C)) = Q

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，若双曲线上存在点$A$，使$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，且$|A F_{1}|=3|A F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G) = True;AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2))
process: \because\angle\angleF_{1}AF_{2}=90^{\circ},且|AF_{1}|=3|AF_{2}|,设|AF_{2}|=m,|AF_{1}|=3m\therefore(3m)^{2}+m^{2}=4c^{2},得_{m}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}c^{2}|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|=2a=2m=\frac{2\sqrt{10}}{5}c\therefore\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$, 过$F_{1}$且垂直于$x$轴的直线与该双曲线的左支交于$A$、$B$两点，$A F_{2}$,$B F_{2}$分别交$y$轴于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为$16$，则$\frac{b^{2}}{a+1}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1,H);IsPerpendicular(xAxis, H);Intersection(H, LeftPart(G)) = {A, B};Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A, F2), yAxis) = P ;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B, F2), yAxis) = Q;Perimeter(TriangleOf(P, Q, F2)) = 16
process: 的周长为32,AB是双曲线的通径,|AB|=\frac{2b^{2}}{a}\because|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|+|AB|=32,|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|-|AB|=4a,|AB|=\frac{2b^{2}}{a}可得\frac{4b^{2}}{a}=32-4a,,\thereforeb^{2}=a(8-a)^{,}可得a\in(0,8)则\frac{b^{2}}{a+1}=\frac{8a-a^{2}}{a+1}=-(a+1+\frac{9}{a+1}-10)\leqslant4,当且仅当a+1=\frac{9}{a+1},即a=2时等号成立,故填4.青】本题主要考查了双曲线的定义,基本不等式的运用,考查学生分析解决问题的能力,属于难题

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 2 y=0$，则正数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = ((2*y)+(3*(pm*x)) = 0)
process: 试题分析:确定双曲线的渐近线方程,与条件比较,即可得到结论.双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{a}x即3x+ay=0\because双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)的渐近线方程为3x\pm2.\thereforea=2

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Q: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/100 + y^2/48 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(Q, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F1)) = (2/3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点$F$到准线的距离为$4$，过点$F$和$R(m, 0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$P$、$Q$两点.若$\overrightarrow{R P}=\overrightarrow{P F}$，则$|P Q|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*p*y);p: Number;p > 0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;Distance(F, Directrix(C)) = 4;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;PointOnCurve(R, l) = True;R: Point;Coordinate(R) = (m, 0);m: Number;l: Line;Intersection(C, l) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;VectorOf(R, P) = VectorOf(P, F)
process: 根据抛物线C:x^{2}=2py(p>0)的焦点F到准线的距离为4,求得抛物线方程x^{2}=8y再由\overrightarrow{RP}=\overrightarrow{PF}和F(0,2),得到点P的坐标,进而得到直线/的方程,与抛物线方程联立求得Q的坐标,再由两点间距离公式求解.(详解)由抛物线C:x^{2}=2py(p>0)的焦点F到准线的距离为4.所以p=4,所以抛物线方程为x^{2}=8y因为\overrightarrow{RP}=\overrightarrow{PF},F(0,2)所以点P的纵坐标为1,代入抛物线方程,可得点P的横坐标为\pm2\sqrt{2},不妨设P(-2\sqrt{2},1),则k_{PF}=\frac{2-1}{0-(-2\sqrt{2})}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}故直线的方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}x+2^{x}将其代入x^{2}=8y得x^{2}-2\sqrt{2}x-16=0可得Q(4\sqrt{2},4),故|PQ|=\sqrt{(-2\sqrt{2}-4\sqrt{2})^{2}+(1-4)^{2}}=9

text: 若椭圆的长轴是短轴的$2$倍，且经过点$(3,0)$，则椭圆的离心率为?

G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线交该抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|+2|B F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;F: Point;PointOnCurve(F,H) = True;H: Line;Intersection(H,G) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F的坐标为(1,0),准线方程为x=-1设过F的直线方程为y=k(x-1),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},化简得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=1,根据抛物线的定义可得|AF|=x_{1}+1,|BF|=x_{2}+1\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{+1}{+1}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+2}{x_{1}+x_{2}+x_{1}x_{2}+}\frac{1+x_{2}+2}{x_{2}+x_{1}x_{2}+1}=1当且仅当\frac{2|BF|}{|AF|}=\frac{|AF|}{|BF|},即|AF|=1+\sqrt{2},|l\because|AF|+2|BF|=(|AF|+2|BF|(\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|})=3+\frac{2|BF|}{|AF|}+\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}\geqslant3+2\sqrt{2}B|=\frac{\sqrt{2}(1+\sqrt{2})}{2}时,\therefore|AF|+2|BF|的最小值为3+2\sqrt{2}

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{2 m-3}=1$表示椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G)=(-y^2/(2*m - 3) + x^2/m = 1)
process: 根据题意,方程表示椭圆,列出不等式组,解可^{\frac{1}{4}}案方程\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{2m-3}=1表示椭圆,即方程\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{-(2m-3)}=1表示椭圆,则\begin{cases}m>0\\-(2m-3)>0\\m\neq-(2m-3)\end{cases},解得0<m<\frac{3}{2}且m\neq1,即m\in(0,1)\cup(1,\frac{3}{2})

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+1}-\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线，则实数$m$的取值范围是?

process: 由m+1<0,m-2<0可得.也可化为双曲线的标准方程再得结论.化成标准方程形式\frac{y^{2}}{m+2}-\frac{x^{2}}{-m-1}-=1^{,}由\begin{cases}-m+2>0\\-m-1>0\end{cases}可得m<-1,故m\in(-\infty,-1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的动弦$A B$长为$a(a \geq 2 p)$，则弦$A B$的中点$M$到$y$轴的最小距离为?

text: 已知点$A(-2,0)$在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的准线上，则$p$=?

process: 由题意,抛物线的准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},所以-\frac{p}{2}=-2,得p=4.

text: 直线$y=k x-2$交抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$于$A$、$B$两点，若$AB$中点的横坐标是$2$, 则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x - 2);k: Number;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$左焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=-12 x$的焦点重合，则双曲线的右准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = -12*x);LeftFocus(G) = Focus(H)
process: \because抛物线y^{2}=-12x的焦点为(-3,0)\therefore双曲线的焦点坐标为(-3,0),(3,0)\therefore双曲线中c=3\becausec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},b=1\thereforea=2\sqrt{2}\therefore双曲线的右准线方程为x=\frac{a^{2}}{c}=\frac{8}{3}

text: 已知斜率为$1$，且在$y$轴上的截距$b$为正的直线$l$与圆$C$:$ x^{2}+y^{2}=4$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle A O B$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Circle;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;b: Number;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Slope(l)=1;b>0;Intercept(l,yAxis)=b;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = sqrt(3)
process: 由题意,可知直线l的方程为y=x+b,圆C的圆心为C(0,0),半径为r=2,由点到直线的距离公\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\sqrt{4-\frac{b^{2}}{2}}\cdot\frac{|b|}{\sqrt{3}}=\sqrt{3},又b>0,解得b=\sqrt{6}或\sqrt{2}

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\sqrt{5}$,$P$是$C$上一点，且$F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P$. 若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$8$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F1, P), LineSegmentOf(F2, P));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 8;Eccentricity(C)=sqrt(5)
process: 利用双曲线的定义,三角形的面积以及双曲线的离心率,转化求解a即可不妨设P为双曲线左支上一点,由题意,设|PF_{2}|=m,|PF_{1}|=n可得m-n=2a,\frac{1}{2}mn=8,m^{2}+n^{2}=4c^{2},e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5},可得m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn=4a^{2},即4c^{2}-32=4a^{2},\therefore20a^{2}-32=4a^{2},即a^{2}=2,则a=\sqrt{2}

已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，若过右焦点$F$且倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线的右支有

text: 已知$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$上一个动点，$Q$为圆$x^{2}+(y-4)^{2}=1$上一个动点，那么点$P$到点$Q$的距离与点$P$到直线$x=-3$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 12*x);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Q: Point;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y - 4)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Q, H) = True;I: Line;Expression(I) = (x = -3)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=12x的焦点为F(3,0),准线方程为x=-3,圆x^{2}+(y-4)^{2}=1的圆心为E(0,4),半径为1,根据抛物线的定义可知点P到准线x=-3的距离等于点P到焦点F(3,0)的距离,从而可得:当P,Q,F三点共线时,点P到点Q的距离与点P到直线x=-3距离之和的最小为|QF|=|EF|-r=\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}-1=4,故答案:4.

text: 抛物线的顶点在原点，对称轴是$x$轴，点$(-5,2 \sqrt{5})$在抛物线上，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;G: Parabola;Vertex(G) = O;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-5, 2*sqrt(5));PointOnCurve(H, G);SymmetryAxis(G) = xAxis
process: 设抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=-2px,代入点(-5,2\sqrt{5})得(2\sqrt{5})^{2}=-2\times(-5)p解得:p=2,抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=-4x,

text: 已知$A B$是过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$焦点的弦，$|A B|=4$，则$A B$中点的横坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), LineSegmentOf(A, B));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4
process: 试题分析:因为抛物线上的点到焦点的距离等于到准线的距离,设A、B到准线的距离为d_{1},d_{2}所以d_{1}+d_{2}=x_{A}+x_{B}+1=4,所以x_{A}+x_{B}=3,所以AB中点的横坐标是x_{0}=\frac{x_{A}+x_{B}}{2}=\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知点$A(1,0)$ , $M$ , $N$分别是$x$轴、$y$轴上的动点，且满足$\overrightarrow{A N} \cdot \overrightarrow{M N}=0$. 若点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{M P}=2 \overrightarrow{N P}$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 0);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, xAxis) ;N: Point;PointOnCurve(N, yAxis) ;DotProduct(VectorOf(A, N), VectorOf(M, N)) = 0;P: Point;VectorOf(M, P) = 2*VectorOf(N, P)
process: 设点M坐标(a,0),N坐标(0,b),点P坐标(x,y)则\overrightarrow{AN}=(-1,b),\overrightarrow{MN}=(-a,b),\therefore\overrightarrow{AN}\cdot\overrightarrow{MN}=a+b^{2}=0\Rightarrowa=-b^{2}而\overrightarrow{MP}=(x-a,y),\overrightarrow{NP}=(x,y-b),\overrightarrow{MP}=2\overrightarrow{NP}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}2x=(x-a)\\2(y-b)=y\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}x=-a\\y=2b\end{cases},代入a=-b^{2}可得y^{2}=4x

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$A(2 \sqrt{2}, 2)$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (2*sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(A,G)
process: 因为(2\sqrt{2})^{2}=4\times2,所以点A(2\sqrt{2},2)在该抛物线上又抛物线的准线方程为:y=-1,所以点A(2\sqrt{2},2)到焦点的距离为:2-(-1)=3,为答安为.3

text: 一个动圆与直线$x=5$相切，且与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}+2 x-15=0$外切，则动圆圆心的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;H: Line;Z: Circle;Expression(G) = (2*x + x^2 + y^2 - 15 = 0);Expression(H) = (x = 5);IsTangent(Z, H);IsOutTangent(Z, G)
process: 设动圆圆心的坐标为P(x,y),半径为r,x^{2}+y^{2}+2x-15=0\Rightarrow(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=16,该圆的半径为4,圆心坐标为M(-1,0)因为动圆与直线x=5相切,所以|x-5|=r又因为动圆与x^{2}+y^{2}+2x-15=0外切,所以PM=4+r\frac{1}{2}+y^{2}=4+|x-5|12+y2=4+x-5\Rightarrowy2=-4x,显然不成立,当x\geqslant5时,\sqrt{(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}}=4+x-5\Rightarrowy^{2}=-4x'显然不成立

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，且双曲线的离心率是椭圆离心率的两倍，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H);Eccentricity(G) = Eccentricity(H)*2
process: 由题得,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}1(a>0,b>0)的焦点坐标为(\sqrt{7},0),(-\sqrt{7},0),c=\sqrt{7}:且双曲线的离心率为2\times\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}=\frac{c}{a}=a=2.\Rightarrowb^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=3双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 1)

text: 点$P(8 , 1)$平分椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=4$的一条弦，则这条弦所在直线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 4);Coordinate(P) = (8, 1);MidPoint(H)=P;IsChordOf(H,G)

text: $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上运动，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 若点$P(x , y)$是曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上任意一点，则$2 x+\sqrt {3} y$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;G: Curve;PointOnCurve(P, G);Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1)

text: 如果方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1$表示双曲线，那么$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/m +y^2/(m-2) = 1);m: Number
process: 由题意知m(m-2)<0,解得0<m<2.

text: 设点$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线的左、右焦点，已知$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ} $, 且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，$A(2, \sqrt{15})$，若点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d_{1}$，点$P$到点$A$的距离为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (2, sqrt(15));PointOnCurve(P, G);d1:Number;d2:Number;Distance(P, yAxis) = d1;Distance(P, A) = d2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率$e=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;e: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e;e = sqrt(10)/5
process: 已知椭圆方程为\frac{x2}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0且m\neq5).当焦点在x轴上,即0<m<5时,有a=\sqrt{5},b=\sqrt{m},则c=\sqrt{5-m}依题意得\frac{\sqrt{5-m}}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5},解得m=3.当焦点在y轴上,即m>5时,有a=王y轴上,即m>5时,有a=\sqrt{m},b=\sqrt{5}则c=\sqrt{m-5},依题意有\frac{\sqrt{m-5}}{\sqrt{10}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}解得m=\frac{25}{2},即m的值为3或\frac{m}{2}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (5, 0);PointOnCurve(P,H);Distance(P,F1)-Distance(P,F2)=6;P:Point

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$是中心在原点的椭圆$C$的一个焦点，$Q$是椭圆$C$的另一个焦点，椭圆$C$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$ ,$P$为椭圆$C$上的一点，且$\angle F P Q=60^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F P Q$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;C: Ellipse;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;Q: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = Q;Negation(F = Q);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(2)/2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;AngleOf(F, P, Q) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: \becauseF(1,0),\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},\thereforea=\sqrt{2},b=1,椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1.设|PF|=m,|PQ|=n,则m+n=2a=2\sqrt{2},在\trianglePQF中,由余弦定理,得m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos60^{\circ}=4,\thereforemn=\frac{4}{3},\therefores_{\DeltaFPQ}=\frac{1}{2}mn\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上一点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，若$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的外接圆和内切圆的半径分别为$R$, $r$，当$R=4 r$时，椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G) ;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3;R:Number;r:Number;Radius(CircumCircle(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)))=R;Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)))=r;R=4*r
process: 在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,利用正弦定理:2R=\frac{|F_{1}F_{2}|}{\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}},求得_{R}=\frac{\sqrt[2]{3}}{3}c'r=\frac{1}{4}R=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{6}c'设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,再利用余弦定理求得mn,然后由S_{\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}mn\sin\frac{\pi}{3}=\frac{1}{2}(m+n+2c)r求解.椭圆的焦点为F_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0),|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,由正弦定理得:2R=\frac{|F_{1}F_{2}|}{\sin\angleF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{2c}{\sin\frac{\pi}{3}}=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}c解得_{R}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}c'r=\frac{1}{4}R=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{6}c'设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,由余弦定理得:4c^{2}=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos\frac{\pi}{3}=(m+n)^{2}-3mn解得mn=\frac{4(a^{2}-c^{2})}{3}所以_{S_{\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}mn\sin\frac{\pi}{3}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}(a^{2}-c^{2})}{3},又_{S_{\DeltaF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}(m+n+2c)r=\frac{\sqrt{3}c(a}{6}}所以\underline{\sqrt{3}(a^{2}-c^{2})}=\frac{\sqrt{3}c(a+c)}{6},整理得2a^{2}-3c^{2}-ac=0,即3e^{2}+e-2=0,解得e=\frac{2}{3}或e=-1(舍去)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$A B$的长为$8$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;l: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Inclination(l)=ApplyUnit(30,degree);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Length(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=8
process: 根据题意可以知道过焦点的倾斜角为30^{\circ}直线方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-\frac{p}{2}),联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=2px\\y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-\frac{p}{2})\end{cases}可得:\Rightarrowx^{2}-7px+\frac{p^{2}}{4}=0\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=7p,x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},\therefore|x_{1}-x_{2}|=\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}}=\sqrt{(7p)^{2}-4\times\frac{p^{2}}{4}}=4\sqrt{3}p'\therefore|AB|=\sqrt{1+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}}|_{1}_{1}-x_{2}|=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\times4\sqrt{3}p=8计算得出:p=1,因此,本题下确答客是:1

text: 若直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且线段$A B$中点的横坐标为$2$，则线段$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = 2

text: 已知直线$x-y=2$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$ , $B$两点，那么线段$AB$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Parabola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x - y = 2);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点，$P$是直线$l$: $y=x+m(m \in R)$上一点，若$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|$的最小值是$4$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;m: Real;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(l) = (y = x + m);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, l);Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 4
process: 依题意椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,则2a=4,a=2,又因为,P是直线l:y=x+m(m\inR)上一点,若|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|的最小值是4,则此直线与椭圆相切.由\begin{cases}\frac{x2}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\\y=x+m\end{cases}消去y并化简得7x^{2}+8mx+4m^{2}-12=0,判别式4=48(7-m^{2})=0,解得m=\pm\sqrt{7}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线与直线$2 x-y+1=0$平行，则它的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Line;Expression(H) = (2*x - y + 1 = 0);IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), H) = True
process: 因为渐近线与直线2x-y+1=0平行,故可得\frac{b}{a}=2^{,}根据双曲线离心率的计算公式可得e=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{5}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$x=t$与椭圆相交于点$M$、$N$，当$\Delta F M N$的周长最大时，$\Delta F M N$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;t: Number;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = t);LeftFocus(G)=F;Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F,M,N)))
process: 设椭圆的右焦点为F_{2},则|MF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|\geqslant|MN|,当且仅当M,N,F_{2}三点共线时等号成立所以\triangleFMN的周长|MF|+|NF|+|MN|\leqslant|MF|+|NF|+|MF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|=4a=4\sqrt{5}此时|MN|=\frac{2b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}所以此时\triangleFMN的面积为s=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}\times2c=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}\times2=\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};F1: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G)
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},A为椭圆上一点,所以|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a=4.

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$与直线$y=2 x$有交点，则离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x);IsIntersect(G, H)
process: 如图所示,\because双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,若双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)与直线y=2x有交点,则应有\frac{b}{a}>2,\therefore\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}>4,\frac{c^{2}-a^{2}}{a^{2}}>4,解得e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}>5,e>\sqrt{5}

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{m}-x^{2}=1(m>0)$的一条渐近线为$m x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (m*x + sqrt(3)*y = 0)
process: 双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{m}x,由题意可得\sqrt{m}=\frac{m}{\sqrt{3}},\becausem>0,解得m=3.故a=\sqrt{3},b=1,则c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=2,因此,双曲线C的焦距为2c=4

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，当$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$时，$\triangle F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是其左右焦点，$A$是圆$x^{2}+(y-5)^{2}=1$上的一点，点$M$在双曲线的右支上，则$|M F_{1}|+|M A|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;M: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;A: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y - 5)^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, H);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(M, RightPart(G))
process: 如图右焦点坐标为F_{2}(5,0),连接AF_{2},MF_{2}由双曲线的定义,得|MF_{1}|-|MF_{2}|=2a=6.\therefore|MF_{1}|+|MA|=6+|MF_{2}|+|MA|\geqslant6+|AF_{2}|.因为点A是圆x^{2}+(y-5)^{2}=1上的点,此时圆心为(0,5),半径为1\therefore|AF_{2}|\geqslant|CF_{2}|-1=5\sqrt{2}-1,\therefore|MF_{1}|+|MA|\geqslant6+|AF_{2}|\geqslant5\sqrt{2}+5,当点M,A在线段CF_{2}上时上式取等号,即|MF_{1}|+|MA|的最小值为5\sqrt{2}+5

text: 过焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$上一点$M$向其准线作垂线，垂足为$N$，若$|N F|=10$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 12*x);F: Point;Focus(G)=F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M,G);L:Line;PointOnCurve(M,L);IsPerpendicular(Directrix(G),L);N: Point;FootPoint(Directrix(G),L)=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = 10

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$A$、$B$两点在抛物线准线上的射影为$A_{1}$, $B_{1} $则$\angle A_{1} F B_{1}$为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A1: Point;F: Point;B1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Projection(A,Directrix(G))=A1;Projection(B,Directrix(G))=B1
process: 由抛物线定义得AA_{1}=AF,BB_{1}=BF\therefore\angleAFA_{1}=\angleAA_{1}F,\angleBFB_{1}=\angleBB_{1}F\because\angleFAA_{1}+\angleFBB_{1}=\pi.\cdot\angleAFA_{1}+\angleAA_{1}F+\angleBFB_{1}+\angleBB_{1}F=2\pi-\angleFAA_{1}+\angleFBB_{1}=\pi\therefore\angleAFA_{1}+\angleBFB_{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}\Rightarrow\angleA_{1}FB_{1}=\frac{\pi}{2}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率等于$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2

text: 已知动直线$l$: $y=\frac{1}{m} x+2 m(m \neq 0)$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$相交于$M$、$N$两点，若椭圆$C$上存在点$Q$，使得$\overrightarrow{O M}+\overrightarrow{O N}=\lambda \overrightarrow{O Q}(\lambda \neq 0)$，则实数$\lambda^{2}$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;Q: Point;lambda:Real;Expression(C) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(l) = (y = 2*m + x/m);m:Number;Negation(m=0);Intersection(l, C) = {M, N};PointOnCurve(Q, C);VectorOf(O, M) + VectorOf(O, N) = lambda*VectorOf(O, Q);Negation(lambda=0)

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$. 若$|A F|=4|B F|$，则直线$l$的斜率是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: \because抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4x,可得它的焦点为F(1,0),\therefore设直线l的方程为y=k(x-1),由\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y2=4x\end{cases}消去x得\frac{k}{4}y^{2}-y-k=0,设A(x_{1}y,),B(x_{2},y_{2}),可得y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{k},y_{1}y_{2}=-4\textcircled{1}\because|AF|=4|BF|,\thereforey_{1}+4y_{2}=0,可得y_{1}=-4y_{2}代入\textcircled{1}得-3y_{1}=\frac{4}{k},且-4y_{2}^{2}=-4,解得y_{2}=\pm1,解得k=\pm\frac{4}{3},

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线上有一点$M$，满足$|M F_{1}|=\lambda|M F_{2}|(\frac{1}{3} \leq \lambda \leq \frac{1}{2})$，且$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则该双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
