process: 如示意图的定义可得:t-\lambdat=2a\Rightarrowt=\frac{2a}{1-\lambda},而\angleF_{1}MF_{2}=60^{\circ}由余弦定理:\cos60^{\circ}=\frac{t^{2}+\lambda^{2}t^{2}-4c^{2}}{2}=\frac{1}{2}\Rightarrow(\lambda^{2}-\lambda+1)t^{2}=4c^{2},\frac{2a}{1-\lambda}(\lambda^{2}-\lambda+1)(\frac{2a}{1-\lambda})^{2}=4c^{2}\Rightarrowe^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{2^{2}-\lambda+1}{(\lambda-1)^{2}}(\frac{1}{3}\leqslant\lambda\leqslant\frac{1}{2}).记f(\lambda)=\frac{2^{2}-\lambda+1}{(\lambda-1)^{2}}(\frac{1}{3}\leqslant\lambda\leqslant\frac{1}{2}),而f(\lambda)=\frac{\lambda^{2}-\lambda+1}{(\lambda-1)^{2}}=\frac{(\lambda-1)^{2}+\lambda}{(\lambda-1)^{2}}=1+\frac{1}{\lambda+\frac{1}{3}-2},由对么函数的性质可知,函数y=\lambda+\frac{1}{\lambda}-2在[\frac{1}{3},\frac{1}{2}]上单调递减,则函数f(\lambda)=1+\frac{A_{1}}{\lambda+1-2}在[\frac{1}{3},\frac{1}{2}]上单调递增,所以f(\lambda)_{\min}=f(\frac{1}{3})=\frac{7}{4},f(\lambda)_{\max}=f(\frac{1}{2})=3,即e^{2}=[\frac{7}{4},3]\Rightarrowe\in[\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2},\sqrt{1}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$，过点$M(1,0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$|A F|=6$ , $O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O A B$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;M: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(M) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(M, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 6
process: 由抛物线的性质到焦点的距离等于到准线的距离求出A的坐标,又过M点进而求出直线AB的方程,与抛物线联立求出B的坐标,由面积公式求出三角形AOB的面积.抛物线y^{2}=8x的准线方程为x=-2,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),过点A作准线的垂线AH,如图由抛物线的定义可知,|AF|=|AH|=6\thereforex_{1}+2=6,\thereforex_{1}=4,y_{1}=4\sqrt{2}设直线AB的方程为y=k(x-1)(k\neq0).由\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y2=8x\end{cases},得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+8)x+k^{2}=0,c_{1}x_{2}=1,x_{2}=\frac{1}{x_{1}}=\frac{1}{4},\thereforey_{2}=-\sqrt{2},\thereforeAOAB的面积S_{AOAB}=S_{AAOM}+S_{ABOM}=\frac{1}{2}|y_{1}|\times1+\frac{1}{2}|y_{2}|\times1=\frac{1}{2}\times(4\sqrt{2}+\sqrt{2})=\frac{5\sqrt{2}}{2}.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/8 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)

text: 已知直线$y=k(x+2)$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为抛物线$C$的焦点，若$|\overrightarrow{F A}|=2|\overrightarrow{F B}|$，则实数$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;k: Real;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(G) = (y = k*(x + 2));Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Focus(C) = F;Abs(VectorOf(F, A)) = 2*Abs(VectorOf(F, B))
process: 设P(-2,0),x=-2为抛物线的准线方程,过点A,B分别作准线的垂线,垂足为M,N,则|BN|=|FB|,|AM|=|FA|,所以|BN|:|AM|=1:2,所以|BP|=|BA|设B(a,b),则A(2+2a,2b)故\begin{cases}b^{2}=8a\\4b^{2}=8(2+2a)\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}a=1\\b=\pm2\sqrt{2}\end{cases}故_{k=\pm\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}}.填\underline{2\sqrt{2}}圆锥曲线中中与焦点或准线有关的问题,可以考虑利用其几何性质来处理.如抛物线上的点到焦点的距离可以转化为到准线的距离,椭圆上的点到一个焦点的距离可以转化到另一个焦点的距离,也可以转化到相应准线的距离.

text: 抛物线$y=-\frac{1}{6} x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = -x^2/6)

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$表示的曲线是椭圆，则实数$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k - 1) + y^2/2 = 1);H: Ellipse;G = H;k: Real
process: 方程\frac{x2}{k-1>0}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1表示的曲线是椭圆,则:\begin{cases}^{n}\\k-1\neq2\end{cases},解得:k>1且k\neq3;

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/9+y^2/4=1)
process: 由题设,c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{9-4}=\sqrt{5},故焦距为2c=2\sqrt{5}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，若在右支上存在点$A$，使得点$F_{2}$到直线$A F_{1}$的距离为$2 a$，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));Distance(F2, LineOf(A, F1)) = 2*a
process: 试题分析:如下图所示,设AF_{2}=x,则AF_{1}=x+2a_{n}\thereforeF_{1}H=\sqrt{4c^{2}-4a^{2}}=2bAH=x+2a-2b,在RtAAHF_{2}中,(x+2a-2b)^{2}+4a^{2}=x^{2}\Rightarrowx=\frac{a^{2}}{b-a}+b-a\geqslantc-a\Rightarrow\frac{a2}{b-a}+b-c\geqslant0\Rightarrow\frac{a^{2+b^{2}-bc-ab+ac}{b-a}\geqslant0\Rightarrow\frac{c^{2}-bc-ab+ac}{b-a}\geqslant0\Rightarrow\frac{(c+a)(c-b)}{b-a}\geqslant0\Rightarrowb>a\Rightarrowc^{2}-a^{2}>a^{2}

text: 已知椭圆$E$的离心率为$e$，左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，抛物线$C$以$F_{1}$顶点，$F_{2}$为焦点，$P$为两曲线的一个交点，$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}=e$，则$e$的值为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;e: Number;Eccentricity(E) = e;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;C: Parabola;Vertex(C) = F1;Focus(C) = F2;P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(E, C)) = P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = e

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1)
process: 双曲线的焦点为(\pm2,0),渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x,即x\pm\sqrt{3}y=0,焦点到渐近线的距离为\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+3}}=1,

text: 已知中心在坐标原点,离心率为$\frac{4}{5}$的椭圆的一个焦点是$(0,4)$,则此椭圆的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;Eccentricity(G) = 4/5;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(0,4)

text: 经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$中心的直线与椭圆相交于$M$、$N$两点（点$M$在第一象限)，过点$M$作$x$轴的垂线，垂足为点$E$. 设直线$N E$与椭圆的另一个交点为$P$. 则$\cos \angle N M P$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;E: Point;N: Point;M: Point;P: Point;l:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H);Intersection(H,G)={M,N};Quadrant(M)=1;PointOnCurve(M,l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);FootPoint(l,xAxis)=E;OneOf(Intersection(LineOf(N,E),G))=P

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$两点，点$C(0, \sqrt{2} b)$，若线段$A C$的垂直平分线过点$B$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (0, sqrt(2)*b);PointOnCurve(B, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, C)))
process: 由题意可得,AABC为正三角形,则\sqrt{2}b=\sqrt{3}c,所以双曲线的离心率\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

text: 已知点$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，与$C$的准线交于点$M$，若$\overrightarrow{A B}+\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{0}$，则$|A B|$的值等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l,Directrix(C)) = M;VectorOf(A, B) + VectorOf(A, M) = 0
process: 如下图所示,分别过点A、B作抛物线C的准线l的垂线,垂足分别为点D、E\because\overrightarrow{AB}+\overrightarrow{AM}=\overrightarrow{0},则点A为线段BM的中点,\therefore|BE|=2|AD|,由抛物线的定义可得|AD|=|AF|,|BE|=|BF|,\therefore|BF|=2|AF|,|AM|=|AB|=3|AF|\becauseAD/\!/FN,\therefore\frac{|AD|}{|FN|}=\frac{|AM|}{|FM|}=\frac{3}{4},\therefore|AD|=\frac{3}{4}|FN|=\frac{3p}{4}因此,|AB|=3|AF|=3|AD|=\frac{9}{4}p

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$P(-1,0)$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，点$Q$为线段$A B$的中点，若$|F Q |=2$，则直线$l$的斜率等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, Q)) = 2

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$\frac{1}{|A F|}-\frac{1}{|B F|}=1$，则直线$l$的倾斜角$\theta$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;theta: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};-1/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) + 1/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 1;Inclination(l) = theta

text: 已知点$A(-1,0)$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的准线与$x$轴的交点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，$P$是抛物线上的动点，则$\frac{|P F|}{|P A|}$最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = A;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 由题意可知:p=2,设点P(x,y),P到直线x=-1的距离为d,则d=x+1,所以\frac{|PF|}{|PA|}=\frac{d}{|PA|}=\frac{x+1}{\sqrt{(x+1)^{2}+4x}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+\frac{4x}{(x+1)^{2}}}\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}=\frac{4}{2}\sqrt{1+\frac{4}{x+\frac{1}{x}+2}}当且仅当x=\frac{1}{x}时,\frac{|PF|}{|PA|}的最小值为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},此时x=1

text: 已知$A(-1,0)$, $B(1,0)$，且$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则动点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);M: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0
process: 由向量垂直的坐标运算可得答案.设M(x,y),则\overrightarrow{MA}=(-1-x,-y),\overrightarrow{MB}=(1-x,-y)因为\overrightarrow{MA}\cdot\overrightarrow{MB}=0,所以\overrightarrow{MA}\cdot\overrightarrow{MB}=x^{2}-1+y^{2}=0,所以轨迹方程为x^{2}+y2=1.

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2 m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线交椭圆$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B$的中点坐标为$(1,-1)$，则椭圆$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;m: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;m>0;Expression(E) = (x^2/(2*m) + y^2/m = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (1, -1);RightFocus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, E) = {A, B}
process: 由题意可知,点F(\sqrt{m},0),所以直线AB的斜率为k=\frac{1}{\sqrt{m}-1}设A,B两点的坐标分别为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{2m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1\\\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\end{cases},两式相减,整理得,\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2(y_{1}+y_{2})}=所以k=\frac{m}{\sqrt{m}-1}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=9,\therefore椭圆E的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{18}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1.

text: 若双曲线的焦点在$y$轴上，离心率$e=2$, 则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Eccentricity(G)=e;e=2;e:Number
process: \because离心率为2即\frac{c}{a}=2设c=2k则a=k又\becausec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\thereforeb=\sqrt{3}k又\because双曲线的焦点在y轴上\therefore双曲线的渐进方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}x

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上一点，满足$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，直线$P F_{1}$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$有公共点，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Circle;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));IsIntersect(LineOf(P,F1), H)
process: 过点O作OM\botPF于M,过点F_{2}作F_{2}N\botPF_{1}于N,利用双曲线的定义以及勾股定理可求得|OM|^{2},由已知可得|OM|^{2}\leqslanta^{2},可得出关于a、c的齐次不等式,结合e>1可求得e的取值范围[详解]过点O作OM\botPF_{1}于M,过点F_{2}作F_{2}N\botPF_{1}于N因为|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|,所以|PN|=|F_{1}N|又因为|OF_{2}|=|OF_{1}|,所以|MN|=|F_{1}M|,故|F_{1}M|=\frac{1}{4}|F_{1}P|,又因为|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,且|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,所以|PF_{1}|=2a+2c因此|F_{1}M|=\frac{a+c}{2},所以|OM|^{2}=c^{2}-(\frac{a+c}{2})^{2}又因为直线PF_{1}与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}有公共点,所以|OM|^{2}\leqslanta^{2},故c^{2}-(\frac{a+c}{2})^{2}\leqslanta^{2}.即3c^{2}-2ac-5a^{2}\leqslant0,则3e^{2}-2e-5\leqslant0,所以-1\leqslante\leqslant\frac{5}{3}又因为双曲线的离心率e>1,所以1<e\leqslant\frac{5}{3}

text: 已知$A$、$B$、$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1( a>0, b>0)$上的不同三点，且$A$、$B$两点连线经过坐标原点，若直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率乘积$k_{P A} \cdot k_{P B}=\frac{2}{3}$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;O:Origin;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A=B);Negation(A=P);Negation(B=P);PointOnCurve(O,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = k2;Slope(LineOf(P,A))=k1;k1:Number;k2:Number;k1*k2=2/3;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的中心为顶点,以椭圆的左准线为准线的抛物线与椭圆右准线交于$A$ , $B$两点,则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Vertex(G)=Center(H);LeftDirectrix(H)=Directrix(G);Intersection(RightDirectrix(H),G)={A,B}

text: 过点$(\sqrt{3},\sqrt{5})$，且与椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$有相同焦点的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/25 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(3), sqrt(5));C:Ellipse;Focus(C)=Focus(G);PointOnCurve(H,C)
process: 根据题中条件,得到所求椭圆焦点在y轴上,且c^{2}=25-9=16,设它的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),由题中条件,列出方程组求解,即可得出结果解】因为所求椭圆与椭圆\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1的焦点相同所以其焦点在y轴上,且c^{2}=25-9=16.设它的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)因为c^{2}=16,且c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2},故a^{2}-b^{2}=16\textcircled{1},又点(\sqrt{3}\sqrt{5})在所求椭圆上所以\frac{5}{a^{2}}+\frac{3}{b^{2}}=1\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}得b^{2}=4,a^{2}=20,所以所求椭圆的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{20}+\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，$O$是坐标原点，$M$是$P F_{1}$的中点，若$|P F_{1}|=4$，则$|O M|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4
process: 由椭圆定义可得,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=6,|PF_{1}|=4,所以|PF_{2}|=2,O、M是分别是F_{1}F_{2}、PF_{1}的中点,所以OM为PF_{2}的中位线,所以|OM|=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|=1

text: 双曲线以$F_{1}(-3 , 0)$ , $F_{2}(3 , 0)$为焦点，且虚轴长为实轴长$\sqrt{2}$倍，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (3, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = sqrt(2)*Length(RealAxis(G))

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点且与其交于点$A$、$B$，以线段$|A B|$为直径的圆$M$恰与抛物线的准线相切，若圆$M$的面积为$16 \pi$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};M: Circle;IsDiameter(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), M);IsTangent(Directrix(G), M);Area(M) = 16*pi
process: 由题意易知直线l的斜率存在,故直线方程可设为y=k(x-\frac{1}{2}),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}由以线段||AB|为直径的圆M恰与抛物线的准线相切,圆M的面积为16\pi,即圆的半径为r=4,故可知|AB|=8,由\begin{cases}y=k(x-\frac{1}{2})\\y^{2}=2x\end{cases}得k^{2}x^{2}-(k^{2}+2)x+\frac{k^{2}}{4}=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}}故|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+1=\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}}+1=8,解得k=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},

text: 若抛物线$C$顶点在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，且过点$(2,1)$，则$C$的标准方程是?

process: 因为抛物线C顶点在原点,焦点在y轴上,故设抛物线方程为x^{2}=my,又抛物线过点(2,1)所以2^{2}=m,即m=4,所以抛物线方程为x^{2}=4y

text: 已知平面内两定点$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,0)$，动点$M$满足 $||M A|-| M B||=6$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?

process: 由题意知:|AB|=10,||MA|-|MB||=6<|AB|,故M的轨迹是以A,B为焦点,实轴长2a=6的双曲线,设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,由a=3,c=5可得b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=16,故点M的轨迹方程是\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12-m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$的右焦点，则实数$p$的值为?

process: 由题得双曲线的右焦点为(4,0),所以抛物线的焦点为(4,0)所以\frac{p}{2}=4,\thereforep=8.

text: 过点$P(2,1)$的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}=\overrightarrow{0}$则此直线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(P, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(P, A) + VectorOf(P, B) = 0
process: \overrightarrow{PA}+\overrightarrow{PB}=\overrightarrow{0},故P为AB中点,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则y_{1}=16x_{1},y_{2}^{2}=16x_{2},相减得到(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})=16(x_{1}-x_{2})故2k=16,k=8,故直线方程为:y=8(x-2)+1,即8x-y-15=0.

text: 已知圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=1$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$的一个顶点和一个焦点，则此椭圆的离心率$e$=?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到焦点的距离是它到$y$轴的距离的$2$倍，则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P,G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = Distance(P, yAxis)*2
process: 设点P的横坐标为m(m>0),利用抛物线的定义和条件建立方程求出m即可设点P的横坐标为m(m>0)因为抛物线的方程为y^{2}=4x,所以其准线方程为x所以根据抛物线的定义可得,点P到焦点的距离为m+1,所以m+1=2m,解得m=1所以点P到焦点的距离为2

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2+m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+1}=1$表示双曲线，则$m$的取值范围是?

process: 因为方程\frac{x2}{2+m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+1}=1表示双曲线,则(m+2)(m+1)>0,解得m<-2或m>-1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$是双曲线的两个焦点，$A$为左顶点、$B(0, b)$，点$P$在线段$AB$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Coordinate(B) = (0, b);Eccentricity(G)=sqrt(5)/2;Focus(G)={F1,F2};LeftVertex(G)=A;PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(A, B))
process: 易得c=\sqrt{5},b=1,设P(x,y)则\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(-\sqrt{5}-x,-y)\cdot(\sqrt{5}-x,-y)=x^{2}+y^{2}-5x^{2}+y2表示原点到点P距离的平方,显然,当OP\botAB时,x^{2}+y2取得最小值,直线AB的方程为x+2y-2=0,由点到直线的距离公式易得(x^{2}+y)_{\min}=\frac{4}{5},故\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}的最小值为\frac{4}{5}-5=-\frac{21}{5},

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=k$的一个焦点是抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点，则$k$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = k);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 16*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=16x的焦点坐标为(4,0)故双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=k的焦点在x轴.即k>0,且c=4,双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=k的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{k}-\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1,故2k=c^{2}=16,解得k=8,

text: 曲线$x y=2$上的点到直线$x+y+\sqrt{2}=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;P0: Point;Expression(G) = (x + y + sqrt(2) = 0);Expression(H) = (x*y = 2);PointOnCurve(P0, H)
process: 设与直线x+y+\sqrt{2}=0平行的直线的方程为x+y+m=0,联立方程组\begin{cases}x+y+m=0\\xy=2\end{cases},可得x^{2}+mx+2=0,令A=m^{2}-4\times2=0,解得m=\pm2\sqrt{2}此时直线x+y\pm2\sqrt{2}=0与曲线xy=2相切,结合图象,可得当m=2\sqrt{2}时,曲线xy=2上的点到直线x+y+\sqrt{2}=0的距离最小即最小值为两平行线x+y+2\sqrt{2}=0和x+y+\sqrt{2}=0的距离,所以最小值为d=\frac{|2\sqrt{2}-\sqrt{2}|}{\sqrt{12}+1^{2}}=1.

text: 已知双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，写出双曲线$C$的一个标准方程?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*2*x)
process: 根据渐近线方程求得\frac{b}{a},从而可写出符合题意的标准方程依题意,双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm2x,不妨设双曲线焦点在x轴上,则\frac{b}{a}=2,\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=4可令b^{2}=4a^{2}=4,可得双曲线C的一个标准方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1也可令b^{2}=4a^{2}=8等等.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，焦点到渐近线的距离为$\sqrt{3}$，则此双曲线的焦距等于?

process: 试题分析:焦点到渐近线的距离即为b,所以b=\sqrt{3}.由\frac{c^{2}}{c}=a^{2}+3,c=2,所以焦距为4.

text: 若焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{k+4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$k$的值为?

text: 直线$l$: $y=2 x+10$过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$一个焦点且与其一条渐近线平行，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = 2*x + 10);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), l);IsParallel(l, OneOf(Asymptote(G)))
process: 根据渐近线的方程和焦点坐标,利用a、b、c的关系和条件列出方程求出a2、b^{2},代入双曲线的方程即可.由题意得,\begin{cases}\frac{b}{a}=2\\-2c+10=0\\c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\end{cases},解得a^{2}=5,b^{2}=20,\therefore双曲线的方程是\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1

process: 由于方程\frac{x^{2}}{m+2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1表示焦点在y轴上的双曲线,则m+2<0,解得m<-2

text: 设点$F$、$B$分别为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>\sqrt{3})$的右焦点和上顶点，$O$为坐标原点，且$\triangle O F B$的周长为$3+\sqrt{3}$，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Real;O: Origin;F: Point;B: Point;a > sqrt(3);Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;UpperVertex(C) = B;Perimeter(TriangleOf(O, F, B)) = sqrt(3) + 3
process: 分析:由AOFB的周长l=a+b+c=3+\sqrt{3},求得a+c=3,根据椭圆的性质可知a^{2}-c^{2}=b^{2}=3,联立即可求得\begin{cases}a=2\\c=1\end{cases},从而求得答案.详根据题意可知AOFB的周长为a+b+c=3+\sqrt{3},又b=\sqrt{3},可知a+c=3,结合a^{2}-c^{2}=b^{2}=3,可以解得\begin{cases}a=2\\c=1\end{cases},故实数a的值为2.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，则$C$的渐近线方程为?

process: 因为双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x^{,}而_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},所以\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{4}\Rightarrowa^{2}=4b^{2}\Rightarrow\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{2}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上的点$A(x_{0}, \sqrt{2})$到其焦点的距离是$A$到$y$轴距离的$3$倍，则$p$=?

process:
设M(x,y),表示出直线AM与BM的斜率,由斜率之差为4建立关系可求.设点M(x,y),其中x
eq\pm2,则k_{AM}= rac{y}{x+2},k_{BM}= rac{y}{x-2},由题可得k_{AM}-k_{BM}= rac{y}{x+2}- rac{y}{x-2}=4,整理可得y=4-x^{2}(x
eq\pm2)即点M的轨迹方程为y=4-x^{2}(x
eq\pm2)

text: 椭圆$C$的中心在坐标原点，左、右焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$在$x$轴上，已知$A$、$B$分别是椭圆的上顶点和右顶点，$P$是椭圆上一点，且$P F_{1} \perp x$轴，$P F_{2} / / A B$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, xAxis);PointOnCurve(F2, xAxis);A: Point;B: Point;UpperVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), xAxis);IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(P, F2), LineSegmentOf(A, B))
process: 由于PF_{1}\botx轴,所以P点坐标为(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a})'由两直线平行斜率相等得\underline{b^{2}}=-\frac{b}{a},化简得b=2c,故离心率为e=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{b^{2}+c}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$焦点相同，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/12 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H)
process: 分析:根据题意,求出椭圆的焦点坐标,由双曲线的几何性质可得若双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1和椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1焦点相同,则有m+1=8,解得m的值,将m的值代入双曲线的方程,即可得答案详根据题意,椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的焦点在x轴上,且焦点坐标为(\pm2\sqrt{2},0),若双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1和椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1焦点相同则有m+1=8,解得m=7则双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{7}-y^{2}=1

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点是$F$，左、右顶点分别是$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，过$F$做$x$轴的垂线交双曲线于$B$、$C$两点，若$A_{1} B \perp A_{2} C$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)(m>0)$到其焦点的距离为$5$, 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}=1$的左顶点为$A$. 若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$AM$平行. 则实数$a$等于?
fact_expressions: A: Point;M: Point;G: Hyperbola;a: Real;H: Parabola;p: Number;m: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a = 1);p>0;m > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M))

text: 已知椭圆与$x$轴相切，两个焦点坐标为$F_{1}(1,1)$, $F_{2}(5,2)$，则其长轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;IsTangent(G,xAxis) = True;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (1, 1);Coordinate(F2) = (5, 2);Focus(G) = {F1,F2}
process: \because分别过F_{1}(1,1),F_{2}(5,2),向x轴作垂线交x轴为A,B,设M是椭圆和x轴切点,过M做垂线交F_{1}F_{2}于Q,连接F_{1}M,F_{2}M,延长F_{2}F_{1}交x轴为K则K点坐标为K(-3,0)且\tan\angleF_{2}KM=\frac{1}{4}(斜率)由于\angleF_{1}MQ=\angleQMF_{2}(椭圆的光学性质,入射角等于反射角.)所以\triangleF_{1}MA\sim\triangleF_{2}MB,相似比为\lambda=2,\thereforeM坐标为(\frac{7}{3},0)故|F_{2}M|=2|F_{1}M|,长轴2a=|F_{1}M|+|F_{2}M|=\sqrt{(\frac{7}{3}-1)^{2}+1^{2}}+\sqrt{(\frac{7}{3}-5)^{2}+2^{2}}=\frac{5}{3}+\frac{10}{3}=5.人答案为:5

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Real;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 4) + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (0, 2);OneOf(Focus(G))=H
process: 由题可得椭圆的焦点在y轴上,\therefore9-(k+4)=4,解得k=1均终安为

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦距为$2 c$，焦点到双曲线的渐近线的距离为$\frac{c}{2}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);c: Number;FocalLength(G) = 2*c;Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G))=c/2
process: 依题意,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的右焦点F(c,0),渐近线方程为bx\pmay=0由双曲线对称性,不妨取右焦点F,则有\frac{|bc|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+(\pma)^{2}}}=b=\frac{c}{2},即c=2b,a=\sqrt{c^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{3}b,所以双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 经过点$P(3,2 \sqrt{7})$, $Q(-6 \sqrt{2}, 7)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Q: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3, 2*sqrt(7));Coordinate(Q) = (-6*sqrt(2), 7);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(Q, G)
process: 可设双曲线方程为:mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1(mn<0),将两点代入即可求解设双曲线的方程为mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1(mn<0),因为所求双曲线经过点P(3,2\sqrt{7}),Q(-6\sqrt{2},7)所以\begin{cases}9m+28n=1,\\72m+49n=1,\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}m=-\frac{1}{75},\\n=\frac{1}{25}.\end{cases},故所求双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{25}-\frac{x^{2}}{75}=1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点坐标为$(1,0)$，则$p$=? 准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (1, 0)
process: 因为抛物线方程为y^{2}=2px,所以焦点坐标为(\frac{p}{2},0),又焦点坐标为(1,0),则p=2,准线方程为x=-1.

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，$\angle F_{1}P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1}PF_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$为椭圆$\frac{4 x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右顶点，直线$l$是抛物线$C$的准线，点$A$在抛物线$C$上，过$A$作$A B \perp l$，垂足为$B$，若直线$B F$的斜率$k_{B F}=-\sqrt{3}$，则$\triangle A F B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (4*x^2/9 + y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;RightVertex(G) = F;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;PointOnCurve(A, LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = True;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), l) = True;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B), l) = B;B: Point;Slope(LineOf(B, F)) = k_BF;k_BF: Number;k_BF = -sqrt(3)
process: \because抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F为椭圆\frac{4x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的右顶点可得m=3\sqrt{3}故A(x_{0},3\sqrt{3})在y^{2}=6x上,可得x_{0}=\frac{9}{2}\therefore|AB|=x_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=6则\triangleAFB的面积为S=\frac{1}{3}\times6\times3\sqrt{3}=9\sqrt{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，$M$是$F_{1} P$的中点，$|O M|=3$，则$P$点到椭圆左焦点距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F1, P)) = M;O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, M)) = 3

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，过其中一个焦点分别作两条渐近线的垂线段，两条垂线段的和为$a$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: LineSegment;L:LineSegment;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(F,H);PointOnCurve(F,L);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F ;F: Point;L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};IsPerpendicular(H,L1);IsPerpendicular(L,L2);H + L = a
process: 不失一般性,令双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的焦点为(c,0),渐近线为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,即bx\pmay=0,垂线段的长度即焦点到准线的距离即\frac{|bc\pma\cdot0|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=b,故由题意可得a=2b,所以双曲线的离心率满足e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{4},即e=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},

text: 顶点在原点且以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为焦点的抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: Vertex(H) = O;O: Origin;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 - y^2/4 = 1);RightFocus(G) = Focus(H);H: Parabola
process: 求得双曲线的右焦点,可设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=mx,m>0,由抛物线的焦点坐标,可得m,即可得到所求方程.由题意得,双曲线\frac{x2}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点为(4,0)抛物线方程设为y^{2}=mx,m>0.\because抛物线的顶点在原点且以双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点为焦点\therefore\frac{m}{4}=4,即m=16\therefore抛物线方程为y^{2}=16x

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}(-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$,$F_{2}(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$，点$P$是第一象限内双曲线上的点，且$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，$\tan \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=-2$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{8}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$共准线，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 短轴长为$\sqrt{5}$，离心率$e=\frac{2}{3}$的椭圆两焦点为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$,过$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$,$B$两点，则$\triangle ABF_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;e:Number;Length(MinorAxis(G))=sqrt(5);Eccentricity(G)=e;e=2/3;Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点，点$A$、$B$在椭圆上，若$\overrightarrow{F_{1} A}=3 \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则点$A$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(F1, A) = 3*VectorOf(F2, B)
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1中,a=\sqrt{3},b=1,c=\sqrt{2}则左焦点F_{1}(-\sqrt{2},0),右焦点F_{2}(\sqrt{2},0),设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}=(x_{1}+\sqrt{2},y),\overrightarrow{F_{2}B}=(x_{2}-\sqrt{2},y_{2})\because\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}=3\overrightarrow{F_{2}B},则有\begin{cases}x_{1}+\sqrt{2}=3(x_{2}-\sqrt{2})\\y_{1}=3y_{2}\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}x_{1}=3x_{2}\\y_{1}=3y_{2}\end{cases}2-4\sqrt{2}由点A,B在椭圆上,则有\begin{cases}\frac{x_{2}}{3}+y_{2}=1\\3x_{2}-4\sqrt{2}2^{2}+(3y_{2})^{2}=1\end{cases}7\sqrt{2}解之得\begin{cases}x_{2}=\frac{7\sqrt{2}}{6}\\y_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{30}}{18}\end{cases}.,\begin{matrix}x_{2}&\frac{7\sqrt{2}}{6}\\y_{2}&-\frac{\sqrt{30}}{18}\end{matrix}故有\begin{cases}x_{1}=-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\\\sqrt{30}\end{cases}-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{30}}即A(-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},\frac{\sqrt{30}}{6})^{或}A(-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},-\frac{\sqrt{30}}{6})

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$M$在$E$的左支上，$\angle F_{1} M F_{2} \in[\frac{\pi}{6}, \frac{\pi}{3}]$，则$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M,LeftPart(E)) = True;In(AngleOf(F1, M, F2),[pi/6, pi/3]) = True
process: 设|MF_{1}|=m,|MF_{2}|=n,\angleF_{1}MF_{2}=\theta,则4(a^{2}+1)=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos\theta又n-m=2a,即m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn=4a^{2},解得mn=\frac{2}{1-\cos\theta}所以\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}|.|\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|\cdot\cos\theta=mn\cos\theta=\frac{2\cos\theta}{1-\cos\theta}=\frac{2}{\cos\theta}-1因为\theta\in[\frac{\pi}{6},\frac{\pi}{3}],所以\frac{1}{2}\leqslant\cos\theta\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}-1\leqslant\frac{1}{\cos\theta}-1\leqslant1^{\cos\theta}则2\leqslant\frac{2}{\cos\theta}-1^{\leqslant}4\sqrt{3}+6所以\overrightarrow{MF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}的取值范围为[2,4\sqrt{3}+6]

text: 已知直线$l_{1}$: $2 x-y+2=0$和直线$l_{2}$:$ x=-1$，抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$和直线$l_{2}$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;P:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l1)=(2*x-y+2=0);Expression(l2)=(x=-1);PointOnCurve(P,G)
process: 由抛物线的定义,可将问题转化为:抛物线上一点到焦点的距离与到直线l_{1}距离之和的最小值进行处理因为直线x=-1是抛物线的准线.故根据抛物线定义,抛物线上一点到焦点的距离与到准线距离相等.故问题转化为抛物线上一点到焦点的距离和到直线2x-y+2=0距离的和的最小值;容易知,其最小值为焦点F(1,0)到直线2x-y+2=0的距离d=\frac{|2-0+2|}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{4\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率为半径，右焦点为圆心的圆与双曲线的一条渐近线相切，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Radius(H) = Eccentricity(G);Center(H) = RightFocus(G);H: Circle;IsTangent(H, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = True
process: 略

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率为$\frac{5}{4}$, 则$m$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 5/4
process: 双曲线\frac{x2}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的焦点在x轴上,则其实半轴长a=4,令半焦距为c,有c^{2}=16+m离心率e,e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{16+m}{16}=\frac{25}{16},解得m=9,所以m等于9.

text: 已知点$Q$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上运动，过点$Q$作圆$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，则$|A B|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;Q: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/8 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Q, G);TangentOfPoint(Q, H) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,H)=A;TangentPoint(l2,H)=B
process: 如图,连接PC,交AB于H,得H为AB的中点,圆(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1的圆心C(1,0),连接AC、BC,可得AC\botPA,BC\botPB,且|PA|=|PB|=\sqrt{|PC}又|AB|=2|AH|=\frac{2|PA|\cdot|AC|}{|PC|}=\frac{2\sqrt{|PC|^{2}-1}}{|PC|}=2设P(4\cos\theta,2\sqrt{2}\sin\theta),\theta\in[0,2\pi],得|PC|^{2}=(4\cos\theta-1)^{2}+(2\sqrt{2}\sin\theta)^{2}=16\cos2\theta-8\cos\theta+1+8\sin^{2}\theta=8(\cos\theta-\frac{1}{2})^{2}+7,当\cos\theta=\frac{1}{2}时|PC|^{2}取得最小值7,所以|AB|的最小值为2\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{7}}=\frac{2\sqrt{42}}{7}

text: 直线$y=x+b$与抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，且$O A \perp O B$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = b + x);b: Number;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B)) = True

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线与抛物线$y^{2}=-8 x$的准线分别交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle A B O$的面积为$4 \sqrt{3}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = -8*x);l1:Line;l2:Line;Asymptote(G)={l1,l2};Intersection(l1, Directrix(G)) = A;Intersection(l2, Directrix(G)) = B;Area(TriangleOf(A, B, O)) = 4*sqrt(3)
process: 因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的两条渐近线为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,抛物线y^{2}=-8x的准线为x=2,所以A(2,\frac{2b}{a}),B(2,-\frac{2b}{a}),因为\triangleAOB的面积为4\sqrt{3},所以S_{\triangleAOB}=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times\frac{4b}{a}=4\sqrt{3},b=\sqrt{3}a,c=2a,e=\frac{c}{a}=2.

text: 已知点$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上一点，$A B$为圆$x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$的任一条直径，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y + 2)^2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), H)
process: 如图所示,设P(x,y),满足\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1,设圆x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1的圆心为C(0,-2)\overrightarrow{PA}=\overrightarrow{PC}+\overrightarrow{CA},\overrightarrow{PB}=\overrightarrow{PC}+\overrightarrow{CB},\overrightarrow{CA}+\overrightarrow{CB}=\overrightarrow{0},\overrightarrow{CA}\cdot\overrightarrow{CB}=-r^{2}=-1\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=(\overrightarrow{PC}+\overrightarrow{CA})\cdot(\overrightarrow{PC}+\overrightarrow{CB})=\overrightarrow{PC}^{2}+\overrightarrow{PC}\cdot(\overrightarrow{CA}+\overrightarrow{CB})+\overrightarrow{CA}\cdot\overrightarrow{CB}=\overrightarrow{PC}^{2}-1=x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}-1=4-4y^{2}+(y+2)^{2}-=-3y^{2}+4y+7=-3(y-\frac{2}{3})^{2}+\frac{25}{3}因为-1\leqslanty\leqslant1.\therefore当且仅当y=\frac{2}{3}时,\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}有最大值\frac{25}{3}\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}的最大值是\frac{25}{3}.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线分别交于$A$、$B$两点,$O$为坐标原点.若双曲线的离心率为$2$,$\Delta A O B$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B:Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(L1,Directrix(H))=A;Intersection(L2,Directrix(H))=B;Eccentricity(G)=2;Area(TriangleOf(A,O,B))=sqrt(3)
process: 试题分析:有e=\frac{c}{a}=2,得c=2a,b=\sqrt{3}a,所以双曲线的渐近线为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x.又抛物线的准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},联立双曲线的渐近线和抛物线的准线方程得-\frac{\sqrt{3}p}{2}.在AAOB中,|AB|=\sqrt{3}P,O到AB的距离为\frac{p}{2}p\cdot\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{3},p=2.

text: 若双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$x-2 y=0$，则它的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (x - 2*y = 0)
process: 试题分析:因为双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的一条渐近线方程为x-2y=0,\thereforea=2b,\thereforec=\sqrt{5}b,所以双曲线的离心率是e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},

text: 过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点$A$的斜率为$k$的直线交椭圆$C$于另一点$B$，且点$B$与右焦点$F$的连线垂直于$x$轴，若$\frac{1}{3}<k<\frac{1}{2}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A:Point;B: Point;e: Number;k:Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C)=A;PointOnCurve(A,H);Slope(H)=k;Intersection(H,C)={A,B};RightFocus(C)=F;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(B,F),xAxis);1/3<k;k<1/2;Eccentricity(C) = e;F:Point
process: 试题分析:如下图所示,设\angleFAB=\theta,B(c,y_{0}),其中c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}(c>0),将点B的坐标代入椭圆的方程可得\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,解得y_{0}2=(1-\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}})=\frac{b^{4}}{a^{2}}\Rightarrowy_{0}=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a},不妨取y_{0}=\frac{b^{2}}{a},所以k=\tan\theta=\frac{|BF|}{|AF|}=\frac{\frac{b^{2}}{a}}{a+c}=\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}+ac}=\frac{a^{2}-c^{2}}{a^{2}+ac},由\frac{1}{3}<k<\frac{1}{2},可得\begin{cases}a2-c^{2}>\frac{1}{3}+ac>\frac{a-c^{2}}{3}即\\\frac{a-1}{2}+ac<\frac{1}{2}\end{cases}\begin{cases}3c^{2}+ac-2a2<0\\2c^{2}+ac-a^{2}>0\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}3e^{2}+e-2<0\\2e^{2}+e-1>0\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}-1<e<\frac{2}{3}\\e>\frac{1}{2}或e<-1\end{cases}\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}<e<\frac{2}{3}

text: 椭圆$M$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$M$上任一点，且$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的最大值的取值范围是$[2 c^{2}, 3 c^{2}]$，其中$c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}$，则椭圆$M$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: M: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;c:Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M) =F1;RightFocus(M)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,M);Range(Max(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))))=[2*c^2,3*c^2];Eccentricity(M) = e;c=sqrt(a^2-b^2)
process: \because|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=(a+ex)(a-ex)=a^{2}-e^{2x2}\leqslanta^{2}\therefore|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|的最大值为a^{2}\therefore由题意知2c^{2}\leqslanta^{2}\leqslant3c^{2}\therefore\sqrt{2}c\leqslanta\leqslant\sqrt{3}c\therefore\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\leqslante\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}故椭圆M的离心率e的取值范围[\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}]本题正确结果:|\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}|

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的一个焦点重合，则$p$=?

text: 已知点$P$在双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的右支上,且点$P$到直线$y=x$的距离为$\sqrt{2}$, 则点$P$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Distance(P, H) = sqrt(2)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为直线$l$，过抛物线上一点，$P$作$P E \perp l$于$E$，若直线$E F$的倾斜角为$150^{\circ}$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;E: Point;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(P, E));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, E), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, E), l) = E;Inclination(LineOf(E, F)) = ApplyUnit(150, degree)
process: 由抛物线y^{2}=4x方程,可得焦点F(1,0),准线l的方程为x=-1,\because直线EF的倾斜角为150^{\circ},\thereforek_{EF}=\tan150^{\circ}=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},\therefore直线EF的方程为y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-1)^{,}联立\begin{cases}x=-1\\y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-1)\end{cases}解得y=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},\thereforeE(-1,\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}),\becausePE\botl于_{E},\thereforey_{P}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},将其代入抛物线的方程可得(\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3})^{2}=4x_{P},解得x_{P}=\frac{1}{3}\therefore|PF|=|PE|=x_{P}+1=\frac{4}{3}.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，右顶点为$A$，点$B(0, b)$，线段$A B$的中点为$P$，且$|P F|=\sqrt{6}|O P|$($O$为坐标原点)，则双曲线的离心率为?

process: 由题可知,A(a,0),设F(-c,0),又点B(0,b),线段AB的中点P,所以点P(\frac{a}{2},\frac{b}{2})所以由两点间距离公式有所以有\sqrt{\frac{FF|=\sqrt{6}}{4}+ac}|OP|,

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{3} x$，它的一个焦点在抛物线$y^{2}=24 x$的准线上，则双曲线的方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 24*x);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Directrix(H))
process: 由题意得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},c=6\thereforea=3,b=3\sqrt{3},所以双曲线的方程为\frac{x2}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{27}=1

G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(P)=(x1,y1);Coordinate(Q)=(x2,y2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G)={P,Q};x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;x1+x2=3
process: 依题意,抛物线p=1,由于过抛物线焦点的弦长公式为x_{1}+x_{2}+p,故|PQ|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=3+1=4.

fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;b: Number;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;A1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A1, B};Max(LineSegmentOf(A1, F2) + LineSegmentOf(B, F2)) = 5
process: 试题分析:|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=4a\cdot|AB|=8-|AB|,根据AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|的最大值为5,可得|AB|的最小值为3.由题意可设直线l的方程为:my=x+c,(直线l的斜率为0不必考虑),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).与椭圆方程联立可得:(b^{2}m^{2}+4)y^{2}.2mcb^{2}y+b^{2}c^{2}-4b^{2}=0,再利用根与系数的关系、弦长公式即可得出|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=4a\cdot|AB|=8-|AB|,\because|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|的最大值为5,\therefore|AB|的最小值为3由题意可设直线l的方程为:my=x+c,(直线l的斜率为0不必考虑),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2}.y_{2})联立\begin{cases}my=x+c\\\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases}化为:(b^{2}m^{2}+4)y^{2}\cdot2mcb^{2}y+b^{2}c^{2}\cdot4b^{2}=0,c^{2}=4\cdotb^{2}\frac{2)[(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}]}{(b^{2}c^{2}b^{4}-\frac{4(b^{2}c^{2}-4b^{2})}{b^{2}m^{2}+4}]=\frac{4b^{2}(1+m^{2})}{b^{2}m^{2}+4},当m\neq0时,|AB|=4+\frac{4b^{2}-16}{b^{2}m^{2}+4}>b^{2}\thereforeb^{2}=3.

text: 已知点$P(0,1)$及椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{1}=1$ , $Q$是椭圆上的动点，则$|P Q|$的最大值为?

process: 由\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1可得渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x'不妨取F(c,0),渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x,可得直线l的方程为:y=\frac{b}{a}(x-c)令x=0可得y=-\frac{bc}{a},所以P(0,-\frac{bc}{a})虚轴端点B_{1}(0,-b),因为B_{1}(0,-b)是线段OP的中点,所以\frac{-\frac{bc}{a}+0}{2}=-b'可得c=2a,所以双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=2,

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$l$过左焦点且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$，以椭圆的长轴为直径的圆截$l$所得的弦长等于椭圆的焦距，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(LeftFocus(G), l);Inclination(l) = pi/3;IsDiameter(MajorAxis(G), H);Length(InterceptChord(l, H)) = FocalLength(G)
process: 由题意知,椭圆左焦点为(-c,0),长轴长为2a,焦距为2c设直线l的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x+c),即\sqrt{3}x-y+\sqrt{3}c=0.因为以椭圆长轴为直径的圆的圆心为(0,0),半径为a.所以圆心到直线l的距离d=\frac{|\sqrt{3}c|}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}c'2c=2\sqrt{a^{2-d^{2}}}=2\sqrt{a^{2-\frac{3}{4}c^{2}},}整理得c^{2}=\frac{4}{7}a^{2}所以椭圆的离心率为\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{4}{7}}=\frac{2\sqrt{7}}{7}

process: \because抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的准线经过点(-1,1),\because\frac{p}{2}=1,\therefore该抛物线焦点坐标为(1,0)

text: 设$P$是双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上任意一点，过$P$作渐近线$l_{1}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$和$l_{2}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$的平行线分别交于点$R$、$Q$. 则$|P R| \cdot|P Q|$=?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (y = (b/a)*x);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (y = (-b/a)*x);Asymptote(E) = {l1, l2};Z1: Line;Z2: Line;PointOnCurve(P, Z1);PointOnCurve(P, Z2);IsParallel(Z1, l1);IsParallel(Z2, l2);R: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(Z1, l2) = R;Intersection(Z2, l1) = Q

text: 准线方程为$x=1$的抛物线标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x = 1)
process: 因为抛物线的准线方程为x=1,所以\frac{p}{2}=1,且抛物线的焦点在x的负半轴上,得p=2,所以抛物线标准方程为y^{2}=-4x,

text: 已知$M$、$N$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上两个不同的点，$F$为抛物线的焦点.若线段$M N$的中点的纵坐标为$2$,$|M F|+|N F|=10$,则直线$M N$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;N: Point;F:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(M,G);PointOnCurve(N,G);Negation(M=N);Focus(G)=F;YCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N)))=2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F))=10

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左顶点为$B$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);UpperVertex(G) = A;LeftVertex(G) = B
process: 因为椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1,所以a^{2}=3,b^{2}=1,即a=\sqrt{3},b=1,所以椭圆的上顶点为A(0,1),左顶点为B(-\sqrt{3},0),所以k_{AB}=\frac{1}{5}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 双曲线$C$与标准型的椭圆$C^{\prime}$有公共的焦点,$C$的实轴长为$C^{\prime}$长轴长的一半,$C^{\prime}$的离心率比$C$的离心率小$\frac{\sqrt{11}}{6}$, 且$C^{\prime}$的焦距是$2 \sqrt{11}$, 则此双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;C1: Ellipse;Focus(C) = Focus(C1);Length(RealAxis(C)) = (1/2)*Length(MajorAxis(C1));Eccentricity(C1) = Eccentricity(C) - sqrt(11)/6;FocalLength(C1) = 2*sqrt(11)

text: $AB$是过$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$焦点的弦，且$|AB|=10$，则$AB$中点的横坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C:Curve;Expression(C)=(y^2=4*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C);PointOnCurve(Focus(C),LineSegmentOf(A,B));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 10

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$为该双曲线上一点，若$|O P|=|O F|$, $\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}+\overrightarrow{O F} \cdot \overrightarrow{O A}=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));DotProduct(VectorOf(O, F), VectorOf(O, A)) + DotProduct(VectorOf(P, A), VectorOf(P, B)) = 0

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，左顶点为$A$，上顶点为$B$. 若点$F$到直线$A B$的距离为$\frac{2 b}{\sqrt{17}}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;LeftVertex(G) = A;UpperVertex(G) = B;Distance(F, LineOf(A,B)) = (2*b)/sqrt(17)
process: (分析)求出直线AB的方程,通过椭圆的中心到直线的距离列出方程,得到a,b,c的关系式,然后求解椭圆的离心率,即可得到答案.由题意,根据椭圆的方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),可得F(-c,0),A(-a,0),B(0,b)则直线AB的方程为bx-ay+ab=0,由点F到直线AB的距离为\frac{2b}{\sqrt{17}},所以\frac{|-bc+ab|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{2b}{\sqrt{17}}整理可得9a^{2}-34ac+2lc^{2}=0,即2le^{2}-34e+9=0,即(3e-1)(7e-9)=0,解得e=\frac{1}{2}或e=\frac{9}{7}(舍去)故答案e=\frac{1}{3}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，抛物线上一点$P$，若$|P F|=5$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G:Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5
process: 因为|PF|=5,所以x_{P}+2=5\thereforex_{P}=3,y_{p}^{2}=24,|y_{p}|=2\sqrt{6}因此APOF的面积为\frac{1}{2}|y_{P}|OF|=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{6}\times2=2\sqrt{6}.青】本题考查抛物线定义应用,考查基本分析转化与求解能力,属基础题

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点，点$P$在$E$上，在$\triangle A P B$中，$\tan \angle P A B=\frac{1}{2}$ , $\tan \angle P B A=\frac{2}{9}$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(E) = A;RightVertex(E) = B;PointOnCurve(P, E);Tan(AngleOf(P, A, B)) = 1/2;Tan(AngleOf(P, B, A)) = 2/9
process: 根据椭圆的对称性不妨设点P在x轴上方,设P(m,n)(n>0),由\tan\anglePAB=\frac{1}{2}\Rightarrow\frac{n}{m+a}=\frac{1}{2},\tan\anglePBA=\frac{2}{9}\Rightarrow\frac{n}{a-m}=\frac{2}{9}联立解得:\begin{cases}n=\frac{4}{13}a\\m=-\frac{5}{13}a\end{cases},代入到椭圆方程得:\frac{(-\frac{5}{13}a)^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{(\frac{4}{13}a)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\Rightarrowa^{2}=9b^{2}所以_{a^{2}}=9(a^{2}-c^{2})\Rightarrowe=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，若椭圆上存在点$A$，使$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=90^{\circ}$且$|A F_{1}|=3|A F_{2}|$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2))
process: 试题分析:根据椭圆的定义|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,\becauseAF_{1}=3|AF_{2}|,\therefore|AF_{2}|=\frac{a}{2},|AF_{1}|=\frac{3a}{2}\because\angleF_{1}AF_{2}=90^{\circ},\therefore勾股定理得(\frac{3a}{2})^{2}+(\frac{a}{2})^{2}=(2c)^{2},化简得5a^{2}=8c^{2},即\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{8},所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{4}

text: 过点$P(1,3)$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$和$l_{2}$，它们分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$中点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 3);PointOnCurve(P,l1);PointOnCurve(P,l2);Intersection(l1,xAxis)=A;Intersection(l2,yAxis)=B;IsPerpendicular(l1,l2)
process: 设线段AB中点的坐标为(x,y),则A(2x,0),B(0,2y),其中PA\botPB,所以\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=(2x-1,-3)\cdot(-1,2y-3)=1-2x-6y+9=0故线段AB中点的轨迹方程为x+3y-5=0经检验,直线方程上的点均符合题目

text: 过点$M(4 , 0)$的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$两渐近线分别交于不同两点$A$、$B$、$O$为原点，若该双曲线的离心率为$2$，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(M,l);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(l,L1)=A;Intersection(l,L2)=B;Negation(A=B);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知双曲线过点$(4, \sqrt{3})$，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{2} x$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (4, sqrt(3));Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = (pm*1/2)*x);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 依题意,设所求的双曲线的方程为x^{2}-4y2=\lambda.\because点M(4,\sqrt{3})为该双曲线上的点,\therefore\lambda=16-12=4.\therefore该双曲线的方程为:x^{2}-4y2=4,即\frac{x^{2}}{-y2=1}故本题正确答案是\frac{x^{2}}{-y^{2}}=1.

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-3}=1$表示双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(5 - k) + y^2/(k - 3) = 1);k: Number
process: 试题分析:由题意可知(5-k)(k-3)<0\thereforek<3或k>5,所以k的范围是(-\infty,3)\cup(5,+\infty)

text: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率是?准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G:Curve;Expression(G)=(x^2/25+y^2/9=1)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$E$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点，$E$上的点$P$到原点的距离为$b$，且$\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=3 \sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$，则双曲线$E$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(E) = {F1, F2};E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);O: Origin;Distance(P, O) = b;Sin(AngleOf(P, F2, F1)) = 3*Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2))
process: 由\sin\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=3\sin\anglePF_{1}F_{2}及正弦定理可得|PF_{1}|=3|PF_{2}|根据双曲线定义可得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a\therefore|PF_{2}|=a,|PF_{1}|=3a又|OF_{2}|=c,|OP|=b\therefore\angleOPF_{2}=\frac{\pi}{2},所以\cos\angleOF_{2}P=\frac{a}{c}在\triangleF_{1}F_{2}P中由余弦定理可得\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}P=\frac{a^{2}+(2c)^{2}-(3a)^{2}}{2a\cdot2c}=\cos\angleOF_{2}P=\frac{a}{c}化简得c=\sqrt{3}a,所以b=\sqrt{2}a,所以双曲线E的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 已知$P$是椭圆上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=90^{\circ}$, $\angle P F_{2} F_{1}=30^{\circ}$, 则椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);AngleOf(P, F2, F1) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与椭圆的一个交点为$P$，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F2, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);OneOf(Intersection(Z, G)) = P;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 k-1}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(2 - k) + y^2/(2*k - 1) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)
process: 试题分析:由题意可得\begin{cases}2-k>0\\2k-1>0\\2-k<2\end{cases}1<k<22-k<2k-

text: 若直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=4(x+1)$的焦点，并且与$x$轴垂直，则$l$被抛物线截得的线段长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),l) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*(x + 1));IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis) = True

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1  (m>1)$的长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;m>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 由椭圆方程知,a^{2}=m,b^{2}=1,又长轴长是短轴长的2倍所以2\sqrt{m}=2\times2b=4,解得m=4与睛)本题主要考查了椭圆的方程及简单几何性质,属于中档题

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为$F$，则以$F$为焦点的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(H) = F;G: Parabola;Focus(G) = F
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点为F(1,0),以F为焦点的抛物线的标准方程是y^{2}=4x

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点重合，则实数$p$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)

text: 已知线段$A B$长等于$10$，两端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$轴，$y$轴上移动，若点$M$在线段$A B$上，且$\overrightarrow{A M}+4 \overrightarrow{B M}=0$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Length(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=10;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))={A,B};PointOnCurve(A,xAxis);PointOnCurve(B,yAxis);PointOnCurve(M,LineSegmentOf(A,B));VectorOf(A, M) + 4*VectorOf(B, M) = 0
process: 设M(x,y),A(a,0),B(0,b),所以\overrightarrow{AM}=(x-a,y),\overrightarrow{MB}=(-x,b-y),因为|AB|=10所以\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=10,即a^{2}+b^{2}=100\cdot因为\overrightarrow{AM}+4\overrightarrow{BM}=0,所以\overrightarrow{AM}=4\overrightarrow{MB},所以\begin{cases}x-a=-4x\\y=4(b-y)\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}a=5x\\b=\frac{5}{4}y\end{cases},代入a^{2}+b^{2}=100,可得25x^{2}+\frac{25y^{2}}{16}=100,即16x^{2}+y^{2}=64.

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右焦点为圆心，且被其渐近线截得的弦长为$6$的圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/16 = 1);RightFocus(G) = Center(H);Length(InterceptChord(Asymptote(G),H))=6
process: 由题意可知,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1的右焦点坐标为(2\sqrt{5},0),渐近线方程为2x\pmy=0双曲线的右焦点到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{2\times2\sqrt{5}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+(\pm1)^{2}}}=4所以,圆的半径为r=\sqrt{d^{2}+3^{2}}=\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}=5因此,所求圆的方程为(x-2\sqrt{5})^{2}+y^{2}=25

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$到其焦点的距离为$5$，则点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标(1,0)抛物线y^{2}=4x上的一点M到该抛物线的焦点F的距离|MF|=5则M到准线的距离为5,则点M到y轴的距离为4.效答客为4专】木题考查抛物线的定义的简单应用,是其础题

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0,2)
process: 由题可得m-6=4,求出即可.由题可得椭圆的焦点在y轴上,\thereforem-6=4,解得m=10.

text: 过抛物线$x^{2}=\frac{1}{8} y$的焦点作直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点$M$的纵坐标为$2$，则线段$A B$长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;M:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = y/8);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M;YCoordinate(M)=2

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作垂直于$x$轴的直线与椭圆相交，一个交点为$P$，则$|P F_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1,H);IsPerpendicular(H,xAxis);OneOf(Intersection(H,G)) = P;IsIntersect(G, H)

text: 直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点为$M(1, t)(t \in R)$，直线$l$是线段$A B$的垂直平分线，若$O D \perp l$，$D$为垂足，则$D$点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;O: Origin;D: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);t: Real;Coordinate(M) = (1, t);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M;PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = l;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, D), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, D), l) = D
process: 设直线的方程为y=k(x-1)+t,代入椭圆方程并化简得-4k^{2})x^{2}+(8kt-8k^{2})x+4k^{2}-8kt+4t^{2}-4=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1})B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\frac{kt-8k^{2}}{1+4k^{2}}=2,解得k=-\frac{1}{4t}线l是线段AB的垂直平分线,故直线t:y-t=4t(x-1),即:y=t(4x-3)令4x-3=0,此时x=\frac{3}{4},y=0,于是直线l过定点E(\frac{3}{4},0)当直线l的斜率不存在时,t=0,直线t也过定点(\frac{3}{4},0点D在以OE为直径的圆上,则圆心为(\frac{3}{8},0),半径r=\frac{1}{2}|OE|=\frac{3}{8},所以点D轨迹方程为:(x-\frac{3}{8})^{2}+y2=\frac{9}{64}.

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过准线上一点$N$作$N F$的垂线交$y$轴于点$M$，若抛物线$C$上存在点$E$，满足$2 \overrightarrow{N E}=\overrightarrow{N M}+\overrightarrow{N F}$，则$\Delta M N F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(N, Directrix(C));N: Point;L: Line;PointOnCurve(N, L) ;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(N, F), L);Intersection(L, yAxis) = M;M: Point;PointOnCurve(E, C);E: Point;2*VectorOf(N, E) = VectorOf(N, F) + VectorOf(N, M)
process: 由2\overrightarrow{NE}=\overrightarrow{NM}+\overrightarrow{NF}可得E为MF的中点,准线方程x=-1,焦点F(1,0),不妨设点N在第三象限,因为\angleMNF为直角,所以|NE|=\frac{1}{2}|MF|=|EF|由抛物线的定义得NE//x轴,则可求得E(\frac{1}{2},-\sqrt{2}),M(0,-2\sqrt{2}),N(-1,-\sqrt{2})即|NF|=\sqrt{6},|MN|=\sqrt{3},所以s_{AMNF}=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 点$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的端点，$C$、$D$为椭圆$E$短轴的端点，动点$M$满足$\frac{|M A|}{|M B|}=2$，若$\triangle M A B$面积的最大值为$8$，$\Delta M C D$面积的最小值为$1$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Endpoint(MajorAxis(E)) = {A, B};Endpoint(MinorAxis(E)) = {C, D};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B)) = 2;Max(TriangleOf(M, A, B)) = 8;Min(TriangleOf(M, C, D)) = 1

text: 抛物线$y=x^{2}$上的点到直线$x-y-2=0$的最短距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - y - 2 = 0)
process: 试题分析:问抛物线到直线的最短距离,那么就有两种想法:1.如果抛物线与直线有交点,最短距离一定是0;2.如果没有就另想办法找到最短距离.我们将抛物线与直线联立得到方程x^{2}-x+2=0,由于4<0,所以他们没有交点.那么我们假设抛物线上的点是P(a,a^{2}),那么问题就转化为动点P到直线的最短距离,带入到点到距离公式得到d=\frac{|a^{2}-a+2|}{\sqrt{2}},即求|a^{2}-a+2|的最小值,将其进行配方得到(a-\frac{1}{2})^{2}+\frac{7}{4}|,所以最短距离为\frac{7\sqrt{2}}{8}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$到焦点的距离为$3$，则点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 3
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x上一点M到焦点的距离为3,则抛物线y^{2}=4x上一点M到准线x=-1得距离为3,则点M到y轴的距离为3-1=2.

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$A(0,2)$. 若线段$F A$的中点$B$在抛物线上，则$F$到$l$的距离为?$|F B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;Directrix(G) = l;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = B;PointOnCurve(B, G)
process: 试题分析:根据题意,线段FA的中点为B(\frac{p}{4},1),所以有1=2p\cdot\frac{p}{4},解得p=\sqrt{2},所以F到l的距离为p=\sqrt{2},|FB|=\frac{p}{4}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{3}{4}\sqrt{2}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，经过原点的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\angle A F B \geq 150^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(O,G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};AngleOf(A, F, B) >= ApplyUnit(150, degree);O:Origin
process: 如图,设椭圆的右焦点为F,连接AF,BF\becauseAB,FF'互相平分,\therefore四边形AFBF为平行四边形\therefore\angleAFB+\angleFBF=180^{\circ}\because\angleAFB\geqslant150^{\circ},\therefore\angleFBF\leqslant30^{\circ}由条件知,当B在短轴端点B_{2}时,\angleFBF'最大,此时在Rt\triangleB_{2}OF'中,\angleOB_{2}F=15^{\circ}=\sin15^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2}}{4}.\frac{6-\sqrt{2}}{4},即e\in(0,\frac{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2}}{4}]

text: 已知点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右支上，$A(0,2)$，动点$B$满足$|A B|=2$ , $F$是双曲线的右焦点，则$|P F|-|P B|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;RightFocus(G) = F
process: 动点B满足|AB|=2,则点B的轨迹是以A为圆心,2为半径的圆,设双曲线的左焦点为F_{1},由题知|PF_{1}|-|PF|=4,|PF|=|PF_{1}|-4则|PF|-|PA|=|PF_{1}|-|PA|-4\leqslant|AF_{1}|-4=\sqrt{13}-4,所以|PF|-|PB|的最大值为\sqrt{13}-2,

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$左焦点$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线的左支于$M$，$N$两点，$F_{2}$为其右焦点，则$|MF_{2}|+| NF_{2}|-|MN|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, LeftPart(G)) = {M, N}
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F2)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点$F(-c, 0)(c>0)$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{4}$的切线，切点为$E$，延长$F E$交双曲线右支于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{O E}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{O F}+\overrightarrow{O P})$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;F: Point;E: Point;O: Origin;P: Point;l1: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2/4);Coordinate(F) = (-c, 0);LeftFocus(G) = F;TangentOfPoint(F, H) = l1;TangentPoint(l1,H)=E;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F,E)),RightPart(G))=P;VectorOf(O,E)=(VectorOf(O,F)+VectorOf(O,P))/2;c:Number;c>0
process: 如图,\because\overrightarrow{OE}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{OF}+\overrightarrow{OP}),\thereforeE为FP的中点,又O为FF的中点PFF的中位线,\thereforeOE/\!/PF,OL=\frac{1}{2}PF'\becauseOE=\frac{1}{2}a,\thereforeIDF'=。r.10.10OE\botPF,\thereforePF\botPF,\cdotFF'=2c,PF-PF'=2a,\thereforePF=2a\therefore由勾股定理得a^{2}+9a^{2}=4c^{2}\therefore10a^{2}=4c^{2},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点作一条斜率为$2$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点,$O$为坐标原点, 则$\triangle O A B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), H);Slope(H) = 2;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点(1,0),直线AB的方程为y-0=2(x-1)即y=2x-2,代入椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1化简可得3x^{2}-5x=\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{5}{3},x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=0,\thereforeAL\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1化简可得3x^{2}-5x=0,O到直线AB的距离d=\frac{|0-0-2|}{\sqrt{4+1}}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}},故\triangleOAB的面积为\frac{1}{2}\cdotAB\cdotd=\frac{1}{2}.\frac{5\sqrt{5}}{3}\cdot\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{5}{3}.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=8 y$，过点$M(x_{0} , y_{0})$作直线$M A $, $M B$与抛物线$C$分别切于点$A$、$B$，且以$A B$为直径的圆过点$M$，则$y_{0}$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Circle;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;x0:Number;y0:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 8*y);Coordinate(M) = (x0, y0);PointOnCurve(M,LineOf(M,A));PointOnCurve(M,LineOf(M,B));TangentPoint(LineOf(M,A),C)=A;TangentPoint(LineOf(M,B),C)=B;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(M,G)

text: 已知$P$、$Q$为抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$上两点，点$P$、$Q$的横坐标分别为$4$ ,$-2$，过$P$、$Q$分别作抛物线的切线，两切线交于$A$，则点$A$的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Q: Point;A: Point;l1:Line;l2:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y);PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(Q,G);XCoordinate(P)=4;XCoordinate(Q)=-2;TangentOnPoint(P,G)=l1;TangentOnPoint(Q,G)=l2;Intersection(l1,l2)=A
process: 由已知可设P(4,y),Q(-2,y_{2}),\therefore\begin{cases}4^{2}=2y_{1}\\(-2)^{2}=2y_{2}\end{cases}\thereforeP(4,8),Q(-2,2);\because抛物线可化为y=\frac{1}{2}x^{2},\thereforey'=x,\therefore过点的切线方程为y=4x-8过Q点的切线方程为y=-2x-2,联立两条切线方程即为A点坐标为(1,4)故点A的纵坐标为-4.考点定位:本题考查抛物线的切线方程、导数的几何含义,考查学生的转化能力和计算能力

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=p y$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的上焦点重合，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = p*y);p: Number;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(H) = UpperFocus(G)

text: 过原点的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=-1$交于两点，则直线$l$的斜率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = -1);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, l);NumIntersection(l, G) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到两焦点的距离之积为$m$，则当$m$取最大值时，点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;Distance(P,F1)*Distance(P,F2) = m;WhenMax(m);m:Number;Focus(G)={F1,F2}
process: \because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,\therefore椭圆的a=5,b=3设椭圆的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},得PF_{1}+|PF_{2}|=2a=10\because|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|\geqslant2\sqrt{|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|}\therefore点P到两焦点的距离之积m满足:m=|PF_{1}|x|PF_{2}|\leqslant(\frac{|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|}{2})^{2}=25当且仅当|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|=5时,m有最大值25此时,点P位于椭圆短轴的顶点处,得P(0,3)或(0,-3)

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2/4 = 1)
process: 由椭圆的标准方程\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1可知,a=2,b=\sqrt{3}\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2-b^{2}}=1\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点，点$Q$在直线$l_{1}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$上，点$P$在直线$l_{2}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，$O$为坐标原点，$2 \overrightarrow{F Q}=\overrightarrow{F P}$，$\overrightarrow{F P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$，$\Delta F O P$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;l1: Line;l2: Line;F: Point;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(Q, l1);Expression(l1)=(y = -x*b/a);PointOnCurve(P, l2);Expression(l2)=(y = x*(b/a));2*VectorOf(F, Q) = VectorOf(F, P);DotProduct(VectorOf(F, P), VectorOf(O, Q)) = 0;Area(TriangleOf(F, O, P)) = sqrt(3)
process: 2\overrightarrow{FQ}=\overrightarrow{FP},\overrightarrow{FP}\cdot\overrightarrow{OQ}=0得OQ是线段FP的垂直平分线,这样可得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},再由三角形的面积可得c,从而求得a,b后得双曲线的标准方程.由2\overrightarrow{FQ}=\overrightarrow{FP},\overrightarrow{FP}\cdot\overrightarrow{OQ}=0,得OQ是线段FP的垂直平分线,所以\angleFOQ=\anglePOQ=\anglePOx=60^{\circ},所以\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},|OQ|=\frac{1}{2}|OF|=\frac{1}{2}c,|FP|=\sqrt{3}c,所以\triangleFOP的面积为\frac{1}{4}\times\sqrt{3}c^{2}=\sqrt{3},解得c=2.又a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},所以a=1,b=\sqrt{3},所以双曲线C的标准方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: $O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 \sqrt{2} x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，若$|P F|=4 \sqrt{2}$，则$\Delta P O F$的面积?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*sqrt(2)*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 4*sqrt(2)
process: \because抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4\sqrt{2}x,\therefore2p=4\sqrt{2},可得\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{2},得焦点F(\sqrt{2},0)设P(m,n),根据抛物线的定义,得|PF|=m+\frac{p}{2}=4\sqrt{2},即m+\sqrt{2}=4\sqrt{2},解得m=3\sqrt{2},\because点P在抛物线C上,得n^{2}=4\sqrt{2}\times3\sqrt{2}=24\thereforen=\pm2\sqrt{6},x|oF|=\sqrt{2},\therefore\trianglePOF的面积为S=\frac{1}{2}|OF|\times|n|=2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$A$、$B$是$C$上的两个点，线段$A B$的中点为$M(2,2)$，则$\triangle A B F$的面积等于?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(B, C);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 2);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 设过M的直线方程为y-2=k(x-2),由\begin{cases}y-2=k(x-2)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases}\Rightarrowk^{2}x^{2}-4kx+4(k-1)^{2}=0\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{4}{k},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{4(k-1)^{2}}{k^{2}},由题意\frac{4}{k}=4\Rightarrowk=1,于是直线方程为y=xx_{1}+x_{2}=4,x_{1}x_{2}=0,\therefore|AB|=4\sqrt{2},焦点F(1,0)到直线y=x的距离d=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\because\triangleABF的面积是2

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线$C$的一条渐近线与直线$A M$垂直，则双曲线$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;M: Point;m: Number;Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;A: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(C)), LineOf(A, M))
process: 由抛物线定义可知,1+\frac{p}{2}=5,得p=8,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=16x,则M(1,4)或M(1,-4),设M(1,4),由题意得A(-1,0),则k_{AM}=\frac{4-0}{1-(-1)}=2,又因为双曲线渐近线方程为y=\pmbx,因为双曲线C的一条渐近线与直线AM垂直,所以2\times(-b)=-1,得b=\frac{1}{2},则c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},所以双曲线的焦距为2c=\sqrt{5}

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$C$上存在一点$P$使得$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则椭圆离心率的范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,C);AngleOf(F1,P,F2)=ApplyUnit(120,degree)
process: 先根据椭圆定义得到|PF_{1}|=a+ex_{1},|PF_{2}|=a-ex_{1},再利用余弦定理,求出x_{1}2=\frac{4c^{2-3}a^{2}}{e^{2}},利用椭圆的范围列出不等式求出离心率的范围.设P(x_{1},y_{1}),F_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0),c>0,则|PF_{1}|=a+ex_{1},|PF_{2}|=a-ex_{1}在\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,由余弦定理得:因为x_{1}=[0,a^{2}],所以0\leqslant\frac{4c2-3a^{2}}{e^{2}}\leqslanta^{2},即4c2-3a^{2}\geqslant0,且e^{2}<1,所以e=\frac{c}{a}\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}故椭圆的离心率的取值范围是|\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}()

process: 先由题意得到A(a,0),B(0,b),再由椭圆过点P(2,1),得到\frac{4}{a^{2}}+\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1,由基本不等式,确定|AB|=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}取最小值时的条件,进而可得出结果.羊解)因为A,B分别为椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)的右顶点和上顶点所以A(a,0),B(0,b),又椭圆C过点P(2,1),所以\frac{4}{a^{2}}+\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1,所以|AB|=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{(a^{2}+b^{2})(\frac{4}{a^{2}}+\frac{1}{b^{2}})}=\sqrt{4+\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}+\frac{4b^{2}}{a^{2}}+1}\geqslant\sqrt{9}=3,当且仅当\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{4b^{2}}{a^{2}},即a^{2}=2b^{20}时,取等号此时a^{2}=2c^{2},所以离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

process: 连接PF_{1},由余弦定理结合平面几何的知识得|PF_{1}|=|OF_{1}|,再由椭圆的定义及离心率公式即可得解.设F(-c,0),椭圆的右焦点F_{1}(c,0),连接PF_{1},如图因为\angleFPO=\frac{\pi}{6},|PF|=\sqrt{3}|OF|所以\cos\angleFPO=\frac{|PF|^{2}+|OP}{2|PF|}.\frac{|OF|^{2}}{P|}=\frac{|OP|^{2}+2|OF|^{2}}{2\sqrt{3}|OP|\cdot|OF|}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以|OP|=|OF|,所以|OP|=|OF_{1}|,\anglePOF_{1}=\frac{\pi}{3},所以\trianglePOF_{1}为等边三角形,|PF_{1}|=|OF_{1}|,所以|PF|+|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}|OF|+|OF_{1}|=(\sqrt{3}+1)c=2a.所以离心率^{e=\frac{c}{a}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}+1}=\sqrt{3}-1

text: 一个动圆与定圆$F$:$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=4$相外切，且与直线$l$: $x=-1$相切，则动圆圆心的轨迹方程为?

process: 由题意可知,圆F的圆心为F(3,0),半径为2,由于动圆与定圆F:(x-3)^{2}+y2=4相外切,且与直线l:x=-1相切动圆圆心到点F的距离比它到直线l的距离大2,所以,动圆圆心到点F的距离等于它到直线x=-3的距离.所以,动圆圆心的轨迹是以点F(3,0)为圆心,以直线x=-3为准线的抛物线.设动圆圆心的轨迹方程为y^{2}=2px,则\frac{p}{2}=3,可得p=6,所以,动圆圆心的轨迹方程为y^{2}=12x.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右顶点和上顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$在椭圆上，$A P$交$y$轴于点$C$ , $B P$交$x$轴于点$D$，若$|A D| \cdot|B C|=a^{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

process: 设P(x_{0},y_{0}),写出直线BP、AP的直线方程,分别求出D(\frac{bx_{0}}{b-y_{0}},0),C(0,\frac{ay_{0}}{a-x_{0}}),进而表示出|BC|、|AD|,由|AD|\cdot|BC|=a2化简可得a=2b,即可求出离心率.设P(x_{0},y_{0})则BP:y=\frac{y_{0}-b}{x_{0}}x+b'令y=0,D(\frac{bx_{0}}{b-y_{a})},0因为\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,所以D.\begin{matrix}b^{-}\\BC&=\frac{2a^{2}b^{2}-2ba^{2}y_{0}-2ab^{2}x_{0}+2abx_{0}y_{0}}{ab-ay_{0}-bx_{0}+x_{0}y_{0}}=2ab=a^{2},即a=2b,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线过点$(2, \sqrt{3})$，且双曲线的一个焦点为$F(-\sqrt{7}, 0)$，则双曲线的方程为?

text: 若点$M(1,1)$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的弦$A B$的中点，则弦$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 设出A,B点的坐标,分别代入抛物线的方程,两式相减,利用中点纵坐标求得直线AB的斜率,从而求得AB的方程,最后联立方程组,利用弦长公式,即可求解.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),代入抛物线y^{2}=4x,可得y_{1}^{2}=4x_{1},y_{2}2=4x_{2}.两式相减,可得k=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{4}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=2所以直线AB的方程为y-1=2(x-1),即y=2x-1,代入抛物线的方程得4x^{2}-8x+1=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=2,x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{1}{4}则|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}}=\sqrt{5\times(2^{2}-4\times\frac{1}{4})}=\sqrt{15}即弦AB的长为\sqrt{15}.

fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2),H);H: Circle;Intersection(H,RightPart(G)) = P;P: Point;AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = alpha;alpha: Number
process: 依题意PF_{1}\botPF_{2},故|PF_{1}|=2c\cdot\cos\alpha,|PF_{2}|=2c\cdot\sin\alpha,因此e=\frac{2c}{2a}=\frac{2c}{|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|}=\frac{1}{\cos\alpha-\sin\alpha}.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;M: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};Area(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(M, N, F2))) = pi

text: $O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上的一点，若$|P F|=3$，则三角形$P O F$的面积为?

process: 由题意,抛物线C的焦点为F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1,由|PF|=3,设P(x,y),则x+1=3,x=2,所以y=\pm2\sqrt{2},即点P的坐标为(2,\pm2\sqrt{2})则\trianglePOF的面积为S=\frac{1}{3}\times1\times2\sqrt{2}=\sqrt{2}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$ ,直线$x-2 y+b=0$与椭圆交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$P Q$中点为$E$、$O$为原点，则直线$O E$的斜率是?

text: 已知抛物线$y=x^{2}$和点$P(0 , 1)$，若过某点$C$可作抛物线的两条切线，切点分别是$A$、$B$，且满足$\overrightarrow{C P}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{C A}+\frac{2}{3} \overrightarrow{C B}$，则$\triangle A B C$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Coordinate(P) = (0, 1);TangentOfPoint(C, G) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1, G) = A;TangentPoint(l2, G) = B;VectorOf(C, P) = VectorOf(C, A)/3 + (2/3)*VectorOf(C, B)
process: 由\overrightarrow{CP}=\frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{CA}+\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{CB}可得\overrightarrow{PA}=-2\overrightarrow{PB},则有直线AB恒过定点P,设直线AB方程与抛物线方程联立,即可解得弦AB的长,对抛物线方程求导,求得切线方程的斜率,可求得切线方程,进而解得C点坐标,利用点到直线的距离公式,三角形面积公式,即可解得所求.羊解】\because\overrightarrow{CP}=\frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{CA}+\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{CB},则3\overrightarrow{CP}=(\overrightarrow{CP}+\overrightarrow{PA})+2(\overrightarrow{CP}+\overrightarrow{PB})\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}=-2\overrightarrow{PB},故直线AB过点P,且AP=2PB.故设直线AB:y=kx+1,A(x_{1},y_{1}),b(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}y=kx+1\\y=x^{2}\end{cases}可得x^{2}-kx-1=0,则x_{1}x_{2}=-1,x_{1}+x_{2}=k.由AP=2PB.可得x_{1}+2x_{2}=0可得k=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},AB=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}}=\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}由导数y'=2x,可得过A,B的切线分别为y+y_{1}=2x_{1}x,y+y_{2}=2x_{2}x联立切线方程可得C(\frac{k}{2},\cdot1)C到y=kx+1的距离d=\frac{2}{2\sqrt{6}}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，若以$M(0,-1)$为圆心且与椭圆$C$有公共点的圆的最大半径为$\sqrt{15}$，此时椭圆$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;M: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (0, -1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/3;Center(G)=M;IsIntersect(G,C);Max(Radius(G))=sqrt(15)
process: 由已知e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},所以a=\sqrt{3}c,则b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{2}c,设椭圆上的任一点P的坐标为(\sqrt{3}c\cos\theta,\sqrt{2}c\sin\theta)则|MP|^{2}=(\sqrt{3}c\cos\theta)^{2}+(\sqrt{2}c\sin\theta+1)^{2}=3c^{2}\cos^{2}\theta+2c^{2}\sin^{2}\theta+2\sqrt{2}c\sin\theta+=-c^{2\sin^{2}\theta+2\sqrt{2}c\sin\theta+3c^{2}+1}=-c^{2}(\sin\theta-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{c})+3c^{2}+3若c\geqslant\sqrt{2},则当\sin\theta=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{c}时,(|MP|^{2})_{\max}=3c^{2}+3,由3c^{2}+3=15得c=2,满足题意此时a=2\sqrt{3},b=2\sqrt{2},椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{18}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1,若0<c<\sqrt{2},则\sin\theta=1时,(|MP|^{2})_{\max}=2c^{2}+2\sqrt{2}c+1,则2c^{2}+2\sqrt{2}c+1=15,即c^{2}+\sqrt{2}c=7,但0<c<\sqrt{2}时,c^{2}+\sqrt{2}c<4,c^{2}+\sqrt{2}c=7无解综上,椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{18}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为椭圆上一动点，$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$面积最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1中,a^{2}=25,b^{2}=9,\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}\cdotb^{2}=16,\thereforeb=3,c=4.由椭圆的几何性质知,当点P为椭圆的短轴端点时,\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的面积最大,故\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|b=bc=12

text: 已知点$P(x, y)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上的一点，则$2 x+3 y$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: \because点P(x,y)是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1上的一个动点,\therefore设椭圆的参数方程为\begin{cases}x=2\cos\theta\\y=\sin\theta\end{cases}(\theta为参)则z=2x+3y=4\cos\theta+3\sin\theta=5(\frac{4}{5}\cos\theta+\frac{3}{5}\sin\theta)=5\sin(\theta+\phi)\because\theta\in[0,2\pi)\thereforez\in[-5,5],即z=2x+3y的取值范围是[-5,5].

text: 点$M(x , y)$在运动过程中，总满足关系式$\sqrt{x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}}+\sqrt{x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}}=6$，点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (x1, y1);x1:Number;y1:Number;sqrt(x1^2+(y1+1)^2)+sqrt(x1^2+(y1-1)^2)=6
process: M到(0,-1)与(0,1)的距离之和为6,又(0,-1),(0,1)两点间的距离为2,所以其轨迹是以(0,-1),(0,1)为焦点的椭圆c=1,a=3,b^{2}=8.故点M的轨迹方程为\frac{y^{2}}{9}+\frac{x^{2}}{8}=1.

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$作斜率为$2$的直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则以$A B$为直径的圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) = 2;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};H: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), H)
process: 由y^{2}=8x得p=4,所以F(2,0),所以直线AB的方程为:y=2(x-2)=2x-4,联立\begin{cases}y=2x-4\\y2=8x\end{cases},消去y并整理得x^{2}-6x+4=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=6,x_{1}x_{2}=4,所以y_{1}+y_{2}=2(x_{1}+x_{2})-8=4,所以以AB为直径的圆的圆心为(3,2),所以以AB为直径的圆的半径为5,所以以AB为直径的圆的标准方程为:(x-3)^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=25

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点的直线$l$交抛物线于$P(x_{1}, y_{1})$, $Q(x_{2}, y_{2})$两点，若$P Q$中点的横坐标为$3$，则$P Q$的长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);P: Point;Q: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(Q) = (x2, y2);Intersection(l, G) = {P, Q};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, Q))) = 3
process: 由抛物线y^{2}=4x可得:2p=4,所以焦点F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1.根据抛物线的定义:|PF|=x_{1}+1,|QF|=x_{2}+|所以|PQ|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2.因为PQ中点的横坐标为3,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=6,所以|PQ|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=6+2=8

text: 直线$y=2 k$与曲线$9 k^{2} x^{2}+y^{2}=18 k^{2}|x|(k \in R, k \neq 0)$的公共点的个数为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;k: Real;H: Curve;Expression(G) = (y = 2*k);Expression(H) = (9*(k^2*x^2) + y^2 = 18*k^2*Abs(x));Negation(k=0)
process: 将直线方程y=2k与曲线方程9k^{2}x^{2}+y^{2}=18k^{2}|x|联立得,9x^{2}-18|x|+4=0,根据方程根的个数来判断.将直线方程y=2k与曲线方程9k^{2}x^{2}+y^{2}=18k^{2}|x|联立得,9x^{2}-18|x|+4=0解得|x|=1-\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}或|x|=1+\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3},所以_{x=1}-\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}或x=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}-1^{a}x=1+\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}或x=-1-\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}故直线与曲线的公共点有4个.均答家为:4

C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, LeftPart(C)) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = 6;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2)) = 10;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1(m>0)$的一条渐近线为$\sqrt{3} x+m y=0$，则$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (m*y + sqrt(3)*x = 0)
process: 由渐近线方程\sqrt{3}x+my=0化简得y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{m}x'即\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{m},同时平方得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{3}{m^{2}},又双曲线中a^{2}=m,b^{2}=1,故\frac{3}{m^{2}}=\frac{1}{m},解得m=3,m=0(舍去),c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=3+1=4\Rightarrowc=2,故焦距2c=4.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，其左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若以右焦点$F_{2}(c, 0)(c>0)$为圆心作半径为$c$的圆与双曲线的右支的一个交点为$M$，且直线$F_{1} M$恰好与圆相切，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;c:Number;H: Circle;F1: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;c>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Center(H)=F2;Radius(H)=c;OneOf(Intersection(H,RightPart(G)))=M;IsTangent(LineOf(F1,M),H)
process: 试题分析:因为右焦点F_{2}(c,0)(c>0)为圆心作半径为c的圆与双曲线的右支的一个交点为M,且直线F_{1}M恰好与圆相切,所以MF_{1}\botMF_{2},|MF_{2}|=c,由勾股定理得|MF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c,由双曲线定义知|MF_{1}|-|MF_{2}|=2a=\sqrt{3}c-c,离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}-1}=\sqrt{3}+1,

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上任意一点$P$，引与实轴平行的直线，交两渐近线于$R$、$Q$两点，则$\overrightarrow{P R} \cdot \overrightarrow{P Q}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;R: Point;Q: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(P, H);IsParallel(H, RealAxis(G));L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1, L2};Intersection(H, L1) = R;Intersection(H, L2) = Q

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点$F_{2}$为圆心作一个圆，使此圆过椭圆中心并交椭圆于$M$、$N$两点，若过椭圆左焦点$F_{1}$的直线$M F_{1}$是圆$F_{2}$的切线，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;F2: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;N: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;Center(H) = F2;PointOnCurve(Center(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, LineOf(M, F1));IsTangent(LineOf(M, F1), H)
process: 由题意,故点M是切点,MF_{2}=c,MF_{1}\botMF_{2}.又\becauseF_{1}F_{2}=2c,\therefore\angleMF_{1}F_{2}=30^{\circ},\therefore|MF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c根据椭圆的定义可得:|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=2a,\therefore|MF_{2}|=2a-c\therefore2a-c=\sqrt{3}c,即a=\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{2}c\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}+1}=\sqrt{3}-1,故选C

text: 若经过点$M(2,0)$且斜率为$1$的直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(M, l);Slope(l) = 1;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则直线l的方程为y=x-2由\begin{cases}y=x-2\\y2=4x\end{cases}得x^{2}-8x+4=0所以x_{1}+x_{2}=8,x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=4所以|AB|=\sqrt{2}\times\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}\cdotx_{2}}=\sqrt{2}\times\sqrt{64-16}=4\sqrt{6}

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，直线$x=a$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线分别交于$D$、$E$两点，若$\triangle O D E$的面积为$4$，则$C$的焦距的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;O: Origin;D: Point;E: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x = a);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(C)={L1,L2};Intersection(G,L1)=D;Intersection(G,L2)=E;Area(TriangleOf(O, D, E)) = 4
process: 因为C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),可得双曲线的渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,与直线x=a联立方程求得D,E两点坐标,即可求得|ED|,根据\triangleODE的面积为4,可得ab值,根据2c=2\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}结合均值不等式,即可求得答案解]\becauseC:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)\therefore双曲线的渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x'\because直线x=a与双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的两条渐近线分别交于D,E两点不妨设D为在第一象限,E在第四象限,联立\begin{cases}x=a\\y=\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}x=a\\y=b\end{cases},即D(a,b)\therefore|ED|=2b;\therefore\triangleODE面积为:S_{\triangleODE}=\frac{1}{2}a\times2b=ab=4;\because双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),\therefore其焦距为2c=2\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}\geqslant2\sqrt{2ab}=2\sqrt{8}=4\sqrt{2};当且仅当a=b=2时,取等号;\thereforeC的焦距的最小值为4\sqrt{2};

text: 设$P$是曲线$y^{2}=4(x-1)$上的一个动点，则点$P$到点$A(0 , 1)$的距离与点$P$到$y$轴的距离之和的最小值是?
