process: 因为抛物线方程是y^{2}=4(x-1),所以抛物线的焦点坐标是F(2,0),准线方程为:x=0,如图所示:由抛物线的定义得:PD=PF,所以PA+PD=PA+PF\geqslantAF,当A,P,F共线时取等号,所以点P到点A(0,1)的距离与点P到y轴的距离之和的最小值是\sqrt{5}

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{100}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上的一点若$P$到椭圆右准线的距离是$\frac{17}{2}$, 则点$P$到左焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/100 + y^2/36 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, RightDirectrix(G)) = 17/2
process: P是椭圆\frac{x2}{100}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1上的一点,设椭圆的两焦点为F_{1},F_{2}若P到椭圆右准线的距离是\frac{17}{2},则\frac{|PF_{1}|}{\frac{17}{17}}=e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{100-36}}{10}=\frac{4}{5}解得|PF_{1}|=\frac{34}{5}.由椭圆的定义可得:|PF_{2}|=2a-|PF_{1}|=20-\frac{34}{5}=\frac{66}{5}

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{y^{2}}{5}+x^{2}=1$的右顶点为$A$、$P$为$C$上一点，则$P A$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2/5 = 1);A: Point;RightVertex(C) = A;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True

text: 双曲线的焦点在$x$轴上，中心在原点，一条渐进线为$y=\sqrt{2} x$，点$P(1,-2)$在双曲线上，则双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;O: Origin;Center(G)=O;Coordinate(P) = (1, -2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(P, G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=sqrt(2)*x)

text: 抛物线$y=x^{2}$到直线$2 x-y=4$距离最近的点的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Expression(H) = (2*x - y = 4);Z: Point;PointOnCurve(Z, G);WhenMin(Distance(Z, H))
process: 试题分析:设与直线2x-y=4平行的直线方程为2x-y=b,将2x-y=b和y=x^{2}联立消去y并整理可得x^{2}-2x+b=0,4=(-2)^{2}-4b=0即b=1时直线2x-y=b与y=x^{2}相切.将b=1代入x^{2}-2x+b=0解得x=1.此时切点为(1,1).由数形结合分析可知抛物线y=x^{2}上的点(1,1)到直线2x-v=4的距离最近老占.百线和国锥曲线相切

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}-2}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2/(m^2 - 2) + x^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)
process: \because方程\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}-2}=1表示焦点在x轴上的椭圆,\thereforem>m^{2}-2>0,解得\sqrt{2}<m<2\thereforem的取值范围是(\sqrt{2},2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点是$F(2,0)$. 其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，该双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)*x)
process: 因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的一个焦点是F(2,0),所以c=2,双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm\sqrt{3}x,即b=\sqrt{3}a\textcircled{1},又c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=2,\textcircled{2}联立\textcircled{2},解得\begin{cases}a=1\\b=\sqrt{3}\end{cases},所以双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=\lambda(\lambda \in R,\lambda \neq 0)$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;lambda: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = lambda);Negation(lambda = 0)
process: 【解和元)将将\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=\lambda化为标准形式:\frac{x^{2}}{9\lambda}-\frac{y^{2}}{16\lambda}=1,对\lambda>0和\lambda<0两种情况进行讨论,求出离心率即将\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=\lambda化为标准形式:\frac{x^{2}}{9\lambda}-\frac{y^{2}}{16\lambda}=1,\textcircled{1}当\lambda>0时,该双曲线表示焦点在x轴的双曲线,此时,a^{2}=9\lambda,b^{2}=16\lambda,所以c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=25\lambda双曲线离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{252}{9\lambda}}=\frac{5}{3},\textcircled{2}当\lambda<0时,该双曲线表示焦点在y轴的双曲线此时,a^{2}=-16\lambda,b^{2}=-9\lambda,所以c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=-25\lambda双曲线离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{25\lambda}{16\lambda}}=\frac{5}{4}所以该双曲线的离心率为\frac{5}{2}或\frac{5}{1}.

text: 若直线$y=k x+2$与抛物线$y^{2}=x$只有一个交点，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1;k: Real
process: 联立直线方程与抛物线方程可得:k^{2}x^{2}+(4k-1)x+4=0\textcircled{1}若k=0,则x=4,满足题意;\textcircled{2}若k\neq0,则a=(4k-1)^{2}-16k^{2}=0,解得k=\frac{1}{8}.综上所述,k=0或\frac{1}{8}.

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1(a>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/12 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$的焦距是?渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1)
process: 由题意得:a=\sqrt{2},b=1,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{2+1}=\sqrt{3},\therefore焦距为2c=2\sqrt{3}渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}+64=0$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$1$，那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 + 64 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P,F1) = 1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2)

E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(E));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);IsTangent(LineOf(P, F2), G)

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，经过点$P(1,4)$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，且点$P$恰为$A B$的中点，则 $|\overrightarrow{A F}|+| \overrightarrow{B F} |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 4);l: Line;PointOnCurve(P,l) = True;Intersection(l,G) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = P
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由点P(1,4)恰为AB的中点,可得y_{1}+y_{2}=8,又由抛物线定义得|\overrightarrow{AF}|+|\overrightarrow{BF}|=y_{1}+y_{2}+2=10,

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，过点$P(-1, \frac{1}{2})$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为弦$A B$中点，则直线$l$斜率是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 1/2);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), C);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 一个圆的圆心在抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上，且该圆经过抛物线的顶点和焦点，若圆心在第一象限，则该圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);H: Circle;PointOnCurve(Center(H), G);PointOnCurve(Vertex(G), H);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Quadrant(Center(H)) = 1
process: 试题分析:抛物线y^{2}=16x的顶点和焦点分别是(0,0)和(4,0),所以圆心在直线x=2上,将x=2代入y^{2}=16x得y=4\sqrt{2},即圆心为(2,4\sqrt{2}),从而圆的标准方程为(x-2)^{2}+(y-4\sqrt{2})^{2}=36

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-y+1=0$与抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 y$交于$A$、$B$两点，点$P$为直线$l$上一动点，$M$ , $N$是抛物线$C$上两个动点，若$\overrightarrow{MN} / / \overrightarrow{AB}$，$|\overrightarrow{MN}|<|\overrightarrow{AB}|$，则$\Delta PMN$的面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - y + 1 = 0);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*y);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, l);M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, C);IsParallel(VectorOf(M, N), VectorOf(A, B));Abs(VectorOf(M, N)) < Abs(VectorOf(A, B))
process: 试题分析:由题意知:当直线MN过原点时,APMN的面积最大,所以直线MN的方程是x-y=0,点P到直线MN的距离d=\frac{|1-0|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},由\begin{cases}x-y=0\\x^{2}=2y\end{cases}得:\begin{cases}x=0\\y=0\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=2\\y=2\end{cases},所以N(0,0),M(2,2)所以|MN|=\sqrt{(2-0)^{2}+(2-0)^{2}}=2\sqrt{2},所以APMN的面积的最大值是\frac{1}{2}\cdot|MN|\cdotd=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{2}\times\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}=1'所以答案应填:1

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的虚轴长为$2$，焦距为$2 \sqrt{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 2;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(3)
process: 试题分析:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的虚轴长为2,焦距为2\sqrt{3},所以b=1,c=\sqrt{3},\thereforea^{2}=c^{2}-b^{2}=2,所以双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1,所以渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 从双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左焦点$F$引圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$的切线$F P$交双曲线右支于点$P$、$T$为切点，$N$为线段$F P$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，则$|N O|-|N T|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;P: Point;F: Point;N: Point;O: Origin;T: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);LeftFocus(G)=F;TangentOfPoint(F,H)=LineOf(F,P);Intersection(LineOf(F,P),RightPart(G))=P;TangentPoint(LineOf(F,P),H)=T;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F,P)) = N
process: 设右焦点为F',则NO-NT=\frac{1}{2}PF-NT=\frac{1}{2}(PF-2a)-NT=-a+NF-NT=-a+FT=-2+\sqrt{16-4}=-2+2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的右焦点，直线$y=k x+1$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点若$A F \perp B F$，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = k*x + 1);k: Real;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F), LineSegmentOf(B, F))
G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 5

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a+t}+\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1(a>0, t>0)$的两个焦点之间距离为$2$，则椭圆上任意一个点到两个焦点的距离之和为?(用含$a$的式子表示)
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;t: Number;a>0;t>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/(a + t) + y^2/a = 1);F1:Point;F2:Point;Focus(C)={F1,F2};Distance(F1,F2)=2;P:Point;PointOnCurve(P,C)
process: 因为\frac{x^{2}}{a+t}+\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1(a>0,t>0)两个焦点之间的距离为2,所以2\sqrt{(a+t)-a}=2所以t=1,所以椭圆上任意一个点到两个焦点的距离之和为2\sqrt{a+1}

fact_expressions: l1: Line;b: Number;b>3;Expression(l1) = (x - sqrt(3)*y + b = 0);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l2: Line;Directrix(C) = l2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C);d1: Number;d2: Number;Distance(A, l1) = d1;Distance(A, l2) = d2;WhenMin(d1+d2);d1 = 2*d2

text: 已知直线$l$交椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，且$A B$的中点坐标为$(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2})$，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = (1/2, 1/2);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B}

text: 若椭圆$x^{2}+y^{2} \cos \theta=1(0<\theta<\frac{\pi}{2})$的焦距为$2$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2*Cos(theta) = 1);theta: Number;0<theta;theta<pi/2;FocalLength(G) = 2
process: 由x^{2}+y^{2}\cos\theta=1可得\frac{x^{2}}{1}+\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{1}{\cos\theta}}因为0<\theta<\frac{\pi}{2},所以0<\cos\theta<1,所以\frac{1}{\cos\theta}>1,可得a^{2}=\frac{1}{\cos\theta},b^{2}=1,c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=\frac{1}{\cos\theta}-1由题意可得2c=2,所以c=1,c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=\frac{1}{coc\alpha}-1可得a^{2}=\frac{1}{\cos\theta}=2,离心率e=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左、右焦点，$M$为$C$上一点且在第一象限. 若$|M F_{1}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，则点$M$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);Quadrant(M) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2))

text: 设椭圆的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，上顶点为$B_{1}$，若$|B_{1} F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|=4$，则该椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;B1: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;UpperVertex(G) = B1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B1,F2))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2))=4

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>0)$的一个焦点为$F(2,0)$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;a>0;Expression(G) = (+ x^2/a^2-y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0)
process: 由题可得:c=2,b^{2}=2,由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\Rightarrowa=\sqrt{2}故离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{2}}=\sqrt{2}

text: 已知三角形$A B C$的三个顶点都在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上，且$A B \perp x$轴，$A C \| x$轴，则$\frac{|A C| \cdot|A B|}{|B C|^{2}}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Vertex(TriangleOf(A,B,C)),G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,B),xAxis);IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(A,C),xAxis)
process: 试题分析:设点A的坐标为(x_{0},y_{0}),(x_{0}>0,y_{0}>0),则由椭圆的对称性知,所以,\frac{|aC|\cdot|AB|}{|BC|^{2}}=\frac{2x_{0}\cdot2y_{0}}{(2\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}})^{2}}=\frac{x_{0}y_{0}}{x_{0}^{2}}\leqslant\frac{1}{2},当且仅当x_{0}=y_{0}=\frac{ab}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}时等号成立.所以答案应填:\frac{1}{2}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$ , $A$, $B$是椭圆的左、右顶点，$P$是椭圆上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，直线$PA$,$PB$倾斜角分别为$\alpha$, $\beta$，则$\frac{\cos (\alpha-\beta)}{\cos (\alpha+\beta)}$=?
fact_expressions: P: Point;A: Point;G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;e: Number;alpha: Number;beta: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/2;LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B);Inclination(LineOf(P, A)) = alpha;Inclination(LineOf(P, B)) = beta
process: 试题分析:由题意,A(-a,0),B(a,0),设P(x,y),则\tan\alpha=\frac{y}{x+a},\tan\beta=\frac{y}{x-a}\therefore\tan\alpha\tan\beta=\frac{y}{x+a}\cdot\frac{y}{x-a}=\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}-a^{2}},\because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)的离心率e\therefore\frac{a^{2}-b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4},\thereforea^{2}=\frac{4}{3}b^{2},\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{\frac{4}{3}b^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,\thereforey^{2}=b^{2}-\frac{3x^{2}}{4},\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}-a^{2}}=-\frac{3}{4}\tan\alpha\tan\beta=-\frac{3}{4},\frac{\cos(\alpha-\beta)}{\cos(\alpha+\beta)}=\frac{\cos\alpha\cos\beta+\sin\alpha\sin\beta}{\cos\alpha\cos\beta-\sina\sin\beta}=\frac{1+\tan\alpha\tan\beta}{1-\tan\alpha\tan\beta}=\frac{1-\frac{3}{4}}{1+\frac{3}{4}}=\frac{1}{7}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$M$在$C$的左支上，过点$M$作$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则当$|M F_{2}|+|M N|$取最小值$10$时，$\Delta F_{1} N F_{2}$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, LeftPart(C));L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=N;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,N)))=10
process: 由题意得|MF_{2}|-|MF_{1}|=2a,故|MF_{2}|=|MF_{1}|+2a,如图示:\frac{,}{b^{2}}=\frac{bc}{c}=b则|MF_{2}|+|MN|=|MF_{1}|+2a+|MN|\geqslant|F_{1}N|+2a=b+2a,当且仅当M,F_{1},N三点共线时取等号\therefore|MF_{2}|+|MN|的最小值为b+2a=10,\therefore10\geqslant2\sqrt{2ab},即ab\leqslant\frac{25}{2}当且仅当b=2a=5时,等号成立,又|OF_{1}|=c,故|ON|=\sqrt{c^{2}-b^{2}}=a\thereforeS_{\DeltaF_{1}NF_{2}}=2S_{\DeltaF_{1}NO}=2\times\frac{1}{2}|NF_{1}|\cdot|NO|=ab\leqslant\frac{25}{2}即\triangleF_{1}NF_{2}面积的最大值为\frac{25}{2}.

text: 过点$P(-2,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$、$B$在第一象限，且点$A$为线段$P B$的中点，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;B: Point;P: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(P) = (-2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,B)) = A
process: 由题意可知,直线l的斜率存在且为正数,可设直线l的方程为x=my-2(m>0),设点A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2}),将直线l的方程与抛物线C的方程联立,列出韦达定理,可得出y_{2}=2y_{1},代入韦达定理求出m的值,即可得出直线l的斜率为\frac{1}{m}由于过点P(-2,0)的直线l与抛物线C:y^{2}=8x相交于A、B两点,若A、B在第一象限所以,直线l的斜率存在且为正数,设直线l的方程为x=my-2(m>0),设点A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}x=my-2\\y2=8x\end{cases},可得y^{2}-8my+16=0,A=64m^{2}-64>0,\becausem>0,解得m>1.由韦达定理可得y_{1}+y_{2}=8m,y_{1}y_{2}=16,由于点A为线段PB的中点,则y_{2}=2y_{1},\therefore8m=,\thereforey_{1}=\frac{8m}{3}16=y_{1}y_{2}=2y_{1}^{2}=2\times(\frac{8m}{3})^{2},可得m^{2}=\frac{9}{8},\becausem>0,解得m=\frac{3\sqrt{}}{4}因此,直线l的斜率为k=\frac{1}{m}=\frac{4}{3\sqrt{2}}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1  (m n \neq 0)$的离心率为$2$，则$\frac{m}{n}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Negation(m*n=0)

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{16-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(16 - m) + y^2/(m + 4) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)
process: \because方程\frac{x^{2}}{16-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1表示焦点在y轴上的椭圆\begin{cases}\\m+4>0\end{cases},解得:6<m<16(m+4>16-m

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$短轴端点为$A$，$B$. 点$P$是椭圆上除$A$ , $B$外任意一点，则直线$PA$，$PB$的斜率之积为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;A: Point;G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B)

text: 动点$P$到点$F(2,0)$的距离与它到直线$x+2=0$的距离相等,则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x + 2 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的直线$x-my+m=0$与抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，且$\triangle OAB$($O$为坐标原点）的面积为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则$m^{6}+m^{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;H: Line;Expression(H) = (m - m*y + x = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);m: Number;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, B)) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 试题分析:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=2px\\x=my-m\end{cases},消去x得y^{2}-2mpy+2pm=0,y_{1}+y_{2}=2pm,y_{1}y_{2}=2pm,(y_{1}-y_{2})^{2}=(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}=4p^{2}m^{2}-8pm.又焦点(\frac{p}{2},0)在x-my+m=0上,\thereforep=-2m,\therefore|y_{1}-y_{2}|=4\sqrt{m^{4}+m^{2}},\thereforeS_{\triangleOAB}=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{p}{2}\times|y_{1}-y_{2}|=2\sqrt{2}-m\sqrt{m^{4}+m^{2}}=\sqrt{2},平方得m^{6}+m^{4}=2

text: 经过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$的直线$A B$，分别交双曲线的左、右支为点$A$、$B$. 求弦长$A B$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, LineOf(A, B)) = True;Inclination(LineOf(A, B)) = pi/6;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), LeftPart(G)) = A;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), RightPart(G)) = B;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G) = True
process: \because双曲线的左焦点为F_{1}(-2,0),设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})直线AB的方程可设为y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{13}(x+2)'代入方程x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1得,8x^{2}\cdot4x-13=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{1}{2},x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{13}{8},\thereforeAB=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot|x_{1}-x_{2}|=\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{3}}\cdot\sqrt{(\frac{1}{2})^{2}+4\times\frac{13}{8}}=3

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$ , $\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2);AngleOf(P,F1,F2)=ApplyUnit(30,degree)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=-8 x$上一点$P$到$y$轴的距离是$4$，则点$P$到该抛物线焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -8*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = 4
process: 由y^{2}=-8x\geqslant0,可得x\leqslant0.已知抛物线方程可得其准线方程为x=2.又由点P到y轴的距离为4,可得点P的横坐标x_{p}=-4.由抛物线定义可知点P到焦点的距离等于其到准线的距离,即|PF|=-x_{p}+2=4+2=6

text: 已知$A$、$B$为坐标平面上的两个定点，且$| A B |=2$，动点$P$到$A$、$B$两点距离之和为常数$2$，则点$P$的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;P: Point;Distance(P, A) + Distance(P, B) = 2
process: \because|AB|=2,而动点P到A、B两点距离之和为也是2,\because2=2,故点P的轨迹不是椭圆,\therefore是线段AB.

text: 双曲线$2 m x^{2}-m y^{2}=2$的一条准线是$y=1$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*(m*x^2) - m*y^2 = 2);m: Number;Expression(OneOf(Directrix(G))) = (y = 1)
process: 可知双曲线的焦点在y轴上,\thereforem<0,双曲线方程可化为\frac{y^{2}}{-\frac{2}{m}}-\frac{x^{2}}{-\frac{1}{m}}=1,因此a^{2}=-\frac{2}{m},b^{2}=-\frac{1}{m},c^{2}=-\frac{3}{m}\because准线是y=1\thereforea^{2}=c,即-\frac{2}{m}=\sqrt{-\frac{3}{m}},解得m=-\frac{4}{3}.

text: 已知点$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，点$A(2 , y_{1})$,$B(\frac{1}{2} , y_{2})$分别是抛物线上位于第一、四象限的点，若$|A F|=10$，则$|y_{1}-y_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;B: Point;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (2, y1);Coordinate(B) = (1/2, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 4;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 10
process: \because|AF|=2+\frac{p}{2}=10,\thereforep=16,则抛物线的方程为y^{2}=32x,把x=\frac{1}{2}代入方程,得y=-4(y=4舍去),即B(\frac{1}{2},-4)把x=2代入方程,得y=8(y=-8舍去),即A(2,8),则|y_{1}-y_{2}|=|8-(-4)|=12,

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线的右支上，且$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$, $F_{2}$到直线$P F_{1}$的距离等于双曲线的实轴长，该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Distance(F2, LineOf(P, F1)) = Length(RealAxis(G))

text: 过椭圆$x^{2}+2 y^{2}=2$的焦点引一条倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，椭圆的中心为$O$，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 2*y^2 = 2);H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H) = True;Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H,G) = {A,B};O: Origin;Center(G) = O
process: 将x^{2}+2y^{2}=2化为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1,因为直线过椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1的焦点F(1,0)且倾斜角为45^{\circ},所以直线方程为y=x-1,联立\begin{cases}y=x-1\\x2-2v2=2\end{cases},得3y^{2}+2y-1=0,得y=\frac{1}{3},y_{2}=-1,则S_{AAOB}=S_{AAOF}+S_{ABOF}=\frac{1}{2}\times(\frac{1}{3}+1)\times1=\frac{2}{3}.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点，点$A$、$B$在椭圆上，若$\overrightarrow {F_{1} A}=5 \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则点$A$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(F1, A) = 5*VectorOf(F2, B)

text: 5. 直线 $l$ 过抛物线 $y^{2}=4 x$ 的焦点 $F$ 交抛物线于 $A$，$B$ 两个点，则 $\frac{1}{|F A|}+\frac{1}{|F B|}=$？
fact_expressions: l: Line;E: Parabola;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, E) = {A, B}

text: 已知曲线$C$:$|x|+|y|=m(m>0)$, 曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有四个不同的交点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;C: Curve;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);m>0;Expression(C) = (Abs(x) + Abs(y) = m);NumIntersection(C, G) = 4
process: 试题分析:(1)若m=1,曲线C:|x|+|y|=1,表示对角线长为2的正方形,可得由面积是2;(2)椭圆的长半轴长为3,短半轴长为2,2<m<3时,曲线C与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1有四个不同的交点;再考虑相切时的情形,即可得出结论.(1)若m=1,曲线C:|x|+|y|=1,表示对角线长为2的正方形,则由曲线C围成的图形的面和2(2)椭圆的长半轴长为3,短半轴长为2,2<m<3时,曲线C与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1有四个不同的交点;x>0,y>0,x+y-m=0与椭圆方程联立,可得13x^{2}-18mx+9m^{2}-36=0\therefore\triangle=(-18m)^{2}-52(9m^{2}\cdot36)=0,\becausem>0,\thereforem=\sqrt{13}.此时曲线C与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1有四个不同的交点

text: 已知$A(1,2)$,$B(-1,2)$, 动点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{A P} \perp \overrightarrow{B P}$, 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线与动点$P$的轨迹没有公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);Coordinate(B) = (-1, 2);IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(A,P),VectorOf(B,P));NumIntersection(Asymptote(G),Locus(P))=0
process: 设P(x,y),由\overrightarrow{AP}\bot\overrightarrow{BP},A(1,2),B(-1,2)\therefore(x-1)(x+1)+(y-2)^{2}=0,即x^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=1设双曲线的一条渐近线方程y=\frac{b}{a}x,则\frac{|2a|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}>1\therefore3a^{2}>b^{2},又b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2},即c^{2}<4a^{2},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}<2,又双曲线离心率e>1,所以1<e<2.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且$F P_{1} \perp F P_{2}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F, P1), LineSegmentOf(F, P2))
process: 根据双曲线的方程,算出焦点F_{1}(-\sqrt{5},0)、F_{2}(\sqrt{5},0).利用勾股定理算出|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=20,由双曲线的定义得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}||=2a=4,联解得出|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=2,即可得到\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积.羊解]\because双曲线\frac{x2}{4}-y^{2}=1中,a=2,b=1\because点P在双曲线上,且\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}\therefore|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=20根据双曲线的定义,得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=4\therefore两式联解,得|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=2因此\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=1

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{20}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$，那么它的焦距是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/20 - y^2/5 = 1)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{14}=10$的左右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$与双曲线$\Gamma$左右两支分别交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$|P Q|=|Q F_{2}|$，则$\cos \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Hyperbola;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/2 - y^2/14 = 10);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l,LeftPart(Gamma))=P;Intersection(l,RightPart(Gamma))=Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，过点$N(2,0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$\frac{|A N|}{|B N|}=2$，则线段$A B$长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);H: Line;PointOnCurve(N, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, N))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, N)) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$、$B$在椭圆$\Gamma$上，$\overrightarrow{A F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}=0$且$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则当$\lambda \in[2,3]$时，椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;lambda:Number;In(lambda,[2,3]);Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, Gamma);PointOnCurve(B, Gamma);DotProduct(VectorOf(A,F1),VectorOf(F1,F2))=0;VectorOf(A,F2)=lambda*VectorOf(F2,B)
process: 因为\overrightarrow{AF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}=0,所以可设A(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),F_{2}(c,0),B(x,y)所以可设A(-c,\frac{b}{a}),F_{2}(c,0),B(x,y)'所以\frac{(1+\frac{2}{2})^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{(-\frac{b^{2}}{2a})^{2}}=1'即(\lambda+2)^{2}c^{2}+b^{2}=\lambda^{2}a^{2},即(\lambda+2)^{2}c^{2}+b^{2}=\lambda^{2}a^{2},即(\lambda^{2}+4\lambda+3)c^{2}=(\lambda^{2}-1)a^{2},即\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{2^{2}-1}{2+41+3}}=\sqrt{\frac{\lambda-1}{2+3}}==\sqrt{1-\frac{-2}{2}}\frac{4}{+3}其在区间[2,3]上为增函数,所以\frac{c}{a}\in\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5},\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}所以椭圆的离心率的取值范围为[\sqrt{5}\sqrt{3}

text: 斜率为$1$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Slope(H)=1;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=x的准线方程为x=-\frac{1}{4};故填x=-\frac{1}{4}.

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=-8 y$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -8*y)

text: 直线$x+y+2=0$分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上，则$\triangle A B P$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x + y + 2 = 0);Intersection(H,xAxis) = A;Intersection(H,yAxis) = B;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 依题意,A(-2,0),B(0,-2),设与直线x+y+2=0平行且与抛物线相切的直线l方程为:x+y+t=0联立直线l与抛物线方程,消去y得:y^{2}+4y+4t=0,则\triangle=16\cdot16t=0,即t=1,\because直线x+y+2=0与直线l之间的距离d=\frac{2-1}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\frac{1}{2}|AB|d=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{2}\times\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}=1.睛】本题考查直线与圆锥曲线的关系,考查运算求解能力,数形结合是解决本题的关键,属于中档题

text: 以直线$3 x-4 y-12=0$与$y$轴的交点为焦点的抛物线标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C:Parabola;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x - 4*y - 12 = 0);Intersection(H,yAxis)=Focus(C)
process: 由题意,知抛物线的焦点为(0,-3),所以2p=12,又焦点在y轴的负半轴上,所以抛物线方程为x^{2}=-12y故填x^{2}=-12y.睛】本题主要考查了抛物线的方程,抛物线的简单几何性质,属于中档题

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{7}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/7 + y^2/4 = 1)

text: 点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右支上，其左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 直线$P F_{1}$与以坐标原点$O$为圆心、$a$为半径的圆相切于点$A$，线段$P F_{1}$的垂直平分线恰好过点$F_{2}$，则该双曲线的渐近线的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;O: Origin;H: Circle;A: Point;TangentPoint(LineOf(P, F1), H) = A;Center(H) = O;Radius(H) = a;PointOnCurve(F2, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)))
process: 如图,A是切点,B是PF_{1}的中点,因为|OA|=a||,所以|BF_{2}|=2a,又|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,所以|BF_{1}|=2b,|PF_{2}|=4b,又|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,根据双曲线的定义,有|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,即4b-2c=2aa,两边平方并化简得3c^{2}-2ac-5a^{2}=0,所以\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{3},因此渐进线的斜率为\pm\frac{b}{a}=\pm\sqrt{(\frac{c}{a})^{2}-1}=\pm\frac{4}{3}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上一点，若$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$，则$P$到左准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)
process: \because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,\thereforea=3,b^{2}=3,\because|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=6,|PF_{1}|=2|PF_{2}|\therefore|PF_{1}|=4,|PF_{2}|=2求出椭圆的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},设P到左准线距离是d,根据圆锥曲线统一定义,得:\frac{|PF_{1}|}{d}=e=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},\therefored=\frac{4\times3}{\sqrt{6}}=2\sqrt{6},即P到左准线距离是2\sqrt{6}.故填:\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2\sqrt{6}}有)本题考查了椭圆的定义的应用,椭圆的几何性质和圆锥曲线的统一定义;椭圆上的点到椭圆的左焦点与到椭圆的方准线的距离之H为椭圆的离心率

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左焦点，$B_{1} B_{2}$是双曲线的虚轴，$M$是$O B_{1}$的 中点，过$F$、$M$的直线交双曲线$C$于$A$，且$F M=2 M A$, 则双曲线$C$离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = ( -y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1 );F: Point ;LeftFocus(C) = F;B1: Point;B2: Point;O: Origin;LineSegmentOf(B1,B2) = ImageinaryAxis(C);M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O,B1)) = M;Line_1: Line ;A: Point;PointOnCurve(F, Line_1) = True;PointOnCurve(M,Line_1) = True;Intersection(Line_1, C) = A;LineSegmentOf(F,M) = 2*LineSegmentOf(M,A)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=100 x$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 100*x)
process: 因为2p=100,所以p=50,所以焦点的坐标为(25,0)

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上一动点，$O$为坐标原点，则线段$O P$中点$Q$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;P: Point;Q:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/8 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O,P))=Q
process: 设Q(x,y),由于Q是OP中点,故P(2x,2y),代入椭圆方程得\frac{(2x)^{2}}{4}+\frac{(2y)^{2}}{8}=1'化简得x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1.即Q点的轨迹方程为x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1.】本小题主要考查代入法求动点的轨迹方程,考查中点坐标,属于基础题

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=6$，则$A B$中点到$y$轴距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),交点为F.根据题意可得AB中点到y轴距离为d=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1-2}{2}=\frac{|AF|+|BF|}{2}-1因为|AF|+|BF|\geqslant|AB|=6,所以d的最小值为2.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交双曲线右支于$M$点，若$M F_{2}$垂直于$x$轴，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(45,degree);Intersection(H, RightPart(G)) = M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,F2),xAxis)
process: 试题分析:由题意得\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(2c)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\Rightarrow\frac{(2c)^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}\Rightarrow2ac=c^{2}-a^{2}\Rightarrowe^{2}-2e-1=0,因为e>1,所以e=1+\sqrt{2}

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$M$在$C$上，点$N$在$l$上，且$\overrightarrow{F N}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F M}(\lambda>0)$, 若$|M F|=\frac{4}{3}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;F: Point;N: Point;M: Point;l: Line;lambda:Number;lambda>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, l);VectorOf(F, N) = lambda*VectorOf(F, M);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 4/3
process: 抛物线的C:y2=4x焦点为F(1,0),准线为l:x=-1,设M(m,n),(n<0),由|MF|=\frac{4}{3},可得m+1=\frac{4}{3},解得m=\frac{1}{3},n=-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},即M(\frac{1}{3},-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3})直线MF的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1),令x=-1,可得y=-2\sqrt{3},即N(-1,-2\sqrt{3}),所以\lambda=\frac{|FN|}{|FM|}=\frac{4}{4}=3

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 3 x$，它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{10} x$的焦点重合，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*sqrt(10)*x);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3*x));OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 试题分析:抛物线y^{2}=4\sqrt{10}x的焦点为(\sqrt{10},0)\thereforec=10,渐近线y=\pm3x\therefore\frac{b}{a}=3\becausea^{2+b^{2}}=c^{2}\thereforea^{2}=1,b^{2}=9\thereforex^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点. 则$|A B|$的值等于?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = 1;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}
process: 抛物线焦点为(1,0),且斜率为1.则直线方程为y=x-1,代入抛物线方程y^{2}=4x得x^{2}-6x+1=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=6,根据抛物线的定义可知|AB|=x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}+x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=6+2=8

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 = 8*y)
process: 抛物线x^{2}=8y的焦点坐标为(0,2),双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x.所以焦点到渐近线方程的距离为d=\frac{|\pm\sqrt{3}\times0+2|}{\sqrt{1+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}}=1,

text: 直线$l$的方程为$y=x+3$，在$l$上任取一点$P$，若过点$P$且以双曲线$12 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=3$的焦点作椭圆的焦点，那么具有最短长轴的椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (12*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 3);Expression(l) = (y = x + 3);PointOnCurve(P, l);PointOnCurve(P, H);Focus(G) = Focus(H);WhenMin(MajorAxis(H))

text: 若$A$、$B$分别是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>1)$短轴上的两个顶点，点$P$是椭圆上异于$A$、$B$的任意一点，若直线$A P$与直线$B P$的斜率之积为$-\frac{m}{4}$ ,则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;m > 1;Vertex(MinorAxis(E)) = {A, B};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E) = True;Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B);Slope(LineOf(A, P))*Slope(LineOf(B, P)) = -m/4
process: 设直线AP、BP的方程为y\cdot1=k_{A}x,y+1=k_{B}x点P(x_{0},y_{0}),k_{A}=\frac{y_{0}-1}{x_{0}},k_{B}=\frac{y_{0}+1}{x_{0}}则k_{A}\cdotk_{B}=\frac{y_{0}2-1}{x_{0}^{2}}=-\frac{m}{4}\textcircled{1},又点P在椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1上,y_{0}2-1=-\frac{x^{2}}{m}\textcircled{2},由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}得,m^{2}=4,\becausem>1=2.即离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}的能力,属于中档题

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，若抛物线上一点$P$到$x$轴的距离为$2$，则$P F$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, xAxis) = 2
process: 抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点为F(0,1),准线为y=-1,因为抛物线上一点P到x轴的距离为2,所以由抛物线的定义可得|PF|=2+1=3均答家为:3

text: 直线$l$: $y=k x+2$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$有两个公共点则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=k*x+2);NumIntersection(l,C)=2;k:Number
process: 联立直线l与双曲线C方程:则\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y2=1\\y=kx+2\end{cases},消掉y,可得(1-2k^{2})x^{2}-8kx-10=0,根据直线l与双曲线C有公共点,即可求得答案.联立直线l与双曲线C方程:则\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1\\y=kx+2\end{cases}消掉y可得(1-2k^{2})x^{2}-8kx-10=0\because直线l与双曲线C有公共点,\therefore\begin{cases}1-2k^{2}\neq0\\4=(8k)^{2}+40(1-2k^{2})\end{cases}解得-\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}<k<-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}或-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}<k<\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}与\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$的焦点、实轴端点恰好是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的长轴端点、焦点，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/25+y^2/16=1);Focus(C)=Endpoint(MajorAxis(G));Endpoint(RealAxis(C))=Focus(G)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 px$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点重合，则该抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1的右焦点为(2,0),因此\frac{p}{2}=2,p=4,准线方程为x=-2【考点】椭圆与抛物线的几何性质

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2=0$有交点，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 + 2 = 0);IsIntersect(Asymptote(G),H)
process: 试题分析:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}\cdot\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线与圆x^{2}+y^{2}-4x+2=0有交点(2,0)到渐近线的距离\leqslant半径r.解出即可.由圆x^{2}+y^{2}-4x+2=0化为(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2,得到圆心(2,0),半径r=\sqrt{2}.\because双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}.\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x与圆x^{2}+y^{2}-4x+2=0有交点\frac{|2b|}{2+b^{2}}\leqslant\sqrt{2},化为b^{2}\leqslanta^{2}.\therefore1<e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a}}\leqslant\sqrt{2}.\therefore该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是(1,\sqrt{2}]

text: 已知点$A$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左顶点，点$B$为椭圆上任意一点，$y$轴上有一点$C(0,4)$，则三角形$A B C$的面积的最大值是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;B: Point;PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;PointOnCurve(C, yAxis) = True;C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (0, 4)
process: 因为点A为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的左顶点,所以A(-5,0),所以AC=\sqrt{16+25}=\sqrt{41},AC的方程为4x-5y-20=0,设B(5\cos\theta,3\sin\theta),则点B(5\cos\theta,3\sin\theta)到直线4x-5y-20=0的距离为\frac{|20\cos\theta-15\sin\theta-20|}{\sqrt{41}}=\frac{55\cos(\theta+\phi)-4}{\sqrt{41}}\leqslant\frac{45}{\sqrt{41}},所以三角形ABC的面积的最大值是\frac{1}{2}\times\sqrt{41}\times\frac{45}{\sqrt{41}}=\frac{45}{2},

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1  (m>0)$的一个焦点为$(4 , 0)$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G)=(y^2/9 + x^2/m^2 = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(4,0)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点，$P$是$C$左支上一点，$A(0,6 \sqrt{6})$，当$\triangle A P F$周长最小时，该三角形的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 6*sqrt(6));RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));WhenMin(Perimeter(TriangleOf(A,P,F)))
process: 设双曲线的左焦点为F_{1},由双曲线定义知,|PF|=2a+|PF_{1}|.\therefore\triangleAPF的周长为|PA|+|PF|+|AF|=|PA|+2a+|PF_{1}|+|AF|=|PA|+|PF_{1}|+|AF|+2a,由于2a+|AF|是定值,要使\triangleAPF的周长最小,则|PA|+|PF_{1}|最小,即P、A、F_{1}共线\becauseA(0,6\sqrt{6}),F_{1}(-3,0)\therefore直线AF_{1}的方程为\frac{x}{-3}+\frac{y}{6\sqrt{6}}=1,即x=\frac{y}{2\sqrt{6}}-3代入x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1整理得y2+6\sqrt{6}v-96=0,解得y=2\sqrt{6}或y=-8\sqrt{6}(舍),所以P点的纵坐标为2\sqrt{6},\thereforeS_{APF}=S_{AAFF}-S_{APFF}\frac{1}{3}\times6\times6\sqrt{6}-\frac{1}{2}\times6\times2\sqrt{6}=12\sqrt{6}数答客为:12.16睛】本题考查双曲线中三角形面积的求解,涉及双曲线的定义,属综合中档题

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=-2 p y(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$F(0,-3)$，则直线$y=x$被抛物线截得的弦的中点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, -3);Focus(G) = F;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x)
process: 根据抛物线焦点坐标,可求得抛物线的标准方程.联立抛物线与直线y=x,求得两个交点坐标,即可由中点坐标公式求得弦的中点坐标.由抛物线的焦点坐标可得p=6,故抛物线方程为x^{2}=-12y所以联立方程\begin{cases}y=x\\x^{2}=-12y\end{cases},变形可得x^{2}+12x=0,解得x=0或x=-12,所以两个交点坐标分别为\begin{cases}x=0\\y=0\end{cases}和\begin{cases}x=-12\\y=-12\end{cases}故由中点坐标公式可知弦的中点坐标为(-6,-6)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率$e=2$，则其渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e: Number;e = 2

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$、$P$为抛物线上一点，若$|P F|=3$，则$\triangle O P F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3
process: 由题可得F(1,0),设P(x_{0},y_{0})则由抛物线定义可得|PF|=x_{0}+1=3,解得x_{0}=2,代入抛物线方程可得|y_{0}|=2\sqrt{2}所以S_{\triangleOPF}=\frac{1}{2}\times|OF|\times|y_{1}|=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times2\sqrt{2}=\sqrt{2}.为答安为.^{^{2}}

text: 设$A B$是椭圆$\Gamma$的长轴，点$C$在$\Gamma$上，且$\angle C B A=\frac{\pi}{4}$，若$A B=4$ , $B C=\sqrt{2}$，则$\Gamma$的两个焦点之间的距离为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;MajorAxis(Gamma) = LineSegmentOf(A, B);PointOnCurve(C, Gamma);AngleOf(C, B, A) = pi/4;LineSegmentOf(A, B) = 4;LineSegmentOf(B, C) = sqrt(2);Focus(Gamma) = {F1, F2}

text: 抛物线$x=\frac{1}{4 m} y^{2}$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x = y^2/(4*m))
process: 抛物线标准方程y^{2}=4mx,得焦点坐标为(m,0)

text: 已知圆$M$:$(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=169$，圆$N$:$(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}=9$，动圆$P$和圆$M$相内切，和圆$N$相外切，则动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Circle;Expression(M) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 169);N: Circle;Expression(N) = (y^2 + (x + 4)^2 = 9);P: Circle;IsInTangent(P,M) = True;IsOutTangent(P,N) = True;P1: Point;Center(P) = P1
process: 由M:(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=169,可得圆心M(4,0),半径为r_{1}=13,又由N:(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}=9,可得圆心N(-4,0),半径为r_{2}=3,设动圆的半径为r,因为动圆P和圆M相内切,和圆N相外切,可得|PM|=13-r且|PN|=3+r,且|MN|=8两式相加,可得|PM|+|PN|=16>|MN|=8由椭圆的定义,可得点P的轨迹是以M,N为焦点的椭圆且2a=16,2c=8,所以a=8,c=4,则b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=48所以椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{48}=1'即动圆圆心P的轨迹方程是\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点，$A$、$B$分别是该椭圆的左顶点和上顶点，点$P$在线段$A B$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;UpperVertex(G) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = True
process: 由题可得F_{1}(-\sqrt{3},0),F_{2}(\sqrt{3},0),A(-\sqrt{6},0),B(0,\sqrt{3}),设P(x,y),因为点P在线段AB上,所以,y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x+\sqrt{3},-\sqrt{6}\leqslantx\leqslant0\therefore\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(x+\sqrt{3},y)\cdot(x-\sqrt{3},y)=x^{2}+y^{2}-3=\frac{3}{2}x^{2}+\sqrt{6}x=\frac{3}{2}(x+\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3})^{2}-1'\therefore当_{x}=-\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}时,\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}的最小值为-1

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的两个焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆$C$交于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta F_{2} M N$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;F2: Point;M: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(F1,G);Intersection(G,C) = {M,N}

text: 已知点$A(-1,1)$和椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $M$是椭圆$C$上的动点，$F$是椭圆$C$的右焦点，则$|M A|+2|M F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 1);C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C) = True;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F
process: 根据椭圆方程得e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\therefore\frac{1}{2}|MA|+|MF|=\frac{1}{2}(|MA|+2|MF|)根据椭圆的第二定义:过A作右准线的垂线,交于N点,右准线方程为x=4.则|MA|+2|MF|=|MA|+|MN|\geqslant|AN|\because|AN|=4+1=5.答案为5

text: 方程$16 x^{2}+k y^{2}=16$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(k*y^2 + 16*x^2 = 16);k:Number

text: 双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$有公共焦点，且$C$的一条渐近线方程为$x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (x + sqrt(3)*y = 0)
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1,得a^{2}=9,b^{2}=5c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=2'\therefore双曲线C的焦点为F_{1}(-2,0),F_{2}(2,0),设双曲线的实半轴为a_{1},虚半轴为b_{1},\because渐近线方程为x+\sqrt{3}y=0,即y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x\therefore\frac{b_{1}}{a_{1}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}又c_{1}=c=2,且a_{1}^{2}+b_{1}2=c_{1}^{2}解得a_{1}^{2}=3,b_{1}2=1.\therefore双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))
process: 双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1焦点在x轴上,\therefore渐近线为y=\pm\sqrt{m}x,\therefore\sqrt{m}=2\Rightarrowm=4

text:
过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x,(p>0)$焦点的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=3$，且$A B$中点的
纵坐标为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 3;YCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 1/2

C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, A)) = 1/2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, B))

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2)
process: 将抛物线方程化为标准形式后可得结果由y=\frac{1}{2}x2得x^{2}=2y.所以2p=2,p=1,所以抛物线y=\frac{1}{2}x2的焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{2})为答安头_{1}

text: 点$M(-3,0)$，点$N(3,0)$，动点$P$满足$|P M|=10-|P N|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(N) = (3, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 10 - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N))

text: 椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，直线$x=m$与椭圆$E$交于$A$、$B$两点.当$\Delta F_{1} A B$的周长最大时，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;G: Line;m: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Expression(G) = (x = m);LeftFocus(E) = F1;Intersection(G, E) = {A, B};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F1,A,B)))
process: 设椭圆的右焦点为E,由椭圆的定义得\triangleFAB的周长:AB+AF+BF=AB+(2a-AE)+(2a-BE)=4a+AB-AE-BE,利用三角形两边之和与第3边的关系即可得结果.【详解)设椭圆的右焦点为E.由椭圆的定义得\triangleFAB的周长为:AB+AF+BF=AB+(2a-AE)+(2a-BE)=4a+AB-AE-BE\becauseAE+BE>AB;\thereforeAB-AE-BE\leqslant0,当AB过点E时取等号;\thereforeAB+AF+BF=4a+AB-AE-BE\leqslant4a;即直线x=m过椭圆的右焦点E时\triangleFAB的周长最大;H时直线x=m=c=4

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆方程为$(m-1) x^{2}+(3 m-4) y^{2}=m$，则$m$的范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2*(m - 1) + y^2*(3*m - 4) = m)
process: 当m=0时原方程不为椭圆故(m-1)x^{2}+(3m-4)y^{2}=m\Rightarrow\frac{x^{2}}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{3m-4}=1.又焦点在x轴上,故\begin{cases}\frac{m}{m-1}>0\\\frac{m-4}{3m-4}>0\\\frac{m}{m}>\frac{m}{2m-4}\end{cases}解得m<0或m>\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$，过椭圆中心的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点 ($A$在第一象限)，过$A$作$x$轴垂线交椭圆于点$C$，过$A$作直线$A P$垂直$A B$交椭圆于点$P$，连接$B P$交$A C$于点$Q$，则$\frac{A Q}{Q C}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;e: Number;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/2;PointOnCurve(Center(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(A, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = C;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, P));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, P), LineSegmentOf(A, B));Intersection(LineOf(A, P), G) = P;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B, P), LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = Q
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/25 = 1)

text: 已知$A(2,1)$, $B(2,-1)$ , $O$为坐标原点，动点$P(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{O P}=m \overrightarrow{O A}+n \overrightarrow{O B}$，其中$m, n \in \mathbf{R}$，且$m^{2}+n^{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;x1:Number;y1:Number;m:Real;n:Real;Coordinate(A) = (2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, -1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);VectorOf(O, P) = m*VectorOf(O, A) + n*VectorOf(O, B);m^2 + n^2 = 1/2
process: 设动点P(x,y),根据向量间的关系得到x=2m+2n,y=m-n,代入m^{2}+n^{2}=\frac{1}{2}化简可得动点P的轨迹方程.设动点P(x,y),则\because点P满足\overrightarrow{OP}=m\overrightarrow{OA}+n\overrightarrow{OB},其中m、n\inR\therefore(x,y)=(2m+2n,m-n),\thereforex=2m+2n,y=m-n,\thereforem=\frac{x+2y}{4},n=\frac{x-2y}{4},\becausem^{2}+n^{2}=\frac{1}{2},\therefore(\frac{x+2y}{4})^{2}+(\frac{x-2y}{4})y^{2}1,即\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$ ,$F_{2}$，点$P$在双曲线上且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) ={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1,P,F2)=ApplyUnit(60,degree)
process: 因为|F_{1}F_{2}^{2}|=|PF_{1}^{2}|+|PF_{2}|-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=(|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|)^{2}+2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\cos\angleF_{1}PF_{2},所以4(4+1)=(2\times2)^{2}+2|PF_{1}|_{PF_{2}}|-2|PF_{1}|PF_{2}|\cos\frac{\pi}{3}\therefore|PF_{1}|PF_{2}|=4,S_{\DeltaPF_{1}}F_{2}=\frac{1}{2}\times4\times\sin\frac{\pi}{3}=\sqrt{3}1本题考查双曲线定义以及焦点三角形,考查基本分析求解能力,属中档题.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点重合，左准线方程为$x=-1$，设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$的左、右两个焦点，$P$为右支上任意一点，则$\frac{P F_{1}^{2}}{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(C)=Focus(G);Expression(LeftDirectrix(C))=(x=-1);P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C))

text: 已知圆$C$的方程$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$,$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点，过$P$作圆的两条切线，切点为$A$、$B$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentPoint(L1, C) = A;TangentPoint(L2, C) = B;A: Point;B: Point;TangentOfPoint(P, C) = {L1, L2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦距为$2 \sqrt{5}$，且双曲线的实轴长是虚轴长的$2$倍，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(5);Length(RealAxis(G)) = 2*Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/4 = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>9)$长轴的一个顶点到直线$x-\sqrt{3} y=0$的距离不小于$2$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;a>9;H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - sqrt(3)*y = 0);Negation(Distance(OneOf(Vertex(MajorAxis(G))),H) < 2)
process: 长轴的顶点为(\pm\sqrt{a},0),故\underline{|\sqrt{a}-0|}\geqslant2^{即a\geqslant16}故离心率e=\sqrt{\frac{a-9}{a}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{9}{a}}\in\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4},1

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$作直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=\frac{25}{12}$,  $| A F|<| B F |$, 则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 25/12;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) < Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$一个焦点坐标为$(m, 0)  (m>0)$，且点$P(m, 2m)$ 在双曲线上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (m, 0);Coordinate(P) = (m, 2*m);PointOnCurve(P, G);m:Number;m>0

text: 如果双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{7}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦点在$x$轴上，焦距为$8$，那么实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/7 - y^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 8
process: 由题意,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{7}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的焦点在x轴上,焦距为8可得m>0且7+m=4^{2},解得m=9.

text: 设过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上任意一点$P$(异于原点$O$) 的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$O P$与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$的另一个交点为$Q$，则$\frac{S_{\triangle A B Q}}{S_{\triangle A B O}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;P: Point;O: Origin;Negation(P=O);PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H);Z: Parabola;Expression(Z) = (y^2 = 8*p*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, Z)={A, B};Q: Point;Intersection(LineOf(O,P), Z)={P, Q}
process: 分析:画出图形,将三角形的面积比转化为线段的长度比,之后转化为坐标比,设出点的坐标,写出直线的方程,联立方程组,求得交点的坐标,最后将坐标代入,求得比值,详画出对应的图就可以发现,\frac{S_{AABQ}}{S_{AABO}}=\frac{PQ}{OP}=\frac{x_{Q}-x_{P}}{x_{P}}=\frac{y_{Q}}{y_{P}}-1设P(\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{2p},y_{1})则直线^{OP:y=\frac{y_{1}}{y_{1}^{2}}x},即y=\frac{2p}{y_{1}}x,与y^{2}=8px联立,可求得y_{O}=4y_{1}从而得到面积比为\frac{4y}{y}-1=3,故答案是3.

text: $P$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$右支上一点,直线$l$是双曲线$C$的一条渐近线,$P$在$l$上的射影为$Q$、$F_{1}$是双曲线$C$的左焦点,则$|P F_{1}|+|P Q|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));OneOf(Asymptote(C))=l;Projection(P,l)=Q;LeftFocus(C)=F1
process: 依题意知,当且仅当Q,P,F_{2}三点共线,且P在F_{2},Q之间时,|PF_{2}|+|PQ|最小,且小值为F_{2}到直线l的距离,从而可求|PF_{1}|+|PQ|的最小值设F_{2}为双曲线C的右焦点,因为|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=4,所以|PF_{1}|+|PQ|=4+|PF_{2}|+|PQ|,显然且仅当Q,P,F_{2}三点共线,且P在F_{2},Q之间时,|PF_{2}|+|PQ|最小,且最小值为F_{2}到直线l的距离,可得l的方程为y=\frac{1}{2}x或y=-\frac{1}{2}x,F_{2}(\sqrt{5},0),可得F_{2}到直线l的距离为1,故|PF_{1}|+|PQ|的最小值为5,故答案:5.

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线的焦点为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)
process: \because双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)的一条渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x\thereforeb=\sqrt{3},\thereforec=2.\therefore双曲线的焦点为(\pm2,0)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右顶点为$A$，右焦点为$F$，过点$F$平行于双曲线的一条渐近线的直线与双曲线交于点$B$，则$\triangle A F B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);A: Point;RightVertex(G) = A;RightFocus(G) = F;F: Point;PointOnCurve(F, H) = True;IsParallel(H, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = True;H: Line;Intersection(H, G) = B;B: Point
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1的右顶点A(3,0),右焦点F(5,0)a=3,b=4,c=5,所以渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x,不妨设直线FB的方程为y=\frac{4}{3}(x-5),将y=\frac{4}{3}(x-5)代入双曲线方程整理,得x^{2}-(x-5)^{2}=9解得x=\frac{17}{5}=-\frac{32}{15}所以B(\frac{17}{5},-\frac{32}{15}),所以S_{\triangleAFB}=\frac{15}{2}|AF||y_{B}|=\frac{1}{2}(c-a)|y_{B}|=\frac{1}{2}\times(5-3)\times\frac{32}{15}=\frac{32}{15}.

text: 椭圆中心在原点，且经过定点$(2,-3)$，其一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点重合，则该椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;Center(H) = O;H: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(I, H);I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (2, -3);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(H)) = Focus(G)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{k+8}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Number;e: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 8) + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/3

text: 动点$P(x, y)$到点$F(3,0)$的距离比它到直线$x+2=0$的距离大$1$，则动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;P: Point;F: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(G) = (x + 2 = 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G) + 1
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 3*y^2 = 1)

text: 经过点$M(2 \sqrt{3} , 2 \sqrt{5})$且与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同渐近线的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (2*sqrt(3), 2*sqrt(5));Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(M,C)
process: 设所求双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=\lambda(2\neq0),又双曲线过点M(2\sqrt{3},2\sqrt{5}),所以\frac{12}{3}-\frac{20}{2}=-6=\lambda,所以双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{12}-\frac{x^{2}}{18}=1

text: 已知$M$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点，$F$为抛物线焦点，过点$M$作准线$l$的垂线，垂足为$E$. 若$|E O|=|M F|$，点$M$的横坐标为$3$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;E: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;l: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = F;L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L, l);FootPoint(L, l)=E;Abs(LineSegmentOf(E, O)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));XCoordinate(M) = 3;Directrix(G)=l
process: 根据题意,可知M(3,\pm\sqrt{6p}),E(-\frac{p}{2}.\pm\sqrt{6p})\sqrt{(-\frac{P)^{2}}{2}+(\pm\sqrt{6p})^{2}}=3+\frac{p}{2},解得:p=3.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$的两条渐近线互相垂直，那么该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 - y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};IsPerpendicular(l1, l2)
process: 由双曲线方程可得渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x,由于两条渐近线互相垂直,可得-\frac{a}{b}\times\frac{a}{a}=-1,解得a=b,根据e=\sqrt{1+\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}}即可得结果.[详解]由双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1,可得渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x\because两条渐近线互相垂直,\therefore-\frac{a}{b}\times\frac{a}{a}=-1,解得a=b.该双曲线的离心率e=\sqrt{1+\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}}=\sqrt{2},

text: 如果双曲线$5 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=20$上的一点$P$到双曲线右焦点的距离是$3$，那么$P$点到左准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (5*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 20);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Distance(P, RightFocus(G)) = 3

text: 设$F(0,-3)$是椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，点$A(0,2)$，若椭圆上存在点$P$满足$|P A|+|P F|=9$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, -3);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 9
process: 设椭圆的上焦点E(0,3),由椭圆的定义可知|PE|+|PF|=2a,又|PA|+|PF|=9,所以|PA|-|PE||=|2a-9|,又|EA|=1,所以|2a-9|\leqslant1,得4\leqslanta\leqslant5,以椭圆的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}\in[\frac{3}{5}\frac{3}{4}]睛】本题考查椭圆的定义和几何性质,涉及圆锥曲线上的点与焦点的距离问题往往利用定义解决

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的中心为顶点，以椭圆的左准线为准线的抛物线与椭圆右准线交于$A$、$B$两点,则$|A B|$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);G: Parabola;Center(H) = Vertex(G);LeftDirectrix(H) = Directrix(G);Intersection(G,RightDirectrix(H)) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/5 = 1)
process: 根据双曲线的简单几何性质计算可得.因为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1所以a=1,b^{2}=5,\thereforec=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{6},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{6}

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点为焦点，离心率为$2$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2
process: 椭圆\frac{x2}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的焦点坐标为(\pm4,0)因为双曲线的焦点与椭圆的焦点重合,所以c=4又因为双曲线的离心率为2,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=2,解得a=2所以b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=16-4=12,即b=2\sqrt{3}所以双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 设$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的点,$P$到该椭圆左焦点的距离为$2$则$P$到右焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = 2
process: 根据椭圆的定义,求得P到右焦点的距离依题意a=5,而P到该椭圆左焦点的距离为2,则P到右焦点的距离为5\times2-2=8

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$过$P(-\sqrt{2},-\sqrt{3})$ , $Q(\frac{\sqrt{15}}{3}, \sqrt{2})$两点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是它的左、右两个焦点，且$M$在此双曲线上，若$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} M F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (-sqrt(2), -sqrt(3));Coordinate(Q) = (sqrt(15)/3, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(P,C);PointOnCurve(Q,C);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M,C);AngleOf(F1, M, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 由双曲线方程可知2a=4,2c=2\sqrt{5}\therefore|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=20,由双曲线定义有||PF|-|PF_{2}||=4,两边平方得|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=16\textcircled{1}由余弦定理,有|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=|PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\cos60\therefore|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=20\textcircled{2},由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}可得|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=20-16=4,\thereforeS_{\DeltaF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}|_{PF_{2}}|\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}\times4\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\sqrt{3}

text: 双曲线$C_{1}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{1}$作一条直线$l$交双曲线右支于点$P$ , $PF_{2} \perp x$轴，且$\sin \angle PF_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;Expression(C1) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C1) = F1;RightFocus(C1) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l) = True;Intersection(l, RightPart(C1)) = P;l: Line;P: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F2), xAxis) = True;Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 1/3
process: 利用已知条件,列出方程,求解双曲线的离心率即可.[详解]由已知PF_{2}\botx轴,且\sin\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{1}{3},可得\tan\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}在APF_{1}F_{2}中,\tan\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{a}{2c}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}2e^{2}-\sqrt{2}e-2=0,解得e=\sqrt{2}

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上任一点，那点$P$到直线$l$: $x+2 y-12=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x + 2*y - 12 = 0)
process: 试题分析:过椭圆上任意点作1的平行线r',当r与椭圆相切时,则点P到直线l:x+2y-12=0的距离的最值等于l到l的距离,设l的方程为x+2y+c=0,联立\begin{cases}\frac{x2}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\\x+2y+c=0\end{cases},将直线代入椭圆,得4x^{2}-2cx+c^{2}-12=0,由4=0,得c=\pm4;所以l到l的距离d=\frac{|-12-c|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}}}=\frac{16\sqrt{5}}{5}或\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知定点$A(0,-2)$，点$B$在圆$C$:$ x^{2}+y^{2}-4 y-32=0$上运动，$C$为圆心，线段$A B$的垂直平分线交$B C$于点$P$，则动点$P$的轨迹$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = (-4*y + x^2 + y^2 - 32 = 0);B: Point;PointOnCurve(B, C1);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, -2);C: Point;Center(C1) = C;P: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = P;Locus(P) = E;E: Curve
process: 由题意,得|PA|=|PB|,\therefore|PA|+|PC|=|PB|+|PC|=r=6>|AC|=4,\therefore点P的轨迹E是以A,C的焦点的椭圆,其中c=2,a=3,\thereforeb=\sqrt{5},\therefore椭圆方程为\frac{y^{2}}{9}+\frac{x^{2}}{5}=1

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于点$P$、$F_{2}$为右焦点，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Z: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = P;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A B}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$ ,则$\frac{1}{|A F|}+\frac{1}{|B F|}$=?$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(E) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};VectorOf(A,B) = 3*VectorOf(F,B)
process: \textcircled{1}依题意可知抛物线E中,p=4,直线l过焦点F(2,0),设点A(x_{1}y_{1}),B(x_{2}y_{2})由抛物线过焦点弦的性质知,x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4}=4,|AF|=x_{1}+2,|BF|=x_{2}+2,\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=\frac{1}{x_{1}+2}+\frac{1}{x_{2}+2}=\frac{x_{1}+2+x_{2}+2}{x_{1}x_{2}+2(x_{1}+x_{2})+4}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+4}{2(x_{1}+x_{2})+8}=\frac{1}{2}\textcircled{2}如图,过点A,B作抛物线准线l的垂线,垂足分别为M,N,由抛物线定义及\overrightarrow{AB}=3\overrightarrow{FB}知,|AM|=|AF|=2|FB|=2|BN|,直角梯形AMNB中过B作BC\botAM于C,|MC|=|BN|=|BF|\cos\angleMAB=\frac{|AC|}{|AB|}=\frac{|AM|-|MC|}{AB}=\frac{|BF|}{3|BF}=\frac{1}{3},直线l的倾斜角\alpha有\cos\alpha=\pm\frac{1}{2},斜率k=\tan\alpha=\pm2\sqrt{2}l的方程为y=\pm2\sqrt{2}(x-2),即2\sqrt{2}x-y-4\sqrt{2}=0和2\sqrt{2}x+y-4\sqrt{2}=0

text: 过点$M(1,2)$作直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，若点$M$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 2);l: Line;PointOnCurve(M, l);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 抛物线$y=a x^{2}$的准线方程是$y=2$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 2)

text: 已知$M$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{7}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的一点，$O$是坐标原点，若$2 M O=F_{1} F_{2}$，则$\triangle F_{1} MF_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2/7 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};2*LineSegmentOf(M, O) = LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)

G: Circle;C:Circle;H: Curve;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(H)=(sqrt((x+4)^2+y^2)+sqrt((x-4)^2+y^2)=12);Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x + 4)^2 = 4);Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,H);PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, C)
process: 方程\sqrt{(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}}x-4)^{2}+y^{2}的曲线是椭圆,M、N所在圆的圆心是椭圆的焦点由椭圆的定义和圆的性质可求得最小值方程\sqrt{(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}}+\sqrt{(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}}=12表示的曲线是椭圆,焦点为F_{1}(-4,0),F_{2}(4,0),圆F_{1}半径为R=2,圆F_{2}的半径为r=1,|PM|+|PN|\geqslant|PF_{1}|-R+|PF_{2}|-r=(|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|)-(2+1)=12-3=9,当且仅当P,M,F_{共线,P,N,F_{2}共线,且M在P,F_{1}之间时等号成立.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1 , m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$A M$垂直，则实数$a$=?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, m);m: Number;PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/a = 1);a: Real;A: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M))
process: 根据抛物线的定义得1+\frac{p}{2}=5,代入解得p=8,故y^{2}=16x,代入M(1,m),解得m=\pm4,不妨取M(1,4),又A(-1,0),则直线AM的斜率为2由双曲线x_{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1知其渐近线y=\pm\sqrt{a}x由已知得-\sqrt{a}\times2=-1,解得a=\frac{1}{4}

text: 已知直线$x-y=2$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，那么线段$AB$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - y = 2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 双曲线$8 x^{2}-y^{2}=8$的右焦点到右准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (8*x^2 - y^2 = 8)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 a x  (a \neq 0)$的准线与圆$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=16$相切，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Real;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(a*x));Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 16);IsTangent(Directrix(G),H);Negation(a=0)

text: 过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右顶点作$x$轴的垂线与$C$的一条渐近线相交于$A$. 若以$C$的右焦点为圆心、半径为$4$的圆经过$A$、$O$两点（$O$为坐标原点），则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;O:Origin;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);L:Line;PointOnCurve(RightVertex(C),L);IsPerpendicular(xAxis,L);Intersection(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=A;RightFocus(C)=Center(G);Radius(G)=4;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(O,G)
process: \because以C的的右焦点为圆心、半径为4的圆经过A、O两点(O为坐标原点),\therefore半径为r=4,圆心为(4,0),可得圆的标准方程为(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=16,B(a,0),y=\frac{b}{a}\cdota=b,求得A(a,b),所以a^{2}-8a+16+b^{2}=16,即c^{2}-8a=0,即8a=16,则a=2,b^{2}=16-4=12,则双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1,

text: 如果方程$\frac{x^{2}}{a-6}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$表示双曲线，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(a-6) + y^2/a^2 = 1);a: Real
process: 由方程表示双曲线,知:\begin{cases}a-6<0\\a\neq0\end{cases}\thereforea\in(-\infty,0)\cup(0,6).

text: 过焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$向其准线作垂线，垂足为$Q$，若$\angle QPF=120^{\circ}$，则$|PF|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Q: Point;P: Point;F: Point;H:Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(P,H);IsPerpendicular(H,Directrix(G));FootPoint(H,Directrix(G))=Q;AngleOf(Q, P, F) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 试题分析:由题意得可知,抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点为F(1,0),抛物线y^{2}=4x的准线方程为x=-1,不妨设P(m,n),(m,n均为正数),则4m=n^{2},所以|PQ|=1+m,|FQ|=\sqrt{2^{2}+n^{2}},由抛物线的定义可知,|PF|=|PQ|=1+m,所以AQPF为等腰三角形,又\angleQPF=120^{\circ},所以\frac{1}{2}|PQ|=|PF|\sin60^{\circ},即\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{2^{2}+n^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}(1+m)'化简3m+2n-1=0,解得m=\frac{1}{3}或m=0(舍去),所以|PF|=\frac{4}{3}.

text: 设$A$、$B$为在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>a>0)$上两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$O A \perp O B$，则$\triangle A O B$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;b > a;a > 0;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B))

text: 设$O$和$F$分别为抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$的顶点和焦点，过$F$的动直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，那么$S_{\triangle O A B}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: O: Point;Vertex(G)=O;F: Point;Focus(G) =F;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);H: Line;PointOnCurve(F,H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H,G) = {A, B}
process: 由题意可得F(0,\frac{1}{2})且直线l的斜率一定存在,设过F点的直线的方程为y=kx+\frac{1}{2},A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立方程\begin{cases}y=\frac{1}{2}x^{2}\\y=kx+\frac{1}{2}\end{cases}消去y得x^{2}-2kx-1=0所以x_{1}+x_{2}=2k,x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=-1,故|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{4k^{2}+4}=2+2k^{2}原点O到直线y=kx+\frac{1}{2}的距离d=\frac{\frac{1}{2}}{\sqrt{1+}}所以S_{\triangleOAB}=\frac{1}{2}|AB\cdotd=\frac{\sqrt{1+k^{2}}}{2}故当k=0时,S_{\triangleOAB}有最小值\frac{1}{2}.

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$有相同的焦点且以$y=\pm \frac{4}{3} x$为渐近线的双曲线方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/49 + y^2/24 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(y=pm*(4/3)*x)
process: 试题分析:\because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1的焦点为(5,0)(-5,0),故双曲线中的c=5,且满足\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3},a^{2}+b^{2}=25,\thereforea^{2}=9,b^{2}=16,所求双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1.

text: 直线$l$与椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$O P \perp O Q$($O$为坐标原点），则以$O$点为圆心且与直线$l$相切的圆方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Ellipse;H: Circle;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(Gamma)=(x^2/4+y^2/2=1);Intersection(l,Gamma) = {P, Q};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(O, Q));Center(H)=O;IsTangent(l,H)
process: 分析:将直线直线l特殊为:x=t,从而得P,Q坐标,由OP\botOQ求解即可.详直线l与椭圆r:\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1相交于P,Q两点,若OP\botOQ(O为坐标原点)不妨设直线l为:x=t.则有:P(t,\sqrt{21-\frac{1}{4})}由OP\botOQ,可得t^{2}-2(1-\frac{t^{2}}{4})=0,解得t^{2}=\frac{4}{3}所以此时l为:x=\pm\sqrt{\frac{4}{3}}.则以O点为圆心且与直线l相切的x^{2}+y2=\frac{4}{3}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$和$A(1,2)$，点$P$为抛物线上的动点，则$\triangle P A F$的周长取到最小值时点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;F: Point;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;WhenMin(Perimeter(TriangleOf(P,A,F))) = True
process: 抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点为F(2,0),点A(1,2)求\trianglePAF周长的最小值,即求|PA|+|PF|的最小值.设点P在准线上的射影为D,根据抛物线的定义,可知|PF|=|PD|因此,|PA|+|PF|的最小值,即|PA|+|PD|的最小值根据平面几何知识,可得当D,P,A三点共线时|PA|+|PD|最小P的纵坐标为:2,可得4=8x,解得x=\frac{1}{2}.则\trianglePAF的周长取到最小值时点P的坐标为(\frac{1}{2},2)

text: 直线$y=x+m$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=\frac{8}{3} \sqrt{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;m: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = m + x);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = sqrt(2)*(8/3)
process: 联立直线与双曲线可得:3x^{2}-2mx-m^{2}-4=0,则\triangle=16m^{2}+48>0,所以x_{A}+x_{B}=\frac{2m}{3},x_{A}x_{B}=-\frac{m2+4}{3},而|AB|=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{(x_{A}+x_{B})^{2}-4x_{A}x_{B}}=\sqrt{2}\times\frac{4\sqrt{m^{2}+3}}{3}=\frac{8}{3}\sqrt{2},可得m=\pm1

text: 动点$P$到直线$x+4=0$的距离减去它到点$M(2,0)$的距离之差等于$2$, 则点$P$的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x + 4 = 0);Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);Distance(P, G)-Distance(P, M)=2

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{2}$，则抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点到$C$的渐近线距离是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}+n y^{2}=1(n \in R)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的焦点，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (n*y^2 + x^2 = 1);n: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m+9}=1$的离心率是$\frac{1}{2}$，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/(m + 9) = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线的方程为$y=\pm 2 \sqrt{2} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*2*sqrt(2)*x)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的离心率\frac{c}{a}=e,\because\frac{b}{a}=2\sqrt{2}则\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=9,\therefore\frac{c}{a}=e=3

text: 设双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的虚轴长为$2$，焦距为$2 \sqrt{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))=2;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(3)
process: 分析:由题意首先求得双曲线的方程,然后求解渐近线方程即可详由题意可得:2b=2,\thereforeb=1,由焦距可得:2c=2\sqrt{3},\thereforec=\sqrt{3}据此可知:a=\sqrt{c^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{2},双曲线方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{2}}{1}=1'则渐近线方程满足:\frac{y^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{2}}{1}=0,据此计算可得渐近线方程为:y=\pm\sqrt{2}x.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$与直线$x+2 y-2=0$交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=\sqrt{5}$，且$A B$中点的坐标为$(m, \frac{1}{2})$，则此椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (m, 1/2);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = sqrt(5);m:Number

text: 写出一个渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$且焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线标准方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Inclination(Asymptote(G))=ApplyUnit(60,degree);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),yAxis)
process: 如\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1,焦点在y轴上,令\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=0,得渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x其中y=\sqrt{3}x的倾斜角为60^{\circ}

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，$C$的准线与$x$轴交于点$T$、$P$、$Q$是$C$上的两点，直线$T P$与$C$相切，$\overrightarrow{T P}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F Q}(\lambda>0)$，则$\lambda$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;lambda:Number;T: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C),xAxis)=T;PointOnCurve(P,C);PointOnCurve(Q,C);IsTangent(LineOf(T,P),C);VectorOf(T, P) = lambda*VectorOf(F, Q);lambda>0
process: 由题意得T(-\frac{p}{2},0),F(\frac{p}{2},0),对于y^{2}=2px.不妨设y>0,则y=\sqrt{2px},求导得y=\sqrt{\frac{P}{2x}},设P(x_{0},y_{0}),且y_{0}>0,则直线TP的方程为y-\sqrt{2}px_{0}=\sqrt{\frac{P}{2x_{0}}}(x-x_{0})因为点T(-\frac{p}{2},0)在直线TP上,所以-\sqrt{2px_{0}}=\sqrt{\frac{p}{2x_{0}}}(-\frac{p}{2}-x_{0}),得x_{0}=\frac{p}{2}则y_{0}=p,所以P(\frac{p}{2},p),\overrightarrow{TP}=(p,p)设Q(x_{1},y_{1}),则\overrightarrow{FQ}=(x_{1}-\frac{p}{2},y_{1},因为\overrightarrow{TP}=\overrightarrow{ZF}所以(p,p)=\lambda(x_{1}-\frac{p}{2},y_{1}),所以\begin{cases}\lambda(x_{1}-\frac{p}{2})=p\\\lambday_{1}=p\end{cases}代入y^{2}=2px,得\lambda^{2}+2\lambda-1=0,得\lambda=-\sqrt{2}-1(舍)或\lambda=\sqrt{2}-1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1知,a2=8,b^{2}=4,c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=4右焦点坐标为(2,0),又抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点坐标为(\frac{p}{2},0),即有\frac{p}{3}=2,解得p=4.青】本题主要考查抛物线和椭圆的性质的应用,由标准方程求佳点坐标

text: 设双曲线$C$经过点$(1,3)$，且与$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$具有相同渐近线，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (1, 3);PointOnCurve(G, C);D:Curve;Expression(D)=(y^2/3-x^2=1);Asymptote(D)=Asymptote(C)
process: \because双曲线C经过点(1,3),且与\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1具有相同渐近线,\therefore设双曲线C的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=\lambda,(\lambda\neq0),把点(1,3)代入,得:\frac{9}{3}-1=\lambda,解得\lambda=2,\therefore双曲线C的方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{6}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}=1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$过点$(2 ,-4)$，则$p$的值为?此抛物线的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(H) = (2, -4);PointOnCurve(H, G)
