fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/m = 1);Length(RealAxis(G))=10

text: 设抛物线的顶点在原点，准线方程为$x=-2$, 则抛物线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x =-2)

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$上的点$(m, 3)$到焦点的距离为$5$, 则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));p: Number;p>0;H: Point;m: Number;Coordinate(H) = (m, 3);PointOnCurve(H, G);Distance(H, Focus(G)) = 5
process: 因为抛物线x^{2}=2py(p>0)的准线方程为:y=-\frac{p}{2},根据抛物线的定义可知:3-(-\frac{p}{2})=5\Rightarrowp=4.

fact_expressions: M: Circle;C1:Circle;C2:Circle;Expression(C1)=((x+2)^2+y^2=1);Expression(C2)=((x-2)^2+y^2=4);IsOutTangent(M,C1);IsOutTangent(M,C2)
process: 由题意,圆C_{1}:(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=1,圆C_{2}:(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4都外切,可得两圆的圆心分别是C_{1}(-2,0)、C_{2}(2,0),半径分别为1和2.设所求圆的圆心坐标M(x,y),半径为r因为所求圆与两个圆都外切,所以(|MC_{1}|=r+1两式相减得|MC_{2}|-|MC_{1}|=1|MC_{2}|=r+:根据双曲线定义可知M点的轨迹为以C_{1},C_{2}为焦点的双曲线中的一支故有2a=1c=2,即a=\frac{1}{2},则b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=\sqrt{4-\frac{1}{4}}=\sqrt{\frac{15}{4}}故圆心M的轨迹方程是4x^{2}-\frac{4y^{2}}{15}=1(x\leqslant-\frac{1}{2})

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且倾斜角为$\frac{3}{4} \pi$的直线交抛物线于$P$、$Q$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O P Q$的面积等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Inclination(H)=(3/4)*pi;Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $5 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=m^{2}$的左、右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点，且满足$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=7 \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$($O$是坐标原点），则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;m: Number;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (5*x^2 - 4*y^2 = m^2);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, l);Intersection(l, RightPart(C)) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F2) = 7*VectorOf(F2, B)
process: 如图,设双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的左右焦点分别为F_{1},F_{2},点M在双曲线的右支上连接MF_{2},过点M作右准线x=\frac{a2}{c}的垂线MN,记\angleMF_{2}x=\theta则由双曲线的第二定义知,\frac{MF_{2}}{MN}=\frac{c}{a},其中e=\frac{c}{a}.即\frac{MF_{2}}{c-\frac{a^{2}}{c}+MF_{2}\cos\theta}=e,整理得,MF_{2}=\frac{\frac{b^{2}}{a}}{1-e\cos\theta}由双曲线C:5x^{2}-4y^{2}=m^{2},得\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{m^{2}}{4}}=所以a^{2}=\frac{m^{2}}{5},b^{2}=\frac{m^{2}}{4},离心率e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{3}{2}由题设直线l的倾斜角为\theta,由\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}=7\overrightarrow{F_{2}B},知AF_{2}=7BF_{2}所以\frac{b^{2}}{1-e\cos\theta}=7\times\frac{b^{2}}{1-e\cos(\pi-\theta)},或\_\frac{b^{2}}{1-e\cos(\pi-\theta)}=7\times\frac{b^{2}}{1-e\cos\theta}把e=\frac{3}{2}代入,可求得\theta=60^{\circ}或\theta=120^{\circ}故直线l的斜率为\sqrt{3}或-\sqrt{3}

text: 设$F$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点，$C$上的一个动点到$F$的最大距离为$d$，若$C$的右准线上存在点$P$，使得$PF=d$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;K: Point;PointOnCurve(K, C);d: Number;Max(Distance(K, F)) = d;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightDirectrix(C));LineSegmentOf(P, F) = d

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的一点$P$到焦点$F_{1}$的距离为$2$, $M$是线段$P F_{1}$的中点,$O$为原点, 则$|O M|$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;F1: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;Distance(P, F1) = 2;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;O: Origin
process: 试题分析:\because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1中,a=5,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=10,结合|PF_{1}|=2=2,得|PF_{2}|=8,\becauseOM是\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的中位线,\therefore|OM|=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times8=4

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;n: Number;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = (4/3)*x);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，在双曲线的右支上存在一点$P$，使得$|P F_{1}|=3| P F_{2} |$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
F1: Point;F2: Point;M: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2)) = 6;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2)) = 10
process: 直接由椭圆的定义可得解动点M满足|MF_{1}|+|MF_{2}|=10>6=|F_{1}F_{2}|所以点M的轨迹是以F,F_{2}为焦点的椭圆.

text: 已知$M$、$N$是过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$的交点，$O$是坐标原点，且满足$\overrightarrow{M F}=4 \overrightarrow{F N}$, $S_{\triangle O M N}=\sqrt{3}|M N|$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Intersection(l,C)={M,N};VectorOf(M, F) = 4*VectorOf(F, N);Area(TriangleOf(O,M,N))=sqrt(3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,N))
process: 不妨设直线MN的斜率k>0.如图,过M,N作抛物线准线的垂线,垂足分别为G,H过N作NK\botMG于K,交x轴于P,过M作MQ\botx轴于Q.由\overrightarrow{MF}=4\overrightarrow{FN},得|MF|=4|FN|,设|FN|=m,则|MF|=4m,|MN|=5m,由抛物线定义知,\therefore|MG|=|MF|=4m,且|NH|=|FN|=m,\therefore|MK|=|MG|-|KG|=3m,\therefore|NK|=\sqrt{|MN|^{2}-|MK|^{2}}=4m,由S_{\DeltaOMN}=S_{\DeltaOMF}+S_{\DeltaONF}=\frac{1}{2}|OF|\cdot(|MQ|+|NP|)=\frac{1}{2}|OF|\cdot|NK|=\frac{1}{2}\cdot\frac{p}{2}\cdot4m=pm又S_{\DeltaOMN}=\sqrt{3}|MN|=5\sqrt{3}m,所以pm=5\sqrt{3}m,\thereforep=5\sqrt{3}.

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4)
process: 由y=\frac{1}{4}x2得:x^{2}=4y,所以2p=4,即:\frac{p}{2}=1所以抛物线y=\frac{1}{4}x2的准线方程为:y=-\frac{p}{2}=睛)本题主要考查了抛物线的简单性质,属于基础题

text: 斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，点$M(1,1)$为线段$A B$的中点，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;B: Point;A: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = M;k:Number;Slope(l)=k

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$P$、$Q$两点. 若$\triangle P F_{2} Q$的内切圆与线段$P F_{2}$在其中点处相切，与$P Q$相切于点$F_{1}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;L: Line;F2: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1,L);Intersection(L, G) = {P, Q};TangentPoint(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P,F2,Q)),LineSegmentOf(P,F2))=MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F2));TangentPoint(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P,F2,Q)),LineSegmentOf(P,Q))=F1
process: 可设\trianglePF_{2}Q的内切圆的圆心为I,M为切点,且为PF_{2}中点,可得\trianglePF_{2}Q为等腰三角形(|QP|=|QF_{2}|),设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,可得m+n=2a,由切线的性质可得m=\frac{1}{2}n,解得m=\frac{2a}{3},n=\frac{4a}{3},设|QF_{1}|=t,|QF_{2}|=2a-t,由|QF_{1}|=t=|QP|-|PF_{1}|=2a-t-\frac{2a}{3},解得t=\frac{2a}{3},则\trianglePF_{2}Q为等边三角形,即有_{2c}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\times\frac{4a}{3}即有_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ ,$ F(\sqrt{2}, 0)$为其右焦点，过$F$垂直于$x$轴的直线与椭圆相交所得的弦长为$2$，则椭圆$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (sqrt(2), 0);RightFocus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);IsPerpendicular(G, xAxis);Length(InterceptChord(G, C)) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$、$P$为$C$任意一点，其中直线$P A_{1}$的斜率范围为$[-2,-1]$，则直线$P A_{2}$的斜率范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);A1: Point;A2: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A1;RightVertex(C) = A2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;Range(Slope(LineOf(P, A1))) = [-2, -1]

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$是$C$上在第一象限的点，点$Q(x_{0}, y_{0})$满足$b x_{0}+a y_{0}=0$，且线段$O P$，$Q F$互相垂直平分，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;O: Origin;Q: Point;F: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(Q) = (x0, y0);RightFocus(C) = F;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, C);a*y0 + b*x0 = 0;PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = LineSegmentOf(Q, F);PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = LineSegmentOf(O, P)
process: 由于线段OP,QF互相垂直平分故|QO|=|FO|=c,即x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=c^{2}又bx_{0}+ay_{0}=0解得x_{0}=-a,y_{0}=b\thereforeQ(-a,b)故QF的中点坐标为(\frac{c-a}{2},\frac{b}{2}),从而P(c-a,b)代入C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)中,有\frac{(c-a)^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(b)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1可得c=(\sqrt{2}+1)a,即e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}+1.

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 2 y=0$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (3*x + pm*2*y = 0)
process: 由渐近线方程为3x\pm2y=0,可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{2}\therefore\frac{3}{a}=\frac{3}{2}\thereforea=2.

text: 已知过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且斜率为$-1$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Slope(l) = -1;l: Line;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的一个焦点重合，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(H) = OneOf(Focus(G))
process: \because抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点坐标为(2,0)\because抛物线y^{2}=8x的焦点与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a2}-y^{2}=1的一个焦点重合,\thereforea^{2}+1=4,a=\sqrt{3},则e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 \sqrt{2} x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，若$|P F|=3 \sqrt{2}$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*(sqrt(2)*x));F: Point;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3*sqrt(2)
process: \because抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4\sqrt{2}x\therefore2p=4\sqrt{2},可得\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{2},\therefore抛物线的准线方程为:x=-\sqrt{2},焦点F(\sqrt{2},0)又P为C上一点,|PF|=3\sqrt{2},\thereforex_{P}=2\sqrt{2}代入抛物线方程得:|y_{P}|=4,\thereforeS_{\trianglePOF}=\frac{1}{2}\times|0F|\times|y_{P}|=2\sqrt{2}

text: 以抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为圆心，半径为$2$的圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);H: Circle;Focus(G) = Center(H);Radius(H) = 2
process: 依题意可知抛物线的焦点坐标为(1,0),也即是圆心的坐标为(1,0),所以圆的方程为(x-1)^{2}+y2=4

text: 抛物线$C$的顶点在坐标原点，焦点为$F(1 , 0)$，过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点。若$A B$的中点为$(2, m)$，则弦$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Vertex(C) = O;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)))= (2,m);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B),C);m:Number
P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LineSegmentOf(P, F1) - LineSegmentOf(P, F2) = 5;LineSegmentOf(F1,F2)=8
process: 根据双曲线定义,到两定点的距离差的绝对值是定值,这里PF_{1}-PF_{2}=5为常数,F_{1}、F_{2}为定点,所以动点P的轨迹是双曲线.

text: 已知点$P$为抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$上的动点，点$P$在$x$轴上的射影为$M$，点$A$的坐标是$(6, \frac{17}{2})$，则$|P A|+|P M|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);M: Point;Projection(P, xAxis) = M;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (6, 17/2)
process: 试题分析:抛物线y=\frac{1}{2}x^{2}的标准方程为x^{2}=2y,焦点为F(0,\frac{1}{2}),由抛物线的定义知|PA|+|PM|=|PA|+|PF|-\frac{1}{2}\geqslant|AF|-\frac{1}{2}=\sqrt{(6-0)^{2}+(\frac{17}{2}-\frac{1}{2})^{2}}-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{19}{2}(当且仅当A,P,F三点共线时等号成立).故最小值为\frac{19}{2}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$，过其左支上一点$M$作平行于$x$轴的直线交渐近线于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P M| \cdot|M Q|=4$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;Eccentricity(G) = 2;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M,LeftPart(G)) = True;L: Line;PointOnCurve(M,L) = True;IsParallel(L,xAxis) = True;Intersection(L,Asymptote(G)) = {P,Q};P: Point;Q: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, Q))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 4

text: 已知$M$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{9}+\frac{x^{2}}{5}=1$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$C$的焦点，则$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, C);Focus(C) = {F1, F2}
process: 根据题意求出a,c,再利用椭圆的定义求解.由题得a=3,b=\sqrt{5},\thereforec=\sqrt{9-5}=2,由题得\DeltaMF_{1}F_{2}的周长为|MF|+|MF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|=2a+2c=2\times3+2\times2=10

text: 若椭圆的两个焦点为$F_{1}(-1,0)$ , $F_{2}(1,0)$，长轴长为$10$，则椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (1, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 10

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上一动点，$A(-2,1)$ , $B(2,1)$，则$\cos \angle A P B$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 根据题意,画出椭圆的图形如下图所示:设P(x_{0},y_{0}),过P作PH\botAB交AB于H,而P(x_{0},y_{0})在\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1上代入上式可得\tan\angleAPB=.由椭圆性质可知,y_{0}\in[-1,1],令t=1-y_{0},t\in[0,2],则\tan\angleAPB=\frac{4t}{t^{2}-4(1-t)^{2}}=\frac{4t}{-3t^{2}+8t-4},t\in[0,2],当t=0时,\tan\angleAPB=0,此时\angleAPB=\pi,\cos\angleAPB=-1,当t\in(0,2]时,由基本不等式可知\tan\angleAPB=\frac{4}{-(3t+\frac{4}{t})+8}\geqslant2+\sqrt{3}当且仅当3t=\frac{4}{t},即t=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}时取等号,此时\cos\angleAPB的值最大,因而\begin{cases}\frac{\sin\angleAPB}{\cos\angleAPB}=2+\sqrt{3}\\\sin^{2}\angleAPB+\cos^{2}\angle\end{cases}化简可得_{\cos^{2}}\angleAPB=\frac{2-\sqrt{3}}{4}B.\begin{cases}\sin^{2}\angleAPB+\cos^{2}\angleAPB=1\\\frac{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2}}{4},\end{cases}综上所述,可知\cos\angleAPB的最大值为\underline{\sqrt{6}-\sqrt{2}},

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,   b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, $P$是双曲线上的一点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$, $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$2 a b$, 则双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 2*a*b;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: \because|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|=2a,PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}2=F_{1}F_{2}2=4c^{2}\thereforePF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=\frac{4c^{2}-4a^{2}}{2}=2c^{2}-2a^{2}=2b^{2}\becauseS=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=2ab\thereforeb^{2}=2ab,b=2a,\thereforec=\sqrt{5}a,e=\sqrt{5}.1本题考查双曲线定义以及离心率,考查基本分析求解能力,属中档题

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=-x$上一点，则点$M$到直线$x+2 y-3=0$的最短距离是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;M: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = -x);Expression(G) = (x + 2*y - 3 = 0);PointOnCurve(M, C)
process: 不妨设过点M的直线x+2y+c=0与抛物线C:y^{2}=-x相切则y^{2}=2y+c则A=4+4c=0,\thereforec=-1故直线为x+2y-1=0点M到直线x+2y-3=0的最短距离为两条平行线之间的距离\therefore点M到直线x+2y-3=0的最短距离d=\frac{|-3-(-1)|}{\sqrt{1+2^{2}}}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知椭圆的焦点在$x$轴上，焦距为$2$，且经过点$(0,2)$，则该椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, 2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 2;PointOnCurve(H,G)
process: \because椭圆焦距为2\thereforec=1又焦点在x轴上,经过点(0,2)\thereforeb=2\thereforea^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}=5\therefore椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线互相垂直，顶点到一条渐近线的距离为$1$，则双曲线的一个焦点到另一条渐近线的距离为?

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的焦距为$8$，点$M(1, \sqrt{3})$在其渐近线上，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;FocalLength(C) = 8;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(M, Asymptote(C))
process: 由题意得\frac{1}{a^{2}}-\frac{3}{b^{2}}=0\thereforeb=\sqrt{3}a\cdot2c=8,c=4\thereforeb=2\sqrt{3},a因此C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$、$P$是椭圆上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，设直线$A P$ , $B P$的斜率分别为$m$ , $n$ ,则当$\frac{a}{b}(3-\frac{2}{3 m n})+\frac{2}{m n}+3(\ln |m|+\ln |n|)$取得最小值时，椭圆$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);PointOnCurve(P, C);m: Number;n: Number;Slope(LineOf(A, P)) = m;Slope(LineOf(B, P)) = n;WhenMin((a/b)*(3 - 2/(3*m*n)) + 2/(m*n) + 3*(ln(Abs(m)) + ln(Abs(n))))

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$2$，点$P$是$E$上的动点，则点$P$到$E$的两条渐近线的距离之积为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Eccentricity(E) = 2;b: Number;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E) = True;A1: Line;A2: Line;Asymptote(E) = {A1, A2}
process: 由\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{e^{2}-1}=\sqrt{3},得b=2\sqrt{3}.\therefore渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x,即\sqrt{3}x\pmy=0,设P(s,t),则\frac{s^{2}}{4}-\frac{t^{2}}{12}=1,即3s^{2}-t^{2}=12,\therefore点P到E的两条渐近线的距离之积为\frac{|\sqrt{3}s+t|}{2}.\frac{|\sqrt{3}s-t|}{2}=\frac{|3s^{2}-t^{2}|}{4}=3均终安为.3

process: 由椭圆的定义可得:3+7=2a,所以a=5,则a^{2}=25,根据椭圆的方程可得:m=25,

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x $, $P$是抛物线上一点，$F$为焦点，若$|P F|=5$，则抛物线的准线方程是? 则点$P$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5
process: 因为抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x,所以p=2,所以抛物线的准线方程是x=-1,设P(x,y),因为|PF|=5,所以x+1=5,解得x=4,y=\pm4所以点P的坐标是(4,4)或(4,-4),

fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);k: Number;k>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (y = 4/x);A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 方法一:\because直线y=kx与双曲线y=\frac{4}{x}相交于点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})\thereforex_{1}y_{1}=4,x_{2}y_{2}=4,又:直线y=kx与双曲线y=\frac{4}{x}都是中心对称图形,原点为其对称中心\thereforeA,B两点关于原点对称.\thereforex_{1}=-x_{2},y_{1}=-y_{2}\therefore2x_{1}y_{2}-7x_{2}y_{1}=-2x_{1}y_{1}+7x_{1}y_{1}=5x_{1}y_{1}=5\times4=20

text: 设$a>1$，则双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{(a+1)^{2}}=1$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?

text: 已知过点$P(-1,1)$的直线$m$交$x$轴于点$A$，抛物线$x^{2}=y$上有一点$B$使$P A \perp P B$,若$A B$是抛物线$x^{2}=y$的切线，则直线$m$的方程是?
fact_expressions: m: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = y);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(P, m);Intersection(m, xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(B,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,A),LineSegmentOf(P,B));IsTangent(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)
process: 分析:由题设B(t,t^{2}),求导得到直线AB:y=2tx-t^{2},然后分t=0和t\neq0两种情况讨论即可得到直线m的方程.详由题设B(t,t^{2}),求导2x=y即k_{AB}=2t,则直线AB:y=2tx-t^{2}当t=0时,验证符合题意,此时A(-2,0),故m:x-y+2=0当t\neq0时,A(\frac{t}{2},0),\overrightarrow{PA}=(\frac{t}{2}+1,-1),\overrightarrow{PB}=(t+1,t^{2}-1)\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=0\Rightarrow(t+1)(\frac{t}{2}+1-t+1)=0\Rightarrowt=4或t=-1(B,P重合,舍去)此时P(-1,1),A(2,0),故m:x+3y-2=0

text: 已知椭圆$F$的左焦点$F_{1}$和右焦点$F_{2}$，上顶点为$A$ , $A F_{2}$的中垂线交椭圆于点$B$，若左焦点$F_{1}$在线段$A B$上，则椭圆离心率为?
fact_expressions: F: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(F) = F1;RightFocus(F) = F2;UpperVertex(F)=A;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)), F) = B;PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(A,B))
process: 设|BF_{2}|=t,由椭圆的定义可得|BF_{1}|=2a-t,再由中垂线的性质可得|AB|=|BF_{2}|=t,从而|AF_{1}|=2t-2a.在4AF_{1}F_{2}中,\cos\angleAF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{c}{a};在ABF_{1}F_{2}中,由余弦定理得\cos\angleBF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{2c}{a}-\frac{a}{c},由此可得a^{2}=3c^{2},最后根据离心率的定义求解即可.如图,设|BF_{2}|=t,由椭圆的定义可得|BF_{1}|=2a-t.\becauseAF_{2}的中垂线交椭圆于点B,\therefore|AB|=|BF_{2}|=t,\therefore|AF_{1}|=|AB|-|BF_{1}|=2t-2a又|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}}=a,\therefore2t-2a=a,解得t=\frac{3a}{2}\therefore|AF_{2}|=|AF_{1}|=a,|BF_{1}|=\frac{a}{2},|BF_{2}|=\frac{3a}{2},|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c在AAF_{1}F_{2}中,\cos\angleAF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{c}{a}\therefore\cos\angleBF_{1}F_{2}=-\cos\angleAF_{1}F_{2}=-\frac{c}{a}在ABF_{1}F_{2}中,由余弦定理得\cos\angleBF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{\frac{a2}{4}+4c^{2}-\frac{9a^{2}}{4}}{2\cdot\frac{a}{2}\cdot2c}=\frac{2c}{a}-\frac{a}{c}\therefore\frac{2c}{a}-\frac{a}{c}=-\frac{c}{a}\thereforea^{2}=3c^{2},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},即椭圆的离心率为\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的焦点相同，且双曲线$C$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?

process: 双曲线C与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的焦点相同,即(\pm3,0),直线y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}x'为双曲线C的一条渐近线,可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},又a^{2}+b^{2}=9,可知a^{2}=4,b^{2}=5.则双曲线C的方程是:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1.

process: 设双曲线的左焦点为F_{1},曲线定义知|PF|-|PF_{1}|=2,所以|PF|=|PF_{1}|+2,从而\DeltaAPF的周长为|AP|+|PF|+|AF|=|AP|+|PF_{1}|+2+|AF|因为|AF|=\sqrt{2^{2}+(2\sqrt{3})^{2}}=4为定值,所以当|AP|+|PF_{1}|最小时,\triangleAPF的周长最小由图可知,此时点P为线段AF_{1}与双曲线的交点,则\DeltaAPF的周长为|AP|+|PF_{1}|+2+|AF|=4+4+2=10

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m+9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，则实数$m$的值是?

process: 试题分析:先由题中条件求出焦点坐标和渐近线方程,再代入点到直线的距离公式即可求出结论.由题得:其焦点坐标为(-5,0),(5,0).渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x,即\pm3y\cdot4x=0,所以焦点到其渐近线的距离d=\frac{20}{5}=4.

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$， 当$a=1$时，直线$x-y+m=0$与双曲线$C$交于不同的两点$A$、$B$，且线段$A B$的中点在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=5$上，则$m$的值?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;H: Line;m: Number;B: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;a=1;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 5);Expression(H) = (m + x - y = 0);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),G);Negation(A=B)
process: 首先求出双曲线方程,设A、B两点的坐标分别为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2}),线段AB的中点为M(x_{0}y_{0}),联立直线与双曲线方程,利用韦达定理,结合已知条件求解m即可.当a=1时,e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3},所以c=\sqrt{3},又c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},得b^{2}=2所以双曲线C的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\cdot设A、B两点的坐标分别为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2}),线段AB的中点为M(x_{0},y_{0}),由\begin{cases}x2-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\\x+y+m=0\end{cases},得x^{2}-2mx-m^{2}-2=0(判别式人>0)\thereforex_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=m,y_{0}=x_{0}+m=2m\because点M(x_{0},y_{0}),在圆x^{2}+y^{2}=5上,\thereforem^{2}+4m^{2}=5,\thereforem=\pm1.

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Length(MajorAxis(C)) = 8;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 9

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，其准线与$x$轴交于点$A$，过$A$作直线$l$与抛物线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$|F M|^{2}+|F N|^{2}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(A, l);Intersection(l, G) = {M, N};A:Point

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上有$A$、$B$两点满足$O A \perp O B$，且点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为$c$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);c:Number;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O,A),LineSegmentOf(O,B));Distance(O, LineOf(A,B)) = c

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/4 = 1)
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,可得a=2,b=\sqrt{2},c=\sqrt{2},椭圆的焦点坐标为:(0,\pm\sqrt{2})

text: 已知动点$P$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{40}=1$上若点$A$的坐标为$(3,0)$,点$M$满足$|\overrightarrow{A M}|=1$,且$\overrightarrow{P M} \cdot \overrightarrow{A M}=0$,则$|\overrightarrow{P M}|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/49 + y^2/40 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Coordinate(A) = (3, 0);Abs(VectorOf(A, M)) = 1;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, M), VectorOf(A, M)) = 0
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{40}=1中,a=7,b=\sqrt{40},可得c=3,根据\overrightarrow{PM}\cdot\overrightarrow{AM}=0,故\overrightarrow{PM}\bot\overline{A}|\overrightarrow{PM}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PA}|-|\overrightarrow{AM}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PA}|^{2}-1,因为|\overrightarrow{AM}|=1,点M的轨迹为以点A为圆心,1为半径的圆,结合图象,即可求得答案.椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{40}=1中,a=7,b=\sqrt{40},\frac{1}{2}-b^{2}=3\begin{matrix}PM&AM\\\frac{PM}{AM}&=|\overrightarrow{PA}|\end{matrix}^{2}-|\overrightarrow{AM}^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PA}|^{2}-1\therefore点M的轨迹为以点A为圆心,1为半径的圆\therefore|\overrightarrow{AP}|越小,|\overrightarrow{PM}|就越小,画出图形如图所示:结合图形知,当P点为椭圆的右顶点时|\overrightarrow{AP}|取得最小值a-c=7-3=4\therefore|\overrightarrow{PM}|的最小值是\sqrt{4^{2}-1}=\sqrt{15}

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点坐标为$(2,0)$，且椭圆过点$A(2 , 3)$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (2, 3);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(C))) = (2,0);PointOnCurve(A, C)
process: 由题意易得:\begin{cases}c=2\\\frac{4}{a^{2}}+\frac{9}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},从而解得:\begin{cases}a=4\\c=2\end{cases}\therefore离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3}(x-2 a)$与双曲线$C$的右支交于点$A$，且与$y$轴交于点$B$. 若$\triangle O B F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，其中，$O$为坐标原点，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Expression(l) = (y = sqrt(3)*(-2*a + x));A: Point;Intersection(l,RightPart(C)) = A;B: Point;Intersection(l,yAxis) = B;Area(TriangleOf(O, B, F)) = 8*sqrt(3);O: Origin
process: 根据题意可得c=2a,再由S_{\triangleOBF}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2a\cdot2\sqrt{3}a=8\sqrt{3},求出a,利用b^{2}=c^{2}-a2即可求解令y=0,可得x=2a,即c=2a,令x=0,可得y=-2\sqrt{3}a,所以S_{\triangleOBF}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2a\cdot|-2\sqrt{3}a|=8\sqrt{3},解得a=2,所以c=4,所以b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=12,即双曲线的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1,直线l:y=\sqrt{3}(x-4),联立\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1\\y=\sqrt{3}(x-4)\end{cases},解得x=\frac{5}{2},y=-\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}即A(\frac{5}{2},-\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}),B(0,-4\sqrt{3}),过A作出y轴的垂线,垂足为D,则_{D}(0,\frac{-3\sqrt{3}}{2}),所以\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}=\frac{|DO|}{|BO|}=\frac{3}{8}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$P(2,0)$的直线与该抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$A F$, $B F$分别交抛物线于点$C$、$D$. 若直线$A B$, $C D$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(LineOf(A, F), G) = C;Intersection(LineOf(B, F), G) = D;Slope(LineOf(A, B)) = k1;Slope(LineOf(C, D)) = k2;k1: Number;k2: Number

text: $\frac{x^{2}}{4-t}+\frac{y^{2}}{t-1}=1$表示双曲线，则实数$t$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) =  (x^2/(4 - t) + y^2/(t - 1) = 1);t: Real
process: 当焦点在x轴上时,\begin{cases}4-t>0\\t-1<0\end{cases},解得t<1;当焦点在y轴上时,\begin{cases}4-t<0\\t-1>0\end{cases}解得t>4;

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y-7=0$和$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (4*x - 3*y - 7 = 0);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (y = -1)
process: 设P(x_{0},\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4})则P到l_{1}距离为\underline{.}则P到l_{2}距离为\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4}+1'\therefore点P到两直线距离和为\frac{-\frac{8}{3})^{2}-\frac{5}{3}<0,}{5}+\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4}+1=\frac{2}{5}(x_{0}-1)^{2}+2'\therefore当x_{0}=1时,距离和最小为2.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$，焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25} + \frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的顶点坐标为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Focus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的两个焦点，若$C$上存在点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 若椭圆焦点在x轴上,则0<m<4,当点P位于短轴端点时,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}取最大值要使C上存在点P满足\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},则\frac{\sqrt{4-m}}{\sqrt{m}}\geqslant1,解得0<m\leqslant2;当椭圆焦点在y轴上时,m>4,同上则需\frac{\sqrt{m-4}}{2}\geqslant1'解得m\geqslant8.综上,m\in(0,2]\cup[8,+\infty).

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点，$F$为其焦点，点$A$在圆$(x-5)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$上，则$|M A|+|M F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, H) = True;H: Circle;Expression(H) = ((x - 5)^2 + (y + 1)^2 = 1)
process: 如图,过M作准线x=-1的垂线,垂足为E,则|MA|+|MF|=|MA|+|ME|,而|MA|+|ME|\geqslantAE\geqslant5-1+1=5,故所求的最小值为5.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线与$x$轴相交于点$P$，过点$P$作斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$|F A|=2|F B|$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);P: Point;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = P;H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H);k: Number;Slope(H) = k;k>0;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))
process: 试题分析:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由已知FA=2|FB得:x_{1}+2=2(x_{2}+2),即x_{1}=2x_{2}+2\textcircled{1},因为P(-2,0),则AB的方程:y=kx+2k,与y^{2}=8x联立得:k^{2}x^{2}+(4k^{2}-8)x+4k^{2}=0,则x_{1}x_{2}=4\textcircled{2},由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}得x_{2}=1,则B(1,2\sqrt{2}),所以k=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 设$M$、$N$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$实轴的两个端点，$Q$是双曲线上的一点(异于$M$、$N$两点)，$\angle Q M N=\alpha$, $\angle Q N M=\beta$, 则$\tan \alpha \tan \beta$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;M: Point;N: Point;Endpoint(RealAxis(G)) = {M, N};Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, G);Negation(Q=M);Negation(Q=N);alpha: Number;AngleOf(Q, M, N) = alpha;beta: Number;AngleOf(Q, N, M) = beta
process: 设Q(m,n)(m\neq\pma),则\tan\alpha=\frac{n}{m+a},\tan\beta=\frac{n}{a-m},所以\tan\alpha\tan\beta=\frac{n^{2}}{a^{2}-m^{2}}又Q在双曲线上,可得\frac{m^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{n^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,所以m^{2}=a^{2}(1+\frac{n^{2}}{b^{2}}),可得\tan\alpha\tan\beta=-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$A$是椭圆上位于第一象限内的一点，$O$为坐标原点，且满足$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O F_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}|^{2}$，若直线$O A$的方程是$y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;A: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Quadrant(A) = 1;PointOnCurve(A, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, F2)) = Abs(VectorOf(O, F2))^2;Expression(LineOf(O, A)) = (y = x*(sqrt(2)/2))
process: 由\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OF}_{2}=|\overrightarrow{OF}_{2}||\overrightarrow{OA}|\cos\angleAOF=|\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}|^{2}可得OF_{2}\botAF_{2},得出A点的坐标,再代入直线羊解】\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}||\overrightarrow{OA}|\cos\angleAOF_{2}=|\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}||即|\overrightarrow{OA}|\cos\angleAOF_{2}=|\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}|所以OF_{2}\botAF_{2}即A点的横坐标为c,则有\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{A}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1由A在第一象限,所以y_{A}=\frac{b^{2}}{a},即A(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}).又直线OA的方程是y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x'可得\frac{b^{2}}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}c'即a^{2}-c^{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}ac所以_{1-e^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}e'解得:e=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}.

text: 已知圆$C_{1}$:$(x-2)^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=4$ , $C_{2}$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=2$，点$P$是圆$C_{1}$上的一个动点，$A B$是圆$C_{2}$的一条动弦，且$|A B|=2$，则$|\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = ((x - 2)^2 + (y - 2)^2 = 4);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = ((x + 2)^2 + (y + 1)^2 = 2);A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), C2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2
process: 由题设知,圆C_{1}的圆心为C_{1}(2,2),半径为2,圆C_{2}的圆心为C_{2}(-2,-1)半径为\sqrt{2},过C_{2}作C_{2}D\botAB交AB于D,则D为AB的中点且|C_{2}D|=\sqrt{(\sqrt{2})^{2}-1^{2}}=1^{1}\therefore点D的轨迹为圆C_{3}:(x+2)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1,其圆心C_{3}(-2,-1),半径为1,由向量的平行四边形法则知,|\overrightarrow{PA}+\overrightarrow{PB}|=|2\overrightarrow{PD}|(2+2)^{2}+(2+1)^{2}=5>2+1=3,\therefore圆C_{1}与圆C_{3}外离,则|\overrightarrow{PD}|的最大值为5+2+1=8,|\overrightarrow{PA}+\overrightarrow{PB}|的最大值是16.

text: 已知点$O$为坐标原点，点$M$在双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=1$上，过点$M$作双曲线$C$的某一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则$|O N| \cdot|M N|$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O: Origin;N: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, C);L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L, OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=N
F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/((75/4)) = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)  ;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3
process: 试题分析:由椭圆方程可知a^{2}=25,b^{2}=\frac{75}{4},焦点三角形AF_{1}PF_{2}的面积为S=b^{2}\tan\frac{\angleF_{1}PF_{2}}{2}=\frac{75}{4}\times\tan\frac{\pi}{6}=\frac{25\sqrt{3}}{4}

text: 点$P$在曲线$\sqrt{\frac{x^{2}}{25}}+\sqrt{\frac{y^{2}}{9}}=1$上运动，$E$是曲线第二象限上的定点，$E$的纵坐标是$\frac{15}{8}$ , $O(0,0)$ , $F(4,0)$，若$\overrightarrow{O P}=x \overrightarrow{O F}+y \overrightarrow{O E}$，则$x+y$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G) = (sqrt(x^2/25) + sqrt(y^2/9) = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);E: Point;Quadrant(E) = 2;PointOnCurve(E, G);YCoordinate(E) = 15/8;O: Origin;Coordinate(O) = (0, 0);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (4,0);x1: Number;y1: Number;VectorOf(O, P) = x1*VectorOf(O, F) + y1*VectorOf(O, E)
process: 由题意,可得点P在曲线\sqrt{\frac{x^{2}}{25}}+\sqrt{\frac{y^{2}}{9}}=1上,即在\frac{|x|}{5}+\frac{|y|}{3}=1上运动,又由E是曲线第二象限上的定点,E的纵坐标是\frac{15}{8},代入可得x=-\frac{15}{8},即E(-\frac{15}{8},\frac{15}{8})设点P(5\cos2\theta,3\sin^{2}\theta),因为\overrightarrow{OP}=x\overrightarrow{OF}+y\overrightarrow{OE},即(5\cos2\theta,3\sin^{2}\theta)=x(4,0)+y(-\frac{15}{8},\frac{15}{8}),即\begin{cases}4x-\frac{15}{8}y=5\cos2\theta\\3\sin^{2}\theta=\frac{15}{8}y\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}x=\frac{1}{2}\cos2\theta+\frac{3}{4}\\y=\frac{8}{5}\sin^{2}\theta\end{cases},所以x+y=\frac{3}{4}+\frac{1}{2}\cos2\theta+\frac{8}{5}\sin^{2}\theta=\frac{5}{4}+\frac{11}{10}\sin^{2}\theta.当\sin^{2}\theta=1,此时最大值为(x+y)_{\max}=\frac{5}{4}+\frac{11}{10}=\frac{47}{20}

text: 若$A$点坐标为$(1,1)$ , $F_{1}$是椭圆$5 y^{2}+9 x^{2}=45$的下焦点，点$P$是该椭圆上的动点，则$|P A|+|P F_{1}|$的最大值为$M$，最小值为$N$，则$M-N$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;M:Number;N:Number;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 + 5*y^2 = 45);Coordinate(A) = (1, 1);LowerFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Max(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = M;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = N
process: 椭圆5y^{2}+9x^{2}=45即为\frac{x2}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1可得a=3,b=\sqrt{5},c=2,设F_{2}是椭圆的上顶点.\because|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=6,那么|PF_{1}|=6-|PF_{2}|,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PA|=6-|PF_{2}|+|PA|=6+(|PA|-|PF_{2}|)\textcircled{1}根据三角形三边关系可知,当点P位于P_{1}时,|PA|-|PF_{2}|的差最大为|AF_{2}|,此时F_{2}、A、P三点共线,易得|AF_{2}|=\sqrt{2}\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PA|最大值为6+\sqrt{2}\textcircled{2}根据三角形三边关系可知,当点P位于P_{2}时,|PA|-|PF_{2}|的差最小为-|AF_{2}|此时F_{2}、A、P三点共线,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PA|最小值为6-\sqrt{2}即M=6+\sqrt{2},n=6-\sqrt{2},\thereforeM-N=6+\sqrt{2}-6+\sqrt{2}=2\sqrt{2}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 - y^2/64 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 14
process: 由已知可得a^{2}=36,b^{2}=64,所以a=6,b=8,c^{2}=100,即c=10,由于双曲线左支上的点到右焦点F_{2}的距离的最小值为a+c=6+10=16.而|PF_{2}|=14<16,所以点P只能在双曲线的右支上.根据双曲线的定义可得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=12,所以|PF_{1}|=26.

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过点$F$作直线$l$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$A$，且与双曲线的右支相交于点$B$，若$\overrightarrow{F A}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);TangentPoint(l, H) = A;Intersection(l, RightPart(G)) = B;VectorOf(F, A) = (1/3)*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 如图所示:设双曲线的右焦点为F\becauseOA=a,AF\botOA,OF=c\thereforeAF=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=b\therefore\cos\angleAFO=\frac{b}{c}\because\overrightarrow{FA}=\frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{FB},O是FF的中点\thereforeBF=3b,FF=2c由双曲线的定义可知:BF-BF'=2a\thereforeBF=3b-2a在ABFF中,由余弦定理可得:BF^{2}=9b^{2}+4c^{2}-2\cdot3b\cdot2c\cdot\frac{b}{c}=4c^{2}-3b^{2}\therefore(3b-2a)^{2}=4c^{2}-3b^{2},整理可得:\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{2}\therefore双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{3}{2}x本题正确结果:y=\pm\frac{3}{2}x

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的一个焦点，则点$F$到双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F
process: 求出双曲线的a,b,c,可设F(2,0),可得双曲线的一条渐近线方程,运用点到直线的距离公式计算即可得到.双曲线C:\frac{x2}{3}-y^{2}=1的a=\sqrt{3},b=1,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=2,则可设F(2,0),设双曲线的一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x'则F到渐近线的距离为d=\frac{\sqrt[2]{3}}{\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{3}}}=1

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=16 y$的焦点，直线$l$: $y=-1$，点$A$为$C$上任意一点，过点$A$作$A P \perp l$于$P$，则$|  A P|-| A F| $=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;Focus(C) = F;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 16*y);l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = -1);A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;PointOnCurve(A,LineSegmentOf(A, P)) = True;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,P),l) = True;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,P),l) = P;P: Point

text: 椭圆$C$上一点$P$到两个焦点$F_{1}(-2,0)$, $F_{2}(2,0)$的距离之和等于$6$，则$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 6;Focus(C) = {F1, F2}
process: 因椭圆C上一点P到两个焦点F_{1}(-2,0),F_{2}(2,0)的距离之和等于6,则该椭圆长半轴长a=3而半焦距c=2,于是得短半轴长b,有b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=5,所以C的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1

text: 设椭圆的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，上顶点为$B_{1}$，若$B_{1} F_{2}=F_{1} F_{2}=4$，则该椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;B1: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;UpperVertex(E) = B1;LineSegmentOf(B1,F2) = LineSegmentOf(F1,F2);LineSegmentOf(F1,F2) = 4

text: 已知点$A(-2,4)$在抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的准线上，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则直线$A F$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = (-2, 4);PointOnCurve(A, Directrix(C));Focus(C) = F
process: 试题分析:由题意可知准线为x=-2,所以\frac{p}{2}=2\thereforep=4,焦点为(2,0),所以k_{AF}=\frac{4-0}{-2-2}=-1

text: 抛物线的焦点是$F(1 ,-1)$，准线方程是$x-y=0$，那么它的顶点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (1, -1);Focus(G) = F;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x - y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{3}{2}$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 3/2
process: 由离心率e=\frac{3}{2}可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},再代入渐近线方程即可.[详解]由已知可知离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3}{2},\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{9}{4},即\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{4},又双曲线焦点在x轴上,渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,即y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}x

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k-3}-\frac{y^{2}}{k+3}=1(k \in R)$表示双曲线，则$k$的范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k - 3) - y^2/(k + 3) = 1);k: Real

text: 已知点$P(6 , y)$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，若点$P$到抛物线焦点$F$的距离等于$8$，则焦点$F$到抛物线准线的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G)=(y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(P)=(6, y1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Focus(G)=F;Distance(P,F) = 8;y1:Number
process: 抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的准线为x=-\frac{p}{2},因为P(6,y)为抛物线上的点,所以P到焦点F的距离等于它到准线的距离,所以6+\frac{p}{2}=8,所以p=4,焦点F到抛物线准线的距离等于4.

text: 点$A(0,1)$到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 1)

text: 设$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点若在$C$上存在一点$P$, 使$PF_{1} \perp PF_{2}$, 且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$, 则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)

text: 直线$y=k(x-1)$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，已知$A B$的中点坐标为$(\frac{3}{2}, 1)$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = k*(x - 1));Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (3/2, 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};k:Number
process: 抛物线2p=4,p=2,\frac{p}{2}=1抛物线的焦点为F(1,0),准线为x=-1,直线y=k(x-1)过(1,0),所以k=\frac{1-0}{3-1}=2由\begin{cases}y=2(x-1)\\y2=4x\end{cases}消去y并化简得x^{2}-3x+1=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=3\\x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=1\end{cases},所以|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=3+2=5

text: 已知$F$，$A$分别是椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点和下顶点，$M(x_{0}, y_{0})$是椭圆$\Gamma$上位于第一象限内的点，点$N$的坐标为$(0, \frac{1}{y_{0}})$，若线段$F M$上存在点$H$同时满足$|\overrightarrow{F H}|=|\overrightarrow{A H}|$，$\overrightarrow{F H} \cdot \overrightarrow{N H}=0$，则$x_{0} y_{0}$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;A: Point;LeftFocus(Gamma) = F;LowerVertex(Gamma) = A;Gamma: Ellipse;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);M: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Coordinate(M) = (x0, y0);Quadrant(M) = 1;PointOnCurve(M, Gamma);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (0, 1/y0);H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, LineSegmentOf(F, M));Abs(VectorOf(F, H)) = Abs(VectorOf(A, H));DotProduct(VectorOf(F, H), VectorOf(N, H)) = 0
process: 由已知F(-1,0),A(0,-1),因为|\overrightarrow{FH}|=|\overrightarrow{AH}|所以点H在线段FA的中垂线y=x上,所以可设H(m,m)(m\neq0),又由H在线段FM上,得k_{FH}=k_{FM}\Rightarrow\frac{m}{m+1}=\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}+1}\textcircled{1},由\overrightarrow{FH}\cdot\overrightarrow{NH}=0,所以m(m+1)+m(m-\frac{1}{y_{0}})=0\Rightarrowm=\frac{1-y_{0}}{2y_{0}}代入\textcircled{1}式得\frac{1-y_{0}}{1+y_{0}}=\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}+1}即1-y_{0}^{2}=(x_{0}+2)y_{0}-x_{0},又\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{2}=1-y_{0}^{2},所以(x_{0}+2)y_{0}-x_{0}=\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{2}\Rightarrow(x_{0}+2)y_{0}=\frac{x_{0}(x_{0}+2)}{2}

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的一条弦，使此弦被$P$点平分，则此弦所在的直线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/4 = 1);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);H: LineSegment;PointOnCurve(P, H);IsChordOf(H, G);MidPoint(H) = P

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $3 x-4 y-6=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);Expression(l1) = (3*x - 4*y - 6 = 0);Expression(l2) = (y = -1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 设抛物线焦点为F,则F(0,1);过P作l_{1}和l_{2}的垂线,垂足分别为N,M,如下图所示:\therefore所求距离之和即为:|PM|+|PN由抛物线定义知:|PM|=|PF|\therefore|PM|+|PN|=|PF|+|PN|\geqslant|FN|(当且仅当F,P,N三点共线时取等号)\therefore(|PM|+|PN|)_{\min}=|FN|=\frac{|-4-6|}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}}=2本题正确结果:2

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的一直线交抛物线于$P$、$Q$两点，若线段$PF$的长为$3$，则线段$F Q$的长?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F, L);Intersection(L, G) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;Length(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3

text: 直线$y=k x-k$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=4$，则弦$A B$的中点到准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;k: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = k*x - k);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)
process: 试题分析:由题意得,抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标为F(1,0),且准线方程为x=-1,直线y=kx-k=k(x-1)恰好经过点F(1,0),设直线y=kx-k与抛物线y^{2}=4x的交点的横坐标为x_{1},x_{2}.根据抛物线的定义可知,AB的中点的横坐标为x_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{1}{2}|AB|-p=1,所以弦AB的中点到准线的距离为2,

text: $F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的两个焦点，$A$为椭圆上一点，且$\angle A F_{1} F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/7 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(A, G);AngleOf(A, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线$l$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta M N F_{2}$的内切圆半径为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;M: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(l, G) = {M, N}

text: $A$是椭圆长轴的一个端点，$O$是椭圆的中心，若椭圆上存在一点$P$，使$\angle OPA=\frac{\pi}{2}$，则椭圆离心率的范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;P: Point;A: Point;OneOf(Endpoint(MajorAxis(G)))=A;Center(G)=O;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(O, P, A) = pi/2

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$N(4,0)$，直线$l$过$F$且交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若以$N F$为直径的圆交$l$于点$M$(异于$F$)，且$M$是$A B$中点，则线段$M F$的长为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (4, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(N, F), G);M: Point;Intersection(l, G) = M;Negation(M=F);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 由抛物线的焦点F(1,0),|NF|=3,所以N,F的中点为:(\frac{5}{2},0),所以NF为直径的圆的方程为(x-\frac{5}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{9}{4},设直线AB的方程为:y=k(x-1),设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},整理可得:k^{2}x^{2}-2(2+k^{2})x+k^{2}=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}},x_{M}=1+\frac{2}{k^{2}},y_{M}=k(x_{M}-1)=\frac{2}{k},所以M(1+\frac{2}{k^{2}},\frac{2}{k})因为点M在以NF为直径的圆上,所以MN\botMF,因为k_{MF}=kk_{MN}=\frac{\frac{2}{k}}{1+\frac{2}{12}-}所以k\cdot\frac{2k}{2-3k^{2}}k_{0}=-1,解得k=\pm\sqrt{2},所以M(2,\pm\sqrt{2}),所以|MF|=\sqrt{(2-1)^{2}+(\pm\sqrt{2}-0)}^{2}=\sqrt{3}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点$F_{2}$作垂直于实轴的弦$P Q$ , $F_{1}$是左焦点，若$\angle P F_{1} Q=90^{\circ}$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;F2: Point;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;Q: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(P,Q),G) = True;PointOnCurve(F2,LineSegmentOf(P,Q)) = True;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,Q),RealAxis(G)) = True;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;AngleOf(P, F1, Q) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

C1: Ellipse;Expression(C1) = (x^2/a1^2 + y^2/b1^2 = 1);a1: Number;b1: Number;a1 > 0;b1 > 0;C2: Hyperbola;Expression(C2) = (x^2/a2^2 - y^2/b2^2 = 1);a2: Number;b2: Number;a2 > 0;b2 > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};Focus(C2) = {F1, F2};OneOf(Intersection(C1, C2)) = P;P: Point;e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(C1) = e1;Eccentricity(C2) = e2;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = True

G: Ellipse;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 2;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y=7$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Expression(l1) = (4*x - 3*y = 7);Expression(l2) = (y = -1)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作斜率为$\frac{b}{a}$的直线与曲线$C$交于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F2, G);Slope(G) = b/a;P: Point;Intersection(G, C) = P;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0
process: 分析:PF_{2}的方程为y=\frac{b}{a}(x-c)',PF_{1}的方程y=-\frac{a}{b}(x+c),联立求出点P的坐标为(\frac{b^{2}-a^{2}}{c},\frac{2ab}{c}),代入双曲线方程,化简即可得结果详取双曲线的渐近线为y=\frac{b}{a}x.\becauseF_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0),\therefore过F_{2}作斜率为\frac{b}{a}的PF_{2}的方程为y=\frac{b}{a}(x-c)因为\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0所以PF_{1}\botPF_{2},\therefore直线PF_{1}的方程y=-\frac{a}{b}(x+c)联立方程组\begin{cases}y=\frac{b}{a}(x-c)\\y=-\frac{a}{b}(x+c)\end{cases},可得点P的坐标为(\frac{b^{2}-a^{2}}{c},\frac{2ab}{c})\because点P在双曲线上,\therefore\frac{(b^{2}-a^{2})^{2}}{a2}-\frac{(-\frac{2ab}{c})^{2}}=1'即\frac{(b^{2}-a^{2})^{2}}{a^{2}c^{2}}-\frac{4a^{2}}{c^{2}}=1'\becausec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},\therefore(\frac{c^{2}-2a^{2}}{ac})^{2}-\frac{4a^{2}}{c^{2}}=1整理得c^{2}=5a^{2},\becausee=\frac{c}{a}>1,\thereforee=\sqrt{5},

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$M$，过点$M$作$C$的两条切线，切点分别为$P$, $Q$, 则$\angle P M Q$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;M: Point;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;P: Point;Q: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentOfPoint(M, C) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1, C) = P;TangentPoint(l2, C) = Q
process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的准线与x轴的交点为M,则M(-\frac{p}{2}设过点M的直线方程为x=ky-\frac{p}{2},由\begin{cases}x=ky-\frac{p}{2}\\y2=2px\end{cases}得y^{2}-2kpy+p^{2}=0,由A=4k^{2}p^{2}-4p^{2}=0,得k=\pm1,\thereforePM\botQM,因此,\anglePMQ=\frac{\pi}{2},

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-\sqrt{3} y=0$交双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$作直线$l$的垂线$A C$交双曲线$\Gamma$于点$C$. 若$\angle A B C=60^{\circ}$，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;l: Line;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(l) = (x - sqrt(3)*y = 0);Expression(Gamma) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Intersection(l, Gamma) = {A, B};C: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, C));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, C), l);Intersection(LineOf(A, C), Gamma) = C;AngleOf(A, B, C) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 联立直线x=\sqrt{3}y和双曲线方程可得x^{2}=\frac{3a2b^{2}}{3b^{2}-a^{2}},y^{2}=\frac{a2b^{2}}{3b^{2}-a^{2}}在直角三角形ABC中,\angleABC=60可得|AC|=\sqrt{3}|AB|,设直线AC的方程为y=-\sqrt{3}x+\frac{4ab}{\sqrt{3b^{2}-a^{2}}}代入双曲线方程可得(b^{2}-3a^{2})x^{2}+\frac{8\sqrt{3}a^{3}b}{\sqrt{3b^{2}-a^{2}}}x-a^{2}b^{2}-\frac{16a4b^{2}}{3b^{2}-a^{2}}=0\frac{b^{2}-a2|b^{2}-3}{3}丁得AC=2\frac{2\sqrt{3}ab}{\sqrt{3b^{2}-a^{2}}}即为a^{2}+b^{2}=|b^{2}-3a^{2}|,可得a=b,e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{2}

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上的一点，$F$为右焦点，点$A$的坐标为$(0, \sqrt{6})$，则$\triangle A F P$周长的最大值为?

process: 如图所示,设椭圆的左焦点为F,利用|AF|=|AF|,|PF|+|PF|=2a=4,利用|PA|-|PF|\leqslant|AF|,即可得到结果如图所示,设椭圆的左焦点为F由题意可知a=2,b=1,c=\sqrt{3},则F(\sqrt{3},0)因为A的坐标为(0,\sqrt{6}),所以|AF|=|AF|=3.由椭圆的定义可得|PF|+|PF|=2a=4,因为|PA|-|PF|\leqslant|AF|.所以\triangleAFP周长为|AF|+|PA|+|PF|=|AF|+|PA|+4-|PF|\leqslant3+4+3=10当且仅当A,P,F三点共线时取等号,所以\triangleAFP周长的最大值为10,

text: 过抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作两条相互垂直的弦$A B$,$C D$，分别交$M$于$A$、$B$、$C$、$D$，则$|A B|+|C D|$的最小值为?

process: 易知直线AB的斜率存在且不为0,所以设直线AB的方程为y=k(x-1)(k\neq0),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})直线AB的方程与抛物线方程y^{2}=4x联立,消y,得:k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=\frac{4}{k^{2}}+4,同理|CD|=4+4k^{2}可理|CD|=4+4k^{2},AB+|CD|=8+4k^{2}+\frac{4}{2}\geqslant16,当且仅当k=\pm1时等号成立的女安为,16

text: 已知$F_{1}$ ,$ F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点，若直线$l$过焦点$F_{1}$，且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$，则$\Delta ABF_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点的直线$l$与双曲线左、右两支分别交于点$P$, $Q$, 且 满 足$|Q F|-|P F|$的值为虚轴长，则该双曲线离心率为?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$P$为$C$上一点，$P F$与$x$轴垂直，$Q$为$x$轴上一点，且$P Q \perp O P$，若$|F Q|=6$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F),xAxis);PointOnCurve(Q, xAxis);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), LineSegmentOf(O, P));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, Q)) = 6
process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0),\becauseP为C上一点,PF与x轴垂直,所以P的横坐标为\frac{p}{2},代入抛物线方程求得P的纵坐标为\pmp,不妨设P(\frac{p}{2},p)因为Q为x轴上一点,且PQ\botOP,所以Q在F的右侧,又|FQ|=6,Q(6+\frac{p}{2},0),\overrightarrow{PQ}=(6,-p),因为PQ\botOP,所以\overrightarrow{PQ}\cdot\overrightarrow{OP}=\frac{p}{2}\times6-p^{2}=0,\becausep>0,\thereforep=3,所以|PF|=3

text: 已知椭圆的中心在坐标原点$O$、$A$、$C$分别是椭圆的上下顶点，$B$是椭圆的左顶点，$F$是椭圆的左焦点，直线$A F$与$BC$相交于点$D$. 若椭圆的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$\angle BDF$的正切值?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;A: Point;C: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;LowerVertex(G) = C;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = B;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;D: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, F), LineOf(B, C)) = D;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: 试题分析:由题意得:A(0,b),B(-a,0),C(0,-b),F(-c,0),所以\overrightarrow{CB}=(-a,b),\overrightarrow{FA}=(c,b),因此\cos\angleBDF=\frac{\overrightarrow{CB}\cdot\overrightarrow{FA}}{|CB|\cdot|FA|}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{\sqrt{c^{2}+b^{2}}},又离心率为\frac{1}{2},所以a=2c,b=\sqrt{3}c,从而\cos\angleBDF=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{7}},\tan\angleBDF=3\sqrt{3}.

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$为抛物线$C$上在第一象限的点.若$M$为$P F$的中点，$O$为抛物线$C$的顶点，则直线$O M$斜率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;M: Point;O:Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Quadrant(P)=1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M;Vertex(C)=O
process: 由题意,可得F(1,0),设_{P}(\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{4},y_{0}),(y_{0}>0),M(x,y),\becauseM是线段PF的中点,则M(\frac{1}{2}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8},\frac{y_{0}}{2})\thereforek_{OM}=\frac{\frac{y_{0}}{2}}{\frac{1}{2}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{8}}=\frac{4y_{0}}{4+y_{0}}=\frac{4}{\frac{4}{y_{0}}+y_{0}}\leqslant\frac{4}{2\sqrt{\frac{4}{y_{0}}\timesy_{0}}}=1,当且仅当y_{0}=2时取等号,\therefore直线OM的斜率的最大值为1.

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=-16 x$的焦点，$O$为坐标原点，点$P$是抛物线准线上的一动点，点$A$在抛物线上，且$|A F|=8$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -16*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(G));PointOnCurve(A, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 8

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$上的点到其准线距离最小值为$1$，则$p$=?

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}-4=0$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$3$,那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 - 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 3
process: 先将双曲线化简成标准形式x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,得出a=1,设点P到另一个焦点的距离为PF_{2},则根据双曲线的定义||PF_{2}|-3|=2a=2,|PF_{2}|>0,即可解得|PF_{2}|得值因为双曲线4x^{2}-y^{2}-4=0,化简成标准形式x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,得出a^{2}=1,即a=1,设点P到另一个焦点的距离为PF_{2},PF_{2}\geqslantc-a=\sqrt{5}-则根据双曲线的定义||PF_{2}|-3|=2a=2,|PF_{2}|>0\therefore|PF_{2}|=1(舍去)或|PF_{2}|=5.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (b>0)$的左、右焦点，$A$是双曲线上在第一象限内的点，若$|A F_{2}|=2$且$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，延长$A F_{2}$交双曲线的右支于点$B$，则$\triangle F_{1} A B$的面积等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;A: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Quadrant(A) = 1;PointOnCurve(A, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = 2;AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)), RightPart(G)) = B
process: 根据双曲线的定义转换可求得\triangleBAF_{1}为等腰直角三角形再计算面积即可由题意知a=1,由双曲线定义知|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|=2a=2,|BF_{1}|-|BF_{2}|=2a=2,所以|AF_{1}|=2+|AF_{2}|=4,|BF_{1}|=2+|BF_{2}|.由题意知|AB|=|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=2+|BF_{2}|所以|BA|=|BF_{1}|,所以\triangleBAF_{1}为等腰三角形因为\angleF_{1}AF_{2}=45^{\circ},所以\angleABF_{1}=90^{\circ},所以\triangleBAF_{1}为等腰直角三角形.所以|BA|=|BF_{1}|=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}|AF_{1}|=F_{1}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{2}\times2\sqrt{2}=4

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作斜率为$k_{1}$的直线和抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，延长$A M$ , $B M$交抛物线于$C$，$D$两点，直线$C D$的斜率为$k_{2}$若$M(4,0)$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;D: Point;C: Point;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;F: Point;k2: Number;k1: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = k1;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, M)), G) = C;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, M)), G) = D;Slope(LineOf(C, D)) = k2
process: 设过点F作斜率为k_{1}的直线方程为:y=k_{1}x-1),联立方程\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\y=k\\x\end{cases}=k(x--1)”消去x可得:y^{2}-\frac{4}{k_{1}}y-4=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})\thereforey_{1}y_{2}=.设C(x_{3},y),D(x_{4},y_{4})则k_{1}=\frac{y_{1}}{\frac{1}{4}(y_{1}^{2}-y_{2}^{2}}=\frac{4}{y_{1}+y_{2}},同理k_{2}=\frac{4}{y_{3}+y_{4}}设AC所在的直线方程为y=m(x-4),联立方程\begin{cases}y=m(x-4)\\y2=4x\end{cases},消去x得:my^{2}-4y-16m=0\thereforey_{1}y_{3}=-16,同理可得y_{2}y_{4}=-16,则\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}=\frac{y_{3}+y_{4}}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=\frac{\frac{-16}{y_{1}}+\frac{-16}{y_{2}}}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=\frac{-16}{y_{1}y_{2}}=4青】(1)直线与抛物线的位置关系和直线与椭圆、双曲线的位置关系类似,一般要用到根与系数的关系;(2)有关直线与抛物线的弦长问题,要注意直线是否过抛物线的焦点,若过抛物线的焦点,可直接使用公式|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p,若不过焦点,则必须用一般弦长公式

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$H$，点$P$在$C$上，且$|P H|=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}|P F|$，则$\Delta P F H$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;H: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = H;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H)) = (sqrt(5)/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))
process: 设P(\frac{t^{2}}{4},t),(t>0),则|PF|=|PM|=\frac{t^{2}}{4}+1,|PH|=\sqrt{(\frac{t^{2}}{4}+1)^{2}+t^{2}}由|PH|=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}|PF|可得t^{2}-8t+4=0,解得t=4\pm2\sqrt{3}.即可求解.由抛物线C:y^{2}=4x,得焦点F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1.过P作PM垂直准线于M,|PH|=\sqrt{(\frac{t^{2}}{4}+1)^{2}+t^{2}}由|PH|=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}|PF|'可得t^{2}-8t+4=0.解得t=4\pm2\sqrt{3}则APFH的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times2\timest=4\pm2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$\overrightarrow{N F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{1}}<0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;N: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F2,H);IsPerpendicular(H,xAxis);Intersection(H, C) = {M, N};DotProduct(VectorOf(N, F1), VectorOf(M, F1)) < 0
process: 当x=c时,\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,解得:y=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a}不妨设M(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),N(c,-b^{2}).则\overrightarrow{NF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}=(-2c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}).(-2c,-\frac{b^{2}}{a})=4c^{2}-\frac{b^{4}}{a^{2}}<0即2ac<b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}不等式两边同除以a2得:e^{2}-2e-1>0解得:e>\sqrt{2}+1故答安为:(,5++a=0

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$M$为抛物线上一点，且$|M F|=3|O F|$, $\Delta M F O$的面积为$16 \sqrt{2}$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Area(TriangleOf(M, F, O)) = 16*sqrt(2)
process: 因为抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为F(\frac{p}{2},0)设M(x_{0},y_{0}),由|MF|=3|OF|可得:(x_{0}-\frac{p}{2})^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=(\frac{3p}{2})^{2}又因为y_{0}^{2}=2px_{0},所以(x_{0}-\frac{p}{2})^{2}+2px_{0}=(\frac{3p}{2})^{2},即x_{0}2+px_{0}-2p^{2}=0,解得x_{0}=p或x_{0}=-2p(舍去)所以M(p,\pm\sqrt{2}p)所以S_{\triangleMFO}=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{p}{2}\times\sqrt{2}p=16\sqrt{2},解得p=\pm8因为p>0,所以p=8.故抛物线的方程为y^{2}=16x.

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\sqrt{5}$. $P$是$C$上一点，且$F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P$.若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$4$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Eccentricity(C)=sqrt(5);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F1, P), LineSegmentOf(F2, P));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 4
C1: Hyperbola;a: Number;C2: Hyperbola;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C1) = (y^2/a^2 - x^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Asymptote(C1) = Asymptote(C2)
process: 双曲线C_{2}:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{2}x,而双曲线C_{1}:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x所以\frac{a}{b}=\frac{1}{2}所以双曲线C_{1}的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a2}}=\sqrt{1+4}=\sqrt{5}

text: $AB$是过$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$右焦点$F$的弦，过$A$作右准线的垂线$AA_{1}$,$A_{1}$为垂足，连接$BA_{1}$交$x$轴 于$C$点，则$C$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;A1: Point;F: Point;G:Curve;C:Point;Expression(G)=(x^2/16-y^2/9=1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B));RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,LineSegmentOf(A,A1));IsPerpendicular(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1));FootPoint(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1))=A1;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B,A1),xAxis)=C

text: 焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的离心率为$\frac{3}{5}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/k = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Eccentricity(G) = 3/5

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2-m}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m - 1) + y^2/(2 - m) = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)
process: 根据题意,方程\frac{x2}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2-m}=1表示焦点在x轴上的椭圆则必有\begin{cases}m-1>2^{n}-\\2-m>0\end{cases},解可得:\frac{3}{2}<m<2,即m的取值范围是(\frac{3}{2},2)

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点$F$作斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) = k;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)
G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x + 1)^2 = 1);Center(H) = Focus(G)
process: \because圆心为(-1,0),\therefore\frac{p}{2}=1,\thereforep=2,

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{5} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(5)*x)
process: 由题得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{5},\thereforeb^{2}=5a^{2},\thereforec^{2}-a^{2}=5a^{2},所以c^{2}=6a^{2},\therefore\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=e^{2}=6,\thereforee=\sqrt{6}所以该双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{6}

text: 设$e$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率，若$e \in(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}]$，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/4 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e,(1/2, sqrt(3)/2])
process: 当a>4时,e=\frac{\sqrt{a-4}}{\sqrt{a}}=\sqrt{\frac{a-4}{a}},所以\frac{1}{2}<\sqrt{\frac{a-4}{a}}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以\frac{16}{3}<a\leqslant16.当0<a<4时,e=\frac{\sqrt{4-a}}{2},所以\frac{1}{2}<\frac{\sqrt{4-a}}{2}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以1\leqslanta<3.所以a的取值范围是[1,3)\cup(\frac{10}{2}

text: 准线方程为$x=\frac{1}{2}$的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x=1/2)

text: 与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的渐近线，且过点$(2,2)$的双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;C:Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 2);Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(H, C)
process: 试题分析:设与双曲线有相同的渐近线的双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=\lambda(\lambda>0),代入点(2,2)解得\lambda=2\cdot故方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}.\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 设双曲线$m x^{2}+n y^{2}=1$的一个焦点与抛物线$y=\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的焦点相同，离心率为$2$，则抛物线的焦点到双曲线的一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;n: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (m*x^2 + n*y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/8);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，点$A$在抛物线上，若点$P$是抛物线准线上的动点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|A F|=5$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 5
process: \because|AF|=5,\therefore点A到准线的距离为5,即点A的横坐标为4,又点A在抛物线上\therefore点A的坐标为(4,\pm4),\because坐标原点关于准线的对称点的坐标为B(-2,0)则|PA|+|PO|=|PA|+|PB|>|AB|=2\sqrt{13}与睛】本题考查抛物线定义以及利用对称性求最值,考查基本分析求解能力,属基础题

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$、$P$是椭圆$C$上第一象限内的点，$O$是原点. 若$\overrightarrow{F O} \cdot \overrightarrow{F P}=|P F|^{2}$，则椭圆$C$离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);Quadrant(P)=1;DotProduct(VectorOf(F, O), VectorOf(F, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))^2
process: 【分和T】设出P点坐标(x_{0},y_{0}),根据\overrightarrow{FO}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=|PF|得到关于x_{0}的一元二次方程,根据方程有解4\geqslant0求得a,b之间的不等关系,结合a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}可求解出离心率的又值范围设P(x_{0},y_{0}),F(c,0),所以\overrightarrow{FO}=(-c,0),\overrightarrow{FP}=(x_{0}-c,y_{0}),所以\overrightarrow{FO}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=c^{2}-cx_{0}又|PF|^{2}=(x_{0}-c)^{2}+y_{0}^{2},所以(x_{0}-c)^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=c^{2}-cx_{0},所以x_{0}^{2}-cx_{0}+y_{0}^{2}=0,又\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,所以x_{0}2-cx_{0}+b^{2}-\frac{b^{2}x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}=0'所以\frac{c^{2}x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}-cx_{0}+b^{2}=0,因为上述方程有正数解,只需A=c^{2}-4b^{2}.\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}\geqslant0,所以a^{2}\geqslant4b^{2},所以4c^{2}\geqslant3a^{2},所以e^{2}\geqslant\frac{3}{4}且0<e<1,所以e\in\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=-2 p x(p>0)$的准线为圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x=0$的一条切线，则抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);IsTangent(H, Directrix(G)) = True
process: 利用圆心到切线距离等于半径列出等式,即可得到本题答案\because抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=-2px(p>0)\therefore其准线方程为x=\frac{p}{2},而圆的标准方程为(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4,圆心为(2,0),半径r=2,因为x=\frac{p}{2}是圆的一条切线,所以|2-\frac{p}{2}|=2,得p=0(舍去)或p=8,抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}==-16x

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的准线与$x$轴交于点$M$，过焦点$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\tan \angle A M B$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;M: Point;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;L: Line;Inclination(L) = ApplyUnit(60,degree);PointOnCurve(F,L) = True;Intersection(L,C) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point
process: 试题分析:抛物线:C:y^{2}=4x的交点坐标F(1,0),M(-1,0),则AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1),联立方程组\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases}解得x=\frac{1}{3}或3,及A(\frac{1}{3},-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}),B(3,2\sqrt{3}),则k_{AM}=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},k_{BM}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},所以\tan\angleAMB=\frac{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}{1+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.(-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2})}=4\sqrt{3}

text: 设动点$A$的轨迹为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，点$B(2,0)$为定点.若线段$A B$的中点为点$P$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;PointOnCurve(A, G)
process: 设点P(x,y),可得出点A(2x-4,2y),再将点A的坐标代入抛物线的方程,化简即可得出点P的轨迹方程.设点A(x_{0},y_{0})、P(x,y),由中点坐标公式得\begin{cases}x=\frac{x_{0}+2}{2}\\y=\frac{y_{0}}{2}\end{cases},可得\begin{cases}x_{0}=2x-2\\y_{0}=2y\end{cases}由于点A在抛物线y^{2}=4x上,即y_{0}^{2}=4x_{0},所以,4y^{2}=4(2x-2),化简得y^{2}=2x-2因此,点P的轨迹方程为y^{2}=2x-2

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点到直线$x+2 y+7=0$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y + 7 = 0)

text: 已知$\triangle ABC$外接圆半径$R=\frac{14 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，且$\angle ABC=120^{\circ}$, $BC=10$，边$BC$在$x$轴上且$y$轴垂直平分$BC$边，则过点$A$且以$B$、$C$为焦点的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;R: Number;Radius(CircumCircle(TriangleOf(A, B, C))) = R;R = 14*sqrt(3)/3;AngleOf(A, B, C) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);LineSegmentOf(B, C) = 10;OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, C), xAxis);PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = yAxis;G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(A, G);Focus(G) = {B, C}

text: 双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=1$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2 = 1)

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上一点$A$到焦点$F$的距离为$4$，若点$M$为抛物线$C$准线上的动点，若$\overrightarrow{M F}=3 \overrightarrow{F A}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(A, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(A, F) = 4;PointOnCurve(M, Directrix(C));VectorOf(M, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, A)
process: 作AE垂直于准线于E,由抛物线的定义可得|AE|=|AF|=4,再由相似的知识即可得解.若p>0,作AE垂直于准线于E,设准线与x轴的交点为N,如图,因为\overrightarrow{MF}=3\overrightarrow{FA},所以|MF|=3|FA|=12,|MA|=16.由相似的性质可得\frac{|MF|}{|MA|}=\frac{|NF|}{|AE|}即\frac{12}{16}=\frac{|NF|}{4},所以|NF|=3,所以D=3;当D<0时,同理可得p=-3.

text: 已知$x_{0}<0$,$M(x_{0}, 0)$,$O$为坐标原点，若在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle O M N=45^{\circ}$，则$x_{0}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: x0: Number;x0 < 0;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (x0, 0);O: Origin;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);N: Point;PointOnCurve(N, C);AngleOf(O, M, N) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)
process: 过M作C的一条切线,切点为Q,如图所示:设\angleOMQ=\theta,因为在抛物线C:y^{2}=4x上存在点N,使得\angleOMN=45^{\circ}所以\theta\geqslant45^{\circ},当\theta=45^{\circ}时,直线MQ的方程为y=x-x_{0},将y=x-x_{0}代入y^{2}=4x,可得y^{2}-4y-4x_{0}=0.由\triangle=16+16x_{0}=0,解得x_{0}=-1,所以x_{0}的取值范围为[-1,0).

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且线段$P F_{1}$的中点恰好在$y$轴上，$|P F_{1}|=\lambda|P F_{2}|$，则$\lambda$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)), yAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = lambda*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));lambda:Number

text: 已知点$A(-\frac{1}{2}, 0)$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，且$|A P|=\sqrt{2}|P F|$，则$|O P|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(A) = (-1/2, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, P)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))
process: 设P(\frac{1}{2}m^{2},m),根据条件结合距离公式求出m^{2}=1,即可求得|OP|.由已知可得F(\frac{1}{2},0),设P(\frac{1}{2}m^{2},m)\because|AP|=\sqrt{2}|PF|,\therefore|AP|^{2}=2|PF|^{2}则(\frac{m^{2}}{2}+\frac{1}{2})^{2}+m^{2}=2[(\frac{m^{2}}{2}-\frac{1}{2})^{2}+m^{2}],解得m^{2}=1\therefore|OP|=\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}m^{4}+m^{2}}=\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+1}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与双曲线左支的一个交点为$P$. 若以$A_{1} A_{2}$为直径的圆与直线$P F_{2}$相切，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;G: Circle;H: Circle;F2: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;A1: Point;A2: Point;b>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 - y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A1;RightVertex(C) = A2;LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2),G);OneOf(Intersection(G,LeftPart(C)))=P;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A1,A2),H);IsTangent(H,LineOf(P,F2))
process: 设以A_{1}A_{2}为直径的圆与直线PF_{2}相切于点M,由双曲线方程知:|OA_{1}|=|OA_{2}|=\sqrt{5};\becausePF_{1}\botPF_{2},OM\botPF_{2},\thereforeOM/\!/PF_{1},又O为F_{1}F_{2}中点,\therefore|PF_{1}|=2|OM|=2\sqrt{5}由双曲线定义知:|PF_{2}|-|PF_{1}|=2\sqrt{5},\therefore|PF_{2}|=4\sqrt{5},\thereforeS_{\DeltaF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{5}\times4\sqrt{5}=20

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 k-3}=1$表示的图形是双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G)=(x^2/(2-k)+y^2/(2*k-3)=1);k:Number

text: 已知椭圆$M$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，抛物线$N$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F_{2}$. 若$P$为$M$与$N$的一个公共点，且$|P F_{1}|=\sqrt{2}|P F_{2}|$，则$M$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: N: Parabola;p: Number;M: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(N) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M) = F1;RightFocus(M) = F2;Focus(N) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(M,N))=P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 根据抛物线与椭圆的定义转化边角关系求解即可.由抛物线的定义可知,准线为过左焦点且垂直与x轴的直线作PQ\botF_{1}Q,则PF_{2}=PQ,又|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{2}|PF_{2}|,故QF_{1}=\sqrt{PF_{1}^{2}-PQ^{2}}=\sqrt{PF_{1}^{2}-PF_{2}^{2}}=PF_{2}=PQ.故\trianglePF_{1}Q为等腰直角三角形.故\anglePF_{1}Q=\frac{\pi}{4},又\anglePF_{1}Q+\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{2},故\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}又|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{2}|PF_{2}|,同理可得F_{1}F_{2}=PF_{2}.故\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}也为等腰直角三角形

text: 已知$A$、$B$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右顶点，点$M$、$N$为椭圆上的两个动点，满足线段$M N$与$x$轴垂直，则直线$M A$与$N B$交点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;M: Point;N: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;PointOnCurve(M,G);PointOnCurve(N,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,N),xAxis)
process: 先求出A、B坐标,由MN与x轴垂直,设出M、N的坐标,设MA与NB的交点为P,利用三点共线得到k_{PA}=k_{MA},k_{PB}=k_{NB},用坐标表示出来,两式相乘,消去x_{1},y_{1}即可得到直线MA与NB交点的轨迹方程.羊解】因为A,B分别为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的左、右顶点,所以A(-2,0),B(2,0)设MA与NB的交点为P,P(x,y),M(x_{1},y_{1}),N(x_{1},-y_{1})由k_{PA}=k_{MA'}k_{PB}=k_{NB},得\frac{y}{x+2}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}+2},\frac{y}{x-2}=\frac{-y_{1}}{x_{1}-2}两式相乘得\frac{y^{2}}{-4}=\frac{-3(1-\frac{x_{1}}{4})}{x_{1}^{2}-4}=\frac{3}{4},化解得\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 已知直线$y=2 x-2$与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\overrightarrow{F A} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x - 2);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Focus(G) = F

text: 已知直线$l$过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点$F$且交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$，过点$O$作直线$A B$的垂线，垂足为$H$，则点$H$为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};O: Origin;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(O, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, LineOf(A, B));H: Point;FootPoint(Z, LineOf(A, B)) = H
process: 由椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1,可得F(-1,0),\textcircled{1}若直线l无斜率,直线方程为x=-1,此时A-1,\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},B-1\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\therefore\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=1-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{2},不符合题意.\textcircled{2}若直线l有斜率,设直线l的方程为y=k(x+1),联立方程组\begin{cases}y=k(x+1)\\x^{2}+2v2=2\end{cases},消元得:(1+2k^{2})x^{2}+4k^{2}x+2k^{2}-2=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1})'B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}-2}{1+2k^{2}},x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{4k^{2}}{1+2k^{2}}\thereforey_{y_{2}}=k^{2}(x_{1}+1)(x_{2}+1)=k^{2}x_{1}x_{2}+(x_{1}+x_{2})+1,\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=0\Rightarrowx_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=0,\therefore(k^{2}+1)x_{1}x_{2}+k^{2}(x_{1}+x_{2})+k^{2}=0,.(k^{2}+1)^{2k^{2}-2}-\frac{4k^{2}}{1+2k^{2}}\cdotk^{2}+k^{2}=0,化为:k^{2}=2.解得k=\pm\sqrt{2}\therefore直线l的方程为\sqrt{2}x-y+\sqrt{2}=0,或\sqrt{2}x+y+\sqrt{2}=0,经过O且与直线l垂直的直线方程为:y=\pm\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}x.\sqrt{2}x+y+\sqrt{2}=0y=\frac{1}{5}x解得H.\frac{2}{3},\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3},或-\frac{2}{3},\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 已知点$P$在曲线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$上，曲线$C$在点$P$处的切线为$l$，过点$P$且与直线$l$垂直的直线与曲线$C$的另一交点为$Q$、$O$为坐标原点，若$OP \perp OQ$，则点$P$的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/2);PointOnCurve(P, C);TangentOnPoint(P, C) = l;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(P, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, l);Intersection(Z, C) = Q;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(O, Q))

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a \neq 0)$上的一点$P(1,4)$到其焦点$F$的距离$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);Coordinate(P) = (1, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F;Distance(P, F) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Negation(a = 0)
process: r-----工】将点P的坐标代入抛物线方程,求出a的值,可得出抛物线的标准方程,利用抛物线的定义可求得|PF|.将点P的坐标代入抛物线方程得a=4^{2}=16,所以抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=16x抛物线的准线方程为x=-4,因此,|PF|=1+4=5.均答家为:5

text: 已知点$A(3,4)$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$的左、右焦点，若以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆经过点$A$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
