text: 若直线$m x+n y=4$和圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=4$没有交点，则过点$(m, n)$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的交点个数为 个?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Circle;H: Line;m: Number;n: Number;I: Point;L:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(H) = (m*x + n*y = 4);Coordinate(I) = (m, n);NumIntersection(H, O)=0;PointOnCurve(I,L)
G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-4, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5, 3);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程是$y=\pm 2 x$，则此双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-2 k}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/(k + 5) + y^2/(4 - 2*k) = 1) ;k:Number
process:
由题意,方程 rac{x^{2}}{5+k}+ rac{y2}{4-2k}=1表示椭圆,则满足 egin{cases}5+k>0\4-2k>0\5+k
eq4-2k\end{cases}解得-5<k<2且k
eq- rac{1}{3},即实数k的取值范围为-5<k<2且k
eq- rac{1}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线交椭圆于两点$P$、$Q$，若$\angle F_{1} P Q=60^{\circ} $，$|P F_{1}|=|P Q| $,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;F1: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};AngleOf(F1, P, Q) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,Q))
process: 由几何关系得出\trianglePF_{1}Q为正三角形,结合椭圆的定义,得出PQ\botx轴,利用椭圆方程得出|PF_{2}|=\frac{b^{2}}{a},结合直角三角形的边角关系得出\sqrt{3}a^{2}-\sqrt{3}c^{2}=2ac,再解方程\sqrt{3}e^{2}+2e-\sqrt{3}=0即可得出答案.详解】\because\angleF_{1}PQ=60^{\circ},|PF_{1}|=|PQ|\because\trianglePF_{1}Q为正三角形,则|PF_{1}|=|PQ|=|F_{1}Q由椭圆的定义可知,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,|QF_{1}|+|QF_{2}|=2a则|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=|PF_{1}|+|QF_{2}|,即|PF_{2}|=|QF_{2}|\thereforePQ\botx轴设点P(c,y_{0}),y_{0}>0,由\begin{cases}\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\a^{2}-k^{2}+c^{2}\end{cases},解得y_{0}=\frac{b^{2}}{a},即|PF_{2}|=\frac{b^{2}}{a}在AF_{1}PF_{2}中,\tan\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}}{|F_{1}F_{2}|}=2c\cdot\frac{a}{b^{2}}=\sqrt{3}即\sqrt{3}b^{2}=2ac,\sqrt{3}a^{2}-\sqrt{3}c^{2}=2ac\therefore\sqrt{3}e^{2}+2e-\sqrt{3}=0,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左, 右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点在$y$轴上，则$\frac{| P F_{2} |}{|P F_{1}|}$的值为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)),yAxis) = True

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$的倾斜角为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2*sqrt(3)/3;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x*(b/a))
process: \because双曲线的离心率为\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\therefore1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{4}{3},\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},\therefore直线y=\frac{b}{a}x的倾斜角为\frac{\pi}{6}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3 m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{5 n^{2}}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2 m^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 n^{2}}=1$有公共的焦点，那么双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;n: Number;m: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(3*n^2) + x^2/(2*m^2) = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2/(5*n^2) + x^2/(3*m^2) = 1);Focus(H) = Focus(G)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，$C$与过原点的直线相交于$A$ , $B$两点，连接$AF$，$BF$，若$|A B|=10$,$|A F|=6$,$\cos \angle A B F=\frac{4}{5}$，则$C$的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;G: Line;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(C, G) = {A,B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 10;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 6;Cos(AngleOf(A, B, F)) = 4/5;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e

C1:Hyperbola;C2:Hyperbola;a:Number;b:Number;a>0;b>0;m:Number;n:Number;m>0;n>0;e1:Number;e2:Number;Expression(C1)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(C2)=(y^2/m^2-x^2/n^2=1);Eccentricity(C1)=e1;Eccentricity(C2)=e2;Asymptote(C1)=Asymptote(C2)
process: 双曲线C_{1}:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的离心率为e_{1}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a},双曲线C_{2}:\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}=1(m>0,n>0)的离心率为e_{2}=双曲线C_{1}与C_{2}有相同的渐近线,可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{m}{n},m=\frac{b}{a}n'则1<\sqrt{1+\frac{2ab}{a2+b^{2}}}当且仅当a=b等号成立,则0<\frac{2ab}{a^{2}+b^{2}}\leqslant\sqrt{2},故\frac{1}{e_{1}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}}的取值范围是(1,\sqrt{2}]

text: $F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$k$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$P$、$Q$两点，线段$P Q$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$M$，且$|P Q|=6$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);k: Number;Slope(l) = k;P: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};M: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)), xAxis) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = 6
process: 先根据抛物线方程求出p的值,再由抛物线性质求出PQ的垂直平分线方程,即可得到答案\because抛物线C:y^{2}=4x,\thereforep=2,焦点F(1,0)可设直线l:y=k(x-1),P(x_{1},y_{1}),Q(x_{2}y_{2})将y=k(x-1)代入抛物线C:y^{2}=4x得:k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0\thereforex_{1}+x2=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}}\because|_{PQ}|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}}+2=6,\thereforek=\pm\sqrt{2}设PQ中点为N(x_{0}y_{0}),则x_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{2+\frac{4}{k^{2}}}{2}=\frac{4}{2}=2,y_{0}=k(x_{0}-1)=k所以线段PQ的垂直平分线方程:y-k=-\frac{1}{k}(x-2)令y=0,可得x=4,所以|MF|=4-1=3

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，点$P$在$y$轴上射影是$M$，点$A(4 , 6)$，则$|PA|+|PM|$的最小值?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (4, 6);PointOnCurve(P, G);Projection(P, yAxis) = M

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$A$到$x$轴的距离为$m$，到直线$x+2 y+8=0$的距离为$n$，则$m+n$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;m:Number;n:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y + 8 = 0);PointOnCurve(A, G);Distance(A, xAxis) = m;Distance(A,H)=n
process: 根据抛物线的定义可知,点A到准线的距离和到焦点的距离相等,即m=|AF|-1如图,|AP|=n,则m+n=|AF|+|AP|-1,而|AF|+|AP|的最小值是点F(0,1)到直线x+2y+8=0的距离d=\frac{|2+8|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}}}=2\sqrt{5}所以m+n的最小值是2\sqrt{5}-1.

text: 已知斜率为$\sqrt{2}$的直线与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，$A B$的中点为$P$，若直线$O P$的斜率为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;Slope(G) = sqrt(2);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};O: Origin;P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;Slope(LineOf(O, P)) = 2*sqrt(2)
G: Ellipse;F1: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-2, 0);F2: Point;Coordinate(F2) = (2, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5/2, -3/2);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True
process: 设椭圆F的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),依题意得c=2,\thereforea=\sqrt{10},则b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=6,故椭圆F的标准)方程为\frac{x^{2}}{10}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1;

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$焦点作直线$l$，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点若线段$A B$中点$M$的横坐标为$2$，则$|A B|$等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;M:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 6*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M;XCoordinate(M)=2
process: 根据抛物线的方程即可求出p=3,再根据中点坐标公式即可求出x_{1}+x_{2},最后根据抛物线的焦点弦公式即可求出|AB|.\becausey2=6x,则p=3,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})\because线段AB中点M的横坐标为2,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=2\times2=4,\therefore|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=4+3=7

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的点到直线$4 x-5 y+40=0$的最小距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (4*x - 5*y + 40 = 0)
process: 试题分析:设椭圆上的点(5\cos\alpha,3\sin\alpha),点到直线的距离d=\frac{|20\cos\alpha-15\sin\alpha+40|}{\sqrt{4^{2}+5^{2}}}=\frac{|25\cos(\alpha+\beta)+40|}{\sqrt{41}},\tan\beta=\frac{3}{4},当\cos(\alpha+\beta)=-1时,d_{\min}=\frac{15}{\sqrt{41}}=\frac{15}{41}\sqrt{41}老点:直线与椭圆

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,以$F_{2}$为圆心作半径为$1$的圆$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$C$上一点，$Q$为圆$F_{2}$上一点，则$|P F_{1}|+|P Q|$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F2: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;Q: Point;F: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 + y^2/6 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Center(F) = F2;Radius(F) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, C);PointOnCurve(Q, F)
process: 由椭圆方程可知:a=3由椭圆定义得:|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=6\Rightarrow|PF_{1}|=6-|PF,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PQ|=6+|PQ|-|PF_{2}|又-|QF_{2}|\leqslant|PQ|-|PF_{2}|\leqslant|QF_{2}|且|QF_{2}|=1\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PQ|=6+|PQ|-|PF_{2}|\in[5,7]本题正确结果:[5,7

text: 设$A(-2,0)$, $B(2,0)$，若直线$y=a x(a>0)$上存在一点$P$满足$|P A|+|P B|=6$，且$\Delta P A B$的内心到$x$轴的距离为$\frac{3 \sqrt{30}}{20}$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (y = a*x);Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B))=6;Distance(Incenter(TriangleOf(P,A,B)), xAxis) = (3*sqrt(30))/20
process: 由题意可得点P为直线y=ax(a>0)与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1的交点,直线方程与椭圆方程联立可得y^{2}=\frac{45a^{2}}{9a^{2}+5},由\trianglePAB的内心到x轴的距离为\frac{3\sqrt{30}}{20},即\trianglePAB的内切圆的半径r=\frac{3\sqrt{30}}{20},由等面积法可求出参数a的值.点P满足|PA|+|PB|=6,则点P在椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1上.由题意可得点P为直线y=ax(a>0)与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1的交点联立y=ax与\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1'消去y得x^{2}=\frac{45}{9a^{2}+5},则y^{2}=\frac{45a^{2}}{9a^{2}+5}因为\triangleAPB的内心到x轴的距离为\frac{3\sqrt{30}}{20},所以\trianglePAB的内切圆的半径r=\frac{3\sqrt{30}}{20}所以\triangleAPB的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times|AB|\times|y|=\frac{1}{2}\timesr\times(|AB|+|PA|+|PB|,即|y|=\frac{5}{2}r,y^{2}=\frac{45a^{2}}{9a^{2}+5}=\frac{5}{4}r^{2}=\frac{25}{4}\times\frac{27}{40},解得a^{2}=3,又a>0,则a=\sqrt{3}睛】本题考查考查直线与椭圆的位置关系,根据椭圆的焦点三角形的相关性质求参数,属于中档题

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 过$F_{1}$且与$x$轴垂直的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，直线$A F_{2}$与椭圆的另一个交点为$C$，若$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{2} C}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, F2), G) = {A, C};VectorOf(A, F2) = 2*VectorOf(F2, C)
process: F_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0)设A(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a})过点C作CD\botx轴,垂直为D,如图由Rt\DeltaAF_{1}F_{2}\simRt\DeltaCDF_{2}且\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}=2\overrightarrow{F_{2}C}\therefore\frac{CD}{AF}=\frac{DF_{2}}{F_{1}F_{1}}=\frac{F_{2}C}{AF}=\frac{1}{2},\thereforeC(2c,-\frac{b^{2}}{\frac{b^{2}}{a})},代入椭圆方程得\frac{4c^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{b^{2}}{4x^{2}}=1\Rightarrow\frac{4c^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{a^{2}-c^{2}}{4a^{2}}=1解得:e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的弦被点$(\frac{1}{2} , \frac{1}{2})$平分，则这条弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);H: LineSegment;IsChordOf(H,G) = True;Coordinate(MidPoint(H)) = (1/2, 1/2)

text: 直线过点$P(-1,0)$且交抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$是线段$P B$的中点，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 0);PointOnCurve(P, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = A
process: 设B(x_{0},y_{0}),则A(\frac{x_{0}-1}{2},\frac{y_{0}}{2}),将A,B两点的坐标代入抛物线方程得\begin{cases}y_{0}^{2}=4x_{0}\\(\frac{y_{0}}{2})^{2}=4\times\frac{x_{0}-1}{2}\end{cases}.则A(\frac{1}{2},\sqrt{2}),B(2,2\sqrt{2})或A(\frac{1}{2},-\sqrt{2}),B(2,-2\sqrt{2}),可得斜率为\underline{2\sqrt{2}}

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1)

text: 已知曲线$C$: $y=\frac{\sqrt{20-x^{2}}}{2}$与直线$l$: $y=-x+m$仅有一个公共点，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;m:Number;Expression(C) = (y = sqrt(20 - x^2)/2);Expression(l)=(y=m-x);NumIntersection(l,C)=1
process: 如图画出曲线_{C}:y=\frac{\sqrt{20-x^{2}}}{2}的图象,要使直线l:y=-x+m与其仅有一个公共点,则存在两种情形,\textcircled{1}曲线与直线相切,联立方程得\begin{cases}y=-x+m\\y=\frac{\sqrt{20-x^{2}}}{2}\end{cases}消元得:5x^{2}-8mx+4m^{2}-20=0因方程只有一个解,则A=0可得m=5或m=-5(舍去)\textcircled{2}直线与曲线相交,由图可知,临界条件为直线(-2\sqrt{5},0)或(2\sqrt{5},0)则-2\sqrt{5}\leqslantm<2\sqrt{5},综上,-2\sqrt{5}\leqslantm<2\sqrt{5}或m=5,

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$的两个焦点，$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{P F}_{1} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 4);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F1),VectorOf(P,F2))=0
process: 双曲线x^{2}-4y^{2}=4\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1,不妨设|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|>|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|,则|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|-|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=4故|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}-2|\overrightarrow{PF}|\cdot|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=16\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0\therefore\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\bot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}故|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}=(2\sqrt{5})^{2}=20故|\overrightarrow{PF}|.|\overrightarrow{PF}|=2

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=m y$过点$(-1,1)$，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = m*y);Coordinate(H) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 因为抛物线x^{2}=my过点(-1,1),所以m=1,所以x^{2}=y,所以抛物线的焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{4})

text: 已知直线$l$: $a x+(a+1) y+2=0$，点$P(-2,0)$，作$P M \perp l$于点$M$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;P: Point;M: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-2, 0);Expression(l) = (a*x + y*(a + 1) + 2 = 0);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,M),l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,M),l)=M
process: 直线/的方程可化为a(x+y)+y+2=0,解方程组\begin{cases}x+y=0\\y+2=0\end{cases},可得\begin{cases}x=2\\y=-2\end{cases}即直线l过定点Q(2,-2),又因为PM\botl,所以\trianglePMQ为直角三角形根据在圆中直径所对的圆心角是直角可知:点M在以PQ为直径的圆上,又点P(-2,0),所以线段PQ的中点坐标为(0,-1)所以点M的轨迹方程为x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=5.

fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = (x^2 +y^2 + 4*x = 0);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = (x^2 +y^2 - 4*x -60 = 0);M: Circle;M1: Point;Center(M) = M1;IsOutTangent(M, C1);IsInTangent(M, C2)
process: C_{1}圆心为(-2,0)半径为2,C_{2}圆心为(2,0),半径为8.设动圆的半径为r,根据两个圆内切和外切的概念,有|MC|=r+2,|MC_{2}|=8-r,|MC|+|MC_{2}|=10符合椭圆的定义,且2a=10,2c=4,b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=21,故椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$上的点$P$到焦点的距离为$8$，则$P$到$x$轴的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 8*y);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = 8

text: 平面上两定点$A$ , $B$之间的距离为$10$，动点$P$满足$PB-PA=6$，则点$P$到$AB$中点的距离的最小值?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Distance(A, B) = 10;-LineSegmentOf(P, A) + LineSegmentOf(P, B) = 6

text: 已知斜率$k(k>0)$为的直线过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且与抛物线$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$、$B$分别作该抛物线准线的垂线，垂足分别为$A_{1}$、$B_{1}$，若$\frac{S_{\Delta A B B_{1}}}{S_{\triangle AB A_{1}}}=4$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;k: Number;k > 0;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;A1: Point;B1: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = k;Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};l1: Line;l2: Line;PointOnCurve(A, l1);PointOnCurve(B, l2);IsPerpendicular(l1, Directrix(C));IsPerpendicular(l2, Directrix(C));FootPoint(l1, Directrix(C)) = A1;FootPoint(l2, Directrix(C)) = B1;Area(TriangleOf(A, B, B1))/Area(TriangleOf(A, B, A1)) = 4
process: 如图所示:抛物线C:y^{2}=4x,F(1,0)设直线AB:y=k(x-1),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由题知:\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\\end{cases}\begin{cases}y=4x\\y=1\end{cases}x_{1}x_{2}=1.因为\frac{S_{\DeltaABB_{1}}}{S_{\DeltaABA_{1}}=\frac{\frac{1}{2}|BB_{1}|\cdot|A_{1}B_{1}|}{\frac{1}{2}|AA_{1}|\cdot|A_{1}B_{1}|}=\frac{|BB_{1}|}{|AA_{1}|}=\frac{x_{2}+1}{x_{1}+1}=4,所以\begin{cases}\frac{x_{2}+1}{x_{1}+1}=4\\x_{1}x_{0}=1\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}x_{1}=\frac{1}{4}\\x_{2}=4\end{cases},解得A(\frac{1}{4},-1),B(4,4)所以k=\frac{x_{1}x_{2}+1}{4-\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{4}{3}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$的右焦点，且倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交双曲线于点$A$、$B$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(45, degree) ;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点为圆心，且与双曲线的渐近线相切的圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);H: Circle;Center(H) = RightFocus(G);IsTangent(H, Asymptote(G))
process: 由已知,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1中,c^{2}=5+4,c=3,焦点在x轴上,故圆心(3,0),渐近线方程:y=\frac{+\sqrt{5}}{2}x,又圆与渐近线相切,\therefore圆心到渐近线距离即为半径长,r=\frac{3\times\frac{x}{2}}{\sqrt{\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}}^{2}+1^{2}=\sqrt{5},\therefore所求圆的方程为(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=5

text: 已知椭圆$G$的中心在坐标原点，焦距为$4$，且椭圆上一点到椭圆焦点的最小距离为$6$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G:Ellipse;O:Origin;P:Point;Center(G)=O;FocalLength(G) = 4;PointOnCurve(P,G);Min(Distance(P,Focus(G)))=6
process: 利用已知条件列出方程组,求解a、c,得到椭圆的离心率.椭圆G的中心在坐标原点,焦距为4,且椭圆上一点到椭圆焦点的最小距离为6\begin{cases}2c=4\\a-c=6\end{cases},解得a=8,c=2,所以椭圆的离心率为:e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{4}

text: 点$P(x, y)$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+y^{2}=1$上的任意一点，则$x+3 y$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 试题分析:由椭圆方程得x^{2}+9y^{2}=9,因为2(x^{2}+9y^{2})\geqslant(x+3y)^{2},所以\sqrt{18}\geqslant\sqrt{(x+3y)^{2}}=x+3y,当且仅当x=3y时等号成立,即x=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2},y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}时,x+3y有最大值3\sqrt{2},所以答案应填:3\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，过点$F_{2}$作与$x$轴垂直的直线，且这条直线与双曲线的一个交点为$P$，已知$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{6}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P;AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = pi/6

C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 13;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 15;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 12/5;Eccentricity(C) = e

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$ , $F$是抛物线的焦点，直线$l$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|+|B F|=6$，则线段$A B$中点的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 6
process: \because抛物线y^{2}=4x,\thereforep=2,直线l与抛物线相交于A、B两点,设其横坐标分别为x_{1},x_{2},因为|AF|+|BF|=6,利用抛物线定义,所以x_{1}+\frac{p}{2}+x_{2}+\frac{p}{2}=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=6,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=4所以AB中点横坐标为x_{0}=\frac{1}{2}(x_{1}+x_{2})=2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=2 x$，它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=20 x$的焦点相同，则双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = 2*x);H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 20*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 分析:利用双曲线的渐近线的方程可得\frac{b}{a}=2,的焦点抛物线y^{2}=20x的焦点相同即可得出c,即可求得结论.详由题得\frac{b}{a}=2,c=5,再由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}得a^{2}=5,b^{2}=20故双曲线的方程是\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1

text: 如果实数$x$，$y$满足$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$,$x+y<c$恒成立，则$c$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: x_: Real;y_: Real;c: Number;x_^2/2 + y_^2 = 1;x_ + y_ < c
process: 试题分析:由\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1可设x=\sqrt{2}\cos\theta,y=\sin\theta\thereforex+y=\sin\theta+\sqrt{2}\cos\theta=\sqrt{3}\sin(\theta+\varphi)\thereforex+y最大值为\sqrt{3},则c的取值范围是(\sqrt{3},+\infty)

text: 过抛物线$y=a x^{2}(a>0)$的焦点$F$作一直线交抛物线于$P$、$Q$两点.若线段$P F$与$F Q$长分别为$p$, $q$ ,则$\frac{1}{p}+\frac{1}{q}$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};p:Number;q:Number;Length(LineSegmentOf(P,F))=p;Length(LineSegmentOf(F,Q))=q
process: 抛物线的标准方程为x^{2}=\frac{1}{a}y,其焦点为F(0,\frac{1}{4a}),设点P(x_{1},y_{1})、Q(x_{2},y_{2})设直线PQ的方程为y=kx+\frac{1}{4a},联立\begin{cases}y=kx+\frac{1}{4a}\\y=ax^{2}\end{cases},可得ax^{2}-kx-\frac{1}{4a}=0,由韦达定理得x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{k}{a},x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{1}{4a^{2}}由抛物线的定义可得

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, Asymptote(C));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M, F1), LineSegmentOf(M, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = 2*b + Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2))
process: 不妨设点M在第一象限,设|MF_{1}|=m,|MF_{2}|=n,则m=2b+n,而MF_{1}\botMF_{2},故m^{2}+n^{2}=4c^{2},联立两式可得,mn=2c^{2}-2b^{2}又点C在以原点为圆心,半径为c的圆上.联立\begin{cases}y=\frac{b}{a}x\\x^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2}\end{cases}可得M(a,b),由三角形的面积公式,可得\frac{1}{2}mn=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2cb,即c^{2}-b^{2}=cb,故a^{2}=bc,即a^{4}=b^{2}c^{2},故a^{4}=b^{2}(a^{2}+b^{2})故b^{4}+a^{2}b^{2}-a^{4}=0,则(\frac{b}{a})^{4}+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}-1=0,解得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2}.1本题考查了双曲线的几何性质,属中档题.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/4 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - sqrt(3)*y + 8 + 2*sqrt(3) = 0);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, l);WhenMax(AngleOf(F1, P, F2))
process: 先根据椭圆\frac{x2}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的方程得出其左右焦点分别为F_{1}(-2\sqrt{3},0)、与F_{2}(2\sqrt{3},0).如图,根据平面几何知识知,当\angleF_{1}PF_{2}取最大值时,经过F_{1}与F_{2}的圆与直线l相切,求出圆心坐标,再利用相似三角形的知识得出\frac{|PF_{1}|}{|PF_{2}|}=\frac{PB}{BF_{2}},最后利用相似比即可求出答案羊解】椭圆\frac{x2}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的左右焦点分别为F_{1}(-2\sqrt{3},0)、与F_{2}(2\sqrt{3},0)如图,根据平面几何知识知,当\angleF_{1}PF_{2}取最大值时,经过F_{1}与F_{2}的圆与直线l相切,此时圆心在y轴上,坐标为A(0,2),在直线l:x-\sqrt{3}y+8+2\sqrt{3}=0中令y=0得B的坐标;B(-8-2\sqrt{3},0)在三角形BPF_{1}和三角形BF_{2}P中,\angleBPF_{1}=\angleBF_{2}P,\thereforeABPF_{1}\cdot\triangleBF_{2}P,\therefore\frac{|PF_{1}|}{|PF_{1}|}=\frac{PB}{BF_{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{AB^{2}-PA^{2}}}{BO+OF_{2}}=\sqrt{3}-1

text: 设$P$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$上的一个动点，点$P$到$C$的两条渐近线的距离分别为$d_{1}$和$d_{2}$，则$3 d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;P:Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);l1:Line;l2:Line;Asymptote(C)={l1,l2};Distance(P,l1)=d1;Distance(P,l2)=d2;d1:Number;d2:Number
process: P(x,y)是双曲线上任一点,求出d_{1},d_{2},并求得3d_{1}+d_{2},然后利用点在双曲线上,\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1即(x+\sqrt{2}y)(x-\sqrt{2}y)=2,应用基本不等式可得最小值.双曲线的渐近线方程是x\pm\sqrt{2}y=0,设P(x,y)是双曲线上任一点不妨设d_{1}=\frac{|x-\sqrt{2}y|}{\sqrt{3}},d_{2}=\frac{|x+\sqrt{2}y|}{\sqrt{3}},3d\becauseP(x,y)在双曲线上,\therefore\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1,所以3d_{1}+d_{2}=\frac{3|x-\sqrt{2}y|+|x+\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{3}}\frac{2y)}{2}=2\sqrt{2},三3|x-\sqrt{2}y|=|x+\sqrt{2}y|,即\begin{cases}x=\frac{2\sqrt{6}}{3}\\y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=-\frac{2\sqrt{6}}{3}\\y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\end{cases}时等号成立.\cdot3d_{1}+d_{2}的最小值为2\sqrt{2}.

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点作两条相互垂直的弦$A B$ ,$C D$，且$|A B|+|C D|=\lambda|A B| \cdot|C D|$，则$\lambda$的值为?

process: 焦点为F(\frac{1}{2},0),p=1,设直线AB的倾斜角为\theta,直线CD的斜率角为\theta+\frac{\pi}{2}或\theta-\frac{\pi}{2},显然\theta\neq\frac{\pi}{2}时,记k=\tan\theta,直线AB方程为y=k(x-\frac{1}{2}),设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由\begin{cases}y=k(x-\frac{1}{2})\\v2=2x\end{cases}得k^{2}x^{2}-(k^{2}+2)x+\frac{k^{2}}{4}=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{1}{4},所以|AB|=|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+\frac{1}{2}+x_{2}+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}}+1=2+\frac{2}{k^{2}}\frac{2}{2\theta}=2+\frac{2\cos^{2}\theta}{\sin^{2}\theta}=\frac{2}{\sin^{2}6}\sin^{2}\theta=\frac{2}{\sin^{2}\theta}2p|AB|==\frac{2p}{\sin^{2}\theta},|CD|=\frac{2p}{\sin^{2}(\theta\pm\frac{\pi}{2})}=\frac{\angleP}{\cos2\theta}.\therefore\lambda=\frac{1}{|AB|}+\frac{-}{|}\frac{1}{|CD|}=\frac{\sin^{2}\theta}{2n}+\frac{\cos^{2}\theta}{2n}=\frac{1}{2p}=\frac{1}{2}

process: 试题分析:由题设原点O到直线l:ax+by=ab的距离为d=\frac{ab}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{ab}{c}=1+\frac{1}{3}c,即c^{2}+3c=3ab.而ab\leqslant\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{2}(当且仅当a=b取等号),所以c^{2}+3c=3ab\leqslant\frac{3}{2}(a^{2}+b^{2}),即c^{2}+3c\leqslant\frac{3}{2}c^{2},解之得c\geqslant6,即的最小值为6

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ , $A(2 , 0)$为长轴的一个端点，弦$B C$过椭圆的中心$O$，且$\overrightarrow{A C} \cdot \overrightarrow{B C}=0$,$|\overrightarrow{O C}-\overrightarrow{O B}|=2|\overrightarrow{B C}-\overrightarrow{B A}|$，则椭圆的方程为?

process: \because\overrightarrow{AC}\cdot\overrightarrow{BC}=0,|\overrightarrow{OB}-\overrightarrow{OC}|=2|\overrightarrow{BC}-\overrightarrow{BA}|,\therefore|BC|=2|AC|,AC\botBC.由椭圆的结构特征可得|OC|=|AC|.\becauseA(2,0)为长轴的一个端点,即a=2,\thereforeC点的横坐标为1,即C(1,\pm1)\because点C在椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1上,\thereforeb^{2}=\frac{4}{3},\therefore椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{3y^{2}}{4}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|=5$，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知抛物线$y=a x^{2}(a>0)$上两动点$A$、$B$(不在原点)，满足$\overrightarrow{O A} \perp \overrightarrow{O B}$，若存在点$M$，使得$\overrightarrow{O M}=\lambda \overrightarrow{O A}+\mu \overrightarrow{O B}$，且$\lambda+\mu=1$，则$M$坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number;a>0;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);O: Origin;Negation(A=O);Negation(B=O);IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B));M: Point;lambda: Number;mu: Number;VectorOf(O, M) = lambda*VectorOf(O, A) + mu*VectorOf(O, B);lambda + mu = 1
process: 试题分析:由\overrightarrow{OM}=\lambda\overrightarrow{OA}+\mu\overrightarrow{OB},且\lambda+\mu=1得\overrightarrow{OM}=\lambda\overrightarrow{OA}+(1-\lambda)\overrightarrow{OB}即\overrightarrow{BM}=\lambda\overrightarrow{BA},\thereforeA,B,M三点共线,于是问题转换为动直线AB过定点,设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),则y_{1}=ax_{1}^{2},y_{2}=ax_{2}^{2}两式相减得y_{1}-y_{2}=a(x_{1}+x_{2})\cdot(x_{1}-x_{2})\thereforek_{AB}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=a(x_{1}+x_{2})直线AB方程为y-y_{1}=a(x_{1}+x_{2})(x-x_{1}即y=a(x_{1}+x_{2})(x-x_{1})+y_{1}=a(x_{1}+x_{2})x-ax_{1}-ax_{1}x_{2}+ax_{1}^{2}=a(x_{1}+x_{2})x-ax_{1}x_{2}\cdots(1)\because\overrightarrow{OA}\bot\overrightarrow{OB},\thereforex_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=0,即x_{1}x_{2}+a^{2}x_{1}^{2}x_{2}^{2}=0,即a^{2}x_{1}x_{2}=-1\cdots(2),以(2)代入(1)得y=a(x_{1}+x_{2})x+\frac{1}{a}\therefore直线AB过定点(0,\frac{1}{a}),\thereforeM的坐标是(0,\frac{1}{a})

text: 设$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一个动点，则点$P$到点$A(0,1)$的距离与点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x = -1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: y^{2}=4x的准线是x=-1,\thereforeP到x=-1的距离等于P到焦点F(1,0)的距离,故点P到点A(0,1)的距离与P到x=-1的距离之和等于|PA|+|PF|\geqslant|AF|,即点P到点A(0,1)的距离与点P到直线x=-1的距离之和的最小值为|FA|=\sqrt{2},

text: 若$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右顶点，过坐标原点$O$的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，直线$P A$, $P B$交直线$x=3$于$E$,$F$两点，则$|E F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;J: Line;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;E: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = 3);RightVertex(G) = P;PointOnCurve(O, J);Intersection(J, G) = {A, B};Intersection(LineOf(P, A), H) = E;Intersection(LineOf(P, B), H) = F

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$, 该抛物线上点$P$的横坐标为$2$, 则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);XCoordinate(P) = 2
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的准线方程为:x=-1,根据抛物线的定义可知:|PF|=2-(-1)=3.

text: 长为$3$的线段$A B$的端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$, $y$轴上移动，动点$C(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{A C}=2 \overrightarrow{C B}$，则动点$C$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: Length(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = 3;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A,xAxis) ;PointOnCurve(B,yAxis) ;C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;VectorOf(A,C) = 2*VectorOf(C,B)

text: 直线$l$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上截得弦长为$4$, 其斜率为$2$, 则直线$l$在$y$轴上的截距是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/2 = 1);Length(InterceptChord(l,G))=4;Slope(l)=2
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 - y^2/3 = 1);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = r^2);r: Number;r>0;IsTangent(Asymptote(G), H)
process: 试题分析:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{6}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的一条渐近线方程为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x-y=0,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{6}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的渐近线与圆(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=r^{2}(r>0)相切,所以r=\frac{|\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\times3-0|}{\sqrt{(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})^{2}+1^{2}}}\sqrt{3}.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/4 = 1)
process: 由双曲线方程知:a=2,b=2,所以渐近线的方程为:y=\pmx

text: 中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的双曲线$C$的两条渐近线与圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=1$都相切，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Circle;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 1);Center(C) = O;SymmetryAxis(C)=axis;IsTangent(Asymptote(C),G)
process: 设y=kx是圆(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=1的切线,则\frac{|2k|}{\sqrt{k^{2}+1}}=1,解得k=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}即切线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x''这也是双曲线的渐近线方程.若双曲线为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},b=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}ac=\sqrt{a^{2+b^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2}+\frac{1}{3}a^{2}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{2}a'\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{\frac{y}{a}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则\frac{a}{b}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},b=\sqrt{3}a,c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2+3a}}=2a,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=2.

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$有公共焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两条曲线的一个公共点，则$\cos \angle F_{1} P F_{2}$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};Focus(H)={F1,F2};OneOf(Intersection(H,G))=P

text: 直线$y=x-\frac{1}{2}$被椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=4$截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 4);Expression(H) = (y = x - 1/2)
process: 主要考查椭圆的几何性质、直线与椭圆的位置关系及弦长公式.将y=x-\frac{1}{2}代入x^{2}+4y^{2}=4整理得,5x^{2}-4x-3=0,设弦端点分别为A(x_{1},y_{1})B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{4}{5}\\x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{3}{5}\end{cases},所以弦长AB=\sqrt{1+1^{2}}\sqrt{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-}\frac{2\sqrt{38}}{5}

text: 已知$P$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为左，右焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右支上的一点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$ , $\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{4}$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G));DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 1/4
process: 设|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=m,|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=n,\because\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,\therefore在直角三角形PF_{1}F_{2}中,根据勾股定理得m^{2}+n^{2}=4c^{2},\because\tan\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{1}{4},\therefore\frac{n}{m}=\frac{1}{4}解得m=\frac{8\sqrt{17}}{17}c,n=\frac{2\sqrt{17}}{17}c'根据双曲线的定义可得_{m}-n=\frac{6\sqrt{17}}{17}c=2a\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{17}}{3}.

text: 设$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，过点$F$向双曲线$C$的一条渐近线引垂线，垂足为$A$，交另一条渐近线于点$B$，若$2 \overrightarrow{A F}=\overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;L1:Line;L2:Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C))=L1;OneOf(Asymptote(C))=L2;Negation(L1=L2);L:Line;PointOnCurve(F, L);IsPerpendicular(L1, L);FootPoint(L1, L)=A;Intersection(L,L2)=B;2*VectorOf(A, F) = VectorOf(F, B)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的两个焦点，$P Q$是经过$F_{1}$且垂直于$x$轴的双曲线的弦. 如果$\angle P F_{2} Q=90^{\circ}$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), G);PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(P, Q));IsPerpendicular(xAxis, LineSegmentOf(P, Q));AngleOf(P, F2, Q) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{9}-\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$的一个焦点到一条渐近线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1)

G: Ellipse;H: Circle;C:Circle;P: Point;N: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x + 3)^2 = 1);Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, H);PointOnCurve(N, C)
process: 设F_{1},F_{2}为椭圆的左右焦点,则|PM|+|PN|\geqslant|PF_{1}|-1+|PF_{2}|-1=2a-2=8.等号成立,当P,F_{1},M共线,P,F_{2},N共线,\thereforePN+PM的最小值为8,

text: 已知点$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点，记点$P$到$y$轴距离$d_{1}$，点$P$到直线$l$: $3 x-4 y+12=0$的距离$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (3*x - 4*y + 12 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);d1:Number;d2:Number;Distance(P, yAxis) = d1;Distance(P, l) = d2

C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(M) = (y^2 + (-a + x)^2 = b^2/4);IsTangent(OneOf(Asymptote(C)),M);WhenMax(a^2/(a^2*b^2+1)-(4/49)*a^2)
process: 】首先利用直线与圆相切确定a,b的关系,然后利用导函数研究函数取得最大值时双曲线的实轴长度即可.双曲线的一条渐近线方程为:bx-ay=0,圆与双曲线的渐近线相切,则圆心到直线的距离等于半径,即:\frac{ab}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{ab}{c}=\frac{b}{2}据此可知:c=2a,则c^{2}=4a^{2},b^{2}=3a^{2}故\frac{a^{2}}{a^{2b^{2}+1}-\frac{4}{49}a^{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{a^{2}\times3a^{2}+1}-\frac{4}{49}a^{2}=\frac{3}{49}\times\frac{-12a6+45a^{2}}{3a^{4}+1}令f(a)=\frac{3}{49}\times\frac{-12a6+45a^{2}}{3a+1}(a>0),则f'(a)=\frac{9}{49}\times\frac{-24a}{}\frac{\sqrt[4]{9}-1}{(3a^{4}+1)^{2}}=\frac{9}{49}\times\frac{-6a(4a^{4}-1)(a^{4}+5)}{(3a^{4}+1)^{2}}由导函数与原函数的单调性的关于可知:函数f(a)在区间(0,\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})上单调递增,在区间(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},+\infty)上单调递减.当a=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}时,\frac{a^{2}}{a^{2}b^{2}+1}-\frac{4}{49}a2取得最大值时,此时C的实轴长为2a=\sqrt{2}

text: 设斜率为$2$的直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a>0)$的焦点$F$，且和$y$轴交于点$A$，若$\triangle O A F$ ($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$4$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Slope(l) = 2;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);a>0;a: Number;F: Point;PointOnCurve(F,l) = True;Focus(G) = F;Intersection(l,yAxis) = A;O: Origin;A: Point;Area(TriangleOf(O,A,F)) = 4

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1)
process: 由双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,可知a=4,b=3;则双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{4}x

text: 设$e_{1}$ , $e_{2}$分别为具有公共焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的椭圆和双曲线的离心率，$P$是两曲线的一个公共点，且满足$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}|$，则$\frac{e_{1} e_{2}}{\sqrt{e_{1}^{2}+e_{2}^{2}}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Hyperbola;e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e1;Eccentricity(H) = e2;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};Focus(H) = {F1,F2};P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(G,H)) = P;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1) + VectorOf(P, F2)) = Abs(VectorOf(F1, F2));F1: Point;F2: Point
process: 试题分析:设椭圆、双曲线的方程分别为\frac{x^{2}}{a_{1}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b_{1}}=1,\frac{x2}{a_{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b_{2}}=1,公共焦点F_{1}、F_{2}的坐标分别是(-c,0),(c,0),设O为坐标原点,由于|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|,则2|PO|=|F_{1}F_{2}|,所以APF_{1}F_{2}是以P为直角顶点的三角形,再由椭圆、双曲线的定义可得\begin{cases}PF_{1}+|PF_{2}|=2a_{1}\\|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a_{2}\end{cases}所以|PF_{1}|=a_{1}+a_{2},|PF_{2}|=a_{1}-a_{2},由|PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}可得a_{1}^{2}+a_{2}^{2}=2c^{2},因此得\frac{1}{e^{2}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}=2,从而\frac{e_{1}e_{2}}{\sqrt{e^{2}+e_{2}^{2}}}的值为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},故应填\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，则$\Delta F_{1} PF_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True
process: 由题意得a=2,b=c=\sqrt{2}.\becauseP为椭圆上一点,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=4,\therefore\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的周长为|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|=4+2\sqrt{2}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左焦点$F$作$\odot O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，记切点为$A$、$B$，双曲线左顶点为$C$，若$\angle A C B=120^{\circ}$, 则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Circle;A: Point;C: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F;l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentOfPoint(F, O) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,O)=A;TangentPoint(l2,O)=B;LeftVertex(G) = C;AngleOf(A, C, B) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 由题意可得双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pmb/ax,因为若\angleACB=120^{\circ},所以根据图象的特征可得\angleAFO=30^{\circ},所以c=2a,又因为b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2},所以b/a=3,故离心率为2

text: 已知点$P$为抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$上的一个动点,$Q$为圆$x^{2}+(y-4)^{2}=1$上的动点,设点$P$到抛物线$C$的准线距离为$d$, 则$d+P Q$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + (y - 4)^2 = 1);Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, G);Distance(P, Directrix(C)) = d;d: Number

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点为$F$，虚轴的一个端点为$B$，如果直线$F B$与该双曲线的一条渐近线垂直，那么此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;F: Point;OneOf(Endpoint(ImageinaryAxis(G))) = B;B: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineOf(F,B),OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = True
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0则焦点F(c,0),B(0,b)直线FB:bx+cy-bc=0与渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x垂直,所以-\frac{b}{c}\cdot\frac{b}{a}=-1\thereforeb^{2}=ac所以c^{2}-a^{2}=ac,即e^{2}-e-1=0,所以e=\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}或e=\frac{1-\sqrt{5}}{2}(舍)

text: 已知点$F$是抛物线$x^{2}=12 y$的焦点,点$P$是抛物线上的点, 若平面上存在一点$M$,满足$\overrightarrow{F M}=\overrightarrow{M P}$, 则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 12*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);VectorOf(F, M) = VectorOf(M, P)
process: 设M(x,y),P的坐标为(t,\frac{1}{12}t^{2}),\because抛物线x^{2}=12y中,2p=12,可得p=6,\thereforeF(0,3),\therefore\overrightarrow{FM}=(x,y-3),\overrightarrow{MP}=(t-x,\frac{t^{2}}{12}-y)又\because\overrightarrow{FM}=\overrightarrow{MP},\therefore(x,y-3)=(t-x,\frac{t^{2}}{12}-y)可得\begin{cases}x=t-x\\y-3=\frac{t^{2}}{12}-y\end{cases},消去参数t可得x^{2}=6y-9即点M的轨迹方程为x^{2}=6y-9,

text: 与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有共同的渐近线，且过点$(2 , 2)$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 2);Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(H, C)
process: 试题分析:与双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1有共同的渐近线,设所求双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=\lambda,代入点(2,2),得:\lambda=3,所以答案应填:\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，其左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若$M$是该双曲线右支上一点，满足$\frac{|M F_{1}|}{|M F_{2}|}=3$，则离心率$e$的取值范围是?

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，其渐近线与圆$(x-a)^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{3}{4}$相切，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y^2 + (-a + x)^2 = 3/4);Eccentricity(C) = 2;IsTangent(Asymptote(C),G)
process: 由题意知,\frac{c}{a}=2,即c=2a,则b=\sqrt{3}a,由圆的方程可知,其圆心坐标为(a,0),半径r=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},不妨取双曲线渐近线bx-ay=0,则\frac{|ba|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},即\frac{\sqrt{3}a^{2}}{2a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},所以a=1,则b=\sqrt{3},故所求双曲线的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 过双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$上任一点$P$向两渐近线作垂线，垂足分别为$A$、$B$，则$|A B|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);P:Point;PointOnCurve(P,G);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};H1:Line;H2:Line;PointOnCurve(P,H1);PointOnCurve(P,H2);IsPerpendicular(H1,L1);IsPerpendicular(H2,L2);FootPoint(H1,L1)=A;FootPoint(H2,L2)=B
process: 试题分析:由题意得:P,A,B,O四点共圆,要使|AB|取得最小值,只须圆的直径取得最小值,即圆的直径的最小值是a=\sqrt{3},因为双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x,所以\angleAOB=120^{\circ},由正弦定理得:\frac{|AB|}{\sin\angleAOB}=2R',所以|AB|=2R\sin\angleAOB=\sqrt{3}\sin120^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{3}{2},所以答案应填:\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点$F$ ,$ A(-1,1)$，则曲线$C$上的动点$P$到点$F$与点$A$的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;F: Point;P:Point;A:Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = -4*x);Focus(C) = F;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(P,C)
process: 试题分析:根据抛物线方程求出焦点坐标和准线方程,再由抛物线的定义知:当P、A和P在准线上的射影点Q三点共线时,这个距离之和最小,即可得出结论\because抛物线方程为y^{2}=-4x,\therefore2p=4,可得焦点为F(-1,0),准线为x=1设P在抛物线准线l上的射影点为Q点,A(-1,1)则由抛物线的定义,可知当P、Q、A点三点共线时,点P到点(-1,1)的距离与P到该抛物线焦点的距离之和最小,\therefore最小值为1+1=2.

text: 焦点分别为$(-2,0)$,$(2,0)$且经过点$(2,3)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;I: Point;J: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(I) = (2, 0);Coordinate(J) = (2, 3);Focus(G) = {H,I};PointOnCurve(J,G)
process: 根据双曲线的定义,设双曲线的标准方程,将点坐标代入即可求解.[详解]由题意得c^{2}=4,可设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4-a^{2}}=1将(2,3)代入方程可得\frac{2}{a^{2}}-\frac{3^{2}}{4-a^{2}}=1,解得a^{2}=1或a^{2}=16(舍)从而,b^{2}=4-a^{2}=3^{n}所以x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1故答:y^{2}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$\frac{b^{2}+1}{a}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x因为一条渐近线的倾斜角为60^{\circ}所以\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},即b=\sqrt{3}a,所以\frac{b^{2}+1}{a}=\frac{3a^{2}+1}{a}=3a+\frac{1}{a}\geqslant2\sqrt{3a\cdot\frac{1}{a}}=2\sqrt{3},当且仅当3a=\frac{1}{a}即a=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}时取等号.所以\underline{b^{2}+1}的取值范围是[2\sqrt{3},+\infty)

text: 已知$A$、$B$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两个动点，且$O A \perp O B$，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\triangle A B F$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B));Focus(G) = F
process: 由于S_{\triangleABF}=S_{\triangleOAB}-(S_{\triangleOFA}+S_{\triangleOFB}),设A(t^{2},2t),B(m^{2},2m),由OA\botOB,得到t,m关系,利用均值不等式求得S_{AABO}=\frac{1}{2}|OA||OB|最大值,继而得解.设A(t^{2},2t),B(m^{2},2m),且OA\botOB\therefore\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=t^{2}m^{2}+4tm=0\thereforetm=-4或tm=0(舍去)由于tm<0\thereforet,m异号,不妨设t>0,m<0则S_{AABO}=\frac{1}{2}|OA||OB|=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{t^{4}+4t^{2}}\cdot\sqrt{m^{4}+4m^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|tm|\sqrt{(t^{2}+4)(m}-4)\geqslant4\sqrt{2|tm|+8}=16当且仅当:|t|=|m|,即m=-t时等号成立.因此4ABO面积的最小值为16,此时A(t^{2},2t),B(t^{2},-2t)因此直线OA倾斜角为45^{\circ},斜率为1故点A就是直线y=x与抛物线y^{2}=4x的除原点外的另一个交点:\begin{cases}y=x\\y2=4x\end{cases}.\begin{cases}x=0\\y=0\end{cases},\begin{cases}x=4\\y=4\end{cases}故A(4,4),B(4,4)因此S_{AOFA}=S_{AOFB}=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times4=2\thereforeS_{AABF}=S_{AOAB}-(S_{AOFA}+S_{AOFB})=16-2\times2=12

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点（点$A$在第一象限），若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 设直线AB的方程为x=my+\frac{1}{2},代入抛物线的方程得y^{2}-2my-1=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则y_{1}+y_{2}=2m|\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{FB},则y_{1}=-2y_{2}代入有\begin{cases}-y_{2}=2m\\-2y_{2}^{2}=-1\end{cases},得\begin{cases}m=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}\\y=-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\end{cases}则|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=m(y_{1}+y_{2})+1+1=\frac{9}{4}b答家为:9

text: 已知抛物线的方程是$y=a x^{2}$，则它的焦点坐标为?

process: 将y=ax^{2}变形为x^{2}=\frac{1}{a}y当a>0时,焦点为(0,\frac{1}{4a});当a<0时,x^{2}=\frac{1}{a}y=-(-\frac{1}{a})y,则焦点坐标为(0,-(-\frac{1}{4a})),即(0,\frac{1}{4a})综上所述,焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{4a})

text: 已知椭圆$T$:$\frac{{x^2}}{a^2}+\frac{{y^2}}{b^2}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{{\sqrt{2}}}2$，右焦点$F(1,0)$，三角形$ABC$的三个顶点都在椭圆$T$上，设它的三条边$AB$、$BC$、$AC$的中点分别为$D$、$E$、$M$，且三条边所在直线的斜率分别$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$，且$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$均不为$0$，$O$为坐标原点。若直线$O D$、$O E$、$O M$的斜率之和为$1$，则$\frac{1}{k_{1}}+\frac{1}{k_{2}}+\frac{1}{k_{3}}$=?

text: 已知椭圆$C$的焦点$F_{1}(-2 \sqrt{2}, 0)$, $F_{2}(2 \sqrt{2}, 0)$，长轴长为$6$，设直线$y=x+2$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x + 2);Coordinate(F1) = (-2*sqrt(2), 0);Coordinate(F2) = (2*sqrt(2), 0);Focus(C) = {F1,F2};Length(MajorAxis(C)) = 6;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}
process: 由已知条件得椭圆的焦点在x轴上,其中c=2\sqrt{2},a=3,从而b=1,\therefore其标准方程是:\frac{x^{2}}{9}+y^{2}=1.联立方程组\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1\\y=x+2\end{cases},消去y得,10x^{2}+36x+27=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2}),AB线段的中点为M(x_{0},y_{0}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=-\frac{18}{5},x_{0}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=-\frac{9}{5}\thereforey_{0}=x_{0}+2=\frac{1}{5},即线段AB中点坐标为(-\frac{9}{5}\frac{1}{5}).

text: 已知点$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$y^{2}=3 x$与过焦点的直线交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 3*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);Intersection(H,G) = {A, B}
process: 设A(\frac{y^{2}}{3},y_{1},B(\frac{y^{2}}{3},y_{2}),当直线AB斜率不存在时,y_{1}=p=\frac{3}{2},y_{2}=-p=\frac{3}{2},所以\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=(\frac{y^{2}}{3},y_{1},(\frac{y^{2}}{3},y_{2})=\frac{1}{9}y_{1}^{2}y_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{27}{16}当直线AB斜率存在时,设方程为x=my+\frac{3}{4}(m\neq0),与抛物线联立方程得:y^{2}-3my-\frac{9}{4}=0所以y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{9}{4},\therefore\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=(\frac{y_{1}}{3},y_{1})(\frac{y_{2}^{2}}{3},y_{2})=\frac{1}{9}y_{1}y_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{27}{16}.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$经过点$(\sqrt{3}, 2)$，且离心率为$3$，则它的虚轴长是?

text: 已知斜率为$k$的直线$l$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=8$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;k: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Slope(l)=k;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),l);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B))=8
process: 易知抛物线C:y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标为(1,0)若l与x轴垂直,则|AB|=4,不符合题意,则可设所求直线l的方程为y=k(x-1)由\begin{cases}y=k(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases},可得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0,由根与系数的关系,可得x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}}又AB过焦点,可知|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}}+2=8,则\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}}=6,解得k=\pm1.

text: $P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上任意一点，$P$在$y$轴上的射影为$Q$，点$M(7,8)$，则$|P M|$与$|P Q|$长度之和的最小值为?

text: 若动圆过定点$A(-3,0)$且和定圆$C$:$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=4$外切，则动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?

process: 设动圆P的半径为r,则有|PA|=r,再由两圆外切得到|PC|=2+r,进而得到|PC|-|PA|=2,再利用双曲线的定义求解.定圆的圆心为C(3,0),与A(-3,0)关于原点对称.设动圆P的半径为r,则有|PA|=r.因为两圆外切,所以|PC|=2+r,即|PC|-|PA|=2<|AC|=6,所以点P的轨迹是以A,C为焦点的双曲线的左支,则a=1,c=3,b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=8,所以轨迹方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(x\leqslant-1)

text: 已知直线$l$分别切抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y  (p>0)$和圆$x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$于点$A$, $B$($A$, $B$不重合)，点$F$为抛物线的焦点，当$|A F|$取得最小值时，$p$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));p: Number;p>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y + 1)^2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;TangentPoint(l, G) = A;TangentPoint(l, H) = B;Negation(A=B);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)))
process: 设A(x_{0},y_{0}),y=\frac{x}{p},所以y_{x}=x_{0}=\frac{x_{0}}{P}所以y-y_{0}=\frac{x_{0}}{p}(x-x_{0})所以直线l的方程为x_{0}x=py+py_{0},则\frac{|p(y_{0}-1)|}{\sqrt{x_{0}^{2}+p^{2}}}=1,把x_{0}^{2}=2py_{0}代入,可解得\begin{cases}x_{0}^{2}=4+4p,\\y_{0}=\frac{2}{D}+2,\end{cases}\therefore|AF|=\frac{2}{p}+2+\frac{p}{2}\geqslant4,当且仅当p=2时等号成立,所以p=2.

text: 椭圆过点$(3 , 0)$，离心率$e=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}$，椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(H, G);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;e = sqrt(6)/3
process: 当椭圆的焦点在x轴时,设椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),则a=3,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},所以c=\sqrt{6},b^{2}=3,所以椭圆方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1;当椭圆的焦点在y轴时,设椭圆方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),则b=3,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a2-b^{2}}{a^{2}}=1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{2}{3},a^{2}=27,所以椭圆方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{27}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1'看】本题考查求椭圆标准方程,其基本方法是待定系数法,具体步骤为:先定形,再定量,即先确定焦点所在位置,然后再根据条件建立关于ab的方程组,求出a,b后即可得到椭圆的标准方程,属于基础题.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (0, -2);Coordinate(F2) = (0, 2);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 4*sqrt(2)

text: 双曲线$C$的一个焦点是$(5,0)$，且一条渐近线方程为$3 x+4 y=0$，则双曲线$C$方程是?

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$的焦点，$M$、$N$是该抛物线的两点，$|M F|+|N F|=3$，则线段$M N$的中点到$x$轴的距离为?

process: 依题意可得抛物线的焦点坐标与准线方程,利用抛物线的定义将M、N到焦点的距离转化为其到准线的距离计算即可.抛物线的焦点为(0,\frac{1}{4}),准线为y=-\frac{1}{4},过M、N分别作准线的垂线,则|MM|=|MF|,|NN|=|NF|,所以|MM|+|NN|=|MF|+|NF|=3,所以中位线|PP'|=\frac{|MM|+|NN'|}{2}=\frac{3}{2},所以则线段MN的中点P到x轴的距离为|PP|-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{3}{2}-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{5}{4}
