text: 已知点$P(1,0)$到双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的距离为$\frac{1}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 0);Distance(P,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=1/2
process: 试题分析:双曲线一条渐近线方程为bx-ay=0,所以\frac{|b\times1-a\times0}{c}=\frac{1}{2},c=2b,a=\sqrt{3}b,e=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点. 若点$P$在双曲线上, 且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$, 则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 x$，过点$E(a, 0)$的直线$l$与$C$交于不同的两点$P(x_{1}, y_{1})$,$Q(x_{2}, y_{2})$，且满足$y_{1} y_{2}=-4$，以$Q$为中点的线段的两端点分别为$M$,$ N$，其中$N$在$x$轴上，$M$在$C$上，则$a$=?$|P M|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);E: Point;a: Number;Coordinate(E) = (a, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(E, l);P: Point;Q: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(Q) = (x2, y2);Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};y1*y2 = -4;M: Point;N: Point;MidPoint(H) = Q;Endpoint(H) = {M, N};PointOnCurve(N, xAxis);PointOnCurve(M, C);H:LineSegment;Negation(P=Q)

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 \sqrt{2} x$，点$A(1,2)$到右焦点$F$的距离为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);RightFocus(C)=F;Expression(Asymptote(C))=(y=pm*(2*sqrt(2)*x));Distance(A, F) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 设双曲线C的半焦距为c,因为点A(1,2)到右焦点的距离为2\sqrt{2},所以\sqrt{(1-c)^{2}+(2-0)^{2}}=2\sqrt{2},解得c=3或c=-1(舍去).因为\frac{b}{a}=2\sqrt{2},所以e=\frac{c}{a}=3,所以a=1,b=2\sqrt{2},所以双曲线C的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1

text: 焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆过点$P(3,0)$，焦距为$2$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);FocalLength(G) = 2;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)
process: 由条件焦点在x轴上的椭圆过点P(3,0),则a=3,又焦距为2,则c=1,从而可得答案由条件设椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)由椭圆过点P(3,0),则a=3,又焦距为2,则c=1所以椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{1}{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta M F_{2} N$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};l: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, l);M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {M, N}
process: 根据椭圆的定义,\triangleMF_{2}N的周长=4a=8

text: 已知动圆$P$与定圆$C$:$(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=1$相外切，又与直线$x=1$相切，那么动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Circle;G: Line;C:Circle;P1:Point;Expression(C)=((x+2)^2+y^2=1);Expression(G) = (x = 1);IsOutTangent(P,C);IsTangent(P,G);Center(P)=P1
process: 设圆心P到直线x=1的距离等于r,P(x,y),由题意可得PC=1+r,即\sqrt{(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}}:x,化简可得y^{2}=-8x.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 由题意可知,\frac{b}{a}=\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=2

text: 顶点在坐标原点，准线为$y=-2$的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = -2)
process: 由已知可得抛物线的标准方程为:x^{2}=2py,由-\frac{p}{2}=-2,得p=4,所以所求抛物线的方程为x^{2}=8y

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的一条渐近线与直线$x+t y+1=0$垂直，则$t$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;t: Number;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (t*y + x + 1 = 0);IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), H) = True
process: 求得双曲线的渐近线方程,直线x+ty+1=0的斜率为-\frac{1}{t},运用两直线垂直的条件:斜率之积为-1(两直线斜率都存在时),计算即可得到所求值羊解】双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1,可得该双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm2x,直线x+ty+1=0的斜率为-\frac{1}{1},而渐近线的斜率为\pm2当两直线的斜率都存在时,两直线垂直的条件:斜率之积为-1,可得-\frac{1}{t}=\frac{1}{2}或-\frac{1}{t}=-\frac{1}{2},解得t=\pm2.

text: 已知双曲线中心在原点且一个焦点为$F(\sqrt{7}, 0)$，直线$y=x-1$与其相交于$M$、$N$两点，$M N$中点横坐标为$-\frac{2}{3}$，则此双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;O:Origin;Center(G)=O;Expression(H) = (y = x - 1);OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Coordinate(F) = (sqrt(7), 0);Intersection(H,G)={M,N};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N))) = -2/3

G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>3;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)) = 8;A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G) = True;PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = True

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$上一点，$P$到椭圆右焦点的距离为$2$，则点$P$到椭圆的左准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/7 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, RightFocus(G)) = 2
process: 试题分析:由椭圆的方程可知a^{2}=16,b^{2}=7\thereforea=4,c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=3\cdot\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3}{4}根据椭圆的定义可得点P到椭圆左焦点的距离为2\times4-2=6,设点P到椭圆左准线的距离为d.由椭圆的第二定义可得e=\frac{6}{d}=\frac{3}{4},解得d=8.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若椭圆$C$上存在点$M$使三角形$M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$\sqrt{3} b^{2}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, C);Area(TriangleOf(M, F1, F2)) = sqrt(3)*b^2;Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 设M(x,y)则S_{\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}||y|=c|y|=\sqrt{3}b^{2},可得|y|=\frac{\sqrt{3}b^{2}}{c}\in(0,b]',再结合b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}即可求e=\frac{c}{a}得范围.详解】设F_{1}(-c,0),F_{2}(c,0),M(x,y)则S_{\DeltaMF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}||y|=c|y|若存在点M使三角形MF_{1}F_{2}的面积为\sqrt{3}b^{2},则c|y|=\sqrt{3}b^{2},可得|y|=\frac{\sqrt{3}b^{2}}{c},因为0<|y|\leqslantb,所以_{0}<\frac{\sqrt{3}b^{2}}{c}\leqslantb'即\sqrt{3}b\leqslantc,可得c^{2}\geqslant3b^{2}=3(a^{2}-c^{2})整理可得:4c^{2}\geqslant3a^{2},所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}\geqslant\frac{3}{4},解得:e\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\leqslante<1所以椭圆C的离心率e的取值范围是

text: 已知直线$l$: $y=k x+1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$交于$M$、$N$两点，且$|M N|=\frac{4 \sqrt{2}}{3}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=k*x+1);Intersection(l,G)={M,N};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = 4*sqrt(2)/3;k:Number

text: 直线$y=x+b$与曲线$y=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}$有且仅有一个公共点，则$b$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;b: Number;H: Curve;Expression(G) = (y = b + x);Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(x^2 - 1));NumIntersection(G, H) = 1
process: 依题意可知曲线y=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}的方程可整理成x^{2}-y^{2}=1(y\geqslant0),注意到双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=1的一条渐近线方程为y=x故要使直线y=x+b与曲线y=\sqrt{x^{2}-1}仅有一个公共点,有两种情况,如图所示(1)直线与左部分相交,此时有b\geqslant1;(2)直线与右部分相交,此时b的范围为-1\leqslantb<0.综合得b的范围:b\geqslant1或-1\leqslantb<0,表示为区间形式即:[-1,0)\cup[1,+\infty)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$2$，则它的一焦点到其中一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点，若点$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot  \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$,则$|P F_{1}+P F_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F1),VectorOf(P,F2))=0

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上任意一点，若$\frac{|PF_{1}|^{2}}{|PF_{2}|}$的最小值为$8 a$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 8*a;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$上任意一点，$P$与两焦点连线互相垂直，且$P$到两准线距离分别为$6$ , $12$，则椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = True;L1: Line;L2: Line;Directrix(G) = {L1, L2};Distance(P, L1) = 6;Distance(P, L2) = 12

text: 设$F$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，$C$的一个动点到$F$的最大距离为$d$，若$C$的右准线上存在点$P$，使得$P F=d$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(A, C);Max(Distance(A, F))= d;PointOnCurve(P, RightDirectrix(C));LineSegmentOf(P, F) = d;d:Number
process: 试题分析:由椭圆C的一个动点到F的最大距离为d,可知a+c=d,由PF=d可得d\geqslant\frac{a^{2}}{c}-c,所以有a+c\geqslant\frac{a^{2}}{c}-c即ac+c^{2}\geqslanta^{2}-c^{2},两边同时除以a^{2},整理得2e^{2}+e-1\leqslant0,解得e\in[\frac{1}{2},1)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点作一条倾斜角为$\alpha$，长度不超过$8$的弦，弦所在的直线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{3}{4}$有公共点，则$\alpha$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;I: LineSegment;alpha: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 3/4);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), I);Inclination(I) = alpha;Negation(Length(I) > 8);IsChordOf(I, G);IsIntersect(OverlappingLine(I), H)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点为$A$, 以$A$为圆心，半焦距$c$为半径作圆$A$，圆$A$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线交于$M$，$N$两点, 若$|M N|=\sqrt{3} c$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;RightVertex(C) = A;A1: Circle;Center(A1) = A;c: Number;HalfFocalLength(C) = c;Radius(A1) = c;M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(A1, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = {M, N};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = sqrt(3)*c
process: 设双曲线C的渐近线方程为bx-ay=0,点A(a,0)到渐近线的距离为d则d=\frac{ab}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{ab}{c}\therefore|MN|=2\sqrt{c^{2}-d^{2}}=2\sqrt{c^{2}-(\frac{ab}{c})^{2}}=2\sqrt{\frac{c}{\because|MN|=\sqrt{3}c\therefore4(\frac{c4-a2c2+a4}{c2})=3c^{2}化简为c^{4}-4a^{2}c^{2}+4a^{4}=0即e^{4}-4e^{2}+4=0解得e=\sqrt{2}故C的离心率为\sqrt{2}1在双曲线方程未知求离心率的问题:列出含有a,b,c的齐次方程,借助于b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}消去b,然后转化成为关于e的方程来求解.

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$, $l_{2}$，直线$l_{1}$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l_{2}$与$C$交于$D$、$E$两点，则$|A B|+4|D E|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l1: Line;l2: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l1);PointOnCurve(F, l2);IsPerpendicular(l1, l2);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l1, C) = {A, B};D: Point;E: Point;Intersection(l2, C) = {D, E}
process: 设直线l_{1}的方程为y=k(x-1),联立方程组,分别求得|AB|=4+\frac{4}{k^{2}}和|DE|=4+4k^{2},结合基本不等式,即可求得|AB|+4|DE|的最小值,得到答案.由题,抛物线C:y^{2}=4x的焦点F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1,设直线l_{1}的方程为y=k(x-1),k\neq0,联立方程组\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\y=k(x-1)\end{cases},则k^{2}x^{2}-(4+2k^{2})x+k^{2}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),可得x_{1}+x_{2}=2+\frac{4}{k^{2}}由抛物线的定义可得AB=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=4+\frac{4}{k^{2}}由l_{1}\botl_{2},可将上式中的k换为-\frac{1}{k},可得|DE|=4+4k^{2},则|AB|+4|DE|=20+4(4k^{2}+\frac{k}{k^{2}})\geqslant20+8\sqrt{4k^{2}.\frac{1}{k^{2}}}=36,当且仅当_{k}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},上式取得等号,则|AB|+4|DE|的最小值为36.

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上的一点，已知$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,G) = True;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F1) , LineSegmentOf(P,F2)) = True

text: 过点$M(0,1)$的直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为椭圆的右焦点，当$\triangle A B F$的周长最大时，$\triangle A B F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(M, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};RightFocus(G) = F;WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(A,B,F)))
process: 分析:根据椭圆的定义和性质可得右焦点F(2,0),设左焦点为F_{1}(-2,0),当且仅当A,B,F,共线时周长最长,再根据两点式求出直线的方程,进而求解面积详由题意,椭圆的左右焦点坐标分别为F_{1}(-2,0),F(2,0).又由椭圆的定义可得|AF|=2\sqrt{2}-|AF_{1}|,|BF|=2\sqrt{2}-|BF_{1}|,所以AABF的周长为|AF|+|BF|+|AB|=4\sqrt{2}+|AB|-(|AF_{1}|+|BF_{1}|),显然|AF_{1}|+|BF_{1}|\geqslant|AB|,当且仅当A,B,F_{1}共线时周长最长,最大值为8\sqrt{2}此时直线的方程为x-2y-2=0,联立方程组\begin{cases}x-2y-2=0\\\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1\end{cases}可得3y^{2}+4y-2=0则y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{3},所以此时aABF的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times4\times\frac{\sqrt[2]{10}}{3}=\frac{\sqrt{4}}{3},\frac{4}{3}.

text: 若直线$l$: $y=(a-1) x-1$与曲线$y^{2}=a x$恰好有一个公共点，试求实数$a$的取值集合?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Curve;a: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);Expression(l) = (y = x*(a - 1) - 1);NumIntersection(l, G) = 1
process: 当a=0时直线l:y=-x-1与曲线y^{2}=0恰有一个公共点,符合题意当a\neq0时,联立方程组\begin{cases}y=(a-1)x-\\x=\frac{y^{2}}{a}\end{cases}整理得(a-1)y^{2}-ay-a=0若a=1时,则y=-1,此时与y^{2}=x有一个公共点,符合题意;若a\neq1时,则A=a^{2}+4a(a-1)=0,解得a=\frac{4}{5}此时直线与曲线相切只有一个公共点,符合题意综上可得,实数a的取值集合为{0,1,\frac{4}{5}}

text: 若椭圆的方程$\frac{x^{2}}{10-a}+\frac{y^{2}}{a-2}=1$，且此椭圆的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，则实数$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(10 - a) + y^2/(a - 2) = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(2)/2
process: 试题分析:当焦点在x轴上时,椭圆的离心率_{e}=1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=1-\frac{a-2}{10-a}=(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})^{2},解得a=\frac{14}{3};当焦点在y轴上时,椭圆的离心率e^{2}=1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=1-\frac{10-a}{a-2}=(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2})^{2}解得a=\frac{22}{3};

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$的准线$l$，过$M(1 , 0)$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与$l$相交于$A$，与$C$的一个交点为$B$，若$AM=MB$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 0);G: Line;PointOnCurve(M, G);Slope(G) = sqrt(3);A: Point;Intersection(G, l) = A;B: Point;OneOf(Intersection(G, C)) = B;LineSegmentOf(A, M) = LineSegmentOf(M, B)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{2} x$，过其左焦点$F(-\sqrt{3}, 0)$作斜率为$2$的直线$l$交双曲线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则截得的弦长$A B$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = sqrt(2)*x);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-sqrt(3), 0);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F , l) = True;Slope(l) = 2;l: Line;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), C) = True
process: 由条件可知:\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2}且c=\sqrt{3},从而求出a,b,c的值,从而求出双曲线方程,则可设直线l的方程,联立直线与双曲线,利用弦长公式即可求出弦长的值.\because双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的一条渐近线方程是y=\sqrt{2}x\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2},即b=\sqrt{2}a,\because左焦点F(-\sqrt{3},0),\thereforec=\sqrt{3}\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=3a^{2}=3^{n}\thereforea^{2}=1,b^{2}=2,\therefore双曲线方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1,直线l的方程为y=2(x+\sqrt{3})设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2})_{2})由\begin{cases}y=2(x+\sqrt{3})\\x-\frac{y^{2}}{x_{2}}=1\end{cases}

text: 已知直线$y=x-3 m$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$P Q$中点的横坐标恰好为$2 m$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;m: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = -3*m + x);Intersection(G, C) = {P, Q};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, Q))) = 2*m

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$经过抛物线的焦点$F$，与抛物线交于$A$, $B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{B A}=4 \overrightarrow{B F}$，则$\triangle O A B$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};VectorOf(B, A) = 4*VectorOf(B, F)
process: 由题意首先确定直线AB的方程,然后联立直线方程与抛物线方程,结合韦达定理即可确定\triangleC的面积.[详解]由题意可知:AF=3BF,结合焦半径公式有:\frac{p}{1-\cos\alpha}=\frac{3p}{1+\cos\alpha}解得:\cos\alpha=\frac{1}{2},\alpha=\frac{\pi}{3},故直线AB的方程为:y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)与抛物线方程联立可得:3y^{2}-4\sqrt{3}y-12=0.则|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\sqrt{(\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3})^{2}-4\times(-4)}=\frac{8}{\sqrt{3}}故\triangleOAB的面积S=\frac{1}{2}\times|OF|\times|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times\frac{8}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{4}{3}\sqrt{3}

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=m x$的焦点是圆$E$:$ x^{2}+y^{2}+4 x-1=0$的圆心，则抛物线$C$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;m: Number;E: Circle;Expression(C) = (y^2 = m*x);Expression(E) = (4*x + x^2 + y^2 - 1 = 0);Focus(C) = Center(E)
process: 将圆的一般式方程x^{2}+y^{2}+4x-1=0化为标准方程得(x+2)+y^{2}=5,所以圆心是(-2,0),于是抛物线C的焦点是(-2,0),故m=-8故其准线方程是x=2.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$左支上的一个点，$|P F_{1}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$ ,且$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C)) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率的取值范围是$(0, \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}]$，点$A$、$B$分别是椭圆的右焦点和上顶点，且左焦点到直线$A B$的距离为$2$，则椭圆上的点$P$到两焦点的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Range(Eccentricity(G))=(0, sqrt(2)/2];A: Point;RightFocus(G) = A;B: Point;UpperVertex(G) = B;Distance(LeftFocus(G), LineOf(A, B)) = 2;A1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = A1;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 先得到直线AB的方程,然后根据左焦点到直线的距离可得\frac{bc}{a}=1,依据均值不等式以及a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}计算即可.羊解】由椭圆离心率为(0,\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}],则_{0}<\frac{c}{a}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\Rightarrow\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}\leqslant\frac{1}{2}又a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2},即2c^{2}\leqslanta^{2}\Rightarrow2c^{2}\leqslantc^{2}+b^{2}>c\leqslantb由题可知直线AB的方程为:\frac{x}{c}+\frac{y}{b}=所以左焦点到直线的距离为:\underline{\bot}\frac{y}{x}又a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}\geqslant2bc,所以1=\frac{bc}{a}\leqslant\frac{b^{2}+c^{2}}{2a},则a\geqslant2当且仅当b=c时取等号又椭圆上的点P到两焦点的距离之和为2a\geqslant4所以椭圆上的点P到两焦点的距离之和的最小值是4效答客为:4

text: 已知过点$M(1,-1)$的直线$l$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$M$是$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (1, -1);PointOnCurve(M,l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 双曲线的对称轴和坐标轴重合，中心在原点，焦点坐标为$(-2,0)$和$(2,0)$，且经过点$P(-2,3)$，则双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (2, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-2, 3);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 分析:根据焦点坐标可得c值,然后根据双曲线的定义计算点P到两焦点的距离可得a值,再由ab,c的关系可得b值即可.详由题意,c=2,|2a=\sqrt{(-2+2)^{2}+(0-3)^{2}}-\sqrt{(2+2)^{2}+(0-3)^{2}}|=2\thereforea=1,b=\sqrt{3},c=2,故双曲线的标准方程是x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} x$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x*(sqrt(3)/2)))
process: 因为渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}x'所以\frac{\sqrt{m}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},解得m=3

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$为双曲线$C$右支上一点，直线$A F_{1}$与$y$轴交于点$B$，且$|F_{1} B|=3|A B|$ ,$ A F_{1} \perp A F_{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(C));Intersection(LineOf(A,F1), yAxis) = B;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, B)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F1), LineSegmentOf(A, F2))

text: 以双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点为圆心，离心率为半径的圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);RightFocus(G) = Center(H);Eccentricity(G)=Radius(H)

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$共焦点，且离心率为$\frac{4}{3}$的双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 4/3;Focus(G)=Focus(H)

text: 双曲线$8 kx^{2}-ky^{2}=8$的一个焦点为$(0,3)$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (8*(k*x^2) - k*y^2 = 8);k: Number;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, 3);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 如果椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的弦被点$(1,1)$平分，那么这条弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;I: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(I) = (1, 1);MidPoint(H)=I;IsChordOf(H,G)
process: 设这条弦的两个端点分别为A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=1\\\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=1\end{cases},得\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=2\\y_{1}+y_{2}=2\end{cases}\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{16}+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4}=1由于点A、B均在椭圆\frac{x2}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1上,则\begin{cases}\\\end{cases}=1两式相减得\frac{x^{2}-x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}-y_{2}^{2}}{4}=0^{,}可在即\frac{(y_{1}-y_{2})(}{(x_{1}-x_{2})}所以,直线AB的斜率为k_{AB}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=-\frac{1}{4}因此,这条弦所在直线的方程为y-1=-\frac{1}{4}(x-1),即x+4y-5=0

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-y-m=0$经过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=6$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (-m + x - y = 0);m: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), l) = True;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6
process: :由\begin{cases}x-y-m=0\\y2=2px\end{cases}得x^{2}-(2m+2p)x+m^{2}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=2m+2p;又直线l:x-y-m=0经过抛物线C:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点(\frac{p}{2},0),\therefore\frac{p}{2}-0-m=0,解得m=\frac{p}{2}又|AB|=(x_{1}+\frac{p}{2})+(x_{2}+\frac{p}{2})=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2m+3p=4p=6,\thereforep=\frac{3}{2}即答案为\frac{3}{5}

text: 设$A(x_{1} , y_{1})$ , $B(x_{2} , y_{2})$是抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$上的两点，直线$l$是$A B$的垂直平分线, 当直线$l$的斜率为$\frac{1}{2}$时，则直线$l$在$y$轴上截距的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;y1: Number;x2: Number;y2: Number;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = l;Slope(l) = 1/2

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$x^{2}=-2 p y(p>0)$的焦点$F$与$\frac{y^{2}}{8}+\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$的一个焦点重合，过焦点$F$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两不同点，抛物线$C$在$A$、$B$两点处的切线相交于点$M$，且$M$的横坐标为$2$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = -2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;Q: Curve;Expression(Q) = (x^2/4 + y^2/8 = 1);OneOf(Focus(Q)) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G) = True;G: Line;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Negation(A = B);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(TangentOnPoint(A, C), TangentOnPoint(B, C)) = M;M: Point;XCoordinate(MidPoint(M)) = 2
process: 由题意可得F(0,-2),则p=4,抛物线方程为x^{2}=-8y设直线AB方程为y=kx-2,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}):-\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{8},y_{2}=由y=-\frac{x^{2}}{8}得y=-\frac{x}{4},\frac{2}{8},所以在点A处的切线方程为y-y=-\frac{x_{1}}{4}(x-x_{1})化简得y=-\frac{x_{1}}{4}x+\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{8}\textcircled{1}同理可得在点B处的切线方程为y=-\frac{x_{2}}{4}x+\frac{x_{2}^{2}}{8}\textcircled{2}联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}得x_{M}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2},又\becauseM的横坐标为2,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=4.将AB方程代入抛物线得x^{2}+8kx-16=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=-8k=4,\thereforek=-\frac{1}{2},\thereforey_{1}+y_{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2})-4=-\frac{1}{2}\times4-4=-6.\therefore|AB|=_{p}-y_{1}-y_{2}=10.

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上有一条长为$10$的动弦$A B$，则$A B$的中点到$y$轴的最短距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 10
process: 令A(x_{1},y),B(x_{2},y_{2}),而抛物线准线为x=-1.如上图,对任意不过焦点的弦AB,E为AB中点有GE=\frac{AC+BD}{2}=\frac{BF+AF}{2}>\frac{AB}{2}故在抛物线中,AB=10的弦中只有过焦点的弦,其中点到准线或y轴的距离最小可知:x_{1}+x_{2}+2=10,且A、B中点坐标为(\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2},\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2})\therefore中点到y轴距离为\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=4均答家为:4[

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=16$被直线$y=\frac{1}{2} x+1$截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 16);Expression(H) = (y = x/2 + 1)

text: 直线$y=2 x+3$与曲线$y=x^{2}$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x + 3);Expression(H) = (y = x^2);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B}

text: 若双曲线经过点$(6, \sqrt{3})$，且其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则此双曲线的标准方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (6, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H, G);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/3))
process: 由题意得,双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{3}x.设所求的双曲线的方程为x^{2}-9y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0).\because点(6,\sqrt{3})为该双曲线上的点,\therefore\lambda=36-27=9.\therefore该双曲线的方程为:x^{2}-9y2=9即\frac{x^{2}}{0}-y^{2}=1

text: 若直线$m x-y-2 m=0$与曲线$x=\sqrt{1+y^{2}}$有两个公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;m: Real;H: Curve;Expression(G) = (-2*m + m*x - y = 0);Expression(H) = (x = sqrt(y^2 + 1));NumIntersection(G, H)=2
process: 曲线x=\sqrt{1+y^{2}}即x^{2}-y^{2}=1(x\geqslant1),其渐近线为:y=\pmx直线mx-y-2m=0,即y=m(x-2),直线过定点(2,0)在同一坐标系下,作出二者的图象:由图像可得:m\in(-\infty,-1)\cup(1,+\infty)

text: 已知点$P(2, a)$在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上，则点$P$到抛物线$C$的焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, a);a: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P, C) = True
process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=4x的准线方程为:x=-1,由抛物线定义得,点P(2,a)到抛物线C的焦点的距离d=2-(-1)=3,所以点P到抛物线C的焦点的距离为3故答家为:3

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{-2-\lambda}+\frac{y^{2}}{1+2 \lambda}=-3$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则$\lambda$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;lambda: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(-lambda - 2) + y^2/(2*lambda + 1) = -3);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)
process: 根据焦点在y轴上的椭圆方程的特点得到不等式组,解不等式组即可.\frac{x^{2}}{-2-\lambda}+\frac{y^{2}}{1+2\lambda}=-3\Rightarrow\frac{y^{2}}{-3(1+2\lambda)}+\frac{x^{2}}{3(2+\lambda)}=1=-3表示焦点在y轴上的椭圆|-\frac{1}{2}|所以有\begin{cases}-3(1+2\lambda)\\3(2+\lambda)>0\\-3(1+2)\end{cases}\Rightarrow-2<\lambda<-3(1+22)>3(2+\lambda)

text: 已知动圆$M$与直线$y=2$相切，且与定圆$C$: $x^{2}+(y+3)^{2}=1$外切，则动圆圆心$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Circle;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = 2);IsTangent(M, G);C: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2 + (y + 3)^2 = 1);IsOutTangent(M, C);M1: Point;Center(M) = M1
process: 设动圆半径为r,则M到直线y=2的距离为r,MC=r+1.故M到(0,-3)的距离等于到y=3的距离,故轨迹为抛物线,即x^{2}=-12y

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F(4,0)$，若过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线的右支有且只有一个交点，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (4, 0);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);NumIntersection(H, RightPart(G)) = 1
process: 试题分析:由题意可知,要使直线与双曲线的右支有且只有一个交点,则双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x的斜率\frac{b}{a}\geqslant\tan60^{\circ},即(\frac{b}{a})^{2}\geqslant3,结合右焦点为F(4,0)即c=4,可解得a的取值范围是0<a\leqslant2,故答案填0<a\leqslant2.

text: 以抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点为圆心，以焦点到准线的距离为半径的圆被双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;C: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/4);Center(C)=Focus(H);Radius(C)=Distance(Focus(H),Directrix(H))
process: 试题分析:根据题意可知圆的方程为x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=4,取双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1的渐近线y=\frac{1}{2}x,即x-2y=0,圆心到直线的距离d=\frac{|-2|}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{\sqrt[2]{5}}{5},所以对应的弦长为2\sqrt{4-\frac{4}{5}}=\frac{8\sqrt{5}}{5}.

text: 焦点在$y$轴上，渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$的双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 已知椭圆方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上的动点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$的最大值为$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);Max(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = (2*pi)/3;a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0
process: 由椭圆的定义可得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a,由余弦定理可得|^{2}=\frac{(|PF_{1}+|PF_{2}|)^{2}-|FF|F}{|PF_{1}|}|P|^{2}-1=\frac{4b^{2}-1=\frac{22}{2a^{2}}-1}{a}F_{1}\bot|PF因为\angleF_{1}PF_{2}的最大值为\frac{2\pi}{3},则\frac{2b^{2}}{a^{2}}-1=\cos因为\angleF_{1}PF_{2}的最大值为\frac{2\pi}{3},则\frac{2b^{2}}{a^{2}}-1=\cos\frac{2\pi}{3}=-\frac{1}{2},可得\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4},因此,该椭圆的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{a2-b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}.

text: 已知曲线$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=m$恰有三个点到直线$12 x+5 y+26=0$距离为$1$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = m);m: Number;D1: Point;D2: Point;D3: Point;PointOnCurve(D1, C) ;PointOnCurve(D2, C) ;PointOnCurve(D3, C)  ;Distance(D1, G) = 1;Distance(D2, G) = 1;Distance(D3, G) = 1;G: Line;Expression(G) = (12*x + 5*y + 26 = 0)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 由题得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=1,\thereforec^{2}=4+1=5,\thereforec=\sqrt{5}由题得\begin{cases}20=|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\times\frac{1}{2}=(|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|)^{2}+|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\therefore|PF_{1}||PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}||=4所以_{S}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\cdot\sin\frac{\pi}{3}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot4\cdot\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\sqrt{3}

text: 过双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 a^{2}}=1(a>0)$的右焦点$F$作斜率为$k$的直线交双曲线的右支于$M$ . $N$两点，弦$M N$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$P$，则$\frac{|P F|}{|M N|}$=?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;a: Number;k:Number;H: Line;M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;F:Point;a>0;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2- y^2/(3*a^2) = 1);RightFocus(Gamma) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = k;Intersection(H,RightPart(Gamma))={M,N};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Gamma);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(M,N)),xAxis)=P

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为$C$渐近线上一点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|O P|=1$ , $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$\sqrt{2} a$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, Asymptote(C)) = True;O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = 1;Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = sqrt(2)*a
process: 不妨设点P(x_{0},y_{0})为第一象限内的点,则y_{0}=\frac{b}{a}x_{0}S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\times2c\times\frac{b}{a^{2}+\frac{2}{c^{2}}}=1,即\frac{3a}{a^{2}}(\frac{a}{b^{2}+1)=\frac{2ac}{b^{2}c}}=\frac{2a^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,}的\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=2则y_{0}=\frac{b}{a}x_{0}=\frac{\sqrt{2}a}{c},即点_{P}(\frac{\sqrt{2}a^{2}}{bc},\frac{\sqrt{2}a}{c})

text: 抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$的焦点为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2)
process: 试题分析:抛物线方程y=2x^{2}变形为x^{2}=\frac{1}{2}y\therefore2p=\frac{1}{2}\therefore\frac{p}{2}=\frac{1}{4},所以焦点为(0,\frac{1}{8})

text: 点$P$是焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{25}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的动点，若点$I$满足$\overrightarrow{PI} \cdot | \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}|+\overrightarrow{F_{1} I} \cdot |\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|+\overrightarrow{F_{2} I} \cdot | \overrightarrow{P F_{1}} |=\overrightarrow{0}$, 则点$I$的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;I: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 - y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);VectorOf(F1, I)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) + VectorOf(P, I)*Abs(VectorOf(F1, F2)) + VectorOf(F2, I)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 0

text: 如果方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+1} + \frac {y^{2}}{m+2}=1$表示双曲线，那么$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 1) + y^2/(m + 2) = 1)

text: 已知点$A$、$B$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的两点，$O$为原点，若$ \overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$, 则点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0

text: 已知$\triangle A B C$的顶点$A$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的一个焦点，顶点$B$、$C$在椭圆上，且$B C$边经过椭圆的另一个焦点，则$\triangle A B C$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;B: Point;C: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);Negation(A=F);OneOf(Focus(G)) = A;PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(C, G);F:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F;PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(B,C))
process: 根据椭圆的定义求解即可.易得\triangleABC的周长为B、C两点到两个焦点间的距离之和为2a+2a=4a=4\sqrt{3}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦距为$6$, 则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);FocalLength(G) = 6
process: \because双曲线\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1,\thereforea=2,b=\sqrt{m}\because双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的焦距为6\therefore6=2\sqrt{4+m}解得m=5

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若椭圆上的点$P$满足$P F_{2} \perp x$轴，$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F2),xAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))=2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))

text: 若$A B$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的动弦, 且$|A B|=a(a>2 p)$, 则$A B$的中点$M$到$y$轴的最近距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);a: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = a;a>2*p;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
P: Point;O: Origin;C: Curve;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Expression(C) = (sqrt(y^2 + (x - 1)^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + 1)^2) = 4);PointOnCurve(P, C);x1: Number;y1: Number
process: 试题分析:由题意,P点轨迹是到两定点(1,0),(-1,0)的距离之和为4的点的轨迹,是椭圆,标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,|OP|的最大值为a=2

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上任意一点，过点$P$作双曲线的渐近线的平行线，分别与两渐近线交于$M$、$N$两点，若$|P M| \cdot|P N|=b^{2}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(P,L1);PointOnCurve(P,L2);Asymptote(G)={l1,l2};IsParallel(L1,l1);IsParallel(L2,l2);Intersection(L1,l2)=M;Intersection(L2,l1)=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N)) = b^2
process: 试题分析:设P(a,0),则双曲线的渐近线方程y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,过点P作双曲线两渐近线的平行方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}(x-a)\begin{matrix}m&y=\frac{s}{x-0}\\y=\frac{a-a}{b}&x\end{matrix}=由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=4b^{2},c=2b,\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2b}{\sqrt{3}b}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$的准线$l$，过$M(1,0)$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与$l$相交于$A$，与$C$的一个交点为$B$，若$\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{M B}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G:Line;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(M) = (1, 0);Directrix(C)=l;PointOnCurve(M,G);Slope(G)=sqrt(3);Intersection(G,l)=A;OneOf(Intersection(G,C))=B;VectorOf(A, M) = VectorOf(M, B)
process: 试题分析:由题意,得l:x=-\frac{p}{2},且直线方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1),则A(-\frac{p}{2},\sqrt{3}(-\frac{p}{2}-1)),因为\overrightarrow{AM}=\overrightarrow{MB},所以B(2+\frac{p}{2},\sqrt{3}(\frac{p}{2}+1)),将B(2+\frac{p}{2},\sqrt{3}(\frac{p}{2}+1))代入y^{2}=2px,得3(\frac{p}{2}+1)^{2}=2p(2+\frac{p}{2}),解得p=2;故填2.

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，过点$(1,0)$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l) = True;Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point
process: 过点(1,0)作倾斜角为45^{\circ}的直线l方程为y=x-1,联立\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\\y=x-1\end{cases},得7x^{2}-8x-8=0,\triangle=64+4\times7\times8>0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{8}{7},x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{8}{7}.|AB|=\sqrt{(1+1)[(\frac{8}{7})^{2}+4\times\frac{8}{7}]}=\frac{24}{7},原点O(0,0)到直线y=x-1的距离d=\frac{|-1|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\therefore\triangleAOB的面积S=\frac{1}{2}\timesd\times|AB|=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\times\frac{24}{7}=\frac{6\sqrt{2}}{7}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，且双曲线的离心率 是椭圆离心率的两倍，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2*Eccentricity(H)

text: 双曲线的焦距是两准线间距离的$4$倍，则此双曲线的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L1:Line;L2:Line;Directrix(G)={L1,L2};FocalLength(G)=4*Distance(L1,L2)
process: 根据焦距和两准线间的距离列出等式,进而解出答案即可.[详解]因为双曲线的准线方程为:x=\pm\frac{a^{2}}{c},所以2c=4\times\frac{2a^{2}}{c},即c^{2}=4a^{2},则e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=4,e=2

text: 已知椭圆中心在原点，一个焦点为$F(-2  \sqrt{3} , 0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则该椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-2*sqrt(3), 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))
G: Ellipse;C:Ellipse;a: Number;Expression(G) = (a*x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(C)=(x^2/12 + y^2/9 = 1);FocalLength(G)=FocalLength(C)

text: 已知以$x \pm 2 y=0$为渐近线的双曲线经过点$(4,1)$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (pm*2*y + x = 0);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (4, 1);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 设双曲线方程为x^{2}-4y^{2}=\lambda,代入点(4,1),计算得到答案双曲线渐近线为x\pm2y=0,则设双曲线方程为:x^{2}-4y^{2}=\lambda,代入点(4,1),则\lambda=12故双曲线方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点$F$作渐近线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$的垂线，垂足为$M$，与双曲线的左、右两支分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;M:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;L:Line;OneOf(Asymptote(G))=L;Expression(L)=(y=(b/a)*x);L1:Line;IsPerpendicular(L,L1);FootPoint(L,L1)=M;PointOnCurve(F, L1);Intersection(L1,LeftPart(G)) = A;Intersection(L1,RightPart(G)) = B
process: 由直线AB与双曲线左右支均有交点,则直线AB与渐近线y=-\frac{b}{a}x必交于第二象限\therefore直线AB的斜率必大于渐近线y=-\frac{b}{a}x的斜率,即-\frac{a}{b}>-\frac{b}{a},即b^{2}>a^{2},又b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}\thereforec^{2}>2a^{2},双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}>\sqrt{2},\therefore双曲线的离心率的取值范围(),+\infty),

text: 顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，且过点$(-4,-8)$的抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(H) = (-4, -8);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(H, G);Vertex(G) = O
process: 依题意,设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=mx,m\neq0.则有(-8)^{2}=m\cdot(-4),解得m=-16,所以所求抛物线方程为v2=-16x.故答安为:y2=-16x

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，过$F$且倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交于$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}
process: 由y^{2}=8x,得2p=8,p=4,则F(2,0)\therefore过A,B的直线方程为y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-2)联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=8x\\y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-2)\end{cases},得x^{2}-28x+4=0设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则x_{1}+x_{2}=28,\because|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+P=28+4=32.
